[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum ga ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D374}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI he ru kA b+h+ya da ya nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag 
[\[1b.2\]]bshad bya ba/_/mchog tu rmad byung gseng ba ni/_/gang zhig mis ni yang dag rig_/sgrub po dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/tshes grangs med cing skar ma'ang med/_/smyung ba med par 
[\[1b.3\]]brjod bya ste/_/dag pa dang ni mi gtsang med/_/mi smra chu yi bya ba med/_/dus dang tshod las rnam par grol/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/_/de yis grong pa'i chos mi spyad/_/
[\[1b.4\]]rtsod ldan dus su dngos grub 'gyur/_/rdzogs ldan yon tan gcig 'grub ste/_/de bzhin gsum ldan yon tan gnyis/_/gnyis ldan yon tan gsum du gsungs/_/rtsod ldan 
[\[1b.5\]]yon tan bzhi nyid de/_/dngos grub nyid du the tshom med/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las 'jug pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan ni 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rab bshad bya/_/rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyud chen du/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed/_/sa yi cha mnyam yid 'ong bar/_/dri yi chu yis nyer byugs te/_/sna tshogs spos ni yid 
[\[2a.2\]]'ong dang /_/me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram/_/gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su/_/sngags shes pas ni bsrung bar bya/_/phyogs ni bcing bar bya ba'o/_/de ltar cho ga yang dag ldan/_/mkhas pas dgod bya dgod par bya/_/sems ni 
[\[2a.3\]]shin tu dga' ba yis/_/kun nas kun tu cho ga bsam/_/bud med phyag rgya ge sar bcas/_/dang po'i tsheg drag rjes dbyangs dang /_/ring dang thung bar rab tu grags/_/gru gsum gnyis ni yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin ma ning bzhi bo 
[\[2a.4\]]dang /_/bud med skyes bu rnam pa bzhi/_/de bzhin gnyis pa dang po'i dbyangs/_/ring dang thung bar shes bya ste/_/dbyangs kyi phyi mo dgong par bya/_/dbyangs kyi sde ni dang por dgod/_/lce rtsa'i dbyangs ni gnyis par dgod/_/tsheg drag 
[\[2a.5\]]dbyangs ni gsum par ro/_/dbus su pad ma bzhi par ro/_/lnga pa ta yi sde tshan te/_/drug pa pa yi sde tshan yin/_/an tas+tha ni bdun par 'dod/_/dro ba'i yi ge brgyad pa ste/_/mtha' ma ru ni bsdus pa yin/_/de ltar rig 
[\[2a.6\]]cing rnam shes pas/_/sngags kyi gtso bo nyid ni btu/_/bkod pa las ni sngags btus pas/_/myur du dngos grub 'bras bu 'thob/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las sngags dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]de nas sngags kyi cho ga bshad/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o/_/gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/sgrub pos dngos grub 'thob 'gyur ba'o/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/_/de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum 
[\[2b.2\]]pa dang /_/an tas+tha yi bzhi pa nyid/_/lnga pa yi ni dang po dang /_/an tas+tha yi bzhi pa nyid/_/de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang /_/uSh+ma Na yi dang por brjod/_/an tas+tha yi dang po nyid/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid/_/gnyis pa yin ni 
[\[2b.3\]]dang po dang /_/an tas+tha yi gsum pa nyid/_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/an tas+tha yi dang por brjod/_/gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/bzhi pa yi ni dang por brjod/_/
[\[2b.4\]]drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/_/de bzhin du ni bcu bdun pa/_/nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni mchog_/de bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/_/nyi shu rtsa bdun mchog nyid dang /_/an tas+tha yi dang por brjod/_/lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/uSh+ma Na yi gnyis pa nyid/_/bcu bdun 
[\[2b.5\]]pa yi mchog nyid do/_/an tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang /_/de bzhin du yang gsum pa'o/_/de nas bcu dgu pa yi mchog_/drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid/_/uSh+ma Na yi gnyis pa dang /_/sum cu rtsa gcig de nas blang /_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/yang na [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[2b.6\]]brgyad pa nyid dang /_/an tas+tha yi dang por brjod/_/uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang /_/de nyid kyi yang bzhi pa nyid/_/de bzhin du yang gsum pa nyid/_/drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/gsum pa yi ni gsum pa nyid/_/drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/uSh+ma Na yi gsum 
[\[2b.7\]]pa nyid/_/an tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang /_/de nyid kyi ni dang po nyid/_/drug pa yi ni dang po dang /_/an tas+tha yi gnyis pa nyid/_/'di ltar drod kyi dang po dang /_/drug pa'i dang por brjod par bya/_/uSh+ma Na yi dang po nyid/_/de bzhin d+h+ya yig rnal 'byor ma/_/lnga pa yi 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ni dang po dang /_/uSh+ma Na yi dang por brjod/_/an tas+tha yi gsum pa nyid/_/de bzhin du ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa nyid/_/lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/an tas+tha yi gnyis pa nyid/_/bzhi 
[\[3a.2\]]pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/byA yi yi ge dang por brjod/_/de nas nyi shu pa nyid dang /_/de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/_/an tas+tha yi gnyis par brjod/_/lnga pa yi ni bzhi ba dang /_/an tas+tha yi de bzhin 
[\[3a.3\]]nyid/_/de nyid kyi ni dang po dang /_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa nyid/_/'di ltar drug pa'i lnga pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/de bzhin mkhas pas bcu bdun pa/_/an tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang /_/de nyid kyi 
[\[3a.4\]]yang bzhi pa nyid/_/drug pa'i dang po'ang brjod par bya/_/drod kyi sde tshan gnyis pa dang /_/an tas+tha yi dang por brjod/_/ka ra ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/_trA sa ye trA sa ya/_k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/_hrauM hrauM/_hraHhraH_phai~M phai~M/_phaT phaT/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_b+ha k+Sha 
[\[3a.5\]]b+ha k+Sha/_ba su ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba la~M bi ne/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_sap+ta pA ta la ga ta b+hu dza~M ga~M sar+b+ba~M bA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/_A kaDa D+ha ya a kaDa D+ha ya/_hra~M hra~M/_dz+hauM dz+hauM/_k+Sh+mA~M k+Sh+mA~M/_hA~M hA~M/_hA~M hA~M/_hU~M hU~M/_ki li ki li/_si li si li/_hi li hi li/_d+hi li d+hi li/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM gyi yi ge dang po 
[\[3a.6\]]ste/_/hU~M phaT yi ge tha mar sbyar/_/rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu grags/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las yi ge btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o//_//snying po 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'o/_/khams gsum 
[\[3a.7\]]rnam rgyal zhes bya bas/_/chos don 'dod dang thar bar skyel/_/drod kyi sde tshan gsum pa la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pa sbyar bar bya/_/dang po ru ni yongs su grags/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/de nyid kyi ni bzhi pas ni/_/'og gi char ni rnam par brtag_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]dbyangs yig gsum par sbyar ba yin/_/drod kyi sde tshan gsum pa la/_/dbyangs yig lnga par yang dag ldan/_/bzhi pa ru ni yongs su grags/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/de nyid kyi ni bzhi pas ni/_/'og gi char ni the tshom med/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/
[\[3b.2\]]dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan/_/steng du nA da sbyar ba ni/_/drug pa ru ni yongs su grags/_/drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/bzhi pa'i dang por brjod par bya/_/dang po yi ni tshig rkang ste/_/dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu ster/_/gcig ma tshang ba'i nyi shu la/_/
[\[3b.3\]]me yi bus ni dbye bar bya/_/dbyangs yig gsum par yang dag ldan/_/dang po ru ni yongs su grags/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/lnga ba'i lnga pa yang dag ldan/_/lan gnyis su ni yongs su grags/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yis 
[\[3b.4\]]brgyan byas te/_/bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/_/lnga pa ru ni yang dag grags/_/drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/bzhi pa yi ni dang po ste/_/thams cad mtshan nyid yang dag ster/_/tshig rkang gnyis par brjod pa'o/_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/_/
[\[3b.5\]]me yi sa bon yang dag gnas/_/dbyangs yig gsum pa yang dag ldan/_/dang po ru ni yongs su grags/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/lnga ba'i lnga pa yang dag ldan/_/dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba ste/_/drug pa yi ni dang po dang /_/de ltar yang ni gnyis 
[\[3b.6\]]ldab bo/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/_/de nas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yis brgyan/_/drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang /_/tshig rkang gsum par brjod pa yin/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/_/dang po yi ni 
[\[3b.7\]]gnyis pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/an tas+tha yi dang po dang /_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum yang dag ldan/_/mchog tu dge zhing dam pa'o/_/drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/gcig ma tshang ba'i nyi shu dang /_/an tas+tha yi bzhi pa la/_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]dbyangs yig gnyis pa yang dag ldan/_/thig le yis ni steng du brgyan/_/an tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang /_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa nyid la/_/me yi bus ni rnam par dbye/_/drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/_/lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan/_/steng du stong 
[\[4a.2\]]pas rnam par brgyan/_/drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/bzhi pa yi ni dang po ste/_/'di rnams rkang pa bzhi pa yin/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po/_/bzhi pa yi ni sngags 'di dag_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba 
[\[4a.3\]]las snying po'i sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas sngags rnams 'di dag ni/_/dpa' bo rnams la sbyar bya ba/_/rnal 'byor ma ni rnams yin te/_/sngags kyi cho ga shes pas bzlas/_/gnyis med dngos grub rnal 'byor ma/_/
[\[4a.4\]]gnyis pa yi ni yi ge la/_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ni ldan/_/drug pa'i yi ge bye brag tu/_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig pas ni ldan/_/bdun par yongs su grags pas ni/_/dbyangs yig bzhi pas ldan pa yin/_/yi ge brgyad pa dag la ni/_/dbyangs 
[\[4a.5\]]yig bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/_/yi ge bcu gnyis pa dag ni/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas rnam par dbye/_/yi ge bcu gnyis ngag la ni/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan byas te/_/drug pa'i dang po nyid kyis ni/_/'og gi gnas su rab tu brtag_/yi ge 
[\[4a.6\]]bcu bzhi pa dag ni/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang ldan/_/dge zhing mchog tu phan pa yin/_/yi ge [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'i mtshan nyid/_/dbyangs yig gsum par ldan byas te/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pas ni/_/'og gi cha ru yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin yi ge bcu drug 
[\[4a.7\]]nyid/_/steng du nA das sbyar ba yin/_/yi ge bcu bdun pa nyid la/_/dbyangs yig gsum pas yang dag ldan/_/yi ge [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa la ni/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas yang dag ldan/_/yi ge nyi shu gcig pa ni/_/dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/_/
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]yi ge nyi shu rtsa gsum pa/_/dbyangs yig lnga pas mnyam par ldan/_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po yis/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dang ldan/_/mkhas pas rtag tu ldan pas ni/_/nyi shu rtsa drug 
[\[4b.2\]]pa la brjod/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan pa ru/_/mtshon byed gnyis ni mtshon par byed/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/_/de bzhin [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pas ni mtshon/_/gcig ma tshang ba'i sum cu la/_/bzhi pa'i dang po sbyar ba dang /_/dbyangs yig 
[\[4b.3\]]gnyis pa yang dag ldan/_/me dang yang dag ldan par bya/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan pa ni/_/sum cu rtsa gcig yi ge yin/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yi ge la/_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum pas ni ldan/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yi ge la/_/nyi ma 
[\[4b.4\]]yis ni rab tu dbye/_/sngags rnams kun gyis gsal ba ste/_/de ltar the tshom med pa yin/_/sum cu rtsa bzhi yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi bzhi pas ldan pa ste/_/go 'phang mchog tu dge ba yin/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas ldan pa ni/_/de bzhin sum cu rtsa 
[\[4b.5\]]bdun yin/_/sum cu rtsa brgyad yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pas ldan par bya/_/dngos grub thams cad rnam par nges/_/de bzhin bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la/_/nyi ma yis ni sbyar ba yin/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gsum yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar bar 
[\[4b.6\]]bya/_/de yang dge ba'i mchog yin no/_/bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rab gsungs pa/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan par bya/_/de ltar nyid du the tsom med/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas ldan pa ni/_/de bzhin bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o/_/bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid la/_/
[\[4b.7\]]dbyangs kyi gnyis pas mnyam par bya/_/de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar bar bya/_/'dis ni thar pa grub pa nyid/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pas ldan pa ni/_/mkhas pas lnga bcu rtsa gnyis brjod/_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]par ldan pa/_/lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge yin/_/lnga bcu rtsa drug yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi drug par ldan pa yin/_/gcig ma tshang ba'i drug cu la/_/an tas+tha yi bzhi par sbyar/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar bar bya/_/steng du nA 
[\[5a.2\]]das rnam par brgyan/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pas ldan pa ni/_/drug cu rtsa gcig pa la sbyar/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas ldan pa ni/_/drug cu rtsa gnyis bye brag go/_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig ldan pa ni/_/drug cu rtsa gsum mkhas pas brjod/_/dbyangs yig 
[\[5a.3\]]lnga pas sbyar ba ni/_/yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/_/de bzhin drug cu rtsa lnga la/_/mes ni nges par sbyar bar bya/_/dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba/_/'dzin pa ru ni the tshom med/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas ldan pa ni/_/drug cu rtsa drug phye ba yin/_/rigs 
[\[5a.4\]]dang rigs min rab bsgrub pa'o/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pas yang dag ldan/_/drug cu rtsa bdun bshad pa ni/_/dpa' bo mchod pa zhes ni bya/_/an tas+tha yi bzhi pa yis/_/drug cu rtsa brgyad rab tu grags/_/bdun cu rtsa gcig yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi 
[\[5a.5\]]gnyis par ldan par byas/_/bdun cu rtsa bzhi yi ge la/_/de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan/_/mtshon cha ru ni rab tu grags/_/bdun cu rtsa lnga pa nyid la/_/dbyangs kyi drug pas sbyar ba yin/_/de ltar du ni gyur pa yin/_/bdun cu rtsa drug yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi 
[\[5a.6\]]gnyis pas ldan byas te/_/me yi bus ni rnam par dbye/_/lnga pa'i bzhi pas sbyar bar bya/_/bdun cu rtsa bdun yi ge la/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan pa yin/_/bdun cu rtsa brgyad mkhas pas brjod/_/brgyad cu rtsa gcig de bzhin mchog_/
[\[5a.7\]]dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba yin/_/brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis par sbyar bar bya/_/chos don 'dod dang thar pa ster/_/dpa' bo rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bshad do/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las sngags 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]btu ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas dngos grub gsang chen gyi/_/de yi snying po nye snying po/_/sngags kyi cho ga shes pas gsang /_/zab pa rgya mtsho chen po bzhin/_/lnga bcu pa yi dgu steng du/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa ste/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 
[\[5b.2\]]pas ni rnam par brgyan/_/dbyangs kyi bzhi pas yang dag ldan/_/dngos grub kun gyi gzhi yin no/_/rnal 'byor snying la tshad med pa'o/_/yi ge re re gnyis gnyis la/_/de bzhin dbyangs ni bcu gnyis ldan/_/mkha' 'gro chen mo lam rnams kyi/_/kun tu 
[\[5b.3\]]yongs su bzlog pa yin/_/nye ba'i snying po brjod pas 'grub/_/rnal 'byor rgyud las rnyed dka' ba'i/_/pho nya yi ni dngos grub pa'o/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dngos grub ni/_/rim dang rim pa med pas skye/_/khrag 'thung rgyud las gzhan du min/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[5b.4\]]phyag rgya mchog yin te/_/ye shes zla ba mchog ni btu/_/kha zas mchog ni bza' bya ste/_/'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sngags btu ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 
[\[5b.5\]]mdor bsdus pa/_/brda yi cho ga'i mtshan nyid dag_/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag bsgrubs na/_/grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/_/dbang chen dang ni me tog gis/_/de bzhin bdud rtsi bskyed par 'gyur/_/zho dang 'o mar ldan pa yis/_/bcud len mchog tu phan 
[\[5b.6\]]pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes brjod la/_/thams cad kun gyi 'dus pa ni/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo mchog yin te/_/thams cad mdza' bas mnyam par 'gro/_/ma dang sring mo chung ma dang /_/bu mo dag ni bkug nas su/_/rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug par 
[\[5b.7\]]bya/_/'di rnams longs ni spyad bya ste/_/chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag ni/_/lan gcig bzlas pas bud med rnams/_/pho nya rnams ni 'gugs par brjod/_/oM sar+b+ba badzra ka mi nI/_/sar+b+ba b+ha k+Sha sho d+ha ya gu h+ya~M badzri NI hU~M swA hA/_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bud med kyis ni yongs bskor nas/_/ji ltar bde ba longs spyod cing /_/sangs rgyas la 'bul mchod par bya/_/dngos grub thob pa zhes su brjod/_/dpal ldan rdo rje bcom ldan la/_/mgo bor thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/gtor ma'i cho 
[\[6a.2\]]ga kun gyis mchod/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag gnyis kyis/_/'gying dang bcas pa'i gar bya'o/_/rnal 'byor pa yis thams cad mchod/_/bsod nams chen po sogs pa yin/_/de ltar mchod pa tsam gyis ni/_/yang dag dngos grub rim pas 'thob/_/
[\[6a.3\]]gang zhig phyag rgya che mi mchod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa/_/ngal ba don med yongs su bsten/_/de yis 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/gal te bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod/_/mchod pas dpa' bo mchod par bya/_/gang zhig phyag rgya che las 
[\[6a.4\]]sdang /_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po/_/skye ba stong phrag du ma ru/_/byol song skye gnas skye bar 'gyur/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung ji lta bar/_/yul du nges par gnas pa ste/_/gtum mo sbom mo'i gnas dag la/_/de ni yul du gyur pa na/_/de yi yul du 
[\[6a.5\]]gyur pa ste/_/gang yang de yi bu dang gnyen/_/gang zhig dpa' bo rnams mchod pa/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po/_/de ni dgra la 'jigs pa med/_/rgyal po'i 'jigs pa la sogs med/_/dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/me dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs 
[\[6a.6\]]pa med/_/rtag tu phyag rgya mchod par bya/_/bsod nams las ni thob pa yin/_/dpa' bo rtag tu der gnas bdag_/gus pas mchod pa bzhes nas ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po bzhugs pa yin/_/de ni mchod cing bsnyen par bya/_/gsol ba yi ni don ched du/_/
[\[6a.7\]]rnal 'byor gzhan la brten byas na/_/log par yongs su langs shing za/_/des ni 'bras bu mi 'thob bo/_/dpa' bo'i rjes su bzung byas na/_/rtsod pa'i dus su dngos grub thob/_/dpa' bo gang zhig phyag rgya bral/_/sgrub po mchod par byed pa ni/_/phub ma 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]'bru dang mtshungs pa ste/_/sa stengs su ni rnal 'byor pa/_/chom po ba ru gyur pa yin/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor 'dzin/_/bdag nyid mchod par byed pa la/_/grol ba'i lam ni rnam par ster/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/_/
[\[6b.2\]]bdag gis bzung bar byas pa yin/_/gang zhig gnyis med mi bsten pa/_/shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de la skyob pa med pa yin/_/rnal 'byor med par rnal 'byor 'chos/_/phyag rgya la ni bgrod 'gyur dang /_/ye shes med par ye shes tshul/_/dmyal 
[\[6b.3\]]bar 'gro bar the tshom med/_/dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/_/de bzhin sku lus dkar po ste/_/sangs rgyas nor bu'i gtsug tor can/_/rdo rje phag mo g.yon du byas/_/de yi phyag mtshan kha dog 'dzin/_/thod pa gcig ni gdan dag la/_/sa dang nam mkha' 
[\[6b.4\]]nyid dag dang /_/gnyis pa dag dang bzhi pa ni/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag na bsnams/_/rdo rje phag mo gsum pa yin/_/'gro ba kun ni de ltar gnas/_/lha dang lha min mir bcas dang /_/sa ni thams cad gdan byas nas/_/de nas las ni mnyam par 
[\[6b.5\]]brtsam/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las kha zas gnyis su med par bsgrub pa nges pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas rnal 'byor ma sngags 'dis/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/_/ji ltar rigs par rab bshad 
[\[6b.6\]]bya/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor gnyis med de/_/de la mi yis mchod par bya/_/dpa' bo'i sngags kyi yid bsgrub pa'o/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra bA rA hi baM/_/Ar+yA bA rA dzi te/_/trai lo kya mA te ma hA bid+yai shwa ri/_/sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yA ba he ma hA badzre/_/badzrA sa ne a dzi te 
[\[6b.7\]]a pa rA dzi te ba sh+yaM ka ri ne tra b+hA ma Ni/_sho Sha Ni ro Sha Ni/_kro d+ha ni ka rA li ni/_trA sa ni ma ra Ni pra b+he da ni a pa rA dza ye bi dza ye dzam b+ha ni/_sta~M b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_badzra bA rA hi/_ma hA yo gi ni kA mai shwa ri kha ge_/tad ya thA pro ta~M ge_/pro ta~M ge_/he na ha na/_prA NA~M 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]kiM ki Ni khiM khi Ni/_d+hu na d+hu na/_badzra ha ste sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/_kha T+wA~M ga ka pA la d+hA ri Ni/_ma hA pi shi ta mA~M sA sha Ni mA nu Sh+yAM tra pra pr-it+te saM ni d+h+ya~M na ra shi ro mA lA graM thi ta d+hA ri ni/_su~M b+ha ni sum b+he ha na ha na/_prA NA~M sar+b+ba pA pa satwA nA~M sar+b+ba pa shu nA~M/_ma hA 
[\[7a.2\]]ma~M sats+tsha da ni mUr ti da~M Sh+T+rA ka ra li ni/_ma hA mu dre shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya/_a gra ma hi Shi sa ha sra shi re sa ha sra wA ha we sha ta sa ha sra A na ne/_dz+wa li ta te dza se dz+wa la mu khi pa ga la lo tsa ne/_badzra sha rI re badzra A sa ne/_mi li te ni mi li tA+e he he ha ha hU~M hU~M kha kha d+hu d+hu/_ru ru/_
[\[7a.3\]]d+hu ru d+hu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_a dwai te/_ma hA yo gi nI pa thi ta/_sid d+hi dreM d+h+ra~M dreM d+h+ra~M/_gra~M gra~M/_he he/_ha ha/_b+hI me ha sa ha sa bI re/_/hA hA/_ho ho/_hU~M hU~M/_trai lo kya/_bi nA sha ne/_sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti/_ta thA ga ta pa ri bA ri te hU~M hU~M phaT/_sing ha rU pe khaH/_ga dza 
[\[7a.4\]]rU pe gaH/_trai lokya u dwa ri/_sa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra sa hU~M hU~M phaT/_pI rA dwai te hU~M hU~M ha ha ma hA pa shu mo ha ni/_yo gI shwa ri s+t+wa~M DA ki ni/_lo kA nA~M ban+dA ni sa t+ya pra t+ya ya kA ri Ni hU~M phaT/_b+hU ta trA sa ni/_ma hA bI re pa ra ma sid d+he/_bi d+ye yo gI shwa ri phaT/_hU~M hU~M phaT 
[\[7a.5\]]phaT swA hA/_dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las dpal rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags su gsungs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje phag mo yi/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni mchog grub pa/_/he ru ka dang phag mo ni/_/ma byung 
[\[7a.6\]]'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di dang 'dra ba'i gsang sngags ni/_/'jig rten gsum na med pa ste/_/'bum dang 'bum phrag gsum du gsungs/_/rgyud kyi snying po mtha' dag bsdus/_/gang gis cho ga 'di rnams rig_/thams cad gtong ba lo ma bzhin/_/
[\[7a.7\]]bdag gis phyi ru ma bzlas kyang /_/las rnams kun ni 'grub pa'o/_/nyon mongs kun las nges par grol/_/dngos grub 'bras bu myur du 'thob/_/shes shing dran pa tsam gyis ni/_/dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/_/de nyid srog chags rnams kyi 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]srog/_/de nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/_/kun la khyab pa de nyid rnyed/_/de ni lus kun la ni gnas/_/de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te/_/dpal ldan he ru ka yis gsungs/_/sngags 'di dag ni yang dag 'byung /_/gang zhig la lar rab tu gnas/_/bstan 
[\[7b.2\]]bcos mtha' dag sa steng du/_/grub mtha' nges pa yang dag gnas/_/'di ni shes pas 'grub pa ste/_/sngags rnams kun ni the tshom med/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/de med par yang dngos grub med/_/grub mtha' rig byed mtha' dag ni/_/snying po 
[\[7b.3\]]gcig tu rab grags pa/_/bdag nyid kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor bdag nyid gnyis med zlos/_/dngos grub thams cad the tshom med/_/las rnams kun gyis gos med de/_/rab 'phel kun tu gtso bor 'gyur/_/lus rnams kun la rnam par gnas/_/
[\[7b.4\]]dpal ldan khrag 'thung lhar shes bya/_/rigs rnams kun la kun tu spyad/_/kha zas la ni brtag mi bya/_/'di ni don dam ye shes te/_/'di ni go 'phang mchog yin no/_/sngags rnams snying po 'di dag ni/_/'jig rten kun la ster ba yin/_/dpal khrag 'thung 
[\[7b.5\]]mngon par 'byung ba las rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis thams cad dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas sngags 'di thob pa yis/_/rang 'dod dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/_/rdo rje phag mo ma de gzhag_/rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya/_/rang 
[\[7b.6\]]'byung rdul ni dmar po yis/_/yul nas rnyed pa'i ras gtub cing /_/byi la yi ni rtug pa nyid/_/dngos grub 'dod pas spos su bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis rlob/_/spos bzang 'di ni sngags rig go/_/rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya yis/_/thod pa kha sbyar 
[\[7b.7\]]bcing bar bya/_/skra yi sbyin sreg brjod pa ste/_/de ltar ma rtogs mnyam bshad pa'i/_/dam tshig rab tu bskyang bar bya/_/rtag tu phyag rgya mchod bya ste/_/rtag tu bza' btung bya ba yin/_/'di ltar sngags zhes bya ba yin/_/dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/_/
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]chang dang ba lang sha bsgos te/_/lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya/_/lha rnams kun dang skar ma dang /_/klu sogs sum cu rtsa gsum gnas/_/sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na/_/phra mo mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/lce yi dri ma so shing dang /_/
[\[8a.2\]]de bzhin rang lus dril phyis dang /_/mi dang a lak+ta dag gi/_/sbyin sreg dag ni byas pa yis/_/'jig rten gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/_/rdul dang rang byung dmar po dang /_/kha zas skyugs pa'i bza' ba dang /_/mi yi skra dang yang dag ldan/_/lan cig gis ni 
[\[8a.3\]]'gugs pa'i mchog_/rang lugs mar ni skyugs pa dang /_/rang gi skra yis sbyin sreg bya/_/nim pa'i shing gi me sbar bas/_/lan cig gis ni sdang ba'i mchog_/bya rog sgro yis sbyin sreg bya/_/smyo byed ma la mnyam gzhag pas/_/tsha ba'i mar khus 
[\[8a.4\]]yang dag ldan/_/skad cig tsam gyis gsad dang bskrad/_/stong phrag dgu ru dgang blugs dang /_/sbyin sreg dag ni bya ba ste/_/dus mi ring bar rgyal po 'thob/_/gang gis sha ni blugs pa dang /_/mkhas pas dgang blugs brgya phrag gis/_/de yi zla gsum 
[\[8a.5\]]nang du ni/_/skad cig tsam gyis dbul ba zad/_/gang gis rtag tu dran pa yis/_/skye bo kun la sdug par 'gyur/_/zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/_/'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/'dod pa'i lha 'dra bud med mchog_/myos shing smyo ba bsten par bya/_/
[\[8a.6\]]'dod pa shin tu rgyas pa yis/_/'jig rten rnams la brtse bar bya/_/sa stengs rnams su dngos grub thob/_/bud med bye bas yongs su bskor/_/dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo dang /_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam sbyor la/_/dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byas nas/_/'jig 
[\[8a.7\]]rten gsum du dngos grub ster/_/dam tshig spyod pa bsrung bar bya/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las dpal rdo rje phag ma'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i las kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu ba'o//_//de nas las mchog dam pa dag_/dpa' 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ni/_/rtag tu 'khyud pas gsang mchod bya/_/rnal 'byor mas ni mchog ster 'gyur/_/sgrub pa pos ni nub kun tu/_/de nas pho nya mchod par bya/_/sha za'i rtsa ba khar bcug ste/_/ji tsam 'dod pa de tsam du/_/rtags ni las su 
[\[8b.2\]]'gyur ba ste/_/sa yi dbu ni snying po dag_/til gyi mar khur btsos nas ni/_/rkang pa'i mthil la byug par bya/_/de nas rtags su gyur pa ste/_/pa ta dang ni ka Tu dang /_/ro hi ni dang rta yi dri/_/'di rnams cha ni mnyam byas te/_/a rga'i 'o mar btags 
[\[8b.3\]]nas ni/_/ling ga la ni bskus byas nas/_/ji tsam tshad du 'dod pa ru/_/de tsam tshad du 'dod pa yin/_/myur du chu ni dron mo yis/_/bskus na snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/_/pad ma dkar po ge sar dag_/sbrang rtsi dag dang btags nas ni/_/lte ba la ni bskus nas 
[\[8b.4\]]ni/_/rtags ni brtan par 'gyur ba yin/_/pad+ma dmar po ge sar dang /_/til ni dkar po dag dang ni/_/ma he'i mar ni ma bskol dang /_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i rtsa ba dang /_/sbrang rtsi lhan cig btags nas ni/_/lte ba la ni byugs byas na/_/de srid rtags ni 
[\[8b.5\]]'gyes mi 'gyur/_/rdul dang yung ba gnyis blangs te/_/ba yi dar ba bre do ni/_/ji srid bre gang gyur tsam du/_/de srid bskol bar byas pa yin/_/de ltar btung bar byas pa ni/_/nyi ma bdun gyis rdzogs par 'gyur/_/bcud len sbyor ba yang dag pa/_/dpa' 
[\[8b.6\]]bo yis ni gsungs pa'o/_/spre'u'i mchil ma blangs byas te/_/phye ma zhib mor byas pa dang /_/rang gi dpa' bo'i sgo nas ni/_/byung dang yang dag ldan byas ni/_/dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/rdo rje phag mo bzlas byas te/_/yid ni gang dang gang gnas pa/_/
[\[8b.7\]]lan cig bzlas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni/_/lag pa g.yon pa bskor byas te/_/gang dang gang la bsams pa ste/_/'tsho ba gro dang gser dang ni/_/bza' ba'i zas dang btung ba dag_/de dag thams cad blangs nas ni/_/sngags pa'i khyim ni yongs su gang /_/khrag 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]dang rang byung gcig byas te/_/sgrub pos rig pa lan bdun bzlas/_/des ni mi la reg byas na/_/reg pas skyes bu khrag 'dzag 'gyur/_/lan cig bzlas pa'i rig pa 'dis/_/chus ni yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_/de ltar sems can gang 
[\[9a.2\]]gang ni/_/khrag dang khrag chen po dag gis/_/skud pa sbags te bcing bar bya/_/lan bdun bzlas pa dag gis ni/_/de gzugs 'dzin par the tsom med/_/kun tu chu yis grol bar 'gyur/_/bltas pas bud med gzugs bzang dang /_/rgyal po rnams dang 
[\[9a.3\]]sa bdag dag_/sgrub pos mthong dang ma mthong ba/_/thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ba ste/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas/_/mda' yi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma bdun na the tsom med/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las dpal 
[\[9a.4\]]rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyi 'dod pa dang /_bcud kyis len dang 'gugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas dngos grub rnal 'byor che/_/'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_/thang ka'i gzugs kyi ri mo ni/_/
[\[9a.5\]]sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/_/rnal 'byor ma yi lus gnas pa/_/sgrub pa pos ni mtshan par bya/_/bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad dam/_/nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes bcu la/_/rig pas nub mo mchod par bya/_/sgrub pos dri dang me tog dang /_/spos ni ji 
[\[9a.6\]]ltar gsungs pa dang /_/de bzhin yang ni bza' dang btung /_/mar me phreng ba dbul ba dang /_/dri zhim spos kyis mchod par bya/_/stan gcig la ni gnas nas ni/_/lha la mngon par kha bltas nas/_/sngags pas kha ni nub tu blta/_/sgrub pa pos ni thang 
[\[9a.7\]]ka'i gzugs/_/zhal bzhi phyag ni bzhi pa dang /_/thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/_/mdzes pa dag ni gzung bar bya/_/lag pas zhags pa lcags kyu bzung /_/kha dog nag po 'bar ba che/_/thod pa'i phreng ba bcings pa dang /_/stag gi bags pas bla gos byas/_/stan la 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas/_/ral pa'i cod pan zla tshes brgyan/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i rus pas brgyan/_/cho gas yang dag bsgom byas nas/_/de nas phreng ba blang bar bya/_/stan gcig la ni gnas nas ni/_/dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa yi/_/me 'dra'i 
[\[9b.2\]]lus kyi rig pa bzlas/_/sgrub pa pos ni snying po ni/_/mtshan ni thog thag bzlas pa bya/_/dang po'i thun la ha ha rgod/_/spyang ki yi ni sgra sgrogs pa/_/sgrub po g.yog dang bcas pa yis/_/de mthong 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/gnyis pa yi ni thun dag la/_/
[\[9b.3\]]nam mkha'i steng du 'bar bar mthong /_/mi g.yo bas ni bzlas pa bya/_/'gro ba thams cad za 'dra yang /_/srin po'i 'jigs pa 'gyur ba'i zhal/_/thun gsum pa la mthong ba yin/_/lhar bcas lha min mir bcas rnams/_/thun bzhi pa la 'grub par 
[\[9b.4\]]'gyur/_/rdo rje phag mo mchog ster lag_/dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/_/nga yis mchog ni sbyin zhes smra/_/mchog tu sa 'og 'gro ba dang /_/ral gri mig sman 'khor lo dang /_/ngag gis thams cad 'grub pa dang /_/phyag rgya chen po rjes su 'grub/_/
[\[9b.5\]]phyag rgya gang gis sgrub pa po/_/dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung des mchod bya/_/phyag rgya'i yid dang lus dag la/_/phyag rgya'i mchod pas mchog ni yod/_/'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin/_/phyag rgyas dngos grub shes pa 
[\[9b.6\]]ste/_/'jig rten gsum na yang dag gnas/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas bshad pa/_/ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[9b.7\]]de nas dgug pa bshad par bya/_/skye ba bdun pas dngos grub ster/_/srid par dngos grub dpa' bo che/_/thams cad pas ni lus gnas mchog_/kun tu lag pa brkyang ba'i mtha'/_/kun tu mig dang spyi bo dang /_/kun tu kha dang rna ba yis/_/'jig rten pa 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]rnams bskor te gnas/_/de phyir myur du bsgrub par bya/_/gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni/_/rang gi lus la des phyung ba/_/'og gi char ni the tshom med/_/de ru bsgrub bya la ni gzhug_/rtsa ba'i lam nas rnal 'byor ma/_/phyugs kyi sa bon 
[\[10a.2\]]blangs nas ni/_/bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya/_/rlung dang me ni yang dag 'byung /_/bsgrub bya'i lus ni bza' ba yin/_/mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas ni/_/lha mo'i sngags kyis rmongs byas te/_/thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin/_/
[\[10a.3\]]sgrub pa po yis sngags lus kyis/_/brgyal zhing dran med rmongs pa dang /_/rdo rje phag mos shin tu rmongs/_/de ni rtag tu dbang du 'gyur/_/'ong zhing rjes su 'ong bar 'gyur/_/de lta nyid du bkod nas ni/_/bsam gtan dag dang yang dag ldan/_/bdag nyid chen pos 
[\[10a.4\]]brgya byin dang /_/sngon du brgya byin chung ma bkug_/de nas thabs ni shes par bya/_/khams gsum dag ni ma lus dang /_/rgyal ba rnams kyang dgug par bya/_/kun tu thabs ni phan pa'i mchog_/gang zhig rgyud rnams kun tu sbas/_/rnal 'byor sngags ni 
[\[10a.5\]]gsungs pa'o/_/brtul zhugs dang ni bzlas pa bral/_/smyung ba cung zad mi dgos te/_/bsam gtan 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur/_/'gro ba blta zhing rab tu sbyar/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las skye ba bdun pa la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa'i cho 
[\[10a.6\]]ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/_/'khor lo chen po pad ma bzhin/_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po mthong ba yis/_/dngos grub ci ste skye mi 
[\[10a.7\]]'gyur/_/ring po nas ni thos pa dang /_/ring po rnams ni mig gis mthong /_/rnal 'byor ma yis 'dod chags dang /_/zhe sdang rnams ni spong ba yin/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/pad ma bzhi ni yang dag ldan/_/grub pa'i slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan/_/dkyil 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]'khor thig ni gdab par bya/_/sa yi cha mnyam yid 'ong bar/_/zug rngu thams cad rnam spangs te/_/tshon sna lnga dang ldan pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri ba yin/_/dngos grub 'dod pas mnyam bzhag pas/_/pho nya dag ni mchod par bya/_/dpa' bo'ang 
[\[10b.2\]]mchod par 'gyur ba yin/_/des ni rdul tshon bsgrub par bya/_/rdul tshon rdzogs pa nyid kyis ni/_/'dod pa'i don kun thar pa ster/_/mthe chung gi ni tshad tsam du/_/rdul tshon yang dag bri bya ste/_/gal te re mig 'di dag ni/_/dma' dang chad dang 'khyog por gyur/_/
[\[10b.3\]]dma' ba'i re khAs dngos grub med/_/'khyog pos nad ni byed pa ste/_/slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka ni/_/ri mo chad pas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de ltar ri mo'i mtshan nyid ldan/_/sa yi dbus su mtho ba bri/_/shar dang byang dag dma' bas ni/_/sngags pas dngos 
[\[10b.4\]]grub thob par 'gyur/_/shar dang byang dag dma' ba dang /_/dbus ni mtho bas rgyal por 'gyur/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i go 'phang nga nges/_/byang mtho bas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/yang na nor ni brlag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sngon gsungs shar mtho bas/_/myur du 
[\[10b.5\]]rigs ni zad par 'ong /_/ji ltar sa yi dbus dma' bas/_/sgrub pa po ni gsod pa yin/_/de ltar ri mo mtshan nyid ldan/_/sa la dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/_/khru gang khru gnyis khru bzhi 'am/_/brgyad dam bcu gnyis bcu drug nyid/_/steng dang 'og tu brtag pa med/_/
[\[10b.6\]]gal te rtog pa med na ni/_/slob dpon ye shes rnyed par dka'/_/dmyal ba mi bzad par ni 'gro/_/gang zhig dman pa'i mi ru 'gyur/_/de nas dgod pa'i cho ga bshad/_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor mas/_/dpal ldan rdo rje khrag 'thung lha/_/drug cu rtsa 
[\[10b.7\]]bzhi'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/gshin rje ma dang skrag byed ma/_/tsan+Di kA ni kun spyod ma/_/nor ma dpa' bo'i blo ma dang /_/sdud ma 'jigs ma brgyad pa ste/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o/_/gzugs can ma dang 'od byed ma/_/lA mA dang ni rab 'phel ma/_/
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]sA pa li kA slar ldog ma/_/i hi kA dang gar dbang phyug_/brgyad pa ru ni brjod pa ste/_/rnal 'byor ma ni yongs su grags/_/khro gnyer ma dang mche gtsigs ma/_/sna chen ma dang ba lang gdong /_/dri chen ma dang glang chen lce/_/ba lang rna ba gdong bzang 
[\[11a.2\]]ste/_/rnal 'byor spyod par gyur pa'o/_/dmar ba'i gtum mo nyid dang ni/_/sa ni ljang gu nyid dag dang /_/stobs chen dpag tshang gsum ma dang /_/rtsub mo dang ni bden smra ma/_/zhal ni shin tu mdzes ma dang /_/thod pa'i dum bu ma dag ste/_/'di rnams snying rje'i dngos 
[\[11a.3\]]grub ster/_/sngon gyi rdo rje phag mo nyid/_/rang nyid kyi ni rig pa yin/_/rang ming brjod pa'i sngags dag la/_/dang por oM gyi yi ge la/_/hU~M hU~M phaT kyis mtha' mar sbyar/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa pa pos/_/de ni rtag tu mchod par bya/_/de ltar thams cad the tsom 
[\[11a.4\]]med/_/sring mo dang ni bu mo dang /_/chung ma shin tu gzugs bzang dang /_/rta dang glang po ba lang dang /_/zhing dang bran pho bran mo dang /_/rin chen rnams ni dbul bar bya/_/deng nas brtsams te bdag nyid 'bangs/_/bdag gis lus ni phul ba lags/_/slob ma 
[\[11a.5\]]dag ni mi 'bul na/_/dngos grub ring bar the tshom med/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol na/_/des ni dngos grub mi 'thob bo/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis ni/_/dngos grub ci ste skye mi 'gyur/_/sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/_/'bad pas slob dpon 
[\[11a.6\]]dgyes par bya/_/de yis dngos grub myur du 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha yis ni/_/ji lta bu ru gsungs pa yi/_/ji lta bzhin du rdul tshon lngas/_/dkyil 'khor mnyam par bri bar bya/_/gdong ni gos kyis bcings byas te/_/lho phyogs sgor ni dgug 
[\[11a.7\]]par bya/_/me tog snyim pas gtor bar bya/_/me tog gang du lhung ba yi/_/gnas la sogs pa bstan par bya/_/oM shrI he ru kA ya bid+yA ma he bid+yA rA dzA ya d+hIHma he swA hA/_bdag gis dpa' bo rab tu bskul/_/bklags pas las ni thams cad byed/_/'chi ba'i 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dus kyi dngos grub ni/_/'chi ba la ni brjod par 'gyur/_/dngos grub 'di yi bye brag gis/_/nyi ma gcig gis dngos grub che/_/'jig rten gsum sgrub bsgom par bya/_/sgrub pa'i dbang po cho ga shes/_/dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/_/brtul zhugs la ni nub 
[\[11b.2\]]gsum gnas/_/lha yi lus su skye bar 'gyur/_/lha yi ye shes mthong 'gyur te/_/de bzhin lha yi gzugs su 'gyur/_/rtsod pa kun las rgyal ba dang /_/rgas dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/_/sangs rgyas bzhin du lha mo bsten/_/dpa' bo bzhin du sa la rtse/_/
[\[11b.3\]]phyag rgya dang ni bcas nyid du/_/nyi ma gsum gyis 'gyur ba nyid/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las lha dgod pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /_bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dkyil 'khor bshad 
[\[11b.4\]]par bya/_/dbang bskur 'khor lo mchod pa ni/_/slob mas nyi ma bzang po 'am/_/ji ltar du ni nub mo la'o/_/de nas dpa' bo mchod par bya/_/stan gcig la ni gnas nas kyang /_/pho nya mo ni bcu drug nyid/_/dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med gnas/_/dpal 
[\[11b.5\]]ldan rdo rje phag mo la/_/sum b+ha ni yi rig pa yis/_/phyogs bzhi ru ni mchod par bya/_/de ltar rnal 'byor chen po mchod/_/gzugs brgyad pos ni rab tu bsrung /_/sngags dang phyag rgya yongs rdzogs nas/_/gnyis med ye shes brtsam par bya/_/nub mo 
[\[11b.6\]]kun tu sgrub pa pos/_/de nas pho nya mchod par bya/_/dus mi ring bar rgyal po 'grub/_/'khor los sgyur ba stobs kyi rgyal/_/sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/sngags dang phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/_/dam tshig thams cad bskyang bya ste/_/'jig rten gsum na 
[\[11b.7\]]rnyed dka' ba/_/g.yon nas skyes pas byed pa yin/_/dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_/sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni/_/de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/_/dbugs dbyung mchog gi bar dag ni/_/dri yi chu dang bcas pa dang /_/rtag tu ril bu bza' bar bya/_/mchod 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]pa'i dus kyi bye brag la/_/pho nyas lhan cig skyes dngos grub/_/dman pa mchog dang 'bring rnams kyi/_/de yis sbyor bas dngos grub 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/_/dpal ldan he ru ka las byung /_/rang byung me tog nyid dag gis/_/cho 
[\[12a.2\]]ga shes pas kun tu spyod/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan mchod pa dang /_/me tog gcig dang yang dag ldan/_/blo ldan gyis ni ston mo bsgrub/_/ma lus snod gnyis 'dus byas te/_/rtog pa med pa'i shes rab che/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi tshul gyis ni/_/gang ltar 
[\[12a.3\]]ji ltar rnyed pa la/_/yid kyis gus pas mchod par bya/_/gnyis dang gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag_/mkha' lding kha bzhin btung bar bya/_/rigs lnga gcig tu yang dag 'grub/_/ston mo bzang po brtsam par bya/_/rtag tu nub mo rgya che ba'i/_/mchod pa 
[\[12a.4\]]bya zhing brtsam par bya/_/gnas der me yi las kyis ni/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu dkrug par bya/_/rnal 'byor gang gis me tog gnas/_/sgrub pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_/byol song rnal 'byor mchog tu 'grub/_/dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams ni/_/
[\[12a.5\]]ce spyang gnyis skyes mig chen dang /_/khrung khrung sa ra sa dang khra/_/pho rog 'ug pa bya rgod kyis/_/dgang blugs kun gyi bye brag gis/_/mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma sbyin/_/mchog dang dman pa'i dngos grub ster/_/de yi rdzas kyi dngos grub skye/_/de bzhin mthong 
[\[12a.6\]]dang reg pa dang /_/rtag tu 'o dang 'khyud pa dang /_/sbyor ba'i gnas kyi bye brag gis/_/ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs kyis ni/_/dngos grub kun gyis byed par brjod/_/sngags las 'byung ba sbyin par bya/_/gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/_/ma dang bu mo sring mo 
[\[12a.7\]]dang /_/chung ma pho nya mor gnas pa/_/gang gis rtag tu sngags ster ba/_/de ni de yi cho gar brjod/_/de nas bdag gis dam tshig bshad/_/g.yon nas 'byung ba mchog yin no/_/gang zhig mi yi bu mo thob/_/he ru ka yi sngags kyis ni/_/'dod pa'i dngos 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]grub 'thob par 'gyur/_/ring po nas kyang rnam shes bya/_/khyim mam zhing la rnam gnas nas/_/khrag 'thung rnal 'byor las gzhan min/_/slob dpon rnal 'byor ma yin te/_/yid can gyis ni rgyud 'di ru/_/rnal 'byor thams cad shes par bya/_/
[\[12b.2\]]gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/_/sngon du dang ba la brten nas/_/gus pa yis ni mchod par bya/_/rtag tu ma mos rnam par gnas/_/gnyis su med dang ngo tsha med/_/phyag rgya shin tu rnal 'byor ldan/_/tshul khrims yang dag brjod pa yin/_/skye ba'i yul 
[\[12b.3\]]las skyes pa dang /_/dam tshig yang dag bsrung ba yin/_/sems kyi bdag nyid snying rjes phan/_/dam tshig can la khro min te/_/ma gus pa la bshad mi bya/_/mtshan mo thog thag bzlas pa bya/_/rnal 'byor ma la mchod par bya/_/bcu drug gnyis med 
[\[12b.4\]]rgyal po'i don/_/nub mo ru ni dam tshig ste/_/dpa' bo rtag tu gcer bu yin/_/sgrub pos sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_/phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/sgrub po las ni mnyam par brtsam/_/bdag nyid pho nya mchog kun dang /_/rnal 'byor gnyis med 
[\[12b.5\]]gnas na ni/_/de las 'byung ba'i rdzas kyis bsgrub/_/de bzhin mthong dang reg pa pos/_/nyin mo rtag tu gsang ba ste/_/rtag tu nub mo gsal bar bya/_/srog chags pags pas sham thabs bya/_/bde ba'i don du bskyod par bya/_/sgrub pa po ni dngos grub nyid/_/
[\[12b.6\]]dag pa rnam gsum gyis 'grub ste/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnyis med gnas/_/zhal ni dkar gnag dang smra dang /_/mi smra'i dka' thub la sogs spangs/_/dang po yi ni dag pa yi/_/sgrub thabs kun gyi mtshan nyid dang /_/byol song zos pas bsod nams sog_/
[\[12b.7\]]gnyis pa'i dag pa brjod bya ba/_/zla ba'i chu ni 'thungs pa nyid/_/gsum pa gnyis med brjod pa'o/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]de nas sdom pa bshad par bya/_/rnal 'byor rgyud las rnyed dka' ba/_/ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/_/kun gyi rgyal por grags pa ste/_/rtag tu phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub 'bras don du/_/spun dang slob 
[\[13a.2\]]dpon mchod par bya/_/de nyid gnyis med rnams gnas so/_/spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu/_/bde dang sdug bsngal kun tu 'byung /_/de la ye shes bstan mi bya/_/sngags rnams su ni 'byin pa yin/_/gtsang zhing dag pa bza' bya ste/_/rtag tu dam tshig yan lag 
[\[13a.3\]]gsang /_/sngags ni su la'ang mi sbyin te/_/man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya/_/gang gi don du man ngag rnams/_/dam tshig srung ba sbyin par bya/_/rtag tu 'jig rten g.yon la spyod/_/rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du gtang /_/yan lag g.yon pa bsgyur bar brtson/_/
[\[13a.4\]]g.yon pas mdzub gtor byas la btung /_/lag pa g.yon pas bdag nyid mchod/_/'di ru g.yon pas 'khyud pa dang /_/g.yon pas gus par mchod par bya/_/g.yon nas kun tu blta ba nyid/_/de bzhin g.yon pas 'gro byas na/_/dngos grub thams cad 
[\[13a.5\]]rab tu ster/_/ji ltar bdag nyid g.yon pas spyod/_/g.yon pas thar pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/cung zad gsungs dang ma gsungs pa/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung g.yon la spyod/_/sgrub pos sa stengs gnas nas ni/_/bzlas dang brtul zhugs bral byas kyang /_/
[\[13a.6\]]g.yon pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las g.yon pa'i mchod pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas rnal 'byor ma yi ni/_/lta bas rengs pa'i cho ga bshad/_/snying gong sna rtser byin gyis 
[\[13a.7\]]brlab/_/de ltar rlung ni g.yo med par/_/snying gi gong bus ske bcings te/_/gzugs bzang ba ni myur du 'ong /_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo bsgrub pa/_/skye gnas la ni gi wang gzhug_/sngags pas pad+ma'i steng gnas te/_/bsam gtan bzlas pa yang dag 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]brtsam/_/skyo zhing kun tu ngu bar 'gyur/_/thig le byas nas gnas pa dang /_/rgod cing dgyes pa nyid dag go/_/de ltar gi wang dngos grub ni/_/gsang ba'i rgyud las nges par 'byung /_/ldong ros dang ni man shing la/_/bu mo la ni gzhug par bya/_/ser 
[\[13b.2\]]zhing zlum pa'i mig nas ni/_/mchi mar bcas shing rtag tu ngu /_/'di rnams kyi ni bzlas par gnas/_/de bzhin snying po nye snying po/_/rang gi srog bzhin legs par 'dzin/_/de ltar dpa' bo dngos grub che/_/rgyud 'di ru ni the tshom med/_/rtsod pa chen po 
[\[13b.3\]]'byung ba la/_/ya~M yig kha dog sngon po la/_/rlung gi shugs kyis bskor bar bya/_/'khrugs pa chen po gzhan gyi sde/_/thams cad rengs shing brlag par bya/_/tsheg drag yi ges mtshon cha bya/_/nyon mongs med par sbyar bya ste/_/de ma thag tu thams cad 
[\[13b.4\]]brlag_/de ni mi yi sde kun te/_/gang zhig cung zad mtshan mchog gis/_/bya ba la sogs byed pa yin/_/gza' dang dug dang me dang dgra/_/ser ba rlung dang mtshon cha'i char/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las gzugs bzang ma blta ba dang gi 
[\[13b.5\]]wang dang gzhan gyi sde rengs pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/ro langs kyi ni sgrub pa'i thabs/_/cho ga yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor bdag_/'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/sngags pas ji ltar rnyed 
[\[13b.6\]]pa yi/_/ro ni nad med gas pa med/_/de ni blangs te bsgrub par bya/_/rnal 'byor kun la dngos grub ster/_/ba nag mo yi 'o ma dang /_/sran gre'u 'bras dang ldan pa yi/_/thug pa ro yi kha ru ni/_/'jigs pa med par blug par bya/_/ji srid ro ni langs kyi 
[\[13b.7\]]bar/_/bdag gis ci bgyi zhes ni smra/_/ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang /_/mchil lham rgyal po ral gri dang /_/sbyin dang dgra bo brlag pa dang /_/rkang byug dang ni bcud kyis len/_/don mchog gcig ni byin nas ni/_/'grub 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]de ltar cho ga'i rim pa ni/_/mtshan nyid kun la bral gyur na/_/sdig pa dang ni yang dag ldan/_/dngos grub rab tu brlag par 'gyur/_/rtog pa 'di yi tshad ma rnams/_/snying po ru ni rab tu sgrogs/_/khyab 'jug drag po dbang po 
[\[14a.2\]]dang /_/tshangs pa la sogs pa dag dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/_/drang srong sna tshogs dag pa dang /_/klu dang dri za lha rnams te/_/ro langs nam mkha' lding la sogs/_/drag po lha min mi 'am ci/_/sha za dang ni srin po sogs/_/nyi ma 
[\[14a.3\]]zla ba skar ma bcas/_/'jig rten skyong ba bgegs kyi rgyal/_/ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs dang /_/lA ma dang ni dum skyes ma/_/gzugs can ma ni slar ldog ma/_/'dod ma sangs rgyas dbang dang ni/_/grub pa'i rig 
[\[14a.4\]]pa 'dzin pa dang /_/gnod sbyin pho dang gnod sbyin mo/_/phyogs chen dpa' mo u ma la/_/ji ltar bde bar rtse zhing rtse/_/de nas grub pa'i dpa' bo che/_/sngags rnams kyis ni 'di dag gis/_/de ltar grub pa'i sngags chen po/_/rig pa yis ni rnal 'byor skye/_/
[\[14a.5\]]dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las ro langs chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs lha thams cad dang rtse zhing bde ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/snying po'i sngags sogs bzlas pa la/_/phreng ba'i rigs dang 
[\[14a.6\]]grangs dag dang /_/cho gas rnal 'byor bzlas pa bya/_/shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang /_/ru drA k+Sha ni mdzes pa yin/_/rdo rje'i mig gis dngos grub ster/_/pu tra dzI ba kun la bshad/_/ni bar ta dang lung thang dang /_/tshe ring nad med 'phel ba yin/_/dbang 
[\[14a.7\]]du byed dang zhi 'dod dang /_/nor 'phel ba ni byed pa yin/_/byi ru yis ni 'phel ba dang /_/rin chen phreng bas mdzes pa yin/_/gser gyi phreng ba dag dang ni/_/sgrub pos rin chen phreng ba bsrel/_/rgyal po'i don du sngags pas bzlas/_/dpal ni che ba nyid du thob/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dngos grub thams cad yod pa dang /_/sa yi dbang por the tshom med/_/'byung po'i mtshan nyid dbang du byed/_/nor rnams 'gugs par byed pa'o/_/bya rog sgro yis bskrad pa nyid/_/bong bu yis ni sdang ba'o/_/khyi dang rta yi phreng ba la/_/sgrub pos me 
[\[14b.2\]]tog gis ni mchod/_/ro yi skra yi skud pa dang /_/bong bu'i spu dang yang dag ldan/_/skud pa 'di yis sdang ba dang /_/khyi yi spu dang bsres pas ni/_/dngos grub thams cad byed pa yin/_/gser gyi skud pas zhi bar 'gyur/_/yang na ras kyi skud pa ni/_/
[\[14b.3\]]gzhon nu ma yis bka' ba yin/_/gzugs mdzes yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/gtsang zhing dran ldan 'jam par smra/_/de lta'i skud pa'i phreng bas ni/_/grol ba'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung mchod par bya/_/spyi bor ri bong can 
[\[14b.4\]]gyis mtshan/_/zhi zhing zhal ni bzhi pa ste/_/'dod pa kun gyi gzugs bzang ba/_/dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/_/sangs rgyas nor bus gtsug phud byas/_/lag pas kha T+rA~M ga ni bzung /_/mdung dang ral pa'i cod pan byas/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis 
[\[14b.5\]]rnam par brgyan/_/brgya phyed phreng bas mtshan pa ste/_/lha chen chung mar bcas pa yi/_/steng nas mnyam par gnas pa yin/_/steng nas gdugs dkar pos g.yogs te/_/lha yi dri yis byugs pa dang /_/lha yi me tog lus la mchod/_/phyag ni 
[\[14b.6\]]'bum phrag dang ldan pa/_/lha yi ga bur dri yis ni/_/lus la bdug cing byugs pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs pas/_/rnga yab gyis ni g.yob pa yin/_/rnal 'byor mas ni mnyam par bskor/_/lA ma dang ni dum skyes ma/_/rdo rje phag mo g.yon la gnas/_/
[\[14b.7\]]dpal ni skyed tshal pad+ma ni/_/rtag tu me tog 'bras bu gnas/_/'dod pa'i shing la lcug ma rgyas/_/lha dang lha min tshogs kyi gnas/_/'dod pa'i rjes chags skye ba ste/_/skyed mos tshal na dpal mchog ste/_/sprin gyi phreng ba phyed kyis bkab/_/'dod 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa'i ro yi char pa 'bab/_/'dod pa'i gnas ni mchog yin te/_/chags dang byams pas kun tu gang /_/pho nya kun dang mnyam par spyod/_/dpa' bo dang ni yang dag ldan/_/nags kyi dbus na rtse ba ste/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug_/
[\[15a.2\]]glu dang gling bu gar la sogs/_/zangs dung sgra ni mnyam pa'i rigs/_/rnga ring gi ni sgra la sogs/_/cha lang sgra ni chen po dang /_/rdza rngar byas pa'i sgra dag dang /_/pa Ta ha ni brdungs pa'i sgra/_/pi wang dgu po rgyud mang sgra/_/rol mo kun gyi sgra chen pos/_/dpal chen 
[\[15a.3\]]bcas par rtse ba ste/_/kun tu yongs su khengs pa yin/_/de yis sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur/_/ji srid snying po skyes kyi bar du'o/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_/mchod pa dang rtse ba'i rtsed mo'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba 
[\[15a.4\]]ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas dngos grub rnal 'byor che/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab bsgrub pa/_/dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/_/sbyin sreg gnyis med dgang blugs kyis/_/mnyam med skal bzang de yi ni/_/dngos grub kun ni skye ba ste/_/skye shi rga 
[\[15a.5\]]dang mya ngan dbul/_/myur ba nyid du brlag par 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i don du sgrub pa pos/_/stong phrag bcu yi sngags ni bzlas/_/pho nya'i steng du gnas nas ni/_/sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga ru bya/_/sha chen dang ni 'o mar bsnos/_/sbyin sreg dgang blugs rim pa yis/_/
[\[15a.6\]]dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgya yi bar/_/g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/dngos grub chen po rgyal dbang dpal/_/ma nyams kun tu khyab cing 'gro/_/sngags pas dus bzhi ru ni gson/_/de la sus kyang gnod mi nus/_/gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/_/
[\[15a.7\]]stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas/_/ba lang sha dang sha chen dang /_/ce spyang sha yis dgang blugs ni/_/chang dang 'o ma mnyam par bsnos/_/sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig tu bya/_/gling bdun gyi ni rgyal dbang por/_/'di yis dpal chen longs spyod 'gyur/_/ji srid 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]snying po rgyas kyi bar/_/de nas dngos grub sngags chen po/_/brgyad lhag pa yi brgya ni bzlas/_/rdzas dang cho ga rdzogs pa yis/_/dgang blugs stong phrag lhag par bya/_/dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni/_/'di nyid du ni dgang blugs brgya/_/bzlas pa rab tu 
[\[15b.2\]]sbyin bya ste/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzhin spun/_/de ltar sbyin sreg cho ga brjod/_/de nas rab 'phel sngags shes pas/_/sa steng gang gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/bskal pa chen po stong phrag gam/_/de bzhin bskal pa stong phrag tu/_/ma nyams sngags pa kun 
[\[15b.3\]]khyab spyod/_/ji ltar ji bzhin 'gro ba nyid/_/sgrub pos nyi ma re re ru/_/rtag tu dgang blugs lnga yis mchod/_/rgyal po yul 'khor dbang du 'gyur/_/bcu yis mi dbang rgyal po dang /_/sde ni stobs dang bcas pa kun/_/de rnams myur du dbang du 'gyur/_/
[\[15b.4\]]sna tshogs bdag nyid nor dang ni/_/sa ni sum cu thams cad dang /_/gling bdun rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho bdun ni mtha' gtugs par/_/longs spyod sa ni gser rang bzhin/_/sum cu lnga yi sbyin sreg gis/_/sa 'og bdun gyi lha ma yin/_/sgrub 
[\[15b.5\]]pos chung mar bcas pa ni/_/myur bar dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/de ltar dngos grub rnal 'byor che/_/dpa' bo dbang phyug dag gis gsungs/_/de nas sha yi dgang blugs 'bul/_/yang na sha chen dag gi'o/_/chang dang bcas nas bsres nas ni/_/pad+ma gcig tu 
[\[15b.6\]]sbyin sreg bya/_/sngags pas yul ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/sum brgya ya ni tshad kyis so/_/'bum phrag gsum gyi sbyin sreg gis/_/'dzam bu gling ni kun tu 'thob/_/'bum phrag lnga yi dgang blugs kyis/_/gling bdun de yis longs spyod 'gyur/_/rtse zhing dngos grub rgyal dbang 
[\[15b.7\]]po/_/ji srid snying po rgyas kyi bar/_/rtag par gsung ba'i cho gar gnas/_/skal dman gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/de ltar gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg ni/_/sngags dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las gling bdun gyi 'khor los sgyur 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ba'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas mngon spyod kyi ni las/_/'dod pas dpa' bo rnams ni bsten/_/dug khrag tsha ba'i mar khu dang /_/mi yi rus pas sbyin sreg bya/_/tsher ma'i me ni rab tu 
[\[16a.2\]]sbar/_/de bzhin 'bras bu phub mar ldan/_/khro ba rgyas shing skra yang grol/_/gcer bu kha yang lho ru bltas/_/sngags pas gos ni nag po byas/_/nyi ma phyed na me la ni/_/drag po las kyi sbyin sreg bya/_/gtum po'i me la sems gcig gis/_/ji ltar nub 
[\[16a.3\]]mo'ang bya ba yin/_/sngags kyi mtha' ni ming dang sbyar/_/nus pa grol zhing myur bar dgug_/stobs ldan sde dang bcas pa ni/_/mngon spyod kyis ni gsad par bya/_/pho nya de nyid rnal 'byor bdag_/'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/'di ni gsad pa'i las yin 
[\[16a.4\]]te/_/phyi nas lha la bzod par gsol/_/'o ma bil ba sbrang rtsi mar/_/til dang ldan pas dgang blugs bya/_/de ltar dpa' bo rab tu ni/_/yang dang yang du sngags 'di bzlas/_/de nas bskrad pa rab tu bshad/_/nyi ma gzhan la las brtsams te/_/bya rog sgro 
[\[16a.5\]]yis sbyin sreg bya/_/dri chen ro ni rgya chen dang /_/sha za'i shing gis me sbar te/_/rlung phyogs kha ni bltas te bskrad/_/bdag nyid du ni gnas nas ni/_/zhag bdun gyis ni the tsom med/_/rnam par sdang ba bshad par bya/_/sngags pas nim pa'i 'dab ma dang /_/
[\[16a.6\]]sbrul gyi pags brjes yang dag ldan/_/bya rog 'ug pa'i tshang dag dang /_/smyo byed me ni rab sbar te/_/brgyad lhag brgya ni gzhug par bya/_/'jigs pa thams cad rnam par dbye/_/gnyen dang bshes rnams gtong bar 'gyur/_/dgug pa'i don du sbyin sreg ni/_/
[\[16a.7\]]mtshan gyis 'di bzhin bsam gtan bya/_/seng ldeng me ni rab tu sbar/_/dus gsum du ni sbyin sreg spyod/_/de yi ming ni lan cig blang /_/de la sngags kyis sbyor ba ste/_/rtag tu sngags pas sbyin sreg bya/_/nges par thams cad 'gugs pa yin/_/sngags 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pas nub mo sbyin sreg bya/_/'dod pas pho nya bcas pa ru/_/de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya yi ni rjes 'jug pas/_/phyag rgya yi ni sbyor bar 'grub/_/rtag tu rgyal po dbang po dang /_/yang dag sangs rgyas pha rol gnon/_/ye shes 
[\[16b.2\]]gzugs ni rnal 'byor che/_/'dod gzugs mar ni gyur pa ste/_/lha mo chen mo lha ma yin/_/klu mo nyid kyi bu mor 'dod/_/srin mo dang ni nye srin mo/_/dri za dang ni gnod sbyin mo/_/mi rnams nyid ni thams cad du/_/'jig rten gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/_/drug 
[\[16b.3\]]cu rtsa bzhi rab sbyar bas/_/rnal 'byor phyag rgya la ni rtse/_/bza' dang btung dang rnyed dang 'jigs/_/'di rnams kun ni yongs su gtang /_/de nyid don dam ye shes te/_/de nyid don dam go 'phang yin/_/de nyid don dam sangs rgyas nyid/_/de nyid don dam bde ba ste/_/
[\[16b.4\]]gzhan du yod par mi brjod do/_/dam tshig nye bar spyad pa yin/_/rtag tu gnyis med phyag rgyar bcas/_/pho nya mchod pas rab tu 'phel/_/sgrub pos mchod pa tsam gyis ni/_/dngos grub kun ni shin tu byed/_/pho nya smad par mi bya ste/_/sgrub pos thams cad 
[\[16b.5\]]'gugs pa yin/_/rgyab dang smad dang bcas pa dang /_/longs spyod sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/_/pho nyas lhan cig skyes dngos grub/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu 'phel/_/rnal 'byor sbyor bral mi bya ste/_/'di rnams sngags ni smras pa yin/_/dpal khrag 
[\[16b.6\]]'thung mngon par 'byung ba las phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/ro langs chen po sgrub pa'i thabs/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/_/'khor lo kun la rnam par 
[\[16b.7\]]gnas/_/mi yi mar khu de yi sha/_/sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad blugs bya/_/de ru rdo rje phag mo byin/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor gyis bskor/_/ro langs srin pos yang dag gang /_/bsregs pa rgod cing 'jigs par byed/_/ce spyang sna tshogs nga ro che/_/yongs su 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bskor nas 'jigs par sgrogs/_/srin pos bkram nas sdigs par byed/_/'jigs pa'i dbyangs kyis sdigs par byed/_/de mthong 'jigs par mi bya ste/_/lus kyi sngags kyi nga rgyal bya/_/dpa' bo chen po legs zhes brjod/_/bdag nyid 
[\[17a.2\]]rdo rje sems brtul zhugs/_/sgrub po yid la ci 'dod pa'o/_/de la mchog ni brgya ster te/_/de yi gnas su dpa' bo 'gro/_/rnal 'byor ma yis yongs su bskor/_/de nas de ma thag nyid du/_/'jig rten gsum la spyod par 'gyur/_/rang nyid lha yi lus su skye/_/dpal 
[\[17a.3\]]chen skal bzang 'dod pa'i gzugs/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/nam mkhar kun tu spyod pa nyid/_/nad dang 'chi ba rnam par spang /_/gnas kun la ni spyod pa ste/_/'di rnams las ni dam pa mchog_/rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bos bshad/_/gnas 
[\[17a.4\]]las rnam par rgyal bar 'grub/_/de nas dpal chen las rgyas byas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang 'thob/_/de yi las ni rab tu 'grub/_/gang gis bzlas med rgyud kyang med/_/spyod pa med cing smyung ba med/_/yid kyis ma lus 
[\[17a.5\]]par byas nas/_/sems dpa' chen po 'grub par 'gyur/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dgug pa bshad par bya/_/mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/_/
[\[17a.6\]]bdag nyid khrag 'thung rnal 'byor gyis/_/'grub par 'gyur te the tsom med/_/thod pa dum bu gcig pa ste/_/skyon kun med cing mdzes pa la/_/bsgrub bya'i lus ni bri bar bya/_/de bzhin brgya phyed 'dab ma la/_/sngags dang ming ni lhan cig tu/_/khrag chen dang ni 
[\[17a.7\]]mnyes nas su/_/gser gyi smyu gus nang du bri/_/sngags ni gi wang khu bas so/_/steng nas 'khor lo kha sbyor yin/_/snying po bzlog ste bsgrub par bya/_/sngags ni bzlas shing gzhug par bya/_/sngags pas nam phyed du gnas te/_/'dab ma gcig ni yang dag 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]blang /_/lus kyi sngags kyi nga rgyal gyis/_/'dab ma brgya ni sbyin sreg bya/_/sems kyis yid la ci 'dod pa/_/sbyin sreg pho nya'i ye shes dang /_/gtor ma sbyin pa'i bye brag dang /_/gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/_/phyag rgya bcing ba bsam par bya/_/
[\[17b.2\]]bsgrub bya de yis 'gugs par 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i bu mo bud med mchog_/'khor los sgyur bar bcas pa dang /_/gzhan du bya ba brtag mi dgos/_/dngos grub 'di rnams mchog tu gsang /_/rnal 'byor mchog ni mngon du bsgrub/_/mdun du dgyes byed 
[\[17b.3\]]mchog gis so/_/yang na las mchog dam pa dag_/sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i lus dag ni/_/tsan dan dmar po'i rang bzhin las/_/gzugs brnyan dag ni rab tu byas/_/rang gi khrag dang gi wang gis/_/mngon par bris te snying gar gzhag_/tsha ba gsum gyis 
[\[17b.4\]]lus ni byug_/zangs kyi khab kyis bsgrub bya yi/_/snying dang lte ba gsang ba ru/_/gnas gsum dag ni phug pa ste/_/nam phyed kyi ni dus dag tu/_/snying po'i sngags ni go bzlog bzlas/_/gang 'dod de ni 'gugs par 'gyur/_/seng ldeng me la de srid 
[\[17b.5\]]gdung /_/sngags ni rjes su dran pa yis/_/bsgrub bya myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/gnas der sangs rgyas 'jig rten sogs/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dag kyang ni/_/rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/_/sngags 'di dag ni dran tsam gyis/_/'jig rten 
[\[17b.6\]]gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i bya yang lhung bar 'gyur/_/shing rnams kyang ni gus par 'gyur/_/chu ni rgyun las ldog pa ste/_/'khrul 'khor dang ni glang chen dang /_/rta dang sbrul dang spre'u dag dang /_/mtsho yi rlabs ni 'ching bar byed/_/ji ltar thang la 
[\[17b.7\]]'gro ba bzhin/_/de ltar chu la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gser gyi btsag gis b+ha ga bri/_/de steng lag pa g.yon pa ni/_/bzhag ste brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bya/_/gang gi ming ni gzung na ni/_/de ni de ma thag tu 'ong /_/rang gi mal stan la gnas te/_/lag pa g.yon par rang 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]rtags gzung /_/gang gi ming brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/de ni de ma thag tu ni/_/sangs rgyas dkar mo de bzhin du/_/rab tu 'dod par 'gyur ba yin/_/dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo ni/_/dran pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba ste/_/bzlas shing brtse bas sbyar 
[\[18a.2\]]bas ni/_/rig pa kun yang rmongs par byed/_/gang gis rig pa sbyor dan pas/_/'jig rten gsum ni dkrug par bya/_/rig pa 'di rnams zhes bya ba/_/dpal ldan phag mo zhes bya ba/_/rmongs dang dbye ba 'di rnams ni/_/khams gsum dbang du byed pa'o/_/
[\[18a.3\]]bklags shing bshad pas dngos grub sogs/_/dngos grub kun byed 'jigs pa yin/_/bshes dang bu mo rigs segs la/_/sngags 'di brjod par mi bya'o/_/thams cad ci bgyir 'gyur ba ste/_/sgrub po mthong bas nges par ltung /_/mi mo'i mtshams las 'dzag 
[\[18a.4\]]'gyur te/_/rtag tu ngo tsha btang bar 'gyur/_/gos med skra ni grol ba dang /_/nu mkhrang bdag nyid gzhan dbang 'gyur/_/lus la reg pa mtha' dag dgod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam 'gyur/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las dpal rdo rje phag 
[\[18a.5\]]mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas kun tu 'bad pa yis/_/phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub pa/_/gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/sgrub pos dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/mche gtsigs ma yi phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[18a.6\]]sgrub po 'dod pa'i tshul gyis su/_/sa rnams kun la nges par spyod/_/lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/_/thams cad dkrugs nas de yis ni/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster/_/brtul zhugs med cing smyung ba med/_/bsam gtan dang ni ldan pa med/_/rjes su 
[\[18a.7\]]dran pa tsam gyis ni/_/'jig rten gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/_/gang gis skye ba'i go 'phang mthong /_/lus la sa bon bkod pas ni/_/'jigs shing skrag la brgyal bar 'gyur/_/rnam par rmongs shing 'dzum pa ste/_/'dod pas myos pa'i skye bo rnams/_/bud med 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]nyid du gyur pa ni/_/sgrub pos mthong bas dgyes par 'gyur/_/sems ni rab tu myos par song /_/rig pa 'di zhes bya ba ni/_/dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo las/_/nges pa ru ni 'byung ba ste/_/sems can thams cad dkrug pa yin/_/rang 'byung sangs 
[\[18b.2\]]rgyas kyis ni gsungs/_/sna tshogs rig pa de yis ni/_/lan cig bzlas shing bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra bar ni/_/'jig rten pa yis mthong bar 'gyur/_/rig pas 'gugs shing de nas 'ong /_/de ma thag tu brgyal ba dang /_/ltung zhing 'chi 
[\[18b.3\]]bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gsungs pa'i 'dab ma yang dag blang /_/'khor lo bdag gis mngon par bri/_/bya rog sgro yi smyu gus ni/_/mig gi chu yis yang dag bri/_/gang gis rlung gis 'thor ba ru/_/snying po bzlog la bzlas pa bya/_/steng du rlung gi 'khor ba ste/_/
[\[18b.4\]]brgya byin yang ni skrag par 'gyur/_/dgra bo la ni mngon spyod do/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las rdo rje phag mo'i go bzlog pa'i snying po'i dgug pa dang bskrad pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas mkha' 'gro ma yi ni/_/mtshan 
[\[18b.5\]]ma ru ni 'gyur ba ste/_/pro tang gi ni phyag rgya zhes/_/gnyis pa pra ti pro tang gi/_/bde 'am zhes ni bya ba yin/_/phyag rgyar yang ni 'gyur ba ste/_/dpa' bo chen po'i brda yin no/_/ga min zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba yin no/_/A ga ma zhes bya ba ni 'ong ba'o/_/de hi zhes bya 
[\[18b.6\]]ba ni chang gi btung ba'o/_/gri h+yaM ni gnas so/_/tsa ru ka ni ston mo med ces bya'o/_/bru tsa naM zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'o/_/tsa ru ka ni khyim 'di zhes bya ba'o/_/na zhes bya ba bzang ba'o/_/pu ta ka zhes bya ba gtor ma'o/_/bun dzan+ti zhes pa kun tu mdzes pa'o/_/tsa ra ka ni 
[\[18b.7\]]mnyam par 'gro ba'o zhes bya bar gsungs so/_/sma ra na ma ni ngag gis bshig pa'o/_/ka t+ya ni bu mo'o/_/Da ha ni 'o byed pa'o/_/g+ha d+ha ni g.yogs pa'o/_/swa ra sha ni g.yon pa'o/_/e tad ta ni bza' ba dang bca' ba'o/_/bal ni ka ni dam tshig go/_/si ra ni mchod 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pa'o/_/A li kaM bden par gsungs pa'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/lA la ni khro ba zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/sa sra ba NaM rna ba zhes gsungs so/_/sa ta ni srog ces su shes par 'gyur ro/_/shA s+t+ri ni chung ma zhes su gsungs so/_/b+ha gi ni 
[\[19a.2\]]bu mo dang sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes su brjod par 'gyur ro/_/a shwa tAM ni bud med kyi nu ma'o/_/ba laHta ka ni skyes bu'o/_/ba la ha ka ni de dag 'khrud pa'o/_/kA na tA ni ma'o/_/tA li ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/ka n+ya ni 'dod pa'i skyes bu'o/_/me ra ni yod pa'o/_/bA sa ka ni 
[\[19a.3\]]dkyil 'khor ro/_/na ra ka zhes pa dur khrod do/_/ka khI ni sgo'o/_/shab ni bram ze'o/_/bi ra d+hi ni rgyal rigs so/_/tsa ra d+hi ni rje rigs so/_/ku ra ni dmangs rigs so/_/an ta s+thaM ni gtum mo'o/_/gr-i he ni phyugs so/_/hi hi zhes pa gsod pa'i ston mo'o/_/
[\[19a.4\]]DA ki ni 'dus pa'o/_/u da kaM ni zla ba'i btung ba'o/_/gr-ih+Na ni phyag rgya rnams so/_/dzi hwa ni ro'o/_/so la reg pa ni ltogs pa zhes brjod pa'o/_/an traM zhes pa ni 'grangs pa'o/_/gan+da ba si ni gnas pa'o/_/bi ma la zhes pa ni che ge mo'i gnas so/_/kir Na ni 
[\[19a.5\]]me tog go/_/rgod pa ni khro bar brjod pa'o/_/laM po da raHso zhes par gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/mu kha ni tshos mkhan du 'gyur ro/_/dzi hwa ni mi 'jigs par gsungs so/_/a da na ni so'i phreng ba'o/_/d+hA dza ni tshan d+ho ha'o/_/tsa la ni rlung ngo /_/pa shu ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]so/_/
[\[19a.6\]]mI sa yan ti ni dkyil 'khor ro/_/sa maM ni bzhi mdo'o/_/go ta ni khrag go/_/ma hA Sha ba sa ni mi 'gyur ba chen po'o/_/a hi zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug chen po'o/_/si d+ha ni rnam grangs so/_/kha la reg na ltogs pa zhes pa'o/_/so la reg pa ni tshim zhes pa'o/_/
[\[19a.7\]]aD+h+ya ni dbul po zhes su gsungs so/_/gsang bar reg na 'khrig pa'o/_/brla la reg na gyis zhes pa'o/_/'og tu bltas na med ces pa'o/_/steng du ces pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma'o/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]gsang ba'i brnga'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams/_/g.yon nas byung bas bya ba ste/_/cho ga shes nas phyag gi lan/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma las byung /_/sa ni spyan mar bshad pa yin/_/chu khams mA 
[\[19b.2\]]ma kI ru brjod/_/gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ni/_/me dang rlung du rnam par gnas/_/'o byed ma ni stong pa'o/_/de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'o/_/mdzub mo'i lcags kyu'i spyan ma ste/_/mthe bong mA ma kI ru brjod/_/gung mo gos dkar mo ru brjod/_/mthe'u chung 
[\[19b.3\]]la ni sgrol mar sbyar/_/ming med la ni pha rol phyin/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbus su mthong /_/gnas la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma/_/thams cad rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/_/de ltar g.yon pa khyad par can/_/slob ma rnams ni bdag nyid che/_/rdo rje 
[\[19b.4\]]sems dpa' thabs chen dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad/_/gsum pa pad+ma gar dbang phyug_/bzhi pa he ru ka ru brjod/_/lnga pa nam mkha'i snying po ste/_/drug pa la ni rta mgrin no/_/de bzhin khro bo'i rdo rje mchog_/'khor lo'i gnas 
[\[19b.5\]]la blta bar bya/_/bya ba thams cad sgrub pa la/_/rang ming brjod pa'i sngags dang ni/_/hU~M hU~M phaT yig sbyar ba yin/_/gshin rje'i phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/_/ji srid bden bral gyi ni bar/_/g.yon pa'i kun spyod 'di rnams 'dod/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni mnyam par gnas/_/
[\[19b.6\]]'di rnams rang gi rigs dang ni/_/phyag rgya dang ni kha dog rigs/_/rigs kyi rig pa yi ge nyid/_/gang phyir de yi rigs su 'gyur/_/rang gi phyag rgya bcings pa yin/_/smra ba rang gi rigs ni brjod/_/bud med gang zhig g.yon du 'gro/_/rtag tu mkha' 'gro ma ni g.yon/_/
[\[19b.7\]]ngag ni rab tu chen por smra/_/g.yon pa'i lta bas kun tu blta/_/bud med rnams la dgyes par smra/_/de ni dam tshig zhes su brjod/_/bud med rnams la gsol ba gdab/_/rigs kyi sa bon rab tu brjod/_/rigs kyi bya ba gtang mi bya/_/rang gi bstan bcos brjod 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]mi dor/_/rang gi rigs kyi rig pa bzlas/_/de bzhin du ni dam tshig bstan/_/gang zhig phyag ni byed pa ni/_/rtag tu g.yon pa yis ni bya/_/bud med rnams dang mthun par bya/_/de yis nges par bden par 'byung /_/rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong 
[\[20a.2\]]gis/_/sa la brko zhing ri mo 'dri/_/lag pa g.yon pa rang phyogs kyi/_/spyi bo la ni 'drud par byed/_/de yis rang gi rig pa dran/_/sgrub po'i lus la phan pa yin/_/mkhur tshos dang ni kos ko dang /_/sna la snyim pas reg pa yin/_/logs su blta zhing sngags 
[\[20a.3\]]bzlas dang /_/lan cig rig pa la ni blta/_/rnal 'byor ma ni bde bar 'gro/_/gang gi dam tshig nges pa yi/_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams rnyed par dka'/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams de bzhin no/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni bden par 'gyur/_/dngos grub kun byed mdzes pa'o/_/mkha' 
[\[20a.4\]]'gro ma rnams rigs dang ni/_/'di ru dpa' bo la sogs mtshan/_/thod pa bla re mche ba dang /_/'khor lo rgyal mtshan ral gri dang /_/rtse gcig tu ni brgyad par brjod/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya/_/dpa' bo sgrub pa rab tu grags/_/dpal ldan rdo rje phag 
[\[20a.5\]]mo yi/_/rigs las yang dag byung ba yin/_/rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug gtso/_/gang zhig rtag tu sha la sred/_/mkha' 'gro thabs kyi nga rgyal gyis/_/zad pa med cing khyad par med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung /_/'jigs pa med cing ngo tsha 
[\[20a.6\]]med/_/thams cad dus su 'gyod pa med/_/mchod pa byed par 'dod pa ste/_/sgrub pos mtshan ni thog thag tu/_/gzhan la nam yang bshad mi bya/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung /_/zhes bya gang gis bklags pas 'grub/_/sgrub pos dka' ba med 
[\[20a.7\]]pa ru/_/sa 'og tu ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sems can la ni phan dang gnod/_/yul kun la ni skyes pa la/_/ji ltar rim pa zhi dang rgyas/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las lag pa'i brda dang rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma dang /_/phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i cho ga'i 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/mngon sum dngos grub ster ba dang /_/gang gis bris pa tsam gyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'ang brlag par 'gyur/_/ro dang btsun mo'i 'dzag pa las/_/rab dang 'bad pas 
[\[20b.2\]]yang dag blang /_/bcu bzhi dang ni nag po'i brgyad/_/ro bsregs khung bu'i sol ba yis/_/thams cad rdo rje zhal bzhi pa'i/_/sngags ni rab tu chud par bya/_/sgrub pos gang zhig gnas su ni/_/lan bdun bzlas la brkos la gzhug_/nyi ma bdun gyis 
[\[20b.3\]]nges par 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin rig pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/lus la mngon par brgyan byas pa/_/de yang yid kyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/mngon spyod kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de ltar cho ga yang dag ldan/_/thams 
[\[20b.4\]]cad las ni bsgrub par 'gyur/_/rang nyid kyis ni sngags gzung na/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni/_/'grub pa dag tu yang mi 'gyur/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /_/dpal mchog dang po'i 'khor lo sdom/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs par/_/man ngag 
[\[20b.5\]]nye bar 'gro ba ni/_/lus kyi dbus na yod pa ste/_/rdo rje khrag 'thung ye shes ni/_/sgrub pos gang gis mi shes pa/_/gang zhig brtul zhugs yun ring yang /_/de las dngos grub med par 'gyur/_/'di ru las mchog shes par bya/_/sngags gzhan rgyas pa ci zhig dgos/_/
[\[20b.6\]]'di rnams kun ni yongs su btus/_/rab tu 'bad pas 'di ru gzung /_/sgrub pos gang dang gang gis ni/_/bsgom dang bzlas pa brtsams pa yin/_/de dang de yis rnal 'byor bdag_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar nor bu dang bdag_/rdzas la 
[\[20b.7\]]brten nas gzugs ni 'dzin/_/de ltar dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal/_/bsam gtan yang dag mchog tu 'gyur/_/dngos po gang dang gang dag la/_/mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/_/de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro/_/sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu 'dra/_/sgrub po rnal 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'byor gzhon la 'dod/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyas mi 'grub/_/bya ba'i rgyud kyis bsgrub pa la/_/dpa' bos rab tu sbyor ba sbas/_/ji srid snying po rgyas kyi bar/_/de dang de ni nyon mongs 'gyur/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las 
[\[21a.2\]]nang gi bsam gtan dang bzlas pa rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas sngags shes shin tu gsang /_/sbyor shes de nyid rnal 'byor brtsam/_/'gro ba kun ni rmongs pas khyab/_/kr-i ya'i lam la sgrub pa yis/_/bskal pa 
[\[21a.3\]]bye ba brgya yis kyang /_/de la 'bras bu thob pa med/_/sngags rnams 'di ni thams cad ni/_/dpa' bo dag gis sbas pa ste/_/de nas rnal 'byor shes pas sngags/_/gcig min yi ge ma lus pas/_/sbas nas yang ni thams cad la/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[21a.4\]]stobs kyis pha rol gnon/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam bkug ste/_/slob dpon bdag nyid chen pos ni/_/myur du dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/_/de ltar rtags ni ston pa'o/_/phyag rgya dang sbyor sgrub ba pos/_/nyon mongs med las 'grub par 'gyur/_/dam 
[\[21a.5\]]tshig med pas bklags pa dang /_/gang gis nam yang nyan pa de/_/ngan pa'i bdag nyid can gyis 'joms/_/rnal 'byor ngan 'gro'i lam du 'gro/_/'jig rten g.yon la spyod pas dran/_/g.yon pa'i sngags las kun tu dmigs/_/thams cad g.yon pas kun tu bya/_/
[\[21a.6\]]dngos grub kun ni rab tu ster/_/rnal 'byor ye shes sbas nas ni/_/kr-i ya'i bstan bcos la ni 'jug_/rab tu 'bad pas sgrub pa pos/_/de dang des ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las sbas pa'i sngags dang dam tshig srung ba'i cho ga'i 
[\[21a.7\]]le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhi dag_/yang dag bsdus te bshad pa yin/_/ba lang lci ba skam po dang /_/de bzhin lhag ma mgo skam dang /_/ro bsregs bzhi yi mgo ri dang /_/'byung ba chen po bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'bum la phyed dang brgya yis dman/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs pa ste/_/gsum mtha'i thig le'i steng du'o/_/bzhi pa'i mtha' ni rab tu sbyar/_/'bum mthar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed/_/bden pa gnyis la mnyam par brten/_/rtag tu drug cu rtsa bzhi mchod/_/'dod 
[\[21b.2\]]pa'i don kun 'grub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang phyug thang shing la/_/mi gang mnyam par spyod pa'i mchog_/sdig kun rnam dag bdag nyid do/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/sangs rgyas nyid mthong skad cig gis/_/ha gnyis thog mar dbang phyug dang /_/ha 
[\[21b.3\]]gnyis bzhi yi khro bo ste/_/sa ra sa ni nyid dag dang /_/ngang pa dang ni ka ran dang /_/khrung khrung dang ni chu skyar dag_/sngags bya chen por brjod pa ste/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi gtor ma spyod/_/dkyil 'khor la ni dngos grub sgrub/_/sngags pas lan cig tu ni brjod/_/gzugs 
[\[21b.4\]]can mi ni myur du 'ong /_/dgug cing dbang du 'gyur ba ste/_/ji srid 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ste/_/bud med stong gis yongs bskor nas/_/sgrub pos sa yi steng du rtse/_/dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo ni/_/gro gar gi wang gis bris te/_/rtag tu sgrub po'i spyi bor btags/_/kun gyi khrag 
[\[21b.5\]]'thung 'dra bar mthong /_/gos dmar yongs su bgos nas ni/_/sgrub pos mtshan ni thog thag tu/_/chu la yongs su bzlas nas ni/_/shing la bsnun na me tog lhung /_/skyes pa bud med phrag pa la/_/lag pa bzhag ste bzlas nas ni/_/rdo rje phag mo dbang du 'gyur/_/man shing 
[\[21b.6\]]la lan nyi shu bzlas/_/rkang pa la byugs mgo gnon 'gyur/_/go ro tsa na la lan nyi shur mngon par bzlas pa byas nas gang thig ler byas pa de thams cad skye bo kun gyis byams par 'gyur/_/rgyal rigs nang du 'jug na sku drin chen por 'gyur ro/_/mig sman la lan brgyad 
[\[21b.7\]]brgyar bsngags te/_mig la mig sman byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/_skyes bu la bsnun na shing du 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/chu la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]pa po yi sngags 'di yis/_/ston mo'i bya ba bza' ston mo/_/kun nas kun tu thams cad du/_/rnal 'byor ma ni dgyes par 'gyur/_/thal ba la yongs su bzlas nas gzhan gyi rigs la bsnun na rengs par 'gyur ro/_/gos la brgyad brgyar yongs 
[\[22a.2\]]su bzlas te mdud pa bcings na gos shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nor dang gos dang /_gzhan yang btung ba la sogs pa mang por 'gyur ro/_/chu la bzlas te chur blugs na chu skam par 'gyur ro/_/thal ba la yongs su bzlas te zho la bsnun na khrag tu 'gyur ro/_/yid 
[\[22a.3\]]kyis bzlas na thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags te thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mar la yongs su bzlas te mnyes nas sgo la reg na sgo rang 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/bum pa la yongs su bzlas te chus bkang na 
[\[22a.4\]]mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lcags kyi phur bu la mngon par bsngags te/_'o ma can gyi shing bcad nas yam shing la lan cig byas te/_gang gi ming dang sngags brgyad brgyar bzlas te bsregs nas/_de'i thal ba blangs te skyes 
[\[22a.5\]]pa la byugs na bud med du 'gyur ro/_/tsan dan la yongs su bzlas te bsnun na brlag par 'gyur ro/_/lan tsha la yongs su bzlas te skyes pas bud med la byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/me tog la yongs su bzlas te mi yi lus po la bsnun na smyon par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[22a.6\]]thal ba la yongs su bzlas te thig le byas na gos dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am bud med gang gi rkang pa g.yon pa'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs te gos la bcings nas gang gi ming bkod de sbas na bcings par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[22a.7\]]skud pa la yongs su bzlas te mdud pa gsum byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa dgra bo'i dbus su bcug na sbrul du 'gyur te/_de'i mche bas btab nas mi gsod par 'gyur ro/_/slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/me tog la mngon 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]par bsngags pa byas nas spyi bor bzung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mi snang bar gyur kyang bud med thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/me tog la mngon par bzlas te mngon par gtor na de nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'dzim 
[\[22b.2\](]ba'i [,]pha'i [)]gong bu la yongs su bzlas te spyi bor bzung na spyi bo mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dpa' bo'i chu la yongs su bzlas te bsnun na 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya yongs su brje zhing bsgos na 
[\[22b.3\]]gzugs yongs su brje bar 'gyur ro/_/dzA ti dang tsam pa ka'i me tog rnams la rtag tu mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gan ti ka dang sbyar ba'i dris 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/chang yang dri chen du dri 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 
[\[22b.4\]]'byung ba las dpal rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba thams cad kyi/_/yid 'ong ston mo la 'dus pa/_/gang zhig yang dag shes pa ni/_/gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ra rnams/_/sha dang chang 
[\[22b.5\]]du ldan pa yi/_/ston mo sna tshogs kyis ni 'grub/_/skal ldan mdza' ba'i longs spyod kyis/_/tshe 'di dam par 'grub par 'gyur/_/skyes pa dang bud med kyi gan du song ste rin po che rnams sdud par byed do/_/de phyir bla med dkon mchog gsum/_/shes par 
[\[22b.6\]]bya ste 'grub par 'gyur/_/ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu dang /_/skud pa gsum dang lha rnams ni/_/thams cad gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/_/rab tu 'grub par the tshom med/_/chu la yongs su bzlas te zla ba'i btung ba la blugs na mer 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni 
[\[22b.7\]]grol bar 'gyur ro/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub pa pos/_/de nas ri yi chu blangs te/_/tsan dan dmar po nyid la zla ba drug tu nye bar longs spyad na nad thams cad rnam par spong zhing /_/lo stong phrag gcig tu gson zhing skra dkar dang gnyer ma rnams spong ngo /_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]sa bon nag po blangs te sngags pas dngos po kun gyi snar blugs nas/_rnal 'byor pas bzlas na gnyer ma dang skra dkar dang mchi ma rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/tshe nyams pa dang skal ba ngan pa rnam par spong ngo /_/nad thams cad 
[\[23a.2\]]rnam par spangs shing lo stong phrag gcig tu gson par 'gyur ro/_/don rnams kun gyi sgrub pa pos/_/de ltar cho ga yang dag ldan/_/bcom ldan mo yi lus gzugs kyis/_/bzlas dang brtul zhugs bral bas kyang /_/mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/
[\[23a.3\]]bla ma'i spyod pa sangs rgyas mnyam/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing pha rol gnon/_/gru gsum gyi ni dkyil 'khor du/_/gal te rgyal po de mchod byed/_/sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/de ru rtag tu nga 'dug ste/_/rang byung me tog la sogs pas/_/
[\[23a.4\]]rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/dpa' bos zla ba gcig gis 'grub/_/ji ltar rang bzhin de bzhin 'gyur/_/de yi sku drin mchog de nyid/_/rdo rje phag mo'i rnal 'byor ma/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug ste/_/chung ma dga' ba med par 'gyur/_/yid 
[\[23a.5\]]kyis sngags ni yongs bzlas na/_/gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/_/sems can thams cad dbang 'gyur zhing /_/dngos grub thams cad the tshom med/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi tshe 'phel ba dang /_mchod pa'i 
[\[23a.6\]]cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu ba'o//_//de nas gser la sogs pa ni/_/thams cad dgug pa'i mchog yin no/_/sngags rnams kun nas sbas pa ste/_/rnal 'byor rgyud gcig rnal 'byor ldan/_/nor gyi bdag po'i khyim song ste/_/gser gyi chu 
[\[23a.7\]]la lan bdun du/_/mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni/_/gang gi khyim du gtor byas te/_/lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur na/_/nyin zhag bdun na gser rnams 'gugs/_/dpag tshad stong phrag gcig gi sa/_/thig le byas na bsgrub bya 'gugs/_/chu 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]yis slar yang grol ba'o/_/kha T+wAM ga la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas de la 'dug na dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang blugs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/phaT yig dang
