[\[23b.2\]]bcas pas rgyas btab par 'gyur zhing rengs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dpal rdo rje phag mo'i yid kyis 'dod pa bzhin bzlas na/_'dod pa thams cad ji ltar bsam pa bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin zhag bdun la 'bum phrag stong gi sbyin sreg gis 
[\[23b.3\]]dpal 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs can rnams la sbyin pa ster bar 'gyur ro/_/man shing srang gcig blangs te/_nag po'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi'i nam phyed na mchod pa byas te/_mar me chen por sbar zhing gtor ma dang lha bshos phul te/_/brgyad brgyar mngon 
[\[23b.4\]]par bsngags nas any+dza na bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad stong phrag gcig tu 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ka ra bI ra'i me tog stong phrag gcig tu sbyin sreg byas na nam mkhar lha mo gnas shing bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23b.5\]]chu'i nang du zhugs te mar dang sbrang rtsi la stong phrag brgyad du bzlas nas ji srid 'dod pa de srid du sbyin sreg byas na de nas 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rkun mo dang rgyal rigs kyis nges par 'tshe ba dang /_rdo rje sems dpa' yang yid kyis bzlas nas rdo 
[\[23b.6\]]rjes nges par 'gyur ro/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las rdo rje phag mo'i yi ge drug gi sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gsang chen thams cad ni/_/gzugs ni yongs su brje ba ste/_/rgyud 
[\[23b.7\]]rnams kun la gsang ba ni/_/'di ru gsang ba'i bya ba gsungs/_/ba lang gi spu las thag pa byas te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas/_gang gi ske la bcings pa de yang ba lang du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems can gyi ske la bcings par gyur pa de ni de dang 'dra bar 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/so ba la mngon par bsngags te so ba'i bdag po'i khyim du gtor nas lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin zhag bdun gyi so ba thams cad dang nor gzhan kun 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod kyi shing la mchil lham 
[\[24a.2\]]byas te mngon par bsngags nas/_de la mngon par gnas na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i yi ge drug pa zlos shing rkang rjes kyi rdul dang thal bar bcas pa la/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas 
[\[24a.3\]]nas gang la byugs pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags bzlas shing spyi bor bcings na gang gis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma la mngon par bltas te ming dang sngags bzlas na 
[\[24a.4\]]de 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/zhag gcig gis dpag tshad gcig tshun chad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhag gsum gyis dpag tshad bcu tshun chad do/_/zhag bdun gyis dpag tshad nyi khri tshun chad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/_/byi la'i spu dang gang gi ming dang lhan cig sbyin sreg 
[\[24a.5\]]byed na de gza' chen pos gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la des bcings pa de byi lar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar khyi dang bya rog gi rgyus pas srad bu byas te mngon par bsngags na de bya rog tu 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems can gang gi srad bu blangs te mngon par bsngags nas mgrin pa 
[\[24a.6\]]bcings na de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/bkrol bas ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'i skra'i srad bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bud med gang gi mgrin pa la bcings na de ni skyes par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bud med kyi skra la srad bu 
[\[24a.7\]]bsgril te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas skyes pa gang gi mgrin par bcings pa de ni bud med du 'gyur ro/_/lag pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas reg na mngal 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/bkrol bas ni grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]ma yid kyis bzlas na rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas na dpal mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las de nyid sngags kyis gzugs thams cad yongs su brje ba dang /_dbang du byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu 
[\[24b.2\]]rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas phur bu'i cho ga bshad/_/bram ze'i dmod pa 'dra ba yi/_/rnal 'byor yan lag yang dag blangs/_/gsang ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur/_/spre'u'i rus pa'i rang bzhin las/_/phur bu sor ni drug par bya/_/lan bdun du ni 
[\[24b.3\]]mngon bsngags te/_/gang gi sgo ru sbas pa ni/_/de yi rigs ni 'chad par 'gyur/_/ba lang glang chen rta dang ni/_/bong bu rnga mo ma he sha/_/gnas pa'i sa der sbas na ni/_/de rnams brlag par 'gyur ba yin/_/mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin/_/
[\[24b.4\]]gang zhig rtag tu 'di bsgom pa/_/rtag tu mig mi 'dzums par blta/_/gang la bzlas par gyur pa yis/_/de yi mig ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/gang gi ming dang sngags su bzlas/_/de yi khrag ni 'gugs par 'gyur/_/thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mo/_/
[\[24b.5\]]rig pa'i mchog ni nyer spyod kyis/_/las ni kun tu bya ba yin/_/ji ltar 'dod pa dpal khrag 'thung /_/rdo rje phag mo'i snying po dang /_/de bzhin nye ba'i snying po'o/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[24b.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu mdzes/_/gsang ba'i bla ma bla med sngags/_/lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/_/lha mo kun gyi snying po ni/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed/_/b+ha yig bdag gis rab tu 
[\[24b.7\]]gsungs/_/oM yig sa bon zhes su brjod/_/ji ltar e yig sa bon la/_/me yi bu ni gsum pas dbye/_/hU~M phaT yi ge mtha' ru sbyar/_/'di rnams yi ge drug pa'i sngags/_/mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin/_/gang zhig rtag tu 'di bsgoms pa/_/rnal 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]'byor dngos grub 'bras skal ldan/_/rtag tu de la bud med bzang /_/sgrub po la ni 'ong bar 'gyur/_/'dod pas brgyal bar gyur na ni/_/sna tshogs kun tu 'dzag pa ste/_/sems ni 'dod pas dgyes nas su/_/de rnams kun ni 'ong 
[\[25a.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu bzlas na bud med rnams/_/rgan dang gzhon pa dbang du 'gyur/_/byin gyis rlob pa byed par 'gyur/_/rang gi khyim du zhugs nas ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin brtag pa'i las 'di nye bar spyad pa ni/_las kun byed par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan thog 
[\[25a.3\]]thag tu bzlas pa byas te/_sgrub pa po shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas pho nya sgrub bo/_/de'i lag mthil du song ba'i dpal sus kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/_/khang stong du zhugs nas nub tu kha bltas te/_stan la 'dug nas gos kyis yol bar byas te/_de la bza' 
[\[25a.4\]]ba dang btung ba'i ston mo byin te/_sman rnam pa lngas spos byas te mar khu chen pos me mar rab tu sbar la stong phrag gcig tu bzlas pa byas te/_de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor la zhugs te sgrub pa po la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[25a.5\]]da ltar byung ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/sha dang kha zas kyi lhag mas rnal 'byor ma rnams la gtor ma byin te/_gi'u wang la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags nas mig la any+dza byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis nam yang 'di dam tshig med 
[\[25a.6\]]pa la brjod par mi bya ste/_rnal 'byor ma thams cad kun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dpal he ru ka la mchod pa bzhin/_de ltar slob dpon rab tu 'bad pas mchod do/_/cho ga bzhin du dgyes par byas te dpal he ru ka dgyes par byas nas rnal 'byor ma 
[\[25a.7\]]rnams 'dis dgyes nas mchog ster zhing /_slob dpon dgyes nas thams cad dgyes par the tshom med do/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/_dpal rdo rje phag mo'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags btu ba'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa/_/sngon bzhin thad ka'i mdun du ni/_/gang gis myur du de 'grub 'gyur/_/yid kyis dbang bskur thob pa ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po la gnas te/_/dngos grub kun kyang phyag rgya ste/_/sgrub pos yang 
[\[25b.2\]]dag mchod par bya'o/_/dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'ongs nas mchog ster bar byed do/_/de la ar+g+ha phul te pus mo sa la btsugs nas lag pa thal mo sbyar te/_sgrub pa'i mchog gis mchod par bya'o/_/sgrub pa po'i lus la 'jug par the 
[\[25b.3\]]tshom med do/_/dpa' bo'i mig ni rab tu gdangs pa dang /_thams cad shes shing gtso bo thams cad byed pa dang /_de nas sgrub pa po mchog 'jig rten gsum du thams cad du 'gro ba'o/_/dpa' bo 'di rnams ye shes che/_/gnyis pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[25b.4\]]spangs/_/gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/_/sa dang rgya mtsho ska rags te/_/lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/_/myur du dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/oM shrI he ru kA ya bid ma he bid+yA rA dzA ya d+hi ma he swA hA/_bsgrub bya'i spyi bo la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bkod pas 
[\[25b.5\]]rengs par 'gyur ro/_/sngags 'di rnams rnam par shes nas stengs su stobs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang /_glang po che dang /_spre'u dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_rta dang /_de bzhin du dmag mi rnams 'dir lus la bkod na rengs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[25b.6\]]de ltar yongs su bkod pa yis/_/gru gsum dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yang /_/skad cig tsam gyis 'ong bar 'gyur/_/kha yi dbus su rnam par bkod/_/de bzhin lce dang rkan la'o/_/de ni myur du dge bar 'gro/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[25b.7\]]dpa' mnyam pa yang /_/skad cig gis ni mi smra 'gyur/_/lce yi rtse nas rig pa 'phrog_/'di ru bkod pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/sngags kyi rgyal po snying gar dgod/_/sems ni 'phrog par byed pa yin/_/rkang pa'i mthil nas mgo yi bar/_/nag po'i gzugs 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ni rnam par dgod/_/dbang po thams cad 'phrog pa ru/_/byed pa ru ni the tshom med/_/las 'di thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster/_/'di rnams de yi dpa' bos gsungs/_/'dod pas sa stengs 
[\[26a.2\]]rnyed par dka'/_/bdag nyid yid bzhin nor bu nyid/_/de nyid bsdus par rnam bshad pa/_/'di yi sngags dang 'dra ba med/_/'di yi las dang mnyam pa med/_/rnam par mi shes pa yis ni/_/cung zad las ni 'grub pa med/_/sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par 
[\[26a.3\]]shes/_/dngos grub thams cad mdzes par byed/_/rang gi lus la rnam par dgod/_/sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/des ni bltas pas dbang du 'gyur/_/thams cad sgrub po'i gtso bo yis/_/rab tu khros pas gsod par 'gyur/_/brtul 
[\[26a.4\]]bzhin rnam par khros pa yis/_/chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho dang /_/'khrug pa dang ni rgyal rigs dang /_/rkun po me yi 'jigs pa las/_/de yis rdo rje thog tu 'gyur/_/gang der yang dag bris pa yis/_/'jig rten gsum yang g.yo ba dang /_/dngos grub 
[\[26a.5\]]thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/sgrub po mchog tu gyur pa yis/_/dbang dang dgug dang rengs pa yis/_/rnam par sdang ba bskrad dang gsad/_/gang du ming gis bris te gzung /_/thams cad du ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha/_/
[\[26a.6\]]mkhas pa yis ni myur ba ru/_/skal med kyis kyang 'grub pa yin/_/sgrub pos rab tu 'bad pa yis/_/'di ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/'khrug pa dgra dang g.yang sa dang /_/rkun po stag dang glang chen dang /_/seng sbrul rta dang mtshon cha'i bar/_/gza' ni sna 
[\[26a.7\]]tshogs 'jigs pa las/_/thams cad du ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de ni rtsod pa med 'dod na/_/sngags pas bri bar bya ba yin/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i klu'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]de nas bskrad pa yang dag bshad/_/dgra bo stobs kyis dregs pas na/_/steng du 'khor ba'i 'dab ma la/_/mkhas pas bya rog sgro yis bri/_/snying po go bzlog yang dag ldan/_/'byung po'i zhag la brgya ru bzlas/_/steng du 'khor zhing lding ba yi/_/'dab 
[\[26b.2\]]ma phyed dang gnyis las ni/_/bsgrub bya myur du skrod par 'gyur/_/gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' skrod/_/nim ba pa tra'i khu bar ldan/_/bsgrub bya'i ming dang dam tshig dang /_/snying du sngags kyis chud par bya/_/ma la sbyin sreg bya ba ste/_/brgyad lhag brgya ni 
[\[26b.3\]]yongs su bzlas/_/go bzlog pa yi snying po yis/_/nyi ma phyed dam nam phyed na/_/pho nya 'khor zhing sngags ni bzlas/_/snying po gnyis brgyad lhag pa'i brgyas/_/'di rnams 'khor bar bya ba yin/_/yid kyis brgyad brgyas dgra rnams ni/_/'khrul 
[\[26b.4\]]'khor dag ni gzhug par bya/_/sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang /_/spyi bor dbyug pa yis ni brdung /_/tshangs pa dbang po drag po dang /_/ming dang dgra rnams gsod pa yin/_/zla ba dag ni phyed pa la/_/bsgrub bya'i spyi bor yang dag bris/_/
[\[26b.5\]]thong pa khrag gis bkang ba ni/_/gang gi gnas su de nyid sbas/_/de ma thag tu khrag ni 'dzag_/sngags la sun ni 'byin pa de/_/de nyid kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang po'i dgra/_/'di nyid stong pa chen po ste/_/dngos grub kun 
[\[26b.6\]]byed mdzes pa yin/_/'di ni khrag 'thung gis ni brjod/_/sngon dang phyi ma dbus dag tu/_/mkhas pas 'jig rten spyod par shes/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung pa las gdug pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa 
[\[26b.7\]]drug pa'o//_//de nas char pa dbab pa bshad/_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor pas/_/gang gis myur du char 'beb pa/_/klu brgyad pos ni the tshom med/_/mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang /_/de bzhin 'jog po stobs kyis rgyu/_/pad+ma dang 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]ni pad chen dang /_/dung skyong dang ni rigs ldan brjod/_/so so zhing ni re re yi/_/sngags dang rang ming brjod par bya/_/sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas dbye ba bya/_/bcu drug pas ni mnyam par brten/_/thog ma tha ma mnyam ldan 
[\[27a.2\]]brtag_/sngags 'di dag ni mnyam par sbyor/_/mtha' yas la sogs brgyad po ni/_/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo yi/_/'jigs pas gzugs brnyan bya ba yin/_/phyogs kyi mdog tu gdengs ka bdun/_/sngags kyis bskul bas yang dag ldan/_/de yi snying 
[\[27a.3\]]gar gzhug par bya/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad dgod byas la/_/gzhag ste nyin bdun mchod par bya/_/mtha' dag chu yis rgyas par bya/_/myur du char ni mi 'beb na/_/las gzhan dag ni sbyar bar bya/_/dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la/_/dug dang ske tshe dag dang ni/_/nim 
[\[27a.4\]]pa'i 'dab ma'i khu ba yis/_/sngags 'di dag ni yang dag bri/_/sbu gu la sogs par ni gzhug_/'bras phub me la gdung bar bya/_/char ni 'bab par 'gyur ba'o/_/yang na klu nor rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mgo dgu pa byas la de'i snying gar bcug la gdung bar 
[\[27a.5\]]bya'o/_/char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling kun tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dpal he ru ka'i bka' nyan par byed pa dang /_klu la klus zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dpal ldan sbyin sreg gis/_/gza' dgu po ni zhi ba yin/_/mig dmar 
[\[27a.6\]]mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]la sogs par/_/sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du sbyar/_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin/_/mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang /_/de bzhin phur bu pa ba sangs/_/de bzhin du ni spen pa mchog_/sgra gcan mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]mnyam par bshad/_/rang ming brjod pa yi 
[\[27a.7\]]ni sngags/_/dang po oM gyi yi ge dang /_/tha mar swA hA sbyar ba yin/_/dbang po me dang gshin rje dang /_/de bzhin bden bral chu bdag dang /_/rlung lha dang ni gnod sbyin dang /_/dbang ldan du ni rab tu grags/_/de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_/sbyor ba'i lam 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]la rab tu 'jug_/rang mtshan bzhon pa kha dog dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid che/_/khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/_/bsgrub bya la ni sbyor ba yin/_/nyin zhag bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis/_/sgrub po ci bgyi 'gyur ba yin/_/zhal bzhi pa yi sngags kyis ni/_/
[\[27b.2\]]phyogs dang mtshams su gsungs pa ste/_/'bru rnams thams cad bsres nas ni/_/nyi khri ru ni bsngags nas kyang /_/grangs ni brgyad dang dgu po bsgrub/_/'di rnams 'jig rten pa yin te/_/rnal 'byor pas ni sgrub pa po/_/sa yi steng du rnam par spyod/_/
[\[27b.3\]]dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'jig rten 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog_/sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas kun/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog_/sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam par bya/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung mchod pa dang /_/mtho ris kyi ni 
[\[27b.4\]]don ched du/_/zhi ba'i dngos grub 'ong ba ste/_/rtag tu drug cu rtsa bzhi mchod/_/dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas/_/rang byung ye shes kyi ni gzhi/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las char dbab pa dang /_
[\[27b.5\]]gza' rgyu ba dang /_'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan na med pa yi/_/pho nya kun gyi dbang phyug mchog_/zhal bzhi yi ni hU~M yig dang /_/ji ltar 'dod par las kyis dbye/_/lha 
[\[27b.6\]]dang mi yi bde ba ni/_/gcig tu bsdus nas bltas pa yis/_/khrag 'thung gnyis med bde ba la/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/gos chen dang ni sha chen dang /_/dbang chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che/_/thams cad dur khrod nas byung ba/_/phyag rgya 'di yi dbang phyug 
[\[27b.7\]]mchog_/bya ba kun la dngos grub ster/_/ji srid mdun du dgra bo bsgom/_/zhags pa nag pos mgrin pa bcings/_/'dod pas dbyug pas brdung bar bya/_/cho ga bzhin du sngags pas bsam/_/lho phyogs su ni bsgyel bar bya/_/dgar ba yid dang ltung ba 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dang /_/yang dang yang du bskrad pa dang /_/lte ba ru ni bkag pa nyid/_/yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed na/_/gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyin sreg bya/_/nyi ma gsum pa kun tu bri/_/'chi bar 'gyur zhing mgo bo ltung /_/
[\[28a.2\]]sngags kyi cho gas 'chi ba ni/_/sa stengs mche bas btab pa ste/_/rnal 'byor ma yi sngags kyis ni/_/rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ster/_/snying pos mi la bsdus nas su/_/phyi nas yang ni ltung ba yin/_/phyag rgya chen po'i snying po ru/_/yon po zhes bar rab tu 
[\[28a.3\]]grags/_/sgrub pos 'jig rten gsum po yang /_/'di yis thams cad bsdus pa yin/_/de nas bskrad pa bshad par bya/_/dgra bo rnams kyis stobs dregs dang /_/sngags pas sngon gsungs cho ga bzhin/_/nim pa'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang /_/bya rog sgro 
[\[28a.4\]]yi bye brag gis/_/sgrub pos rab tu 'bad pa mchog_/blo ldan rang gi gnas la spyod/_/de ni sa steng 'khor los sgyur/_/nyi ma bdun gyis lha nyid dang /_/zla ba yis ni 'jig rten pa/_/lo yis sangs rgyas byang chub sems/_/dran pas phal che'i mi rnams 
[\[28a.5\]]so/_/zla ba phyed kyis lha ma yin/_/srin po dang ni gnod sbyin mo/_/klu dang dri za dag dang ni/_/mi 'am ci la sogs skad du/_/sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis/_/sgrub pos sa steng rnyed par dka'/_/rnal 'byor 'di ni dngos grub che/_/rnal 'byor kun la 'di 
[\[28a.6\]]mchog yin/_/rnal 'byor 'di ni dpal chen po/_/sum cu pas ni mchod pa yin/_/'di dang 'dra ba gzhan na med/_/cung zad mdzes pa gsang ba rgyas/_/'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal/_/gsang ba'i ming dang mkha' 'gro ma/_/gang zhig cung zad pas 
[\[28a.7\]]rab skye/_/mi yi 'jig rten na ni yod/_/de kun lho ru kha bltas pa'o/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las bskrad pa dang gsang pa'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/'khor los 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]sgyur ba drug gi sngags/_/cho ga shes pas sngags ni gsang /_/'dod pa'i dngos grub 'ong bar 'gyur/_/sems ni shin tu rnam dag byas/_/de nas rdza rnga bcing bar bya/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge dgod par bya/_/re'u mig dgu ni 
[\[28b.2\]]bcing bya ste/_/mnyam par yi ge bzhi bcu dgu/_/gnas der blo ldan gyis ni btu/_/dang po rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/_/rdza rnga'i rnam pa dpa' bo che/_/dpa' bo chen po'i zhal ni bsgyur/_/ji ltar rigs pa de ltar byas/_/mtha' dag rab tu zhi ba yin/_/sde 
[\[28b.3\]]tshan dbye ba shes byas nas/_/mkhas pas phyi mo las ni btu/_/bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa blangs te/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas yang dag ldan/_/dang po yi ger gyur pa yin/_/de nas bzhi bcu rtsa gcig blang /_/bzhi bcu pa yis sbyar ba yin/_/gnyis par yongs su grags 
[\[28b.4\]]pa'o/_/de nas sum cu so drug blang /_/dbyangs kyi gsum pa sbyar ba yin/_/gsum pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o/_/drod kyi yi ge gsum pa la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pa yang dag ldan/_/bzhi pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/de nyid kyi ni bzhi par ldan/_/
[\[28b.5\]]lnga pa'i yi ger gyur pa ste/_/rdo rje sems bdag nyid chen po/_/de bzhin bzhi bcu rtsa dgu blang /_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba ste/_/steng du nA das sbyar ba yin/_/yi ge drug pa ru ni brjod/_/o~M gyi yi ge dang po ste/_/phaT kyi yi ge tha mar ro/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags/_/de bzhin 
[\[28b.6\]]gcig dman lnga bcu la/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar ba yin/_/ya yi sde tshan brgyad pa la/_/me yi bus ni sbyar ba yin/_/dbyangs kyi bzhi pas sbyar ba ste/_/gnyis pa'i yi ge mchog yin no/_/steng du na das sbyar ba'o/_/yi ge gcig dman nyi shu la/_/skye bar byed pas yang dag gnas/_
[\[28b.7\]]dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar ba mis/_/yi ge gsum par gyur pa yin/_/gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu blang /_/sum cu rtsa drug yang dag blang /_/yi ge bzhi pa brjod pa'o/_/lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/_/de bzhin bzhi bcu zhe brgyad pa/_/gzugs kyis rab tu dbye ba yin/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]lnga pa ni yang dag blang /_/yi ge bdun pa ru ni brjod/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa pos/_/oM gyi yi ge dang po ste/_/hU~M phaT yi ge mtha' ru sbyar/_/rnam snang mdzad du gyur pa'o/_/'dis ni dngos grub thams cad ster/_/dbyangs kyi 
[\[29a.2\]]gnyis pa nyid dag dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa la/_/dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis sbyar/_/gnyis pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o/_/bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi yang dag ldan/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar ba ste/_/yi ge gsum par gyur pa'o/_/o~M yig dang por 
[\[29a.3\]]swA hA mthar/_/pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/_/'di rnams rang gi sngags bshad pa'o/_/de bzhin gcig dman lnga bcu blang /_/dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis sbyar/_/dang po'i yi ge brjod par bya/_/drod kyi yi ge bzhi pa la/_/dbyangs kyi bcu gcig 
[\[29a.4\]]gis ni sbyar/_/gnyis pa'i yi ge brjod par bya/_/an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar ba yin/_/ra yig dag dang bcu bdun pa/_/lnga pa yis ni mnyam par ldan/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yis mchod par bya/_/o~M gyi yi ge dang po ste/_/hU~M hU~M phaT ni 
[\[29a.5\]]mtha' mar yin/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo che/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi dbang /_/de nas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa ni blang /_/drod kyi yi ge dang po la/_/dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yis sbyar/_/gnyis pa ru ni rab tu 
[\[29a.6\]]grags/_/an tas+tha yi gsum pa la/_/bcu gsum pa yis sbyar ba yin/_/dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dag dang /_/mkhas pas gsum pa ru ni brjod/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yang dag blang /_/gcig gis ma tshang lnga bcu la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar 
[\[29a.7\]]ba yin/_/steng du na das sbyar bar bya/_/o~M gyi yi ge dang po ste/_/phaT kyi yi ge tha mar yin/_/de lta nyid du the tshom ma med/_/'di ni rdo rje nyi mar gyur/_/dngos grub ster zhing thar ba ste/_/yi ge bzhi bcu pa nyid dang /_/de nyid la ni dbyangs yig dang /_/bcu gsum 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa yis sbyar ba yin/_/de ni gnyis ldan du ni bri/_/'on kyang rig pa cung zad med/_/gcig gis ma tshang nyi shu dang /_/an tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang /_/dbyangs yig gnyis pas yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yis sbyor/_/bzhi pa'i yi ger brjod 
[\[29b.2\]]pa'o/_/dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa dang /_/de bzhin bcu drug pa nyid dang /_/dpa' bo nyi shu drug pa btu/_/yi ge bdun pas brjod pa'o/_/o~M gyi yi ge dang po ste/_/hU~M phaT tha mar sbyar ba yin/_/dpa' bo chen po rta mgrin te/_/dngos grub kun gyi gtso 
[\[29b.3\]]bo yin/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi bsam gtan dang sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste so dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang dag gnas pa'i sngags/_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/_/snying 
[\[29b.4\]]ga mgo bo spyi gtsug dang /_/go cha mig la sogs pa ru/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs sbyar/_cho ga byas shing rab tu bsrung /_/rdo rje sems dpa' snying la sbyar/_/dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/_/rnam par snang mdzad mgo bor dgod/_/de ltar 
[\[29b.5\]]yon tan khyad par can/_/spyi gtsug pad ma gar dbang phyug_/phrag par khrag 'thung dgod pa ste/_/mig gnyis rdo rje nyi ma yin/_/yan lag kun la rta mgrin te/_/de ltar go cha bgos pa yin/_/thams cad las ni sgrub par byed/_/lag par dgod pa 
[\[29b.6\]]yang ni bya/_/lag pa'i brda ni bstan bya ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bor gnas/_/de bzhin rnam snang mdzub mo ste/_/gung mo pad ma gar dbang phyug_/ming med dpal ldan khrag 'thung ste/_/mthe'u chung rdo rje nyi ma'o/_/sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog yin/_/lag 
[\[29b.7\]]pa'i mthil du dpa' bo che/_/gnyis med rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma/_/rgyab tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kun/_/'di rnams lag pa la ni dgod/_/kun gyis stug par mnyam pa ni/_/de ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/_/gshin rje'i phyogs nas 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]brtsams nas ni/_/ji srid bden bral gyi ni bar/_/dus drug nyis 'gyur du ni byas/_/mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa mchod/_/tshes dang dbyangs dang dus shes bya/_/dus bzhi sum 'gyur shes par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su he ru ka/_/
[\[30a.2\]]spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa 'phel/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug la/_/mchod pas dbul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang /_/dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/_/'di rnams dpa' bo'i sring mo yin/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa yin/_/dpal 
[\[30a.3\]]khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang /_lha'i grangs dang lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dus bzhi mtha' yi rnal 'byor la/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa'i gsang ba ni/_/
[\[30a.4\]]dpa' bo gnyis med bstan par bya/_/rdzogs ldan 'di ru ma yin te/_/gsum ldan la ni sring mor brjod/_/gnyis ldan la ni bu mor shes/_/rtsod ldan chung ma'i pho nyar gnas/_/de ltar cho ga shes byas nas/_/dngos grub 'bras bu skal ldan 'gyur/_/dpa' bo 
[\[30a.5\]]kun gyi rjes bsgoms nas/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub yod pa yin/_/phyag rgya chen po'i theg pa che/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams dngos grub ster/_/phyag rgya chen po gzhan na med/_/rnal 'byor kun la sgrub pa pos/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/_/gzhan yang 
[\[30a.6\]]rig byed smra ba dang /_/dpyod pa pa dang grangs can dang /_/gzhan yang bye brag smra ba ltar/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen gyi/_/kun tu dngos grub mchod pa ste/_/dngos grub yang dag ye shes nyid/_/thams cad pas ni mchog yin no/_/sa las rin chen bzhi 
[\[30a.7\]]yin te/_/de bzhin mchog gi mchog nyid do/_/mkha' 'gro ma dang rig pa che/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po dang /_/sdom pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang /_/rnal 'byor 'di rnams shes pa mchog_/rig byed bzhi la nga mi byams/_/nga la gus pas nga byams so/_/de 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]la nga ster de rjes gzung /_/ji ltar bdag nyid kun tu mchod/_/thams cad gnyis su med pa ste/_/kun nas kun tu rnal 'byor bsgrub/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo mchog_/mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa yin/_/zla ba'i btung bas dngos grub 'gyur/_/
[\[30b.2\]]rtag pa yi ni go 'phang mchog_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/mkha' dang mnyam las btus pa yin/_/kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin/_/khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung zhes pa/_/thar pa'i dngos grub mchog tu ster/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung ji ltar 'thob/_/
[\[30b.3\]]yon tan gzhan ni rtswa bzhin btang /_/spyan ma mthe bong la ni gnas/_/mdzub mo mA la kI ru brjod/_/gung mo'i rtse mor sgrol ma yin/_/ming med la ni 'od byed ma/_/mthe chung pha rol phyin ma dgod/_/lag pa'i mthil du mnyam par sbyor/_/rgyab tu 
[\[30b.4\]]gshegs su gsol ba ste/_/de ltar nyid du the tshom med/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las dus bzhi'i mtha'i rnal 'byor ma dang lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/skye ba bdun 
[\[30b.5\]]pa'i sgrub pa po/_/bsdus pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/sngags dang rnal 'byor rab 'bad pas/_/'bras dkar btags pa'i rang bzhin las/_/sngags pas byol song gzugs dang ni/_/gro ga la sogs yang dag blang /_/sgrub pos gang lta ji lta bar/_/
[\[30b.6\]]de yi gzugs la gzhag bya ba/_/ming ni sngags kyi nang chud bya/_/lus ni tsan dan dmar pos byug_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/_/gang gis nub mo ci nus bzlas/_/byug pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag dang /_/de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni/_/mi rnams dam 
[\[30b.7\]]tshig can du 'gyur/_/ce spyang sha dang chang gis ni/_/phyi nang bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/ce spyang sbyin sreg byas pa las/_/de la dngos grub thams cad gnas/_/'di ru ce spyang sbyin sreg bya/_/nor gyi lha dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de nas gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]mkha' 'gro ma kun dgyes par 'gyur/_/ji srid yongs su rgyas pa ru/_/de yi sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/yang dag brtag pa'i tshogs kyis gang /_/rnal 'byor bzhi sogs phyag rgya dang /_/rang gi mdog dang phyag mtshan dbyibs/_/dngos 
[\[31a.2\]]grub thams cad rab ster ba/_/thig le dang ni nA das sbyar/_/rnal 'byor che la rnam par gnas/_/las kyi dbye bas hU~M yin no/_/'bad pas thar pa bsgom par bya/_/lte snying mgrin pa sna yi rtser/_/hU~M gi yi ge rnam pa bzhi/_/'phar ba dang ni ring thung dang /_/rnam bcad 
[\[31a.3\]]las ni dbye ba ste/_/'phar ba yis ni thar bar 'gyur/_/ring bas rgyas pa rab tu brjod/_/thung bas mi mthong ba ru 'gyur/_/rnam par bcing bas gsod par byed/_/lte ba dril bu'i sgra dang mnyam/_/snying gar 'brug gi sgra 'dra ste/_/mgrin par ba lang gi ni sgra/_/sna 
[\[31a.4\]]rtser yungs kar 'phar ba 'dra/_/hU~M yig bzhi po rgyal po che/_/'jig rten gsum yang sgrub pa po/_/pu dza o a go ra de mA kA o tri ko ka la ka hi pre gri sau su na si ma ku/_phyi nang bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas/_/pu yig la sogs rnam par gnas/_/rnam shes ye shes gzung 
[\[31a.5\]]bar bya/_/rab tu 'bad pas bla ma bstod/_/phyi yi lam nas bsten pa ste/_/bstan bcos rnams kyang ring ba yin/_/thabs kyi rnal 'byor ma ni rnams/_/'bad pas bla ma'i bsnyen bkur bya/_/bstan bcos mtshan nyid mdor bsdus pa'o/_/de nyid ston pa'i dpa' 
[\[31a.6\]]bo yin/_/skad cig gis ni rnal 'byor ba dag_/skad cig gis ni phyag rgya sbyin/_/kun nas kun tu skad cig ste/_/skad cig sngags dang rnal 'byor rig_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las skye ba bdun pa'i bsgrub bya dang /_hU~M yig bzhi rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'i 
[\[31a.7\]]le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dpal ldan rgyal chen dang /_/dpa' bo phan par 'dod pa yis/_/pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni/_/yid kyis kun nas phyag 'tshal te/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod pa/_/gsang ba chen po dag ni 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]zhus/_/kun gyi rnam pa rgyas pa ru/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/gang ni gnas su gnas pa yin/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams la brtse/_/nyon cig man ngag ji bzhin bshad/_/rtag pa bsam gyis mi khyab gzung /_/gang gis ji ltar sngon du gsung /_/thams 
[\[31b.2\]]cad bdag nyid rtag tu gnas/_/lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod/_/sgo dgu ru ni gyur pa ste/_/lte ba'i dbus na pad+ma che/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grags/_/de yi gnas na dpa' bo bzhugs/_/cha med cha ni rnam par spangs/_/lus rnams kun gyis rnam 
[\[31b.3\]]par brtse/_/lus bral dri ma med pa ste/_/la lar gzugs kyi gnas na bzhugs/_/la lar sna yi gnas na bzhugs/_/la lar mig gi sgo na gnas/_/la lar sgra yi sgo na bzhugs/_/la lar bshang gci'i sgo na gnas/_/la lar sems dang rnam shes bcas/_/
[\[31b.4\]]la lar sred dang ltogs dang skom/_/la lar khro dang la lar zhi/_/la lar ltogs dang bcas pa'i gdong /_/la lar bud med mchog gi lus/_/la lar gsod cing brdeg pa dang /_/la lar smra ba bzhin du gnas/_/la lar me tog 'bras la gnas/_/la lar rtse zhing 
[\[31b.5\]]longs spyod ga nas/_/la lar dri la rnam par gnas/_/la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga/_/sa dang chu dang me dag dang /_/la lar rigs kyi dbye ba yis/_/gtum mo dang ni sbom po dang /_/la lar ma dang sring mo yin/_/la lar chung ma bu mo dang /_/la lar tshangs pa dbang phyug dang /_/
[\[31b.6\]]nyi ma dang ni 'phrog ma dang /_/la lar zla ba skar ma dang /_/la lar nub mo nyin mo dang /_/la lar khams gsum pa yin te/_/la lar thams cad med zad rgyal/_/la lar ro dang bag chags nub/_/cha med stong pa kun mi gsal/_/la lar byang chub gzigs mo che/_/la lar 
[\[31b.7\]]bdud las rgyal ba yin/_/la lar chos kyi 'khor lo che/_/de bzhin la lar 'chi 'pho ste/_/la lar dka' ba spyod pa yin/_/la lar dge slong tshul du gnas/_/la lar byis pa yi ni gzugs/_/la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa dang /_/la lar na bas zos pa dang /_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]la lar snod dang bcud dag dang /_/la lar sngo zhing dmar ba dang /_/la lar dkar zhing ser ba dang /_/la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/_/la lar sgron ma gos dkar mo/_/la lar spyan ma mA la kI/_/la lar kun tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/la 
[\[32a.2\]]lar bya yi mngal du 'gro/_/nam mkha' ru ni 'gro ba nyid/_/la lar glang chen nga rgyal te/_/la lar smad 'tshong mar ni 'gyur/_/la lar rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur/_/la lar gnyid ni log par gnas/_/la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_/la lar khrag dang 
[\[32a.3\]]pags pa dri/_/la lar ngu zhing mya ngan byed/_/la lar mi rnams za ba dang /_/la lar bskal par gsung ba dang /_/ji ltar kun tu rnam par dbye/_/lha yis ji srid gsungs pa kun/_/gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas/_/dpa' bo 'di rnams gsang chen po/_/
[\[32a.4\]]phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas/_/kun la khyab cing rtag tu stod/_/srid pa gzung zhing dri ma med/_/rnal 'byor bas ni 'di ltar bsgom/_/gnyis med ye shes nyid dang yang /_/de dang 'dra bar stong par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid la ni rnam par bsgom/_/de la brtul zhugs 
[\[32a.5\]]bshad pa med/_/phreng ba dang ni sngags kyang med/_/gzungs dang sbyin sreg las med de/_/mi g.yo go cha'i bya ba med/_/lag pa phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dang /_/g.yon brkyang rkang stabs la sogs med/_/dpa' bo chen pos srid pa gzung /_/rang byung mchog ni byed pa'o/_/
[\[32a.6\]]dgag pa ru ni mi bya ste/_/bdag nyid nges par mchod par bya/_/zla ba'i dbus su thig le bsgom/_/brgya yi phyed kyis rnam par brgyan/_/de yi dbus su rab bsams te/_/gzhon med thig ler bcas pa yin/_/de yi lus ni 'bral 'gyur te/_/bsgom du med 
[\[32a.7\]]cing bsam du med/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las kun gyi rnam pa'i sgyu ma ltar bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de ltar sgyu ma'i cho ga dang /_/gong gi cha ni rnam par spangs/_/rtag tu snying ga'i dbus na gnas/_/'di ltar 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]gsang ba chen po'o/_/lte ba'i rtsa bar pad+ma gnas/_/ge sar bcas shing 'od dang ldan/_/rang bzhin kun ni shel dag ltar/_/bcu drug la sogs kyis ni bskor/_/yi ge mnyam par sbyor ba ste/_/nam mkha' sbyar ba'i bdag nyid do/_/de nyid dbus su 
[\[32b.2\]]stong pa che/_/spro dang sdud par byed pa yin/_/gang gis ming ni kun rang bzhin/_/gang gis yongs su grags pa'o/_/nyi ma zla ba rnam dag ste/_/'char dang nub par bstan pa yin/_/sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/_/bsod nams thams cad rnam par 
[\[32b.3\]]'phel/_/pad+ma'i sna rtser yungs kar tsam/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin kun/_/yid kyis bzlas par yang dag ldan/_/phyi yi dbyangs ni rnam par spangs/_/de yi ye shes sangs rgyas te/_/gzhan gyis sangs rgyas mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sems dpa' dngos po 
[\[32b.4\]]shes/_/khrus med dri ma med pa ste/_/bde ba'i chos ni de bzhin gshegs/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang bzhin/_/thams cad me yi rnam pa ru/_/mthong ba mtshan ma dang po'o/_/srin bu me khyer rnam pa yi/_/mtshan ma gnyis par mtshon pa ni/_/rdul 
[\[32b.5\]]phran dkar po'i rnam pa ru/_/phyogs bcur 'jig rten mthong ba yin/_/nyon mongs 'don pa'i las rnams ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid dang /_/'dod pa lha yi longs spyod myang /_/bzhi pa mthong bar bstan pa'o/_/lha gzugs mtho ris lha rnams ni/_/
[\[32b.6\]]gang la mthong bar sems pa'o/_/drug pa 'jigs pa longs spyod do/_/bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de/_/brgyad par 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'bras bu 'thob/_/skra yi rtse mo brgyar gshags cha/_/rdul phran shin tu bsam par bya/_/stong pa la sogs 
[\[32b.7\]]dmigs mi bya/_/gzugs la sogs pa mi blta ste/_/rdul med sa bon med pa bzhin/_/gzugs med mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rnam shes ye shes gzung ma yin/_/rnam shes de yi rang bzhin te/_/mngon shes brgyad po yang dag 'thob/_/kun mkhyen kun byed gtso bo ste/_/ye shes 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]sku ni dri ma med/_/skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur/_/gzi brjid stobs dang ldan pa yin/_/sdug cing skal ba bzang por ston/_/dpag bsam shing ni yang dag byung /_/rtag tu bsgom zhing bzlas pas ni/_/ji srid lus ni bsgul bskyod dang /_/ngag gi smra 
[\[33a.2\]]ba thams cad ni/_/de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya ste/_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas/_/pad+ma bzhi dang 'khor lo che/_/de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi gzhi/_/dpa' bo bye ba rnams dang ni/_/sangs rgyas bye bas legs par gsungs/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon 
[\[33a.3\]]par 'byung ba las thams cad so sor gsal ba'i mngon par shes pa brgyad nges par bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzugs brnyan gyis zhi ba/_/'di ru yid ldan don du gsungs/_/gang gis myur du de 'grub pa/_/nad pa zhi 
[\[33a.4\]]bar byed pa ni/_/pho mo rgyal po byis pa rnams/_/sus kyang cho ga shes bya ba/_/spang leb khri sogs stan rnams ni/_/'bras dang sran chung yang dag bsres/_/shin tu btsos nas bsnos byas te/_/nya dang sha dang khrag gis ni/_/gzugs brnyan dag ni bca' ba ste/_
[\[33a.5\]]bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa ni/_/skra yi tshad du bya ba yin/_/sngags kyi yi ges bskul bar bya/_/drug dang bcu gnyis yi ges so/_/bla re dag ni bre ba dang /_/sna tshogs gos dang rgyal mtshan mchog_/dri dang spos dang me tog sogs/_/gsang sngags kyis ni 
[\[33a.6\]]bskul bar bya/_/srung ba chen po'i gos kyis ni/_/smad g.yogs dang ni stod g.yogs byas/_/gang gis cung zad nad pa yi/_/spyod lugs ji ltar yin pa bzhin/_/ro ru song nas bskyal bar bya/_/rol mo sna tshogs glu dbyangs dang /_/de bzhin gzhug pa bya ba ste/_/
[\[33a.7\]]gzugs brnyan la ni gdags par bya/_/dpung rgyan lag gdub mgul rgyan dang /_/gos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan/_/rked pa la ni mtshon chas bcings/_/lag par ral gri 'dzin pa ste/_/spyi bor bcing zhing go cha bgos/_/snying rje la sogs phan pa'i sems/_/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che/_/go cha gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/_/dur khrod du ni 'gro ba ste/_/rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bos bskor/_/'du byed rnams ni dang por byas/_/dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri ba ste/_/ma mo rnams dang rnal 'byor ma/_/bsgom 
[\[33b.2\]]zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dgod/_/de ru lha rnams yang dag gzhag_/gzugs brnyan lus ni lho phyogs su/_/sngags pas mgo bo bstan par bya/_/ji ltar mdzes pas bsgrub bya bsgom/_/nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/_/g.yas 
[\[33b.3\]]brkyang gis ni yang dag gnas/_/rtsa ba'i sngags sogs kyis ni bsrung /_/sngags pas kha ni shar du bltas/_/lag pas shes rab kha T+wAM ga/_/grib ma bgom par byas nas ni/_/lte ba'i phyogs su brdeg par bya/_/ji ltar sdug bsngal bar ni 
[\[33b.4\]]gtub/_/lha sbyin nad ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/dbang po la sogs shar phyogs gzhag_/sngags kyis bskul bar bya ba ste/_/ji ltar cung zad gzhug bar bya/_/slob dpon gyis ni mdzes par brtag_/khye'us khye'u grol ba ste/_/bu mos bu 
[\[33b.5\]]mo grol ba yin/_/thams cad khrus dang gtsang sbra dang /_/mdzes shing zhi bar bya ba ste/_/phyi nas slob dpon dgyes par bya/_/gos dang rgyan la sogs pa yi/_/gzhan kun la yang mchod par bya/_/bza' ba btung sogs gos kyis so/_/gsang ba chen pos 
[\[33b.6\]]zhi bar bya/_/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las 'bum phrag gsum las btus pa/_bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal khrag 'thung chen po bklags pas 'grub pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhan las rgyal ba dang po'i sgrub pa'i rgyud kyi phyi ma/_dpal khrag 
[\[33b.7\]]'thung mngon par 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po a dwa ya badzra dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]{D375}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_/yo gi nI sany+tsA r+yaM/_/bod skad du/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi drin gyis bde chen gnas/_/skad cig gis ni 'thob 'gyur ba/_/bla ma rin chen lta bu 
[\[34a.2\]]yi/_/rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga mchog_/'khor lo gsum bdag 'di sgom pa/_/rnal 'byor lam la gnas pa yin/_/lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni/_/rgyud du sbas par gnas 
[\[34a.3\]]gang de/_/bstan pa ru ni ji skad gsungs/_/bshad pa yang ni de bzhin no/_/so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid/_/brda yi cho ga rgyas pa yin/_/gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/sgrub pa po yis grub thob pa/_/sum cu rtsa bdun tshul gyis ni/_/byang chub phyogs la 
[\[34a.4\]]gnas pa yin/_/'jig rten du ni bsgom byar bshad/_/he ru ka dpal 'gro ba'i mchog_/de la thog mar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis phung po lnga la lha'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste/_gzugs kyi phung po la ni rnam par snang mdzad do/_/tshor ba'i phung po la ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/_/
[\[34a.5\]]'du shes kyi phung po la ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/_/'du byed kyi phung po la ni rdo rje rgyal po'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni shrI he ru ka rdo rje'o/_/mig gnyis la ni gti mug rdo rje'o/_/rna ba gnyis 
[\[34a.6\]]la ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/_/sna dag la ni phrag dog rdo rje'o/_/lce la ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o/_/lus la ni ser sna rdo rje'o/_/skye mched thams cad la ni dbang phyug rdo rje'i dbyings so/_/sa'i khams la ni ltung byed ma'o/_/chu'i khams la ni gsod byed ma'o/_/me'i khams la ni 
[\[34a.7\]]'gugs ma'o/_/rlung gi khams la ni gar dbang ma'o/_/nam mkha'i khams la ni pad+ma'i dra ba mo ste/_de ltar phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams la lha'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las lha rnams kyi gnas kyi rnam par dag pa 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]gnas pa ste dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i sbyor bas sbyar bar bya ste/_de thams cad kyang gang zhe na/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sems 
[\[34b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i 
[\[34b.3\]]dbang po dang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi 
[\[34b.4\]]yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dran pa 
[\[34b.5\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[34b.6\]]rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos ma 
[\[34b.7\]]skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'o/_/de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yin no/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o//_//de la de rnams kyi lha'i sbyor ba'i grangs ji lta bar mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste/_
[\[35a.2\]]lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA mA'o/_/chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni khaN+Da ro hA'o/_/sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o/_/'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum mo'o/_/brtson 
[\[35a.3\]]'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/_/dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/_/sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o/_/dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o/_/dran 
[\[35a.4\]]pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o/_/shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srung ma'o/_/dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o/_/dran pa'i stobs ni chang 
[\[35a.5\]]'thung ma'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs ma'o/_/shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o/_/brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o/_/dga' ba yang dag byang chub 
[\[35a.6\]]kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/_/shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khaN+Da ro hA'o/_/chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o/_/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni tsakra war ti nI'o/_/btang snyoms 
[\[35a.7\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los sgyur ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khwa gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o/_/
[\[35b.2\]]dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o/_/mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o/_/mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las byang 
[\[35b.3\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshang bya ba/_/dpa' bo gnyis med dam pa ste/_/he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag_/yan lag kun ni cha shas gnas/_/sen mo dang 
[\[35b.4\]]so la ni thod pa phyed pa'o/_/sku dang spu la ni keng rus chen po'o/_/pags pa dang dri ma la ni keng rus so/_/sha la ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o/_/rgyus pa la ni lha dgra'o/_/rus pa la ni 'od dpag med do/_/mkhal ma la ni rdo rje'i 'od do/_/snying la ni 
[\[35b.5\]]rdo rje'i sku'o/_/mig gnyis la ni myu gu can no/_/mkhris pa la ni rdo rje'i ral pa can no/_/glo ba la ni dpa' bo chen po'o/_/rgyu ma la ni rdo rje ha mdzad do/_/gnye ma la ni rab bzang ngo /_/lto ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'o/_/bshang ba la ni 'jigs byed chen po'o/_/mtshog 
[\[35b.6\]]ma'i sbubs la ni mig mi bzang ngo /_/bad kan la ni stobs po che'o/_/rnag la ni rin chen rdo rje'o/_/khrag la ni rta mgrin no/_/rdul la ni nam mkha'i snying po'o/_/tshil la ni dpal he ru ka'o/_/mchi ma la ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/_/mchil ma la ni rnam par snang 
[\[35b.7\]]mdzad do/_/snabs la ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las dpa' bo'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa/_/gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/_/sgrub pos dngos grub 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]thob 'gyur ba'o/_/ji ltar nang gi bdag nyid shes/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/_/rnam dgod ji ltar sbyar ba ni/_/snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste/_/rten dang brten pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/b+hai raM b+ha sogs yang dag ga gnas/_/bla ma 
[\[36a.2\]]las brgyud rim bzhin du/_/gang zhig cho ga 'di shes pas/_/ri steng pad+ma ge sar gyi/_/sna tshogs 'dab ma 'jam pa la/_/de yi dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub mdzad pa/_/mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang /_/khaN+Da ro hA gzugs can ma/_/
[\[36a.3\]]pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod/_/dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin/_/phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/_/sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam rol ma'o/_/mtshams kyi bzhi po dag la ni/_/lnga pas gang ba'i thod pa gzhag_/pUl+la sogs dang yang dag sbyar/_/
[\[36a.4\]]yul dang yul du gnas pa yin/_/spyan drang 'khor lo'i dbus gnas la/_/rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/_/pu zhes bya ba ni pul+lI ra ma la ya na khaN+Da ka pA la dang pra tsaN+DA'o/_/dzA zhes bya ba ni dzA lan d+ha ra na ma hA kang kA la dang tsaN+DA k+ShI'o/_/o zhes bya ba ni au 
[\[36a.5\]]D+Yin na kang kA la dang pra b+hA ba tI'o/_/a zhes bya ba ni ar bu da na bi ka Ta daM Sh+T+ra dang ma hA na sI ste gnas so/_/go zhes bya ba ni go dA ba rI na su rA bai ri Na dang bI ra ma tI'o/_/rA zhes bya ba ni ra me shwa ri na a mi tA b+ha dang khar wa rI'o/_/de zhes bya ba ni de wi koT na badzra pra b+ha dang lang 
[\[36a.6\]]ke shA rI'o/_mA zhes bya ba ni ma la ba na badzra de ha dang dru mats+tsha yA'o/_/nye ba'i gnas so/_/thugs kyi 'khor lo ste nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o/_/kA zhes bya ba ni ka ma rU pa na ang gu ri dang i rA ba tI'o/_/o zhes bya ba ni o Di na badzra dza Ti la dang ma hA b+hai ra bA'o/_/zhing ngo /_/tri 
[\[36a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni tri sha ku ni na ma hA b+hai ra ba dang bA yu be gA'o/_/ko zhes bya ba ni ko sa la na badzra hUM kA ra dang /_su ra b+ha k+ShA'o nye ba'i zhing ngo /_/ka zhes bya ba ni ka ling ga na su b+ha dra dang sh+yA ma de bI'o/_/la zhes bya ba ni lam ba ka na badzra b+ha dra dang /_/su b+ha drA'o tshan do ha'o/_/kA zhes bya ba 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ni kAny+tsi na ma hA b+hai ra ba dang ha ya kar+NA'o/_/hi zhes bya ba ni hi mA la ya na bi rU pA k+Sha dang kha gA na nI'o/_/nye ba'i tshan do ha'o/_/gsung gi 'khor lo ste sa la rgyu ba'o/_/pre zhes bya ba ni pre ta pu ri na ma ha ba la dang tsakra be gA'o/_/gr-i zhes bya ba ni gr-i ha de ba tA na rat+na badzra dang khaN+Da ro hA'o/_/
[\[36b.2\]]'du ba can no/_/sau zhes bya ba ni sau rASh+Ta na ha ya grI ba dang /_shauN+Di nI'o/_/su zhes bya ba ni su par+Na dwI pa na A kA sha gar b+ha dang tsakra ba ra mI NI'o/_/nye bar 'du ba can no/_/nA zhes bya ba ni nA ga ra na shrI he ru ka dang su bI rA'o/_/si zhes bya ba ni si nad+hu de sha na/_pad+ma na r+t+te shwa ra 
[\[36b.3\]]dang /_ma hA ba lA'o/_/dur khrod do/_/ma zhes bya ba ni ma ru de sha na ba ro tsa na dang tsa kra bar ti nI'o/_/ku zhes bya ba ni ku lu tA na badzra sa twa dang ma hA bI r+yA 'o/_/nye ba'i dur khrod do/_/sku'i 'khor lo ste sa 'og na spyod pa'o/_/kA kA s+yA dang u lU kA s+yA dang shwa nA s+yA dang sU ka 
[\[36b.4\]]rA s+yA ni phyogs su'o/_/ya ma dA d+hi dang ya ma dU tI dang ya ma daMSh+Ti NI dang /_ya ma ma tha nI ni mtshams su'o/_/de ltar phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid ji srid nges par rtog pa'i spyod yul du gyur gyi bar du dmigs par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las lha'i gnas kyis 
[\[36b.5\]]bstan pa ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bdag po sogs kun gyi/_/mtshan ma phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams dang /_/rang mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul rnams/_/rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya/_/rgyal chen shrI he ru ka ni/_/gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/_/phyag 
[\[36b.6\]]gnyis yang dag 'khyud pa dang /_/gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa 'dzin/_/g.yas pa'i lhag mar dgra sta mdung /_/rtse gsum gri gug DA ma ru/_/g.yon gyi lhag mar kha T+wAM bsgreng /_/thod pa dmar chen zhags pa dang /_/tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams bshad do/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[36b.7\]]kyis ni brgyan pa yin/_/thod pa'i phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs/_/brgya phyed par ni shes par bya/_/bcom ldan yum ni mdun du bzhugs/_/zhal gcig 'bar ba chen po ste/_/'khyud pa yis ni thod pa dag_/gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag bkang bsnams/_/g.yas 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]pas rtag tu sdigs mdzub dang /_/ma rungs pa yi gri gug bsnams/_/sku mdog dmar zhing cher 'bar ba/_/thod dum brgyan pa'i sku rags can/_/dbu skra grol zhing spyan gsum sku/_/mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung /_/byin pa 
[\[37a.2\]]zhabs kyis legs par 'khyud/_/gnyis ka kha sbyar tshul gyis bzhugs/_/mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po ni/_/kha T+wAM ga snod gri gug bsnams/_/sku la spyan gsum rgya lnga sogs/_/skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/_/dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/_/phyag 
[\[37a.3\]]rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan/_/phyag gnyis zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/_/ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis bcings/_/rdo rje dril bus legs 'khyud cing /_/chags pa chen po rjes chags mdzad/_/rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu bzhi/_/dbu skra grol bas rnam par 
[\[37a.4\]]brgyan/_/phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang /_/spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan/_/rnal 'byor snod dang bcas pas 'khyud/_/sdigs mdzub kyis ni gri gug bsnams/_/he ru ka dpal la sogs kun/_/g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/_/
[\[37a.5\]]mgur chu dpung rgyan rna cha dang /_/thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ni/_/phyag rgya drug par rab tu bshad/_/pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pas/_/phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa yin/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/spyan gsum 'og 
[\[37a.6\]]pag dag gis brgyan/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/yi ge gsum gyi dngos grub kyi/_/ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing /_/dngos grub 'dod pas gzhan mi bya/_/de yi bsod nams gang 'gyur ba/_/sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po/_/lce ni brgya stong du ma yis/_/
[\[37a.7\]]bsod nams brjod par nus ma yin/_/khwa gdong la sogs rnam pa bzhi/_/thams cad kyang ni sgo skyong ste/_/kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs/_/sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs ldan/_/gshin rje brtan sogs mtshams bzhir te/_/de dag zhabs gnyis brkyang pa dang /_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gzugs gnyis ldan zhing yid 'phrog ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma skyed ji bzhin du/_/khwa gdong la sogs dbye ba nyid/_/de ltar ma lus 'khor lor gnas/_/mdog dbye'i cho ga'i rim bzhin no/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las rang gi mtshan ma dang /_/zhal 
[\[37b.2\]]dang phyag rgya dang /_sku mdog dang mtshon cha bstan pa ste drug pa'o//_//de nas go cha gnyis po ni/_/gang shes pas ni myur ba ru/_/sgrub pa po yis grub thob pa/_/rgyud du sbas pa nges bshad bya/_/oM ha/_na ma hi/_swA hA hu/_bau Sha Ta he/_hU~M hU~M ho/_
[\[37b.3\]]phaT haM/_snying ga spyi bo spyi gtsug dang /_/dpung pa mig gnyis go cha sbyar/_/dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad gnas/_/gsum pa pad+ma gar dbang rgyal/_/bzhi pa he ru ka dpal bshad/_/lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma ste/_/drug pa la ni 
[\[37b.4\]]rta mchog yin/_/de ni go cha rnam drug gis/_/shin tu bsrungs pa nyid yin no/_/o~M baM/_haM yoM/_hriM moM/_hriM hriM/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_lte ba snying ga de bzhin kha/_/spyi bo spyi gtsug go cha nyid/_/dang po rdo rje phag mo'o/_/gnyis pa ya mi nI ru brjod/_/gsum pa 
[\[37b.5\]]rmongs byed ma nyid de/_/bzhi pa sbyin ma yin par bshad/_/lnga pa kun tu skrag par grags/_/drug pa gtum mo yin par bshad/_/go cha drug nyid phag mo dang /_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las go cha gnyis bstan pa 
[\[37b.6\]]ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas po cha gnyis shes nas/_/ye shes 'khor lo rnam bsgoms nas/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/_/dam tshig 'khor lor myur gzhug bya/_/rkang pa mnan la steng du blta/_/steng du pheM gyi sgra bsgrags la/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[37b.7\]]'jig rten khams gnas pa'i/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug_/sngags kyis yang dag bskul ba dang /_/skad cig de la spyan drang bya/_/mdzub mo dgug byas gung mo nges par sbyar/_/mthe bong rdo rje brnyan por yang dag sbyar/_/de ni dpral ba'i phyogs kyi dbus 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]gzhag la/_/gcu zhing gcu zhing bskor ba byas pa yis/_/sngags pas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma byin brlab/_/yi ge d+yA ni sna rtser yang dag sbyar/_/byA ni mtshan gyi lte bar yang dag dgod/_/lte ba snying ga kha dang dpral ba ru/_/sngags kyi 
[\[38a.2\]]tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab/_/lte ba snying ga dag tu rnal 'byor ma/_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis ni/_/a ba d+hU tI gnyis kyis dpa' byin brlab/_/rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyis med yin/_/dang por dga' ba dpa' bo ste/_/
[\[38a.3\]]mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma/_/rab tu dga' ba ma lus nyid/_/bde ba'i thabs de kun rig pa'o/_/lha yul sa steng sa 'og tu/_/skad cig gis ni gzugs gcig 'gyur/_/sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yi/_/bsdu ba de nyid bshad pa ni/_/g.yas dang 
[\[38a.4\]]g.yon gyi lag gnyis kyis/_/bskor ba mkha' 'gro'i bde de yin/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/_ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas sprul par shes bya dang /_/longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod pa 
[\[38a.5\]]nyon/_/theg pa chen po phyag rgya che/_/rnal 'byor ma yi grub ster bshad/_/phyag rgya chen po las lhag pa'i/_/rnal 'byor kun las mchog gzhan med/_/he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/_/rnal 'byor kun dbang dbang phyug yin/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/nam 
[\[38a.6\]]mkha' dang mnyam las blangs pa/_/kun mkhyen ye shes de'i rang bzhin/_/he ru ka dpal dpa' bo mchog_/skye bo dam pa kun 'dus pa/_/zhi ba'i btung bas grub 'gyur ba/_/rtag pa'i go 'phang mchog yin te/_/skyon med pa ni rtag pa'i gnas/_/bu la sogs 
[\[38a.7\]]pa yang dag sbyar/_/yul dang yul du rnam par gnas/_/he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dgod/_/yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/_/longs spyod rdzogs par shes bya ste/_/rnal 'byor che la gnas pa yin/_/mdor bsdus nas ni rab 'jug pa/_/blo gros brtson pas shes 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]par bya/_/ldog pa'ang ji ltar bstan pa ni/_/bshad bya sgrub pa po rnams nyon/_/shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/_/he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid/_/ru ni bkod dang bral ba ste/_/ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o/_/de ni rang bzhin stong ba ste/_/kun tu 'gro zhing mi shigs 
[\[38b.2\]]par/_/mdor bsdus nas ni sgom byed pa/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi/_/sku gsum dag ni rnam sgom pa/_/byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/_/der ni nges par bsgom par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las 'jug pa 
[\[38b.3\]]bstan pa ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bsgoms pas dub gyur na/_/bsdus pa spyod tshul khyad par gyis/_/sbyor dang bral bar mi bya ste/_/spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'di yin/_/sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin/_/bsam gtan cho ga rgyas byas la/_/rang 'dod 
[\[38b.4\]]las la gtor ma ni/_/khyad par du yang sbyin par bya/_/zla ba mar ngo'i tshes bcu dang /_/zla ba yar ngo'i de nyid la/_/'bad pas dpa' bo chang sogs dang /_/rdo rje lha mo rab mchod cing /_/sngar bshad sngags dang rgya sbyar ba/_/cho ga bzhin du yang dag bsrung /_/
[\[38b.5\]]oM A ra l+li hoHdzaHhU~M baM hoH/_badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya hoH/_de ltar lan gsum bzhi lngar brjod/_/dam tshig sogs rdzas legs gnas par/_/rdo rje thal mo kha gyen phye/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas mngon bzla/_/oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_/sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha 
[\[38b.6\]]sa/_b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tson+mA dA/_pa smA ra badzra DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya i maM ba laM gr-i h+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu ya thai ba~M/_ya theSh+TaM b+huny+dza tha dzi g+h+ra tha/_pi ba tha/_mA ti kra ma tha/_ma ma sarba kArta yA/_/sat+su khaM bi shud d+ha ye/_sa ha yi ka b+ha ban+tu hU~M hU~M phaT phaT 
[\[38b.7\]]swA hA/_dpa' bo'i 'khor lo la sogs sngags/_/dur khrod la sogs kyis kyang brgyan/_/lho phyogs kha bltas rnal 'byor pas/_/gnas ni mthon por rab tu mchod/_/nye bar mtshon pa ji lta bar/_/bdag gis nus pas dbul bar bya/_/dgun zla 'bring 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]po la sogs pa'i/_/tshes bcu la ni dad pas mchod/_/skye bo dam pa kun 'dul la/_/bde ba thams cad dbul bar bya/_/der ni bshos rnams bza' bya ste/_/lhag ma snod du gzhag par bya/_/de yi lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal/_/
[\[39a.2\]]gang gis kyang ni gzhom mi nus/_/de ni skye bo dad ldan rnams kyis mchod/_/he ru ka dpal mngon par dgyes gyur nas/_/kun tu dgyes pa'i mchog ni stsol 'gyur te/_/gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas/_/mtshan mo skra ni grol gyur pas/_/
[\[39a.3\]]brtul zhugs gos med gtor sbyin na/_/he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor bdag_/des ni ma mo dga' bar 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las gtor ma dang /_/mchod pa tshes bcur bya ba srung ba bstan pa ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas pha rol phyin 
[\[39a.4\]]drug dang /_/byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/_/gnas sogs sa ni bcu po rnams/_/che mchog lha yi bdag nyid can/_/dngos po gang dang gang gis ni/_/mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/_/de yis de yi dngos 'gyur te/_/sna tshogs gzugs 
[\[39a.5\]]can nor bu 'dra/_/de bzhin 'jigs dang bcas pa'am/_/'jigs med ji lta ji ltar gnas/_/bsam gtan dag gam sgom pa yis/_/las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed/_/spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab stsal/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob 'gyur ba/_/bsgom 
[\[39a.6\]]pa bdag gis bshad par bgyi/_/snying po kun las btus pa yin/_/log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/_/gang yang khyod kyis bshad mi bya/_/bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan/_/gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba/_/skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/_/sgyu 'phrul ye shes 
[\[39a.7\]]kyis bskul ba/_/dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang /_/rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin/_/lkugs shing glen la thabs ngan ldan/_/byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/_/sems can yongs su ma smin dang /_/phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa/_/de dag kun gyis 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]mi shes te/_/mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang /_/khengs pa la ni rten par dga'/_/nga rgyal la sogs bdun sems ldan/_/de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi/_/sbyong yul gsang ba mi shes so/_/he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug_/slob dpon 
[\[39b.2\]]bdag nyid chen po yis/_/myur du dngos grub skyed byed de/_/'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/_/kun sbyong cho ga'i rnal 'byor shes/_/cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya/_/srid pa gsum po ma lus na/_/de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes/_/mthong ba dang ni 
[\[39b.3\]]reg pa dang /_/thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/_/sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/_/de ltar de ni the tshom med/_/lha rnams bzlog ste dgod pa dang /_/sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang /_/bsgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa ni/_/snying po thams cad bsgrub pa 
[\[39b.4\]]yin/_/rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni/_/sems ni yongs su smin pa dag_/'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi/_/dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin/_/bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa ni/_/dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa/_/bsod nams 
[\[39b.5\]]chung ba'i sngags pas kyang /_/nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las thams cad rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bsrung min bza' min dang /_/dkyil 'khor pa min dkyil 'khor min/_/bzlas 
[\[39b.6\]]brtul sbyin sreg med mod kyi/_/mdor na sems 'dus tshul can yin/_/gzung bya rnam shes ye shes ni/_/bla mas bstan las rtsol bya ste/_/phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos pa/_/lam de shin tu ring ba yin/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni/_/bla ma'i bsnyen 
[\[39b.7\]]bkur la brtson pa/_/ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /_/dpa' bos de nyid bstan pa yin/_/skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag_/skad cig rnam pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/_/kun nas thams cad skad cig ste/_/skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod/_/smras dang lta 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dang lag bcangs dang /_/'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs/_/gong nas gong du bsten par bya/_/thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin/_/rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra/_/de nyid srog 
[\[40a.2\]]chags rnams kyi srog_/de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin/_/de nyid thams cad khyab byed de/_/lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/_/de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te/_/he ru ka dpal yin par bshad/_/skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid/_/phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa 
[\[40a.3\]]yin/_/ye shes bdag tu byung de la/_/gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang /_/bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang /_/rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams/_/'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/_/de med par ni grub mi 'gyur/_/rig byed grub pa'i mtha' rnams 
[\[40a.4\]]las/_/'di ni snying por rab tu bshad/_/'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid/_/gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang /_/gang du bde chen zhes bya gcig pu nyid/_/gcig pu'i nyams ni du mas gar mdzad do/_/'dug dang ldang ba nyid ngag dang /_/
[\[40a.5\]]'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang /_/byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang /_/ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin/_/de nas cho ga'i ming gzhan pa/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/_/de nyid du ni kun skyes pa/_/'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin/_/a A/_
[\[40a.6\]]i I/_u U/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_e ai/_o au/_aM aH/_ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya ra la wa/_sha Sha sa ha/_k+ShaH/_'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin/_/mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin/_/lha 
[\[40a.7\]]kun gyi ni skyed pa dang /_/sngags rnams kyi ni rgyud nyid yin/_/gang zhig 'di rtag sgom pa dang /_/rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang /_/rnal 'byor pa yis dang por brjod/_/he ru ka dpal gnyis med 'gyur/_/der ni lag sogs rgyan yin te/_/ska rags gnas 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rnams thams cad yin/_/'di ni rtag tu 'dzin byed pa/_/chos kun rtogs par byed pa yin/_/A li kA li mdun bsams te/_/rnal 'byor chen pos rnam gnas la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor legs rdzogs pa/_/lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas par bsgom/_/de yi dbus 
[\[40b.2\]]gnas bsam pa ni/_/dam pa'i gnas mchog yi ge ste/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/lha yi sku ni bsgom par bya/_/de ni gzugs las 'das pa ste/_/dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin/_/bsam mi khyab pa nyid bsams te/_/bsam de mtshan 
[\[40b.3\]]mar brtag mi bya/_/yang na bdag nyid sems bsam pa/_/de las gzungs ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las rgyud thams cad las nges par byas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi gnas gcig pu bstan pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[40b.4\]]gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma gnyis med/_/he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che'i/_/gnas ni yi ge'i sa pa yin/_/pul+lIr ma ya mgo bo la/_dzA lan d+ha ra spyi gtsug nyid/_/au t+yan rna ba g.yas pa ste/_/ar bu da ni rgyab phyogs 
[\[40b.5\]]la'o/_/gnas so/_/go dA ba rI rna ba g.yon/_/rA me shwa ra smin ma'i mtshams/_/de bI ko Ta mig gnyis te/_/mA la ya ni dpung mgor ro/_/nye ba'i gnas so/_/kA ma rU pa mchan khung dgod/_/o Te nu ma gnyis la'o/_/zhing ngo /_/tri sha ku ni 
[\[40b.6\]]lte ba'i dbus/_/ko sa la ni sna rtser ro/_/nye ba'i zhing ngo /_/ka ling ka ni kha la dgod/_/la~M ba ka ni mgrin dbus nyid/_/tshan do ha'o/_/kA ny+tsi snying la dgod par bya/_/hi mA la ya mchan rtsar ro/_/u pa tshan do ha'o/_/pre ta pu ri mtshan la ste/_/gr-i ha de 
[\[40b.7\]]ba bshang lam la'o/_/'du ba can no/_/sau rA Sh+Ta brla gnyis bsam/_/gser gling rje ngar gnyis la'o/_/nye bar 'du ba can no/_/nA gar ni sor mor ro/_/sin d+hu rkang pa'i bol gnyis la'o/_/dur khrod do/_/ma ru mthe bong gnyis la dgod/_/ku lu tA ni 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]pus mor gnas/_/nye ba'i dur khrod do/_/pu dzA o a go ra de mA/_/kA o tri ko ka la ka hi/_/pre gr-i sau su nA si ma ku/_/gnyid log ma log ldang ba dang /_/bza' 'am 'gro ba'i chos spyod pa'am/_/gang yin der ni rnam bkod na/_/'jig rten 
[\[41a.2\]]gsum gyis mi g.yo'o/_/ming gi rgyud ni 'bum sde las/_/snying po bsdus par gyur pa yin/_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i rgyud/_/'bum gcig nang nas de bzhin bshad/_/shes rab rgyud ni gsang ba ste/_/ming 'byung ba las gnas pa yin/_/bstan pa 
[\[41a.3\]]yis ni sprul pa yin/_/bshad pas longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod/_/so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan/_/sku gsum 'khor lo gsum du bshad/_/chos sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs 
[\[41a.4\]]dag ni/_/bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yin/_/blo ngan glen zhing lkugs pa dang /_/shes rab dman zhing log lta can/_/phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa/_/bla ma la ni sun 'byin yin/_/de dag kun kyang rnam spangs te/_/gus kyang bshad par mi bya'o/_/
[\[41a.5\]]cha dang cha yi khyad par la/_/der ni gnyis su med par bshad/_/dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang /_/bka' bsgo'i lha mo dpa' bo skyes/_/de 'og ma lus kun spyod pa/_/'khor ba las grol gtso bo yin/_/ma lus rig byed las sprul pa/_/grub pa'i mthar ni 
[\[41a.6\]]de rab bsgrags/_/dpa' bo khyod kyis nga la bshad/_/sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba/_/sgra dang sgra nyams brda rnams kyi/_/lam 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'brang /_/bsdus don yang dag blangs pa dang /_/brda yi tshig ni rgyas pa yin/_/gang gis kun spyod mi 
[\[41a.7\]]shes par/_/rnal 'byor pa ni rnal 'byor ston/_/de yi ngal ba don med de/_/'bras bu de ni thob mi 'gyur/_/'gro la 'phags pas sngon gsungs pa/_/sbas te gzhan du gsungs pa yin/_/kun spyod 'dir ni bshad pa las/_/sgrub pa pos ni rab mnyam gzhag_/
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]rgyal bas sngon ni rgyud chen po'i/_/sngags kyi yi ge sgrub mdzad pa/_/las kyi bya ba gang yang rung /_/dge dang mi dge brtags te bya/_/yi ge mtha' dang dbus dag tu/_/der ni thams cad rab tu grub/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las A li kA li 
[\[41b.2\]]dang /_las thams cad kyi nges pa gnyis su med par bstan pa ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du/_/sbas gsang cho ga bshad bya ste/_/sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa/_/rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal 'byor/_/mkha' 
[\[41b.3\]]'gro la sogs rdo rje yi/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/_/me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi/_/gnyis med gnyis su med sbyor nyid/_/gnyis med rdzas ni me tog sogs/_/re re nas ni dbul bar bya/_/phyag rgya lnga sogs mchog lus kyi/_/
[\[41b.4\]]pha rol son pas phar phyin drug_/lag pa'i mchod sogs ye shes can/_/blo ldan dpa' bos shes par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma drug [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/rdo rje sems sogs bcu gnyis dang /_/dpa' bo chen por sbyar bya la/_/lag pa'i mchod 
[\[41b.5\]]la sogs pas bstod/_/lnga po lnga dang yang dag bsre/_/'o ma dang yang bsre bar bya/_/mchod pa nges ni legs gnas la/_/spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod dang ldan/_/lag pa'i mchod pas rnal 'byor pa/_/dbul ba'i 'dod don 'grub par 'gyur/_/sems 
[\[41b.6\]]ni gzhan du gyur pa dang /_/bza' btung gos sogs thob par 'gyur/_/lha yi mchod pa byas na ni/_/de la bsam pa rnam grub 'gyur/_/dpa' bo 'di ni dpa' chen po/_/sa steng rnal 'byor ma rnyed dka'/_/rnal 'byor pa yi spyod brtul zhugs/_/rnal 
[\[41b.7\]]'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/_/gang zhig rtag tu 'dir rang mchod/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/_/dpa' bo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i lag pa'i mchod pa bstan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dpa' 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]bo rnal 'byor ma/_/gnyis med spyod pa'i cho ga bshad/_/dang por mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/_/'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya/_/nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la/_/yid la 'dod pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/_/sems can rjes 
[\[42a.2\]]gzung don gyi phyir/_/dpa' bo chen po 'gro bya zhing /_/srog chags yan lag go bgos la/_/bde don gnyer bas bde ba bsrung /_/mchod phyir thogs ni kun spangs la/_/he ru ka dpal gtsang sbrar gnas/_/grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/_/
[\[42a.3\]]rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dpa' bo gang /_/tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag_/lha yi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi/_/brgya phyed phreng bas brgyan pa yin/_/thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kun/_/lus kyi khams su 
[\[42a.4\]]brtag par bya/_/dpa' bo'i go cha drug gi ni/_/rgya 'dis lus ni mdzes pa yin/_/rdo rje phag mo sogs sngags gang /_/mgur chus ske ba mdzes pa yin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog_/kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku/_/
[\[42a.5\]]shes rab DA ma ru ru brtag_/thod pa dril bu la sogs kun/_/lus kyi khams su brtag par bya/_/yi ge bdun gyi gsang sngags kyi/_/rna chas snyan ni mdzes pa yin/_/rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags gang /_/ska rags byas pa brgyan pa yin/_/'khor lo 
[\[42a.6\]]kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'i/_/sngags ni lag pa'i thod pa yin/_/rnam par snang mdzad yum sngags dang /_/thod pas mgo bo brgyan pa yin/_/de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams nas/_/tsham ngam sngags kyis legs par bsrung /_/rtag tu tshangs par spyod 'gyur ba/_/
[\[42a.7\]]gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad mchod pa'o/_/nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste/_/mtshan mo bcom ldan ma brtag bya/_/mi bya ci yang yod min te/_/rtag tu mi bsam yod ma yin/_/mi bza' ci yang yod min la/_/dge dang mi dge mi smra med/_/bdag nyid ji bzhin 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]'gro de bzhin/_/bdag ci 'dra bar gzhan de bzhin/_/de ltar rnam bsam rnal 'byor bdag_/'jigs pa thams cad yongs spangs te/_/dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod/_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/_/he ru ka dpal gzhir gnas pa'i/_/yan 
[\[42b.2\]]lag bskyod pa ji snyed dang /_/tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa/_/de snyed phyag rgya gsang sngags yin/_/rigs lnga'i kun tu spyod pa ni/_/rigs gcig nyid du spyad par bya/_/de ltar shes pa'i bdag nyid can/_/go 'phang mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gnyis med ye 
[\[42b.3\]]shes sems ldan la/_/mi bya ba ni ci yang med/_/mi rtog bdag nyid sems kyis ni/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams spyad/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las gnyis su med pa'i brtul zhugs dang gsang sngags bstan pa ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//
[\[42b.4\]]gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/_/dus mthar dngos grub mi thob ste/_/blo ni gzhan du rnam 'khrugs pas/_/phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bzlas pa yis/_/bde bar 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/_/bkres dang skom gyi sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/'bad de 'dod bya dmigs nas ni/_/
[\[42b.5\]]de nyid kyis bdag rnal 'byor pa/_/ji ltar he ru ka'i ye shes/_/ji 'dod par ni yongs su rgyu/_/rna bas ring nas thos pa dang /_/skad cig gis mthong rnal 'byor pas/_/chos 'di de ltar shes nas ni/_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/_/shes rab chen 
[\[42b.6\]]por byas pa nyid/_/gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang /_/A li kA li ma gtogs par/_/gal te chos 'di 'dod na ni/_/de yi ngal ba don med de/_/'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo dang bya ba'i spyod pa rnams/_/rnal 'byor gsang sogs dbye ba 
[\[42b.7\]]nyid/_/'jig rten kun la bshad pa ni/_/byang chub don gyi rgyu nyid yin/_/nga yis 'jug par bshad pa ni/_/tshogs gnyis gnyis su med pa yin/_/de nyid chos kyi rang bzhin zhes/_/mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig 'dod/_/thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni/_/
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]brten par ngas ni sngon bshad pa/_/rnal 'byor pa yis dngos grub kyis/_/sgom pa mngon dgar gyur pa yin/_/spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni/_/spros pas spros pa med par bya/_/rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba gang /_/sprul pa rnams kyi 
[\[43a.2\]]de nyid bstan/_/rgyud 'di yis ni rnal 'byor pa/_/bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/_/sems rnams thams cad bsal nas ni/_/longs spyod kun la nyer spyad bya/_/blo ldan chen po 'khor lo sdom/_/sdom pa la ni rnam par spyod/_/rnal 'byor ma yi 
[\[43a.3\]]mtshan ma gang /_/gzugs dang brda dang tha snyad dag_/khyim lnga la sogs yul rnams su/_/rnal 'byor ma ni lnga nyid gnas/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas kun tu/_/g.yon nas bskor ba la rab brtson/_/ji ltar sngar bshad 'khor lo yi/_/grangs kyi cho 
[\[43a.4\]]gas brtul zhugs can/_/dpa' bo'i sngags sogs rnal 'byor ma'i/_/yid la 'dod pa dgod par bya/_/shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/_/bong bu'i rnam par bsgom par bya/_/he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba/_/las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/_/
[\[43a.5\]]he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas/_/lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la/_/bshad dang ma bshad gang bsam pa/_/de dag thams cad myur du 'grub/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las dngos grub kyi nges pa dang dpal he ru ka'i mdzad pa bstan pa ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de 
[\[43a.6\]]nas he ru ka dpal rgyud/_/sems ni dri med yin par bshad/_/dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni/_/phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/_/de nyid dang ni thams cad 'byung /_/me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi/_/pad+ma'i 'dab gnas rnal 
[\[43a.7\]]'byor ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma bzhi pad+mar gnas/_/mA ma kI sogs bzang mo yin/_/thod pa'i dum sogs 'khor lor gnas/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med yin/_/sems can 'khor ba las grol ba/_/dpa' bo nyid ni yin par brtag_/khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs kun/_/
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]sgo dang mtha' yi mtshams rnams su/_/sna tshogs gdul ba'i thabs can gyis/_/sems can don la brtson par mdzad/_/gsang ba'i gnas kyi rnam gnas pa/_/rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/_/rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo yis/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/_/rnal 
[\[43b.2\]]'byor 'bras bu thob nas ni/_/srid mtshor ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba las ni sgrol ba'i thabs/_/rgyud kyi snying po bsdus pa yin/_/bla ma slob mas rtogs sla'i phyir/_/cho ga rgya cher ma bshad de/_/sems ni ngal so rnal 'byor ba/_/mya ngan 'das pa bstan 
[\[43b.3\]]mi bya/_/de ltar spyod pa'i skyes mchog 'di/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol tu/_/'dis ni sangs rgyas nyid mthong 'gyur/_/ji ltar sngar bshad sdig pa rnams/_/spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin/_/gang zhig 'di sgom 
[\[43b.4\]]rnal 'byor pa/_/'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad ster/_/he ru ka dpal mtshan brjod pas/_/lha sogs kun gyi gsang gang dang /_/mi la sogs la gang zhig yod/_/de yi bsod nams des 'thob bo/_/bsam gtan gyis ni bsams tsam mam/_/'don 
[\[43b.5\]]cing klog gam bris pa yis/_/mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur te/_/yang na 'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa ni 'pho ba'i tshe/_/dpal ldan he ru ka la sogs/_/dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang /_/rnal 'byor ma ni ji snyed pa/_/lag na sna tshogs me 
[\[43b.6\]]tog bsnams/_/ba dan rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang /_/rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang /_/sna tshogs glus ni nye bar mchod/_/'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog ste/_/mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su 'khyer/_/de lta'i dpa' bo chen po dang /_/rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon/_/
[\[43b.7\]]ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang /_/kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed/_/lam yang bshad cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma yi gnas/_/he ru ka 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dpal sogs rnal 'byor/_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/_/pul+lIr ma la yar rab gtum/_/dzA lan d+ha rar gtum pa'i mig_/au D+yan ni 'od ldan ma/_/ar bu dar ni sna chen mo/_/go dA ba rir dpa' blo ma/_/rA me shwa rang 
[\[44a.2\]]mi'u thung ma/_/de bI ko Tar lang dbang phyug_/mA la par ni shing grib ma/_/kA ma rU par sa srung mo/_/o Tir 'jigs byed chen mo yin/_/tri sha ku nir rlung shugs ma/_/ko sa lar ni chang 'thung ma/_/ka ling lha mo sngo bsangs ma/_/lam pA kar ni rab 
[\[44a.3\]]bzang mo/_/kAny+tsi kar ni rta rna ma/_/hi ma la yar bya gdong ma/_/pre ta pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs/_/gr-i ha de bar dum skyes ma/_/sau rASh+Tar chang 'tshong mo/_/gser gling 'khor lo'i go cha mo/_/nA ga rar ni rab dpa' mo/_/sin d+hu'i yul du stobs chen mo/_/
[\[44a.4\]]mya ngan yul du 'khor sgyur ma/_/ku lu tAr ni brtson chen mo/_/yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang /_/dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o/_/gsang ba'i sngags la rtag gnas nas/_/rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma ni re re zhing /_/bye ba grangs 
[\[44a.5\]]snyed dag gis bskor/_/mtshan ma mtshan nyid phyag rgya sogs/_/g.yon pa'i sgrub pa po yis sba/_/mi bzad las ni gang gang gis/_/skye bo rnams ni 'ching 'gyur ba/_/thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i pha rol 
[\[44a.6\]]brgal nas 'di/_/ci 'dod ye shes can du 'gyur/_/mgur chu gtsug rgyan dpung rgyan dang /_/rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang /_/mgul pa brgyan cing spyi bor phreng /_/ska rags rkang gdub sgra nyid do/_/ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi/_/ge sar a li ka li las/_/nyi shu rtsa 
[\[44a.7\]]bzhir yang dag ldan/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bcas/_/u ma'i bdag po yang dag mnan/_/rdo rje dril bu sku la 'khyud/_/he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/_/go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/de nas rtag tu spos chus 'dir/_/rtag tu lus ni yan lag dril/_/dri 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]zhim yan lag gis brgyan cing /_/thal ba'i phyag rgya sogs pas bsgos/_/kha dog la sogs g.yogs pa'i gzugs/_/rang gi lus ni yongs su bsgyur/_/spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs par/_/shes nas rnal 'byor la legs gnas/_/yan lag 
[\[44b.2\]]can dang tshigs can dang /_/sdud dang de bzhin snying stobs dang /_/gar gyi tshul ni bzhi po 'di/_/de nyid mthong bas shes par bya/_/gdung ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni/_/rnal 'byor shes pa yin par bshad/_/de la 'bad de bya ba ni/_/skal ba bzang po'i gar chen yin/_/
[\[44b.3\]]gar gyi gnas su gnas pa kun/_/rgyan rnams de ni yin zhes bya/_/kun tu dgug dang bcing bya dang /_/gzhug dang de bzhin bskyod pa dang /_/'bebs dang 'di ni 'khyil pa dang /_/de bzhin 'dir ni brgyan pa dang /_/tshangs skud lus las dgrol ba dang /_/
[\[44b.4\]]rnam pa kun tu bcing ba dang /_/rkang gdub rab tu gzhug pa dang /_/lag pa'i rgyan ni nyid dag dang /_/srog shing gcig gyur srad bu yin/_/'og pag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang /_/rol ldan bcu drug par shes bya/_/phreng ba nyi shu rtsa lnga yin/_/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu 
[\[44b.5\]]spyod pa las de kho na nyid dag pa la sogs pa bstan pa ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[44b.6\]{D376}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsa tur yo gi nI saM pu Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/rnal 'byor bzhi yi kha sbyor te/_/zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad/_/
[\[44b.7\]]rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste/_/zhal rnams kyang ni kha sbyor ma/_/'di ru rgyas par brjod pa yin/_/'og dang steng du rnam bshad dang /_/de bzhin g.yon dang g.yas pa'o/_/A li kA li'i bye brag gis/_/lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/_/zla ba nyi mar rnam par bshad/_/sa 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]dang rlung gi nyid dag dang /_/chu me de bzhin nam mkha' dang /_/khams lnga dag dang yang dag ldan/_/gzugs dang reg pa de bzhin sgra/_/mig gnyis dang ni sna dag dang /_/lus kyi steng 'og tu yang gsal/_/rtag tu rdor can rnam par gnas/_/cha dang cha 
[\[45a.2\]]min rnam par grol/_/stong pa'i dang las yang dag gnas/_/ya yi sde mtha' yang dag rdzogs/_/u yig dag ni thig ler bcas/_/'byar zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba ste/_/kha sbyor rnam pa rnal 'byor gyi/_/rdor can ji ltar chang gis myos/_/'khor nas sems ni 
[\[45a.3\]]rnam par grol/_/khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/_/rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/_/bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub kyis/_/ma lus lus pa med pa mthong /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang ldan dang /_/dbang po de bzhin 'dod dbang phyug_/pha rol stobs kyis 
[\[45a.4\]]mnan nas ni/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis ni mchod/_/tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyis/_/dam tshig sgra yis bshad pa ste/_/srog dang rtsol ba kun tu bya/_/de yis 'di ni dam tshig sdom/_/de la kha sbyor rnam pa bshad/_/zhal bzhi ru ni rab tu gnas/_/rnal 
[\[45a.5\]]'byor ma bzhi sde zhes bya/_/sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/gang gang dbang po'i lam nas byung /_/de dang de yi rang bzhin nyid/_/'dod pa kun las longs spyod pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/_/gzugs ni ji ltar rdzogs pa las/_/de la sgom pa ci
