[\[45a.6\]]lta bu/_/sngags rnams ji ltar bskyed par bgyi/_/rdzogs par yang ni ci ltar 'gyur/_/de dag thams cad tha snyad tsam/_/sngags dang rgyud rnams yang dag 'byung /_/byang chub sems ni 'di ru bsngags/_/'dod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[45a.7\]]ni mtshon/_/mtshon bya du ma'ang mtshon mi bya/_/sngags rnams rgyas par bshad nas ni/_/lha rnams kyi ni bsgom pa nyon/_/steng gi sgo ni gsum yin te/_/lte bar rlung gi gzugs can ma/_/de la dbus su rtag tu stong /_/dag pa yi ni shel lta bur/_/longs spyod chen po 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]nges par 'byung /_/dgu pa bcu yis ldan pa ste/_/cha brgyad de yi yan lag gis/_/sgo dgu'i sa bon yin pa ste/_/lus la sa bon rjes su brjod/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid kyis/_/steng gi char ni shes rab ste/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'byung /_/
[\[45b.2\]]sems kyi rdo rje zhes ni bshad/_/'dir ni steng gi pad+mar bshad/_/de la gnas ni b+ha gar bshad/_/shes rab de nyid rdor can bcas/_/rten dang brten par 'byung ba yis/_/rtsa rnams kun la rnam par gnas/_/khu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa yis/_/spro dang 
[\[45b.3\]]sdud par byed pas so/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bsgom pa'i rim pa phyed pas so/_/gdams ngag rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/lha rnams bsgom par brjod pa ste/_/de rnams sna tshogs rnal 'byor gyis/_/zla ba nyi mar bshad pa yin/_/gzhan 
[\[45b.4\]]yang gzhan min rnam par grol/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni g.yo ba med/_/der ni gzung bar bya ba ste/_/gang zhig de ru ji ltar gnas/_/nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/mtshan mo shes rab tu ni brjod/_/nam mkha'i nang song mchog tu zhi/_/dag cing dge ba yid du 'ong /_/
[\[45b.5\]]sangs rgyas la sogs mu stegs kun/_/lha min gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/de nyid 'dod chags chags bral dang /_/'dod pas thar bar gyur pa nyid/_/de nyid bud med rnams la chags/_/de nyid mngal ni rab tu len/_/de nyid 'chi ste ril po'iganas/_/de nyid bskams 
[\[45b.6\]]pas mthong ba yin/_/de nyid gong du gyur pa ste/_/de nyid dri ru rnam par gnas/_/de nyid sdug bsngal rig pa ste/_/rig pas bde ba nyid dag la/_/de nyid gcig pus khyab pa yin/_/bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/gzugs bzang gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog_/
[\[45b.7\]]sna tshogs gzugs rnams yid du 'ong /_/gzugs kun gsal bar byed pa'i dpal/_/gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba'o/_/bcu drug phyed phyed de yi phyed/_/rtag tu de nyid rig pa po/_/sna tshogs rtag tu zhi ba'i gzugs/_/nam mkha' lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/de 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]nyid rab tu zhugs par brjod/_/'gro la gsal ba mar me bzhin/_/sna yi rtse mor rnam par 'byung /_/'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od zer te/_/'di rnams kun ni bdag gis brjod/_/rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid du/_/gang gis shes pas cho ga 
[\[46a.2\]]shes/_/de yi dpal ni rgyas par 'grub/_/gzhan yang sngags kyi tshogs bshad de/_/gsang ba'i sbyor ba sbas pa ste/_/sde tshan brgyad kyi mtha' ma gzung /_/sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/de bas b+hu yig sbyin par bya/_/dang por oM yig yang dag ldan/_/a ni 
[\[46a.3\]]yig 'bru kun gyi mchog_/thig le chen po yi ge med/_/nam mkha' nam mkha'i dbus gnas par/_/sngags dang rgyud ni yang dag 'byung /_/ci ltar de ltar sngags kyang ni/_/de bzhin nyid kyi tshul lta bur/_/yi ge tsam dang yang dag ldan/_/de la dbus su rab tu 
[\[46a.4\]]grags/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/gang yang gzhan gyi lha tshogs dang /_/'byung po ma lus thams cad dang /_/lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/_/de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs/_/yi ge la sogs gzugs can gyis/_/gzugs can rnal 'byor 
[\[46a.5\]]lA ma dang /_/dum skyes ma yi bye brag gis/_/zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad/_/rnal 'byor bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/lte ba dang ni ge sar ldan/_/'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/de la dbus su dpa' bo che/_/phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/dang po la ni 
[\[46a.6\]]sha yis gang /_/gnyis pa khrag gis bkang ba nyid/_/gsum pa bzhi pa lus phyag rgya/_/kha T+wAM ga dang DA ma ru/_/de bzhin kha dog dkar po 'phro/_/dri med ston ka'i nam mkha' bzhin/_/dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin gnag_/ljang gu'i zhal te gtsigs pa'o/_/
[\[46a.7\]]phyag rgya brgyad ni mdo ru bshad/_/phyag gis mtshon char rab tu grags/_/dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/gnyis pa snying ni 'byin pa'o/_/gsum pa rmongs byed phyag rgya yin/_/bzhi par ltung byed de bzhin no/_/lnga par gar ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/drug par gsod 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]byed mar ni brjod/_/bdun par za byed ma'i phyag rgya/_/brgyad par steng du len par nges/_/gshin rje mo dang skrag byed da drag_/gtum mo dang ni bzang za dang /_/b+ha su ma dang 'dod pa nyid/_/de nyid brgyad po phag mo nyid/_/mi bzad rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs/_/
[\[46b.2\]]khrag dang khu ba za ba mo/_/'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'bar/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/_/mang por rnam bshad ye shes ni/_/de la dbus su rnam par 'byung /_/dpag tshad 'bum gyi rgya khyon du/_/de yis gsal bar byed pa yin/_/sems can thog ma tha ma med/_/
[\[46b.3\]]rdo rje sems dpa' chags pa che/_/thig le rdo rje can du 'gyur/_/zla ba phyed pa lta bur gsal/_/gdan ni pad+ma ra ga ste/_/rgyal po'i gzugs ni gsal ba yin/_/rgyal po nyid ces rnam par bshad/_/steng du 'byung bar rab tu grags/_/yang ni dgod par bya ba 
[\[46b.4\]]ste/_/rigs kyi dbye bas brjod pa'o/_/shar du rdo rje sems dpar gyur/_/lho ru rnam par snang mdzad brjod/_/nub tu rta yi rgyal po'o/_/byang du pad+ma gar dbang ste/_/'khor lo'i dbus su he ru ka/_/steng gi sgra ni rta gdong yin/_/'di rnams 'di ru dgod 
[\[46b.5\]]par gsungs/_/rigs kyis dbye bas rnam pa lnga/_/de ru bsgom par bya ba yin/_/gzhom med gzhig tu med pa ste/_/de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs/_/mgon po rnam par snang mdzad sogs/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las tshogs kyis bsgyings pa'i rgyud 
[\[46b.6\]]chen po zhes bya ba ste brtag pa dang po'o//_//de nas rdo rje phag mo de/_/rkang rgyan dang ni do shal rgyan/_/de yi dkyil 'khor la gar byed/_/dbang bskur ba ni ster ba yin/_/dam tshig la ni legs gzhag phyir/_/phag mos de bzhin rdo rje can/_/ci 'dod de 
[\[46b.7\]]bzhin rdo rje can/_/dri chen dri chu za ba dang /_/khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/_/rtag tu bud med dang nus sam/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed dam/_/smros shig rdor can bde ba che/_/de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/bzhad par gyur nas 'di dag smras/_/lha mo ci ste bdag mi spro/_/khrag dang 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]khu ba la sogs bza'/_/rtag tu bud med gus par bgyi/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bgyid do/_/yang ni legs so legs so byin/_/sgo skyong de bzhin rdo rje can/_/thod pa yang dag blangs nas ni/_/rdo rje can la bza' ba dbul/_/zhi zhing gcer bur 'dug 
[\[47a.2\]]pa dang /_/rdo rje can ni skra grol bas/_/legs par dbang bskur ster bar byed/_/b+ha gar 'o byed rdo rje can/_/de nas brtsams te rdo rje khyod/_/sems can don gyis brtul zhugs bzang /_/bza' ba dri chen dri chu dang /_/khrag dang khu ba sha dag go/_/b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o 
[\[47a.3\]]bya ste/_/bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mos/_/de nas rtag tu dbang bskur ro/_/hU~M hU~M haHhaHaHaHhrIHhrIHswA hA/_/de nas de ma thag tu kun/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis/_/sgra chen po ni rab tu bsgrags/_/rdo rje can de dbang 
[\[47a.4\]]bskur ro/_/sna tshogs gzugs can drag po che/_/thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/_/sha dang khrag dag 'thung ba ste/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni sbyor/_/la la rol mo'i cha byad brdung /_/pa Ta ha sogs mu ku Na Da/_/la la rab tu glu len cing /_/
[\[47a.5\]]la la pi wang bsgreng ba ste/_/la la rdor can gar byed do/_/la la dril bu'i sgra sgrogs byed/_/la la sgra dag rab tu sgrogs/_/phyogs bcur pheM gyi sgra dag go/_/la la gar dag rab tu byed/_/la lar dkyil 'khor du glu len/_/la la me tog rab tu 'grems/_/
[\[47a.6\]]de yis rdor can la dbang bskur/_/la la spos kyis rab sbyin byed/_/la la dri yis de bzhin no/_/'di ltar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni bya/_/de nas rdor can lha mo de/_/tshig 'di dag ni brjod pa ste/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid 
[\[47a.7\]]dag dang /_/dbang dag legs par brjod nas ni/_/nga yis gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/lha rnams dgod pa mchog dag go/_/rgya ru kun tu khru brgyad de/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/sngags pas de yi nyis 'gyur [(]dbyad[,]dpyad[)]/_/gang du mkha' 'gro'i tshogs 'gying ba/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]nam mkha' 'od kyis rgya khyab par/_/gang de dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/_/dbus su 'khor lo yang dag bri/_/lte ba dag ni ge sar ldan/_/'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag bcas/_/kha dog dkar por yang dag ldan/_/de la dbus su dpa' bo dgod/_/dag pa'i shel 
[\[47b.2\]]bzhin dri ma med/_/dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/_/dang po'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/_/smin ma khro gnyer rab tu gsal/_/mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni/_/lho ru bltas pa'i zhal dag go/_/g.yon pa rmad du byung ba ste/_/rgyab ni 'jigs pa chen po 
[\[47b.3\]]yin/_/mdun rgyab rta yi zhal gyis brgyan/_/dkar po dmar po de bzhin gnag_/ljang gu ya ni kha dog go/_/phyag brgyad kyang ni bri bar bya/_/thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/dpal ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/_/'jigs byed ljags ni 'dril ba ste/_/
[\[47b.4\]]'jig dus chen po'i me dang mtshungs/_/dur khrod lta bur 'jigs su rung /_/brtsegs par rgod cing bzhad pa che/_/pheM gyi sgra ni sgrogs pa'o/_/zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ru/_/lha bzhi rnams ni brjod par bya/_/kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'i lag_/khrag dang 
[\[47b.5\]]khu ba dag 'thung ngo /_/'khor lo gnyis pa yang dag bshad/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la/_/'khor lo chen po yi ge brgyad/_/'od zer dmar po 'bar ba ste/_/gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma/_/lam mchog 'phel dang sa ma li/_/phyir mi ldog dang e hi ki/_/
[\[47b.6\]]rdor can brgyad par brjod pa yin/_/lha mo brgyad po 'di ru dgod/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar/_/lag pas kha T+wAM ga gzung zhing /_/thod pa khrag gis bkang ba'o/_/phyi rol 'khor lo yang dag brjod/_/lha rnams bkod pa mchod dang ni/_/saM khi nI dang puk+ka 
[\[47b.7\]]si/_/gsod ma dkar mo sgrog ma dang /_/gtum mo ri khrod ma nyid dang /_/sgrol ma de bzhin khro gnyer ma/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal glang chen mo/_/de bzhin g+hasma rI dag dang /_/durga tsa muN+Da dag dang /_/de bzhin tshangs ma khyab 'jug ma/_/sgo skyong 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]yang dag bshad pa ni/_/sgo bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/_/'khor lo chen po kha dog sngo/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs kyi 'od/_/lha mo chen mo kha dog dkar/_/kha T+wAM ga dang nya phyis 'dzin/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyal po ste/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[48a.2\]]ma bzhi'i sdom pa ni/_/rang gi rgyud du thun mong ste/_/dkyil 'khor bla ma'i bla ma yin/_/srub pa chen po'i sdom pa ni/_/de yi bla ma zhes su gsungs/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las dkyil 'khor gyi brtag pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o//_//de 
[\[48a.3\]]nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dam tshig chen po'i sgrub thabs so/_/glang po rta dang bong bu dang /_/ba lang rnga mo dag dang ni/_/khyi yi sgron ma rab tu 'byung /_/sgron ma chen mo rab tu bshad/_/'gro ba dga' bas gsal bar byed/_/bya rog 'ug pa khra dang ni/_/
[\[48a.4\]]chu skyar bya rgod lnga po yi/_/spos chen po ni rab tu bshad/_/spos su 'bul bar byed pa'o/_/'di rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/sa gsum po ru rnam par spyod/_/ci srid sbyor ba tshogs pa yis/_/dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog_/bdud rtsi lnga 
[\[48a.5\]]ni rnam brjod pa/_/'chi med dngos po med pa'o/_/rtog pa med par bza' bar bya/_/blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so/_/sde tshan tha ma'i sngags btus te/_/bcu drug cha yis yang dag ldan/_/pra Na ba sbyor steng du ste/_/thig les gnon cing brgyan pa yin/_/
[\[48a.6\]]dri zhes kun tu brjod pa yin/_/kun nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/_/nyi shu bdun pa 'og tu sbyin/_/sngags la sogs pas phye ba yin/_/spyi bo de ru yang dag sbyar/_/yi ge lha yi gzugs kyis ni/_/nyi shu rtsa drug yang ni sbyar/_/dbyangs yig gnyis 
[\[48a.7\]]pas brgyan pa yin/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum yang ni blang /_/'og gi char ni sbyar bar bya/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pa yang dag ldan/_/bzhi pas sbyar bar bya ba yin/_/de yi dbus su yang dag gsungs/_/yi ge dbang phyug gis ni brgyan/_/bcu drug mtha' ni yang dag 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]bshad/_/steng dang 'og tu khyab pa yin/_/de la dbus su yang dag gsungs/_/stong pa chen po'i yi ge ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gzhig tu med/_/dag pa yi ni shel lta bur/_/rdzas 'di rnams ni bza' ba yin/_/rnal 'byor 'di rnams mchog yin te/_/
[\[48b.2\]]rnal 'byor kun las mchog tu 'phags/_/khyod la mdo ru bsdus par bshad/_/bza' ba rnams ni yang dag brjod/_/gang gi rigs pas thams cad bza'/_/dngos po ro mnyam bsres nas ni/_/dag dang ma dag mi byed par/_/de bzhin nyid rnams 
[\[48b.3\]]thams cad dang /_/bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya/_/de nyid bcu yis rab dbye bas/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par grol/_/sbyin pa'i snying po sbyin par bya/_/sems kyis rnal 'byor rdzogs nas ni/_/thams cad rtswa sogs bzhin du btang /_/sangs 
[\[48b.4\]]rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims gyur/_/de nyid kun gyis mi 'jigs pa/_/skye bo thams cad 'tshe mi byed/_/dang por snying rje bla na med/_/bzod pa tshul khrims bgegs med dang /_/gzhan gyi gnod pa 'gegs pa ste/_/gur dang phur bu dra ba dag_/gdug 
[\[48b.5\]]pa'i bdud ni 'joms pa ste/_/bdud med 'chi ba med pa yin/_/bdag gi sems ni bcing bar bya/_/gang gis rang sems gdul ba yis/_/bdud kyis gnod pa smos ci dgos/_/mnyam pa'i sems kyi dri yis ni/_/gru bzhi pa ru yang dag bri/_/lus la 
[\[48b.6\]]ste'u dang tsan dan dang /_/sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa na/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes brjod/_/dngos po bdag med bsres pa ste/_/gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyal bar 'gyur/_/gang dag rnal 'byor ma yi ni/_/zhu ba rnams la za ba dag/_/de yis sa 
[\[48b.7\]]stengs mtha' dag tu/_/rga dang na ba rnam par 'joms/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las dam tshig chen po'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba'i brtag pa ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/sbyor ba dang po'i sgrub thabs te/_/sbyor ba rnam bzhir shes 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]par bya/_/dam tshig bzhi ni bsgrub pa ste/_/dang po khu ba rnams shes bya/_/gnyis pa de bzhin khrag nyid do/_/rdo rje chu dang dri chen ni/_/dam tshig bzhi ni bsten pa ste/_/'dod chags khu bar rnam par bshad/_/phrag dog khrag ni nyid dag go/_/
[\[49a.2\]]gti mug rnam snang rgyal po ste/_/zhe sdang dri chur bcas pa yin/_/dam tshig bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/dam tshig bzhi la spyod pa pos/_/dang po sbyor ba 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/_/bris sku gzhug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/
[\[49a.3\]]dam tshig de nyid bsgrub bya ste/_/stong pa'i rdo rje brjod bya ste/_/ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsam/_/mdor bsdus pa ni sngags bzlas bya/_/hU~M dag sngags ni brjod par bya/_/dngos pos bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_/spro dang sdud par byed pa'o/_/
[\[49a.4\]]bdud bzhi gzhan las rgyal ba yi/_/go cha mtshon cha 'di yis bcing /_/ra ba phur bu gur sogs kyis/_/phyogs bzhi la sogs bcing bar bya/_/khams bzhi por ni yang dag 'byung /_/bdud bzhi po ni rnam par brjod/_/bad kan sha dang rkang dag dang /_/rus pa'i 
[\[49a.5\]]khams la yang dag 'byung /_/spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang /_/gos dkar la sogs bzhi pa'o/_/khams bzhi dag ni rnam dag pa/_/sbyor ba dang por brjod pa'o/_/brtson chen zhes su rnam bshad pa/_/rlung dang me ni mchog yin te/_/de la dbus su yang dag 
[\[49a.6\]]gnas/_/dzA ta ri yi rang bzhin ming /_/dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/_/kha dog med par rab tu grags/_/dbyangs dang yi ge'i tshul dag tu/_/dbyangs med yi ge med pa'o/_/tshangs min khyab 'jug drag po min/_/nam mkha' min zhing 'dod pa min/_/zla 
[\[49a.7\]]ba min zhing skar ma min/_/nyi ma min zhing rlung yang min/_/gnod sbyin srin po lha min min/_/'byung po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]nyid min cing /_/snod dang bcud ni sna tshogs dang /_/khams gsum po ni ma lus la/_/bdag nyid chen po de yis khyab/_/bems po nyid la yid kyis 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]rtogs/_/de nyid 'jig rten pa ru 'gyur/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/zla ba gza' zin skar ma lha/_/de nyid thams cad bde ba che/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang mdzad/_/pad+ma nyi ma khrag 'thung rta/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mo/_/de nyid rdo rje bde chen po/_/rdo rje 
[\[49b.2\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/de bzhin pad+ma pad+ma 'dzin/_/nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid/_/rigs 'di rnams su bsgyur ba'o/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor bri ba nyid/_/rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa'o/_/de nyid sngags su rab tu bya/_/hU~M hU~M phaT kyi yi ge nyid/_/dmyal ba dud 'gro yi 
[\[49b.3\]]dgas dang /_/lha dang mi dang lha min dang /_/rmongs pa'i sems su gyur pa yis/_/'khor ba 'di ru 'khor bar 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor chen po mdor bsdus pa/_/rdo rje can la gnas pa'o/_/lha mo chen mo slar yang dri/_/'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur/_/gnas 
[\[49b.4\]]nas 'di yi sems dag ni/_/skye ba ji ltar brjod pa yin/_/khu ba ji ltar gzugs su 'gyur/_/skye bo'i skye ba ji ltar yin/_/de yi gzugs kyi skye mal ni/_/khrag las ji ltar 'byung ba lags/_/'byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba ci/_/de yi skye ba ji ltar lags/_/
[\[49b.5\]]sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/_/skye gnas kun la chags pa ni/_/dngos po rnam pa ji ltar khyab/_/zhi ba'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/_/thams cad du ni ji ltar skye/_/'di rnams yang dag bshad pa ni/_/lha mo bden par bdag la gsungs/_/
[\[49b.6\]]ji ltar de bzhin rdo rje nyon/_/sems can kun gyi skyed pa dag_/'khor bar yang dag bsrubs pa las/_/[{]ding [,]deng [}]'dir thabs kyis 'di 'gyur ro/_/thog ma tha ma med dus su/_/sems can thams cad yang dag 'byung /_/rgya mtsho 'khrugs sogs gting gi bar/_/blo 
[\[49b.7\]]gros chen po 'grubs pa yin/_/de las de dag skye bar 'gyur/_/sa yi khams dang yang dag ldan/_/me yis mnyams par nges par bsrubs/_/chu dang rlung gi bye brag go/_/yid kyis de ru rab zhen pa/_/mngal ni bzung zhing blangs pa ste/_/de ni 'khor bar 'khor bar 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]'gyur/_/dga' ba mya ngan ldan pa ste/_/de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/_/so sor skye ba smra ba ste/_/de bzhin chos dag zab mo nyid/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas brjod/_/de nyid 'di rnams mnyam bshad pa/_/sum cu pa ste 
[\[50a.2\]]rnyed par dka'/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las de kho na nyid kyi man ngag sbyor ba bzhi'i cha zhes bya ba ste brtag pa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsgrub/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/_/phyi dang nang du yang 
[\[50a.3\]]dag gnas/_/phyi ru ji ltar gsungs pa lags/_/nang du yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/nyon cig rdo rje nang gi ni/_/ji bzhin sbyin sreg rab bsgrub bya/_/me chen po dag rab tu sbar/_/rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya/_/bza' ba btung ba gang yang rung /_/de ru thams cad 
[\[50a.4\]]sbyin sreg bya/_/sreg rdzas rang bzhin gsungs pa dag_/gzugs phung la sogs lnga po dag_/rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya/_/de dag thams cad sems las byung /_/khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/_/dri chen dri nu lnga po dag_/rnam rtog med par bza' bar bya/_/
[\[50a.5\]]blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so/_/gti mug nga rgyal de bzhin chags/_/zhe sdang de bzhin 'dod chags nyid/_/phrag dog ser sna phra ma dag_/dam tshig de nyid dri ma med/_/ji ltar nyi ma 'bar ba bzhin/_/de ltar dri ma med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar ston gyi zla gsal ba/_/
[\[50a.6\]]de ltar 'di yi dbus gsal yin/_/'dod chags chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/rdo rje snang byed sgron ma bzhin/_/de nyid thar par gsungs pa ste/_/bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/sbyin sreg 'di la rab gnas na/_/lha rnams dga' bas tshim pa yin/_/sbyin sreg las 
[\[50a.7\]]ni rab gsungs nas/_/rab gnas dag ni brjod par bya/_/sngon gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas/_/de nas rab gnas bya ba ste/_/rab gnas sku sogs thang ka dang /_/rnal 'byor can gyis glegs bam ste/_/dpal ldan g.yon gyis dril bu 'dzin/_/g.yas kyis rdo rje yongs su 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gzung /_//don kun rnal 'byor kun gyis ni/_/mdzes par sku gzugs mchod par bya/_/sha dang chang dag rab tu bkang /_/ro yi steng du yang dag gnas/_/par pa Ti kA shaM ku li/_/mchod pa kun gyis dgyes par bya/_/me tog spos dang mar me dang /_/dri nyid dang ni 
[\[50b.2\]]rnam pa bzhi/_/glu dbyangs de bzhin gar dag dang /_/sgrub pos pa Ta ha sogs te/_/sku la sogs pa 'di rnams la/_/rab gnas chen po bya ba yin/_/ya i~M aM hiM ya i aM/_/dze idz+dza i mA a uM/_/mA a uM mA ad+ha m+mu pA/_/pidz+dza i tsit+ta yaM mu/_/tsiN+Tidz+dza 
[\[50b.3\]]ai sa e la/_/sat+t+rAt+thu ki ri dz+dza i/_/glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/_/dbang rnams kun kyang blang ba ste/_/chos rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gzhi/_/mchod pa kun gyi sprin chen mo/_/spro zhing bsdu bar brjod pa'o/_/
[\[50b.4\]]nga yis rab gnas bshad pa ni/_/rgyud gzhan las ni rnyed par dka'/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las sbyin sreg rab gnas kyi brtag pa ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas mdor bsdus rab bshad pa/_/de nyid gtan la dbab pa'i mchog_/rtag tu sems 
[\[50b.5\]]ni rnam rtog med/_/rnam rtog bcas pas ci ltar 'gyur/_/ci ltar me dag rab 'bar ba/_/rtag tu shing rnams tshig par brjod/_/de la tshig pa shing rnams te/_/'di yis tshig par mthong ba yin/_/de yis tshig pa ji bzhin du/_/blo ldan rnam rtog med pa yis/_/
[\[50b.6\]]phung po lnga yi shing rnams te/_/de bzhin gzugs kyi phung po nyid/_/rus pa rkang dang bad kan dang /_/khrag dang khu ba dri chen dag_/mig gnyis de bzhin rna ba dang /_/de bzhin du ni sna nyid dang /_/sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/_/rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang /_/'byung 
[\[50b.7\]]pa lnga po thams cad la/_/de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga dag_/de yi gnas ni bye brag tu/_/nga yis bye brag brjod pa ste/_/lte bar gnas pa'i 'khor lo chos/_/'dab ma drug cu bzhi dang ldan/_/shes rab gnas su rab tu gsungs/_/zla ba'i gzugs bzhin gsal ba ste/_/de 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]yi dbus su gnas pa dag_/me lta bur ni 'bar ba yin/_/me chen de ni 'bar ba ste/_/de yi rtse mo mthong ba ni/_/de yis de ni gzugs mthong yin/_/dngos po thams cad gzugs 'dzin pa/_/blo yi gnas su gsungs shing 
[\[51a.2\]]brjod/_/hU~M yig nga ro tshul 'dzin pa/_/rdo rje can ni rtag tu 'byung /_/rdo rje 'dzin chen gzugs bzhin no/_/rlung gis bskyod pa me yin te/_/de yi dbus su rab tu grags/_/gang zhig ri bong can gzugs gsungs/_/shes rab de nyid mdor bsdus so/_/ji ltar nyi mar 
[\[51a.3\]]rab tu brjod/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur/_/sde tshan brgyad kyi tha ma gzugs/_/thig le dang ni zhabs kyur bcas/_/de nyid nyi ma zhes su gsungs/_/'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/_/de yi dbus su yang dag 'byung /_/rdo rje can gnas mnyam par 'gyur/_/
[\[51a.4\]]ji ltar gnyid kyis gzung ba ni/_/cung zad kyang ni mthong ba med/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i gzung ba dag_/langs na rtag tu mthong ba yin/_/de ru thabs ni bsgom pa yin/_/de yi rang bzhin mchog tu grags/_/sems can thogs med bde chen brjod/_/de ru der 
[\[51a.5\]]gnas dngos po yis/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa gsal/_/de phyir de nyid dngos po yis/_/blo ldan sems kyis de nyid gsungs/_/sems ni rnam par dag pa ste/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam par 'gyur/_/sngags pa gar 'dod 'gro ba yin/_/skad cig 
[\[51a.6\]]gis ni gnas par 'gro/_/'dod chen rnams ni chags par 'gyur/_/drag po rnams la drag po mtshon/_/zhi ba rnams la zhi ba ste/_/'di ni mdun rgyab rgyal ba rim/_/ji ltar 'di ru pad+ma rim/_/'dod chags skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur/_/sna tshogs bag chags skyon 
[\[51a.7\]]mi chags/_/khams gsum po ni de bzhin dag_/stong pa ma yin mi stong min/_/dbu ma nye bar thob pa'o/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor/_/thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid do/_/'di ni byang chub sems rdo rje/_/sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis/_/dngos po 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]med par sgom pa'i dngos/_/de la bsgom par brjod pa min/_/phreng ba med cing bya ba med/_/spungs pa med par brjod pa ste/_/rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni/_/dbu ma'i mchog gi go 'phang ngo /_/bla na med pa'i ye shes ni/_/bla med zhes ni rim pa med/_/'dis 
[\[51b.2\]]ni 'khor ba rnam par grol/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su gsungs/_/de yis rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub/_/skye ba 'di la grub pa ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/_/khrag dang khu ba bza' ba ste/_/dri chen dri chu sha dang 
[\[51b.3\]]lnga/_/de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/_/ba hU bi ha hU~M kA ra ga ti ba hU~M bi ha/_/rU pa d+hA ri Ne ba hU~M bi d+hanA nA rany+dzi ha/_ba hU bi ha br-i t+ya gI tat+ya/_/ba hu bi ha dzi ba san+ta t+ya she/_/ShaHni she Sha sa twa bi na ya bi dig+b+han sa ma ra stu bi shud+d+he haHhaHhaHhaHhoH/_a 
[\[51b.4\]]hai sam+ba re sidz+dz+ha ma hU~M a ho/_/shuM ha hU~M re u pa rU a la la la la hoH/_glu 'di dag ni blangs pa ste/_/brtag pa kun gyi bla na med/_/de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ste 
[\[51b.5\]]brtag pa drug pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/de nyid rnal 'byor thams cad ni/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson de bzhin/_/bsam gtan bzod pa shes rab dang /_/stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni/_/smon lam ye shes yang dag 'byung /_/pha rol 
[\[51b.6\]]phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi/_/sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/_/tshul khrims gsum gyi ngo bo nyid/_/bsam gtan rnam bzhir gsungs pa ste/_/brtson 'grus rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/_/bzod pa rnam pa bcur shes bya/_/shes rab rnam 
[\[51b.7\]]pa drug tu 'gyur/_/stobs ni rnam bcu rab tu gsungs/_/thabs ni rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/_/smon lam gnyis su shes bya ste/_/ye shes rnam lngar gnas pa'o/_/chos dang mi 'jigs rdzas dang byams/_/sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po ni/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]ngar 'dzin med cing khengs pa bral/_/bden pa gnyis med gnas pa ni/_/tshul khrims rnam gsum brjod pa ni/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs/_/gang gis rnal 'byor ma gnyis dang /_/phyi yi rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/_/bsam 
[\[52a.2\]]gtan pha rol phyin pa ni/_/dri chen dri chu de bzhin sha/_/khrag dang khu bar yang dag 'byung /_/'di rnams brtson 'grus lnga po ni/_/dam tshig sgra yis brjod pa'o/_/tshig rtsub [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang ngag 'khyal dang /_/chags sdang zhe sdang phrag dog dang /_/nga rgyal khro dang de bzhin dbyen/_/
[\[52a.3\]]'di bcu rnam par bshad pa ni/_/rdo rje can ni bzod bcas 'gyur/_/yang dag lta ba yang dag rtog_/yang dag ngag dang yang dag las/_/yang dag 'tsho dang yang dag rtsol/_/bdag gis mdo ru bsdus nas ni/_/shes rab rnam pa drug tu brjod/_/dad pa'i stobs 
[\[52a.4\]]dang dran pa'i stobs/_/ting 'dzin stobs dang shes rab stobs/_/lus kyi stobs dang ngag gi stobs/_/ye shes stobs dang smon lam stobs/_/brtson 'grus kyi ni stobs rnams te/_/'di rnams stobs ni bcu pa'o/_/ma skyes pa yi dge ba bskyed/_/skyes pa'i 
[\[52a.5\]]mi dge yang dag spong /_/mi dge ma skyes mi skyed dang /_/dge ba skyes pa 'phel ba ste/_/bzhi po thams cad chos rnams kyi/_/dge ba'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni/_/rdzogs par byed pa nyid dag go/_/smon lam rnam pa gnyis su gnas/_/me long mnyam nyid so sor 
[\[52a.6\]]rtog_/bya grub chos dbyings rnam par dag_/ye shes rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/_/'di rnams bcu bzhi po dag ni/_/pha rol phyin pa mdor bsdus pa/_/bdag gis de nyid brjod pa ste/_/rdor can nyon cig gtan la dbab/_/bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mtha'/_/mgo nas 
[\[52a.7\]]rkang pa'i mthil bar du/_/de yi dbus su nges 'gyur ba/_/lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/_/rtag tu shar bar 'gyur ba ste/_/'di ru rdo rje can gyis mthong /_/lus ngag sems kyi dbus dag tu/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar ba'o/_/steng gi sgo ru rtag gnas pa'o/_/nyi 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ma'i 'od zer phreng ba can/_/cung zad lus las mthong ba med/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo'i gzugs can te/_/de nyid rnal 'byor lam gyis ni/_/rtag pa'i dus su rnam par gnas/_/de la dbyar gyi dus med cing /_/dpyid med ston yang yod ma yin/_/dgun med 
[\[52b.2\]]sos kyang med pa ru/_/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/_/sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod/_/sngags dang rgyud la ji ltar gnas/_/nya dang sha ni bza' bar bya/_/chang gi btung ba mchog yin no/_/bcud kyis len gyi cho ga yis/_/sngags ni brjod par mi bya'o/_/mtshon 
[\[52b.3\]]cha'i gnas la dus rtag tu/_/mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[52b.4\]]rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//_//dpal oT+D+YAn nas nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal po chen po dpal in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhabs kyis 
[\[52b.5\]]bkol cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o/_/bod kyi lots+tsha ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur te/_/slad kyis de nyid kyi tshe paN+Di ta gnyis la yang gtugs te gtan la phab pa//[ {D377}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[52b.6\]]A khyA ta tan+t+rot+ta ra badzra bA h+ya b+hi d+ha nA da bA rA h+ya b+hi bo d+ha naM nA ma/_bod skad du/_phag mo mngon par brjod pa bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las/_phag mo mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas rnal 'byor bshad bya ba/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'o/_/
[\[52b.7\]]phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/phag mo yi ni gtso mo yong /_/rnal 'byor rnams kyi grub ster ma'o/_/rnal 'byor ma lus rnams kyi yang /_/snying po rnal 'byor btus pa'o/_/sgrub pa po la phan don phyir/_/bla ma'i rgyud pa gsal ba'o/_/phyi rol rnam 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]rtog med pa dang /_/kun tu dam tshig chos nyid dang /_/spyod dang dogs pa med pa dang /_/kun tu ser sna rnams spangs te/_/tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar med/_/bsnyen gnas cho ga gcor med de/_/dag dang mi dag gtsang yang med/_/chu yi gtsang 
[\[53a.2\]]sbra bya ba med/_/dus dang tshes las rnam par grol/_/gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/_/rang rgyud sngags dang rnal 'byor shes/_/sems can kun gyi don brtson pas/_/ri sul tshang tshing phug rnams dang /_/chu bo'i 'gram dang 'dus pa dang /_/rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[53a.3\]]'gram dag dang /_/shing gcig sa dang khang stong dang /_/ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dang /_/skyed mos tshal mchog sna tshogs dang /_/lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas/_/khyim mam yang ni bzhi mdo ru/_/'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba'i/_/sgrub pa po yis bsgrub 
[\[53a.4\]]par bya/_/gnas ni bstan par byas pa'am/_/gang du yid ni dga' ba ru/_/sdom pa sna tshogs bsrung 'dod pa'i/_/der ni dngos grub yang dag 'grub/_/gdul bya'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bsgom pa'i dbye ba mang po'o/_/ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi yis/_/
[\[53a.5\]]sa gzhi byug pa bya ba dang /_/bzod pa'i pha rol phyin nan tan/_/me tog gcal du dgram par bya/_/sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gdan dag la/_/gtong bar shin tu mnyam par gzhag_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin dmigs te/_/sems ni rtse gcig pa yis su/_/tshangs 
[\[53a.6\]]pa'i gnas ni bzhi po dang /_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag dang /_/sems can kun la bde 'byung ba'i/_/dge ba bcu ni dmigs par bya'o/_/chos rnams stong pa nyid du ni/_/phyi nang bdag nyid mthong bya ste/_/de nas sems tsam du gnas te/_/byang chub kyi ni tshogs 
[\[53a.7\]]mchog go/_/snying gi mkha' dbyings pad dbus gnas/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni/_/mchog gi de nyid der mthong ste/_/'od zer sna tshogs rang bzhin bzang /_/kun tu rnam par spros pa las/_/sngar grub rnams ni yang dag 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bskul/_/nam mkha'i khams ni nyams dga' bar/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba ste/_/byin gyis brlab pa dag kyang byed/_/til gyi gang bu bzhin mthong ste/_/khro bo lha mo thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/bla ma byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[53b.2\]]dag_/mchod dang mchod pa byed pa'i bdag_/lha mo rnam pa dgu mthong ste/_/sangs rgyas tshogs kyi sprul pa spro/_/khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma/_/'gro ba rigs drug sems can yang /_/de ni sangs rgyas nyid du gzhag_/nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba'i dbus/_/
[\[53b.3\]]de nyid du ni zhugs mthong ste/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/_/thams cad du ni skyabs su mchi/_/sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas go 'phang la gzhag bya/_/sgrub pos de la gsol ba gdab/_/rtag tu skyabs su gsol bar bya/_/phung po lnga la nga 
[\[53b.4\]]rgyal ni/_/sems bzang po ni bskyed par bya/_/gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang /_/'du byed rnam par shes nyid kyang /_/bru~M a~M hrIHhoHhU~M zhes pa/_/rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang /_/de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang /_/rdo rje rgyal po zhes grags dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje 
[\[53b.5\]]sems dpa' mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid/_/dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka/_/mig dang rna ba sna dag dang /_/lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid/_/oM hU~M trA~M AHkha~M hU~M/_gti mug zhe sdang phrag dog dang /_/'dod chags ser sna nyid kyang ngo /_/skye mched kun 
[\[53b.6\]]la rdo rje dbang /_/sa dang chu dang me dang ni/_/rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/_/lA~M bA~M pA~M tA~M khA~M zhes pas/_/ltung bar byed dang gsod pa dang /_/'gugs par byed dang gar byed nyid/_/pad+ma'i dra ba lha mo ni/_/nam mkha' dang mnyam lta bu'o/_/de ltar phung po khams dang skye 
[\[53b.7\]]mched rnams la rnal 'byor pa tha mal pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'o/_/zhes rnam par dag pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gsum la skyabs su gsol te/_/sngags kyi lus su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]nyid he ru kar bsgoms te/_/sems can kun gyi don kyang byed/_/he ru ka yi gnas thob par/_/bla na med pa'i go 'phang la/_/sems can thams cad gzhag par bya/_/o~M swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsarbad+hAr+m+mA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85 haM/_zhes lan gsum brjod 
[\[54a.2\]]do/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng lta bu'i/_/dngos po kun brtse phyogs bcu ru/_/'od zer de las ra ba dang /_/de bzhin du ni dra bar blta/_/rdo rje sa gzhi byin gyis brlab/_/bla re mda' yi ra ba dang /_/rdo rje me 'bar dra ba ni/_/de yi phyi rol ring du bsam/_/o~M me di nI badzrI b+ha ba 
[\[54a.3\]]badzra ban d+ha hU~M/_o~M badzra prA kA ra hU~M baM hU~M/_o~M badzra pany+dza ra hU~M baM hU~M/_o~M badzra bi tA na hU~M khaM hU~M/_o~M sha ra dzA la traM saM traM/_o~M badzra dz+wa la a na lA rka hU~M hU~M hU~M/_mdzub mo mthe bong dag sbyar te/_/se gol gtogs te phyogs bcur yang /_/o~M suM b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT shar du'o/_/
[\[54a.4\]]o~M grih+Na grih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT byad du'o/_/o~M grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT nub tu'o/_/o~M A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badzra hU~M hU~M phaT lho ru'o/_/sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bgegs thams cad kyi mgo la phur bu btab ste/_g.yas skor dang g.yon pa bskor ba ma yin pa'o/_/oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya 
[\[54a.5\]]g+hA ta ya/_sarba du Sh+TA na big+h+nAM hU~M phaT/_kI li kI la ya/_sar+b+ba pA paM hU~M hU~M hU~M/_badzra kI la ya badzra d+hA ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/_sar+b+ba duSh+TAn big+h+nAM kA ya ba ka tsit+taM badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/_brdung bar bya ste/_rdo rje phur pa la khro bo'i lta bas bltas nas/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ma yin pas 
[\[54a.6\]]rdo rjes sgrub pa bos brdungs te/_o~M badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI lA ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/_bdud med bdud kyi las kyang med/_/rang gi sems kyis bcings pa bzhin/_/gang gis rang gi sems 'dul na/_/gang las bdud ni gnas par 'gyur/_/stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yang /_/mnyam 
[\[54a.7\]]gzhag dang bas dran par bya/_/oM ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_o~M a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_mig yor tsam gyi ye shes ni/_/sems tsam rnam par brtag par bya/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]chos 'di dag_/chos can med cing chos nyid med/_/nam mkha' lta bur gos pa med/_/dngos po med cing rtog pa med/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid phan bya'i phyir/_/smon lam dbang gis dmigs bya ste/_/ji srid sa yi 'og dmigs pa/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam 
[\[54b.2\]]par bya/_/yaM gi yi ge las byung ba/_/gzhu 'dra kha dog sngo dang ldan/_/rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan bsam bya ste/_/du ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'o/_/de yi steng du raM las ni/_/me yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/_/zur gsum po la kha dog dmar/_/'bar ba'i 
[\[54b.3\]]phreng ba 'khrug cing dmar/_/nyi ma bye ba lta bur gnas/_/rdo rjes mtshan pa bsam par bya/_/de yi steng du chu nyid kyang /_/baM las bum pa mchog tu gyur/_/zlum zhing 'od zer phreng bar ldan/_/kha ba lta bu nyid kyang ngo /_/de yi steng du bsam bya ba/_/laM las byung ba 
[\[54b.4\]]ser por ldan/_/gru bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan/_/'od zer ser po'i tshogs 'khrugs pa'o/_/de steng rnal 'byor pa bsgoms pa/_/ri yi rgyal po ri rab mchog_/zur bzhi rin chen bzhi rang bzhin/_/rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_//suM las byung ba bzang 
[\[54b.5\]]po'o/_/'od zer bzang po mchog gi mchog_/de yi steng du bsgom bya ba/_/bruM las byung ba brtag pa ste/_/de yongs gyur las 'khor lo mchog_/gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/_/dra 
[\[54b.6\]]ba dra ba phyed pas spras/_/dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan/_/grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang /_/sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje rin po che yis spras/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ba/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/_/sna tshogs kha dog mchog gi mchog_/
[\[54b.7\]]lte ba dang ni ge sar bcas/_/thams cad dag pa nyid kyi gdan/_/de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha/_/gsal ba'i rang bzhin dri ma med/_/de steng a li kA li ni/_/dbus su baM gis brgyan pa'o/_/de yi dbus bzhengs gtso mo ni/_/phag mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/_/zhal 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis te/_/spyan gsum shin tu chags pa'o/_/gdan la phyed skyil gyis bzhugs te/_/shin tu mdzes pas gar byed pa'o/_/phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/_/phyed ni dbus ma dbang phyug zhal/_/dkar dang dmar dang 'di 
[\[55a.2\]]'dra'i gzugs/_/thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan mdzes/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bsnams/_/pad+ma bskor cing 'khor bar ldan/_/dpral bar phyag rgya 'bar ba dang /_/mi yi pags pa'i bla gos dang /_/thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing /_/zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa gzhag/_/cang 
[\[55a.3\]]te'u gri gug mgo bo yang /_/zhal bzhi pa ni tshangs pa yi/_/sngo dang ser dang ljang gu yi/_/bzang po'i zhal gyis nye bar mdzes/_/zhal ni mche ba gtsigs pa ste/_/zla ba phyed pas steng du brgyan/_/sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan mtshan/_/dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed/_/
[\[55a.4\]]lha mo phyag rgya drug gis brgyan/_/dum bu brgyad pas ska rags ni/_/ska rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa/_/rkang pa'i gdub kyis nye bar mdzes/_/dpung rgyan mdzes par byed pa dang /_/dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang /_/phyag rgya rdo rjes mtshan pas so/_/shin tu gzugs 
[\[55a.5\]]bzang yid du 'ong /_/shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/_/seng gdong ma ste 'jigs par byed/_/byang gi phyogs su phag gdong ma/_/lha mo la ma 'jigs byed ma/_/nub tu lha mo glang po'i gdong /_/dum skyes ma ste drag mo'o/_/lho ru lha mo gzugs can ma/_/rta yi gdong 
[\[55a.6\]]pa lhag pa'i gzugs/_/spyan gsum sna tshogs gzugs can ma'o/_/thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing /_/mgo bo gri gug 'dzin pa can/_/gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste/_/gar byed pa yis shin tu mdzes/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gdan la phyed skyil gyis/_/drag cing gtum pa 'jigs 
[\[55a.7\]]ba'o/_/'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan ma/_/lha mo'i zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan/_/me la sogs pa mtshams bzhi ru/_/byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod/_/bum pa'i steng du rnam par dgod/_/dung dang kun da zla 'dra ba'i/_/byang shar la sogs phyogs 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]bzhi ru/_/rtsibs drug pa yi 'khor lo bri/_/'khor lo'i dbus su bri bya ba/_/rigs kyi lha mo bzhi po ni/_/lha mo mA ma kI dang spyan/_/sgron ma gos dkar mo dag ste/_/sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba ste/_/lha mo rdo rje rigs dbang phyug/_/dkar dang sngo dang 
[\[55b.2\]]dmar ba yi/_/lha mo rtag pa'i rigs yin no/_/ljang gu dkar dang dmar ba yi/_/lha mo las kyi rigs yin no/_/dmar dang ser dang ljang gu yi/_/lha mo pad+ma'i rigs las byung /_/spyan gsum skra ni grol ba yin/_/phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa yin/_/
[\[55b.3\]]rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/_/phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/_/thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing /_/rang gi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rgya gram dang /_/pad+ma dmar po mchog gi mchog_/de bzhin thams cad dril bu 'dzin/_/pad+ma skor ba 
[\[55b.4\]]byed pa'o/_/bdud bzhi po ni zhabs kyis mnan/_/gar dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal/_/sna tshogs pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs/_/rigs kyi dngos grub rang bzhin byed/_/mgo dang cang te'u phyag na bsnams/_/rdo rje gri gug gis kyang mdzes/_/thod pa'i phreng 
[\[55b.5\]]ba'i dbu rgyan can/_/mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o/_/mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du/_/gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa dgod/_/shar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug la/_/lha mo ji ltar rjes mthun dgod/_/'khor lo'i rtsibs drug dang po la/_/pU l+lir ma la yar 
[\[55b.6\]]rab tu gtum ma'o/_/rtsibs gnyis pa la dza lan da rar/_/gtum pa'i mig can no/_/gsum pa la o Di yan du 'od ldan ma'o/_/bzhi pa ar bu dar sna chen mo'o/_/lnga pa go da ba rir brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/_/drug pa rA me shwa rar mi thung ma'o/_/gnyis pa byang 
[\[55b.7\]]gi 'khor lo rtsibs drug la/_dang po de bi ko Tar laM ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/_/gnyis pa mA la yar shing grib ma'o/_/gsum pa ka ma rU par sa srung ma'o/_/bzhi pa o Der 'jigs byed chen mo'o/_/lnga pa tri sha ku ni ra rlung gi shugs can ma'o/_/drug pa ko 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]sa lar chang 'thud ma'o/_/gsum pa nub kyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug gi shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang po la ka liM kar ljang lha mo'o/_/gnyis pa lam ba kar shin tu bzang mo'o/_/gsum pa kany+tsi kAr rta rna ma'o/_/bzhi pa kha ba can du bya gdong ma'o/_/lnga 
[\[56a.2\]]pa pre ta pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/_/drug pa gr-i ha de pa tAr dum skyes ma'o/_/bzhi pa lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi shar du sau rASh+Tar chang 'tshong ma'o/_/gnyis pa gser gyi gling du 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/_/gsum pa nA ga rang shin tu dpa' mo'o/_/bzhi pa sin 
[\[56a.3\]]d+hur stobs chen ma'o/_/lnga pa ma rur 'khor los sgyur ma'o/_/drug pa ku lu tAr brtson 'grus chen mo'o/_/dang po dkar ljang thod pa dang /_/kha T+wAM ga dang 'khor lo dang /_/cang te'u dang gri gug go/_/gnyis pa byang du ljang ser/_rdo rje dang /_thod pa dang /_kha T+wAM 
[\[56a.4\]]ga dang /_cang te'u dang /_/gri gug go/_/gsum pa nub tu dmar ser thod pa dang /_kha T+wAM ga dang /_pad+ma dang /_cang te'u dang /_gri gug go/_/bzhi pa lho'i lha mo ser dmar sna tshogs rdo rje dang /_cang te'u dang /_gri gug dang /_thod pa dang /_kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/_/
[\[56a.5\]]lha mo thams cad bud med phyed dbang phyug spyan gsum pa/_phyag bzhi pa/_gcer bu/_skra grol ba/_phyed skyil gyi gar gyi zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdan gyi steng na/_thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/_phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/_rkang gdub dang ska rags 
[\[56a.6\]]dang /_dbu rgyan rnams rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/_/de nas 'khor lo phyir bskor te/_rdo rje'i phreng ba shar du'o/_/'khor lo'i phreng ba byang du'o/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba nub tu'o/_/pad+ma'i phreng ba lho ru'o/_/dbus su rdo rje ra bas mdzes/_/mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad 
[\[56a.7\]]du/_/sna tshogs rdo rje yang dag bri/_/blo ldan de yi phyi rol bskor/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phreng ba sna tshogs ldan/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo rnams dang /_/mtshams kyi cha ni bzhi rnams su/_/mkha' 'gro drag po'i gzugs can no/_/de la mnyam par gzhag pas dgod/_/
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]khwa gdong ma ni shar du dgod/_/kha dog sngon mo yid 'phrog ma'o/_/'ug gdong ma ni byang gi sgor/_/dmar zhing ljang la mdzes pa'o/_/khyi gdong ma ni nub kyi sgor/_/drag cing ser mo du ba 'dra/_/lho yi ngos su phag gdong ma/_/ljang zhing sngo ba'i gzugs can ma'o/_/
[\[56b.2\]]spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa'o/_/phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog_/'bru tshugs lta zhing [(]bod [,]pod [)]thung ma/_/g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/_/sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus gnas/_/phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/_/thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/_/
[\[56b.3\]]dbu skra grol zhing rnam par brtags/_/gshin rje brtan ma ma he'i gdong /_/me yi phyogs su bzhugs pa'o/_/gshin rje pho nya bong bu'i gdong /_/bden bral gyi ni phyogs su bzhugs/_/gshin rje'i mche ba rnga mo'i gdong /_/rlung du rten cing drag por ldan/_/
[\[56b.4\]]gshin rje'i 'joms ma rta yi gdong /_/dbang ldan rten cing rnam par 'khor/_/thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/_/sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog ma/_/gcer bu skra ni grol ba dang /_/phyed skyil gyi ni gar dang ldan/_/mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/_/spyan 
[\[56b.5\]]gsum zhal ni g.yo ba ste/_/sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus gnas/_/'dod pa drag pos brtags pa'o/_/'khor gyi lha mo dkyil 'khor rnams/_/thams cad [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]steng du bzhugs/_/thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing /_/gri gug mgo bo 'dzin par byed/_/lag pa g.yon 
[\[56b.6\]]na rnga chung ni/_/rdung bar byed cing shin tu 'jigs/_/phyi rol bskor ba'i rnam pa ni/_/gzhan yang rnam pa mang por 'gyur/_/glu dang gar gyi yo byad dang /_/sna tshogs dam tshig mchog rnams dang /_/spos dang me tog mar me sogs/_/dri dang phreng ba byug pa dang /_/lha 
[\[56b.7\]]yi na bza' gzhal yas khang /_/lha yi rol mo mchog gi rnams/_/kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis/_/phyi yi rnal 'byor mas mchod byed/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog_/nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang las/_/rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog_/phag mo 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]mngon par 'byung ba'i mchog_/gsang ba chen mo'i mchog 'di ni/_/cung zad smra bar mi bya ste/_/phyi rol [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phreng ba dang /_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom par bya/_/'di ltar dgod par bya ba yi/_/ji ltar 'khor lo de rnams dgod/_/
[\[57a.2\]]sen mo dang so dag la ni rab tu gtum ma'o/_/skra dang ba spu dag la gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/_/pags pa dang dri ma dag la 'od ldan ma'o/_/sha la sna chen ma'o/_/rtsa rgyus la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/_/rus pa la mi'u thung ma'o/_/mkhal ma la lang ka'i 
[\[57a.3\]]dbang phyug ma'o/_/snying la ni shing grib ma'o/_/mig la sa srung ma'o/_/mkhris pa la 'jigs byed chen mo'o/_/glo ba la rlung gi shugs can ma'o/_/rgyu ma la chang 'thung ma'o/_/gnye ma la ljang lha mo'o/_/lte ba la ni shin tu bzang mo'o/_/rkang pa la rta rna ma'o/_/
[\[57a.4\]]mdoms su bya gdong ma'o/_/bad kan la 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/_/rnag la dum skyes ma'o/_/khrag la chang 'tshong ma'o/_/rdul la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/_/tshil la shin tu dpa' mo'o/_/mchin pa la shin tu stobs can ma'o/_/mchil ma la 'khor 
[\[57a.5\]]los sgyur ma'o/_/snabs la brtson 'grus chen mo'o/_/pu l+lI ra ma la ya ste mgo la rab tu gtum ma'o/_/dzA lan d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug la gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/_/o Di yan te rna ba g.yas pa 'od ldan ma'o/_/ar bud ste ltag par sna chen ma'o/_/go dA pa 
[\[57a.6\]]ri ste rna ba g.yon pa la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/_/rA me shwa ra ste smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o/_/de bi ko T+Ta ste mig gnyis la lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/_/mA la wA ste phrag pa gnyis la shing grib ma'o/_/kA ma rU pa ste mchan khung gnyis su sa srung ma'o/_/o Di 
[\[57a.7\]]ste nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo'o/_/tri sha ku ni ste lte ba la rlung gi shugs can ma'o/_/ko sa la ste rna rtser chang 'thung ma'o/_/ka ling+ka ste kha la ljang lha mo'o/_/lam pa ka ste mgrin par shin tu bzang ma'o/_/kAny+tsi ste snying gar rta rna ma'o/_/hi ma la ya ste mdoms 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]su bya gdong ma'o/_/pre ta pu ri ste gsang bar 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/_/gr-i ha de ba tA ste bshad lam dum skyes ma'o/_/sau rASh+Ta ste brla gnyis la chang 'tshong ma'o/_/su war+Na dwI pa ste rje ngar gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/_/na ga ra ste sor mo rnams la 
[\[57b.2\]]shin tu dpa' mo'o/_/sin+d+hu ste rkang pa'i bol la stobs chen mo'o/_/ma ru ste mthe bong gnyis la 'khor los sgyur ma'o/_/ku lu tA ste pus mo gnyis la brtson 'grus chen mo'o/_/sa'i khams ni ltung bar byed ma'o/_/chu'i khams ni gsod par byed ma'o/_/me'i 
[\[57b.3\]]khams ni 'gugs par byed ma'o/_/rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/_/nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma'i dra ba can no/_/gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/_/tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/_/'du shes kyi phung po la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/_/
[\[57b.4\]]'du byed kyi phung po la rdo rje rgyal po'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la dpal he ru ka'o/_/mig gnyis la gti mug rdo rje'o/_/rna ba gnyis la zhe sdang rdo rje'o/_/sna gnyis la phrag dog rdo rje'o/_/kha la 
[\[57b.5\]]'dod chags rdo rje'o/_/reg la ser sna rdo rje'o/_/skye mched thams cad la dbang phyug rdo rje'o/_/thugs la rdo rje mi bskyod pa/_/kha la rdo rje 'od dpag med/_/sku la rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/_/oM baM lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o/_/haM yoM snying gar ya mi nI'o/_/hrIM moM kha la rmongs 
[\[57b.6\]]byed ma'o/_/hriM hriM mgo bo la skyod byed ma'o/_/hU~M hU~M spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o/_/phaT phaT yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha ma ste gtum byed ma'o/_/de ltar rab tu dgod byas te/_/ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/_/de yi rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/_/dngos po 
[\[57b.7\]]kun gyi ngo bo 'dis/_/mdzub mo mdud bya gung mo nges par sbyar/_/mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab sbyar ste/_/de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab sbyar nas/_/bskor zhing bskor zhing kun tu bskor bar bya/_/rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta/_/gyen du phaiM gyi sgra sgrogs pas/_/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs/_/dzaHhU~M baM hoH/_rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa dang /_gzhug pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_dbang du bya ba'o/_/dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams 
[\[58a.2\]]kyis/_nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su gang bar bltas te/_bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i bum pas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i tshul gyis de dag la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o/_/ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba'i/_/
[\[58a.3\]]lha yi chu 'di dag pa yis/_/de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/_/oM sarba ta tha ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shrI hU~M AHhU~M/_rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a las byung ba'i thod par ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba cha bcu drug dang /_hU~M ba~M dang /_oM gyis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[58a.4\]]te yi ge gsum du gyur par bsam la 'khor lo gsum bsgom par bya'o/_/oM sa ma ya shud d+hAHsarba d+har+m+mAHsa ma ya shud d+ho\u0f85 ha~M/_chos thams cad kun tu ro gcig pas gnas par sems kyis bya'o/_/ye shes bdud rtsi sbyin pa yis/_/ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu btung 
[\[58a.5\]]ngo /_/oM a mr-i ta u da ka hU~M hU~M Tha Tha le hu~M/_A khaM hU~M phaT swA hA/_ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/'khor lo'i tshogs mchog spro bar bya/_/rus pa chen po'i phreng ba yis/_/phyis ni bzlas pa de gnas bya/_/srog dang rtsol ba rab bsdams te/_/bsams na 
[\[58a.6\]]skad cig gis 'char ro/_/dbang bskur mchod dang dam tshig ni/_/ro gcig byas te bsgoms pa yis/_/de snying ye shes sems dpa' dang /_/mchod pa ye shes bdud rtsi yis/_/lus dang ngag yid dam tshig ni/_/sems ni bsam med shin tu brtag_/bzlas 
[\[58a.7\]]dang bsgom pa yang dag ldan/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_/dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa 'dis/_/gsang sngags rgyal po'i mchog bzlas so/_/oM bai ro tsa nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM dang ming ni yang dag ldan/_/hU~M 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]hU~M phaT dang yang dag ldan/_/rab tu gtum sogs de sngags sogs/_/bzlas pa'i mchog la sbyar bar bya/_/oM badzra bA rA hi pro taM ge pro taM ge pro taM ge_/ha na ha prA NAM kiM ki Ni khiM khi Ni d+hu na d+hu na/_badzra ha ste sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/_badzra kha T+wAM ga ka pa la d+hA ri Ni/_ma hA 
[\[58b.2\]]bi shi ta mAM sA sha ni/_ma nu ShAn+t+ra/_phra br-it+te san+ni d+h+ya na ra shi ro mA lA graM thi ta d+hA ri Ni suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/_ha na ha na/_prA NAM sar+b+ba pA pa/_sa twA nAM sar+b+ba pa shUnAM ma hA mAM sa ts+tshe da ni/_kro d+ha mUr te daM Sh+TA ka rA li ni/_ma hA mu dre shrIHhe ru ka de ba s+yA gra ma hi Shi sa ha sra shi re sa ha sra/_bA ha 
[\[58b.3\]]be sha ta sa ha srA na ne dz+wa li ta te dza se dz+wA la mu khi piM ga la lo tsa ni/_/badzra sha rI re/_badzra A sa ni mi li mi li/_ti mi li ti mi li/_he he/_ha ha/_hU~M hU~M/_kha kha/_d+hu d+hu/_ru ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_/mu ru mu ru/_a dwai te ma ha yo gi nI pa Tha ta sid+d+he draiM d+haM draiM d+haM graM graM he he ha ha/_b+hI me 
[\[58b.4\]]ha sa ha sa bI re hA hA hoHhoH/_hU~M hU~M trai lokya bi nA sha ni sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti ta thA ga ta pa ri wA ri te hU~M hU~M phaT/_siM ha rU pe khaHga dza rU pe gaHtrai lokya u da re ma hA sa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra sa hU~M hU~M phaT/_bI rA dwai te/_hU~M hU~M haHhaH/_ma hA pa shu mo ha ni ma hA yo gI shwa rI twaM/_DA ki 
[\[58b.5\]]nI sar+b+ga lo kA nAM ban d+hA ni sad+yaHpra t+ya ya kA ri Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_b+hu ta trA sa ni ma hA bI re pa ra ma sid d+he yo gI shwa ri phaT/_hU~M hU~M phaT hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_de ltar rdo rje phag mo'i mchog tu grub pa'i snying po dam pa'o/_/oM na mo b+ha ga wa te badzra bA rA hi baM hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M na ma Ar+yA pa rA dzi te trai 
[\[58b.6\]]lokya mA te ma hA bid+ye shwa ri hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM na maHsarba b+hu ta b+ha ya ba he ma hA badzre hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM na mo badzrAs ni a dzi ti a pa rA dzi te ba sh+yaM ka ri ne tra b+h+ra ma Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM na maHsho Sha Ni ro Sha Ni kro d+he kA rA le hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M na ma s+t+rA sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni pa rA dza ye hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM 
[\[58b.7\]]na mo dza ye bi dza ye dzam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ni mo ha ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM na mo badzra bA rA hi ma ha yo gi ni ka me shwa ri kha ge hU~M hU~M phaT/_sngags 'di thams cad du byas te/_A li kA li rdo rje phag mo'i bdag nyid kyi dngos por bya ste/_rkang pa brgyad pa cho ga'i bdag nyid kyis mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni/_/zhi ba'i btung ba btung ba'i mchog_/chos rnams mnyam nyid dam tshig mchog_/sum cu rtsa bdun gnas kyi mchog_/de 'og rnam par dag pa bsgom/_/lus rjes su dran pa mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/tshor ba rjes su dran pa 
[\[59a.2\]]lA mA'o/_/chos rjes su dran pa khaN+Da ro hA'o/_/sems rjes su dran pa rU pi nI'o/_/'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/_/dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/_/sems kyi rdzu 'phrul 
[\[59a.3\]]bskyed pa ni sna chen ma'o/_/dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o/_/dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o/_/shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srung ma'o/_/dad pa'i 
[\[59a.4\]]stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o/_/dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni ljang lha mo'o/_/shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna 
[\[59a.5\]]ma'o/_/brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o/_/dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/_/shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o/_/chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub 
[\[59a.6\]]kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o/_/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/_/btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los sgyur ma'o/_/yang dag 
[\[59a.7\]]pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o/_/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khwa gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o/_/yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'o/_/yang dag pa'i ting 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'o/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed par byed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o/_/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams rjes su gnas pa dang srung bar byed pa ni gshin rje'i pho nya ma'o/_/mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong bar byed 
[\[59b.2\]]pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o/_/mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar byed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o/_/chos bdag med pa'i lam gnas su/_/dkyil 'khor dam par bzhugs pa ni/_/shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor pa gnas bya/_/snang 
[\[59b.3\]]ba med pa'i gnas la gnas/_/snang ba med la yang dag brten/_/spyod pa med pa'i chos rnams la/_/chos can med cing chos nyid med/_/rten 'brel mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos/_/dngos med mtshan ma med pa'o/_/'di ni de nyid go 'phang gnas/_/ye shes dag gi mig 
[\[59b.4\]]gis mthong /_/phra rab rdul bral dang mnyam pa/_/'khor lo'i gnas mthong shin tu nges/_/skra rtse stong phrag brgya yis ni/_/cha dang cha ru yongs su brtag_/he ru ka dang rnal 'byor ma/_/lhan cig b+ha ga'i gnas mthong ba/_/'khor los sgyur ba rab brtson pas/_/khwa 
[\[59b.5\]]gdong ma ni phyi rol dgod/_/he ru ka sogs bdag po khyod/_/mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor/_/phan tshun du ni bdag po byed/_/rdo rje sems sogs sbyor bar ldan/_/phyi rol dur khrod drag po dang /_/kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mchog_/shing mchog sna tshogs 
[\[59b.6\]]mdzes pa dang /_/khyi dang ce spyang 'jigs pa dang /_/khwa dang 'ug pa bya gar rgod/_/ce spyang de bzhin ro bsregs pa/_/keng rus gsal shing gis phug dang /_/'gegs nas 'phyang dang phyed bsregs dang /_/thod pa skam po pus mo dang /_/mgo med lag na thod pa dkar/_/rnam 
[\[59b.7\]]pa sna tshogs sbrul gyis mdzes/_/drag po'i sbrul dang de bzhin rnga/_/seng ge phag dang stag dang ni/_/de bzhin ra dang lug dag dang /_/glang po rta dang bong bu dang /_/rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog_/rnam pa sna tshogs chang dang ni/_/'bru chang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis/_/dpal 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]bo bzang po 'dus pa dang /_/sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang /_/thod pa kha T+wAM ga dag dang /_/gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams 'dzin/_/sna tshogs rol mo bzang po dang /_/bza' ba'i ro mchog longs spyod dang /_/sna tshogs 'o dang 'khyud pa dang /_/bca' dang 
[\[60a.2\]]bldag pa'i mchog rnams kyis/_/rnam pa de ltar dur khrod ni/_/gnod sbyin ro langs srin po rnams/_/he ru ka yi nga rgyal gyis/_/de la gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/cang te'u rdo rje dril bu dang /_/gar dang rol mo byed pa dang /_/phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgyar ldan/_/hU~M hU~M phaT ki li ki la 
[\[60a.3\]]bya/_/g.yas brkyang pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/dam tshig kha ru bcug nas ni/_/sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya/_/o~M A ra li ho/_/badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho/_/de skad gsum dang bzhi dang lnga brjod par bya'o/_/g.yas skor dang g.yon 
[\[60a.4\]]skor gyis kyang thod pa'i nang gi sbyin par bya ba rnams/_/rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye la sngags 'di brjod do/_/oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa sarba b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsa un mA da a pasmA ra DA ka DA kin+yA da ya i maM ba liM gr-ih+NaM tu/_sa ma ya rak+Shan tu ma ma sar+b+ba sid d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan tu/_ya thai 
[\[60a.5\]]baM ya theSh+TaM b+huny+dza thA/_pi ba tha dzig+h+ra tha mA ti kra ma thA/_ma ma sar+b+ba r+t+tA ya sat+su khaM/_bi shud d+ha ya sa hA yi ka b+ha ban+tu hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_/de ltar cho ga dang cho gas thun mtshams bzhir sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gsang ba'i gsang chen 'di gsungs 
[\[60a.6\]]pa/_dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid chos/_/nam mkha' lta bu dri ma med/_/stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis/_/stong pa shin tu rnam par bsgom/_/legs so zhes ni bya ba byin/_/rgyud rdzogs pa yi sbyor ba las/_/legs so legs so ye shes che/_/bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las phag mo mngon 
[\[60a.7\]]par byang chub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA nA ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]{D378}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_DA ki nI sarba tsit+ta a dwa ya a tsit+ta dz+nyA na badzra bA rA hi a b+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 
[\[60b.2\]]zhes bya ba/_mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /_gti mug 
[\[60b.3\]]'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /_nga rgyal 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /_/'dod chags 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /_phrag dog 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /_yum sangs rgyas spyan dang /_yum mA ma kI dang /_yum gos dkar mo dang /_yum dam tshig sgrol ma dang /_yum kun tu 
[\[60b.4\]]bzang mo dang /_de rnams kyi b+ha ga la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang /_khros ma nag mo dang /_bde chen dkar mo dang /_ser mo don grub ma dang /_dmar mo sgra sgrog 
[\[60b.5\]]ma dang /_sna tshogs mthar phyin ma dang /_las kyi gtso mo la sogs pa'i ye shes dang /_las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /_gzhan yang badzra DA ki nI dang /_rat+na DA ki nI dang /_pad+ma DA ki nI dang /_/karma DA ki nI dang /_sa ma ya DA ki nI dang /_bi shwa 
[\[60b.6\]]DA ki nI dang /_sarba DA ki nI dang /_lo ka DA ki nI la sogs te dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mes po tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /_gzhan yang 
[\[60b.7\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi po rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_phyogs skyong ba bcu dang /_lha ma srin sde brgyad dang /_'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/_/yang de'i tshe na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba rang gi stan las langs nas 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye kye mgon po bdag la gson/_/khyed kyi 'khor du 'dus pa yi/_/skal dang ldan pa 'di rnams la/_/lam log mu stegs ma lags pa'i/_/dman pa nyan thos ma lags pa'i/_/
[\[61a.2\]]ma smin mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos cig zhu/_/phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog_/bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog_/bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/bar chod sel ba brda yi mchog_/bsam 
[\[61a.3\]]gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog_/bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i mchog_/ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan te/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga/_/bsam 
[\[61a.4\]]gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba las/_gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas mgon po des spyan phyogs mtshams kun la gzigs nas zhal 
[\[61a.5\]]rdo rje'i mgur 'dzum pa mdzad nas bka' stsal pa ni/_e ma ho/_nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/dus 'dir tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/_/mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud bshad kyis/_/kha sbub zhabs rdol dri ma can/_/snod skyon gsum po spang byas la/_/rtse gcig sems 
[\[61a.6\]]kyis mnyan par gyis/_/phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba de/_/gnyug ma'i sems kyis blta bar gyis/_/dmigs gtad med pa'i sgom pa ni/_/gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsgom par bya/_/dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog_/gnyug ma'i yid kyis spyad par bya/_/bar chod sel 
[\[61a.7\]]ba brda yi chos/_/gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsal bar bya/_/smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog_/gnyug ma'i sems kyis bskur bar bya/_/tshe gcig 'bras bu sangs rgyas de/_/gnyug ma'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan de/_/ma bcos sems 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]kyis bsgrub par bya/_/rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga/_/ma bcos sems kyis gcad par bya/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa las phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las ston pas zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste 
[\[61b.2\]]gnyis pa'o//_//de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/_/tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas/_/dang po gdeng chen lta ba gces/_/des na lta ba dang por bstan/_/phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog_/nam mkha' lta bu shes par gyis/_/thams cad 'degs pa lta 
[\[61b.3\]]ba'i mchog_/sa gzhi lta bur shes par gyis/_/thams cad sdud pa lta ba'i mchog_/'byung ba chu ltar shes par gyis/_/nyon mongs sreg pa lta ba'i mchog_/'byung ba me ltar shes par gyis/_/ngos gzung med pa lta ba'i mchog_/'byung ba rlung ltar shes par gyis/_/
[\[61b.4\]]de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/_'pho 'gyur med pa lta ba'i mchog_/ri bo lta bur shes par gyis/_/g.yo 'gul med pa lta ba'i mchog_/rgya mtsho lta bur shes par bya/_/gsal la ma 'dres lta ba'i mchog_/'ja' tshon lta bur shes par gyis/_/gnyis su med pa 
[\[61b.5\]]lta ba'i mchog_/ga bur lta bur shes par bya/_/de nas yang gsang bas tshig 'di gsungs te/_zil gyis gnon pa lta ba'i mchog_/seng ge lta bur shes par bya/_/nyam nga med pa lta ba'i mchog_/glang chen lta bur shes par bya/_/stobs dang ldan pa lta ba'i mchog_/
[\[61b.6\]]rta mchog lta bur shes par bya/_/kun tu rgyug pa lta ba'i mchog_/stag mo lta bur shes par bya/_/'jigs pa med pa lta ba'i mchog_/dom bu lta bur shes par bya/_/de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig 'di gsungs te/_skyon gyis ma gos lta ba'i mchog_/byang chub sems de 
[\[61b.7\]]dkar por snang /_/dus gsum mi 'gyur lta ba'i mchog_/byang chub sems de nag por snang /_/yon tan rgyas pa lta ba'i mchog_/byang chub sems de ser por snang /_/kun la khyab pa lta ba'i mchog_/byang chub sems de dmar por snang /_/phrin las rdzogs pa lta ba'i 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]mchog/_/byang chub sems de ljang khur shar/_/de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig gsungs te/_/dus gsum snang ba lta ba'i mchog_/rnam par snang mdzad lta bur shar/_/chos nyid don la rtag sems pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur shar/_/thams cad 
[\[62a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid rtogs pas/_/rin chen 'byung ldan lta bur shar/_/chos can so sor ma 'dres pas/_/snang ba mtha' yas lta bur shar/_/sna tshogs snang la ma 'dres pas/_/don yod grub pa lta bur shar/_/zhes pa gsungs so/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs 
[\[62a.3\]]gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus/_/rtogs pa lta ba'i rjes thogs la/_/bsgom pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta 
[\[62a.4\]]bu/_/zhes zhus pas/_de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/_/sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa yis/_/rtogs pa'i don go bsgoms las byung /_/gzhan du 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/_/sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/ye nas spros dang bral ba la/_/rtag par 'dzin 
[\[62a.5\]]pa bsgom pa'i skyon/_/phyi dang nang gi chos nyid la/_/chad par 'dzin pa bsgom pa'i skyon/_/'o na ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_/lam med lam gol dman pa'i lam/_/'di rnams spangs te bsgom par bya/_/dang po byang chub sems bskyed de/_/smon 'jug gnyis po sngon du 
[\[62a.6\]]gces/_/gzung ba yul med sgom pa'i mchog_/chos kyi bdag med rtogs par bya/_/'dzin pa'i sems me sgom pa'i mchog_/gang zag bdag med rtogs par bya/_/chos rnams gang yin mi 'gegs pas/_/thabs kyi lam du shes par bya/_/ngo bo ci yang ma grub 
[\[62a.7\]]pas/_/shes rab lam du shes par bya/_/chos rnams rgyu med sgom pa'i mchog_/stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar yin/_/'bras bu stong pa sgom pa'i mchog_/mtshan med pa yi rnam thar yin/_/rgyu 'bras dbyer med sgom pa'i mchog_/smon pa med pa'i rnam thar yin/_/kun la 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]byams pa sgom pa'i mchog_/byams pa tshad med rang bzhin yin/_/kun la brtse ba sgom pa'i mchog_/snying rje tshad med ngo bo nyid/_/kun la phan pa sgom pa'i mchog_/dga' ba tshad med ngo bo nyid/_/kun la khyab pa sgom pa'i mchog_/btang snyoms tshad med ngo bo 
[\[62b.2\]]nyid/_/bsod nams tshogs sog sgom pa'i mchog_/bzhi gsum bcu gnyis bdag nyid can/_/lam la bsgoms pa sgom pa'i mchog_/nges 'byed bzhi yi bdag nyid can/_/ye shes mthong ba sgom pa'i mchog_/byang chub yan lag rnam bdun yin/_/goms par 
[\[62b.3\]]byed pa sgom pa'i lam/_/'phags lam brgyad kyi bdag nyid can/_/goms pa mthar phyin sgom pa'i mchog_/bcu pa la ni yongs su grol/_/sangs rgyas pa yi rnam thar yin/_/chags sems bral ba sgom pa'i mchog_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/_/rang sems dag 
[\[62b.4\]]pa sgom pa'i mchog_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yin/_/ji mi snyam pa sgom pa'i mchog_/bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/_/go cha sbyor ba sgom pa'i mchog_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yin/_/g.yeng ba med pa sgom pa'i mchog_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin 
[\[62b.5\]]pa yin/_/'khor 'das shes pa sgom pa'i mchog_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin/_/nyon mongs mi spong sgom pa'i mchog_/thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/_/mi mthun zil gnon sgom pa'i mchog_/stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/_/ci bsams 'grub pa sgom pa'i 
[\[62b.6\]]mchog/_/smon lam pha rol phyin pa yin/_/ji snyed mkhyen bya sgom pa'i mchog_/ye shes pha rol phyin pa yin/_/chos dbyings ye shes sgom pa'i mchog_/spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/me long ye shes sgom pa'i mchog_/thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar 
[\[62b.7\]]shes yin/_/mnyam nyid ye shes sgom pa'i mchog_/kun la snyoms pa'i bdag nyid yin/_/kun rtog ye shes sgom pa'i mchog_/ma 'dres gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/bya grub ye shes sgom pa'i mchog_/phrin las thams cad dus gcig rdzogs/_/mkha' 'gro ma 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud ces bya ba las sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi ba'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/he ru ka la 'di skad gsol/_/goms par bya ba'i rjes thogs 
[\[63a.2\]]la/_/spyod pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji ltar bgyi/_/de nas ston pas gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/cung zad drod ni thob pa dang /_/de tshe spyod pa spyad par bya/_/dang po gsang ba'i spyod pa bya/_/byang chub sems ni drod thob nas/_/rig pa brtul zhugs spyod par bya/_/
[\[63a.3\]]lhan cig skyes pa'i drod thob nas/_/ma dad zlog pa'i spyod pa bya/_/chu tshod lta bu'i drod thob nas/_/tshogs kyi spyod pa ci bder spyad/_/smyon pa lta bu'i sems thob nas/_/phyogs med rnam rgyal spyod pa bya/_/de yi dbye ba gzhan na gsal/_/gnas dang grogs dang dus dang 
[\[63a.4\]]zas/_/le'u gzhan nas shes par bya/_/kun gyis bkur ba spyod pa'i mchog_/rgyal po lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/ngo tsha shes pa spyod pa'i mchog_/rje rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/chags sdang 'khru ba spyod pa'i mchog_/bram ze lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/srid dang bral ba spyod pa'i 
[\[63a.5\]]mchog/_/dmangs rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/dmas pa 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog_/gdol pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/mtho sa 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog_/seng ge lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/nyam nga med pa spyod pa'i mchog_/glang chen lta bu'i spyod 
[\[63a.6\]]pa bya/_/shugs dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog_/rta mchog lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/rnam rtog gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog_/spyang ki lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/drag shul lta byed spyod pa'i mchog_/dred mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/gza' gtad med pa spyod 
[\[63a.7\]]pa'i mchog_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/ngo tsha bral ba spyod pa'i mchog_/ro langs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/ro dang 'grogs pa spyod pa'i mchog_/rigs ngan lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/dur khrod gnas pa spyod pa'i mchog_/ce spyang lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/bag yod rngam pa spyod pa'i 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]mchog/_/wa mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/de las gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/zung du 'brel ba spyod pa'i mchog_/ngur pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/gzhan gyis mi mthong spyod pa'i mchog_/khwa ta lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/dug lnga spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog_/rma bya lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/
[\[63b.2\]]dus tshod 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog_/khu byug lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/nyes pas ma gos spyod pa'i mchog_/bya rgod lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/rim gyis 'dzeg pa spyod pa'i mchog_/spre'u lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/'jigs pa med pa spyod pa'i mchog_/
[\[63b.3\]]dom bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/mtshan mo rgyu ba spyod pa'i mchog_/zhag mig can gyi spyod pa bya/_/gang la mi gnas spyod pa'i mchog_/bung ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/snang ba lta ba spyod pa'i mchog_/'phar ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/dgos 'dod 
[\[63b.4\]]'byung ba spyod pa'i mchog_/nor bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/_/sman dug gnyis med spyod pa'i mchog_/ga bur lta bur shes par bya/_/cis kyang mi tshugs spyod pa'i mchog_/rdo rje lta bur shes par bya/_/mi mthun gcod pa spyod pa'i mchog_/ral gri lta bur shes par bya/_/de 
[\[63b.5\]]nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i mchog_/mda' gzhu lta bur shes par bya/_/stong pa'i kha 'byed spyod pa'i mchog_/shaka ti lta bur shes par bya/_/'bigs par byed pa spyod pa'i mchog_/mdung thung lta bur shes par bya/_/nga bdag 
[\[63b.6\]]gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog_/sta re lta bur shes par bya/_/gdul bya 'dren pa spyod pa'i mchog_/lcags kyu lta bur shes par bya/_/dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang /_/grong khyer dag tu rnal 'byor rgyu ba'i tshe/_/de 'dra'i skyes bu'i phyag rgya cher rtogs byed/_/de nyid sems 
[\[63b.7\]]kyi khyad par mthong gyur na/_/brtul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sa la 'gro/_/sems nyid gnyis kyi gnad dang ma bral na/_/brtul zhugs spyad kyang sdug bsngal sna tshogs skye/_/bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs rab ldan na/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ltar/_/thogs pa med pa phyag rgya chen po de/_/skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas sa la reg_/ces gsungs so/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab 
[\[64a.2\]]tu dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/_/yang dag brda ni brda chen po/_/kun gyis mi rtog sbas pa'i don/_/bar chad sel ba brda yi chos/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pas 
[\[64a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_/snang ba thams cad las kyi brda/_/tshig ni ji snyed ngag gi brda/_/de la bsam gyis mi khyab gnas/_/don gyi brda ru shes par bya/_/de nas dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/_/gang zag 'jug pa'i rim pa dang /_/dpa' bo brtag pa'i rim pa dang /_/
[\[64a.4\]]phyag rgya mo yi brtag pa dang /_/mchog dang thun mong dngos grub dang /_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dag dang /_/rnal 'byor phag mo rdzogs byed dang /_/brda yi bye brag ji snyed pa/_/'gro mgon khyed kyis bshad du gsol/_/mgon po dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/_/thams 
[\[64a.5\]]cad kun gyi brda chen po/_/sbas pa'i brda ni bshad bya ba/_/g.yas pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang /_/g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin dang /_/lus kyi brda rnams rdzogs par bya/_/mi rtog sgom pa ston pa la/_/lag pa g.yon pa bstan pa ni/_/sa ro zhes ni brjod par bya/_/
[\[64a.6\]]rkang pa grong khyer sa bgrod pas/_/spyod pa nyams myong gis 'gro ba/_/go ba'i phyir nas rkang bstan te/_/a g+hu la zhes brjod par bya/_/srin lag mkha' 'gro ma yi rtsa/_/de yi phyir na de bstan te/_/shes rab chen por go bya'i phyir/_/b+ha ta ri zhes brjod par bya/_/lce 
[\[64a.7\]]yis zas kyi ro myong ltar/_/stong pas bde ba myong bstan phyir/_/lce bstan tsar+ya g+ha zhes brjod/_/skal bar ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni/_/yul la rig par bya ba'i phyir/_/lto ba zas kyi snod bstan pa/_/an d+ha li zhes brjod par bya/_/lto ba zas kyi snod yin phyir/_/de 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bzhin snod ni bstan par bya/_/bla ma'i brgyud pa go cha'i phyir/_/paM ka ta zhes brjod par bya/_/sor mo lnga'i ni rgyud gcig ltar/_/lnga yi rtsa ba e baM du/_/bsdus phyir sor mo lnga bstan la/_/tshan d+ho ha zhes brjod par bya/_/so yi stobs kyis zas 'dul 
[\[64b.2\]]ltar/_/e baM ji bzhin rtogs par byed/_/gang gis so ni bstan byas pas/_/tsa la ni zhes brjod par bya/_/byin pas lus kyi stobs skyed ltar/_/goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir/_/go phyin pa ni bstan byas la/_/me ga ba zhes brjod par bya/_/sa gzhi 
[\[64b.3\]]'gro ba kun 'degs ltar/_/'bras bu dam tshig gis bsten ltar/_/sa gzhi gru bzhir bstan byas la/_/maN Dal zhes su brjod par bya/_/sor mo lnga ni rgyu mthun phyir/_/phung lnga rigs lngar rgyas btab pas/_/g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga bstan pa/_/sba ran zhes 
[\[64b.4\]]brjod par bya/_/mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'chang /_/rgyas gdab gnyis ni go bya'i phyir/_/dbugs ni la ni dbyung bar bya/_/dpal kun sham zhes brjod par bya/_/so 'chal ba yi zhe sdang gis/_/'bras bu'i rtags ni yin pa'i phyir/_/gnyis snang gcod phyir so 
[\[64b.5\]]'cha' bas/_/ma ta khra zhes brjod par bya/_/sha ni srog chags thams cad las/_/'byung zhing chos rnams thams cad ni/_/sems yin phyir nas sha bstan pas/_/ra tsa na zhes brjod par bya/_/khro gnyer khros pa'i rtags yin pas/_/bya ba thams cad sdug bsngal 
[\[64b.6\]]gyi/_/rtags yin phyir na khro gnyer bstan/_/ni ri ha zhes brjod par bya/_/bsdums pas dbye ba med pa ltar/_/'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa ltar/_/b+ha ga ni zhes brjod par bya/_/dpe yis mtshon pa'i don du ni/_/dri ma kun las grol ba'i phyir/_/bsdams pa bkrol 
[\[64b.7\]]nas gre nan brjod/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin/_/thams cad tshim par byed pa ltar/_/sna tshogs snang ba'i chos kun la/_/bde ba chen po'i ros tshim phyir/_/gtor ma btang la hika ka brjod/_/lto ba zas kyi snod yin ltar/_/sems can sangs rgyas snod yin 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]pas/_/don du lto ba bstan nas ni/_/ni gar ma zhes brjod par bya/_/de rnams phan yon dpag med pas/_/snying po rgyud du gsal bar bstan/_/brda dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas/_/bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po la/_/longs spyod pa ni thabs kyi 
[\[65a.2\]]mchog/_/byin gyis brlabs dang sa bon dang /_/rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad pas/_/dpag med rim gyis phan yon 'byung /_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/lnga bsdus rtse mo mnan pa ni/_/bum pa'i dbang ste lus kyi brda/_/mtheb srin e yi drang ro 
[\[65a.3\]]gcig/_/gsang ba'i dbang ste lus kyi brda/_/byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ni/_/gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin/_/skyes dang ma skyes gnyis med pas/_/bzhi pa yin te lus kyi brda/_/de yi ngag gi brda smras pa/_/ka la sha ya bum pa'i dbang /_/ya ra la wa gsang 
[\[65a.4\]]pa'i brda'o/_/e baM ma yA gsum pa'i brda'o/_/e hU~M o~M AHbzhi pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las brda'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo 
[\[65a.5\]]des/_ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa de la phyi'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /_nang gi mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /_gsang ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /_de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa phul nas 'di skad zhus so/_/bla med ston pa he ru 
[\[65a.6\]]ka/_/'khor ba'i sems can 'dren mdzad pa/_/thugs rje che dang ldan pa khyod/_/nad pa lta bu'i sems can la/_/chos kyi sman mchog bstan du gsol/_/long ba lta bu'i sems can la/_/chos kyi sgron me sbar du gsol/_/rgyal po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/_/kun la byams pa mdzad 
[\[65a.7\]]du gsol/_/blon po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/_/kun la phan pa mdzad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas ston pa 'jigs byed he ru ka de thugs rab tu dgyes te/_sku'i sgo nas mdzes gar rnam pa gsum mdzad/_gsung gi sgo nas rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gsum mdzad/_thugs kyi sgo 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]nas khyad par gyi ye shes rnam pa gsum bskyed nas/_/'khor rnams la spyan gzigs nas tshangs pa'i gsung gis rdo rje'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/_/ma rig pa yi mun pas bsgribs/_/'khor 
[\[65b.2\]]ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ltung /_/nyon mongs 'dam du bying ba yis/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri dang /_/bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kun/_/nyon mongs pa yi gnyen por bstan/_/dbang po rab 'bring dang sbyar nas/_/thun mong theg pa 
[\[65b.3\]]rim gyis bstan/_/mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum/_/bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin/_/bder gshegs thugs rje bsam mi khyab/_/sems can rnams la de ltar bstan/_/de nas dur khrod bdag mo des yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bla med ston pa he ru ka/_/
[\[65b.4\]]thun mong theg pa de ltar bstan/_/khyad par gsang sngags ji ltar lags/_/rgyud sde rnams kyi dbye ba zhu/_/smin pa'i lam ni ji ltar lags/_/grol ba'i lam ni gang la bgyi/_/dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas ston pa he ru kas/_/
[\[65b.5\]]nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag la/_/gsang sngags rgyud sde ngas bshad kyis/_/snod skyon gsum po spangs la nyon/_/bya ba gtso bor byed pa la/_/kri ya'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/_/spyod pa gtso bor byed pa la/_/gnyis pa'i rgyud sde rnam 
[\[65b.6\]]lnga bstan/_/sems nyid gtso bor byed pa la/_/rnal 'byor rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/_/bde stong gtso bor byed pa la/_/bla na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan/_/yid la byed pa med rnams la/_/gong na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan/_/de'i phyir rgyud sde rnam pa lnga/_/gsang sngags rgyud 
[\[65b.7\]]ces bya bar grags/_/re re la yang lnga lnga ste/_/rgyud chen nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/_/rgyud kyi dbye ba de ltar na/_/smin zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_/lam zhes bgyi ba gang la 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bgyi/_/de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/_/de nyid yod de smin lam med/_/des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/
[\[66a.2\]]lam log mu stegs byed rnams la/_/de nyid yod de smin lam med/_/des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/dman pa nyan thos rang rgyal la/_/de nyid yod de smin lam med/_/de phyir bskal pa grangs med du/_/dka' thub spyod pa nyon re mongs/_/ma smin mdo 
[\[66a.3\]]sder zhugs rnams la/_/de nyid yod de smin lam med/_/des na tshe gcig sangs rgyas dka'/_/zhes so/_/de nas dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/_smin zhes bya ba gang la bgyi/_/lam zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/_/dpa' bo chen pos bshad du 
[\[66a.4\]]gsol/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/smin zhes bya ba ni sang d+ha'i sgra las shes par bya'o/_/lam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni a tha mi tha'i sgra las shes par bya/_'jig rten pa'i lam dang sbyar ro/_/lus dang ngag dang sems dang gsum/_/ma smin smin par 
[\[66a.5\]]byed pa'i thabs/_/dbang bskur cho ga ji snyed bstan/_/dang po bsnyen pa bya ba gces/_/grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi/_/bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas nas/_/sa chog sta gon tshul bzhin bya/_/dang po sa gzhi yongs su gzung /_/gnyis pa sta gon
