[\[66a.6\]]gnas pa ste/_/nub gsum pa la 'jug par bya/_/rgyud rnams gzhan du shes par bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor shar gyi sgor/_/ba yi rnam lnga'i maN+Dal bri/_/skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/_/bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/_/dkyil 'khor de 
[\[66a.7\]]yi lho'i sgo ru/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi maN+Dal bya/_/skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/_/gsang ba'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/_/dkyil 'khor de yi nub sgo ru/_/dal gyi chos 'byung e dbyibs bri/_/skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/_/shes rab ye shes 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]dbang bskur te/_/gsum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/_/dkyil 'khor de yi byang sgo ru/_/phrin las rnam bzhi'i maN+Dal bri/_/skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/_/bzhi pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/_/dkyil 'khor de yi pho brang du/_/seng chen 
[\[66b.2\]]bsnol ba'i khri stengs su/_/skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/_/rdo rje slob dpon byed pa'i dbang /_/cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bskur/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbang gsum po/_/thog ma nyid du bskur bar bya/_/de nas dur khrod brgyad rnams kyis/_/dbang ni 
[\[66b.3\]]rnam pa brgyad po bskur/_/de nas zas rnams bdud rtsi'i dbang /_/ji lta bar ni bskur bar bya/_/de nas phyag mtshan rnams kyi dbang /_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bskur bar bya/_/de nas nyan pa'i dbang rnams bskur/_/de nas bshad pa'i dbang rnams bskur/_/de nas 
[\[66b.4\]]skal ldan gang zag la/_/mnga' gsol sum cu rtsa lnga bya/_/de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyis/_/dbang rnams ma lus rdzogs par bskur/_/de nas dbang rdzogs gang zag de/_/bder gshegs rnams kyi sras yin te/_/mkhyen rab bde gshegs rnams dang 
[\[66b.5\]]mnyam/_/mthu stobs khro rgyal rnams dang mnyam/_/tshe tshad nyi zla gnyis dang mnyam/_/dang po las can sbyor ba yis/_/sa brgyad pa la rab tu gnas/_/dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na/_/rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang /_/slob dpon bya ba yong mi nus/_/dbang 
[\[66b.6\]]bskur gnang ba ma mthong na/_/gzhan gyi yon tan kun 'chang yang /_/'khor lo srog shing med pa 'dra/_/dbang ma thob par las rtsom dang /_/sgyid ma ma rtas khal 'gel ba/_/'di dag phung po'i rgyu yin no/_/slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing /_/dbang rnams 
[\[66b.7\]]thob par ma byas na/_/nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa ni/_/'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]de nas dur khrod phag mo des/_/he ru ka la 'di skad zhus/_/sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i chos/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/_/dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum/_/gang dang gang gis grol ba lags/_/dug lnga spyod pa'i gang 
[\[67a.2\]]zag lnga/_/gang dang gang gis 'joms par byed/_/de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/dbang po rab kyi gang zag la/_/rang bzhin rnam dag phag mo bstan/_/dbang po 'bring gi gang zag la/_/brjod pa sgra yi phag mo 
[\[67a.3\]]bstan/_/dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/_/mtshon pa brda yi phag mo bstan/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/ston pa la ni tshig 'di gsol/_/rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yi/_/rdo rje phag mo ji lta bu/_/sgra yi phag mo ji lta 
[\[67a.4\]]bu/_/dbyibs kyi phag mo ji lta bu/_/zhes pa la sogs pa zhus so/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/rang bzhin nyid nas dag pa de/_/chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid/_/skad cig drug gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/
[\[67a.5\]]brjod pa sgra yi phag mo de/_/longs spyod sgra yi ngo bo nyid/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku'i ngo bo nyid/_/zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/mtshon pa brda yi phag mo de/_/sprul pa sku yi ngo bo nyid/_/zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[67a.6\]]'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/dpa' bo che la yang zhus pa/_/gang zag rigs la lnga yod de/_/gti mug can gyi gang zag dang /_/zhe sdang can gyi gang zag dang /_/'dod pa gtsor byed gang zag dang /_/nga rgyal 
[\[67a.7\]]can gyi gang zag dang /_/phrag dog can gyi gang zag lnga/_/de rnams gang dang gang gis grol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/_/gti mug can gyi gang zag la/_/sku yi phag mo dkar mo bstan/_/gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms/_/'dod pa 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]gtsor byed skyes bu la/_/gsung gi phag mo dmar mo bstan/_/'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms/_/zhe sdang can gyi gang zag la/_/thugs kyi phag mo nag mo bstan/_/zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms/_/nga rgyal can gyi gang zag la/_/yon tan can gyi 
[\[67b.2\]]phag mo bstan/_/nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms/_/phrag dog can gyi gang zag la/_/phrin las phag mo ljang khu bstan/_/phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms/_/de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/he ru ka la tshig 'di gsol/_/dug lnga shas che gang zag 
[\[67b.3\]]la/_/'bras bu sku lnga ji ltar thob/_/ye shes lnga ni ji ltar snang /_/rigs lnga zhes ni gang la bgyi/_/khro mo lnga ni ji ltar bsgom/_/'khor lo lnga ni ji ltar gnas/_/snying po lnga ni ji ltar bzlas/_/dam tshig lnga ni ji ltar bsrung /_/nyams myong lnga ni ji ltar 'byung /_/
[\[67b.4\]]nyon mongs lnga ni ji ltar 'byung /_/ye shes lnga ni ji ltar 'phel/_/grangs kyi tshad ni ji ltar bzlas/_/mtshan ma'i rtags ni ji ltar 'byung /_/dus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/_/las tshogs rnams ni ji ltar 'grub/_/ces zhus so/_/de nas dpa' bo he ru kas/_/thugs 
[\[67b.5\]]rab tu dgyes te brda'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/_/dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/_/'bras bu rnam pa lnga thob ste/_/kun la khyab pa chos sgra dang /_/theg chen spyod pa longs sku dang /_/gang la gang 'dul sprul sku dang /_/cis kyang mi shigs rdo 
[\[67b.6\]]rje'i sku/_/ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog dang /_/skye ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur/_/rtogs pa'i don la goms par byed/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'thob/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud du bshad/_/thob bya'i ye shes rnam lnga yang /_/spros bral chos dbyings ye shes dang /_/
[\[67b.7\]]me long ye shes gzugs brnyan ltar/_/bdag gzhan gnyis med mnyam pa nyid/_/gsal la ma 'dres so sor rtog_/phrin las mthar phyin bya ba grub/_/ye shes lnga ni de ltar skye/_/gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la'o/_/dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/_/rigs ni rnam pa lnga 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]thob ste/_/spros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/_/dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen rigs/_/skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i rigs/_/sems can don grub las kyi rigs/_/gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la/_/dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag 
[\[68a.2\]]de/_/ye shes khro mo lnga bsgoms nas/_/bde ba skye ba sku yin pas/_/bde chen dkar mo bsgom par bya/_/nus pa 'byung ba gsung yin pas/_/dmar mo sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya/_/rtogs tshad 'char ba thugs yin pas/_/khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya/_/
[\[68a.3\]]brtan par byed pa yon tan te/_/ser mo don grub bsgom par bya/_/bar chad sel ba phrin las te/_/sna tshogs mthar phyin bsgom par bya/_/rim gyis ma yin cig car yin/_/rgya dang 'bur gyi tshul du bya/_/yig 'bru rnams kyi gnas lugs ni/_/spyi gtsug 
[\[68a.4\]]bde chen 'khor lo na/_/bde byed sku yi yi ge bzhi/_/rang bzhin rtsa yi gzugs can no/_/mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na/_/gsung mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni/_/rang bzhin rtsa yi tshul du gnas/_/snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na/_/thugs mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni/_/rtsa yi 
[\[68a.5\]]dbyibs dang mthun par gnas/_/lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na/_/rten byed yon tan yi ge bzhi/_/de yi rang bzhin rtsa yi dbyibs/_/phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi ni/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag yi ge bzhi/_/las dang rjes mthun gzugs su gnas/_/snying po lnga yi bzlas thabs ni/_/phyi 
[\[68a.6\]]dang nang dang gsang ba dang /_/phrin las bzhi yi tshul du bzlas/_/dam tshig lnga yi bsrung tshul ni/_/bde chen dkar mo'i dam tshig tu/_/sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/_/khros ma nag mo'i dam tshig tu/_/drag cing rtsub pa'i spyod pa bya/_/ser mo don grub dam tshig tu/_/dngos 
[\[68a.7\]]po kun la chags med bya/_/dmar mo sgra sgrogs dam tshig tu/_/smra zhing bud med bsten par bya/_/sna tshogs mthar phyin dam tshig tu/_/rgyud cing mchod pa'i spyod pa bya/_/mkha' 'gro spyi yi dam tshig tu/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la/_/rtag tu longs spyod bya ba ni/_/bza' ba'i dam tshig 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]rnam lnga ste/_/gsang sngags spyod pas bsten par bya/_/de nas nyams dang byin brlabs ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]skye tshul 'di lta ste/_/dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skye/_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/_/chos rnams gzugs brnyan ltar mthong ba/_/rdo rje mkha' 
[\[68b.2\]]'gro'i nyams myong yin/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid skye ba/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/_/chos rnams ma 'dres so sor gsal/_/pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/_/dngos po gang la'ang thogs med pa/_/las kyi mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/_/
[\[68b.3\]]nyon mongs lnga yi 'gyur lugs ni/_/gti mug chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur/_/zhe sdang me long ye shes 'gyur/_/nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyir 'gyur/_/'dod chags so sor rtog par 'gyur/_/phrag dog bya ba nan tan 'gyur/_/de nas 'gyur ba lam du byed/_/de nas gzhan yang 
[\[68b.4\]]bshad bya ste/_/sku yi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'phel/_/gsung gi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/_/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'phel/_/thugs kyi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes 'phel/_/yon tan yi ge rnam bzhi yis/_/mnyam 
[\[68b.5\]]pa nyid kyi ye shes 'phel/_/phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi yis/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'phel/_/A li dang ni kA li yis/_/sgra don dag gis rtogs par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/_/grangs kyi tshad ni 'di lta ste/_/'bum phrag gcig gis 
[\[68b.6\]]bgegs rnams skrod/_/'bum phrag gnyis kyis grong khyer skrod/_/'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal po 'joms/_/'bum phrag bzhi pas bud med 'gugs/_/'bum phrag lnga yis phyogs rnams bsreg_/'bum phrag drug gis 'byung ba bzlog_/'bum phrag bdun gyis gnas 
[\[68b.7\]]khang g.yo/_/'bum phrag brgyad kyis mngon shes 'char/_/'bum phrag dgu yis zas nor 'du/_/'bum phrag bcu yis gang 'dod 'grub/_/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/_/mtshan ltas rab 'bring tha ma gsum/_/skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag la/_/ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]mngon sum dag tu mthong bar 'gyur/_/dbang po rab kyi snang ba ste/_/las 'phro can gyi snang ba yin/_/skal ba 'bring gi gang zag la/_/ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/_/rang gi las dang gang mthun par/_/rmi lam dag tu mchog tu gsal/_/skal ba 'bring 
[\[69a.2\]]gi mtshan ltas yin/_/skal ba dman pa'i gang zag la/_/tshul bzhin bris pa'i thang sku ste/_/'od dang sgra dang 'dzum pa dang /_/mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan 'byung ba dang /_/skye ba 'di la nges par 'grub/_/sbyor ba dman pa'i gang zag la/_/bar ma do nas lam sna 'dren/_/
[\[69a.3\]]mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/_/dus kyi tshad ni rnam gsum ste/_/rab la skad cig rnam drug yin/_/'bring la zla ba drug gis grol/_/tha ma lo drug sbyar ba'o/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/_/rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/_/las tshogs rang bzhin dbye ba ni/_/
[\[69a.4\]]rgyas dang bsdus pa shin tu rgyas/_/rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/_/bsdus pa tshar gcad rjes gzung gnyis/_/rgyas pa phrin las rnam pa bzhi/_/shin tu rgyas pa thun mong brgyad/_/de las 'phros pa nyi shu lnga/_/bde chen dkar mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/zhi ba'i las tshogs 
[\[69a.5\]]rnam lnga 'grub/_/ser mo don grub ting 'dzin gyis/_/rgyas pa'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/_/dmar mo sgra sgrogs ting 'dzin gyis/_/dbang gi las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/_/khros ma nag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/drag po'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/_/sna tshogs mthar phyin ting 
[\[69a.6\]]'dzin gyis/_/phrin las bzhi yi las rnams 'grub/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/_/ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la/_/
[\[69a.7\]]phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di phul nas 'di skad zhus te/_/skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gis/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/_/sku dang mchod rten ji ltar bgyi/_/de yi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa'o/_/de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/_/nyon cig dur khrod bdag 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]mo khyod/_/rigs can lnga yi gang zag des/_/bdag don gzhan don byed 'dod pas/_/sku lnga gdung lnga mchod rten lnga/_/rgyu lnga sngags lnga las rim lnga/_/lnga tshan lnga ru shes par bya/_/de yi bya ba'i rim pa ni/_/de nyid gsum dang ldan par bya/_/dang po bdag gi de nyid dang /_/gnyis 
[\[69b.2\]]pa rgyu yi de nyid dang /_/gsum pa 'bras bu'i de nyid do/_/dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/_/de bzhin rigs kyi gang zag de/_/dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/_/sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/_/'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/_/gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/_/rnam pa lnga 
[\[69b.3\]]ru shes par bya/_/sa gzhi dkar zhing snum pa la/_/rin chen sna lnga la sogs pa'i/_/lnga tshan lnga ni legs sbyar te/_/lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/_/sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/_/'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/_/rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/_/de 
[\[69b.4\]]nas mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/_/de la mchod dang bstod pa bya/_/bzhugs su gsol ba'i rim pa ni/_/dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/_/zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/_/rin chen rigs kyi gang zag des/_/dad dang brtson 
[\[69b.5\]]'grus rab ldan pas/_/sku'am mchod rten 'debs dus su/_/'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/_/gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/sa gzhi ser la 'tsher ba la/_/gong du bstan pa ji lta bar/_/sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/_/'og min gnas nas 
[\[69b.6\]]spyan drangs nas/_/rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/_/de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/_/mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/_/dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/_/rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/_/pad+ma rigs kyi gang zag de/_/
[\[69b.7\]]dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/_/sku dang mchod rten byed dus su/_/'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/_/gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/sa gzhi dmar la gdang ba la/_/lnga tshan lnga dang legs sbyar te/_/lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/_/sku dang 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]mchod rten ci rigs gdab/_/'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/_/rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/_/de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/_/mchod dang bstod dang bzhugs pa kun/_/dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/_/dbang gi las rnams 'grub 
[\[70a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/_/rdo rje rigs kyi gang zag de/_/dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/_/sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/_/'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/_/gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/sa gzhi gnag cing rtsub pa la/_/khrag 
[\[70a.3\]]dang dug dang tsher ma dang /_/yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang /_/lnga tshan lnga dang bcas pa la/_/lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/_/sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/_/'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/_/rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/_/de la mnga' gsol na 
[\[70a.4\]]bza' gsol/_/mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa kun/_/dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/_/drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed/_/dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/_/las kyi rigs kyi gang zag de/_/dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/_/sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus 
[\[70a.5\]]su/_/'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/_/gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/sa gzhi ljang zhing kha dog ser/_/gong du lnga tshan lnga dang sbyar/_/de la sku dang mchod rten rnams/_/ji ltar nus pa bzhin du gdab/_/'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/_/rab 
[\[70a.6\]]tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/_/de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/_/mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/_/dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/_/drag po'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/bstod pa lnga ni so sor bstod/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis 
[\[70a.7\]]su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sku dang mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo des ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gsum phul nas 'di skad zhus so/_/kye kye mgon po 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bdag la gson/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/_/nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_/rnam rtog brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/_/dus gsum kun tu sdug bsngal bskyed/_/de yi gnyen po bshad du gsol/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems 
[\[70b.2\]]can rnams/_/rgyu ni ma rig pa yis bskyed/_/rkyen ni rnam par rtog pa ste/_/de rnams rnam rtog ji ltar bsal/_/phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/_/de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu/_/legs nyes kun gyi stangs gcod pa'i/_/mna' dang gal gyis 'jigs pa 
[\[70b.3\]]la/_/de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu/_/nyon mongs nad kyis nyen pa la/_/de las thar pa'i thabs cig zhu/_/bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod dus su/_/de las rgyal ba'i thabs cig zhu/_/lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der/_/de las thar pa'i thabs cig 
[\[70b.4\]]zhu/_/de nas ston pas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyu 'bras kun tu sdug bsngal ba/_/ma lus dbyer med shes gyur na/_/sdug bsngal ma lus bde bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang thun mong 'di lta ste/_/phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/_/phyogs las 
[\[70b.5\]]rnam par rgyal bar bya/_/nyes legs kun gyi stangs gcod pa/_/mna' 'am gal gyis 'jigs pa la/_/mna' las rnam par rgyal bar bya/_/nad dang gdon gyis nyen pa la/_/bgegs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/_/bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod pa la/_/ngag 
[\[70b.6\]]las rnam par rgyal bar bya/_/lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der/_/rlung las rnam par rgyal bar bya/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba rnam pa 
[\[70b.7\]]lnga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas mgon po he ru kas 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi sdud pa mo rab tu dga' ste/_'khor rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang de ltar dga' mgu yi rangs te/_phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]pa phul nas/_mgon po thugs rje dang ldan pas/_/bdag dang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang /_/'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/_/thugs rjes gnang ba bka' drin lags/_/zhes dga' mgu yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[71a.2\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed he ru kas gsungs pa rdzogs 
[\[71a.3\]]so//_//[{D379}]dur khrod bdag mos gsol pa/_lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/_/ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur/_/phag mo zhes bya gang la bya/_/yi ge'i don ni gang la bskyal/_/bskyed rdzogs ngo bo gang la bya/_/dpa' bo he ru kas 
[\[71a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_nyon cig dur khrod phag mo khyod/_/nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa/_/dkar zhing spros bral zhi bar byed/_/ma chags skyon gyis ma gos pa/_/dmar la gdang ba sgra sgrogs yum/_/skyon med sems nyid rang dbang 'dus/_/gnyen po gcig kyang mi 
[\[71a.5\]]'gyur bas/_/khros ma nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin/_/mi 'gyur rang sems dbyings su grol/_/che ba ye shes lnga rgyas pa/_/ser mo skyon med don grub ma/_/ngo bo rgyal la g.yo dang bral/_/sna tshogs skyon gyis ma gos pas/_/in+d+ra nI la'i mthar byin ma/_/sna tshogs 
[\[71a.6\]]ngo bo gcig tu 'dus/_/rnam pa gang yang 'gyur ba med/_/chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med/_/rnam rtog cis kyang ma gos pas/_/phag ces bya ba rtog med yin/_/dbyings nyid rtog pa spros bral bas/_/mo zhes bya ba dbyings su thim/_/de la phye na rnam pa 
[\[71a.7\]]gsum/_/dam chos skye med phag mo ni/_/skye 'gag med pas chos sku yin/_/brjod pa sgra yi phag mo ni/_/phag ni ka li thabs yin la/_/mo ni A li longs skur 'dod/_/mtshon pa dbyings kyi phag mo ni/_/stong nyid mtshon pa'i sku mdog la/_/rtog med snying rje phag 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gi gdong /_/thabs dang shes rab phag mo la/_/bde stong skyon bral gcer bu ni/_/rtog pa med pas sprul sku'o/_/yig 'bru gsal la mi rtog pas/_/thim pa na yang cang te'u/_/snang stong mtha' dang bral ba'o/_/bskyed rdzogs ngo bo dbyer med pas/_/
[\[71b.2\]]mtshon pa snang ba stong pa'i dang /_/de nyid snang ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/dbyer med zung 'jug khas len bral/_/gcig la gcig rgyas gdab par bya/_/grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ces gsungs so/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med/_/
[\[71b.3\]]pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma bskyed rim bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas dur khrod bdag mo des dpa' bo chen po la 'dzum pa dang bcas nas zhus pa/_gsang sngags rnams kyi sngags 
[\[71b.4\]]ni gang /_/bzlas par bya ba'i yi ge gang /_/'khor lo rnam bzhi dgod pa gang /_/zhes zhus pas/_/he ru kas bka' stsal pa/_dur khrod bdag mos gus par gyis/_/gsang sngags rnams kyi yi ge ni/_/thams cad byed pa yi ge oM/_/dgyes pa sku yi yi ge 
[\[71b.5\]]ni/_/badzra bA ra hi zhes 'byung /_/nus pa 'byung ba gsung gi kro tA kA li/_/rtogs pa thugs ni ha ri sa/_/yon tan 'byung ba A be sha ya/_/phrin las mdzad pa e baM ma yA/_/de las gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_/'khor lo lnga yi dbus nyid du/_/yi ge bzhi pas rgyas 
[\[71b.6\]]btab nas/_/bzlas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum/_/zhi ba phyi yis bzlas pa ni/_/yig 'bru rnams ni kha dog dkar/_/de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros/_/nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa kun/_/ba spu'i sgo nas bstan pa yis/_/sems can kun la phog pas kyang /_/
[\[71b.7\]]sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/_/de bzhin gshegs la phog pas kyang /_/mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas so/_/bdag la slar thim zhi ba 'grub/_/rgyas pa ser po 'phro 'du yis/_/gong bzhin spro bsdu shes par bya/_/dmar po dbang gi 'phro 'du bya/_/
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]drag po nag po'i 'phro 'du bya/_/sna tshogs 'phros pas phrin las bzhi'i/_/dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin/_/nang dang gsang ba'i bzlas pa yang /_/gong bzhin spro bsdu shes par bya/_/dur khrod phag mos yang gsol pa/_/
[\[72a.2\]]zad cing 'phel bar byed pa gang /_/mthar thug pa yi yi ge gang /_/zhes zhus so/_/dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa/_/gti mug zad byed a yin te/_/has ni zhe sdang zad par byed/_/nga rgyal zad byed ri yin te/_/ni yis 'dod chags zad par 
[\[72a.3\]]byed/_/phrag dog zad byed sa yin no/_/a ni chos dbyings ye shes 'phel/_/ha ni me long ye shes 'phel/_/ri yis mnyam nyid ye shes 'phel/_/ni yis so sor rtog byed 'phel/_/sa yis bya grub ye shes 'phel/_/a ni sangs rgyas mkha' 
[\[72a.4\]]'gror snang /_/ha ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror snang /_/ri ni rin chen mkha' 'gror snang /_/ni yis pad+ma mkha' 'gror snang /_/sa yis las kyi mkha' 'gror snang /_/as ni de bzhin rigs thob ste/_/has ni rdo rje'i rigs chen thob/_/ri ni rin chen 
[\[72a.5\]]rigs thob ste/_/ni yis pad+ma'i rigs thob bo/_/sa ni las kyi rigs chen thob/_/chos sku'i mthar thug a yin te/_/longs sku'i rnam pa yi ge ha/_/sprul pa sku ni ri yin no/_/ngo bo nyid sku'i yi ge ni/_/rdo rje'i sku ni yi ge sa/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[72a.6\]]dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/_/dbang po rab 'bring rim pa yis/_/ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa/_/dbang po rab 'bring gsum yin te/_/dbang po rab kyi gang zag la/_/skad cig drug gi gdams ngag 
[\[72a.7\]]bstan/_/ye shes skad cig dang po yis/_/gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gcad/_/skad cig gnyis pa'i ye shes kyis/_/'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcad/_/skad cig gsum pa'i ye shes kyis/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rtog pa gcad/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]skad cig bzhi pa'i ye shes kyis/_/nyams la zhen pa'i rnam rtog gcad/_/skad cig lnga ba'i ye shes kyis/_/nyams myong bde ba'i rnam rtog gcad/_/skad cig drug pa'i ye shes kyis/_/yid la byed pa'i rnam rtog gcad/_/grol 'gyur 
[\[72b.2\]]rab la the tshom med/_/dbang po 'bring po'i gang zag la/_/rlung drug man ngag bstan pa ni/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung goms pas/_/rang bzhin sgrib pa sel bar byed/_/thad kar 'byung ba'i rlung goms pas/_/mtshan mo lta bu'i sgrib pa sel/_/
[\[72b.3\]]rang las skyes pa'i rlung goms pas/_/chod pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed/_/spong byed rlung la goms pa yis/_/sngon du rgyu ba'i sgrib pa sel/_/sbyong byed rlung la goms pa yis/_/shes bya'i sgrib pa sel bar byed/_/rdzogs byed rlung la goms pa yis/_/
[\[72b.4\]]sa rnams rim gyis gnon par byed/_/ye shes rnams ni dus gcig 'char/_/shes bya thams cad dus gcig chod/_/rlung drug ma yin ye shes yin/_/mun pa rnams ni bsgribs pa yis/_/ye shes rim gyis skye ba dang /_/sgrib pa rim gyis sel bar byed/_/
[\[72b.5\]]grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/_/yul ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing /_/lus dag pa ni dkyil 'khor yin/_/rang sems dag pa phag mo'i sku/_/ngag dag pa ni sngags su gsungs/_/lta bsgom dag pa dngos grub yin/_/dpe don 
[\[72b.6\]]gnyis su med pa gang /_/skal med dngos grub mi 'byung bas/_/lo drug bsgoms na the tshom med/_/ces gsungs so/_/mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma rdzogs 
[\[72b.7\]]rim bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas lots+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D380}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bid+yA d+ha ri NI badzra yo gi nI sA d+ha na nA ma/_bod skad du/_
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]rig pa 'dzin pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_de nas yang dag bshad bya ste/_'bum phrag gsum ba las 'byung ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rgyud las sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba ste/_snying ga nas spros pas rmi lam lta bu'i lus dang longs 
[\[73a.2\]]spyod dam pa'i bde ba gnyis su med par gyur pa dang /_'dir de'i steng du ma ning gi sa bon blta ste/_sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las dmar mo zhal steng du phyogs shing gyen du gzigs pa/_zhabs g.yon pa la 'khyud pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba dang me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i phyag can ma/_
[\[73a.3\]]me tog gi zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na'o/_/zhabs g.yas pa'i rting pa la reg pa'i g.yas pa na rdo rje'i phyag can ma rgyan thams cad spangs pa mo/_rig pa 'dzin ma'i rig pa'i sbyor ba can ma/_spro zhing kun tu sdud pa'i lus can ma/_man+dA ra ba dang /_mya ngan med pa dang /_yongs 'du rnams 
[\[73a.4\]]skyes par gyur pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'i khang par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/o~M ba~M rdo rje phag mo'o/_/ha~M yoM sngon mo gshin rje ma'o/_/hriM moM rmongs byed ma'o/_/hreM hrIM kun tu bskyod ma'o/_/hU~M hU~M kun tu skrag byed ma'o/_/phaT phaT gtum mo yan lag thams cad la 
[\[73a.5\]]mtshan ma'o/_/lte ba dang /_/snying ga dang /_de bzhin du kha dang /_mgo bo dang /_spyi bo ste 'di mtshon bya'o/_/rnal 'byor ma lnga po 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bshad do/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/o~M shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra A kaD+D+ha ya A kaD+D+ha 
[\[73a.6\]]ya/_pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/_/to Sha ya to Sha ya/_/sarba Da ki nI nAM hr-i da yaM hU~M phaT/_oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe maM ba liM hU~M o~M/_o~M badzra DA ki nI pra tI ts+tshe maM ba liM hU~M hU~M/_o~M rat+na DA ki nI pra tA ts+tshe maM ba liM hU~M trAM/_o~M pad+ma DA ki nI pra tI ts+tshe maM ba liM hU~M hrIH/_o~M bi shwa DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe maM ba liM hU~M AH_o~M sarba yo gi nI pra tIts+tsha maM ba liM 
[\[73a.7\]]hU~M hU~M/_ha ha hi hi badzra dzaHhU~M baM hoH/_o~M badzra ya gi nI sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha hoH/_rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dza ya se na'i zhabs dang /_lots+tsha ba btsun pa d+harma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]{D381}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa~M pu Ta nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[73b.2\]]cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas rdo rje snying po la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i tshe rdo rje snying po 
[\[73b.3\]]stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ye shes kyi dbang po rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i 
[\[73b.4\]]mtshan nyid mnyan par 'tshal lo/_/e ma'o rdo rje snying po legs so legs so/_/snying rje chen po legs so legs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi phung po legs so legs so/_/gang zhig rgyud thams cad du gsang ba de thams cad 'dod pas zhus shig_/
[\[73b.5\]]de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams rab tu 'dzum zhing mig phye bas phyag 'tshal te/_rang gi the tshom yang dang yang du zhus pa/_rgyud ni thams cad ci zhes brjod/_/gleng gzhi yang ni ji ltar lags/_/'di la gsang ba ci zhes gsungs/_/
[\[73b.6\]]ji ltar yang dag sbyor byung ming /_/de la mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rgyud dang thams cad de ni rgyud thams cad do/_/rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o/_/de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni byung bar nges pa zhes bya 
[\[73b.7\]]ba'i don to/_/khyab 'jug dang /_/dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o/_/yang dag par sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no/_/de las byung ba ni yang dag par sbyor 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i don to/_/'byung ba ni skye ba ste/_de ltar gnas pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa'o/_/mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni 'dis mtshon par byed pa'o/_/yang na rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi yang dag par 
[\[74a.2\]]sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpar gsungs so/_/gsang ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni man ngag can gyi sngags btu ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/_/de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/_/
[\[74a.3\]]dang por stong nyid bsams pas ni/_/lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru/_/gzugs kyi khams ni stong pa yi/_/sgra la de nyid kyis ni bya/_/dri yi khams ni stong pa yi/_/ro la de nyid kyis ni bya/_/reg bya'i khams ni stong pa yi/_/yid la de nyid kyis ni bya/_/
[\[74a.4\]]rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/_mig gi rang bzhin stong pa yi/_/nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/_/rna ba'i rang bzhin stong pa yi/_/nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/_/sna yi rang bzhin stong pa yi/_/nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/_/lce yi rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[74a.5\]]yi/_/nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/_/lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi/_/nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/_/yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi/_/dbus su rnam shes ji ltar lags/_/de phyir gzugs med lta ba med/_/sgra med thos pa po yang med/_/dri med snom pa 
[\[74a.6\]]po yang med/_/ro med myong ba po yang med/_/reg med reg pa po yang med/_/sems med sems las byung ba'ang med/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gnyis med gnyis ni rnam spangs pa'i/_/de nyid lam ni ji bzhin nyon/_/rtog ge med cing rnam shes 
[\[74a.7\]]med/_/de bzhin rtog ge pas mi rtogs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/_/nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid/_/nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes te/_/mi shes pa yi mun pas bsgribs/_/bag chags sad pa'i ye shes gang /_/rang rgyal rnams kyi sprul pa'o/_/
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gsang ba sangs rgyas spyod yul nyid/_/de rnams kun gyis mi shes so/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las/_/rgal bar 'gro ba'i sems kyis ni/_/lus kyi dbus su bskor ba yi/_/rgal ba mtshon par gsungs pa ste/_/rnam shes ye shes sems kyis ni/_/
[\[74b.2\]]mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed/_/ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/_/shes bya rnams gyis 'gro ba brtag_/'gro ba brtag pa'i sems kyis ni/_/ji ltar rang 'dod la sogs 'gro/_/'gro bar sngon gyi skye ba ni/_/stong phrag du ma dag tu 'gro/_/yo gis sngar 
[\[74b.3\]]gsungs mtshan nyid kyi/_/mtshan nyid stong par bsams nas ni/_/lus kyi stong pa'i zhing sogs la/_/blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab/_/rtsa yi mdzes spyi las byung ba/_/de ni rdul bral rab tu grags/_/dag pa'i shel gyi 'od dang mnyam/_/byang chub sems ni 'od 
[\[74b.4\]]gsal ba/_/ye shes lnga yi dngos de nyid/_/yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam/_/de yi nang du gnas pa'i lha/_/mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin can/_/ma mo phyed pa mchog tu phra/_/thig le'i gzugs kyi yid kyi dngos/_/snying gi dbus su rtag gnas shing /_/
[\[74b.5\]]'od zer ldan zhing gzi brjid che/_/bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mthar/_/rkang mthil mgo bo med par ni/_/thag pa gcig ni rnam phyung nas/_/lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/_/cha ni lnga pa tsam nyid ni/_/klu dbang dbyibs su rgyas pa la/_/de yi cha yang 
[\[74b.6\]]phye nas ni/_/rdo rje'i dbus su rnam phyung ste/_/skye gnas dbus su sa bon gnas/_/chos dbyings khu bar byas nas ni/_/sgo ni dgu po thams cad du/_/de ni rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin me ni tshangs pa'i dngos/_/sa yi sa bon gnyis kyis ni/_/
[\[74b.7\]]mig la de nyid sbyar bar bya/_/rlung gi stong sogs sa bon gyi/_/sems kyis sna dang rna ba sogs/_/bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon lce/_/dbang por gtso bo dbang phyug nyid/_/mgrin par gti mug sa bon te/_/lag par nyon mongs de bzhin no/_/g.yo ba snying gi gnas 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]rnams su/_/phyugs bdag lte ba'i rtsa bar ni/_/yan lag brgyad kyi sa bon gyis/_/yan lag brgyad kyi cho gas 'dzin/_/brtan sogs g.yo bar bcas pa yi/_/'gro kun khyab par byed pas khyab/_/tshangs sogs lha dang lha min rnams/_/
[\[75a.2\]]de yi gdan du gyur pa yin/_/gang la gtso bo spyod gyur pa'i/_/khyim ni b+ha ga zhes su gsungs/_/ji srid lus la rnam gnas pa/_/de yi las dang las min 'gyur/_/dge dang mi dge gang cung zad/_/byas pa'i las ni thams cad byed/_/rnal 'byor mnyam pa 
[\[75a.3\]]nyid du gsungs/_/rab tu sbyor ba sgom pa yin/_/gang tshe las kyi lus bcom pa/_/de ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin/_/gang gis brtan dang g.yo khyab pa/_/des ni de tshe rang gis nus/_/nam mkha' lta bur mnyam nyid ni/_/de yi kha dog shes par bya/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[75a.4\]]gnas dpa' bo ni/_/gos pa med cing dri ma spangs/_/ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang /_/bu mo de bzhin gnyen mo dang /_/bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs dang /_/rje'u mo de bzhin dmangs mo dang /_/gar ma tshos ma g.yung mo dang /_/de bzhin du ni gdol pa mo/_/
[\[75a.5\]]thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/_/de nyid rig pas mchod par bya/_/ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar/_/rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya/_/ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun sogs/_/sa la spyod pas sdug bsngal byed/_/rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni/_/phyag 
[\[75a.6\]]rgya rnam pa lngar ni gsungs/_/bram ze skye gnyis rigs skyes ma/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gsungs/_/rgyal rigs ma ni rgyal po'i rus/_/rma bya zla sogs rigs las skyes/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes byar grags/_/rje'u mo bal glang skyong ba ste/_/las 
[\[75a.7\]]kyi rigs las skyes par gsungs/_/dmangs mo yang ni bran mo ste/_/rnam par snang mdzad chen por gsungs/_/gar ma pad+ma'i rigs nyid de/_/tshos ma de bzhin las kyi rigs/_/g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/_/rin chen gdol pa mor shes bya/_/phyag rgya lngar ni 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]rnam par nges/_/'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/_/mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/_/dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing /_/de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid/_/'dis ni shes rab rigs pas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs par mngon 
[\[75b.2\]]par brjod/_/rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/_/rigs ni brgya dang mtha' yas dang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/_/rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang /_/phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/_/rdo rje rin chen pad nor bu/_/
[\[75b.3\]]'dzin pa'i rim pa'i rigs rnams so/_/sgom pa po med bsgom bya med/_/sngags med lha yang yod ma yin/_/spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/sngags dang lhar ni yang dag gnas/_/rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang /_/rin chen dpag med sems dpa'o/_/
[\[75b.4\]]tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang /_/thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod/_/tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid/_/'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya/_/zhi ba rtag tu dge ba ste/_/thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/_/dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/_/dga' ba rtogs 
[\[75b.5\]]phyir rnam sangs rgyas/_/gang phyir lus las byung ba'i phyir/_/lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya/_/'di la b+ha ga mnga' ba'i phyir/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya/_/b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod/_/dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun/_/yang na nyon mongs 
[\[75b.6\]]la sogs pa/_/'joms pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das/_/gang phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir/_/shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya/_/gang phyir skal ba ston pa'i phyir/_/shes rab de nyid sring mo nyid/_/shes rab tshos mar brjod pa ni/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[75b.7\]]'tshed pa'i phyir/_/btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod/_/yon tan 'jo bar gsungs pa'i phyir/_/shes rab bu mor brjod par bya/_/snying rje chen pos g.yo ba'i phyir/_/shes rab gar mar brjod par bya/_/gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa/_/de phyir g.yung mor brjod 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]par bya/_/A li kA li rab smras pa/_/brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad/_/rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor yin/_/nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/_/lag pa sgyur ba phyag rgya yin/_/sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no/_/gang phyir rnam sems bsam 
[\[76a.2\]]gtan ni/_/gang sems de ni bsam gtan no/_/pha las bde ba gang thob pa/_/de yi bde ba rang gis bza'/_/bde ba gang gis 'ching ba 'dir/_/de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod/_/brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[76a.3\]]bsgom pa'i de kho na'i rab tu byed pa ste dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun brjod par bya'o/_/nang gi lus dang /_phyi'i lus dang /_phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/_
[\[76a.4\]]ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/_/nang gi tshor ba dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_phyi nang gnyis ka'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/_ma rig pa la sogs pas yid 
[\[76a.5\]]gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/_/nang gi chos rnams dang /_phyi'i chos rnams dang /_phyi nang gnyis ka'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/_ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su 
[\[76a.6\]]gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/_/nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi nang gnyis ka'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas ba'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/_ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig 
[\[76a.7\]]rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/_/'di rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'jog go/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/sdig 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'jog go/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[76b.2\]]rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'jog go/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/de ltar dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir thabs tshad med pa bsgoms pas yongs su gang ba'i phyir yongs su gang bar gyur pas bsgom pa dam pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa 
[\[76b.3\]]skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'jog go/_/smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/_/'di rnams ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/_/'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/_bye brag 
[\[76b.4\]]phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi 'dun pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du 
[\[76b.5\]]byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/_bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi brtson 'grus nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab 
[\[76b.6\]]tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/_/dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/_bye brag phye pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_rnam par byang bar gyur 
[\[76b.7\]]pas bdag gi dpyod pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/_/sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/_bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /_/'gog 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_rnam par byang bas bdag gi sems nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/_/'di rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/_'dod par spyod pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad par 
[\[77a.2\]]byed de/_rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa la so sor yid ches par gyur pa gang zhig de ltar las byed par 'gyur ba dge ba'am sdig pa de dang de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni 'tsho ba'i rgyur yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o/_/
[\[77a.3\]]'di ni dad pa'i dbang por gsungs so/_/gang zhig chos rnams la dad pa'i dbang pos dad par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par byed do/_/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang por gsungs so/_/gang zhig chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes pa 
[\[77a.4\]]de'i chos rnams ni dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par mi byed pa'o/_/'di ni dran pa'i dbang por gsungs so/_/gang zhig chos rnams la dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa'o/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin 
[\[77a.5\]]gyi dbang por gsungs so/_/gang zhig chos rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de'i chos rnams ni shes rab kyi dbang pos so sor rig pa ste/_de ni chos de dang de rnams la so sor rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni shes rab kyi dbang por gsungs so/_/
[\[77a.6\]]dbang po lnga po 'di rnams 'phel ba ni stobs lnga ru 'gyur te/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs te/_'di rnams ni stobs lnga'o/_/de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_
[\[77a.7\]]'di lta ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /_'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_kun nas 
[\[77b.2\]]nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i kun nas rnam par byang bar gyur pa dang /_chos rab tu 'byed pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sogs pa bsgom pa'o/_/de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i lta ba ni gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_bdag tu 
[\[77b.3\]]lta bas kun nas bslang ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_'tsho ba med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_skyes bu med pa dang /_gang zag med pa dang /_shed las skyes med pa dang /_shed bu med pa dang /_byed pa po med pa dang /_tshor ba po med pa'i lta bas 
[\[77b.4\]]kun nas bslang ba chang ba ma yin pa dang /_rtag par lta bas kun nas bslang ba ma yin pa dang /_srid pa dang bral ba'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba dang /_rigs su lung bstan pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba dang /_ji srid 'khor ba ma yin zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang ma 
[\[77b.5\]]yin pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i lta bar gsungs so/_/gang zhig yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i 
[\[77b.6\]]rtog pa gang zhig tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos kun nas slong ba de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par 'gyur te/_'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog par gsungs so/_/gang 
[\[77b.7\]]zhig tshig gis bdag la gdung bar mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya ba dang /_bdag la nyon mongs par mi bya zhing gzhan dag la nyon mongs par mi bya ba dang /_bdag la mi dpya zhing gzhan dag la yang dpya bar mi bya ba ste/_de mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]'gyur zhing /_gang gi tshig gis yang dag pa'i 'phags par 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces gsungs so/_/gang zhig las nag po dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_gang zhig las dkar ba 
[\[78a.2\]]dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_gang zhig las dkar po dang /_nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_gang zhig las dkar po dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po'i rnam par smin pa dang /_nag po 
[\[78a.3\]]zad pa'i bsam pas gnas pa de'i las mngon par 'du byed de/_dam pa'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mthar gsungs so/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta bur dul ba dang /_yon tan yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing 
[\[78a.4\]]dul ba dang /_kha gsag med pa dang /_mang du smra ba ma yin pa dang /_gtam la mi dga' ba dang /_rang gi spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang /_bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog par 'dzin pa dang /_'phags 
[\[78a.5\]]pa'i bka'i gnag bas 'tsho ba ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsungs so/_/rtsol ba ni gang zhig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_'phags pas ma gnang ba dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa rjes su bsten par mi 'dod pa ni rtsol ba ste/_rtsol ba 
[\[78a.6\]]gang zhig yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par 'jug cing mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang /_so so'i gnas su skyed par byed pa de ni rtsol bar yang dag par rjes su 'brang ba ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsungs so/_/gang la nye bar gnas pa de ni rab tu mi 
[\[78a.7\]]g.yo ba dang /_lus drang pos kyog po ma yin pa dang /_'khor ba'i skyon sna tshogs la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston cing /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas 'dod pa'i dran pa ni mi brjed pa ste/_'di ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o/_/'di ni yang dag pa'i dran 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]par gsungs so/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas te/_mya ngan las 'das pa mnan pa'o/_/'dis ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes gsungs so/_/de nyid yang 
[\[78b.2\]]dag bshad pa ni/_/dga' ba la sogs sa rnams te/_/dbang po la sogs rang bzhin gyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/_/phung po la sogs khyad par gyi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[78b.3\]]nyid ni mchog tu 'bab/_/byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/_/gang tshe 'dir ni gang gyur pa/_/dbang po phung po 'byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas de yi de ma thag_/rang lus nyid la sangs rgyas nyid/_/gzhan ni gang du'ang mi gnas so/_/lus las gzhan du sangs 
[\[78b.4\]]rgyas nyid/_/mi shes pa yis bsgribs par brjod/_/ye shes chen po rang lus gnas/_/rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/_/dngos po kun la khyab pa po/_/lus gnas lus la ma skyes pa'o/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/_/lus la rtsa du lags/_/bcom ldan 
[\[78b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas/_/brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lhag/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/rtsa rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog_/gsungs pa/_'di lta ste/_mi phyed ma zhes brjod pa dang /_phra gzugs ma dang /_rtse ba 
[\[78b.6\]]ma dang /_/g.yon pa ma dang /_thung ngu ma dang /_rus sbal skyes ma dang /_/sgom pa ma dang /_dbang ma dang /_skyon ma dang /_'jug ma dang /_/ma mo dang /_mtshan mo dang /_/bsil sbyin ma dang /_/tsha ba ma dang /[ {]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]dang /_/ro ma dang /_/kun 'dar ma dang /_/'bab ma dang /_
[\[78b.7\]]rangs ma dang /_mdog ma dang /_gzugs can ma dang /_spyi ma dang /_rgyu sbyin ma dang /_sbyor bral ma dang /_sdug gu ma dang /_grub ma dang /_'tshed ma dang /_de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang /_sum skor ma dang /_'dod ma dang /_khyim ma dang /_gtum mo dang /_bdud 'dra lam 'o/_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rtsa 'di dag ji lta bu lags/_srid gsum yongs su gyur pa ste/_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spang ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po 
[\[79a.2\]]lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthar thug pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'grel pa byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la de 
[\[79a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gsang ba'i ye shes bla med pa/_/snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen 
[\[79a.4\]]nas/_rgyud thams cad kyi snying po ye shes mar me rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos sems 
[\[79a.5\]]dpa' ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog_/'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/_/brtan pa rtag pa mchog tu yang /_/yid srub so sor skyes pa nyid/_/rtag tu rang bzhin mnan dka' ba/_/sna tshogs las kyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/sna tshogs cho ga 'dod pa yi/_/sangs 
[\[79a.6\]]rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs rnams/_/sems can rnams ni 'dul bar brjod/_/sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan dang g.yo/_/thams cad dngos po srid pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/'dis ni sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/
[\[79a.7\]]thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog_/sangs rgyas sogs pas 'dul ba'i phyir/_/dngos grub sems can kun don mchog_/rang gi ngo bos yongs bsgyur bas/_/bud med sgyu ma thams cad 'grub/_/sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/_/mkha' 'gro ma zhes kla klo'i skad/_/Dai bai hA ya 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]sar 'gro bar/_/skad dbyings 'di ni rnam par brtag_/nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pas/_/mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/_/kun nas sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/_/kun las sna tshogs sdom pa'o/_/rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin/_/nor bu nor 
[\[79b.2\]]bu 'dzin pa nyid/_/'di rnams kyi ni rigs rnams yin/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdul dang bral ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_/byang chub kyi sems 'di bka' stsal pa/_stong min stong pa min pa'ang min/_/
[\[79b.3\]]dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/_/shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/_/thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de/_/de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje thabs/_/shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/_/rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/_/dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang med/_/rnam rtog med 
[\[79b.4\]]pas rtag mos pas/_/brtag pa kun gyis brtag par bya/_/rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/_/sems can don ni yongs su brtag_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag chos/_/chos can med cing chos nyid med/_/sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid/_/de nas 'di ni chos 
[\[79b.5\]]ngag 'byung /_/de nas theg pa chen po las byung ba'i bsgom pas yon tan rgyas pa rnams kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/_/rnal 'byor gyi bdag po sems can grol bar mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 
[\[79b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/sems can bdag nyid skyes pa gcig par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i gti mug gcod par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de kho na nyid thams cad kyi ye shes gcig tu ston par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[79b.7\]]bdag rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/chos rnams thams cad gcig pa'i sku'i/_/snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid/_/de dang de 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]yi rang bzhin 'gyur/_/mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis/_/rtag par shin tu mnyam gzhag nyid/_/gang phyir thams cad bdag nyid kyi/_/rnam shes phung por gnas pa ni/_/skyes bu tha mal sems rmongs pa/_/la las so sor rtog mi nus/_/
[\[80a.2\]]sems dang sems byung sems kyi dngos/_/ye shes shes bya rang bzhin can/_/'bras bu rnams la byed pa nyid/_/chos dang chos can sgom pa nyid/_/gang phyir chos ni du mas ni/_/chu bo'i rgyun ni rgya mtsho ltar/_/thar pa nyid ni gcig pu yin/_/mang po dmigs par mi 'gyur 
[\[80a.3\]]ro/_/ji ltar nang du rnam gnas pa/_/bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur/_/de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du/_/gtan la phab pa rab bshad bya/_/sems can kun la mnyam pa'i phyir/_/gru gsum 
[\[80a.4\]]rgya che'i gzugs can nyid/_/tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas/_/de rnams kyi ni gnas su 'gyur/_/de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin/_/kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs can ma/_/de nyid yul las rnam par 'das/_/srog chags kun gyi snying la gnas/_/de phyir de rgyas ci zhig bya/_/
[\[80a.5\]]mdor bsdus pas ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med pas/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas gang thob pa/_/gang gis dam pa'i bde bas khyod/_/skye ba 'dir ni thob par 'gyur/_/yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'am/_/'dis ni dngos grub chen po brgyad/_/
[\[80a.6\]]gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa yang /_/gti mug chags dang nga rgyal dang /_/phrag dog dang ni nyon mongs lngas/_/sems can so sor bcings pa gang /_/rang gi yan lag nyid kyis 'joms/_/'dis ni 'gro drug sems can bcings/_/'khor bar 'khor zhing skye ba nyid/_/
[\[80a.7\]]nyon mongs pas ni rmongs gyur pas/_/sdig pa du ma byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir 'di bcom cang mkhyen nyid/_/sangs rgyas kyis sprul rigs pas ni/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung ba yi/_/sbyor bral sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/_/thabs dang shes rab sprul pa'i rgyus/_/nyon mongs 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]rnams ni yid ches 'gyur/_/mtshon pa 'di ni 'bras bur gyur/_/khams gsum du ni dri med snang /_/gang dang gang gis gnas gyur pa/_/de ni de yi ngo bo can/_/bud shing bsregs pa'i rigs pas ni/_/dgyes pa'i rgyal ba gar mkhan mchog_/phung po khams dang 
[\[80b.2\]]skye mched rnams/_/'di nyid rnam dag mtshon pa 'di/_/ji ltar dgra bo nus pa la/_/dgra bo nus pas de bsnun pa/_/gti mug dag pas gti mug ste/_/zhe sdang dag pas zhe sdang nyid/_/'dod chags dag pas 'dod chags te/_/nga rgyal rnam dag nga rgyal che/_/phrag dog 
[\[80b.3\]]dag pas phrag dog nyid/_/thams cad rnam dag rdor 'dzin mgon/_/de yi ngo bo rnam dag pa/_/nyon mongs lnga ni mnyam par 'gyur/_/de ltar rigs ni lnga rnams dang /_/ye shes lnga dang sangs rgyas lnga/_/'di las rdo rje snying po dang /_/khro bo khams gsum sems can 
[\[80b.4\]]skye/_/nang gi dbye ba 'di nyid ni/_/bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur/_/bla ma dman pa'i sems can rnams/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig shin tu gsal bas ni/_/'dzam gling de 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags/_/gru gsum dag pa e yi dbyibs/_/dbus 
[\[80b.5\]]su dgyes pa'i e ba~M yin/_/gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/_/rdo rje ra li rnam par byung /_/btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes kyang bya/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes byar bshad/_/de yi nang song pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas/_/de la a li ka li 'dres/_/sde tshan 
[\[80b.6\]]brgyad ni rnam par gnas/_/sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can gyi/_/las kyi tshogs ni byed par 'gyur/_/yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu nyid/_/rig byed rnams la nye bar gnas/_/sngags rnams nyid dang rgyud rnams dang /_/phyi rol tshul gyi bstan bcos kyi/_/rdo rje snying po'i rang 
[\[80b.7\]]bzhin 'di/_/gzhan du 'di las cung zad med/_/a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha/_/sde tshan dga' ba lnga bcu yang /_/mnyam pa dag tu sprul pa rnams/_/rdo rje ra li pad+mar son/_/'dab ma brgyad po phyogs rnams dang /_/mtshams rnams su ni 'di rnams rigs/_/de rnams dbus su ze 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]'bru la/_/dam pa'i dbang phyug ma yod do/_/sde tshan brgyad po rnams kyis ni/_/yi ge dam pa yongs su bskor/_/a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog_/don chen sde tshan gtso bo ni/_/lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni/_/'di nyid las ni yang dag 
[\[81a.2\]]byung /_/gang zhig ral gri mig sman dang /_/rkang byug ril bu rkang 'og dang /_/gnod sbyin mo yi yan lag ma/_/'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su rgyu/_/dngul chu'i 'gro bas rjes su 'brang /_/gang zhig thams cad mthu che ba/_/rang gi khyim du lnga bcu 'dod pa dang ldan par 
[\[81a.3\]]'grub bo/_/de ni sde tshan brgyad nang son/_/dbyangs mchog sde tshan bdag nyid 'byin/_/skye bo rnams kyi tshig rgyas pa/_/gang zhig cung zad rtogs bya ba/_/de kun sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni/_/de phyir rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/lus can rnams ni thams cad kyi/_/sgra ni 
[\[81a.4\]]sngags zhes brjod par bya/_/sna tshogs mdud pa'i gnas chen las/_/chos kyi ra li rnam par 'byung /_/dngos grub rdzu 'phrul rnam gnas pa'i/_/sngags dang nges pa gang yang med/_/rang bzhin gyis ni ma skyes pa'i/_/sngags kyi yig 'bru dbang phyug mchog_/yang 
[\[81a.5\]]dag sbyor byung mtshan nyid ni/_/de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya/_/e ni sa ru shes par bya/_/las kyi phyag rgya spyan ma nyid/_/snying rje chen mo thabs chen mo/_/rang bzhin sna tshogs spyod yul ma/_/lte bar sna tshogs 'dam skyes la/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lor rnam par gnas/_/
[\[81a.6\]]ba~M ni chu ru shes par bya/_/chos kyi phyag rgya mA ma kI/_/byams pa dang ni smon lam tshul/_/lha mo rdo rje'i rigs gtso ma/_/snying gar chu skyes 'dab brgyad la/_/chos kyi 'khor lor yang dag gnas/_/ma ni me ru brjod pa ste/_/phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo/_/dga' dang stobs 
[\[81a.7\]]kyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/lha mo pad+ma'i rigs byung ma/_/lkog mar chu skyes 'dab brgyad gnyis/_/longs spyod 'khor lor yang dag gnas/_/yA ni rlung gi rang bzhin te/_/nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms byed/_/dam tshig phyag rgya chen mor nges/_/lha mo las kyi rigs gtso 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]ma/_/btang snyoms ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/_/sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol ba mo/_/'dam skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/_/bde chen 'khor lo chen por gnas/_/e ni shes rab brjod par bya/_/ba~M ni thabs dang ldan pa nyid/_/ba~M gis rnam par brgyan pa nyid/_/e ni 
[\[81b.2\]]nges par mdzes par 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/_/steng dang 'og tu snyoms par 'jug_/e nyid dang ni ba~M nyid dag_/gnyis gnyis su ni brjod pa nyid/_/'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni de skad ces gsungs nas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud 
[\[81b.3\]]kyi tshogs la bsnyegs so zhes brjod do/_/bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni de skad du 'dod chags chen po 'di la rtag tu gnas pa'o/_/shru zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par gsungs so/_/ta zhes bya ba ni gang yang bde ba chen po'i mgon po'o/_/bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[81b.4\]]bdag nyid kyis thos pa'i phyir rna ba'i ye shes kyis thos pa yin gyi/_/rtogs pa ni ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das mi rtogs pa'i skyon gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sdud par byed pa dang 'chad pa po dag dbyer med par 'gyur ro/_/yang na 
[\[81b.5\]]rtogs pa nyid ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas nas 'chad pa po nyid sdud par byed pa yin te/_'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga /_/rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa dang /_/de dag ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_/gang du bde ba chen po'i mgon po gar mdzad pa'i tshe/_gcig nyid 
[\[81b.6\]]gcig dang du ma'i ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rol par mdzad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang cung zad gsungs pa de bdag gis gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig nyid la'o/_/gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig nyid la'o/_/thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par son pa ste/_/
[\[81b.7\]]'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa la lhag par mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed do zhes bya bar bsnyegs so/_/dus zhes bya ba ni dus tshod ces gsungs so/_/dus ni rnam pa gsum du brjod/_/bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal dus/_/bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid do/_/'o ma'i rgyun 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ltar sna bug tu/_/'ong ba bde ba'i dus su gsungs/_/me yi gzugs kyis 'gro ba nyid/_/sdug bsngal dus dang de gcig grags/_/gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin/_/dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/'dod chags med cing chags bral 
[\[82a.2\]]med/_/dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la 'dod chags nus mtshan nyid/_/'dod chags bral ba 'gog par gsungs/_/'di bral dbu mar mi rtog pas/_/'di gsum dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags nyid dang chags bral nyid/_/'dres 
[\[82a.3\]]par gyur pa rnyog pa med/_/de bzhin 'dod chags chags bral las/_/ro mnyam gcig pu'i skad cig ma/_/dngos po kun gyi ro mnyam pa/_/bsgom pa'i dus ni gcig tu gsungs/_/'di lta ste/_dbang phyug dang /_gzugs dang /_grags pa dang /_dpal dang /_
[\[82a.4\]]ye shes dang /_brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste/_b+ha ga drug ces gsungs so/_/de 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/_/yang na gang zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos de rnams bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[82a.5\]]cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rnams dang /_de rnams nyid kyi snying po dang /_de nyid kyi rdo rje dang /_de nyid kyi btsun mo dang /_de'i b+ha ga de la bzhugs so/_/kye bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes bya bas ci gsungs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[82a.6\]]stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro gcig pa thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo'i yid 'phrog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i rang bzhin gang gi chos kyi 'byung 
[\[82a.7\]]gnas la/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag gis thos pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab gang gis nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa de'i phyir shes rab b+ha gar gsungs te/_b+ha ga der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo lhan 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]cig tu bzhugs so/_/e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/kun mkhyen ye shes bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde don gang /_/btsun mo nye bar mdzad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru ni/_chos kyi thog mar rtag tu yang dag 
[\[82b.2\]]par gnas pa ste/_dag pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub skyed par byed pa'o/_/lag na rdo rjes ma bshad pa de ngas khyod la bshad do/_/tshig 'bru 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las pha rol tu shin tu ring bar 'gro ba mngon du 
[\[82b.3\]]mtshon par mdzad pa dang /_mngon du ma mdzad pa de nub pa'i sems kyis skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas nyid dam/_rdo rje sems dpa' 'thob par 'gyur te/_gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ma thob pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa ste sangs rgyas yin no/_/mtshan 
[\[82b.4\]]gzhi mtshon par byed pa ni sems dpar yang dag par gsungs te/_sdang bas bsten pa tsam gyis mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur bas na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyi ro spang bar bya'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi srid pa'i 'jigs 
[\[82b.5\]]pa las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po dpal dang ldan pas dag pa'i sems sgom par byed de/_thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba 'dis ji ltar yang dag par thob pa dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mtshan gzhi thabs dang shes rab kyi nus pas nam mkha' dang mnyam 
[\[82b.6\]]zhing gnas gsum du snang ba ste/_de'i mtshan gzhi ni mtshon par dka' ba dang /_thams cad du son zhing rgyu dang rkyen spangs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur 'jig rten gyi rang dang gzhan gyi don byed de dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog go/_/rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang ba 
[\[82b.7\]]dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste dang po rdzogs so//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/_/sgrub pa po la phan don du/_/gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/_/cho ga yang ni bshad par bya/_/dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi/_/rnal 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang /_/'bad pas hU~M las rdo rje can/_/byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri/_/tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang yang /_/khang stong dang ni khyim nang du/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya/_/
[\[83a.2\]]rdul tshon dam pa nyid dang ni/_/yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te/_/rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid phyes/_/yang na 'bras la sogs pas bri/_/dkyil 'khor khru gsum bya ba dang /_/mthe bong gsum ni lhag par bya/_/der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/_/rig ma bzang po 
[\[83a.3\]]gzhug par bya/_/sngags kyi lam gyi rjes btsal bas/_/gang tshe mkhas pas dbang bskur ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du/_/dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs gnas su/_/'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas bdag/_/blo dang ldan pas de bzhin blang /_/
[\[83a.4\]]rang byin brlab pa'i gnas thob pas/_/dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa yis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam las/_/sngags kyi lam ni de bzhin gsungs/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/_/dam tshig rim pa shin tu ring /_/de phyir don kun la 'bad 
[\[83a.5\]]pas/_/dbang don rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes/_/rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho/_/ji bzhin sbyor bas gsol ba gdab/_/yang nam dang sring bu mo/_/bu sring mo yi bu mo nyid/_/'di nang gang de ji lta bar/_/rnyed nas bsgrub pa nyid du gyis/_/yang na mngon du 'di med na/_/
[\[83a.6\]]kun mkhyen gyis bsngags rig ma ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyab mdzad pa/_/de ni de phyir gzung bar bya/_/skye ba gnyis kyi bu mo dang /_/yang na btso blag ma dang /_yang na gdol pa mo dang /_/g.yung mo dang /_/rigs las skyes ma dang /_/yang na rgyal mo dang /_/gar 
[\[83a.7\]]mkhan gyi bu mo dang /_bzo mo dang /_yang na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mig ma dang /_rked pa phra ba dang /_ro smad rgyas pa dang /_nu ma mtho ba dang /_b+ha ga bzang ba dang /_dam tshig gi spyod pa la shin tu dam pa dang /_de kho na la gnas pa dang /_sngags dang rgyud shes pa ste/_sgrub pa po'i 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]dbang po la gnas gsum du che ba'i bu mo 'di dag bshad do/_/rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis 'di rnams kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ma rnyed ji ltar gang rnyed de/_/de bzhin bcu drug lon pa nyid/_/dang po'i lang tsho phun sum tshogs/_/mig mdzes phyag rgya rnyed nas 
[\[83b.2\]]ni/_/rig ma de nyid blangs nas ni/_/skyabs su 'gro ba'i rim pas ni/_/sbyangs nas de nyid gsang ba dang /_/sngags dang rgyud kyi rim kun bsgrags/_/sgra 'am 'og gi lam du lces/_/de nyid de bzhin steng du gzhug/_/kun gyi cha rigs sna tshogs byed/_/rim pa nyid 
[\[83b.3\]]kyis rna cha dang /_ska rags che dang se mo do/_/lag gdub dang ni rkang gdub ldan/_/de ltar dngos grub dam pa ster/_/gang zhig sbyangs pa'i rig ma kun/_/nye bar 'tshe ba med gnas su/_/rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor mang po/_/de nas tsan dan gos phreng sogs/_/rnam 
[\[83b.4\]]par brgyan nas dbul bar bya/_/dri dang phreng sogs rim gro yi/_/'o ma'i mchog sogs rgyas pas ni/_/phyag rgya thabs cig sgrub pa pos/_/gus par 'bad pas yang dag mchod/_/slob mas bus po'i lha nga ni/_/sa la dad pas btsugs nas ni/_/thal mo sbyar 
[\[83b.5\]]nas bstod pa 'dis/_/ston pa la ni zhu ba bya/_/stong pa'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs/_/ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa can/_/dag pa'i de nyid 
[\[83b.6\]]don ston mdzad/_/bdag med chos las byung ba yi/_/rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems/_/pha rol phyin pa'i yon tan rnams/_/mgon po las ni rtag tu byung /_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/dkon mchog gsum 
[\[83b.7\]]dang theg chen dang /_/de bzhin bstan dang 'gro ba dang /_/khams gsum po ni 'di dag kun/_/'gro ba'i dpa' bo phyag 'tshal bstod/_/yid bzhin nor bu ltar gyur pa'i/_/'gro ba'i 'dod pa'i don grub phyir/_/dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad/_/sangs 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]rgyas sras po phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nyid bla med bdag 'tshal bas/_/yon tan mtsho khyod bka' drin las/_/kun mkhyen rdo rje dbang gis ni/_/da lta nyid du bka' drin skyobs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/_/ji ltar dpal thugs rdo rje yis/_/
[\[84a.2\]]rdo rje chos can la gsungs ltar/_/de bzhin mgon pos bdag la skyobs/_/bcom ldan zhabs pad spangs nas ni/_/gzhan du bdag la 'gro ma mchis/_/'khor ba'i 'gro las nges rgyal bar/_/de phyir mgon pos thugs rje mdzod/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon dpal/_/rjes 
[\[84a.3\]]su brtse bcas phan sems kyis/_/slob la snying rje bskyed nas ni/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang /_/'dod yon lnga yis gang ba dang /_/bla re bres pas nye bar 'bar/_/rnal 'byor ma dang sbyor ldan zhing /_/dril bu sil sil sgra dang ni/_/me tog bdug 'khyil 
[\[84a.4\]]nyams dga' ba/_/lha yi dri phreng bde ba'i mchog_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i/_/dkyil 'khor mchog tu ngo mtshar bar/_/slob dpon skal ba bzang po mchog_/de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas/_/rgyal ba'i bdag skyes byang chub sems/_/pad+ma'i snod du 
[\[84a.5\]]gzhug par bya/_/rnga yab g.yob cing gdugs dang ni/_/bkra shis tshigs bcad glu rnams kyis/_/phyag rgya ldan pas slob ma de/_/'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya/_/slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis/_/dbang ni rin chen mchog byin nas/_/bzang po'i rang 
[\[84a.6\]]bzhin legs sbyangs pa'i/_/dam tshig yid 'ong nges par sbyin/_/khrag chen dang ni ga bur bcas/_/tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dang /_/rigs kyi bdag po'i chu ldan zhing /_/lnga pa sems las yang dag byung /_/'di rnams dam tshig yang dag par/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[84a.7\]]kyis nye bar gsungs/_/bzang po rtag tu bskyang bar gyis/_/sdom pa yang ni da ltar nyon/_/srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing /_/bud med rin chen yongs mi spang /_/des na slob dpon spang mi bya/_/sdom pa shin tu 'da' bar dka'/_/gang du gsungs pa'i rig ma'am/_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma/_/dag cing sprul pa'i rig ma ni/_/si hA ga bur bsgos pa ni/_/ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/_/de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya/_/phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang /_/thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te/_/bstan pas yang dag gang byung ba/_/
[\[84b.2\]]slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya/_/ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid/_/de nyid la ni bya bar bshad/_/rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur/_/rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/_/mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/_/dngos dang dngos min bdag nyid mchog_/thabs dang shes 
[\[84b.3\]]rab rnam par 'dres/_/'dod chags 'dod chags bral bas 'dres/_/de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog_/de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid/_/de nyid 'di ni kun khyab byed/_/de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes can/_/he ru ka dpal zhes byar brjod/_/gzhan rnams gang rnams de 
[\[84b.4\]]rnams dang /_/dngos dang dngos med de las byung /_/dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ste/_/mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma/_/shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/_/de bde thabs las thams cad rig_/dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/_/mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'i grangs/_/
[\[84b.5\]]gsum pa dga' bral dga' bar bshad/_/bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod/_/de yang dbang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang /_/gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang /_/gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/_/bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems kyi 
[\[84b.6\]]dbang gis ni/_/slob ma sdig pa bral ba yin/_/sangs rgyas grong khyer mchog sngon du/_/de nas de la gnang ba sbyin/_/byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/_/phyogs kun du ni 'khor lo ni/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/_/kun tu mchog tu rab tu bskor/_/thabs dang shes 
[\[84b.7\]]rab rang bzhin bdag_/yid bzhin nor bu ltar mthong nas/_/sbyor med bral zhing ma zhum pas/_/sems can don ni da ltar gyis/_/dbang dang bka' gnang thob nas ni/_/bya ba byas par rab 'dzum zhing /_/'gro ba dga' bar byed pa yi/_/shin tu snyan pa'i tshig 'di 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]brjod/_/deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/_/bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas/_/de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skye/_/da ni sangs rgyas rigs su 'gyur/_/bskal pa rgya mtshor 'jigs chen por/_/mnar med skye ba yang dag 'khrugs/_/nyon mongs 
[\[85a.2\]]'dam ni brgal dka' las/_/bdag ni mgon po khyed kyis bsgral/_/khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las/_/theg pa rdzogs pa lta bur bdag_/bag chags thams cad bral bas na/_/bdag la byang chub 'tshal ma mchis/_/rangs shing mig ni phye ba yis/_/zhabs la 
[\[85a.3\]]'jus nas gus par bya/_/gang dang gang zhig sdug pa'i rdzas/_/re ba med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/de dang de nyid dbul bar bya/_/bla ma'ang snying rje ldan pas ni/_/slob ma bsdu ba'i bsam pa'i phyir/_/de la phan pa'i bsam pas bzung /_/de nas phyag 'tshal mchod nas ni/_/
[\[85a.4\]]bla ma la ni yon rnams dbul/_/gser ni stong phrag brgya dang ni/_/rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/gos ni zung 'gyur brgya nyid dang /_/glang po rta dang yul 'khor nyid/_/rna cha dang ni rkang gdub dang /_/nor bu dang ni sor gdub sogs/_/gser las byas pa'i mchod 
[\[85a.5\]]phyir thogs/_/rang gi chung ma bu mo dang /_/bran pho bran mo sring mo nyid/_/phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bar bya/_/bdag gi dngos po thams cad kyis/_/blo dang ldan pas bla mar dbul/_/de ring tshun chad bdag bran du/_/khyod la bdag ni dbul lags zhes/_/de ltar zhu ba byas 
[\[85a.6\]]gyur pas/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas/_/da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/bdag la bka' drin legs par skyobs/_/ji ltar bla med byang chub de/_/byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bsgrubs/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas/_/kun mchog mchod pa 
[\[85a.7\]]bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can gnas gsum 'khor ba rnams/_/de nyid la ni gzhag par bgyi/_/dbang chog 'dis sbyin par bya zhing slob ma'i lhag par mos pa dang /_/zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rig pas lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis shes par byas nas tshig nyid kyis 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dbang rin po che sbyin par bya'o/_/gang thob dbang rab mchog ni rigs kyi bdag por gzung ba rnyed par dka' zhing mtshungs pa med par gdams/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing gi dpal dag blang bar byas pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba/_/bka' yi 
[\[85b.2\]]gnang ba rnyed nas 'jig rten gsum gyi dgra bo las rgyal rtsom pa'i go bgos pa yi blos/_/byang chub dag la dgod pa'i sangs rgyas 'dir ni de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni dri ma med par spyod/_/byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//
[\[85b.3\]]de nas thabs dang shes rab don/_/bsgom pa yang dag rab bshad bya/_/pha rol don brtson brtson 'grus kyi/_/sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las/_/bsgral dka' gang zhig rnam bsgoms pas/_/rnal 'byor pas ni rang don du/_/
[\[85b.4\]]mya ngan 'das par gnas mi 'gyur/_/gang gis khyad 'phags mthar thug par/_/sangs rgyas dri med ngo mtshar ra rmad/_/'grib dang 'phel las rnam par grol/_/byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/_/phung po lnga sogs chos rnams dang /_/theg gsum shin tu spang mi 
[\[85b.5\]]bya/_/chos dbyings shin tu mnyam pa nyid/_/chu shing lta bur yongs su gzung /_/stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste/_/stong min bsgom par mi bya'o/_/stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas/_/stong min yongs su mi spang ngo /_/stong dang stong min gzung ba las/_/rtog pa nyung min skye 
[\[85b.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/yongs su spangs na kun rtog ste/_/de phyir de gnyis yongs su spang /_/gnyis kyis gzung ba yongs spangs pa/_/rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste/_/nga zhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di/_/de phyir de ni yang dag spang /_/rnam pa med cing dogs pa med/_/'dod pa med 
[\[85b.7\]]cing sdig pa bral/_/thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol/_/nam mkha' lta bur mkhas pas bsgom/_/snying rje ldan pas sems can la/_/rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya zhing /_/sems can yod dang yod min zhes/_/de ltar yongs su brtag mi bya/_/spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]shes rab ces ni rab tu grags/_/yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i/_/thams cad don byed snying rje nyid/_/dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang /_/dmigs med snying rje chen po nyid/_/blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa/_/nam mkhar nam mkha' ji lta 
[\[86a.2\]]ba'o/_/gang la sgom pa po yang med/_/gang yang rnam par sgom pa'ang med/_/bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min pa/_/de yi de nyid sgom par brjod/_/gang yang bya ba yod min 'dir/_/bza' bya nyid kyang yod ma yin/_/byed po bza' las rnam par grol/_/don dam rnam par 
[\[86a.3\]]bsgoms pas na/_/'di la sgrub po gang yang med/_/gang yang stong par byed pa med/_/dor ba cung zad med par brjod/_/blang ba'ang cung zad yod ma yin/_/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_/sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang /_/'phrog pa zla ba'i grong khyer mtshungs/_/rmi lam rtse 
[\[86a.4\]]ba lta bur blta/_/sgyu ma ji bzhin thams cad du/_/blta ba nyid dang reg par bya/_/'gro ba thams cad gnas pa ni/_/gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/sbyor ba 'dus pas bsam mi khyab/_/rmi lam sad pa lta bu ni/_/ji ltar gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis ni/_/dbang po gnyis 
[\[86a.5\]]ni 'dus pa yis/_/b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/_/ye shes ci zhig skye zhe na/_/thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med/_/rang gis rig pa'i ye shes de/_/gzhan du smra bar mi nus so/_/gzugs rnams thams cad lta ba dang /_/sgra rnams nyid 
[\[86a.6\]]kyang nyan pa dang /_/smra ba dang ni rgod pa dang /_/sna tshogs ro ni za ba dang /_/las rnams thams cad byed pa ni/_/gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro bas/_/de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/_/rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/'di ni gnyis su med par brjod/_/'di ni byang chub 
[\[86a.7\]]sems mchog nyid/_/rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid/_/'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/pha rol phyin pa kun gyi dngos/_/mnyam nyid bsam bya nyid du gsungs/_/sangs rgyas kun mchog bsgom bya nyid/_/'gro ba brtan dang 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]g.yo ba'i bdag_/byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs/_/de nyid las ni thams cad skyes/_/dngos dang dngos med sbyor bral ba/_/rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba/_/bsgoms na myur du 
[\[86b.2\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/ma lus skyon la sdang ba dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs des/_/dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan rnams/_/mtha' yas de las skye par 'gyur/_/kun rtog mang po'i mun pas khyab gyur pa'i/_/rab tu 'joms pas smyo zhing blo 'gyu ba/_/chags 
[\[86b.3\]]sogs dgag dka'i dri mas gos gyur pa'i/_/sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal rtog las rnam par grol/_/'dod chags las sogs dri mas gos bral ba'i/_/gzung ba dang ni 'dzin med sems dpa' mchog_/de nyid mya ngan 'das pa 
[\[86b.4\]]mchog tu gsungs/_/sdug bsngal phung po du ma'i mtshan gyur pa/_/'di las gzhan du cung zad yod ma yin/_/bde ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa/_/de las gzhan du grol ba'ang yod ma yin/_/sdug bsngal ma lus zad par 'dod pa dang /_/rdzogs sangs 
[\[86b.5\]]rgyas kyi bde mchog thob 'dod pas/_/sems ni brtan par byas nas 'bad pas dpyad/_/de yi rang bzhin dngos po med par byed/_/ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa'i yol stug po/_/skye dgu'i yid bsgribs sdug bsngal mtha' yas la/_/ji srid de nas de ni bral yin te/_/de 
[\[86b.6\]]srid bde ba rgya chen tha dad min/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug 'phags dgyes pa'i/_/de yi zad phyir rang gi bya ba yang /_/rgyas pa de yi yan lag 'gro ba blta/_/de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyi nges pa byas nas bka'i gnang ba dang /_rang gi dam tshig la 
[\[86b.7\]]gnas pas sgom par byed na lag pa'i phyag rgya dang /_sngags dang sku gzugs kyi nga rgyal bsgom pa dang /_dam tshig gi thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes pas ci zhig bya/_sangs rgyas nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshon pa mngon du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor yin te 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bskyed pa dang /_de mtshon pa na gnas gsum po nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gzhung thams cad spangs nas thob pa'i gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor de la brtson pas rang rig pa tsam la spro bas nyin dang mtshan du goms par bya'o/_/
[\[87a.2\]]ri'i rtse mo dang /_zhi ba'i gnas dang /_pad+ma'i tshal dang /_rgyal po'i tshal dang /_dben pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang /_rang gi khyim mam/_sems la mngon par 'dod pa thams cad mkhyen pas sngags pa 'di'i nang du gang dang gang gi gnas der gnas shing 
[\[87a.3\]]sngags shes pa spro ba dang ldan pa des sgom par byed de/_thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs par sangs rgyas nyid mngon du thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir shes rab ma dngos su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa bzang mo spang bar mi bya ste/_phyag rgya re re dang 
[\[87a.4\]]ldan pa 'di ma gtogs par dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir ye shes skyed pa yi/_/phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyar bar bya/_/gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste/_/zhe sdang phyag rgya chen por brjod/_/phrag dog las kyi phyag rgya ste/_/'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya bdag_/yo 
[\[87a.5\]]gis phyag rgya sna tshogs 'di/_/bskyed nas rig ma bza' bar bya/_/de la gnyis ka yang lha'i gzugs su mngon du bsams nas gti mug las zhi ba dang /_khro ba las ma rungs pa dang /_'do chags las chags pas las rnams byed do/_/de'i don du rab tu byed 
[\[87a.6\]]pa lnga po 'di rnams kyis rgyal ba rnams yin no/_/snga dro dang /_nyi ma'i mtha' dang /_nyi ma phyed dang /_/nam phyed kyi dus su yang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/_/mnyam par sbyor ba las gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[87a.7\]]skye bo gdug pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems 'ba' zhig de bsams pas sems la lhag par mos pa mngon du bya'o/_/gang zhig yang rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus kyi 'bad pas rnal 'byor 'di bsgrub par bya'o/_/shes rab mngon du ma rnyed na byol 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]song dag la'ang rtag tu goms par bya'o/_/de ltar gang zhig rnal 'byor pas gal te pad+ma 'dzin pa la mngon du nyi ma re re'am/_zla ba so so'am/_lo la reg par mi byed na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig nyams pas rnal 'byor pa bag med
