[\[87b.2\]]pa skye bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig blang bar byas na yang mi byed par sdom pa gzung bar bya ste/_de'i phyir kun gyis sdom pa dang ldan zhing de kho na la gnas pas phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/_/gsang ba'i nye ba'i rdzas dang sngags dang rgyud 
[\[87b.3\]]kyis 'di skad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rtag tu nye bar 'dug ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gnas gsum po rtse gcig pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o/_/thabs dang shes rab kyi don bsgom pa 
[\[87b.4\]]zhes bya ba gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi/_/rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag bshad/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i/_/thams cad las ni sna tshogs byed/_/gsang ba mchog gi 
[\[87b.5\]]dgyes pa na/_/thams cad bdag nyid 'di la bsgrub/_/rnam par bral dang gnas su yang /_/rang gi tshal sogs rnams su yang /_/kun las sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/_/kun las sna tshogs sdom pas ni/_/kun las sna tshogs bya ba rnams/_/ji 
[\[87b.6\]]ltar bde bar bsgrub par bya/_/bde gshegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid/_/khro bo'i sgrub thabs thams cad dang /_/zhi ba rnams kyi lha rnams la/_/ci zhig nga yis bshad par bya/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas gar/_/
[\[87b.7\]]bsgom pa lha yi rnal 'byor dang /_/sngags kyi bzlas pa'i chog rim dang /_/bris sku 'am ni sku gzugs kyang /_/sems kyis thams cad sprul pa ste/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/_/nga yis rgyud du bsgrags pa yin/_/stong nyid gcig las rdo rje can/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bskyed pa'i yig 'bru gzugs dang ni/_/phyag rgya dbyibs kyi chog rim dang /_/sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga yang /_/gang gis sgrub pos 'grub 'gyur ba/_/
[\[88a.2\]]gtso bo shin tu dga' chen pos/_/bka' drin gyis ni bskyab tu gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang por byams pa bsgom par bya/_/gnyis par snying rje rnam par bsgom/_/gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang /_/kun gyi tha mar 
[\[88a.3\]]btang snyoms so/_/yang ni stong pa'i byang chub sems/_/gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/_/gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs/_/bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod/_/re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas/_/nyi der hU~M byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/_/rdo rje de nyid 
[\[88a.4\]]kyis ni ra ba dang /_/gur yang cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya/_/dang por ro ni bsgom par bya/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod/_/de steng rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/_/he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/_/rang gi snying gar re pha bsgom/_/de las byung ba'i nyi 
[\[88a.5\]]dkyil 'khor/_/der ni hU~M gi dbyibs nyid ni/_/thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/_/kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/_/hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje nyid/_/rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/_/yang ni hU~M gi de nyid bsgom/_/de nyid yongs su gyur bltas nas/_/
[\[88a.6\]]zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje skye ba dpa' bo che/_/'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba 'am/_/yang na sngo dang nyi ma ltar/_/dad pas nges par bsgom par bya/_/nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/_/rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/_/rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa 
[\[88a.7\]]yi/_/lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya/_/dkar mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mtshan pa 'dzin/_/chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod/_/ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/_/g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing /_/puk+ka sI ni rdo rje lag_/de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/_/gdol ba mo ni cang te'u rdung /_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]g.yung mo sku la 'khyud pa ste/_/mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis/_/'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/_/de nas gnas las rnam grol ba'i/_/chos rnams kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/A li zla ba kA li nyi/_/sa bon nang du son rig pa/_/de nyid sems 
[\[88b.2\]]dpa' zhes byar brjod/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/_/nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/_/rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro/_/bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa na/_/yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi nang 
[\[88b.3\]]son par/_/de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/hU~M skyes sngo dang nyi ma ltar/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/_/spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ser/_/sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi dbyibs/_/'jigs byed mnan 
[\[88b.4\]]cing g.yon pa na/_/rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid dang /_/thod pa yang ni g.yon pa na/_/g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/_/hU~M ni 'don par byed pa'i bdag_/lha mo brgyad kyis bskor nas ni/_/dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[88b.5\]]bdud rtsi sdom pa kun/_/de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/khro bo'i gzugs ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par brgyan/_/bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/_/dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin no/_/sngar gsungs 
[\[88b.6\]]dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gnas/_/hU~M gi sa bon las byung ba'i/_/g.yon na thod pa lha dang ni/_/lha min khrag gis bkang ba dang /_/g.yas na rdo rje me lta bus/_/'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/_/gzhan pa yi ni phyag dag gis/_/lus 
[\[88b.7\]]la yang dag 'khyud pa nyid/_/shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan bsgom/_/dang por stong pa bsgom bya zhing /_/gnyis pa la ni cha bral nyid/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/hU~M ni der ni bsgom par bya/_/
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug par/_/lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya/_/dang po'i zhal ni dkar min zhing /_/g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba nyid/_/g.yon pa dmar po lta bu ste/_/spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can nyid/_/
[\[89a.2\]]rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang /_/thod pa'i gdan la yang dag gnas/_/bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams kyi/_/thod pa phyag gis bzung ba dang /_/gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/_/de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/_/dang po rdo rje 'bar ba nyid/_/gsum par de 
[\[89a.3\]]bzhin rtse gsum pa/_/dpal ldan shes rab 'khyud pa dang /_/ral pa'i cod pan brgyan pa ste/_/sprin gyi 'od 'bar du ma ni/_/sangs rgyas dam tshig spro bar bya/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos/_/der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/lha mo lhan cig ldan par ni/_/de 
[\[89a.4\]]nas phyag rgya bsgom par bya/_/thod pa'i stan la gnas par ni/_/'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya/_/sna tshogs gzugs ma yid 'ong ma/_/zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/dang por rig ma bri bar bya/_/gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin ma mdzes/_/thod pa khu bas gang ba dang /_/
[\[89a.5\]]lcags kyu lag pas 'dzin pa mo'o/_/gnyis pa rtse gsum lag pa dang /_/khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /_/rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid/_/gsum pa lag par ral gri dang /_/thod pa chu yis gang ba dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/_/bzhi pa kha T+wAM ga lag 
[\[89a.6\]]ma/_/g.yon pa'i lag pas thod pa nyid/_/mu suN+DI dang ba dan gsum/_/lnga pa zhags pa'i lag pa dang /_/thod pa lag pas bzung ba dang /_/de bzhin ut+pal cang te'u nyid/_/drug pa'i lag pas pad+ma dang /_/thod pa tshil gyis gang ba dang /_/de bzhin me 
[\[89a.7\]]long dgra sta nyid/_/bdun pa 'phang mdung lag pa dang /_/dung dang 'khor lo'i mtshon cha 'dzin/_/thod pa khrag gis gang bar ni/_/khru gang tsam du yang dag bri/_/brgyad pa bum pa'i lag pa dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/_/thod pa skyes pa'i pags pa yis/_/
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]bkab pa rdzas kyis gang ba ni/_/ze 'brur bde ba chen po dang /_/'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya/_/rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu dang /_/rdo rje zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje dril bu 
[\[89b.2\]]nyid/_/sgo yi skyong ba yang dag khri/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom bya zhing /_/phyis ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsams/_/hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/oM ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba nyid/_/A ni ngag dang yang dag ldan/_/shel ni dag pa lta bu nyid/_/hrIHni de la 
[\[89b.3\]]yang dag sbyar/_/de bzhin du yang swA hA nyid/_/sngags kyis bzlas par yang dag gsungs/_/bsam gtan yi ge gcig po nyid/_/lha mo rnams kyi hrIHnyid ni/_/'dab ma rnams la de nas dgod/_/mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis/_/sa bon bzhi 
[\[89b.4\]]dang yang dag ldan/_/sgo yi skyong ba thams cad du/_/dang po dbyangs yig la sogs ldan/_/b+ha ga nyid du sgrub pa pos/_/de nas rdo rje gzhug par bya/_/hrIHyi rnam pa nyid dang yang /_/de la hU~M ni brjod par bya/_/zla mtshan dus su khrag bcas pa'i/_/
[\[89b.5\]]khu ba kha yis bza' bar bya/_/bdag nyid dang ni b+ha ga la/_/me tog dri yis mchod par bya/_/gal te sgrub po grub 'dod na/_/de nyid la ni bzlas par bya/_/rdo rje drag mo de bzhin gcig_/de bzhin rdo rje gzugs brnyan gnyis/_/gsum pa rdo rje 'dod chags 
[\[89b.6\]]ma/_/bzhi pa rdo rje zhi ba ma/_/lnga pa rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/_/drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/bdun pa sgra yi rdo rje ma/_/de bzhin brgyad pa rdo rje sa/_/gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi/_/rim pa ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/_/
[\[89b.7\]]zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/_/srung dang de bzhin mngon spyod nyid/_/re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo yi/_/phyi rol mu khyud nyid du bya/_/'khor lo las kyi kha dog sogs/_/mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya/_/o~M tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/_/'di yis sa bon 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]thams cad kyis/_/phyag 'tshal sreg blugs tha ma ni/_/dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya/_/srung ba'i tshig kyang rnam par bya/_/mnyam nyid ye shes stong pas ni/_/bdag nyid kyi ni gzugs su bya/_/mnyam nyid kun rig gnas su ni/_/
[\[90a.2\]]srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar bya ba/_/srung ba ye shes can gyis bsgom/_/'jigs pa thams cad ring du byed/_/sems can dngos po med na ni/_/rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/pad+ma'i gdan ni bsam par 
[\[90a.3\]]bya/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster mar/_/bdag gi lus ni bsgom par bya/_/o~M tA re swA hA/_/mgo bo la'o/_/o~M tA re swA hA/_mig dag la'o/_/o~M tA re swA hA/_sna dag la'o/_/o~M tu swA hA/_rna ba dag la'o/_/o~M re swA hA/_lce la'o/_/o~M tA ri ni swA hA/_snying gar ro/_/
[\[90a.4\]]yan lag drug ni rnam par gzung /_/'phags ma sgrol ma bsam par bya/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/kun la skyabs sbyin lag pa dang /_/g.yon pa ut+pal lta bu mchog_/sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul 
[\[90a.5\]]ba yis/_/lha rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/oM ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA/_/las thams cad pa'i sngags so/_/dgra dang rgyal pos bcings pa dang /_/'gro ba'i shin tu 'jigs pa'i dug_/yan lag rims ni sna tshogs dang /_/dug sogs dus min 'chi 
[\[90a.6\]]ba yi/_/'jigs pa'i gnas ni gang gang la/_/de dang de la rab sbyar bya/_/shes rab chub pa blo ldan par/_/srung ba bris nas gzung bar bya/_/srung ba bzang po 'di nyid ni/_/'jigs pa thams cad du ni spangs/_/srung ba 'di ni thams cad las/_/
[\[90a.7\]]rnal 'byor de nyid gong na med/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/_/de yi dbus su hrIHnyid ni/_/kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'od/_/de nas bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/mda' dang 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gzhu yi lag pa ma/_/ut+pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin/_/'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/_/'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/_/khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid/_/bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs/_/
[\[90b.2\]]'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin/_/'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid/_/brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid/_/'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa 'di/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/_/mnyam nyid gzugs su bsams nas ni/_/khams 
[\[90b.3\]]gsum gyi ni rang bzhin gyis/_/sngar gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/gong du gsungs pas bsgrub par bya/_/shes rab 'bar ba'i las rnams ni/_/'di yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/_/o~M pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye hU~M swA hA/_/dngos po'i ngo bos bsgom 
[\[90b.4\]]par bya/_/'od zer 'bar ba du ma yi/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/kha dog dkar po 'od gsal ma/_/shes 
[\[90b.5\]]rab bdag nyid gzung bar bya/_/'di yi sa bon bzlas nas ni/_/shes rab 'dab ma lta bur 'phel/_/gu ba'am blo ni dman pa yi/_/shes rab 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor ro/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/yi ge de la dgod par bya/_/thod pa'i 
[\[90b.6\]]gdan gyi dbus gnas par/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/zhi ba'i 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin/_/thod pa dang ni zhags pa nyid/_/de bzhin 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs par/_/kun tu rnam par spro bar bya/_/'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni/_/rin chen 'byung gnas 
[\[90b.7\]]bsgom par bya/_/btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/_/sku mdog ser po gzi brjid che/_/thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/dpa' bo rin chen lcags kyu 'dzin/_/thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid/_/'dir ni rnal 'byor rim 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pas ni/_/pad+ma rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i 'od/_/dpa' bo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing /_/thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/_/pad+ma zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid/_/rgyan rnams 
[\[91a.2\]]kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/don yod phyag na ral gri 'dzin/_/thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs par/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang /_/lcags kyu dag ni g.yas pas 'phyar/_/bai DUr+ya ltar 
[\[91a.3\]]ljang gu ste/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/de yi nang son sa bon ni/_/bru~M las spyan gyi dbyibs su ni/_/thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/_/phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam 
[\[91a.4\]]par brgyan/_/'khor lo'i lag pa mda' dang gzhu/_/de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/_/zhags pa ral gri thod pa nyid/_/spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang /_/do shal dang ni rkang gdub brgyan/_/kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes/_/
[\[91a.5\]]de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyan nyid/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs gang ba/_/de yi nang son bsam par bya/_/hU~M las mA ma kI yi dbyibs/_/thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/_/kha dog sngon mo 'bar chen mo/_/spyan gsum 
[\[91a.6\]]ma la zhal gcig ma/_/thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid/_/lcags kyu dang ni ral gri nyid/_/zhags pa rdo rje de bzhin du/_/dril bu dang ni thod pa'o/_/'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang /_/kha T+wAM ga dang bcu gnyis ni/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[91a.7\]]dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/der ni hrIHni bsam bya zhing /_/gos dkar zhes bya rnam par bsgom/_/thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/_/kha dog 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]dmar mo 'bar chen mo/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs gang ba/_/phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa dang /_/pad+ma'i lag par ral gri dang /_/thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang /_/zhags pa de bzhin rin chen nyid/_/do shal dang ni rkang gdub 
[\[91b.2\]]sgra/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgoms na/_/myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/de yi nang song tA~M nyid ni/_/sgrol ma'i dbyibs su 
[\[91b.3\]]bsam par bya/_/thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/_/phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/_/ral gri phyag na chags bcas ma/_/ut+pal de bzhin lcags kyu dang /_/thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang /_/zhags pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang /_/gzhu dang mda' 
[\[91b.4\]]ni 'dzin pa nyid/_/zhal gcig ma ni yang dag bri/_/kha dog ljang gu spyan gsum ma/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/_/rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba dpal 
[\[91b.5\]]yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o//_//he ru ka dang bdag med ma'i/_/skyed pa'i sgrub dang de nyid nyon/_/gang gis gdug pa drag po yis/_/sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba yi/_/mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad pa'i/_/
[\[91b.6\]]de dag thams cad khyod la bshad/_/rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas kyang /_/rdo rje can nyid rdo rjer dbab/_/'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag po ni/_/kun tu rnam par spro bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sa bon phreng ba de nas dgod/_/de nas rdo rje chags 
[\[91b.7\]]chen las/_/rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur/_/sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las/_/de nas rig mas bskul bar bya/_/rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig_/puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/_/stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/_/bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]mdzod/_/khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas/_/kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig_/stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/_/ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod/_/dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba/_/stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci/_/
[\[92a.2\]]khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas/_/gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid/_/bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis/_/mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig_/g.yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas/_/snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig_/aM dang hAM las rdo rje che/_/
[\[92a.3\]]khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni/_/zhabs rnams sa la rdegs pa dang /_/lha dang lha min sdigs par mdzad/_/ga~M ca~M ba~M g+ha~M pa~M sha~M la~M Da~M/_/'di yis sa bon dbyung bar bya/_/bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon la/_/o~M hU~M sngon po 'bar gtsigs pas/_/ma mo'i 
[\[92a.4\]]'khor lo grong nyams dgar/_/gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya/_/zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/_/phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/_/bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid/_/'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po/_/sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa/_/
[\[92a.5\]]rgod cing drag shul 'jigs su rung /_/snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi/_/gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid/_/mgo yi phreng bas do shal mdzad/_/nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas/_/kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po/_/sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/_/nyid kyi zhal 
[\[92a.6\]]nas hU~M spro zhing /_/thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid/_/bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing /_/dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas/_/dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/rtsa ba'i zhal ni bzhad cing nag_/g.yas pa'i zhal ni kun da mtshungs/_/g.yon 
[\[92a.7\]]pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa/_/steng ma'i zhal ni rnam par gtsigs/_/spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che/_/lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/_/rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang /_/mda' dang de bzhin 'khor lo nyid/_/de bzhin gshor dang dbyig pa dang /_/rtse gsum pa dang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]lcags kyu nyid/_/g.yon par dril bu pad+mar bcas/_/gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'phyar zhing /_/thod pa dang ni rin chen nyid/_/sdigs mdzub zhags pa de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer ldan/_/kun tu rnam par spro bar bya/_/de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis/_/dkar 
[\[92b.2\]]mo la sogs de nas dgod/_/dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste/_/gzhu dang mda' ni 'gengs pa mchog_/thod pa khrag gis bkang ba dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje gri gug nyid/_/chom rkun ma ni kha dog dmar/_/'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin mar brjod/_/thod pa dang ni 
[\[92b.3\]]cang te'u nyid/_/gsal ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya/_/rmongs byed ma ni sku mdog nag_/de bzhin thod pa dang ni gshor/_/sa la zlog pa nyid dang ni/_/g.yas pa rtse gsum 'phyar ba'o/_/ro langs ma ni dkar ser mtshungs/_/phyag dag na ni chang dang chu/_/
[\[92b.4\]]ral gri dang ni thod pa nyid/_/mdzes ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya/_/puk+ka sI ni kha dog ser/_/dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang /_/sha yis gang ba'i thod pa dang /_/rin chen dang ni mchog sbyin nyid/_/gdol pa mo ni sngo mdog mtshungs/_/de bzhin rlung 
[\[92b.5\]]gi gos 'dzin ma/_/gzhan bdag gis thod pa dang /_/de bzhin pad+ma dkar po nyid/_/g.yung mo sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog_/rdo rje dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin/_/g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa ste/_/gzhan pas rlung gi gos 'dzin ma/_/g+hasma rI ni ljang ser mtshungs/_/
[\[92b.6\]]rdo rje me thab dgra sta'i lag_/thod pa tshil bus yongs gang ba/_/g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed ma/_/ri khrod ma ni dkar mdog mtshungs/_/kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'i lag_/rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid/_/sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par bya/_/ro hi ta 
[\[92b.7\]]dang phag nyid dang /_/rus sbal de bzhin lto 'phye nyid/_/seng ge de bzhin stag nyid dang /_/wa dang dge slong nyid rnams ni/_/de ltar dkar mo la sogs pa'i/_/thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/sgeg pa la 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]sogs ro dang ldan/_/rta yi gzugs dang phag gi gdong /_/khyi gdong de bzhin seng ge ma/_/zhal bzhi ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/gling bu dang ni pi wang dang /_/mu kun+da dang rdza rnga ste/_/
[\[93a.2\]]phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/nag mo dkar ser lta bu dang /_/de bzhin steng du rta gdong ljang /_/ser mo nag mo dkar mtshungs dang /_/de bzhin steng du phag gdong dmar/_/dmar zhing nag dang 
[\[93a.3\]]dkar mtshungs shing /_/de bzhin steng du khyi gdong sar/_/ljang dang nag dang dkar ba'i gdong /_/steng du 'bar ba'i seng ge gdong /_/thams cad skra ni steng du 'bar/_/g.yon brkyang ba yis ro mnan cing /_/spyan gsum khro zhing sgeg pa dang /_/
[\[93a.4\]]rgod pa'i bzhin ni bsgom par bya/_/he ru ka bskyed pa gsum pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs ni/_/rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon/_/gnyis med ye shes chos ldan pa'i/_/gnyis kyi dngos po 
[\[93a.5\]]spangs pa yis/_/rnal 'byor kun sogs dang por ni/_/dag pa gsum ni gdon par bya/_/swa b+ha ba shud d+hAH/_sarba d+harmA swa b+ha ba shud d+ho\u0f85 haM/_/badzra shud d+hAH/_/sarba d+harmA badzra shud d+ho\u0f85haM/_/yo ga shud d+hAH/_sarba d+harmA yo ga shud d+ho\u0f85haM/_/de ltar byas 
[\[93a.6\]]nas rnal 'byor pas/_/yang ni bsam gtan de nyid bya/_/yid dang rjes mthun gnas rnams su/_/de nas bsam gtan brtsam par bya/_/bla re yang ni bre ba nyid/_/sna tshogs gos ni 'phyang ba dang /_/'phan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /_/phyogs 
[\[93a.7\]]bcu'i gnas ni thams cad du/_/dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dang /_/de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du/_/skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bdag gi lus ni bsam par bya/_/blo gros ldan pas sngar mchod nas/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ma ni gzung /_/de ltar cho ga sna tshogs ni/_/nges par bsgom pa nyid du bya/_/ye shes rgya mtsho ri bo'i mgor/_/phyogs sogs kha dog bzhi ni bsam/_/de bzhin gser gyi rgyan byung dang /_/rin chen bdun gyis rnam par spras/_/g.yer 
[\[93b.2\]]ka 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni/_/'dod pas kun tu rgyas par ni/_/gnas ni lnga ru seng ge yi/_/gdan ni bsgom pa nyid du bya/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/_/gdugs ni dkar pos rnam par spras/_/bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung 
[\[93b.3\]]nas ni/_/dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/_/zhal gsum pa la phyag drug nyid/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas/_/ma bcings skra yis mdzes pa dang /_/sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo/_/sbrul 
[\[93b.4\]]gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/rgod dang khro ba sgeg pa dang /_/spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma/_/sgra cher rgod dang gtsigs pa mo/_/gos ni dmar pos shin tu mdzes/_/steng du kha T+wAM ga nyid dang /_/gnyis pa la ni dgra sta nyid/_/gsum 
[\[93b.5\]]pa la ni rdo rje nyid/_/g.yon na de bzhin dril bu'i sgra/_/gnyis pa la ni lhung bzed nyid/_/gsum par de bzhin ral gri 'dzin/_/'od zer 'bar ba du ma dang /_/dbus su mkhas pas bsgom par bya/_/ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mdun du ni/_/bdag 
[\[93b.6\]]gis dbugs kyis phyung nas ni/_/kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes/_/ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang /_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras/_/
[\[93b.7\]]rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/_/ye shes byang gi cha la ni/_/bdag gis dbugs las phyung nas ni/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/_/rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]ga/_/ma bcings skra yis rnam par brgyan/_/yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan dang ni/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya bsgom/_/ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/_/yang ni ro langs ma phyung nas/_/
[\[94a.2\]]phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/kha dog sngon mo shin tu mdzes/_/rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga_/ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/_/lus la sbrul gyis brgyan pa dang /_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/ye shes lho yi cha la ni/_/gdol pa mo 
[\[94a.3\]]ni dmar mo ltar/_/rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga_/ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/_/phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/yongs gang gzugs dang gzi brjid ldan/_/'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/_/dbang 
[\[94a.4\]]ldan lha mo seng ge ma/_/gdong ni seng ger bsam par bya/_/dkar dang ser ba lta bur ni/_/klu dbang stan la g.yas brkyang gnas/_/rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub zhags/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni/_/lus ni 
[\[94a.5\]]'bar bar bsgom par bya/_/mer ni stag mo zhes bya ba/_/rin chen bdun po mchog gi gdan/_/phyag gnyis sngo dang dkar ba mtshungs/_/gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/'bar ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang /_/de bzhin sdigs mdzub zhags pa nyid/_/
[\[94a.6\]]'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni/_/lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya/_/bden bral lha mo wa gdong ma/_/sgra cher rgod dang 'jigs pa mo/_/ma he'i gdan dang yang dag ldan/_/dmar zhing nag pa'i kha dog ma/_/lus la shin tu mdzes gos dang /_/phyag gnyis 
[\[94a.7\]]kyis ni rnam par spras/_/lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/rlung du lha mo 'ug pa ma/_/ser dang dmar ba'i kha dog ma/_/klu yi gdan la gnas pa dang /_/de nyid rgyan ni rab tu brtag_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]skyil krung gnas/_/lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma/_/'od zer 'bar ba du ma yis/_/thams cad kyi ni thams cad 'bar/_/mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dbus su ste/_/phyi rol du ni bzhi po rnams/_/de ltar dgod pa'i rim bltas nas/_/phyi nas 
[\[94b.2\]]gnas ni rab tu brtag_/shar du mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo/_/phyag gnyis dang ni mdog dkar mo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gdan la gnas pa dang /_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/skra ni grol zhing drag mo dang /_/me ni 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu/_/khar ni lag pa 
[\[94b.3\]]bcug nas ni/_/sgra cher rgod dang de bzhin 'bar/_/byang du mar me rgyal mo dbang /_/kha dog gser mdog drag shul ma/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs can gtsigs pa can/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/_/'bar 
[\[94b.4\]]ba'i me ni lta bu'i 'od/_/thal mo gnyis kyis lag pa ni/_/mgo bo'i steng du mar me bzhin/_/nub tu lha mo 'jib byed ma/_/kha dog dmar mo 'jigs pa mo/_/rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/khrag gi srad bu 
[\[94b.5\]]lag pa yi/_/snyim par khrag ni 'thung bar byed/_/me ni 'bar ba'i 'od drag mo/_/lha mo gtso mo 'jib byed ma/_/lho ru g.yo ldan ma zhes pa/_/kha dog nag po'i 'od lta bu/_/rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/_/ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/_/
[\[94b.6\]]gos ni dmar po shin tu mdzes/_/sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /_/sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing lag_/thams cad sems ni rmongs par byed/_/'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo/_/thams cad rig pas thams cad bsgom/_/'di rnams 
[\[94b.7\]]gzugs sogs mdun du ni/_/dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya/_/rlung dang me yis bdun pa'i don/_/rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul/_/thig le sgras ni mnan pas ni/_/rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs/_/gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]de nas bdag med sgrub pa ni/_/ci gsungs mdo ru bsdus nas bshad/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/_/lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/_/
[\[95a.2\]]'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du byin za dang /_/lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang /_/ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'i/_/chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni/_/'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa/_/ze 'bru las ni gcig yin te/_/rdo rje can 
[\[95a.3\]]gyi sku gsum mchog_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yis/_/ro ni nges par bsam par bya/_/de yi steng du zla ba yin/_/zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid/_/phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan/_/gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po/_/A li zla ba'i 
[\[95a.4\]]gzugs kyis gnas/_/kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do/_/zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pas/_/dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags/_/zla ba me long ye shes ldan/_/de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid/_/rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/_/so 
[\[95a.5\]]sor rtog par brjod par bya/_/thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/_/gzugs brnyan rdzogs par dag pa'o/_/mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa ni/_/rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya/_/A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan/_/
[\[95a.6\]]yi ge las byung gong bu la/_/hUM phaT rnam pa 'dod mi bya/_/sems pa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba/_/dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom par bya/_/phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin/_/zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od/_/thabs dang shes rab rang 
[\[95a.7\]]bzhin las/_/de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid/_/A li shes rab kA li thabs/_/zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye ba/_/gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa/_/kha dog dbye ba so so yin/_/de phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas/_/dkyil 'khor pa yang rab tu brtag_/
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni/_/nang gi 'phar ma yang dag gnas/_/phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/_/rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/_/dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/_/chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/_/lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/dbus 
[\[95b.2\]]su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/_/phyi rol 'phar mar dkar mo dang /_/chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma/_/g+ha sma rI dang puk+ka sI/_/ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo/_/brgyad pa g.yung mos gang ba'o/_/'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid/_/mkha' spyod sa spyod 
[\[95b.3\]]ma zhes brjod/_/srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/ngos su gyur ma yang dag gnas/_/lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdog_/drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/_/zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma/_/'khor lo 
[\[95b.4\]]rna cha mgul rgyan dang /_/lag par gdu bu ska rags nyid/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas/_/'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs/_/ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/_/de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad/_/g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang /_/de bzhin steng du 
[\[95b.5\]]kha T+rA ga_/g.yas na rdo rje sngon po dang /_/de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid/_/ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/_/spyan dmar de bzhin steng skyes ser/_/kha dog sngon mo ches gsal ma/_/stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing /_/'jigs pa'i me ni lta bur ni/_/gsal ba'i gzugs 
[\[95b.6\]]can ma de gnas/_/g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste/_/g.yon na ma rgad sngo dang mtshungs/_/phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel/_/g.yas na gri gug 'dzin pa ma/_/rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa 
[\[95b.7\]]dang /_/de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas pas/_/sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi/_/'od zer sna tshogs kun tu spro/_/de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag_/mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya/_/gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog_/yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/_/rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyibs/_/rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs/_/dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ni/_/phyag rgya chen por yongs su gzung /_/
[\[96a.2\]]thams cad rnam par bltas nas ni/_/sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya/_/sar pa legs par bkal ba dang /_/shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas ni/_/srad bus thig gdab shes rab can/_/ji ltar nus par dkyil 'khor nyid/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/
[\[96a.3\]]rta babs rnams kyis shin tu mdzes/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/gos dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/_/mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang /_/sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig 
[\[96a.4\]]gdab bya/_/de yi 'khor lo so so'i skabs/_/nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing /_/ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/rdo rje ka ba'i rtser gnas pa/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/de nas dkyil 'khor nang 
[\[96a.5\]]du ni/_/sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod/_/gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yang /_/sgrub pa'ang khyod la bshad par bya/_/de la dang por lha nyid kyi/_/khyim du sngags pa zhugs nas ni/_/a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/bsams 
[\[96a.6\]]nas de steng rdo rje ni/_/dkar po rtse mo lnga pa nyid/_/cho gas bsam par byas nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la/_/mchod nas phyag 'tshal 'di skad gsol/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du 
[\[96a.7\]]gsol/_/bdag ni che ge mo zhes bgyi/_/dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/_/ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/_/ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/_/byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/_/byang chub sems ni bla med mchog_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed par 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]bgyi/_/dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/sems can don byed tshul khrims dang /_/tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum/_/so sor bdag gis brtan par gzung /_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/_/
[\[96b.2\]]sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/_/sdom pa deng nas brtan por gzung /_/rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang /_/de nyid las ni so sor gzung /_/slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/_/rin chen rigs kyi rnal 
[\[96b.3\]]'byor gyis/_/dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/_/nyi ma re re drug byas nas/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/_/byang chub chen po las byung ba/_/pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/_/phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/_/dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung /_/
[\[96b.4\]]las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/_/sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/_/thams cad so sor gzung bar bya/_/mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/_/byang chub sems ni bla med po/_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can kun 
[\[96b.5\]]gyi don gyi phyir/_/sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi/_/ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi/_/ma grol ba dag sgrol bar bgyi/_/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing /_/sems can mya ngan 'das la gzhag_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa 
[\[96b.6\]]thams cad kyi rtse mo las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/_de nas bsam gtan gnas 'dug nas/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/_/yang dag rjes su blta bar bya/_/phyi dang nang gi bdag 
[\[96b.7\]]nyid can/_/'di dag thams cad sems kyis brtags/_/sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni/_/gzhan du yong pa ma yin no/_/chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir/_/yid kyis a nut+pan+na brjod/_/de nas rang 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]sems de nyid 'dis/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/_/'dod pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pas ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par blta/_/oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+ha~M ka ro mi/_tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor che dag pa/_/nam mkha' lta bu dri 
[\[97a.2\]]ma med/_/yid gnyis kun las rnam par grol/_/mchog tu rnam par rtog pa 'joms/_/nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag_/dang po zla ba ltar bltas nas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir/_/a sogs gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[97a.3\]]a A i I u U r-i r-I l-I l-I e ai o au a~M aH/_bcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/_/yon tan khyad par ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gru gsum rgya chen rang bzhin can/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 
[\[97a.4\]]gnas/_/'di ni a sogs gzugs kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas yon tan 'jug par 'gyur/_/shel dang zla ba lta bur ni/_/de yi steng du 'jug par 'gyur/_/sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/de nyid dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/sngags pas 
[\[97a.5\]]'di yi sngags kyis ni/_/byang chub sems ni skyed par byed/_/oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+bA da yA mi/_byas pa'i rjes su rim 'byung ba/_/sems can rjes su 'dzin pa po/_/dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag gang /_/nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon/_/zla 
[\[97a.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can/_/'dir yang skar ma'i rnam pas ni/_/sangs rgyas yon tan ka sogs kyi/_/gzugs kyis gzugs brnyan lta bu yi/_/rnal 'byor gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_
[\[97a.7\]]Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya ra la wa/_sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH/_'di yi dkyil 'khor cho ga kun/_/rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungs so/_/de la dbus su rtse lnga pa/_/'od zer dkar po bcas pa nyid/_/kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]pas/_/brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir/_/bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan du/_/'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya/_/oM tiSh+Tha badzra/_byang chub spyod pa bla na med/_/de yi sa ni rtogs pa 'di/_/ye shes dag pa zag pa med/_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[97b.2\]]'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje nges par brtag par bya/_/nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi/_/tshad du yang dag gang ba yi/_/rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag nyid du/_/sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o/_/'dis ni sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/spro ba dang ni 
[\[97b.3\]]bsdu bar bya/_/oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni/_/snang ba med cing gnas pa med/_/ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid/_/dngos po med pa la sogs spangs/_/gcad med dbyer med gzung du med/_/chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa/_/
[\[97b.4\]]rdo rje bdag med yang dag gyur/_/rdo rje'i sku ni gong na med/_/de ltar yang de rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig_/yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' ni/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/_/sangs 
[\[97b.5\]]rgyas rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ni/_/'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya/_/oM ya tha sarba ta thA gA tA sta thA ha~M/_sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/_/spyod yul de nyid rtogs pa ni/_/mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dge/_/
[\[97b.6\]]de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i rdo rje dang /_pad+ma'i rigs kyi ming ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje 
[\[97b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas/_/pad+ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen mo ldan/_/de yi rdo rje pad+ma'i steng du gnas/_/de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don/_/de nas de ltar bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang 'og tu sngags kyi yi ge 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bkod de/_cho ga bzhin du ri rab dang /_gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste/_'od zer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/_der ba~M las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+mar nyi 
[\[98a.2\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa ya ra la was brgyan pa'o/_/de nas de'i steng du sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa/_rab tu bsngags pa/_nor bu rin po che chen po 'od gsal ba dang /_/
[\[98a.3\]]kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dpyangs pa dang /_rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang /_'phan dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_do shal dang /_do shal phyed pa dang /_zla bas nye bar mdzes par rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med khang bsam par bya'o/_/hU~M gi sngags 
[\[98a.4\]]'dis rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di bkod de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o/_/yang sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje de nyid yang yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa 
[\[98a.5\]]zla ba'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_dpa' po shes rab dang dga' ba gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang /_dril bu dang /_ral gri dang /_lcags kyu nyid dang /_thod pa dang /_zhags pa 
[\[98a.6\]]'dzin pa nyid do/_/g.yas pa ni kha dog nag po'o/_/g.yon pa ni pad+ma rA ga'i 'od do/_/zhal gsum pa dang /_phyag drug pa nyid dang /_spyan gsum pa nyid dang /_bzang po'i gzugs can te/_rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/_/dgyes pa'i dkyil 
[\[98a.7\]]'khor bsgom par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor pa'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o/_/shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do/_/lhor ni rin chen 'byung gnas so/_/nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/_/byang du ni gdon mi za bar grub 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]pa'o/_/dbang ldan du ni spyan no/_/mer ni mA ma kI'o/_/bden bral du ni gos dkar mo'o/_/rlung du ni sgrol ma'o/_/phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la drag shul ma ni kha dog dkar mo'o/_/lho ru ni rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma ni kha dog ser mo'o/_/nub tu ni 'dod chags rdo 
[\[98b.2\]]rje ma kha dog dmar mo'o/_/byang du ni rdo rje zhi ba mo kha dog ljang gu ma'o/_/dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar ser lta bu'o/_/me ru ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar ser lta bu'o/_/bden bral du ni sgra'i rdo rje ma ni sngon dmar lta bu'o/_/rlung dang sa'i rdo rje ma ni 
[\[98b.3\]]kha dog ljang skya ma lta bu'o/_/phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu ma'o/_/me ru ni bi pa~M ma'o/_/bden bral du ni mu kun da ma'o/_/rlung du ni rdza rnga ma'o/_/gling bu ma la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma'o/_/phyi rol gyi snam bu la me tog 
[\[98b.4\]]ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste/_de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o/_/shar gyi sgo la lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' sngo bsangs ma'i mdog bri bar bya ste/_zhal g.yas pa dang /_gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dkar 
[\[98b.5\]]po'o/_/phyag g.yas pa'i dang po ni lcags kyu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o/_/gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o/_/g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang /_sdigs mdzub dang /_dril bu 'dzin pa ste phyag drug pa bri bar bya'o/_/lho'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags 
[\[98b.6\]]pa ma kha dog dkar ser te/_zhal g.yas pa dang /_gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dmar ba'o/_/g.yas pa na ni zhags pa dang /_rdo rje dang /_ral gri 'phyar ba'o/_/'khor lo dang /_dril bu dang /_sdigs mdzub zhags pa can te phyag drug go/_/nub kyi sgo la ni rdo rje 
[\[98b.7\]]lcags sgrog ma ste/_de bzhin du yang kha dog dmar zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/_zhal g.yas pa dang gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dkar ba'o/_/phyag drug na lcags sgrog dang /_rdo rje dang /_ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_dril bu dang /_lcags kyu'o/_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]byang gi sgo la ni rdo rje dril bu ma 'jigs par byed ma ste/_zhal gsum ni ljang gu dang /_nag mo dang /_dkar mo'o/_/phyag drug na ni dril bu dang /_rdo rje dang /_lcags kyu dang /_'khor lo dang /_ral gri dang /_zhags pa'o/_/thams cad kyang skra steng du 
[\[99a.2\]]'bar ba ste/_sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/_/me'i phyogs nas brtsams te me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsungs so/_/shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rnal 'byor ma 
[\[99a.3\]]lcags kyu ma dang /_zhags pa ma dang /_lcags sgrog ma dang /_dril bu'i lag pa ma ste/_sgo srungs ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying po bstan pa ste the tshom mi za'o/_/de ltar bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul 
[\[99a.4\]]gyis kyang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/gong ma lta bu de'i phyed kyis de'i nang du zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang /_/phyi rol du ri mo bzhis yongs su 
[\[99a.5\]]bskor ba'o/_/lha mo thams cad kyi gnas su ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams ni dkar mo la sogs pa rab tu brtag par bya'o/_/de la dbus su hrIH'i yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i shar gyi re'u mig la ni hrIH'o/_/lho ru ni ho'o/_/nub tu ni gI'o/_/
[\[99a.6\]]byang du ni dzi'o/_/me ru ni ha~M ngo /_/bden bral du ni dza~M ngo /_/rlung du ma~M ngo /_/dbang ldan du ha~M ngo /_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod pa ni me'i mtshams su ni a~M ngo /_/bden bral du ni u'o/_/rlung du ni e'o/_/dbang ldan du ni ai dgod par bya'o/_/shar gyi 
[\[99a.7\]]sgo la dzaH'o/_/lho ru ni hU~M ngo /_/nub tu ni pa~M mo/_/byang du ni hoHda god par bya'o/_/phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/_der dbang po la sogs pa'i 'byung po chen po brgyad po 'jigs par byed par dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]shar du ha ri bA sa la/_/lha yi tshogs ni yang dag bri/_/lho ru tsu ta'i shing la ni/_/gshin rje'i gtso bo'i dbang phyug bri/_/nub tu a sho ka gnas su/_/sprin gyi rgyal po der ni dgod/_/de bzhin byang du byang chub shing /_/gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par 
[\[99b.2\]]gzhag_/de bzhin mer ni ka rany+dzar/_/drang srong tshogs kyis ya'i dag khyab/_/bden bral la tA dzA Tir ni/_/srin po la sogs de nas dgod/_/rlung du pAr+thi pa la ni/_/rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri/_/dbang ldan pa Ta s+tha lar ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]tshogs ni 
[\[99b.3\]]yang dag bri/_/drag bcas dbang bcas nye dbang bcas/_/zla bcas nyi ma gshin rje'i cha/_/rgyas btab rmongs byas zos byas shing /_/thal ba'i dngos bcas 'tsho bar byed/_/thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis/_/g.yon par kha T+wAM brten nas su/_/
[\[99b.4\]]dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing /_/khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams/_/g.yas su rdo rje 'bar ba ste/_/'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/_/skyil krung phyed pa byas nas ni/_/nyid kyi brla steng g.yon pa mnan/_/tshangs pa la sogs 
[\[99b.5\]]mnan pa de/_/grags pa nye bar mi za ste/_/kun du 'od zer sna tshogs kyis/_/sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa 'dis/_/spro ba yang ni sbyin par bya/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/dpal yang dag par sbyor 
[\[99b.6\]]ba las byung ba ste brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'o//_//bcom ldan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i/_/ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ci/_/gsang ba nyan par 'tshal lags na/_/thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[99b.7\]]mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa/_kol+la i riT+Thi a bol+la/_mum+mu Ni re kak+ko lA/_g+ha Na ki pIn+na ho bAdz+dzaM i/_kA ru Ne ki a i na ro lA/_ta hoM ba 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]lA khAdz+dza i/_g+ha De ma a NA pidz+dza i/_ha le kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i/_du d+hu ra badz+dza a i/_tsa u sa ma kAs+thu ra si h+lA/_kap+pu ru lA i a i/_ma la in+d+ha Na~M sha li dza/_ta hiM b+ha ru kha i a i/_phreM kha Na kheT+Ta ka ran+te/_shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na mu 
[\[100a.2\]]Ni a i/_Ni ra~M shu ang ga ce DA bi a/_ta hiM dza sa rA ba pa Ni a i/_ma la a dza~M kun du ru bAT+Ta i/_DiM Di ma ta hiN+Na badz+dza a i/_mu khe g+ho g+hu gu g+hu/_mu g+hu lu g+hu/_dreSh+TA/_'di rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma gsungs pa zhes bya 
[\[100a.3\]]ba la spro bar bya'o/_/DA/_DI/_bu/_su/_mA/_yo/_b+hi/_d+hI/_lu/_s+t+rI/_sa/_pe/_phI/_b+ha/_b+hu/_pI/_b+hu/_hI/_ga_/tri/_ku/_hA/_dzA/_ke/_b+ha/_swA/_pu/_dzA/_o/_a/_go/_rA/_de/_mA/_kA/_o/_tri/_ko/_ka/_la/_kA/_hi/_pre/_gr-i/_sau/_su/_nA/_shi/_
[\[100a.4\]]ma/_ku/_de nas ngag gits+tsho ma yi/_/cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bye/_/gang gis spun dang sring mor yang /_/the tshom med par shes bya ba/_/po ta~M gI dang /_pra ti po ta~M gI dang /_ga mu dang /_lum+ba dang /_ni ga ra dang /_tsa Tu ka~M dang /_hr-i da ya~M dang /_kau ra ba dang /_
[\[100a.5\]]kar+N+Ni kA dang /_a li ka ra Na~M dang /_ba rA ha dang /_shra wa Na dang /_man+dza na dang /_na raHdang /_tA li kA dang /_na ra ka~M dang /_a mru ka~M dang /_kA khi la dang /_swa sa Na~M dang /_pa ri d+hiHdang /_bi ra d+hiHdang /_kru rA dang /_an+taHdang /_a li kA dang /_b+ha gi nI dang /_mu 
[\[100a.6\]]da ka~M dang /_gr-i ha Na dang /_mu drA dang /_dan+ta spaR+sha dzi hwA dang /_gan+d+ha ba hi nI da~Mng /_A ga ma na~M dang /_s+thA nA ta dang /_ki ra NaHdang /_go ma dang /_nA dA dang /_lam+bo da ra dang /_dan+taHdang /_ni ro d+ha dang /_bi dz+nya p+ti dang /_d+hu r+ya dang /_d+hu mra pri ya dang /_sA nu dang /_sa ri taHdang /_
[\[100a.7\]]a~M gu l+yA dang /_ba da na~M dang /_rA dzi kA dang /_a da nA dang /_pa~M k+ti dang /_ts+tsh+nan do dang /_tsa loHdang /_mr-i ga pa ti dang /_maN+Da la~M dang /_sa ma~M dang /_phal gu ShaM dang /_ma hA k+Sha ra~M dang /_ts+tshA/_nA/_go dang /_ma dang /_b+ha dang /_hA dang /_a pya kA dang /_s+tha dang /_dan+ta spaR+sha ne 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dang /_mu kha spaR+sha ne dang /_ho dang /_hrI kA dang /_shU n+ya spaR+sha ne dang /_u ru spaR+sha ne dang /_steng dang /_'og tu yod pa ni phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du gsungs so/_/yi ge dang ngag gi ts+tsho ma ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//rdo rje snying po snying rje che/_/
[\[100b.2\]]yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/_/gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma/_/lA mA yongs gyur byis bcas mo/_/mi ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo/_/'di dag mkha' 'gro bdun du gsungs/_/mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang /_/smin ma yon por gang byed cing /_/sngon 
[\[100b.3\]]gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang /_/phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa yang /_/de ni gzugs can mar shes bya/_/dpa' bos gnyis med bstan pa'o/_/sdug pa'am gal te mi sdug pa'i/_/byis pa lta zhing 'o byed ma/_/de ni 'o byed mar shes bya/_/mkha' 'gro 
[\[100b.4\]]mchog kyang de nyid yin/_/byol song lta stangs khro gnyer gdong /_/'di ni smin sgyur sdigs par byed/_/gzhan du dbugs kyis 'jigs byed ma/_/de ni lA mAr rnam par bstan/_/phag dang ce spyang byi la dang /_/rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed ma/_/
[\[100b.5\]]de ni yongs gyur ma ru gsungs/_/rab tu dga' zhing gsal bar dgod/_/song bar gyur nas mi ldog ma/_/de ni byis bcas mo ru gsungs/_/gang zhig skyo bas lag pa 'am/_/bong pa 'am ni rkang pas sam/_/gos mtha' ma yang na shing gis ni/_/
[\[100b.6\]]des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/de ni mi ldog mar shes bya/_/rgod dang smra dang ngu ba dang /_/glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba/_/de ni 'dod pa mar shes bya/_/mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mar gsungs so/_/thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang /_/chu srin rgyal mtshan ral gri 
[\[100b.7\]]dang /_/'phang mdung dang ni bdun du gsungs/_/yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di/_/rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/_/lus srul mo'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lA mA'i mtshan nyid ni/_/yang 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dag rab tu bshad par bya/_/dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang /_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i 'od/_/dkar po'i gos la rtag dga' zhing /_/tsan dan sar pa'i dri dang ldan/_/bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/_/chags shing 
[\[101a.2\]]mthong na rjes 'gro ma/_/khyim du pad+ma 'dri byed pa/_/pad+ma gar dbang rigs las byung /_/smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son/_/lus ni sngo sangs skya ba dang /_/ut+pal sngon po'i dri dang mtshungs/_/khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni/_/rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 
[\[101a.3\]]ni/_/he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba/_/de ni mkha' 'gro mar shes bya/_/mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba dang /_/de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/_/ra skyes khyim bya dag gis kyang /_/rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang /_/de yi khyim du rdo rje ni/_/bris nas 
[\[101a.4\]]rtag tu mchod byed pa/_/he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba/_/mkha' 'gror 'di la the tshom med/_/'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am/_/lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa'i/_/ser zhing sngo sangs bud med gang /_/rtag tu gos ser dga' ba nyid/_/me tog 
[\[101a.5\]]dkar po'i dri chen dang /_/skal bzang phun sum tshogs ma de/_/khyim du 'khor lo 'dri bar byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro/_/gnag cing sngo sangs bud med gang /_/so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang /_/rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni/_/
[\[101a.6\]]skra ni rtag tu grol ba yin/_/rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang /_/spyod cing mang du smra ba dang /_/rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni/_/rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/_/rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las byung /_/dkar zhing gser dang mtshungs pa dang /_/'bar ba'i mig dang ba spu gang /_/
[\[101a.7\]]rdo rje gang gi dpral ba'am/_/lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa/_/rtag tu rgyal srid dga' ba dang /_/snyems shing bden par smra ba dang /_/ma li ka yi dri dang ldan/_/khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni/_/rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/_/dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung /_/
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog_/sha la dga' ba'i bud med gang /_/mig sman nag po lta bu'i 'od/_/dpral bar mdung rtse'i rnam pa nyid/_/drag shul las la dga' ba gang /_/rtag tu dur khrod 'gro gang dang /_/'jigs med skyugs bro med 
[\[101b.2\]]pa dang /_/gang gi dpral bar bsdus nas ni/_/khyim du thod pa 'dri byed cing /_/rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/_/he ru ka yi rigs las byung /_/char sprin mdog 'dra'i bud med gang /_/so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing /_/rtag tu drag shul las rnams dang /_/
[\[101b.3\]]g.yon pa'i mche ba byung ba ni/_/khyim du dgra sta 'dri byed cing /_/rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/_/rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba/_/de ni mkha' 'gror the tshom med/_/gang gi skra ni li ba dang /_/bzhin ni yongs su zlum pa dang /_/rtag tu kha la sma ra dang /_/
[\[101b.4\]]smin ma ring zhing ba spu dang /_/gos dkar gtsang zhing zhi ba dang /_/mi bskyod bden par smra ba dang /_/rtag tu dam pa'i chos dga' ba/_/dpa' bo'i sring mor de shes bya/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya/_/yang na ru sbal phyag rgya bya/_/ril ba spyi blugs 
[\[101b.5\]]mchod byed pa/_/phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/_/de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/_/khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar byed/_/ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma/_/mig ni dmar zhing ser ba dang /_/che zhing skal bzang nor dang ldan/_/ser zhing tsam pa lta bu nyid/_/
[\[101b.6\]]ring zhing lag pa ring ba dang /_/sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang /_/ri mo gsum ni dpral ba 'am/_/steng gi mtshams su nges par gnas/_/rgod pa dang ni dga' ba nyid/_/lam gyi rnam pa gnon cing gnas/_/g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni/_/gtam 
[\[101b.7\]]la rtag tu dga' ba nyid/_/de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/_/mdung rtse'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya/_/rkang pa g.yon pa bskums pa yi/_/gar nyid kyang ni rab bstan bya/_/g.yon gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/_/phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/_/bcu bzhi ba dang 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]brgyad pa la/_/khyim du mdung rtse bris shing mchod/_/'jig rten dbang phyug mtshan nyid yin/_/dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang /_/mig ni ljang zhing ser ba dang /_/de bzhin skra ni 'khyil ba dang /_/dar dpyangs bcings par snang ba 
[\[102a.2\]]nyid/_/ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas/_/de bzhin steng du ring ba dang /_/rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing /_/rtag tu rgod cing glu len dang /_/glo bur du ni khro ba dang /_/khyad par du ni sems g.yo dang /_/rtsod pa rtag tu dga' ba nyid/_/de 'dra'i rab myos 
[\[102a.3\]]mthong nas ni/_/'phang mdung phyag rgya rab bstan bya/_/gnyis pa yis kyang 'bad pa yis/_/dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyin/_/g.yon gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/_/phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/_/thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang /_/rtag tu gos ser 
[\[102a.4\]]dga' ba dang /_/mgrin pa nas ni gos 'phyang ba/_/de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/_/'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya/_/gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni/_/dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par bya/_/de bzhin yongs su bskor ba nyid/_/de yi dus ni bcu 
[\[102a.5\]]bzhi la/_/khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed/_/yan lag kun la ba spur bcas/_/mig ni nag cing ser ba dang /_/gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang /_/bzhin sbom kha ni sbom pa dang /_/ma mchu 'phyang zhing khung mig dang /_/sna ni nyams par gyur pa 
[\[102a.6\]]dang /_/rtag tu dri za 'dod pa dang /_/sprin gyi kha dog lto che ba/_/de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/_/klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/_/gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/_/'phang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya/_/yongs su bskor ba gong ma bzhin/_/de ni bcu gcig 
[\[102a.7\]]ches la ni/_/mche ba 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod/_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi/_/mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/_/bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg_/spyi bo de la rab 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bstan bya/_/gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la/_/mkhur tshos de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig so ni ston pa la/_/lce ni de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la/_/kos ko de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig mgrin pa reg pa la/_/lto ba de la rab 
[\[102b.2\]]bstan bya/_/gang zhig lto ba ston pa la/_/lte ba de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la/_/sa ni de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la/_/ling ga de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig pus mo ston pa la/_/byin pa de la rab bstan bya/_/
[\[102b.3\]]gang zhig lag pa ston pa la/_/dpung pa de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig rkang pa ston pa la/_/rkang mthil de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig sor mo ston pa la/_/sen mo de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig sa ni ston pa la/_/nam mkha' de la rab bstan 
[\[102b.4\]]bya/_/gang zhig nam mkha' ston pa la/_/nyi ma de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig chu bo ston pa la/_/rgya mtsho de la rab bstan bya/_/gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa/_/legs par 'ongs zhes brjod pa yin/_/gang zhig sor mo gnyis ston pa/_/shin 
[\[102b.5\]]tu legs 'ongs brjod pa yin/_/g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul dang /_/g.yon pa'i smin sgyur tshul ston pa/_/slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston/_/rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ste brtag pa'i rgyal 
[\[102b.6\]]po bzhi pa'o//_//de nas skye bo dam pa kun/_/'du ba yang dag rab bshad bya/_/de la zas gcig bza' bar bya/_/snod gnyis su yang ma lus brtson/_/kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[102b.7\]]pa/_/gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/_/zhing dang de bzhin nye ba'i zhing /_/ts+tshan do nye ba'i ts+tshan do ha/_/'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/_/dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang /_/'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid/_/'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te/_/sa 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid/_/'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya/_/kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/_/de bzhin du sa bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las byung ba bka' drin gyis bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gnas ni dzA lan d+ha rar gsungs/_/de bzhin du oD+yAn nyid/_/gnas ni kol+la gi ri dang /_/de bzhin ar bu da nyid do/_/nye gnas go dA ba ri nyid/_/de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang /_/de bzhin de bI ko Tar bshad/_/de 
[\[103a.3\]]bzhin mA la wa nyid dang tsa/_/de bzhin ka ma rU par gsungs/_/o dra zhing ni nyid du gsungs/_/nye zhing tri sha ku ni dang /_/de bzhin ko sha la nyid dang /_/ka li kar ni ci gsungs pa'o/_/de bzhin lam bA ka nyid dang /_/kAny+tsi kha ba'i gnas nyid ni/_/
[\[103a.4\]]ts+tshan dor yang dag gsungs pa dang /_/nye ba yi yang ts+tshan do'o/_/pre ta a hi ba si gsungs/_/de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang /_/sau rASh+Ta rang gser gling nyid/_/'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/_/nA ga ra dang sin d+hU ni/_/dur khrod nyid du brjod pa dang /_/ma ru 
[\[103a.5\]]dang ni ku lu tA/_/nye ba yi ni dur khrod nyid/_/snying rje de bzhin las kyi brang /_/ha ri ke la nyid dang ni/_/lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho'i nang song dang /_/bin+d+hA gzhon nu'i grong khyer nyid/_/'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod do/_/de dang nye ba dur khrod nyid/_/rab song 
[\[103a.6\]]dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'gram/_/skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram/_/nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya/_/de nas gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_/rdul bral gnas su tsu ta gnas/_/kong ka nar ni zla ba'i gling /_/ka rany+dzAr gnas tsA ri 
[\[103a.7\]]tra/_/aT+Ta ha sar ka dam+pa/_/lha mo'i mkhar du ba Ta gnas/_/ha ri ke lar hi ra gnas/_/o D+yAn a sho ka ni gnas/_/dzA lan+d+ha rar gser shing gnas/_/gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/_/de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/_/zhing ni 'od byed shes par 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]bya/_/nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can/_/ts+tshan do mngon du gyur par nges/_/nye ba'i ts+tshan do sbyang dka' ba/_/'du ba ring du song ba ste/_/nye ba'i 'du ba mi g.yo ba/_/dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid/_/nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/_/pha rol phyin bcu'i sa 
[\[103b.2\]]rnams la/_/rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad/_/pU la sogs pa ci gsungs pa/_/phyi dang nang du bsam par bya/_/rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'du ba'i/_/nyin par nyid kyang legs bshad bya/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zla phyed bcu bzhi dang /_/brgyad pa la yang khyad 
[\[103b.3\]]bar du/_/rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid/_/skye ba bdun pa khyad par du/_/'bad pas snying rje bskyed nas ni/_/mkhas pas gsad par bya ba nyid/_/snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/_/de phyir snying rje yang dag bshad/_/ji ltar bdag bzhin sems 
[\[103b.4\]]can nyid/_/ji ltar sems can de bzhin bdag_/'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag_/dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/_/'du ba'i gnas te lnga pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//gsang ba'i pad+ma'i mtshan nyid ni/_/ye shes dbang 
[\[103b.5\]]po nyan par 'tshal/_/ye shes sems dang 'dres pa yi/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gnas bzhi mnyam par gnas nas ni/_/rdzogs byang rim pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed nas ni/_/
[\[103b.6\]]'dod chags la sogs ring du spangs/_/yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su ni/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/_/snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/spyi bo med pa'i spyi bo dang /_/sgra mtha'i de bzhin gsang pad+ma/_/cha ni 
[\[103b.7\]]sna tshogs yig 'bru rnams/_/de bzhin du yang stan rnams nyid/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par byed/_/bsdus nas gong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpar rang nyid 'gyur/_/chu yi khams dang me yi khams/_/ro 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]gcig mchog gi gnas su ni/_/thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyar/_/sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug_/bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang /_/lung gi rjes 'brangs de nyid shes/_/gsang don de nyid dngos po yang /_/de nyid 
[\[104a.2\]]las ni gcig las gcig_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyis/_/stong sogs de nyid mtshan nyid kyis/_/lus kyi dri ma bkrus nas ni/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyar/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes sems dpa' 
[\[104a.3\]]bsam par bya/_/mdog dkar kun da zla ba yi/_/'od zer rnam par spro ba ni/_/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/pad+ma'i gnas la yang dag bzhugs/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/phyag rgya 
[\[104a.4\]]chen po phyag gnyis kyis/_/snying gi gnas su gzir bar mdzad/_/gzugs dang gzi brjid yongs gang ba/_/ye shes sems dpar bsgom pa nyid/_/chu shing me tog lta bur ni/_/lte ba ru ni yang dag gnas/_/langs nas snying gar kun tu gnas/_/
[\[104a.5\]]sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs gang ba/_/bton nas dang po'i pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/_/ze ba dang ni ze 'brur bcas/_/yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi/_/phyag gnyis zhal gcig dkar po ni/_/bzang 
[\[104a.6\]]po dri med dbus su bsam/_/de yi dbus su rnam shes dang /_/ye shes de nyid sbyar bar bya/_/dang po shar gyi 'dab ma la/_/byams par ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa/_/lho yi sgor ni snying rje nyid/_/rin chen de nyid sa bon las/_/nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/_/'od dpag 
[\[104a.7\]]med pa'i sa bon dgod/_/byang gi sgo yi gnas su ni/_/sems kyi don yod gtso bo nyid/_/dang po'i dbyangs sogs sa bon gyi/_/zla ba'i thig le ji bzhin rim/_/zla ba'i 'od zer dkar brgyan pa'i/_/yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/_/mtshams rnams su ni ma 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ning nyid/_/rnam pa bzhi po sngar gsungs pa/_/de yi dbus su de yi sems/_/yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_/sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pa/_/bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/_/stong pa mtshon du med pa la/_/
[\[104b.2\]]yi ge'i rnal 'byor la sogs ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/_/snying po med pa'i chu shing las/_/snying po bdud rtsi 'bras 'byung ltar/_/'bras bu rnam shes ye shes ni/_/
[\[104b.3\]]gzugs med pa la ye shes gzugs/_/ye shes sku ni skyon med pa/_/mtshan nyid mtshon du med pa nyid/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/_/yig 'bru med las yig 'bru'i gzugs/_/de dbus ngo bo stong pa nyid/_/de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis 
[\[104b.4\]]gzung /_/ji ltar mtshan nyid shes kyang ni/_/mnyam nyid ye shes sems kyis ni/_/de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/_/myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/_/bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/_/ye shes rnam shes ngo bo las/_/mtshan nyid bstan 
[\[104b.5\]]bcos mdor bsdus pa/_/de nyid dpa' bo ston pa po/_/'di yi bsgom pa thams cad kyi/_/'od zer dkar pos rnam par brgyan/_/lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi/_/bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/_/kha dog dkar po 'od gsal ba/_/bdud 
[\[104b.6\]]rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur/_/snying gi sa bon pad dbus su/_/mthe bong yongs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di/_/de yi dbus su sa bon ni/_/A li kA li yongs btus pa/_/kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/_/zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba ni/_/de yi dbus 
[\[104b.7\]]su sgo rnams kyi/_/thig le bsam par rab tu grags/_/skra yi rtse mo brgya char ni/_/phra rab gzugs su yang dag gnas/_/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin las/_/ye shes can gyi mtshan nyid mtshon/_/go 'phang gnas kyi thig le ltos/_/sems kyi mtshan 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]nyid thams cad shes/_/snying la tshangs pa'i sgo yi ni/_/thig le sgo yi lam las ni/_/bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yis/_/rnam shes ye shes kyi yang blang /_/lam gyi phyi rol bstan bcos kyang /_/ma yin ring bar 'gyur ba yin/_/bstan bcos 
[\[105a.2\]]rnams ni rnyed sla yang /_/sbyor ba de la rnyed par dka'/_/rnal 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni/_/bla ma gsol ba 'debs la brtson/_/bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/_/rnam par mkhas pas mthong bar 'gyur/_/mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/_/
[\[105a.3\]]g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med/_/yid ni chos rnams sngon du 'gro/_/yid ni dag cing yid ltar mgyogs/_/yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis/_/smra ba dang ni byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir yid kyi bdag nyid kun/_/yid la byung bar blo ldan pas/_/snying gar sems 
[\[105a.4\]]bsgom sdom pa ni/_/gal te 'dod na yo gis bzlas/_/rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te/_/de nyid dpyad pas ma yin no/_/'bras bu rgyu yi sa bon te/_/de nyid mthong ba ma yin no/_/gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod kyis/_/dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lnga/_/
[\[105a.5\]]spyi bo spyi med yang dag gnas/_/kun nas kun du 'bab par 'gyur/_/rtag tu rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi/_/ye shes rnam shes sa bon las/_/thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan/_/'khor ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/_/yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan/_/yi ge ngag ni rnam 
[\[105a.6\]]par spangs/_/nges par rtag tu go 'phang gnas/_/rtag pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings/_/rtag tu phra zhing skyon med pa/_/ye shes la ni rnam shes nub/_/ye shes dngos pos rnam shes kyi/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur/_/dang por mtshan ma thams 
[\[105a.7\]]cad kyi/_/mar me'i rnam pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/gnyis pa mtshan mo me khyer gyi/_/rnam pa'i rdul ni mtshon par byed/_/rdul dkar tsa na ka dbyibs su/_/phyogs bcur de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/_/gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]rnam par brtags/_/lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang /_/bzhi par yang ni bstan pa'o/_/lha yi gzugs ni thams cad kyang /_/lnga par sems kyis brtag par bya/_/drug pa gzugs ni med pa'i cha/_/bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de/_/brgyad par 
[\[105b.2\]]rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don/_/rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che/_/yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/_/nges par dngos po thams cad kyi/_/dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod/_/phyis ni re rer dbye ba yis/_/lha rnams kyi ni 
[\[105b.3\]]brjod par bya/_/lus can rnams kyi phung po dang /_/khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams/_/rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag_/nyon mongs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya/_/rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/_/dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min/_/yul gyi dngos 
[\[105b.4\]]po dag pa'i phyir/_/rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog_/gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang /_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa snang ba/_/de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste/_/de phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos/_/kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa 
[\[105b.5\]]gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs la sogs pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mig gis 
[\[105b.6\]]gzugs ni gzung bar bya/_/sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya/_/dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/_/lce yis ro ni rig par bya/_/lus kyis dngos po rig par bya/_/yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni/_/dag pas dug med byas nas ni/_/bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya/_/
[\[105b.7\]]gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/_/tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma ste/_/'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug_/de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal/_/rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka/_/mig la gti mug rdo rje bshad/_/zhe sdang rdo rje mngon thos 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]pa/_/phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna/_/kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer bshad/_/reg la ser sna rdo rje ma/_/khams dang skye mched thams cad ni/_/dam pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka/_/sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma/_/chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod/_/me 
[\[106a.2\]]yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma/_/de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug_/nam mkha'i khams su brjod pa ni/_/pad+ma 'bar ba 'khyil pa nyid/_/'di ltar lus can rnams kyi lus/_/phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid/_/bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las/_/nyon 
[\[106a.3\]]mongs la sogs des bskyed pa'i/_/bskyed pa'i cha la legs gnas pas/_/srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/phung po dang skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas spyod pas rtog pa rnams/_/'jig par 
[\[106a.4\]]byed pa bshad par byed/_/chos rnams kun la mnyam byung ba/_/de nyid spyod pa gong na med/_/sangs rgyas sras la phan pa'i phyir/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam gnas pa/_/gang zhig yang ni de nyid las/_/rdo rje yan lag med pa yi/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa 
[\[106a.5\]]mchog_/skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por/_/rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las/_/sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed/_/tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang /_/myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing /_/snying po'i yon tan kun gyi gnas/_/sems kyi rin 
[\[106a.6\]]chen las byung ba/_/'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas rab bsngags pa'i/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan kun/_/lus byung 'di las ma gtogs par/_/dga' ba'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs med 'di/_/
[\[106a.7\]]grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis/_/lha yi dgra dang brgya byin dang /_/grong khyer sum brtsegs dgra bo dang /_/nor sbyin tshangs pa la sogs pas/_/zhabs kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yis/_/sdig pa 'jig byed 'di la spyod/_/myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]gnas kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas ni/_/gang zhig 'gro la phan par ni/_/kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsungs/_/de ltar mchog tu bsam yas gnas/_/shin tu gsang ba yo gis bsgom/_/rtog pa thams cad bral bar 
[\[106b.2\]]ni/_/dam tshig la ni spyad par bya/_/rgyu mthun 'bras bu rang bzhin las/_/dang po'i rtsom par yo gi gnas/_/de nas bsgoms pas dub pa na/_/bsdus nas byis pa'i rtse bar bya/_/sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la/_/'jam pa'i gzugs can rang nyid 
[\[106b.3\]]bsgom/_/grub par grags pa ma lus pa/_/ci gsungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/spyod pas bla na med pa yi/_/kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas/_/spyod pa nges rig rdo rje can/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/dpal ldan slob dpon 
[\[106b.4\]]rdo rje can/_/kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni/_/blo gros chen po bya ba byas/_/de nas rang gi 'dod sgyur bas/_/sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas/_/kun tu seng ge lta bur ni/_/de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyad/_/
[\[106b.5\]]ji ltar byung don yang dag rig_/'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis/_/yang dag lta ba rab sgyur bdag_/brtan pa'i sems ni gnas med pas/_/phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid ni/_/thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma ltar/_/khams gsum 'di dag thams 
[\[106b.6\]]cad ni/_/mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir shes bya/_/sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol/_/'tsho bar dbang phyug 'du ba dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni/_/thams cad shin tu ring du spangs/_/rtag tu rtog pa med gyur pas/_/gnyis su med par nges 
[\[106b.7\]]byas nas/_/pha rol phyin drug rnal 'byor gyis/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub rab grub phyir/_/sems can don la legs nus kyang /_/sems can yongs su brtag mi bya/_/byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas/_/phyogs las rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam/_/thabs 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dang shes rab ldan pa'i bdag_/sbyor ba kun la rgyab kyis phyogs/_/de nyid goms par rab byas pas/_/skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/rtog pa kun las rnam par grol/_/sems can bsam pa'i khyad par las/_/sgyu ma ltar 
[\[107a.2\]]sogs rnal 'byor gyis/_/thams cad nyid ni bza' bar bya/_/chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung /_/gang yang kun tu lam grogs med/_/dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod par rab tu bza'/_/longs spyod rdzogs don 'di dag 
[\[107a.3\]]kun/_/khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/_/sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje sems dpas rnam par sprul/_/ye shes mtha' yas thob pa yis/_/de bzhin gshegs phyag mi bya na/_/rtag tu sgom pa ldan pa yis/_/dbang bskur med 
[\[107a.4\]]sogs smos ci dgos/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/_/de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/_/de phyir de nyid lha rnams nyid/_/dkyil 'khor smyung ba mi bya zhing /_/phyag rgya mchod rten las mi bya/_/dpal ldan rdo rje mgon 
[\[107a.5\]]pos ni/_/gang yang gzhan du bstan pa rnams/_/lhag par mos pas gnas gang yang /_/de rnams kyis kyang de nyid rig_/ji ltar bdud rtsi'i don gnyer bas/_/snying po blangs nas dor ba spong /_/de ltar chos kyi snying po ni/_/thob nas rtog pa thams cad spangs/_/
[\[107a.6\]]rtog med gang tshe blo ldan pas/_/dogs pa spangs shing gnas med pa/_/thugs kyi rdo rje ci gsungs bzhin/_/de tshe 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/_/rtog pas dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur te/_/'gro ba drug gi 'khor ba yi/_/rgya mtsho ru ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/rtog pa 
[\[107a.7\]]med na grol 'gyur zhing /_/gnas ni dri med zhi ba nyid/_/de phyir rtog pa'i dgra gzhom phyir/_/dam tshig sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang /_/de ni rtag tu goms par bya/_/gang gis dam tshig gnas gyur pa/_/sngags shes bsam pa'i nus pas bya/_/dngos 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]po kun la blta bar bya/_/nges par thams cad ma skyes pa'i/_/rnam pa yi ni rnal 'byor gyis/_/khyi dang bong bu rnga mo dang /_/glang po la sogs khrag 'thungs nas/_/sha yang rtag tu bza' ba nyid/_/sha chen khrag gis bsgos pa ni/_/thams cad khyad 
[\[107b.2\]]par du ni blta/_/dman pa'i sha ni thams cad dang /_/srog chags 'bum phrag brgya ldan bza'/_/rnam snang shin tu rul ba yi/_/srin bu brgya phrag zi zir ldan/_/khyi dang mi skyugs bsres nas ni/_/sha ni rdo rje'i chus gos ldan/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[107b.3\]]pas ni spro ba yis/_/rnam snang bsres nas bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje'i chu ni btung bar bya/_/gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu sha'i bza' ba ma rnyed na bza' ba'i don du sha'i gzugs su rnam par brtags te bza'o/_/gang zhig gzhan pa'i 'jig rten za ba de bza' 
[\[107b.4\]]bar bya'o/_/de kho na'i sgrub pa po'i dbang po gang zhig bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa de la bgrod par bya ba dang /_gang zhig bya ba ma yin pa de ni de'i bya ba dang /_bgrod pa dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin par rnam par rtog pa dang /_bza' ba dang bza' bar bya ba ma yin 
[\[107b.5\]]pa dang /_sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang /_btung ba dang btung ba ma yin par sngags pas mi bya ste/_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yang sems 'khrul pa ma yin pa de ltar chang rnal 'byor pas rtag tu btung bar bya ba 
[\[107b.6\]]dang /_dman pas shin tu sgeg pa dang /_rigs dang bcas pa dang /_rigs med pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa'i sems can thams cad la gcig pa'i tshul gyis rgyal ba lta bur blta ba dang /_glegs bam bklag par gsungs pa mi bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor dang 
[\[107b.7\]]me tog bsdu bar mi bya ba dang /_sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ba dang /_lha dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la phyag mi bya ba dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_pha rol gyi bud med skal ba bzang mo bsten par bya ba dang /_gdug pa can la byams pa mi bya bar gsungs pa dang /_
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]sangs rgyas dang srog chags gsad pa dang /_rgyal bas mchod pa'i slob dpon dang /_ye shes kyi dam tshig ni sems can de dam tshig gis rtag tu dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par byed de/_blo dang ldan pa la phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa mchod 
[\[108a.2\]]par byed do/_/gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang zhig slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse mo la mthong ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas slob dpon la sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo /_/nges par 
[\[108a.3\]]rang gi dam tshig sangs rgyas 'dod pas dngos grub sbyin par byed pas bla ma dam pa la smad par mi bya ba dang /_rdo rje spun la mi gus par mi bya ba dang /_gang zhig byin pa de bzung nas mchod rten la phyag mi bya ba dang /_spun dang /_bu dang /_pha dang /_rgyal 
[\[108a.4\]]srid kyi longs spyod dang /_gter dang /_nor dang /_'bru thams cad la rtswa lta bur mthong nas khams gsum gyi rgyal po bsgrub par bya'o/_/'khyud pa'i spyod pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/_/
[\[108a.5\]]spyod pa pha rol phyin mtshan nyid/_/gang gi ring nas shes pa de/_/rdo rje yo gir the tshom med/_/mkha' 'gro ma sogs gtor ma ni/_/ji ltar rnyed dang bza' btung ni/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yis bza'/_/ro yi dkris ma'i gos bzang dang /_/ro bsregs 
[\[108a.6\]]thal bas rnam par brgyan/_/phru chag shin tu gsang bar ni/_/mtshan mo'i dus su rgyu bar bya/_/bzhi mdo dang ni ri bo dang /_/shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang /_/bzhir ni de nas sngags pa yis/_/bsgom pa bzang po bya bar brjod/_/ma mo'i khyim 
[\[108a.7\]]dang mtshan mo dang /_/yang na dben pa'am bas mthar ni/_/cung zad drod ni thob pa yis/_/gal te spyod pa byed 'dod na/_/bdag nyid gal te 'grub 'dod pas/_/byis pa bzhin du spyad nas ni/_/sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur/_/blo ldan chen 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pos rgyu bar bya/_/zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/kha dog can gyi rtag sgrib pa/_/ba spu'i khung bu'i bu ga nas/_/phyogs bcu rnams su dbyung bar bya/_/'jam pa'i rdo rjer rang gyur nas/_/dkyil 'khor par ni rab tu brtag_/pad+ma'i tshal ni nyams dga' 
[\[108b.2\]]bar/_/chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang /_/der gnas rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/phug gam ri yi rtse mor ni/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gnas/_/ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du bza'/_/zos shing zos nas 
[\[108b.3\]]gtor ma sbyin/_/'bras bu sna tshogs do shal sogs/_/'ol ma zi sogs de bzhin spras/_/srog chags yan lag gos gyon zhing /_/bde don gnyer la bde ba sbyin/_/res 'ga' legs sbyar zur chag ni/_/bzlog pa yis ni 'don par byed/_/
[\[108b.4\]]bza' dang bza' min ci snyed pa/_/smyon pa'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya/_/gzhan pa'i yul 'khor grub pa dang /_/ri yi phug dang tshang tshing dang /_/gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod che/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du yang /_/der gnas shes rab can gyis bsgom/_/
[\[108b.5\]]skrag pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_/de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas/_/yang ni phyogs las rnam rgyal brtsam/_/sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol/_/phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa yi/_/skye ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa yi/_/kun gyi bsam pa 
[\[108b.6\]]'gengs par byed/_/gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa kun/_/bsgom pas spangs shing rnam par spangs/_/'dis ni bsgoms pa thams cad kyis/_/phyogs las rnam rgyal mngon par brjod/_/de ltar re zhig gnas byas nas/_/de nyid mi shigs rnal 'byor 
[\[108b.7\]]pas/_/rig ma'i lha mo 'dod pa yi/_/shin tu gzugs can bsdus nas bya/_/chus byung yid 'ong rin chen dang /_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i nyams dga' 'am/_/lha yi bu mo gnod sbyin mo/_/yang na klu mo rkang 'og tu/_/gnas pa dang ni lha min mo/_/'di 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]nang yo gis rig ma gcig_/rang gi sems la mngon 'dod pa/_/lcags kyu zhags pa'i rab sbyor bas/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bkug nas bsgrub/_/nye bar dgos pa rgyas pa kun/_/ma bslangs par ni lha yis ster/_/rga dang nad las rnam 
[\[109a.2\]]par grol/_/gnyis med gnas gsum sdig pa med/_/lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni/_/phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam/_/skal dang skal med rnam dpyang pas/_/de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya/_/bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid/_/ji ltar rnyed pa bza' bar 
[\[109a.3\]]bya/_/yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir/_/zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o/_/bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol/_/de bzhin ngo tsha'i bya ba nyid/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/_/yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che/_/mchod sbyin sbyin sreg dka' thub 'das/_/
[\[109a.4\]]sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs/_/dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol/_/shin tu rnal 'byor ldan spyod kyis/_/nges par sngon du lha min gang /_/brgya byin lta bu yin na yang /_/de la 'jigs par mi bya ste/_/seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par 
[\[109a.5\]]rgyu/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya/_/rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa/_/gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med/_/yang na dpal ldan rgyal tshab che'i/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa bsgrag par bya/_/gang gis dngos grub 
[\[109a.6\]]mthar 'gro ba/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/sgom pa po yis rnam gzung ba/_/rna ba dag la rna cha bzang /_/spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin/_/lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid/_/rked pa la ni ska rags nyid/_/rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo/_/
[\[109a.7\]]dpung pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid/_/mgrin pa la ni nor bu ste/_/bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid/_/bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de/_/he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid/_/mnyam par gzhag pas gnas par bya/_/shin tu bzhin bzang mig yang sam/_/rang gis dbang 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]bskur snying rje can/_/rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas/_/spyod pa brtul zhugs rtogs par bya/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos med na/_/gang zhig rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i/_/rigs kyis kyang ni bya ba'o/_/yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba/_/byang chub sa bon bcug pa 
[\[109b.2\]]yis/_/sbyang ba byas te khyer nas ni/_/gang tshe rdo rje mchog ldan par/_/de tshe glu ni blang bar bya/_/gang tshe dga' ba skyes pa na/_/thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste/_/de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis bya/_/'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod 
[\[109b.3\]]pa/_/rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med/_/mgul gyi phreng bar rin chen bdag_/lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod/_/ska rags la ni don yod gnas/_/shes rab kha T+wA~M ga gzugs can/_/thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u/_/sman ni rnam par bza' 
[\[109b.4\]]bar bya/_/chu ni rtag tu btung bya ste/_/rga shis zil gyis mi non cing /_/kun tu bsrung bar gyur pa de'i/_/rkun ma'i skras kyang cod pan bya/_/de la hU~M byung sbyar bar bya/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams/_/rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin/_/
