[\[109b.5\]]sor lnga'i dum bur byas nas ni/_/cod pan la ni rnam par 'dzin/_/thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/_/skra yi ska rags nyis skor nyid/_/thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs/_/rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin/_/cang te'u'i sgra ni bzlas pa ste/_/sems 
[\[109b.6\]]can thams cad mgron gnyer ba'o/_/kha T+wAM ga ni shes rab ste/_/rdo rje bzlas dang bsgom pa yin/_/thod pa can du rang gyur pa/_/brkam dang rmongs dang de bzhin 'jigs/_/khro dang ngo tsha'i bya ba ni/_/rtag tu rnam par spang bar bya/_/he ru ka bdag rnal 'byor 
[\[109b.7\]]pa/_/rigs lnga la ni gnas par bya/_/rigs lnga dag dang mnyam par ldan/_/rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag_/rigs gcig du ma nyid kyis ni/_/gang phyir dbye bas bskyed mi bya/_/bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas/_/the tshom med par spyod pa bya/_/
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las/_spyod pa'i brtag pa ste lnga pa'o//_//lha lags nyan par 'tshal lags na/_/rang byin brlab pa'i rim ci lags/_/gsang ba la sogs dgongs pa ci/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[110a.2\]]snying rje che/_/yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/_/thams cad rgyud kyi gtan phab pa/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bsgrag par bya/_/e yi rnam pa gang gsungs pa/_/gnas kyi mtshan nyid mi gsal bar/_/'gro dang rjes su 'ong ba nyid/_/khams dang 
[\[110a.3\]]sems kyi rtag 'gro ba'o/_/khams zhes bya ba'i sgra du lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/'di ltar gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug brjod par bya ste/_/ra yi rnam pa khrag gi khams/_/ha ni de bzhin reg bya nyid/_/s+ye ni bad kan zhes byar 
[\[110a.4\]]gsungs/_/pa yi rnam pa sems nyid dang /_/ra yi rnam pa ro nyid de/_/me ni de bzhin lta tshil dag_/ra ni me nyid du ni gsungs/_/me yi rnam pa sha ru gsungs/_/sa yi rnam pa bshang bar gsungs/_/rbA yi rnam pas de bzhin tshil/_/sman pags pa 
[\[110a.5\]]nyid du gsungs/_/ni yi rnam pas rus pa nyid/_/sa ni gci ba nyid du gsungs/_/dA yi rnam pas glo ba nyid/_/s+thi ni pad+ma nyid du gsungs/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i rdzas dang ldan/_/ta yi rnam pas khu ba ni/_/byang chub sems las byung ba yin/_/rtsa yi 
[\[110a.6\]]sgra yi rang bzhin las/_/de ltar lha mo bsgrags pa yin/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/cha yi bdag nyid 'gyur ba nyid/_/ra ni me zhes bya bar gsungs/_/khrag las mkhris pa yang dag langs/_/mtshan nyid gcig 'dod bad kan las/_/rdul 
[\[110a.7\]]dang chu rgyus yang dag byung /_/de yi mgon por brjod pa'i rlung /_/ha ni kun du 'gro bar gsungs/_/rus pa'i mtshams ni 'di rnams su/_/sa bon lnga ni yang dag btab/_/rkan du ra dang thams cad du/_/sa bon bzhi ni dam pa nyid/_/dang po'i re'u mig 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]gnas der ni/_/sa bon lnga ni mdzes pa nyid/_/ha ni dbyangs kyi drug ldan pa/_/rnam par shes par yongs su grags/_/ha yi rnam pas thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor/_/sgra yi tshul las byung bton zhing /_/dam tshig spyod pa'i 
[\[110b.2\]]spyod yul nyid/_/'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/_/thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas/_/bsrub dang srub byed sbyor ba las/_/ji lta ba ni de bzhin no/_/sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan/_/rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis/_/
[\[110b.3\]]rtsa gnyis skye gnas dbus su ni/_/g.yon dang g.yas su de bzhin du/_/g.yon du khu ba rnam shes bya/_/g.yas pa la ni khrag nyid de/_/de yi phan tshun bsdu ba yang /_/chos kyi dbyings ni sdud pa yin/_/snying stobs sku dang rdul dag bcas/_/mun 
[\[110b.4\]]pa sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/snyi stobs khu ba rin chen rdul/_/mun pa skyed par byed pa nyid/_/rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyor bas/_/dngos dang dngos med ro gcig 'gyur/_/bshang ba gci ba bad kan dang /_/khrag dang lnga pa khu ba nyid/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[110b.5\]]lnga yi gong bu'i dngos/_/de phyir rdo rje can du brjod/_/rus pa rkang dang khu ba ni/_/pha las skyes par de bzhin gsungs/_/pags pa dang ni sha dang khrag_/ma las skyes pa zhes byar bsgrags/_/gong bu'i bsdu ba rnams kyi yang /_/tshad ni 'di dag gsungs 
[\[110b.6\]]pa ste/_/gong bu gcig pu gnyis su 'gyur/_/gnyis su gyur pa du ma rnams/_/gcig pu du ma'i rang bzhin gyis/_/de phyir rdo rje can 'dir gsungs/_/rtsa yi kun spyod nyid gsungs pa/_/de yi sgo yang de gnyis la/_/de rnams 'du ba'i dus su ni/_/lha ni 
[\[110b.7\]]dmigs par 'gyur ba yin/_/steng gi sgo dang 'og nyid de/_/'og gi sgo ni rnam par shes/_/steng gi sgo ni dbyings nyid do/_/rtsa ni thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 'jug par bsam/_/de yi lus kyi steng sgo la'ang /_/rdo rje can gyi rtag 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]rgyun bzhugs/_/steng gi sgor ni sbyor ba gsum/_/sgo dgu rnams kyis yongs su bskor/_/kye bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba gsum ni ci zhes bshad/_/ji ltar gang gi rnam pa yis/_/sems kyi rtag tu 'gro ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gsum nyid sbyor ba sbyor ba gsum/_/rnam gsum dbye bas rnam par gnas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/tha ma 'bring po dam pa nyid/_/ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu pa/_/sbom po lnga ni lhag pa'i lha/_/bug pa dgur ni son 
[\[111a.3\]]pa'i sgo/_/dgu yi rnam par yongs su grags/_/tha ma'i sga ni skur ldan pa/_/sbom po lha yi sprul pa'o/_/sems dang skyes bu skyes bu can/_/khyad par rnal 'byor pa yi don/_/rtag par kun du dus su ni/_/'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad par las/_/rkang med rkang 
[\[111a.4\]]gcig rkang gnyis dang /_/rkang bzhi la ni sogs pa yi/_/rlung la sogs pas rab dbye bas/_/rtag tu 'gro ba rlung rnam bzhi/_/sems kyi gnas pa rnam pa gnyis/_/nub dang rab rgyu'i cho ga yis/_/rtag tu nub dang rab rgyu ba/_/sems can kun la 'gro ba'o/_/
[\[111a.5\]]de ltar gang zhig mi rig pa/_/sems med skyed bu med pa dang /_/yid dang ldan pa med pa dang /_/rnal 'byor pa yi don med pa/_/me nyid gang dang rlung dang ni/_/dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/_/'khor lor sems kyi kun spyod pa/_/steng dang ngos dang brang 'og 
[\[111a.6\]]'gro/_/zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas/_/gsum pa'i sgo ni yid dang bcas/_/rngub dang dbyung ba gnyis ka yang /_/sgo yi dam pa nyid yin te/_/gtso bo dam pa yi ni sgo/_/steng dang 'og tu rab tu grags/_/'og gi sgos ni rnam par shes/_/steng gi sgos ni 
[\[111a.7\]]dbyings nyid de/_/rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/_/steng gi sgor ni g.yo zhing gnas/_/de rnams 'og tu rnam par gnas/_/steng gis gshegs su gsol ba nyid/_/spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba yi/_/tshul gyi sems kyis rtag tu 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'gro/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo rnams/_/'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la/_/yon tan skyon ni rab brjod pas/_/bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis/_/lhan cig skyes pa grub pa'i gnas/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[111b.2\]]dpa' bde chen po/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan lha mos ni/_/bol+la kak+ko lar bcug nas/_/sems dpa' chen po mnyes byas te/_/tshig ni 'di dag yang dag gsol/_/dpyid ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_/thig le bgyi ba 
[\[111b.3\]]ji ltar lags/_/mi phyed la sogs ji ltar gnas/_/de yi gnas ni ji ltar lags/_/pul+lI ra sogs ci gsungs dang /_/'khor lo dgod pa de bzhin gzhan/_/ji ltar rtsa yi rdzogs pa yi/_/de yi dbye ba bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/lha mo bshad par bya yis nyon/_/gsang ba las ni ches gsang mchog_/rtsa'i rang bzhin dang /_gnas la sogs pa dang /_sa bcu dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi 'khor lor son pa gnas kyi nang 
[\[111b.5\]]gi rab tu dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsungs pa/_spyi bo mA la ya yi yul/_/de bzhin spyi gtsug 'bar ba 'dzin/_/de bzhin du ni o D+yan nyid/_/rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod/_/rtsib ma'i rgyab ni arbu da/_/bzhi ni gnas shes bya ba'o/_/rna ba g.yon pa'i 
[\[111b.6\]]rang bzhin ni/_/de bzhin go dA ba rir shes/_/dga' ba'i dbang phyug bshad pa ni/_/smin ma'i dbus gnas rab tu bskul/_/de bzhin mig dag lha mo'i mkhar/_/lag pa'i rtsa bar ma la ba/_/de ltar nye bar gnas nyid de/_/thugs kyi 'khor lor rnam 
[\[111b.7\]]par gnas/_/gnas kyi khyad par rang bzhin gyi/_/mkha' spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad/_/mchan khung kA ma rU pa nyid/_/nu ma o drar rab tu grags/_/'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod/_/lte ba tri sha ku nir brjod/_/sna yi rtse mor ko sha lA/_/nye ba'i 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]zhing du brjod pa'o/_/kha ni ka ling ka ru brjod/_/mgrin pa lam pa ka ru gsungs/_/tshan do ha zhes rnam par bshad/_/snying gi kAny+tsir brjod pa ste/_/dbang po hi ma la ya nyid/_/nye ba yi ni tshan dor brjod/_/de ltar yul rnams thams cad 
[\[112a.2\]]du/_/gsung gi 'khor lor rnam par gnas/_/gnas kyi khyad par yul gyi ni/_/sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad/_/rtags la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lhag par gnas/_/gsang ba la ni khyim gyi lha/_/'di dag 'du bar brjod pa'o/_/brla ni sau rASh+Ta ru brjod/_/
[\[112a.3\]]rje ngar gnyis ni gser gling gi/_/rang gi ngo bor rnam par bshad/_/nye ba ya ni 'du ba nyid/_/sor mo nA [(]gar [,]ga ra [)]ru brjod/_/rkang pa'i rgyab ni sin d+hur nges/_/dur khrod du ni yang dag brjod/_/mthe bong la ni ma ru zer/_/pus mo ku la dA ru brjod/_/'di 
[\[112a.4\]]dag nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/_/mkha' 'gro mar ni gsungs pa'o/_/'di dag yul dang rang lus skyes/_/rang gi nang dang phyi rol gnas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas/_/thams 
[\[112a.5\]]cad du ni yang dag bshad/_/'di rnams gnas su mkha' 'gro ma/_/rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/_/drug pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan yang dam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar gnas su son pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo 
[\[112a.6\]]bshad par bya'o/_/snying gi nang song pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas/_/de yi nang du son pa'i rtsa/_/mar me'i rang gi ngo bo can/_/chu shing gi ni me tog ltar/_/brkyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o/_/de yi nang gnas dpa' bo ni/_/yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra 
[\[112a.7\]]tsam/_/mi shigs hU~M gi sa bon ni/_/kha ba lta bur 'dzag pa nyid/_/lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba/_/dpyid ces bya bar rnam par bshad/_/rgod ma'i me yi gzugs kyis ni/_/bdag med ma ni thig ler brjod/_/las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis/_/
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar/_/dpyid thob pa yi chog shes pas/_/snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par gnas/_/dpa' bo shrI ni he ru ka/_/'di ni dpyid kyi thig ler brjod/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs 'dzin ma/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par gnas/_/
[\[112b.2\]]sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas ni/_/sgo ni rnam gsum 'byung ba las/_/'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar byed/_/'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas/_/lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni/_/thung ngu ru ni rab tu grags/_/snying la yang ni hU~M nyid ni/_/ring po ma mo gnyis dang 
[\[112b.3\]]gnas/_/mgrin pa o~M gyi gzugs kyis ni/_/ma mo gsum brjod pa lu ta/_/dpral bar ha~M gi rnam pa 'di/_/sgra dang thig le mi shigs pa/_/'khor lo pa zhi yi rab dbye bas/_/sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang /_/thun bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_/
[\[112b.4\]]pad+ma bzhi las byung ba dang /_/dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo yis/_/rnal 'byor bzhi ni mngon du'o/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis/_/bya dang byed pa'i dngos po las/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol/_/'dab ma rnams kyi 
[\[112b.5\]]bzhi la yang /_/'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa rnams ni/_/mar me'i rang bzhin lta bur ni/_/phyogs bzhi la ni rnam par gnas/_/rtsa rnams bzhi yang mtshams rnams su/_/rnam par gnas shing der son pa'ang /_/bdud rtsi lnga ni 'bab pa ste/_/de mchod rang gi gzugs 
[\[112b.6\]]gnas pas/_/de yi dngos po'i ngo bo las/_/mchod pa bzhi ni rnam par bshad/_/lus kyi snying gi nang du ni/_/rtsa lnga rnams ni rnam par gnas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi nye bar brjod/_/gnas sogs dgye ba la gnas nas/_/gnas dang 
[\[112b.7\]]gnas la rnam par gnas/_/spyi bor yang dag byung ba yi/_/rtsa ni spyi bo skyes zhes brjod/_/rdul dang snying stobs mun pa'i tshul/_/de yi nang na tso mo ni/_/pul+lI rar ni mi phyed ma/_/so dang sen mo 'bab par brjod/_/'bar ba 'dzin pa gra gzugs ma/_/de 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]bzhin skra dang ba spu 'bab/_/o D+yAn gnas ni chen po la/_/rtse ba ma ni rnam par gnas/_/rna ba g.yas par gnas nas ni/_/pags pa dri ma 'bab ma gnas/_/urbu dar ni g.yon pa ma/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni sha 'bab ma/_/gang zhig chu 
[\[113a.2\]]rgyus 'bab pa'i rtsa/_/ba yi mchog sbyin rnam par gnas/_/de ni sra pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/thung du mar ni rnam par bshad/_/gang zhig dga' ba'i dbang phyug rtsa/_/de bzhin rus sbal skyes mar grags/_/sra ba'i dngos pos gnas pa'i phyir/_/rus pa'i 
[\[113a.3\]]phreng ba 'khrugs par gnas/_/lha mo'i mkhar du gang zhig rtsa/_/'jam pa sgom pa ma ru brjod/_/de ni rtag tu mchin pa 'bab/_/thams cad lus la rtag par gnas/_/mA la bar ni dbang ma ni/_/rgyal ba'i dbang phyug snying la gnas/_/rtsa ni gang 
[\[113a.4\]]zhig mig 'bab ma/_/'dod pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas/_/gzugs ni mthong bar 'dod pa ste/_/skyon bral ma zhes rnam par bshad/_/o Dir mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa/_/gang zhig 'jug ma chen mor brjod/_/tri sha ku ner byung ba ni/_/ma mo nges 
[\[113a.5\]]par glo bar bcas/_/ko sha lar ni mtshan mo nyid/_/rgyu ma'i phreng bzang khyab cing 'bab/_/ka ling kar ni bsil sbyin ma/_/ngos kyi chu rgyus yang dag bshad/_/tsha ba ma ni lto gnas nges/_/lam pA kar ni rab tu grags/_/'bab ma nyid ni kAny+tsir gnas/_/
[\[113a.6\]]thams cad du ni bshang ba 'bab/_/mtshams kyi mtha' yi nang du yang /_/kha ba'i gnas su rangs ma'i gdong /_/shin tu gzugs can bad kan ldan/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha gnas yang dag gnas/_/gang zhig rtag tu rnag 'bab pa/_/khyim gyi lhar ni yang dag 
[\[113a.7\]]gnas/_/mkha' 'gro dam pa'i dbang phyug gis/_/spyi ma nyid du rnam par bshad/_/so rASh+Tar ni gang zhig rtsa/_/rgyu sbyin ma ni dmar po 'bab/_/rdul ni 'bab par gyur pa ni/_/gser gling du ni yang dag bshad/_/yan lag gzi brjid kun khyab ma/_/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]sbyor bral mar ni rab tu grags/_/nA ga rar ni sdu gu ma/_/tshil can sbom zhing myos byed 'bab/_/sin d+hur shin tu grub pa nyid/_/mya ngan mchi ma 'bab mar brjod/_/ma rur gnas ma lud skam 'bab/_/'tshed pa ma zhes rnam par bstan/_/gu lu twar ni yid bzang 
[\[113b.2\]]ma/_/sha dang snabs ni 'bab ma'o/_/drug pa las yul gyi dgod pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//lha lags mnyan par 'tshal lags na/_/nang gi dkyil 'khor mchod pa la/_/sogs pa'i las ni ji ltar lags/_/sbyin sreg las ni mi 
[\[113b.3\]]'tshal bas/_/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/he ru la sogs pa'i lha/_/rtsa gzugs mdzes par yang dag byung /_/lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/_/sgo bzhir ji skad gsungs pa'o/_/rang 
[\[113b.4\]]gi yan lag brgyad byung bas/_/ka ba de yis bskor nas gnas/_/dngos po kun gyis mnyam pa'i phyir/_/gru bzhi bar ni rab tu grags/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bos ni/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gcig tu gsungs/_/ri ni mgo bo'i ze 'bru la/_/ji 
[\[113b.5\]]ltar rtsom chen la sogs rim/_/bla ma'i dus thabs rim nyid kyis/_/de ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas/_/rkang pa'i mthil du rtsom chen rlung /_/gzhu yi dbyibs su rnam par gnas/_/sum mdo yi ni gnas su ni/_/de bzhin gru gsum 'bar ba nyid/_/
[\[113b.6\]]zlum po'i rnam pa'i dbyibs kyis ni/_/chu ni lte bar rnam par gnas/_/snying gar yang ni sa nyid de/_/kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do/_/sgal tshigs dbyug gu'i gzugs kyis ni/_/ri rab ri rgyal de bzhin no/_/der ni spyi bo'i char gnas/_/'dam skyes 'dab ma sum 
[\[113b.7\]]bcu gnyis/_/dbyangs dang gsal byed mdzes par gnas/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis byang chub 'dod/_/pad+ma'i nang du son pa gang /_/de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brjod/_/spyi bo'i nang du klad pa ni/_/gang zhig gnas pa de ru gsungs/_/de nang ha~M gi rnam pa nyid/_/
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]thig le'i gzugs can mi shigs pa/_/'jig rten kun gyi rtsa ba de/_/brtan pa'i bdag nyid g.yo ba'i bdag_/gsal dang mi gsal gzugs las ni/_/sa bon gzugs kyi rnam par gnas/_/lus can rnams ni kun gyi gzugs/_/
[\[114a.2\]]de phyir gdod nas rdzogs pa nyid/_/bdud rtsi'i gzugs kyis 'dzag par ni/_/nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gnas/_/de nyid kyis ni sgra 'byed cing /_/me ni dga' bar byed pa ste/_/des ni gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/yin pa nyid du the tshom med/_/de nyid 
[\[114a.3\]]dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs/_/dngos po rnams kyi snying po mchog_/de ni len cing gcod pa'i phyir/_/lus ni dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod/_/rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/_/'khor lor yang ni dkyil 'khor brjod/_/byang chub sems ni rin po che/_/
[\[114a.4\]]dkyil 'khor de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/_/phyi rol bcas pa'i nang gzugs kyis/_/sna tshogs khyab cing rnam par gnas/_/phyi rol gzugs dang sgra la sogs/_/dbang po thams cad 'jug pa'o/_/nang gi khu ba la sogs pa/_/grub pa'i rdzas ni rnam 
[\[114a.5\]]par gnas/_/phyi rol bcas pa'i nang nyid kyis/_/rdo rje can gyi byang chub sems/_/sbom dang phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/'gro ba'i gnyen gyi rang bzhin can/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/dam tshig don du gsungs pas ni/_/dkyil 'khor goms 
[\[114a.6\]]pas skye ba 'dir/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur/_/nyan thos rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang /_/de bzhin rang rgyal rnams kyi dang /_/tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyi/_/dkyil 'khor goms bas rdzogs pa nyid/_/shes rab me ni cher 'bar bar/_/nang gi 
[\[114a.7\]]khu ba la sogs dang /_/de bzhin phyi rol gzugs sogs kyi/_/bsreg rdzas kyis ni sbyin sreg bya/_/skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang /_/phung po la sogs khyad par las/_/de rnams kyi ni gzugs can lha/_/de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/_/des ni de 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]mchod gang gi phyir/_/rnal 'byor mchod par yang dag bshad/_/thod pa 'di ni mgo bo nyid/_/bsreg rdzas kyi no snod du gsungs/_/blugs gzar ro mar bshad pa ste/_/snying gi 'khor lo [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]dag_/dgang gzar zhes byar yang dag brjod/_/thab 
[\[114b.2\]]khung lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi/_/tshangs pa'i me ni sum mdor gnas/_/sgra ni sngags zhes brjod pa ste/_/bzlas pa 'khor bar byed pa yin/_/bsgom pa mtshungs par snang ba nyid/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis med rnal 'byor phyir/_/
[\[114b.3\]]lhan cig skyes pa zhon pa 'di/_/'di ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs/_/dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gzugs kyi phyir/_/slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po nyid/_/de skad la sogs ci gsungs pa/_/rgyud ni thams cad rtogs par bya/_/da dung bdag la the 
[\[114b.4\]]tshom mchis/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang /_/bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyis ni/_/mgon po ji ltar rol bar 'gyur/_/de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal bas/_/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/spyi bo lter 
[\[114b.5\]]son 'khor lo ni/_/e yi dbyibs su yang dag gnas/_/snying dang mgrin par yang dag gnas/_/ba~M gi rnam pa lta bur brjod/_/lte ba'i nang gnas pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhir ldan/_/'dam skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/_/spyi bo'i nang du rnam par 
[\[114b.6\]]gnas/_/mgrin pa'i nang du son pa yang /_/pad+ma lo ma bcu drug nyid/_/de yi snying ga'i gnas su ni/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du brjod/_/'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi nyid/_/sprul pa la ni rab tu grags/_/pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad par/_/chos kyi sku ni rab tu bskor/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa 
[\[114b.7\]]bcu drug rtsibs/_/de bzhin 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/_/bde chen ye shes chen po la/_/kun tu yang dag rnam par gnas/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/_/sde tshan brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/_/yig 'bru dang po'i ngo bo yis/_/'di ni a ste yi 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]ge mchog_/chos kyi 'khor lor rnam bshad pa/_/hU~M ni mi shigs pa ru brjod/_/dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/_/ya ra la was rnam par brgyan/_/longs spyod 'khor lo'i nang gnas pa/_/oM ni yig 'bru gsal bar byed/_/cha 
[\[115a.2\]]ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/_/kun tu yongs su bskor ba'o/_/bde chen 'khor lo chen po la/_/ha~M ni thig le'i gzugs can no/_/g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag la/_/zla ba nyi ma rnam par bshad/_/mgrin pa nas brtsams g.yon pa'i rtsa/_/longs 
[\[115a.3\]]spyod rdzogs pa'i sku can ma/_/lte ba'i nang du ngal sos shing /_/kha ni 'og tu myos byed 'bab/_/gang zhig lte ba las stengs rtsa/_/de bzhin kha ni steng du 'bab/_/mgrin pa'i nang du ngal sos shing /_/khrag 'bab par ni rab tu grags/_/myos byed zla ba zhes 
[\[115a.4\]]byar bshad/_/khrag ni nyi ma zhes byar gsungs/_/sgo gnyis mnyam par zhon nas ni/_/steng dang 'og tu mnyam gnas pa/_/'di dag zla ba nyi ma gnyis/_/rtsa ni gnyis su rab tu grags/_/dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba'i 
[\[115a.5\]]rgyur/_/nub pa dang ni 'char don dang /_/log dang sad pa lta bur gsungs/_/g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos la ni/_/dbyangs ni bcu gnyis yang dag gnas/_/kha ni steng du yang dag bshad/_/ka la sogs pa rnams kyis bskor/_/kha ni 'og gi gnas su 
[\[115a.6\]]gnas/_/lhag par byas nas sbyar ba nyid/_/k+Sha ni srin po nyid gsungs pa/_/'og gi char ni rnam par gnas/_/gang tshe mgrin par chags chen gyi/_/gzugs kyi zla ba gnas pa na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i sku/_/de tshe longs spyod rdzogs par bshad/_/gang 
[\[115a.7\]]tshe rdo rje'i rtser gnas pa/_/de tshe de ni sna rtser ro/_/gang tshe longs spyod rdzogs sku yang /_/nub par gnas par gyur pas na/_/b+ha ga'i nang du son de yang /_/yungs kar tsam du rnam par gnas/_/nyi ma'i gzugs su yang dag bshad/_/sprul pa'i skur ni brjod pa ste/_/
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/spros pa de yis bskyed pa'o/_/pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po ni/_/'dab ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba can/_/sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs su ni/_/der ni nyi ma nub pa na/_/gang tshe rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/_/gong bur gyur pa rnyog pa med/_/
[\[115b.2\]]'khor ba'i lam ni rnam bcad cing /_/spros pa nyer zhi dge ba ste/_/gnyis med mchog tu dag pa nyid/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs/_/shrI ni he ru ka zhes brjod/_/rgyud ni srin bu'i gzugs can nyid/_/rgod dang lta dang lag bcangs nyid/_/rgyud du de nyid 
[\[115b.3\]]rnam par gnas/_/'dod chags nyid dang chags bral yang /_/zos nas srin bu gnas pa nyid/_/rtsa thams cad kyi mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa ste drug pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[115b.4\]]chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang /_/rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'khor lo'i bsgom pa'i lam dang ni/_/lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba dang /_/mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo'i khyad par dang /_/dgongs pa'i skad kyi khyad par ni/_/
[\[115b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs na/_/sdom pa'ang bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas par/_/a yi rnam par sdom pa'i gnas/_/ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang /_/sdom pa de nyid 
[\[115b.6\]]rab tu phye/_/bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che/_/rdo rje skye mched thams cad nyid/_/'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas/_/phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa med/_/sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni/_/'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya/_/sku gsum yongs su 
[\[115b.7\]]shes pa las/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang /_/de bzhin bde ba chen po nyid/_/skye gnas mgrin snying dbus su ni/_/sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas/_/ma lus pa yi sems can gyi/_/skye ba gang la brjod bya ba/_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gang zhig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/_/de la sprul pa'i sku nyid yin/_/sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin te/_/chos kyi sku yang snying gar yin/_/ro rnams drug gi gzugs can gyi/_/bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod/_/chos rnams kun la 
[\[116a.2\]]gnas brtan phyir/_/thams cad yod pa'i rang bzhin can/_/mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo dang /_/bde ba chen po spyi bor gnas/_/e ba~M rnam pa rgyu mthun nyid/_/rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las/_/skyes bu byed pa longs spyod la/_/bde chen 'khor lor dri 
[\[116a.3\]]med nyid/_/rgyu mthun la sogs rab dbye bas/_/'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/_/las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis/_/las la bcom ldan shes rab brjod/_/gang zhig sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas brtan brjod/_/chos ni ngag 
[\[116a.4\]]las byung ba'i phyir/_/'khor lo thams cad yod par smra/_/gang zhig mgrin par kun bkur phyir/_/longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid/_/gang zhig bde chen mgor gnas phyir/_/bde chen 'khor lor dge 'dun che/_/sde pa sku zhes brjod pa ste/_/lto 
[\[116a.5\]]ba gnas su brjod par bya/_/skye gnas 'dod chags bral ba nyid/_/mngal gyi phru ma chos gos te/_/de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid/_/mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag_/'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyis gnas/_/de bzhin sngags bzlas a dang ha~M/_/sngags 'don 
[\[116a.6\]]skyes pa dge slong nyid/_/gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs/_/'di rnams rkyen gyis sems can rnams/_/sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/_/zla ba bcu yang sa rnams te/_/sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/_/btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/_/khu ba zhes bya rnam par 
[\[116a.7\]]gnas/_/de med pas na bde med 'gyur/_/bde ba spangs na de med 'gyur/_/nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas/_/lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba/_/de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min/_/de nyid dngos med tshul yang min/_/zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can nyid/_/
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa/_/de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin brjod/_/rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/_/rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das/_/zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni/_/lha yi gzugs kyi rnal 
[\[116b.2\]]'byor ni/_/skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas/_/'on kyang bag chags phal pas so/_/lha mos de skad bshad pa ni/_/rnal 'byor kun gyi gong na med/_/de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/_spyan ma dang /_mA ma 
[\[116b.3\]]kI dang /_gos dkar mo dang /_sgrol ma dang /_khro gnyer can dang /_skul byed ma dang /_ri khrod ma shing lo can dang /_'og zhal ma dang /_sdom pa ma dang /_/de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur cing 
[\[116b.4\]]brgyal ba dang /_skrag par gyur to/_/de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi tshogs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bslang du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen 
[\[116b.5\]]pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rnal 'byor ma thams cad bslang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/'on kyang blo bur dri mas bsgribs/_/de bsal nas ni sangs rgyas 
[\[116b.6\]]nyid/_/bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu/_gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa/_/btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur/_/rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni/_/de yi de nyid yongs su gcod/_/dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis/_/skye bo thams 
[\[116b.7\]]cad 'chi bar 'gyur/_/dug gi de nyid shes pa des/_/dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed/_/ji ltar rlung gis zin de la/_/ma sha'i bza' ba sbyin par bya/_/ldog pa'i sman ni brtags pa las/_/rlung gis rlung la snun par byed/_/so sor rtog las rnam rtog 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dang /_/srid pa nyid kyis srid dag byed/_/ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa/_/chu gzhan gyis ni dgug par bya/_/de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang /_/rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya/_/ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa la/_/yang ni me yis gdung bar bya/_/
[\[117a.2\]]de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa/_/'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya/_/skye bo mi bzad pa yi las/_/gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/_/thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/_/'dod chags kyis ni 'jig rten 
[\[117a.3\]]'ching /_/'dod chags nyid kyis rnam par grol/_/bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes/_/'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las/_/kun du ru las lnga ru 'gyur/_/dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las/_/dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 
[\[117a.4\]]'gyur/_/bol+la kak+ko la sbyor bas/_/reg pa sra ba'i bag chags kyis/_/sra ba gti mug chos yin phyir/_/gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod/_/gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid/_/gsher ba chu yi khams su brjod/_chu ni mi bskyod ngo bo'i 
[\[117a.5\]]phyir/_/zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa/_/gnyis kyi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las/_/rtag tu drod ni skye bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin/_/'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/kak+ko lar ni gang zhig sems/_/de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can/_/
[\[117a.6\]]don yod rlung las 'byung ba'i phyir/_/phrag dog don yod grub pa yin/_/bde ba 'dod chags sems yin te/_/rin chen khrag dang 'dod chags nyid/_/ser sna nam mkha' las byung ba/_/nam mkha' ser sna rdo rje yin/_/sems ni chen po gcig nyid la/_/lnga yi 
[\[117a.7\]]gzugs kyis mtshon pa nyid/_/rigs ni lnga po skyes pa lnga/_/de la stong phrag du ma nyid/_/de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig_/bde chen mchog tu phan pa nyid/_/'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yis/_/dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang gA'i klung ni bcu 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]yi bye ma snyed/_/rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/_/rigs chen lnga ni rigs ni du ma rnams/_/de rnams rigs las brgya phrag du ma rnams/_/de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams/_/bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur/_/
[\[117b.2\]]de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'dir gsol pa/_ci gong bu'i gzugs can 'di tsam du'ang chung ba de snyed kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[117b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_/skra yi khyon tsam phra ba la/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams du ma ni/_/gnas dang dog dang 'dzer min pa/_/de bzhin 'dir yang blta bya ste/_/stobs bcu dag dang ldan pa'i lha/_/bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag gi ni/_/sdum par ston mo bzhes 
[\[117b.4\]]par 'tshal/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rigs kyi bu/_/yang dag byung ba bka' stsal pa/_/yang dag sbyor byung mtshan nyid ni/_/bshad par bya yis lha mo nyon/_/gsang ba la ni sa yi khams/_/mchog la de bzhin du ni chu/_/dgyes pa la ni me ru bshad/_/thams 
[\[117b.5\]]cad bdag nyid rlung la gnas/_/rtag tu bzhugs par brjod pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa bdag_/yang na me long lta bu'i tshul/_/de bzhin du yang mnyam pa nyid/_/so sor rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/de bzhin bya ba nan tan la/_/rtag tu bzhugs par brjod 
[\[117b.6\]]pa 'di/_/shin tu rnam dag rang bzhin can/_/de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad nyid/_/gzhan yang mi bskyod pa nyid dang /_/yang na rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_/yang na 'od dpag med pa yis/_/gang tshe rtag bzhugs don yod la/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu'i dngos/_/
[\[117b.7\]]thig le'i gzugs te yid lta bu/_/shin tu yang dag ye shes che/_/lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin can/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/_/bde ba dam pa ru ni brjod/_/rang byung ngo bo 'di nyid ni/_/chos kyi skur ni rab tu grags/_/de yi shes rab lhan cig skyes/_/de phyir 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]gnas pa'i gzugs can ma/_/las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis/_/lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar/_/bdag med ma zhes rnam par bshad/_/dpyid kyi thig le nyid du brjod/_/skra yi rtse mo brgya stong lus/_/glog gi zer ma mnyam pa'i 'od/_/lha 
[\[118a.2\]]yi rnal 'byor dus su ni/_/ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse bug nas/_/phyogs bcur rnam par phyung nas ni/_/kun tu lha dang lha min bsdigs/_/snying la chos kyi 'khor lor ni/_/bsregs nas longs spyod 'khor lor song /_/sna yi bu ga g.yas pa nas/_/thams cad 
[\[118a.3\]]du ni phyung nas ni/_/mdzod spur song ba dag gis kyang /_/bug pa nges par phyogs bcu yi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/shangs kyi bu ga g.yon par ni/_/zhugs nas spyi gtsug 'khor lor ni/_/kun bsregs rnam par phyung nas ni/_/sngar gsungs 
[\[118a.4\]]nyid kyi bug pa nas/_/yang ni spyi gtsug zhugs par bya/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs pa yis/_/dga' ba de nas bskyed par bya/_/lte ba'i dkyil 'khor phyin nas ni/_/snga ma bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/_/yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i rgyud chen po las 
[\[118a.5\]]dpyid kyi thig le zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste drug pa'o//_//ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/_/bcom ldan bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/dgongs pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi/_/rnal 'byor ma yi rtag dam tshig_/nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa/_/
[\[118a.6\]]rgod dang lta ba dag gis kyang /_/'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis sogs/_/rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/_/dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa/_/bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol/_/dgongs pa'i skad ni skad chen po/_/dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru/_/
[\[118a.7\]]rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis/_/de nyid rtse gcig sems kyis nyon/_/ma da na chang ba la sha/_/'du ba ma la ya dza nyid/_/'gro ba khe Ta ro ni shra ba/_/rus pa'i rgyan ni ni raM shu/_/'ong ba phreM ka Na ru brjod/_/cang te kri pri ta ru brjod/_/skal med du du ra zhes bshad/_/
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]skal ldan kA liny+dza ra~M brjod/_/reg min Di Di ma zhes brjod/_/thod pa pad+ma b+ha dza na~M/_/bza' ba ti pri ta ra shes bya/_/tshod ma ma la tin d+ha na~M/_/bshang ba tsa tus+sa ma~M brjod/_/gci ba ka s+t+ru ri zhes brjod/_/rang byung sih+lar shes par bya/_/khu ba ga bur brjod par 
[\[118b.2\]]bya/_/sha chen shA li dza zhes brjod/_/dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du ru/_/rdo rje bol+la zhes brjod de/_/pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer/_/mu khi/_sor mo kha ru bcug pa ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o/_/g+ho g+hu/_thal mo spyi bor yang dag gzhag_/mar me ma yi 
[\[118b.3\]]mtshan ma'o/_/g+hu g+hu/_/mthe bong rgan po bcangs pa ni/_/'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/_/mu g+hu/_lag pas rna ba brdebs pa ni/_/g.yo ldan ma yi mtshan ma nyid/_/lu g+hu/_sna rtser thal mo brdebs pa ni/_/dge ba'i gtam ni 'dri ba'o/_/draSh+Ta [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mgo 
[\[118b.4\]]ston pa/_/rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan mar mtshon/_/Da zhes bya ba skyes bur nges/_/DI ni bud med de nas brjod/_/pu zhes bya bar rengs pa nyid/_/su ni de bzhin za ba nyid/_/ma zhes bya ba ma ru brjod/_/yo ni de bzhin chung mar nges/_/b+hi zhes bya ba sring mo nyid/_/
[\[118b.5\]]d+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor brjod/_/lu zhes bya ba bu mor nges/_/s+t+ri ni khrag tu shes par bya/_/sa ni zhi ba'i btung ba nyid/_/pe zhes bya ba btung ba ste/_/bi zhes bya ba nges par sha/_/b+ha zhes bya ba bza' bar brjod/_/b+hu zhes bya ba 'du ba nyid/_/bi zhes bya ba dur khrod 
[\[118b.6\]]nyid/_/b+hu zhes bya ba ro ru brjod/_/DI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma/_/ga ni de bzhin lA mA nyid/_/s+t+ri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma/_/ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma/_/kha zhes bya ba dum skyes ma/_/dza zhes bya ba byin pa zung /_/ke zhes bya ba lag pa gnyis/_/b+ha zhes 
[\[118b.7\]]bya ba phyag 'tshal ba/_/swA ni legs 'ongs bya ba yin/_/'di rnams ni yi ge re re zhing yang brda ste/_dpa' bo dang sring mor des shes par bya'o/_/yi ge'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_/ngag gi brda ni mi 'tshal bas/_/bde ba chen 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pos bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad bya ba/_/de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/_/po ta~M gi zhes bya ba ni phyag go/_/pra ti po ta~M gi zhes bya ba ni phyag gi lan no/_/ga mu zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba zhes brjod 
[\[119a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lum pa zhes bya ba ni 'ong ba nyid do/_/ni ga raM zhes bya ba ni byin cig ces brjod par 'gyur ro/_/tsaT+Tu ka zhes bya ba ni khyer cig ces brjod pa yin no/_/hri da ya zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo zhes bya ba yin no/_/kau ra ba zhes bya ba ni gsod pa zhes brjod pa yin no/_/
[\[119a.3\]]kar+N+Ni ka zhes bya ba ni dril bu zhes brjod pa yin no/_/a li ka ra Na zhes bya ba ni spyi bo zhes brjod pa yin no/_/ba ra ha zhes bya ba ni skra zhes brjod pa yin no/_/shra ba Na zhes bya ba ni rna ba'o/_/man+thA zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi'o/_/na ra zhes bya ba ni mnyam par sbyor ba zhes brjod 
[\[119a.4\]]pa yin no/_/tA li kA zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/nA ra ka zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro/_/a mu ka~M zhes bya ba ni dur khrod do/_/kA li la zhes bya ba ni sgo'o/_/swa sa Na~M zhes bya ba ni bram ze'o/_/pa ri d+hi ni rgyal rigs so/_/bi ra ti ri ni rje'u rigs so/_/kru ra zhes 
[\[119a.5\]]bya ba ni dmangs rigs so/_/an+ta ni gdol pa'i rigs so/_/a li ka ni phyugs so/_/b+ha gi ni ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/mu da ka~M ni tshil bu'o/_/grih+na zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'o/_/dan+ta spaR+sha ti dzi hwa zhes bya ba ni bkres so zhes brjod pa yin no/_/g+han+da pa hi ni sred pa'o/_/A ga 
[\[119a.6\]]ma na zhes bya ba ni gan du'o/_/s+thA na zhes bya ba ni che ge mor ro/_/ki ra Na ni me tog go/_/lam po ni 'jigs pa'o/_/dan+ta ni rgod pa zhes brjod pa yin no/_/ni ro d+ha ni char pa'o/_/bi dzAp+ti ni chog par 'dzin pa'o/_/d+hu mA ni sprin no/_/d+hu mra pri ya dang /_sA nu ni ri'o/_/sa ri to ni 
[\[119a.7\]]chu bo'o/_/oM gu l+ya ni yan lag dang nying lag go/_/ba da na~M ni kha'o/_/rA dzi ka ni lce'o/_/a da nA ni'o/_/pa~M ka ti ni rgyal mtshan no/_/ts+tshan do ni phreng ba'o/_/tsa la ni rlung ngo /_/mr-i ka pa ti ni phyugs so/_/maN+Da la ni mnyam pa'o/_/swA sa ni lam gyi bzhi mdo'o/_/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]phal gu sha ni skye bo'o/_/ma ha k+Sha ra ni phyugs chen po'o/_/ts+tsha ni ra'o/_/na zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o/_/go zhes bya ba ni ba glang ngo /_/zhes bya ba ni ma he'o/_/b+hi zhes bya ba ni bza' ba'o/_/ha zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs so/_/a phya ka zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i skyes bu'o/_/
[\[119b.2\]]s+tha zhes bya ba ni gnas so/_/mu kha sbaR+sha na ni zos so zhes bya ba'o/_/dan+ta spaR+sha na ni 'grangs so zhes bya ba'o/_/ho zhes bya ba ni gang yang rnam grangs so/_/hrI ka ni ngo tsha ba'o/_/shU n+ya spar+sha ne ni mai thu na gyis shig ces bya ba'o/_/u ru spaR+sha ne ni de lta da ltar gyis shig ces bya 
[\[119b.3\]]ba'o/_/ngag gi brda yi ye shes so/_/mnyam par drag shul dpral ba can/_/rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod/_/dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas/_/g.yon pa na ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/_/g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa nyid/_/gnyis ni steng du sbyar bar 
[\[119b.4\]]bya/_/dbu ma rengs pa'i lta stangs nyid/_/sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis/_/dud 'gro'i lta stangs gsad pa la/_/sna yi rtse mor gzugs brnyan gnyis/_/'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed/_/bum pa yis ni dbang du byed/_/dgang ba yis ni 'gugs pa nyid/_/
[\[119b.5\]]zhi ba nyid kyis rengs par byed/_/rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid/_/me tog la ni dbang du grags/_/rdo rje shing la dgug pa nyid/_/g.yo bcas rtsal rengs byed nyid/_/zla drug goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/'di la 'khrul bar 
[\[119b.6\]]mi bya ste/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/slob dpon gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/_/shin tu phyag 'tshal dpal ldan ni/_/rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor gyis/_/g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul gyis/_/nam mkhar 'gro bar bsgoms pas ni/_/gang zhig 
[\[119b.7\]]gnas pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/g.yon pa'i smin sgyur pha rol gyi/_/sde las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur/_/bdud kyi dpung ni gzhom pa'i phyir/_/de nyid kyi ni rnal 'byor gyis/_/g.yon pa'i mig bsgul zhes bya bas/_/dkar mo la sogs gzugs bsgoms 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pas/_/der ni rdzogs na 'grub par 'gyur/_/g.yas pa'i mig bsgul zhes bya bas/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs kyis/_/skyes bu'i gzugs ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/ngag gi tha snyad ma gtogs par/_/'jig rten rab tu grags pa 
[\[120a.2\]]yi/_/tha snyad du yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/de ltar yo gis 'jig rten dang /_/'jig rten 'das par bsdus par 'grub/_/legs par bshad pa'i dngos grub bo/_/lta stangs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems sbyor zhing /_/ji ltar dbyibs kyi sku 
[\[120a.3\]]ldan pas/_/'dir ni mi yi thod pa yi/_/yungs kar cho ga bzhin du gdab/_/btsos pa'i mar khu bza' byas shing /_/mgo bo 'bras bus de bzhin byugs/_/phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings pas/_/bsrung ba kun gyi gong na med/_/dpal ldan 
[\[120a.4\]]rdo rje sems sbyor zhing /_/tshems ni bsdams shing zhal btsums pas/_/dpal ldan g.yon pa bsgyings 'dzin cing /_/g.yas par 'khor lo phyogs tshul gyis/_/gsal bar steng 'og byin gyis brlab/_/sa la rang gi phyag rgya bya/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos dngos 
[\[120a.5\]]grub sbyin/_/skye ba gnyis pa'i thod par 'di btab nas/_phyi nas ni mi'i thod par ro/_/de nas blangs nas bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_ma ning la sogs pa dang /_khwa dang /_'ug pa dang /_bya rgod dang /_mchil pa'i dngos grub sna tshogs byed do/_/'ol ma zi 
[\[120a.6\]]dkar po sgrub pa'i cho gas kyang /_'dod na glang po dang /_rta'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_ma he'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_'dod na khyi dang /_byi la dang /_ce spyang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_'dod na bud med dang /_/
[\[120a.7\]]skyes pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ro'i kha'i bug pa'i nang du son pa'i bu ra nag po ro bsregs pa'i mes mar ngo'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la gdungs shing bdug pa byin na 'gro ba ma lus pa 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang /_a lo ka dang /_ma tu lung ga dang /_
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]tsi tra ka dang /_ba tsa ka dang /_khyim bya'i sgo nga dang /_arka'i 'bras bu rnams thams cad bdug pa las/_rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten kun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/rta gsod pa skya bo'i rtsa ba dang /_nyi ma'i ljon shing dang /_phe chag pa dang /_sdig pa'i rnga ma dang /_dug tu 
[\[120b.2\]]nges pa'i brgya'i cha dang ldan pa/_'dis de rnams cha bsnyams te lag pa la byugs na ba glang gi snar 'gyur ro/_/di na ka ra'i 'o mas ba na ri nyi ma bdun du byugs nas nags kyi mi zhag bdun spangs te/_de bzhin du kha Ti kas bris pa'i lag pa dag gis reg na klu'i dbang 
[\[120b.3\]]po'i dug 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i phyir bzlog pa sbyin par bya ste/_mA la ya las byung ba dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_nad kyi dbang po dang /_ma da na pha la dang /_dzA gu'i yul dang /_ta ka ra dang ldan par 'bras kyi chu dang ldan pas 'gro ba'i dug sna tshogs 'jig 
[\[120b.4\]]par byed do/_/de'i nyin par skyes pa'i byis pa'i ro tsan ta ka ra'i snying por gnas pa'i ril bu zos na lag na rdo rje lta bur ji ltar 'dod par dug btung bar bya'o/_/sbal pa dang /_sbrul gdong gnyis pa'i tshil bsdus la sh+leSh+ma'i shing gi 'bras bu 'dis lag pa la byugs 
[\[120b.5\]]pas/_reg na dug zhi bar byed do/_/ba'i mar dang /_badzri dang /_ba hi'i khrag dang /_sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i sha dang /_sgal tshigs kyis lag pa la byugs na gnas gsum gyi yang dug med par byed do/_/gcer bu la sogs pa'i cho gas mnyam par bzhag pas/_
[\[120b.6\]]bA la ka'i rtsa ba cha bdun du byas nas/_'byung po'i nyi ma lag pa la bcings na nyin bzhi pa 'jig par byed do/_/lto 'phye'i dbang po'i shun pa sar pa dang /_lto 'phye'i dgra'i gshog pa'i cha dang ldan par bdug pa dang ldan pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po sdang bar byed do/_/
[\[120b.7\]]yang na kA gnyis dang nyin mo 'jigs pa'i gshog pa dag cho ga bzhin du bdug pas ni 'phrog byed ma smad kyang 'byed par byed do/_/gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/rta'i rmig pa'i khung bur sbrul gyi mgo gzhag cing gnod sbyin smyon pa'i lce dang lhan cig dgra'i gnas kyi sgor sbas 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]na/_nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/_/ha li ni dang /_phag gi rtug pa dang /_ro'i mgo skyes dang /_mgrin [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]rus pa rnams gnas gsum gyi sbyor ba'i mchog ste/_nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do/_/rta gsod pa dmar po'i me tog dang /_b+hal+lA 
[\[121a.2\]]ta ka dang /_star bu rnams kyis me long la bskus na rta dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo la sogs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rta dang /_ba glang dang /_phag dang /_/spre'u dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo'i lag skyes rnams kha sbyor du mes bsregs nas sbal pa'i tshil bu bsres 
[\[121a.3\]]pas/_de rnams kyi gzugs snga ma bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/aM ko Ta ka'i sa bon gyi mar khu dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang /_mig sman gyi 'bras bus byugs nas gang zhig srid pa'i mtha'i gzugs rnams me long gi dbus su mig sman gyis byugs pa'i mi'i mig 
[\[121a.4\]]gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ta ka pa'i 'bras bu dang /_aM ko Ta'i 'bras bu dang /_mar khu'i tshigs mas rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i skyes bu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/_ta ka ra'i mig sman gyis byugs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/ri bong can gyi chu dang /_dza lu 
[\[121a.5\]]ka dang /_sbal pa'i mar khu dang /_pA Ta li'i rtsa bas rkang pa'i mthil byugs na/_skyes bu me ma mur gyi tshogs la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/shra ma Ni ka dang /_sbal pa'i tshil bu dang /_dza lu ka dang /_zla ba las byung ba dang ldan pas lag pa dang /_rkang pa byugs na me kha ba 
[\[121a.6\]]ltar bsil bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/kha'i nang du dun+du ba'i rin po che bcug ste/_chur zhugs na shAkya'i gnas kyi nang du zhugs pa lta bur blo dang ldan par 'dod pas gnas so/_/so na ka'i sa bon gyis rkang pa'i lham zung byas na chu'i steng du skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa gru 
[\[121a.7\]]lta bur 'chag cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/mar sar dang /_btsag skya bo dang /_dri nga ba dang /_nya'i mar khu'i tshigs mas bug pa thams cad byugs na/_skyes pa blo dang ldan pa chu srin lta bur rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/sa bon dang /_ka na ka'i drungs pa chen po'i srin bu'i phye ma dang 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ldan pa dang /_ko k+ki la rnams kyis skyes pa 'drer byed par 'gyur ro/_/bu ram dang /_a ra na la dag gis ni phyir zlog par byed do/_/skye ba gnyis pa dang /_byi la dang /_spre'u dang /_rang 'tshed dang /_khwa'i dgra dang /_sre mong gi spu rnams brdungs shing /_tsa ra ma'i 
[\[121b.2\]]rtug pa'i phye mas 'jig rten pa thams cad smyo bar byed do/_/ba lang tshe'i rnga ma dang /_ka gnyis pa'i gshog pa g.yas pa dang ldan pa mal du bcug na myur du dgra bo rjed byed kyis 'jigs par byed do/_/ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang /_ma tu lung ga dang /_phug 
[\[121b.3\]]ran dang /_rma bya dang /_zangs kyi gtsug pud can gyis lan cig gis smyo bar byed cing blo gros dang bral bar byed do/_/skra'i las kyi mtha' yin no/_/ka na ka'i 'bras bu blangs nas/_dam tshig chen po dang /_srin bu'i phye ma dang bsres nas bza' ba dang btung ba 
[\[121b.4\]]la sbyar na de'i skad cig la smyo bar 'gyur te/_nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/tsha ba'i mar khus pi tsu marnga'i shing la gtor zan gyi tshang blangs te byugs nas/_lag pa de nyid kyis ma reg par dur khrod du shing bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs nas gang gi spyi bor 
[\[121b.5\]]byin pa de skrod par byed do/_/khwa dang 'ug pa'i gshog pa dag dang /_bram ze dang /_gcer bu pa dag gi skra gcig tu byas nas d+ha du ra'i shing la me sbar nas/_du ba med par bsregs te/_de'i thal ba blangs la skyes pa'am bud med kyi gnas mal gyi 'og tu bcug na de'i 
[\[121b.6\]]skad cig la sdang bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa dang ye shes so/_/yang na dbang du bya bar 'dod na dga' ba dang bcas pa/_dkar mo'i snying po'i nus ba mda'i rma phye mar byas nas/_'dod pa'i phye mas rang gi sa bon dang ldan pas rgyal la bdag po'i brtul zhugs 
[\[121b.7\]]ma'ang dbang du byed do/_/skyes ma skal ba ngan pa bzung nas na ra'i shing gi yal ga'i tshigs ma dang /_glang po che'i chang dang mnyam par bu mo'i lag par bzhag na/_skal ba bzang ba po steng du 'dren par byed do/_/b+hu ta ke shi dang /_ru dan ti dang /_daN+Da ut+pa la dang /_ha 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]sa de ba dang /_phyogs kyi chu dang /_bdag nyid kyi myos byed dang btags pas skad cig gis [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]dbang du byed do/_/but+tany+dza ri dang /_a pa na ta dang /_rtag tu ngu dang /_daN+Da ut+pal lhan cig btags pa'i phye ma dang /_phyogs kyis chus sam reg pa 
[\[122a.2\]]nyid kyis 'gro ba'i yan lag ma dbang du byed do/_/biSh+Du krAn tra dang /_sra ban ti dang /_la k+Sha Na dang /_a ba na ta dang /_mig las byung ba dang /_phyogs kyi chu lhan cig btags pas lha'i dbang po'i [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]yang skad cig gis dbang du byed do/_/'di na ka ra 
[\[122a.3\]]dkar po'i shing gi rtsa ba dang /_many+dziSh+Ta dang /_mchil pa dang /_kuSh+Ta dang /_rang gi yan lag gi rma las byung ba dang /_di ga d+ha 'di rnams kyis gnas gsum po dbang du byed do/_/ra ma du tI dang /_ru dan ti dang /_k+Shir d+hi dang /_bdag gi myos byed dang bsres shing 
[\[122a.4\]]seng ldeng dang btags pa'i ril bu dang so rtsi lhan cig pas rang byung gi [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]yang skad cig gis dbang du byed do/_/ma he la bcings pa'i sna thag dang /_ka na ka'i shing gis ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang yan lag can shi ba'i ro bsregs pa'i me mdag ka na 
[\[122a.5\]]ka'i khu bas bsad pa'i phye ma dang /_bdag gi myos byed kyis lha'i bdag po'i bu mo yang skad cig gis dbang du byed do/_/reg pa la sogs pas bdag gi ye shes so/_/shriM kha dang /_mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i 'khor lo dang /_lha'i bdag po'i sbas pa dang /_
[\[122a.6\]]ba lba dang /_ba lang gi gi wang dang /_ldong ros dang ldan pas dpral bar thig le byas na skad cig gis dbang du byed do/_/durba dkar po dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi durba dang /_ba lang gi gi wang dang /_lhan cig pas dpral bar thig le byas shing lhan cig mthong bas mi'i 
[\[122a.7\]]dbang po yang dbang du byed do/_/nam mkha' lding gi bdag po'i 'khor lo dang /_lha'i bdag po'i sbas pa dang /_a ba na ta'i ral pa dang /_du dan ti dang /_phyogs kyi chu dang btags pa'i phye mas mi'i bdag po'i [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]yang skad cig gis dbang du byed do/_/skyes 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]pa bag ma sar pa mngon par blangs pa shi ba'i me tog dang /_dbang phyug chen po la b+han du ka'i mchod pa'i spyi bo'i me tog dang /_skyes pa shi ba dang mtshungs par g.yon pa bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /_bdag gi myos byed lhan cig pas bsnun pa'i bud med phyi nas rjes 
[\[122b.2\]]su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/biSh+Nu krAn ta dang lha yi bdag pos sbas pa dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_du ba dang /_lto'i srin bu dang /_lhan cig nam mkha'i chu dang btags pa'i phye mas skad cig gis dbang du byed do/_/u grA dang /_ts+tshin+da dang /_ru ha dkar po dang /_baM se dang /_
[\[122b.3\]]kan b+hi dang /_in+d+ra ya ba mnyam pa 'di rnams dang ldan pas man ngag las thig le byas pas dbang du byed do/_/shrI ris ka la dang /_a nu Na dang /_tsan+danadang /_ri bong 'dzin pa 'di rnams kyis mnyam par shin tu sbyar ba dang /_drang srong gi bu mkha' 'gro ma'i khrag gis

[\[122b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/thig le 'byung bar byed pa'i ye shes so/_/yang na ril bu bya bar 'dod pas byi la nag po'i mig dang /_bya rog nag po'i mig dang /_phag nag po'i rna ba g.yon pa'i khrag gis mnye zhing bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung gi dngos po'i ril bu nyi ma dang /_zla 
[\[122b.6\]]ba dang /_me'i nang du son par so sor dkris pa rgyal la bsgrub cing rang 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags kyis bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur te/_khar bcug na dpal dang ldan pa gnod sbyin ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du rnam par spyod do/_/yang na ngang mo nag mo'i mig dang /_bya 
[\[122b.7\]]rog nag po dang /_'ug pa nag po'i mig dang /_khu byug nag po'i mig dang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung du yid ches pa dang /_baj+ri'i 'o mas ril bu byas pa nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_me'i nang du son par dkris nas khar bcug na mi snang bar byed do/_/yang na gdung gi 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]dngos po'i ril bu skyes pa shi ba dang mtshungs par bud med bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /_ka pit+tha yongs su smin pa'i phye ma dang /_sardza ra dza'i khu ba dang /_rdul dang /_de yongs su btags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung gi dngos po yid ches pa nyi ma 
[\[123a.2\]]dang /_zla ba dang /_me'i nang du son par de nyid kyis yongs su dkris nas rgyal la bsgrub cing ril bu khar bcug na gnod sbyin lta bur 'dod pa'i gzugs can du dpal dang ldan par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yang na sro ta ka dang /_ri bong gis mtshan ma'i tsher ma dang /_
[\[123a.3\]]sbrang rtsi dang /_/sbrang rtsi can dang /_dang po'i me tog dang ldan pa dang /_pad ma sar pa'i ge sar dang ldan pa'i ril bu lcags gsum gyi nang du gnas pas sbed par byed do/_/yang na a sho ka sngon po rab tu rgyas pa'i myu gu bud med kyi khrag gis lan bdun du byugs shing 
[\[123a.4\]]lcags gsum gyi nang du bcug pa khar bcug pas ni 'gro ba ma lus pa sbed par byed do/_/yang na ta ka ra'i byang phyogs kyi rtsa ba phyogs kyi gos kyis gtum zhing zla ba gzas zin pa na ril bu nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_me'i nang du bcug na kha'i nang du gnas pas mi snang bar 
[\[123a.5\]]byed do/_/ba glang gi gi wang dang /_ang gu ta'i shing gi me tog dang /_'gags nas shi ba'i mig dang /_tshil blangs shing kha gnyis pas zos pa'i lhag ma dang ldan pa'i ril bu 'di ni brtags pa'i [{]brkyang ma [,]rkyang ma [}]zhes bya'o/_/yang na pha'i tshal du zla mtshan gyis myos pa'i bu mo 
[\[123a.6\]]mnyes pa'i rdzas dang /_ba bla dang ldan pas dpral ba'i gnas kyi ngos kyi gnas su thig le byas na gnas gsum po sbed par byed do/_/yang na a sho ka sngon po'i byang gi phyogs su khwa'i tshang gi myu gus dpral ba'i 'gram du thig le byas na rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten thams 
[\[123a.7\]]cad sbed par byed do/_/phug ron gyi khong par sro ta'i mig sman bcug nas ro sreg gi me la bsregs te/_grub pa'i mig sman byi la dkar po ma yin pa'i khrag gis bsad pas sbed bar byed do/_/yang na tri NA sar pa'i tshogs kyi myu gus bteg pa'i sa dang /_sar g+ha dang /_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]ta la dang ldan pa rgyal la grub pas dpral ba'i ngos su thig le byas na sbed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ril bu mchog tu gyur pa ba bla dang /_ba glang gi gi wang 'di dag gong gi bstan pa'i dgos pa'i ril bu mchog 'di sgrub pa'o/_/mi snang ba'i ye shes so/_/de nas mig sman 
[\[123b.2\]]gyi sbyor ba bshad par bya ste/_shA li dza las byung ba'i mar khu dang lhan cig dur khrod kyi ras las byung ba'i sdong bu 'byung po'i nyi ma'i mtshan mo ba'i skyed mos tshal du skyes pa'i thod pa gsum gyi nang du mar khu dang bcas pa'i mar me'o/_/de'i steng du pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhag 
[\[123b.3\]]nas dga' ma'i thod pa las du ba blang bar bya'o/_/de nas nyin mo 'jigs pa'i mgo bo bsregs nas tsan dan dmar po dang mang du btags te/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo rdo'i gtan pa la zhib tu btag cing phye mar bya'o/_/gong du blangs pa'i du ba dang lhan cig gcig tu byas 
[\[123b.4\]]nas bya rgod kyi pags pa'i snod du bcings te/_bya rgod kyi rje ngar gyi rkang ngam/_gong gi mi'i rus pa'i thur mas so/_/de nas mig sman ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_b+ha ga'i nang du sngags pas cho gas bsgrub par bya'o/_/grub pa'i mig sman gyi sbyor 
[\[123b.5\]]ba'i ye shes so/_/de nas las kyi cho ga bshad/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan rtag dga' ba/_/gang gis sgrub po 'grub 'gyur ba'i/_/bcud kyi las kyi cho ga brjod/_/cho ga'i dngos po ma gang yang /_/phongs pa'i sems can bde ba 'bab/_/ri dang rgya mtsho las skyes 
[\[123b.6\]]pa du ma dang /_byas pa'i skyur po dang /_bu dang /_mdud pa dang /_rdo'i gtan pa tshan de la yang dang yang mnyes nas/_snu hi dang /_ri'i ze 'bru dang /_rol pa dang /_'dab ma'i chu sings po dang bcas par zangs kyi snod du bskol bar bya'o/_/lcags blangs nas sbyar bar bya 
[\[123b.7\]]zhing /_ba gu la dang /_ut+pa la chen po'i cha dang ldan par ji srid du mar sar byung ba de srid du mnye bar bya'o/_/de ma thag tu rdo rje can gyi 'o mas btags nas sin du dang tshwa las khu bar 'gyur ba ste/_zangs dang /_dngul gyi cha dang gser lhan cig pa'i cha khyor gub bkab par 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]bzhu zhing /_de nas bri'i rdo ba phyed tsam du sbyin par byas la gser phyed kyi tshad gzhug par bya'o/_/bcud kyi ye shes so/_/de nas bcud len bshad par bya/_/thams cad snying po kun bsdus pa/_/dus kyi 'ching bar gnas nas ni/_/rnal 'byor phyag rgya 
[\[124a.2\]]bsgrub par bya/_/gzhi mnyam nyid dang gla rtsi dang /_/tsan dan dmar po ga bur nyid/_/sA lu skyes dang si h+la dang /_/kun du ru dang kak+ko la/_/de bzhin rkang gi snying po nyid/_/'di rnams sman ni chen po nyid/_/dus ni drug tu 'od zer can/_/dpyid dang so ga nyid dang ni/_/
[\[124a.3\]]de bzhin du ni dbyar nyid dang /_/ston gyi dus dang dgun stod dang /_/de bzhin gzhan yang dgun smad do/_/dpyid la cho ga nyi shar na/_/so ga mkhas pas nyin phyed na/_/dbyar la nyi ma bsnyur ba na/_/ston ni de bzhin nyi nub na/_/dgun stod la ni nam phyed na/_/
[\[124a.4\]]dgun smad la ni tho rangs so/_/dus kyi sbyor ba mchog 'di ni/_/zhal mchog ma ni khyod la bshad/_/dgun stod dus su nam phyed na/_/me tog tu ni gsungs pa nyid/_/dpyid la yang ni bzhi mnyam nyid/_/nyi shar de bzhin dngos grub ster/_/dbyar la nyi ma 
[\[124a.5\]]bsnyur ba na/_/gla rtsi yid du 'ong ba nyid/_/so gar don kun grub pa pos/_/nyi ma phyed na rkang skyes nyid/_/ston ka pad+ma snum pa nyid/_/srod la dngos grub byed pa nyid/_/dgun smad la ni tho rangs na/_/khyad par du ni ga bur nyid/_/rnal 'byor mchog rab 'di nyid 
[\[124a.6\]]ni/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag par byed/_/rga dang 'chi las rnam grol bar/_/'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/_/bu dang g+han d+ha ga nyid dang /_/mchog dang yang dag ldan par ni/_/mar gyis khyab par byas nas ni/_/las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/_/rdzas ni bcu 
[\[124a.7\]]bzhi blangs nas ni/_/dgu dang 'bad pas bza' bar bya/_/zla ba nyi ma'i rnam pa'i chas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams bya/_/nyi ma bdun phrag gsum gyis 'grub/_/so dang sen mo skra ltung zhing /_/yang ni nye bar skye bar 'gyur/_/grub na khams rnams thams cad ni/_/
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]gser gyi dngos por byed par 'gyur/_/de nas 'bru mar gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_pad+ma las skyes pa dang /_bo la las skyes pa'i mar khu nyid dang /_bzhi mnyam 'di dag mnyam zhing mnyam par ldan pa dang /_yung ba dkar po ma yin pa'i tshigs ma dang /_bo la'i chu dang 
[\[124b.2\]]bcas pa dang /_gu DU tsi'i snying po blangs nas thams cad du ba lang gi 'o mas bya'o/_/de nas cha bshad par bya ste/_phye ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis blangs nas chu nyis 'gyur dang /_ji srid kham phor bzhi cha lus pa de sred du bskol bar bya'o/_/bo la gsum dang /_ji ltar rjes su 
[\[124b.3\]]rim pas lan gsum du bsgrub par bya'o/_/'bru mar bzhi 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang /_gu DU ci ta de'i phyed dang /_de'i phyed kyi tshigs mar gyur ba dang /_gong du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas zhen pas btso bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di de'i tshe 'bring po la ni 
[\[124b.4\]]gu DU tsi phyi rol du gnas so/_/mgo byug pa la ni drag por gsungs te/_btso ba gsum ni mchog tu 'dod do/_/snar blugs pa la ni srang bcu'o/_/btung ba la ni srang brgyar gsungs so/_/byug pa la ni rnal 'byor pa shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[124b.5\]]du bya'o/_/snar blugs pas ni lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/btung ba la ni de bzhin du lnga brgya'o/_/mgo bo byug pa la ni sum brgya'o/_/nga'i tshig la the tshom med de lha'i gzugs su 'gyur ba dang /_dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu sdug par 'gyur zhing bstan bcos 
[\[124b.6\]]thams cad rgyas par shes shing lus gsal zhing gzi brjid che ba dang /_bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/bzhi mnyam blangs nas bskam par byas nas 'o ma dang lan mang du btags par bya'o/_/ba glang gi lci ba'i mes mi snang bar bsregs nas 'bru mar blangs te 'bru mar 
[\[124b.7\]]nag po gnyis dang /_mar khu bcu gnyis dang /_'bru mar gyi nyis 'gyur gyi 'o ma dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas cho ga bzhin du byas pas rnal 'byor pas btso bar bya'o/_/gser bzhi dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_nr-i ba dang /_tsi ti dang /_ta la dang /_'di rnams kyis 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]rim pa 'phel ba'i tshigs mar brjod pa dang /_mtshan mo dang /_ba ku tsi dkar po dang /_ut+pa la'i snying po dang /_lcags kyi dri ma dang /_dri'i rdo dang /_gu gul dang /_sardza ra sa dang /_ga bur dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]las skyes pa'i chang dang /_rdzas 'di 
[\[125a.2\]]rnams dang /_mar khus btsos pas nad med cing tshe ring bar 'phel bar byed do/_/mgo bo la byugs na gnyer ma dang skra dkar sel bar byed cing nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med do/_/de nas lus kyi byug pa'i 'bru mar gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[125a.3\]]de nyid kyis 'bru mar de 'on kyang khrag sel bar byed pa dang /_gser gyi shing dang /_brtan par rab tu skyes pa dang /_sin d+hu bA rai dang /_lhan cig gong du gsungs pa'i cho gas sngags pas chu bsgrub par bya'o/_/de'i rjes su sh+yA ma dang /_pri ya dang /_ke sha ri dang /_
[\[125a.4\]]ba ku la dang /_rig pa 'dzin ma dang /_nA ga dang /_'khor lo 'thag pa dang /_mtshan mo rgyu ba dang /_ka na ka dang /_shi khi dang /_pra par dang /_b+hu tA ri dang /_pa ra hri da dang /_bal+la b+hi dang /_grol ba dang /_lag pa'i rtsibs dang /_many+dza ri dang /_gser 
[\[125a.5\]]shing dang /_ba tsA dang /_ba ku tsa dang /_sprin gyi shing dang /_yung ba dang /_many+dziSh+Tha dang /_nad kyi dbang po/_glang po'i stobs 'di dag gis ni nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/tsan+dan gnyis dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi chang dang /_ga bur dang /_sha la ki 
[\[125a.6\]]dang /_na kha dang /_bu ram dang mnyam par ldan pa'i bdug pa ni 'dod pa'i don thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/g.yan pa dang /_shu ba dang /_za 'brum dang /_yan lag las skyes pa'i dug thams cad 'jig par byed de/_lha mo ngas gsungs pa la the tshom mi 
[\[125a.7\]]bya'o/_/yung ba dang /_srid pa'i rdul dang /_sin du bA ra dang /_lha khang gi so phag gi rdul dang /_ka na ka'i 'dab ma'i tshigs ma dang /_gla rtsi dang /_bzhi mnyam 'di dag mnyam pa dang /_rkun ma dang /_ke~M su dang /_lhan cig pas nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]srin bu dang /_mdze dang /_yan lag las skyes pa'i dug las byung ba yang 'jig par byed na yang bA ku ci dang lhan cig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lus byug pa'i cho ga'o/_/de nas bska ba gsum dang bzhi mnyam lhan cig phye mar byas nas/_gla rtsi grang mo dang 
[\[125b.2\]]lhan cig lo gcig tu brtul zhugs can gyis btung bar bya'o/_/de ltar khong du song ba'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa bad kan la sogs pa ltung bar byed do/_/zhu na sngags pa'i skra dkar po la sogs pa 'jig par byed de/_gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/yang na bzhi 
[\[125b.3\]]mnyam blangs nas zhib par phye mar byas nas 'bras bu gsum dang lhan cig mar dang sbrang rtsis brdzis nas zho gnyis bza' bar bya'o/_/de nas gzugs bzang por 'gyur zhing lo sum brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni rlon pas kyang yin mod kyi 'on kyang mar dang sbrang 
[\[125b.4\]]rtsi dang bral ba'o/_/yang na bska ba gsum blangs nas phye ma zhib mor bya'o/_/byi la'i rkang rjes tsam las rim pas 'phel bas gla rtsi 'bring po shin tu bsil bar byas nas rnal 'byor pas bdag gi nus pa nye bar brtags nas btung bar byas na rlung dang /_bad kan 
[\[125b.5\]]'joms pa dang /_skra dkar sel bar byed la dron mos ni skra dkar byed pa yin no/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum blangs nas 'o ma dang chur bco bar bya ste mgo bo bsku bar bya'o/_/dbang po'i stan dang /_'bras sA lu dmar po dang lhan cig btags par byas la khur ba byas te 
[\[125b.6\]]mar gyis btsos nas sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba gsum na nad thams cad dang /_khyad par du skra dkar 'joms so/_/zla ba drug tu sbyor ba goms pas rnal 'byor pa shin tu dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ba dang /_tshil bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[125b.7\]]zla ba dgu na lus bzang po dang /_yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lo gcig na ni glang po'i stobs nyid dang /_lo sum brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na nA ga mU la dang /_ba la sha dang /_kuSh+Tha cha gsum dang /_mA ga d+ha bcu'i cha gcig 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dang cha mnyam pa'i phye ma dang /_ba'i 'o ma dang phye zho gnyis bsres nas yang dag par brdzis te/_'di nyi ma re re la rnal 'byor pa mkhas pas bza' bar bya'o/_/rnal 'byor pas lo brgyar brag stong pa la sogs par gnas na nges par shin tu yongs su tshim pa 
[\[126a.2\]]dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur bas sman 'di dang ldan pas brag stong pa la sogs pa la gnas par bya'o/_/sbyor ba gzhan ni rgan po lta bur don med pa'o/_/sbyor ba med pas rnal 'byor pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i gnas brag 'bab chu dang bcas 
[\[126a.3\]]pa de'i gnas su bsgom par bya'o/_/dus kyi 'chi ba mi rig par/_/gang zhig rnal 'byor bar 'dod pa/_/mkha' la khu tshur bsnun pa dang /_/smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung ba dang /_/bkres phyir phub ma rdung ba ltar/_/de ni ngal ba don med cing /_/de nyid 'bras bu 'thob mi 
[\[126a.4\]]'gyur/_/yo gi shin tu mnyam gzhag pa/_/de ltar cho ga nga yis bsngags/_/ye shes thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba/_tshe ring ba'i rig pa ste bdun pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/bzlas 
[\[126a.5\]]sogs sbyin sreg ji ltar lags/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang /_/gtor ma mchod sogs ji ltar lags/_/sbyin sreg la sogs mtshan nyid ni/_/ji ltar de nyid rdo rje nyon/_/dang por sngags pas 'bum bzlas bya/_/phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam/_/g.yas 
[\[126a.6\]]brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang nyid/_/mnyam stobs bi shA khi la~M ni/_/de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas/_/yang na phyi nas rig ma gzhug_/bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs nyid/_/rje'u rigs de bzhin dmangs mo ni/_/de ltar cho ga sna tshogs nyid/_/de tshe sbyin sreg yang 
[\[126a.7\]]dag brtsam/_/zhi ba thab khung zlum po nyid/_/khru gang tshad tsam thig gdab bya/_/btab nas khru phyed brkos nas ni/_/'og tu sa la mtho gang khung /_/tsan+dan dkar pos ngos dag byug_/de yi phyi rol zlum por sa/_/sor bzhi pa yi mu ran yin/_/rgyas pa'i 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]thab khung gru bzhi ste/_/khru gnyis tshad du rnam par rgyas/_/'og tu khung bu khru gang ba/_/mu ran la ni sor brgyad nyid/_/me tog ser pos brgyan pa dang /_/dri ni ser pos rjes su byug_/mngon spyod thab khung gru gsum pa/_/rgyar ni sor mo nyi shu ste/_/'og gi 'phang 
[\[126b.2\]]du sor mo bcu/_/mu ran la ni sor mo gsum/_/dur khrod sol bas byug par bya/_/dbang dang dgug pa thun mong ste/_/thab khung gcig pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs/_/dgug pa zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs/_/thab tshad khung bu thab khung phyed/_/tshad gzugs mu ran byas 
[\[126b.3\]]nas ni/_/dri ni dmar bos byug par bya/_/zhi la kha dog dkar po yin/_/rgyas la de bzhin ser po nyid/_/dbang la de bzhin dmar po yin/_/ji ltar dbang la de bzhan dgug_/ji ltar gsad la de bzhin sdang /_/phyogs kyi cha ni 
[\[126b.4\]]bshad par bya/_/shar gyi phyogs su zhi ba yin/_/lho yi phyogs su mngon spyod nyid/_/nub tu dbang dang dgug pa ste/_/byang du rgyas pa'i thab khung nyid/_/gong gi las la ltos nas ni/_/rdul tshon rnams ni bshad par bya/_/thab khung brko ba'i bya ba'o/_/de nas 
[\[126b.5\]]'bru sna tshogs kyi cho ga bshad par bya sta/_'bras sA lu dang /_so ba dang /_til dkar po dang /_nas dang /_'bras bu dang /_dUr ba dang /_'o ma dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres la/_'o ma can gyi shing lnga las skyes pa'i rlon pa'i shing 
[\[126b.6\]]yal ga dang bcas pa rtse mo'i char gnas pa 'di sbrang rtsi dang /_'o ma dang /_mar la gnyis kyi rtse mo btags te sreg blugs bya'o/_/u du ma bA ra dang /_bla k+Sha las bskyed pa'i me rab tu sbar la zhi bar 'dod pas dus gsum du kha shar du blta zhing gnas nas sreg blugs 
[\[126b.7\]]brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/de la dkyil 'khor pa yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyas par bya bar 'dod na til nag po dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_sA li dmar po dang /_nas la sogs pa dang /_de nyid kyis yam shing du brjod pa ste/_'on kyang khu tshur gyi tshad dang /_khru gang gi 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]tshad 'o ma dang mar la btags te/_gur gum gyi dri'i chus gtor nas mngar gsum dang /_zho dang /_zan mchog dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang ldan pa dang /_me tog brgya ba dang /_bil ba'i 'bras bu dang /_pad+ma dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_'bru rnams 
[\[127a.2\]]dang /_/de nas u dum bA ra'i shing la me sbar la las kyi rjes su lha'i rnal 'byor dmigs te/_kha byang du blta zhing gnas nas thun gsum du shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas stong phrag gcig sreg blugs bya'o/_/nyi ma bdun gang ba na nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[127a.3\]]de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na til dmar po dang /_nag po dang /_pri yang ku dang /_nA ga ge sar dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_a sho ka dang /_ba ku la dang /_pA Na dang /_me tog brgya pa rnams dri dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar zhing /_lha'i shing dang /_b+ha Ta dang /_
[\[127a.4\]]pip+pa li dang /_u dum bA ra la sogs pa'i shing rnams las byung ba sor brgyad pa dang /_shal+la ki dang /_gu gul gyi shing dag dang /_seng ldeng nyid dang /_dri bzang po la sogs pa dang /_de nas skyes pa dang bud med kyi rdo rje'i chu dang lhan cig bsres pas gzugs 
[\[127a.5\]]dmar por dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te gang gi ming nas sreg blugs byas pa de zhag bdun gyis dbang du byed de/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas mngon spyod bya bar 'dod pas til nag po dang /_mon sran gre'u la sogs pa dang /_b+ha la ta ka'i 'bras 
[\[127a.6\]]bu dang /_nag por gyur pa dang /_yungs kar gyi mar khus bskus nas khrag dang bsres pas lhan cig shing nag po 'khyor po las skyes pa'i tsher ma dang /_tsha ba dang /_kha ba la sogs pa'i shing thams cad las skyes pa'i sor bcu pa dang /_skyes pa'i rus ba dang /_
[\[127a.7\]]rnam par snang mdzad dang /_bong bu'i sbangs dang /_spu dang /_khyi'i rtug pa dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang bcas par thams cad 'bru mar gyis yang dag par byugs nas ro bsregs pa'i me la mnyam par gzhag pas kha lhor bltas te/_gang gi ming nas brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]sreg blugs byas na nyi ma gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/ma shi na mthar gcig tu gnas nas me'i thab khung gru gsum byas te/_gong du gsungs pa'i rdzas de nyid gdol pa'i me la sreg blugs byas na de nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis mthar byed kyi gnas su khyer bar 'gyur te 'di 
[\[127b.2\]]la the tshom mi bya'o/_/yang na bskrad par bya bar 'dod pas yungs kar dang /_khre dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_rkang rjes kyi rdul bsres nas khrag dang /_yungs mar gyis bskus te de nyid la bya'o/_/gser shing la khwa'i tshang dang lhan cig sbyar bas gang gi ming nas sreg 
[\[127b.3\]]blugs byas na de skad cig la skrod par byed do/_/yang na khwa'i shing dang /_rnga mo'i rtug pa dang /_lhan cig chang dang ldan par skra grol zhing gcer bur gyur pas gang gi ming gis ro bsregs kyi me la sreg blugs byas na de'i skad cig la skrod par byed do/_/yang na rengs par 
[\[127b.4\]]'dod pas nya dang sha la sogs pa'i rdzas dang /_bag phye dang lhan cig 'bru dang /_khrag dang /_sbrang rtsi bskus nas khwa'i gshog pa dang sbyar zhing khwa'i khyim gyi shing la sogs pa dang /_lhag ma dang so shing lhan cig thab khung gru bzhi par gang gi ming nas sreg blugs byas 
[\[127b.5\]]na de bya ba kun la rengs par byed do/_/yang na yung pa dang /_ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_gi wang dang lhan cig kha byang du bltas te gnas nas gang gi ming nas sreg blugs byas pa de rengs par 'gyur ro/_/khyi dang khyim bya'i sha dang /_/rnga mo'i rtug pa byi la'i khrag 
[\[127b.6\]]gis byugs pas pi cu ma rnga'i shig gis me spar la gang gi grong gi ming nas sreg blugs byas pa de grong stor par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig chen po chang gis byugs pas ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du thun gsum gyi bar du sreg blugs byas na zla ba drug gis yul gyi bdag 
[\[127b.7\]]por 'gyur ro/_/wa'i sha'i sreg rdzas kyis sreg blugs brgya byas na zla ba gsum lon nas dbul po skad cig gis 'jig par byed do/_/ba glang gi sha khrag gis bsgos pas sreg blugs stong byas na dbang du byed do/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du the tshom med do/_/de nyid 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]kyi sha chang gis byugs nas lag pa g.yon pas sreg blugs stong byas na sangs rgyas kyang dbang du byed na dman pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci dgos/_yang na nI Sh+Tha ba na~M gi so shing dang /_de bzhin du rang gi lus dril ba dang /_chang gis byugs pa'i sbyin 
[\[128a.2\]]sreg dag gis dbang du byed par the tshom med do/_/khyim gyi me tog zos nas skyugs pa dang /_mi'i skra dang ldan pa'i sbyin sreg gis rtag tu mchog tu 'gugs par byed pa yin no/_khwa'i gshog pa yungs mar gyis byugs nas d+ha du ra'i me la gang gi ming gis 
[\[128a.3\]]sreg blugs byas na 'phral du skrod pa dang /_gsod par byed do/_/lhag par grol ba dang /_kuSh+mA N+da dang /_khre dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_Sha na dang /_skyugs pa dang /_ske tshe dang /_/khyim gyi me tog dang /_'dab ma lhan cig sbyin sreg byas na kha 'ching bar byed 
[\[128a.4\]]pa 'di la the tshom med do/_/khyi'i sha dang rdo rje'i chu lhan cig gang gi ming nas sreg blugs byas na de nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/rta'i sha dang lhan cig rnam par snang mdzad kyis sreg blugs byas na nyi ma bdun gyis mi'i bdag po dbang du byed do/_/
[\[128a.5\]]glang po'i sha dang /_khu bas lhan cig sreg blugs byas na grong khyer dbang du byed do/_/nya dang /_sha chang dang lhan cig ji srid du sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bud med thams cad dbang du byed do/_/yang na khwa'i sha 'ba' zhig gang gi ming nas ji srid stong du sreg 
[\[128a.6\]]blugs byas na nyi ma gsum gyis rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'bros na/_yang dman pa'i mi lta ci smos/_khwa dang /_khra'i sha gang gi ming gis d+ha du ra'i shing gi me la sreg blugs byas na de skrod par byed do/_/sha chen dang /_bya rgod kyi sha gang gi ming gis sreg blugs byas 
[\[128a.7\]]na smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams me la sreg blugs byas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar las rnams bya ba ni/_/nges par 'grub na bya ba nyid/_/gang gzhan dpya bar 'gyur ba ste/_/gang la'ang bye ba sbyin mi bya/_/bye bar gyur na mi 'grub cing /_/bde ba mi yis rnyed mi 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'gyur/_/de phyir sngags pas gang la yang /_/las rgyas dang por gang bya min/_/gal te byed par 'dod na ni/_/de tshe gcig pu gnyis med bya/_/de tshe sngags pas las kun 'grub/_/bdun pa las sbyin sreg gi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[128b.2\]]lha lags nyan par 'tshal lags na/_/sngags btu'i cho ga ji ltar lags/_/de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal bas/_/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon/_/de yi sngags ni khyod la bshad/_/
[\[128b.3\]]gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma mA ma kI/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad byas nas/_/lte ba sbas pa'i spyod yul du/_/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/_/der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/_/a la sogs pa'i rab dbye bas/_/sngags kyi sde 
[\[128b.4\]]tshan dbang phyug mchog_/dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/stong pas stong pa mnan pa nyid/_/bdun pa yi ni gsum pa la/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zla ba phyed bas brgyan/_/byang chub sa bon de nas blangs/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yis ni rnam par mchod/_/'di dag snying por yang dag gsungs/_/
[\[128b.5\]]nye snying khyod la bshad par bya/_/bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa ni/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/_/nyis 'gyur uSh+ma rnams kyi ni/_/gsum pa blangs nas drug pa yi/_/gnyis ldan dbyangs kyi lnga pas ni/_/sbyar zhing gang zhig mthar gnas pa'i/_/gnyis par 
[\[128b.6\]]lnga pa stan du bya/_/gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/_/nyi shu rtsa dgu pa yi gdan/_/gang zhig bdun pa'i gsum pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni dang po nyid/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar bar bya/_/brgyad pa yi ni gnyis pa la/_/bcu gnyis pa yis stan du bya/_/sum 
[\[128b.7\]]cu rtsa gnyis blangs nas ni/_/dkar mo de la sbyar bar bya/_/gang zhig lnga pa'i gsum pa la/_/de nyid bzhi pa 'og tu sbyin/_/mthar gnas gsum pa blangs nas ni/_/g+hasma rI yis mchog tu mdzes/_/gsum pa'i dang po'i sa bon dang /_/lnga pa yi 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]yang lnga pa la/_/chom rkun ma ni mchog tu 'dod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba skyed/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed/_/shi ba slong bar byed par gsungs/_/rdo rje dam tshig skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba yang bka' stsal pa/_oM badzra bai lo 
[\[129a.2\]]ce ni swA hA/_/gnyis pa'i bzhi pa chu mas brgyan/_/de nas nye ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa/_/uSh+pa'i dang po'i sa bon ni/_/mkha' spyod ma yis steng du brgyan/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la/_/chom rkun ma yis de bzhin sbyar/_/
[\[129a.3\]]brgyad pa yi ni dang po nyid/_/rdo rje ma ni mchog tu 'dod/_/yi ge nyi shu bzung nas ni/_/lnga pa yis ni stan du bya/_/dkar mo yis ni mdzes par gsungs/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/nyi shu rtsa bdun blangs nas ni/_/de nyid chom rkun ma yis brtag_/
[\[129a.4\]]gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa la/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi stan/_/gsum pa'i dang po nyis 'gyur nyid/_/gang zhig gnyis pa'i bzhi pa ni/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis sbyar/_/yi ge bcu gcig pa blangs nas/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas phye ba nyid/_/lnga pa 
[\[129a.5\]]yi ni lnga pa la/_/de nyid la ni dkar mor sbyar/_/gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa la/_/rdo rje ma yi snying po mchog_/bcu drug de nas blangs nas ni/_/de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug nyid/_/nyis 'gyur dang ni gnyis pa yi/_/bzhi pa dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan/_/gang zhig 
[\[129a.6\]]bzhi pa'i dang po la/_/dkar mo lhan cig snyoms par 'jug_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/de nyid la ni dkar mo sbyar/_/rdo rje bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la/_/rtag tu las ni rab tu sgrub/_/rdo rje chen po 'jigs don du/_/de yi stobs ni byed par brjod/_/ces bka' 
[\[129a.7\]]stsal to/_/oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/_gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/bzhi pa ni ni dang po la/_/chom rkun mas ni mdzes par gsungs/_/bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/_/steng du dkar mos brgyan pa nyid/_/gnyis pa ya ni dang po dang /_/bcu gcig pa ni de 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]nas gzung /_/chom rkun mas ni spyi bor mdzes/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar bar bya/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/gang zhig bzhi pa'i dang po la/_/chom rkun ma ni mchog tu 'dod/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/bzhi pa'i 
[\[129b.2\]]dang por mkha' spyod ma/_/spyi bo ru ni rnam par mdzes/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/bcu gcig pa la chom rkun ma/_/lhan cig tu ni snyoms par zhugs/_/rtag tu chos ni rgyas pa'i stobs/_/de bzhin mdzod ni chen por gnas/_/gsung gi rdo rjes gsungs 
[\[129b.3\]]pa bzhin/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa byed par 'gyur/_/oM badzra d+harmA hrIHswA hA/_de nas bcu drug blangs nas ni/_/rdo rje ma ni mchog tu mdzes/_/mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/_/de nyid la ni chom rkun sbyar/_/de nas lnga pa blangs nas ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni 
[\[129b.4\]]brgyan par brjod/_/de nas bcu drug pa bzung nas/_/lnga pa'i dang po stan du bya/_/rdo rje ma ni de la sbyar/_/yi ge nyi shu bdun pa gzung /_/chom rkun ma ni mnyam par bsgom/_/gang zhig lnga pa'i dang po la/_/mkha' 'gro 'og gi cha la sbyar/_/gang zhig bdun 
[\[129b.5\]]pa'i gnyis pa la/_/chom rkun snying po 'od gsal ba/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang /_/sems can khams ni thams cad gcig_/bran khol lta bur thams cad ni/_/nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/de'i skad cig la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen 
[\[129b.6\]]pos bka' stsal to/_/oM ni thams cad gsal bar byed/_/mthar ni swA hA sngags btu bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster/_/oM ka ra ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_tra sa ya hrA sa ya/_k+Sho b+ha ya 
[\[129b.7\]]k+Sho b+ha ya/_hrauM hrauM/_hraHhraH/_phaiM phaiM/_phaT phaT/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi rAn+t+ra mA lA ba la~M bi ni/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sa p+ta pA tAl ga ta b+hu dzang+ga sar+b+ba~M pA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/_A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/_hrIM hrIM/_dz+nyauM dz+hauM/_k+Sh+mA~M k+Sh+mA~M/_hA~M hA~M/_hIM hIM/_hU~M hU~M/_ki li ki li/_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]shi li shi li/_tsi li tsi li/_d+hi li d+hi li/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po yi ni sngags/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/_/uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la/_/puk+ka sIs mdzes stong pas mnan/_/mthar 
[\[130a.2\]]ni swA hA sbyar bar bya/_/'di ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/_/'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed/_/dang por yig 'bru'i bdag po sbyin/_/de nas de rjes mkha' spyod ma/_/mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed/_/rig byed kyi ni dang po 
[\[130a.3\]]sbyin/_/gnyis pa'i gnyis pa bzung nas ni/_/stong pas mnan cing mthar swA hA/_/sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes rab can/_/dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/_/gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/_/ma ning dang ni chu mas brgyan/_/stong bcas mthar ni swA hA 
[\[130a.4\]]ni/_/sdang bar byed pa nyid du brjod/_/dang por yig 'bru'i dbang phyug sbyin/_/bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/_/stong pa rdo rje mkha' 'gror ldan/_/mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod nyid/_/yang ni yig 'bru'i dbang phyug sbyin/_/hu~M ni dmar po 'dra ba nyid/_/mthar ni 
[\[130a.5\]]swA hA thig le mchog_/dga' bzang la sogs 'gro rtag 'gugs/_/gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin/_/g+huHni yang dag rab tu sbyar/_/yang ni swA hA byas nas ni/_/lha dang mi ni gsod par byed/_/brgyad pa gnyis kyi nang du ni/_/brgyad kyi brgyad pas rnam 
[\[130a.6\]]par brgyan/_/gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin/_/cha med mthar ni swA hA sbyar/_/las kyi sa bon de nas gzung /_/rnam snang mthar ni swA hA sbyar/_/thams cad du ni sgo srung la/_/ma ning bzhi yi sa bon dang /_/de bzhin dbyangs kyi lhag ma nyid/_/rig byed rnams 
[\[130a.7\]]kyi dang po sbyin/_/mthar ni swA hA gdon par bya/_/me tog ma dang bdug pa ma/_/dri dang de bzhin mar me nyid/_/gling bu ma dang pa wang ma/_/mu kun da dang rdza rnga ma/_/de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/_/de nas las rnams 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]kun byed pa'i/_/sgrol ma'i 'byung ba bshad par bya/_/ut+pa la ni kha bzhi dang /_/mtshams su rnam par gnas pa yin/_/tA~M ni gsum gyis mtshan pa dang /_/de yi lte bar cho ga yis/_/kun nas zlum po'i rnam par ni/_/sngags pa yis ni bri bar bya/_/
[\[130b.2\]]'di lta ste/_oM pra san+na tA re/_a mr-i ta mu khi/_a mr-i ta lo tsa ne/_sar+b+bA r+tha swa d+ha ni/_sar+b+ba sa twa ba shang+ka ri s+t+rI bA pu ru Sho bA rA dzA no bA ba sha~M ku ru ta~M swA hA/_de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yi ge dang ldan pa bya ba yin no/_/de'i lte ba la lnga pa'i dang po zla ba phyed pa 
[\[130b.3\]]dang thig les brgyan pa'o/_/de nas phreng ba'i dbyibs su bskor zhing mthar swA hA dang /_ze'u 'bru la ni hrIHnang du chud par bya'o/_/sngags pas 'khor lo gnyis cho ga bzhin du byas na nyi ma bdun gyis mi'i dbang po yang dbang du byed do/_/yang na 'khor lo rtsibs bcu 
[\[130b.4\]]par pad+ma'i dbus su sngags kyi yi ge bcu'i rig pa dang lte ba la bsgrub bya nang du chud par byas na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du byed par the tshom mi za'o/_/'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bris nas sngags kyi yi ge drug rig pa dang dbus su hrIHba sha~M ku ru hrIHswA hA sbyar bar bya ste/_/
[\[130b.5\]]ba glang gi gi wang dang /_a la ka ta dang /_tsan dan dmar po dang /_rang gi khrag lhan cig pas gro ga la bris nas gang zhig 'dzin par byed pas lha la sogs pa'ang dbang du byed na yang dman pa'i mi lta ci smos/_chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje dkar po rtse gsum 
[\[130b.6\]]pa gdong bzhi pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i lte ba la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du chud par bya ste/_kham phor gnyis su cho ga bzhin du kha Ti ka yis bris na rengs par byed do/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po pad+ma'i rnam par kun nas gyur pa la yi ge'i rnam pa dgod par bya ste/_gaH'i 
[\[130b.7\]]tshogs nang du chud par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i lte bar gaHbrgyad kyis brgyan te dbus su gaHswA hA gaHbsgrub bya nang du chud par byas nas yung ba'i khu bas rdo ba'i gtan pa la 'di dag bris nas khas bub ste gzhag par byas na shin tu rengs par 'gyur te/_gzhan du ma yin no/_/
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]'khor lo ni de nyid de/_'on kyang hU~M dang phaT nang du chud par bya'o/_/dug dang /_khrag dang /_ske tshe lhan cig tu mi'i rus pas thod pa la bris te dur khrod du gzhag na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid yin mod kyi o~M nang du chud par byas nas gur gum gyis gro
