[\[131a.2\]]ga la bris te me tog ser pos mchod par bya'o/_/yang na mchod pa lnga dang lhan cig pas nyi ma bdun gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi yi ge dang swA hA nang du chud par byas nas bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi yi ge'i rig pa bcu po de nyid a nang du chud par 
[\[131a.3\]]byas nas/_tsan+dan dkar pos ming bris te/_kham phor la me tog dkar po dri bzang pos ji ltar nus pas mchod cing mchod nas thun gsum du cho ga bzhin du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/e'i dbus su A che ge mo zhes bri bar bya zhing /_/de'i 
[\[131a.4\]]steng dang /_ngos dag dang /_'og tu hU~M dang /_mtshams su ba~M dang /_phyi rol du ri mo gsum bskor nas ba lang gi gi wang gis gro ga la bris te mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhag par byas na nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du byed do/_/'dab ma bzhi la hrIHdang ldan zhing 
[\[131a.5\]]dbus su hrIHlha sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_phyi rol du de nas hU~M bzhi bri bar bya ste/_tsan+dan dmar pos kham phor so ma btang ba la ming bris na khros pa zhi bar 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom med do/_/gur gum dang /_ba lang gi gi wang ngam/_yang na a la ka ta'i khu bas 
[\[131a.6\]]grog la 'khor lo bris nas gcig 'dzin par byed cing 'khor lo gzhan mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug ste/_/gang la kha bltas pa de sdug par 'gyur ro/_/tha dad pa'i sngags ni/_oM sar+b+ba mo ha ni ta re tut+ta re tu re sarba duSh+TA nA~M mo ha ya mo ha ya b+ha ga wa ti sar+b+ba duSh+TA nA~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha 
[\[131a.7\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gos kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa byas nas lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun gyis mi tshugs so/_/ut+pa la la lan bdun du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ut+pal las mtshan pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/pad+ma 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'dab ma brgyad par gyur pa las hrIHdang shrI mchog dang ldan zhing /_lte ba la hrIHlha sbyin shrI ba lang gi gi wang gis gro ga la bris nas 'dzin par byed na thams cad du skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa byas nas gti mug gi rigs kyi sngags btu bar 
[\[131b.2\]]bya zhing phyi rol du ri mo yongs su zlum por bskor te/_rdo rje rtse gsum pa brgyad kyis bskor te/_de ltar cho gas gur gum gyis bris nas dpung pa la bcings te gdags pa byas na thams cad du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'khor lo ni de nyid de/_'on kyang rdo rje dang bral 
[\[131b.3\]]ba'o/_/lte ba'am yang na phyi rol du 'di lta ste/_o~M hU~M hU~M bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/_khA da khA dang /_tshin+da tshin+da/_d+hu na d+hu na/_ma tha ma tha/_ba~M d+ha ba~M d+ha/_a mu ka~M a mu ke na/_sa ha pi dwe Sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sngang bar byed pa 'di ni rta mgrin gyi'o/_/mngon spyod kyi rdzas ni 
[\[131b.4\]]ma he dang /_rta'i rmig pa'i nang du bris na skad cig gis 'phrog pa dang /_bgrod par dka' ba lhan cig pa yang sdang bar byed na/_yang dman pa'i mi lta ci smos/_me'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bris nas steng dang 'og dang mtshams zung gi cho gas/_hU~M gaHhU~M hU~M gaHhU~M 
[\[131b.5\]]de rnams ni steng du'o/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT 'og gi cha la'o/_/hU~M gaHhU~M hU~M gaHhU~M 'di dag phyi rol gyi spyi bor bri'o/_/dbus su ni hU~M gaHhU~M hU~M gaHhU~M ste/_dug dang /_khrag dang /_ske tshe dang /_dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /_nim pa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang /_rdo rje'i chus dur khrod kyi 
[\[131b.6\]]ras sam/_smyon pa'i ras la bris nas stobs po che'i sngags kyis bskor nas 'bar ba'i me'i steng du gzhag na dgra bo rengs par byed do/_/dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i o~M gnas brgyad du bris pa'i dbus su pad+ma nges par bzhag nas a brgyad kyis brgyan no/_/
[\[131b.7\]]lte ba'i nang du bsgrub bya gnas par byas la/_hU~M bzhi yis spras par kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du gnas pa'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pas mnan cing skul bar byed pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa bzlas shing bsgoms nas rdo rje'i skud pas kun tu dkris na/_'dis mi thams cad dang /_
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]lha rnams dang /_sku gsum las skyes pa rnams rengs par byed do/_/dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje rtse gsum pa brgyad kyis mtshan cing /_de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa la 'di lta ste/_o~M pA ta pA ta ni swA hA/_shar du'o/_/o~M dzam+b+ha 
[\[132a.2\]]dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/_/g.yas su'o/_/oM mo ha mo ha ni swA hA/_/nub tu'o/_o~M sta~M b+ha sta~M b+ha ni swA hA/_byang du'o/_/yang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig ces bya ba 'di nyid kyi sngags gro ga la yung 
[\[132a.3\]]ba'i khu bas bris nas sbal pa'i khar bcug ste/_de'i kha myos byed kyi tsher mas phug nas steng gi sbal pa'i ya mgal de yang spang leb la 'og tu sbyar te gzhag par byas na de'i skad cig gis pha rol gyi dpung rengs par byed do/_/'khor lo zlum po'i rnam par 
[\[132a.4\]]gyur pa la rdo rje rtse lnga pa mtshams su rnam par gnas pa'o/_/de'i rwa dbus ma'i steng gi mgo bo la hU~M bzhi'o/_/de'i lte ba la yang sngags bri bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_oM ba dA kra ma si/_pa rA kra ma si/_u da ya ma si/_ne ra ma si/_arka ma si/_marka ma si/_
[\[132a.5\]]ur ma ma si/_ba nam si/_gul+ma ma si/_tsI ba ra ma si/_ma hA tsI ba ra ma si/_an+ta r+d+dA na ma si swA hA/_o~M ni thams cad du'o/_/de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse gsum pa kha phyogs su gnas pa'o/_/o~M bat+tA li/_oM ba ra li/_o~M bA rA ha mu khi/_de bzhin du g.yas 
[\[132a.6\]]dang g.yon du'o/_/de ltar rtse mo thams cad kyi mgor rim pas bri bar bya'o/_/o~M mA rI ts+yai ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su'o/_/de ltar dbus su ni/_o~M ba rA li/_o~M ba tA li/_o~M bA rA ha mu khi/_sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra du nA~M/_kA ya wA ka tsit+ta mu kha~M/_dzam+b+ha ya/_
[\[132a.7\]]stam+b+ha ya/_de'i dbus su mA~M mo/_/de'i dbus su lha sbyin rak+Sha rak+Sha'o/_/mA~M gyi phyi rol du ni/_o~M mA rI ts+yai lha sbyin zhes bya'o/_/'khor lo 'di gro ga la gur gum gyis bris nas gzung bar byas na thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba dang /_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rna bar rna cha gnyis dang /_spyi gtsug gi steng du rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnas zhing ha~M dang ldan pa dang /_dpral ba'i steng du la~M la~M dang /_g.yas pa'i kos ko nas brtsams te/_gang zhig bdag gi sems la snun par byed pa de la ltung ba dang /_rig sngags phyir zlog 
[\[132b.2\]]par mdzod cig_/de'i lte ba las steng du kha'i bar du mchod rten gyi dbyibs su bri bar bya'o/_/de'i steng du gnas par rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri bar bya zhing /_mchod rten gyi snying po dang /_g.yas pa dang /_brang dang /_g.yon pa dang /_'og gi bar ji snyed pa 'dir gnas te/_ye 
[\[132b.3\]]d+harmA phreng ba'i dbyibs su bri bar bya'o/_/de'i mgrin par hU~M kha 'og tu bltas pa'o/_/de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha steng du bltas ba bri zhing ngos dag tu hU~M bcu gnyis so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi bang rim la dbyangs ma ning dang bral ba'o/_/skyes bu'i snying gar rig 
[\[132b.4\]]sngags phyir zlog cing ltung bar byed pa gong ma bzhin du ste/_'on kyang tshar du'o/_/yang byin pa dang /_pho mtshan dang /_rtags la tshar du'o/_/pu~M yu~M ra~M yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/rta~M rta~M rol pa dang bcas pa'i dbyig pa la'o/_/bra~M ra~M rkang pa dag la'o/_/skar ma rgyal 
[\[132b.5\]]la dug dang /_lan tsha dang /_ske tshe dang /_nim pa'i lo ma dang /_smyo byed kyi khu ba dang /_dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /_lhan cig pas skyes bu 'di 'dri ru gzhug par bya'o/_/rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su/_tsan+dan dkar pos lha sbyin nang du chud par bya zhing /_tsan+dan dkar pos rje 
[\[132b.6\]]btsun mchod rten bri/_/gur gum gyis rdo rje bris pa 'di yi rig pa 'dzin par byed na/_de'i thams cad du bsrung ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/ri rab zur brgyad pa rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan cing mtshams kyi nang du ni nA~M gi rnam pa bri bar bya'o/_/hU~M gnyis kyis bskor ba dang /_/
[\[132b.7\]]a la ka tA ka pA pa ma~M sa~M grwa gnyis kyi nang du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas bri bar bya zhing /_phyi rol du ri mo zlum pos bskor bar bya'o/_/de'i dbus su tshogs kyi bdag po bri bar bya ste/_gar gyi dbang phyug gi tshul du la du'i snod dang /_g.yas par bgrang phreng 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dang /_g.yon na rdo rje rtse gsum dang /_la phug lo ma dang bcas par byi ba la zhon zhing pad+ma la gnas pa dgod par bya'o/_/hU~M gaHhU~M hU~M gaHgaHhU~M br-iSh+Ti ku ru hU~M gaHgaHhU~M/_glang po'i dpral ba dang /_snying ga dang /_pho ba dang /_lte ba'i steng du bri bar bya ste/_
[\[133a.2\]]tsha ba gsum dang /_srin lag gi khrag lhan cig pas kham phor so ma btang ba la 'di bris nas seng ldeng gi me la gdung bar byas na nges par char 'bab par 'gyur te/_gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/ldong ros kyis de nyid kyi gdong gi nang du bris nas me la gdungs na sprin rengs 
[\[133a.3\]]shing char 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris nas gaHbrgyad kyis brgyan cing de'i dbus su cho gas bsgrub bya nang du chud par bya ste/_dur khrod kyi ras sam mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i ras la ldong ros dang yung ba'i khu bas bri bar bya'o/_/sA lu btags 
[\[133a.4\]]pa la tshogs kyi bdag po byas nas de'i snying gar 'khor lo 'di bcug ste/_kham phor shin tu tshos pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas skud pa ser pos dkris shing /_me tog ser pos man ngag ji lta bas mchod par bya'o/_/lha mo de ltar bshad pa ni rgyal po rengs par byed pa'i 
[\[133a.5\]]mchog go/_/mA~M gi nang du 'di nyid kyi sngags bri bar bya ste/_o~M bat+tA li/_ba rA li/_ba rA ha mu khi sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta nA~M mu kha~M stam+b+ha ya/_yung ba'i khu bas so phag gnyis la yang dag par bris nas kha sbyor byas te legs par 'khrul 'khor byas nas sa la sbas na/_gdug 
[\[133a.6\]]pa thams cad rengs par byed do/_/gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/de nas sa la 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ste/_b+ha ga'i nang du ling ga dang bcas par der ming bri bar bya'o/_/gcig pu gnyis su med par bdag nyid gci ba byas na ji srid nyi ma bdun gyis gang zhig bud med 
[\[133a.7\]]'dod pa de hriH'i zhags pas bskor ba'i cho gas 'gugs par byed do/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gnas pa bri bar bya ste/_rdo rje dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_dgra sta dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_zhags pa dang /_sna tshogs rdo rje dang /_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]kha T+wa ga dang /_de bzhin du lcags kyu nyid de ltar mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o/_/de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba'i nang du che ge mo dang che ge mos bu rnyed par gyur cig ces bya ba dang 'khor lo'i lte bar sngags bri bar bya ste/_'di lta ste/_oM ma Ni d+ha ri 
[\[133b.2\]]badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sA re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sngags 'di bri bar bya ste/_o~M -i mra ta bi lo ki ni/_gar+b+ha saM rak+Sha Ni A kar+Sha Ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_skar ma rgyal la gur gum dang /_ba lang gi gi wang gis gro ga la bris nas 
[\[133b.3\]]'dzin par byed na bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo bum pa'i dbyibs su gyur pa'i mgrin pa ring po'i mgrin par/_yaHde yaHba yaHda yaHt+ta yaHmu yaHts+tshA yaHTa yaHya yaH_de ltar cho gas bri bar bya ste/_dbang phyug gi gnas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi ras la khwa'i khrag 
[\[133b.4\]]gis gang gi ming nas mngon par bris nas khwa gson po'i mgrin pa la btags te/_rlung gi phyogs su btang na myur du skrod par byed do/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/_hU~M gi de kho na nyid kyi sa bon snying por 
[\[133b.5\]]chud par byas nas rdo rjes mtshan pa rnam par bsams shing phyis bsgrub bya nang du chud par byas te/_gur gum dang /_ba lang gi gi wang gis gro ga la cho ga bzhin du bris nas 'dzin na/_rnal 'byor pa de'i rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi 
[\[133b.6\]]par gyur pa kun tu ri mo gsum bar/_o~M hrIMHklIMH/_'dis cho ga bzhin du skar ma rgyal la bris te/_lag pas 'dzin pas des reg na bran bzhin du byed de/_'khor lo rdza rnga'i dbyibs su gyur pa rdo rje dang pad+mas mtshan pa/_sku rdo rje la sogs pa mdor bsdus 
[\[133b.7\]]nas phyi rol du ri mo gsum gyis bskor te/_las kyi rdo rje rab tu bsgoms pas dgra thams cad nges par gnon cing /_las kyi cho ga mthong bas sngags kyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i sngags bka' stsal pa/_oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/_
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn bi d+yA rA dzA ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_ya tshan brgyad po'i sa bon dang /_/de bzhin ma mo bcu gnyis kyi/_/yi ge bar ma phyi byas pa/_/yan lag drug ni he ru ka_/dpa' 
[\[134a.2\]]bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba/_/yi ge re re yang dag gnas/_/snying ga ru ni dang po nyid/_/gnyis pa spyi bo ru ni brjod/_/gsum pa spyi gtsug sbyin par bya/_/bzhi pa go char gyur pa ste/_/mig la lnga par gyur pa yin/_/drug pa mtshon char brjod par bya/_/rdo rje 
[\[134a.3\]]phag mo mnyam sbyor ba/_/phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/_/'od zer ser pos gsal bar brgyan/_/dbu skyes zla ba phyed pas mdzes/_/rus pa'i phreng ba nar ba dang /_/kha T+wA~M ga ni lag na gnas/_/bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/_/he ru ka nyid des dran bya/_/
[\[134a.4\]]ye shes sems dpa' snying bsams nas/_/ra ba phyogs su dgod par bya/_/khro bo 'bar 'khrugs bsams nas ni/_/mi bzad 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/_/bgegs bskrad phur bas btab nas ni/_/phyogs ni kun tu lha dang ni/_/lha min mi 
[\[134a.5\]]ni sdigs par byed/_/de ltar cho gas goms pa ni/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pas mi shigs/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang /_sgo bzhi par yang dag par bri bar bya'o/_/der 'dab ma drug pa ge sar dang ldan pa gzhag par bya zhing /_sngags pas 
[\[134a.6\]]mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo nyis 'gyur du rnam par bri bar bya'o/_/lte ba la dpa' bo dgod par bya zhing /_de bzhin du gzhan la mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/sgo kun tu rdo rje rtse gsum pa kha dog ser pos mtshan par bya ba dang /_'khor lo'i snying por pho nya mo dgod 
[\[134a.7\]]par bya zhing /_sgo la yang cho ga'i rim pa bzhin du'o/_/mchod pa chen po byas nas skar ma bzang po la brtul zhugs can gyis 'di 'dzin par byed na dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_mtshon phog pa la sogs pa zlog par byed de/_lha mo ngas gsungs pa la the tshom 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]mi bya'o/_/skyes bu dgra las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'khor lo'o/_/yang na zangs kyi 'dab ma la skar ma rgyal la brko bar bya zhing /_de nyid kyi sngags bsgrub bya nang du bcug cing sgo dang bral ba ste/_chur gzhag cing dus gsum du mchod pa byas na de nas dgra thams 
[\[134b.2\]]cad rengs par byed do/_/sngags pas mnyam par gzhag pas cho ga bzhin du mtsho skam pa med par bcug na zhi bar byed do/_/de nas gzhan yang 'khor lor gyur pa gru bzhi pa dang /_sgo bzhi pa dang /_rig byed la de bzhin du rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/_/sgo la rdo 
[\[134b.3\]]rje tho ba dang /_rin chen dbyig to dang /_pad+ma dang /_de bzhin du rdo rje ral gri'o/_/mtshams su thod pa dkar po gnas pa'i ut+pa la dang lcags kyu'o/_/de bzhin du de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa la mkhas pas yi ge dgod par bya ba yin no/_/de'i lte 
[\[134b.4\]]ba la sngags kyi mchog 'di bri bar bya ste/_'di lta ste/_oM pra san+na ta re a mr-i ta mu khi a mr-i ta lo tsa ne sar+b+ba ar+tha sa d+ha ni swA hA/_dbang gi sngags 'di bri bar bya'o/_/de nas gdug pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'i sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/_oM sar+b+ba mo ha ni 
[\[134b.5\]]tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TA nAM mo ha ya mo ha ya/_b+ha ga ba ti sar+b+ba duSh+TA nAM/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_de'i dbus su zla ba bya zhing zla ba'i dbus su bzhi pa'i dang po ze ba'i dbyibs su zlum po'i rnam pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i dbus su rtsi bas drug pa bya zhing /_de nas 
[\[134b.6\]]sngags rig pas yi ge drug hrIH'i cho gas nang du chud par byas na pha rol gyi dpung thams cad las rgyal ba sgrol ma 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/'di 'bum bzlas pas sa g.yo ba dang /_rgya mtsho dang mtsho la sogs pa bskam par 'gyur ba dang /_dug bdud rtsir byed par 
[\[134b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_bdud rtsi yang dug tu byed par 'gyur ro/_/gyo mo la mngon par bsngags nas steng dang /_'og dang /_phyogs dang /_mtshams su gtor ba byas na lha thams cad dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams bcings pa dang /_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'phrog pa dang /_klu thams cad kyi dug 'phrog par 'gyur ro/_/gyo mo la yongs su bzlas nas chu la gtor na rgyun las bzlog nas 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gyo mo de nyid 
[\[135a.2\]]kyis rba rlabs rengs par byed do/_/steng du bltas nas stong bzlas na char chen po zlog par byed do/_/pha rol gyi dpung la kha bltas nas stong bzlas pa byas nas g.yul du zhugs na mtshon brgya yis bsnun kyang na ba skye bar mi 'gyur te/_mtshon gyis chod par mi 'gyur 
[\[135a.3\]]zhing rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur ba dang /_ngo mtshar du ma byed par 'gyur ba dang /_sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul bas rtse bar 'gyur ro/_/bdun pa las rgyas pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//rab gnas mtshan nyid 
[\[135a.4\]]bzang po ni/_/rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol/_/bzlas dang bsam gtan mi 'tshal bas/_/sbyin sreg las cho ga ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag_/chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yi/_/dgyes pa chen po rnyed dka' bas/_/bka' 
[\[135a.5\]]drin gyis ni bskyab tu gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bsam gtan las cho ga ji lta bar/_/bshad par bya yis lha mo nyon/_/bsam gtan tsam gyis sbyor bas ni/_/las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/de la dang por sa sbyang ba 
[\[135a.6\]]bshad pa'i phyir bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas/_/khengs btsas gnyis med yang dag gnas/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal gyur nas ni/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bskrad par bya/_/rkang pa'i dgod pa ci gsungs dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[135a.7\]]du ni lha rnams nyid/_/sbyin sreg las ni ci gsungs dang /_/thab khung gi ni mtshan nyid dang /_/de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas/_/phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba zhal gsum pa phyag drug par gyur pa bsgoms nas/_khro bo'i 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]sprin phyung ste/_de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa la khyed rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas su dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /_slob dpon dang de'i slob ma rnams bsrung ba mdzad du gsol zhes bskul lo/_/
[\[135b.2\]]de nas de bsdus nas nang du bcug ste/_rang gi snying gar zla ba la rigs kyi bdag po'i lte ba'i nang du hU~M gnas par byas nas/_de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs rang gi rig ma dang /_rnal 'byor ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[135b.3\]]dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas dang po'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab cing /_'dod pa'i bskor ba byas nas lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bar bya ba dang /_g.yon pas dril bu sgra snyan par dkrol bar bya'o/_/rkang pa'i mthil du hU~M las rdo rje 'bar ba dgod par 
[\[135b.4\]]bya zhing /_khro bo hU~M mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis blo dang ldan pas dang por hU~M brjod pas bskrad par bya'o/_/lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gsang ba pa gdug pa can thams cad la khro bo'i skur bsgoms pas/_tshig 'di dag brjod par bya ste/_gang yang lha dang /_lha ma 
[\[135b.5\]]yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_'byung po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_lus srul po dang /_gnon po mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 
[\[135b.6\]]'am ci dang /_rig sngags grub pa khyed song shig_/sa'i phyogs 'dir slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya ba'i slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don dang /_sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[135b.7\]]rgyal po che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dri bas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' thos nas de dag myur ba nyid du song shig_/gang zhig mi 'gro ba de dag lag na rdo rje hU~M mdzad khros pa'i gdong rab tu 'bar ba kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas ye shes chen po'i rdo rje'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bo brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes lan gsum du brjod do/_/rdo rje chen po lag par bzung nas rang gi rdo rje las khro bo'i sku bton te/_rdo rje'i rkang pas dkyil 'khor gyis kun tu bskor zhing yongs su bcags pas gdug pa can thams cad bskrad 
[\[136a.2\]]par bya'o/_/de ltar sa yongs su gzung ba yin no/_/de nas sa'i lha mo dgug pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya zhing /_bla ma la phyag 'tshal nas sngags kyi mkhan po phyag 'tshal te/_phyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi kha dog can bum pa lag na 
[\[136a.3\]]thogs pa bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas dri zhim po la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga po rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing /_lhag par gnas nas nye bar bya'o/_/de'i dgug pa'i sngags bka' stsal pa/_oM e h+ye hi ma hA de bI pr-i thi bI lo ka mA ta re/_sar+b+ba rat+na 
[\[136a.4\]]saM pur+N+Ne di bya laM kA ra b+hU Shi te hA ra nU pU ra ni r+g+ho She/_badzra satwa pra pU dzi te/_gr-i hI twA i da marga ho ma kar+m+ma su sA d+ha ye ta/_hI hI hI hI ha~M swA hA/_sngags 'dis sta gon la gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas sa byug pa bya ba'i phyir bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa bsang 
[\[136a.5\]]gtor byas te byug par bya'o/_/de nas sha chen gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/bdugs ma thag tu mchod nas de la dbus su phyag rgya gzhag pa ni rig ma rab tu gzhug par bya'o/_/ci lags bcom ldan 'das lugs ma dang /_'dus byas pa dang /_ri mo sna 
[\[136a.6\]]tshogs dang /_shing la sogs pa las byas pa'i rig ma'i lha mo gzhug par bgyi zhes gsungs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gdol pa la sogs pa'i mi'i bu mo gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i dngos po med na gzhan phal pa mchog gi yan 
[\[136a.7\]]lag la hrI'i sngags dgod par bya'o/_/yan lag thams cad la zhes bya ba ni snying ga dang /_smin mtshams dang /_lkog ma dang /_spyi bo rnams su hrIHdang /_b+ha ga'i dbus su b+h+ru~M dgod par bya'o/_/ci bcom ldan 'das gong du de rnams kyi dbus su b+hu~M dgod pa 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/dbus kyi sgras ni lte bar gsungs so/_/der b+hu~M dgod par bya'o/_/der yi ge bkod nas spyan la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya zhes bka' stsal to/_/spyan gyi dbyibs 
[\[136b.2\]]su bsgom par bya zhing /_/der bram ze mo'am/_dmangs mo zhi ba la spyan gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba kha dog dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsgom par bya'o/_/dbang la gdol pa mo sgrol ma kha dog dmar mo bsgom par bya'o/_/rgyas pa la gar ma dang 
[\[136b.3\]]rgyal rigs dag gos dkar mo kha dog ser mo'o/_/de ltar las kyi dbye bas mchod pa lngas mchod do/_/me tog snyim par gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ni/_de'i b+ha ga la me tog dang /_khu ba gzhug par bya'o/_/de ltar sbyin sreg gi sa sbyang bar byas pa yin 
[\[136b.4\]]no/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang gzhan phal pa mchog gi bu mor rtogs par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyir sbyin sreg gi cho ga de nye bar bstan par bya ste/_gang la gsang ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la yang cho ga 'dis thig 
[\[136b.5\]]gdab par bya zhing /_rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_gsang ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa'i rang gi dam tshig ste/_'di skad du rnal 'byor gyi gnas su gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs su thab khung bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/sna tshogs las ni rab bsgrub phyir/_/
[\[136b.6\]]sbyin sreg las ni rab bshad bya/_/me ni lha yi kha ru gsungs/_/sbyin sreg de nyid rnam par gnas/_/sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim/_/tshim nas dngos grub rab tu stsol/_/gang zhig sngags kyi lhag chad dag_/sbyin sreg gis ni de kun dgang /_/sku 
[\[136b.7\]]gsum mchog gi rtse las skyes/_/de phyir sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags/_/gtsubs pa las ni byung ba'i mes/_/dag byed las ni byed par 'gyur/_/gdol pa'am dur khrod skyes pa ni/_/mi dge ba ni rab tu bsgrub/_/zlum po dang ni gru bzhi dang /_/zla phyed 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]dang ni gru gsum pa/_/rdo rje'i mtshan ma'i mu ran dang /_/dkyil 'khor grwar ni spro bar bya/_/thab khung dbus su gtsug tor dang /_/chu skyes rdo rje rin chen dang /_/pad+ma gzhug par bya ba'o/_/sbyin sreg de nyid chog rim pas/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[137a.2\]]ji bzhin gnas nas ni/_/pus mo'i nang du lag pa nyid/_/blugs gzar mar khus khyab pas ni/_/de bzhin dgang gzar dgang blugs nyid/_/g.yas su sbyin sreg yo byad gzhag_/g.yon du chu yi snod nyid de/_/mdun du mchod yon snod nyid do/_/las 
[\[137a.3\]]kun byed pa bzlas pas ni/_/bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya/_/thab khung kun du ku sha yi/_/rtse mo drang pos yongs su bskor/_/me ni 'bar bar rig nas ni/_/me lha spyan ni drang bar bya/_/sngags 'dis cho ga bzhin du g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang /_me 
[\[137a.4\]]'jigs pa g.yo bas/_oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de pa r-i Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gr-i hI twA hu ti ma hA ra ma smin san+ni hi to b+ha ba/_o~M ag+ne dI pyA dI pyA bi sha ma hA shri ye/_ha bya ka bya bA ha na ya swA hA/_mchod pa lnga la g.yon pa'i rdo rjes bsang gtor bya zhing /_me'i phyogs nas bkug 
[\[137a.5\]]pa lto ba 'phyang zhing mig gsum pa dang /_zhal bzhi pa dang /_phyag bzhi pa dang /_kha dog dmar zhing ral pa chen po dang /_me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing las kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa ste/_lag pa dang po na mchog sbyin/_gnyis pa na bgrang phreng /_g.yon 
[\[137a.6\]]pa na ril ba spyi blugs nyid dang /_gnyis pa na dbyig gu nyid/_kha dog dmar pos rnam par brgyan cing drang srong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 'di lta bu'i gzugs su bsams nas thab khung gi dbus su gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i sbyin sreg thams cad la 
[\[137a.7\]]lan gsum gyi bar du sreg blugs sbyin te/_de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas 'bar ba'i rnam pas thim par bya'o/_/rim pa'i sbyor ba 'dis lha rnams mkhas pas tshim par bya'o/_/tshim par byas nas bzod par gsol to/_/dngos grub 'dod pas shes par bya ste/_
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_rdo rje dang /_bum pa dang /_pad+ma dang /_lcags kyu'i dbyibs dang /_rtse gcig pa dang /_rtse gnyis pa dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_mchog dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma dang /_khyad par du g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /_'bar 
[\[137b.2\]]ba'i kha dog dkar po dang /_bzang po'i 'khyil ba mkhas pas brtag par bya ba dang /_brgya byin gyi gzhu lta bur gtsang ba dang /_snum pa dang /_dbang po sbas pa lta bu'i 'od dang /_ku sum b+ha dang /_bai DUr+ya lta bu dang /_dri zhim pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_gser 
[\[137b.3\]]dang /_/dngul lta bu dang /_du ba med pa dang /_nyi ma lta bu 'bar ba dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_zhi ba la kha dog dkar po lta bu dang /_rgyas pa la ni ser po lta bu dang /_rjes su chags pa la ni dmar po mchog dang /_mngon spyod la ni sngon po dang /_nag po dang /_
[\[137b.4\]]me lce mang ba dang /_du ba dang /_me stag thams cad yang dag par langs pa dang /_chung ngu chung ngur 'chad pa dang /_myur bar gzi brjid chung ba dang /_nag po dang bcas pa dang /_pa la sha'i mdog dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_nyi ma lta bu nyid dang /_de bzhin du ba glang 
[\[137b.5\]]gi mgo lta bu nyid dang /_ro'i dri dang /_nya'i dri dang /_bong bu'i dang /_khyi'i dang /_rnga mo'i ni bgegs dang /_bgegs med pa'i 'bar ba'i mtshan ma mtshon par bya ba yin no/_/myur bar bzlas pa dang /_bsgom pa la dga' bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_
[\[137b.6\]]o~M dang po dang /_swA hA mthar 'gro ba'i sngags brjod do/_/zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang la rgyun mi 'chad par dbyangs sbyar bar bya zhing /_zhi ba la zhi ba'i yid dang /_rgyas pa la tshim pas mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_dbang la dbang gi yid dang /_
[\[137b.7\]]myos par byed cing nang gi gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_mngon spyod la hU~M dang phaT kyis lus 'bar zhing 'bar ba dang /_'jig rten gsum bza' ba'i sems kyi cho gas gnas so/_/sngags kyi yi ge'i rkang pa yi/_/nang du chud pas bskul bas sbyar/_/gang yang kha dang 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]ldan pa'i lha/_/sna tshogs las kyis mchod par bya/_/sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/_/sngags kyi sgrub pos cho ga shes pas/_/dang por sreg blugs gang bar dbul/_/phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/_/sbyin sreg de nyid kyis ni bskul/_/sbyin 
[\[138a.2\]]sreg cho ga'i rim pa 'di/_/zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang ni/_/khu ba srid pa'i sbyin sreg la/_/bshang gci khrag dang rkang dang ni/_/rus pa sha chen sbyin sreg gi_/thams cad las ni kha bkang yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[138a.3\]]rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i las rgyas pa phyi dang nang du gyur pa 'di bka' stsal pa/_gang gi gang yang lha'i 'khor lo'i dbus su bcug pa de'i 
[\[138a.4\]]mtshan du bstan par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mkhas pas bsngags so/_/zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang dang /_mngon spyod kyi las rnams la bdag pos 'khor lo'i rgyal mo rnam par bsgom par sbyor bar byed do/_/b+ha ga'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba 
[\[138a.5\]]bsgom par bya ste/_tA~M las skyes pa'i lha mo sgrol ma mthu chen mo sgeg pa'i ros yang dag par gnas ma/_zhal brgyad ma/_spyan gsum ma/_phyag bcu drug ma/_zhal 'dzum pa/_ma ra ka ta lta bu/_lang tsho phun sum tshogs ma/_na bza' sna tshogs man pas ma/_do 
[\[138a.6\]]shal dang /_rkang gdub dang /_lag gdub dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rna rgyan dang /_ska rags chen po dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan ma/_ut+pa la yis spyi bo brgyan ma/_ya ba'i me tog lta bur mchog ma/_g.yon brkyang bas gnas su bzhugs ma/_sum cu rtsa 
[\[138a.7\]]gsum gyi bdag po yang 'jigs shing skrag par mdzad cing /_gzhan yang thal mo sbyor ba dang /_'od zer dmar po nye bar 'bar zhing sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par spro ba dang /_sems can thams cad lam lta bur sdug par rnal 'byor pas bsgom par byas 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]na myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/dang po na ral gri'o/_/gnyis pa na ut+pa la'o/_/gsum pa na mda'o/_/bzhi pa na rdo rje'o/_/lnga pa na lcags kyu'o/_/drug pa na dbyig pa'o/_/bdun pa na gri gug go/_/brgyad pa na mi 'jigs pa'o/_/g.yon 
[\[138b.2\]]pa'i dang po na thod pa'o/_/gnyis pa na sdigs mdzub bo/_/gsum pa na gzhu'o/_/bzhi pa na kha T+wa ga'o/_/lnga pa na zhags pa'o/_/drug pa na mi'i mgo bo'o/_/bdun pa na rin po che'o/_/brgyad pa na bum pa 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yas pa'i zhal dang po ni sngon po'o/_/
[\[138b.3\]]gnyis pa ni ser po yang dag par 'bar ba'o/_/g.yon pa'i dang po ni dkar po'o/_/gnyis pa ni ljang gu dang /_baiDU r+ya lta bu'o/_/steng gi zhal ni rnam par gtsigs shing /_du ba'i mdog dang /_'jigs pa chen po dang /_khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs par byed pa/_
[\[138b.4\]]dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed pa/_de ltar lha mo bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas steng gi zhal bong bu'i rnam pa dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/_zhabs bzhi pa/_rtse gsum sbrul gyis bskor ba/_de bzhin du he ru ka zhes bya ba nges par rgyu'i mchog bsgom par 
[\[138b.5\]]bya'o/_/b+ha ga'i nang du yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor du ba'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de'i steng du zla ba'i dbus su d+hIHyongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsams nas de'i snying gar a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/_de nas 
[\[138b.6\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'od zer phyung ste cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya'o/_/de'i steng du hU~M 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa bsams nas de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal dgu pa ma he'i gzugs dang /_zhabs bcu drug pa/_phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa/_gcer bu 
[\[138b.7\]]sku mdog nag cing gzi brjid chen po/_thod pa mchog gis brgyan par mdzad cing /_'jigs byed chen po'i steng gi ling ga dang /_g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs shing /_gsus pa che ba dang /_sku che zhing skra steng du 'bar bas 'jigs pa'i rnam pa dang /_thod pa'i phreng 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_'jigs pa chen po'i dus lta bur sgrogs pa dang /_skyes pa'i pags pa dang /_tshil dang /_khrag dang /_sha dang /_/lto ba'i tshil dang /_rkang za ba dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nye dbang dang /_drag po la sogs pa'i 
[\[139a.2\]]'jig rten gsum za ba dang /_sgra cher bzhad cing lce nar ba dang /_'jigs pa yang 'jigs par mdzad pa bsam par bya'o/_/dang po ni ma he'i gdong ngo /_/g.yas pa'i rwa'i zhal gsum ni sngon po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po ste/_/khro gnyer dang /_zhal 
[\[139a.3\]]gtsigs pa'o/_/g.yon pa ni dkar po dang /_du ba dang /_nag po'o/_/de dag gi dbus su zhal shin tu dmar ba khrag 'dzag pa'o/_/de'i steng du 'jam pa'i gzugs shin tu ser zhing cung zad khro ba dang /_byis pa'i rgyan dang /_gtsug pud lnga'i mchog dang 
[\[139a.4\]]gzhon nu ste/_/de ltar brtan par byas nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sngags pas bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas g.yas pa'i dang po na ni gri gug go/_/gnyis pa na ni 'bigs byed skyong ba'o/_/gsum pa na ni gtun shing ngo /_/bzhi pa na ni chu gri'o/_/
[\[139a.5\]]lnga pa na ni ka Na ya'o/_drug pa na ni sta re'o/_/bdun pa na ni mdung ngo /_/brgyad pa na ni mda'o/_/dgu pa na ni lcags kyu'o/_/bcu pa na ni dbyig to'o/_/bcu gcig pa na ni kha T+wa ga'o/_/bcu gnyis pa na ni 'khor lo'o/_/bcu gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o/_/bcu 
[\[139a.6\]]bzhi pa na ni rdo rje tho ba'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa na ni ral gri'o/_/bcu drug pa na ni cang te'u'o/_/phyag g.yon pa'i dang po na ni thod pa'o/_/gnyis pa na ni mgo bo'o/_/gsum pa na ni phub bo/_/bzhi pa na ni rkang pa'o/_/lnga pa na ni zhags pa'o/_/drug pa na ni gzhu'o/_/bdun 
[\[139a.7\]]pa na ni rgyu ma'o/_/brgyad pa na ni dril bu'o/_/dgu pa na ni lag pa'o/_/bcu pa na ni dur khrod kyi ras so/_/bcu gcig pa na gsal shing gis phug pa'i skyes bu'o/_/bcu gnyis pa na ni me'i thab khung ngo /_/bcu gsum pa na ni thod pa'o/_/bcu bzhi pa na ni sdigs 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]mdzub bo/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa na ni ba dan lce gsum pa'o/_/bcu drug pa na ni rlung gi ras so/_/gnyis kyis ni glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/zhabs g.yas pa'i 'og tu ni mi dang /_/ma he dang /_glang dang /_/bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyi dang /_lug dang /_ce sbyang 
[\[139b.2\]]ngo /_/zhabs g.yon pa'i 'og tu ni bya rgod dang /_'ug pa dang /_khwa dang /_ne tso dang /_khra dang /_man tri dang /_bya rgod chen po dang /_bya long ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam gtan nam 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dur khrod chen po 
[\[139b.3\]]srin po dang /_zhing skyong ba dang /_ro langs dang ldan pa dang /_gsal shing gis phug pa'i skyes bu dang /_bsregs pa'i skyes bu dang /_mdung gis phug pa dang /_khwa dang /_bya du ma dang /_khyi dang ldan par ha has kun tu khyab par byed pa de ltar cho gas rnal 
[\[139b.4\]]'byor pas bsgom par bya'o/_/drag shul gyi las thams cad rab tu grub par byed pa zhes bya ba rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/de nas mA~M las ye shes skyes/_/'od zer can ni snang byed do/_/rta bdun dag gi shing 
[\[139b.5\]]rtar gnas/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jigs byed ma/_/zhal gsum ma la spyan gsum ma/_/phyag drug mdog ni ser mo mtshungs/_/g.yas pa sngon por gyur pa dang /_/g.yon pa kun da zla ba mtshungs/_/'od zer du ma'i 'od gsal ma/_/phyogs 
[\[139b.6\]]bcu srung ba rtsom pa mo/_/zhal ni rnam par 'dzum pa dang /_/sgeg cing shin tu lang tsho bab/_/sna tshogs gos la sogs pa dang /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rgyan byed ma/_/dbu rgyan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga/_/thor tshugs me tog dag gis spras/_/g.yas 
[\[139b.7\]]pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/_/gnyis pa khab ni skud pa can/_/gsum par mda' ni gsor ba ste/_/g.yon pa la ni sdigs mdzub zhags/_/a sho ka yi yal ga gnyis/_/gsum pa la ni gzhu nyid de/_/kun du 'od zer sna tshogs ni/_/sangs rgyas sprin dang 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'dra ba spro/_/'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/sems can rnams ni dbang du sdud/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi nang son par/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nges bsam bya/_/
[\[140a.2\]]ba~M las yongs gyur lha mo ni/_/kha dog ser mo cher 'bar ma/_/zhal gsum ma la spyan gsum nyid/_/khro bcas zhal ni 'dzum pa dang /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis shin tu brgyan/_/phyag drug sar ba'i lang co ma/_/g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang /_/gnyis 
[\[140a.3\]]ba na ni dgra sta nyid/_/gsum pa na ni mda' gsor ma/_/g.yon pa na ni sdig mdzub zhags/_/gnyis par shing lo'i rnga yab dang /_/gsum par gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid/_/me tog gis ni thor tshugs dkris/_/pad+ma dkar po gnas pa dang /_/
[\[140a.4\]]'od zer dmar pos brgyan pa ma/_/khro bo 'bar ba'i spro ba 'bab/_/khro bo 'bar bas kun skrag cing /_/bsregs shing skye dgu gzas zin gang /_/khro bo 'bar bas smon pa dang /_/mi bskyod pa yis mgo bo mnan/_/dkar po rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yang /_/
[\[140a.5\]]bdud rtsi rab tu char 'bebs pa/_/sngar bzhin g.yas dang gzhan pa'i zhal/_/'di 'dra'i sgyu ma kun gzhi'i phyir/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/_/nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i ri khrod ma shing lo can zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[140a.6\]]pa rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje khro bo bsgom pa ni/_/lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon/_/khro bo'i skur ni blangs nas ni/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bsgom par bya/_/zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/ji srid de bzhin phyag 'bum nyid/_/khro bo chen po lus dkar ba/_/
[\[140a.7\]]de mdog mtshon cha 'dzin mar ni/_/rdo rje phag mo brtag par bya/_/dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/_/thal bas lus la byugs pa dang /_/phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/mdung rtse ral pa'i cod pan mtshan/_/zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/_/yi 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]dgas chen po gdan mdzad pa/_/pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/_/kha dog dmar po mnyam 'od du/_/rig ma bzhi dang mnyam par ldan/_/sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan nye bar mdzes/_/rta yi gzugs sogs phyag bzhi ma/_/zhal bzhi dang ni sbrul 
[\[140b.2\]]gyis brgyan/_/yi ge yi ge yang dag ldan/_/thod par bzhugs shing sku mdog dkar/_/zhal bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/_/yar la was rnam par brgyan/_/cho gas ji srid bsgrub bya brtsam/_/rlung sogs ji ltar rim pas ni/_/du ba dmar dang 
[\[140b.3\]]ser dang dkar/_/bsam gtan 'dis ni bltas tsam gyis/_/'o ma'i shing ltar bud med rnams/_/'ju bar 'gyur te gzhan du min/_/ra yi yi ge yang dag ldan/_/kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi ma/_/'bar ba'i phreng khyab 'jigs ma ste/_/zhal bzhi wa 
[\[140b.4\]]yi gdong gis spras/_/hU~M gis bkang ba nyid kyis ni/_/rdo rje phra mo rnam bsgoms pas/_/sna yi rtse mor rdzogs pa las/_/bsgrub bya'i lus la dgang bar bya/_/yan lag tshigs ni thams cad la/_/sna tshogs rdo rje nges sbyar ba/_/des ni rdo rje mtshon 
[\[140b.5\]]cha yis/_/'bar ba dang ni khrag gi lus/_/kun tu 'jigs par byed par ni/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni bsgom/_/o~M badzra DA ki nI a mu ka s+ya rak+ta mA kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/_/'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/khrag ni 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog_/lha 
[\[140b.6\]]mo de ltar bshad pas ni/_/skems par 'di la the tshom med/_/de nas de nyid kun rdzogs nas/_/ma he'i gzugs ni 'jigs pa mo/_/sku mdog nag po 'jigs chen po/_/zhal bzhi pa dang 'jigs par mdzad/_/phyag brgyad pa dang zhabs bzhis spras/_/
[\[140b.7\]]rdo rje gtun shing ral gri dang /_/'khor lo de bzhin cang te'u nyid/_/g.yon na kha T+wA~M ga dang ni/_/thod pa gzhu dang zhags pa nyid/_/sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa yi/_/rdo rje khro bo yang ni spro/_/yid kyis bsgrub bya'i srung ba ni/_/cho ga yis ni bkug nas ni/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]des ni bsgrub bya rnam par bsams/_/zhags pas bcings nas lho phyogs su/_/rdo rje khro bos drangs nas ni/_/rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang /_/ral gri yis ni dral ba dang /_/rgyu ma nar zhing myos pa nyid/_/o~M badzra rAk+Sha sa b+ha k+Sha ye ti phaT/_/de 
[\[141a.2\]]nas khyi yi gdong byas nas/_/rdo rje srin po bsgom pa'o/_/o~M hrIHSh+T+ri bi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_/'di ni ma he'i gdong gshin rje'i gzugs kyi sngags so/_/khwa dang wa dang bya rgod kyis/_/thams cad du ni yongs su bskor/_/des ni bza' ba ldan par ni/_/
[\[141a.3\]]yid kyis bskul bar bsgom par bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor mnyam zhon par/_/rdo rje mche ba rnam par bsam/_/de yi rgyab tu zhon par ni/_/bsgrub par bya ba yongs su brtag_/rdo rje khro bos gzir nas ni/_/lho yi phyogs su khyer bar bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 
[\[141a.4\]]'khor lo ma dang /_/de yi nges par rkang rjes sa/_/rdo rje'i mgo bo rkang par ni/_/de yi ming ni gzung bas sa sba/_/de ltar bsgom pa'i sbyor bas ni/_/cho ga yis ni las rnams bya/_/brgya byin kyang ni skrod byed na/_/sa yi skye bo smos ci dgos/_/bram ze'i skra 
[\[141a.5\]]dang dge sbyong spus/_/'ug pa'i gshog pa dkris nas ni/_/de ming sngags kyi nang bcug ste/_/bris nas sa la sbas nas ni/_/rdo rje khro bo gnyis dag gis/_/'thab pa ru ni rnam par bsam/_/de ltar rnam bsam sbyor bas ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pas sdang 
[\[141a.6\]]bar byed/_/tsi yi yi ge dang ldan pas/_/rta'i rnam pa'i gdong du byed pa ni chang 'gugs par byed pa la mchog ste/_sku mdog ljang gu dang /_zhal bzhi pa dang /_zhabs bzhi pa dang /_phyag brgyad pa dang /_rta mgrin gyi rgyal po chen po dam pa'i dbang phyug 'grub 
[\[141a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dang po ni ljang gu la cung zad ser ba ste/_spyan gsum pa'o/_/zhal g.yas pa dang /_gzhan pa ni nag po dang dkar po'o/_/de bzhin du steng ma ni rta gdong ste/_rnam par gtsigs shing ljang gu'o/_/g.yas pa ni ba dan lce gsum pa 'phyar ba'i 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]tshul lo/_/gnyis pa na ni sna tshogs rdo rje/_gsum pa na ni ral gri/_bzhi pa na ni mda'o/_/g.yon pa na ni sna tshogs pad+ma'o/_gnyis pa la ni 'phang mdung /_gsum pa la ni me long /_/bzhi pa la ni gzhu'o/_/g.yon brkyang bas nyi ma la bzhugs shing gar dang 
[\[141b.2\]]bcas pa dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'gyel bar 'gyur ba de ltar sngags pas cho gas bsgom par bya'o/_/bsgrub bya'i lte bar ya~M gi rnam pa bsgom par bya zhing /_ma~M gi rnam pa gyur pa las chang lto bar bsgom par bya ste/_phyis 
[\[141b.3\]]skyug par byed par bltas na chang skyug par 'gyur ro/_/rlung gi phyogs su song ste/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas dri'i thig le bdun blo dang ldan pas bya zhing /_/kham phor gyis sba bar bya'o/_/der ri rab zur brgyad pa rwa brgyad kyis kun tu spras par sprul te/_sprul 
[\[141b.4\]]pa'i rdo rjes mnan nas ya'i rnam pa rlung bdun po kun gyi sa bon dbugs rngub pas nang du sbas te/_dbang chen la~M gis mtshan pas sa'o/_/de ltar sbyor bas bsgrubs na 'jig pa lta bu'i rlung 'ching bar byed do/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgoms nas/_de'i 'dab 
[\[141b.5\]]ma la klu bdag brgyad dang /_dbus su 'bar ba'i 'bar ba chen po can bkod nas rdo rje khro bo'i skus zhabs kyi mthil gyis gzir bar bya ba dang /_lto 'phyes sprin gyi chu gtor bar byed pa dang /_hU~M gnyis kyi nang du bcug nas dbus su klu'i sa bon bcug ste gzir bar 
[\[141b.6\]]bya zhing hU~M gis bzlas pa byas pas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa chen po byed pa'i nyi ma'i mdog gi 'od ltar shin tu dmar bas kha gdangs nas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa dang /_hU~M 'bar ba'i ljags kyis sprin la bldag pa dang /_rol mtsho bdun yongs su 
[\[141b.7\]]gang ba 'gugs pa dang /_dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byin pas ras bal gyi phur ma ltar gtor ba dang /_de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 'bar ba bton pas skad cig gis 'dral ba dang /_gcod pa dang /_hU~M gi rnam pas sdigs par byed do/_/ston ka'i 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dus kyi nam mkha' lta bu/_me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i mi g.yo mgon dpral ba'i nang nas bton te/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su phyag drug na ral gri dang /_sdigs mdzub dang /_mda' dang /_zhags pa dang /_gzhu dang /_rdo rje 
[\[142a.2\]]ste/_char rab tu 'bebs shing khro bo grangs med pas yongs su bskor bas bdud las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_bgegs thams cad bskrad pa dang /_hU~M gi sgras gang bas 'jig rten gsum gang ba yang 'jig par byed do/_/skyes pa'i khrag dang /_rkang rjes kyis 
[\[142a.3\]]las mi'i gzugs byas nas mig la mi'i rus pa'i phur bu 'od zer can gyi sngags lan nyi shur mngon par bsngags te/_gdab par bya zhing btab ma thag tu de tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar bcug nas rgyab tu rdo rje gtun shing gis brdung bar bya ste/_oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M 
[\[142a.4\]]badzra mu Sha le na tsU r+NaN ya big+h+na' na hU~M phaT/_/de ltar bsam gtan gyi las kyis skyes pa'i bgegs zlog par byed do/_/nam mkha' lding mig sman gyi kha dog lta bu klu brgya stong gis brgyan cing /_lus la klu brgyad dang /_brgya stong gi gdong dang /_nam mkhar gnas 
[\[142a.5\]]pa'i bka' sprin de rnams kyis thos nas sprin gyi tshogs kyis char zlog par byed do/_/nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa'i mdog sngon po yang mchus bsnun pas chu bo'i tshogs skems par byed do/_/o~M badzra nA rA ya Na nir+b+bA pa ya ba h+nin+na pA tsa bAm+bu me g+haiHhU~M/_nam mkha'i 
[\[142a.6\]]khams kyi nang son par/_/zhal gsum pa la spyan gsum pa/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/stag gi pags pa mnabs pa dang /_/kha dog dmar po gzi brjid che/_/nyi ma shar ba'i 'od lta bur/_/ral gri nyid dang kha T+wAM ga/_/gzhu dang de 
[\[142a.7\]]bzhin mda' nyid dang /_/sha chen gyi ni thod pa dang /_/de bzhin du ni cang te'u nyid/_/zhags pa nyid dang lcags kyu dang /_/g.yon na ut+pal rnam par spras/_/g.yon brkyang 'jigs pa chen po ni/_/nyi mar gnas shing gar dang ldan/_/dmar po 'bar zhing 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'khyil ba dang /_/gos ni chen po bla bre dang /_/dur khrod du ni rab tu bya/_/hrIMHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni/_/sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol ba mo/_/de ltar bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/_/yo gis sangs rgyas nyid thob na/_/dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/
[\[142b.2\]]de nas dbang du bya 'dod pas/_/mya ngan med pa'i brgyad la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste/_gos dmar pos bgos nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/zhal gsum pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas nas bdag nyid kha dog dmar por bsams 
[\[142b.3\]]te/_phyi nas rang gi sku las phyag gnyis ma dmar mo lag pas lcags kyu dang /_zhags pa 'dzin ma dbyung bar bya'o/_/des bsgrub bya'i snying dang mgrin pa bcings nas dgug par bsam par bya zhing rang gi lus la lha mo de gzhug par bya'o/_/bsgrub bya myos pas 
[\[142b.4\]]gyur nas de'i snying gar sngags kyi yi ge bcu kha dog dmar por dgod par bya ste/_yang na bsgrub bya dang ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge de rnams la de zhugs pas de rnams lhan cig tu 'dres par gyur par bsam par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba 'dis nyi 
[\[142b.5\]]ma bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du byed par the tshom mi za'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i bar chad bzlog pa'i don du bka' stsal pa/_dpal mchog dang po'i gzugs su bdag nyid zhal gsum pa/_zhabs bzhi dang /_phyag bzhi pa/_zhal 
[\[142b.6\]]dmar po'i 'od zer 'bar ba/_/snyems ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor bar rnam par bsam nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang /_/rdo rje kI li kI la dang /_rdo rje sdug pa dang /_/rdo rje snyems ma'i g.yas na rdo rje mda' 'gengs shing 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yon 
[\[142b.7\]]pa bsgyings shing rked par gzhag pa dang /_gzhu 'dzin par bsams te/_de nas sems dpa' phyung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i sprin rnam pa thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i g.yas na mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_dbang gi thod rin po che 'dzag pa nam 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]mkhar son pas ni rdo rje zlog par byed do/_/o~M ma hA su kha badzra te dzaHhU~M/_de ltar shin tu dga' ba'i bcing ba byas nas rnal 'byor bla na med par bshad do/_/gang zhig rnam par phye bas gsod par byed pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/zhi ba la ni mtha'i ya 
[\[143a.2\]]dang ni gnyis dang /_phyi nas ya dbu ma phyi bas yig 'bru lhag mas ji ltar bde bas so/_/lha mo de ltar bshad pas ni las thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed do/_/rab tu myos ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas yang brgyad pa la ku ru kul+le'i rnal 'byor la gnas nas 
[\[143a.3\]]bsam gtan 'di bya'o/_/myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing /_de nas ka kA ma tsi ka'i khu bas thig le byas nas sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/o~M a mu kI me hrIHba shIb+hA ba tu/_khri bzlas pas 'grub po/_/de nas dug gis zin pa bslang ba'i phyir rang gi snying 
[\[143a.4\]]ga na pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam par bya'o/_/de'i steng du dbyangs kyi gsum pa 'dab ma brgyad la kha dog dkar po bsam par bya zhing /_bdag nyid yang 'og gi klu'i gzugs kha dog dkar po i'i bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam par bya'o/_/klu de'i mig 
[\[143a.5\]]las bdud rtsi byung bas der bsgrub par bya ba de'i lus la ltung bar bsam par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba 'dis khams gsum yongs su gang ba'i dug med par byed do/_/de nas zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par gzung bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa'i bdag nyid las zla ba 
[\[143a.6\]]dang nyi ma byas te/_rdo rje'i chu la gzhug par bya zhing sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/o~M tsan drArkaka mA tsa la ma tsa la tiSh+Tha ti_Sh+Thi he badzra ya swA hA/_bye ba phrag drug bzla bar bya ste/_phyi nas las 'di yang dag pa brtsam par bya'o/_/zla ba dang nyi ma dag gnas shing nyin mtshan bye brag 
[\[143a.7\]]med par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ste/_kha Ti kA dang /_bdud rtsi lnga dang /_kuT+NA ra tshin+na dang lhan cig btags la ril bu bya'o/_/o~M badzra kar+t+ta ri he badzrA ya swA hA/_dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas shing de grub na bsgrub 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]bya ril ba spyi blugs kyi mgrin pa bskor nas/_bcag na dgra thams cad kyi mgo 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/lha dgas par 'dod pas thig le bsgrub par bya ste/_rdo rje bcings pas rdo rje can gyi me tog bsgrubs te/_sta res bcad pa dang bsregs nas nyi ma gzas zin pa 
[\[143b.2\]]dang mi bskyod pa dang btag par bya zhing /_btags nas dgra sta bya ste/_de rdog pas mnan nas sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/o~M badzra kuT+ThA ra spA Ta ya s+pha Ta ya phaT phaT swA hA/_dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas la/_phyi nas thig le byas na gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas 
[\[143b.3\]]so/_/de nas char gyi rab tu sbyor ba bshad par bya ste/_o~M A phuH/_yi rnam pa'i cho ga ltar mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas ni blugs par bya'o/_/me tog nag pos ni mchod par bya/_klu 'dul ba'i khu bas ni byug par bya/_glang po che'i chang gis 
[\[143b.4\]]ni mgo bo byug par bya/_kham phor kha sbyar du ni gzhag par bya/_ba nag po'i 'o mas ni dgang bar bya/_gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni dkri bar bya/_rlung gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas nas der mtha' yas gzhag par bya/_de'i 'gram du cho gas dkyil 
[\[143b.5\]]'khor bzhengs par bya/_de'i dbus su mtha' yas gzhag par bya'o/_/mtha' yas mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje bri bar bya ste/_zhal brgyad pa/_zhabs bzhi pa/_phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/_spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi par bsgom par bya'o/_/phyis ni slob dpon nang gis sa ma 
[\[143b.6\]]rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnas su sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/oM g+hu ru g+hu ru/_g+hu Ta g+hu Ta/_sha ma sha ma/_g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/_g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/_a nan+ta k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya/_nA gA d+hi pa ta ye/_he he ru ru ka~M/_sap+ta pA tA la/_ga tan+tA gA nA kaR+Sha ya/_bar+Sha ya/_gardza ya/_
[\[143b.7\]]tardza ya/_phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHhU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog nas bzlas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi 'bab na de'i tshe mgo ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/sprin dral bar 'dod pas 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]de'i tshe dur khrod kyi ras la sngags 'di bri bar bya'o/_/o~M tar+dz+dza ya tardza ya/_sh+ma shA na pri yA ya phaT swA hA/_dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las las thams cad kyi bsam gtan 'byung ba zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po 
[\[144a.2\]]ste bdun pa'o//_//gzhan du mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni/_/bcom ldan bdag ni nyen par 'tshal/_/de nyid bzhi ni mi 'tshal bas/_/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/_/'khor ba sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi/_/ji ltar de nyid rdo rje nyon/_/dang por 
[\[144a.3\]]rdo rje'i de nyid de/_/dril bu yang ni gnyis pa la/_/gsum pa la ni phreng ba nyid/_/bzhi par ye shes mtshan nyid do/_/de nyid bzhi yi rba rlabs las/_/pha rol 'dod pa 'dren pa'o/_/dbus su rnam par snang mdzad mgon/_/shar du mi bskyod de bzhin yang /_/
[\[144a.4\]]rin chen lho yi rwa la'o/_/'od dpag med ni nub tu dgod/_/byang du don yod grub pa ste/_/rwa lnga rnams kyi lha nyid do/_/pad+mar byang chub yan lag brgyad/_/sa ji lta bar gzhag par bya/_/phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang /_/nam mkha' kun du bzang po bzhin/_/
[\[144a.5\]]gnod sbyin dbang po 'jam dpal dang /_/rnam par sel dang sa nyid kyang /_/lha rnams brgyad po 'di rnams kyis/_/sa ji lta bar gzhag par bya/_/dbus su skabs gsum sgo nga la/_/ye shes lha ni thim par bya/_/pad+mar lha mo brgyad po rnams/_/ji bzhin 
[\[144a.6\]]gnas su sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bzhi/_/de bzhin rtse nam phyogs bral lo/_/rwa la mkha' 'gro ma lnga ste/_/dbus su ye shes ming can te/_/shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/byang du drag mo'i ming can te/_/ro langs ma ni phyogs kyi mthar/_/
[\[144a.7\]]gtum mo lho yi dbang phyug ma/_/rdo rje'i de nyid lha rnams su/_/mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin/_/gang phyir de nyid rdo rje yi/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag sems la/_/rdo rje snying can rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje sems ni byed du gzhug_/rdo rje dag pa bstan par bya/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]rdo rje chos la brtson pa'i yid/_/rdo rje de nyid can kun rnams/_/rdo rje las la mngon par 'gro/_/rdo rje spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje sems can 'khor ba sgrol/_/rdo rje dgug pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/rdo rje rengs pa'i rnal 'byor rig_/mun pa lta bu'i nyon mongs 
[\[144b.2\]]pa/_/rnam shes mar me dang lhan cig_/ye shes rdo rjes gzhom par bya/_/snang ba'i phyogs ni 'thob ba'o/_/rdo rjes bsgrubs pa thams cad la/_/rdo rje'i bdag ces bstan pa yin/_/rdo rje chos kyi snying po can/_/rdo rje thar pa'i lhur len pa/_/rdo rje pad+ma rnam 
[\[144b.3\]]mnan te/_/bsgrub bya de nyid thams cad nas/_/rdo rje pad+ma kun zhugs pa/_/rnam par mkhas pas bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyon/_/shes rab dkrol ba'i de nyid ni/_/lha ni kun gyis thos par 'gyur/_/
[\[144b.4\]]cha gsum gsal bar gzung ba la/_/ska rags byas pa bzang po nyid/_/zhi ba ut+pal ku mu ta/_/rin chen pad+ma rnam par gnas/_/phyogs mtshams brgyad pa'i dbus su ni/_/dgu pa la ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/lha dgu la sogs rtse mo ni/_/lha rnams 
[\[144b.5\]]dgu yis byin gyis brlabs/_/chu srin kha las byung ba yi/_/rtse mo 'od zer zla bar gnas/_/rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bshad/_/ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba 'don/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par/_/byang chub snying por rnam par gnas/_/phyogs bcu 
[\[144b.6\]]thams cad rig pa'i gnas/_/'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas pa/_/phyogs ni brgyad ces bya bar ni/_/lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags/_/yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni/_/phyogs ni brgyad du rnam par dgod/_/shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/_/byang du yang ni gos 
[\[144b.7\]]dkar mo/_/nub kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/_/lho ru yang ni sangs rgyas spyan/_/gser dang sbrang rtsi gzi brjid ma/_/rdo rje phreng ba bzhi pa'o/_/nang gi gzugs ni nam mkha' ste/_/gzugs kyis gang ba gzi brjid can/_/pad+ma kha phye las byung ba/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]gzugs med srid pa'i gnas su ni/_/shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa ltar/_/ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su ni/_/de yi yang ni dbus su yid/_/lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/_/gzugs ni mdzes shing yon tan gnas/_/steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams/_/
[\[145a.2\]]ji ltar gong ma bsam par bya/_/nang gi ye shes dbyug gu ni/_/thams cad sdud cing 'byin par byed/_/A li kA li sgom pa ni/_/gnas ni brgyad du bskyod par bya/_/A li ka li rab sbyor bas/_/'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed/_/rdo rje dril bu'i thabs nyid 
[\[145a.3\]]de/_/thabs ni yang ni nang du nyid/_/de la lag gnyis rab tu brkyang /_/rnam lnga 'dod pa'i bskor ba bya/_/g.yas par nyi ma yang dag bsam/_/g.yon par zla bsam g.yon pa nyid/_/lus can rnams kyi thabs nyid de/_/rang 'dod lhar ni bsam par bya/_/
[\[145a.4\]]byang du rdo rje gsor nas ni/_/phyi nas blo ldan yang dag gdab/_/hU~M gi glu yi rnam pa yis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/_/rdo rje gsor bas mdzes pa yis/_/rmongs pa'i sems can rnam par sgrol/_/chos kyi rnam thar 'bras bu nyid/_/rdo rje dgyes 
[\[145a.5\]]pa 'dzin pa ste/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho/_/thabs dang shes rab rab dkrol zhing /_/thabs dang shes rab lag pa'i dngos/_/o~M badzra d+harma ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta sa~M pra ra Ni ta sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsA li ne/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA da swa b+hA be tsa badzra sa twa hr-i da ya sa~M to Sha ni hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho swA hA/_/
[\[145a.6\]]o~M sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma ye tiSh+Tha e Sha twAn+d+ha' ra yA mi hi hi hi hi hi hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_thabs dang shes rab chos kyis ni/_/'gro ba thams cad sad par byed/_/mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/_/sems can sangs rgyas don du dkrol/_/rdo rje de nyid kyis ni gzung /_/
[\[145a.7\]]chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/_/thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/_/sems can don ni yo gis byed/_/de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa/_/glang po dril bu dkrol ba nyid/_/rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi/_/rang gi dngos grub ring du brtag_/brgyad pa las dril 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]bu'i de kho na ste rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//phreng ba la sogs mtshan nyid ni/_/yang dag ji ltar rdo rje nyon/_/gang gi yang dag cho ga yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang /_/khams ni dkar po la 
[\[145b.2\]]sogs gzhan/_/zhi ba'i las la khyad par du/_/phreng ba yi ni mtshan nyid do/_/gser dang dngul dang zangs ma pa/_/pad+ma'i sa bon khyad par du/_/rgyas pa la ni phreng ba nyid/_/rnam par mkhas pas bgrang bar bya/_/gur gum la sogs dri sogs kyis/_/dri ni 
[\[145b.3\]]thams cad khyad par du/_/bsgrubs shing ril bu byas nas ni/_/dbang la yongs su rab tu grags/_/ru drAk+Sha dang lung tang dang /_/de bzhin skyes pa'i rus pa nyid/_/drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/_/mngon spyod la ni yongs su grags/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon 
[\[145b.4\]]spyod la/_/phu tra dzI wa las kun byed/_/sngags kyi bsgrub pa lnga bcu ste/_/dbang la de yi phyed nyid do/_/brgya phrag gcig ni zhi ba la/_/de bzhin rgyas la lhag par brgyad/_/mngon spyod la ni drug cu nyid/_/khyad par du ni las la sbyar/_/ji ltar las kyi bye brag 
[\[145b.5\]]gis/_/phreng ba la sogs bya ba'o/_/phyogs dang mtshams ni brgyad rnams kyi/_/dbus su dgug pa sangs rgyas kyi/_/lha ni dgu sogs srad bu la/_/lha dgus byin gyis brlab par bya/_/phreng ba kun ni dgra bcom pa/_/mchod rten steng du rab tu brtag_/
[\[145b.6\]]mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'i phyir/_/steng du yang ni chos kyi dbyings/_/lag mthil nyi ma bsams nas ni/_/dbyangs yig dang po la sogs pa/_/lag pa'i dbus su rnal 'byor pas/_/bsgom zhing bdud rtsi yi ge nang /_/'od zer 'phro ba du ma dang /_/kha 
[\[145b.7\]]dog dkar po bsams nas ni/_/sor mo rdo rje rtse mo ste/_/g.yon pa pad+ma 'dab mar bsgom/_/pad+ma rdo rje snyoms 'jug pa'i/_/kha sbyar dbus su phreng gzhag la/_/kun gyi de nyid bsgom bya zhing /_/phreng ba byin gyis brlab par bya/_/sor mo la sogs bye brag las/_/
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]phyis ni sngags pas bzlas pa bya/_/rdo rje gnyis med dngos po las/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje can gyi dngos/_/zhi la khro bor dgod par bya/_/rgyas la dbu ma'i de nyid la/_/srin lag la ni dbang du gsungs/_/kun gyi mtha' mar mngon spyod la/_/mthe 
[\[146a.2\]]bong rdo rje lcags kyu lha/_/dngos po las ni dgug par bya/_/mnyam gzhag bzlas dang sgom pa yis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/de nyid med pa'i sngags zlos dang /_/rdo rje dril bu de nyid med/_/phyag rgya'i de nyid skye 
[\[146a.3\]]mi 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa yis de nyid dmigs/_/de nyid thams cad byed pa nyid/_/yi ge rnams kyi rgyu las ni/_/gzugs kyi snying po bgrang ba'i grangs/_/rdzun pas rnal 'byor ma snying 'grub/_/o~M pa de pa de/_ma hA dz+nyA 
[\[146a.4\]]na~M/_sar+b+ba bud d+ha ma ha~M b+ha be ta hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ho ho ho a kha~M swA hA/_sngags kyi phreng ba sbyangs nas ni/_/gang 'dod de nyid bsgrub par bya/_/de nyid las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/kun du gsal ba med na ring /_/ye shes de nyid khyad par du/_/ye shes chen po yang dag nyon/_/
[\[146a.5\]]mnyam nyid sems kyis dbye ba las/_/mnyam par gzhag pas 'khor lo brtag_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ye shes sa bon gyis ni sprul/_/sku mdog dkar po bsgom par bya/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni/_/phyag gnyis sems 
[\[146a.6\]]dpa'i skyil mo krung /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis/_/snying ga'i gnas su btsir ba nyid/_/sku mdog dkar po shin tu mdzes/_/'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso/_/kun tu 'od zer sna tshogs kyis/_/
[\[146a.7\]]sangs rgyas dam tshig sprin gyis spro/_/zung ltar rim pa'i cho ga yis/_/sngags kyi bzlas par rab tu grags/_/g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag gnyis kyis/_/bskor ba mkha' 'gro ma de bde/_/A li kA li sa bon ni/_/hU~M gi srad bus brgyu ba nyid/_/
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]'di yi sa bon rnal 'byor pas/_/bsgoms na myur du sangs rgyas thob/_/brgyad pa las sngags kyi bzlas pa dang sgom pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//'pho ba'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid kyi/_/de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon/_/bzang po'i lam 
[\[146b.2\]]du rnal 'byor pas/_/'gro ba mdzes pa khyod la bstan/_/ye shes dbang po nyan par 'tshal/_/sgo rnams dgu ni ji ltar lags/_/ye shes sgo yi dbye bas ni/_/yon tan skyon ni ji ltar lags/_/dus su srog ni 'chad pa yi/_/yang dag rab tu sbyor ba nyon/_/legs 
[\[146b.3\]]pa'i lam ni mdzes pa'i gnas/_/ngan pa'i lam yang skyon rnams nyid/_/lte ba'i steng na thig le dang /_/mig dang sna sogs rna ba dag_/btung dang btung ba min pa'i sgo/_/mtshan nyid lte bar 'dod pa can/_/mtho ris thig les gzugs lus can/_/steng ni 
[\[146b.4\]]steng du gnas pa yi/_/'gro dang 'ong bar yongs su grags/_/sna las gnod sbyin dag tu 'gyur/_/rna ba dag las grub pa'i lha/_/gal te mig las shes 'gro na/_/mi rnams kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/srid pa'i sgo las [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]te/_/gci las de bzhin 
[\[146b.5\]]byol song ngo /_/dmyal ba brgyad ni btung min pas/_/de ltar spang phyir rigs kyi bu/_/srid pa'i 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/gang phyir sga yi khyad par ni/_/'khor ba'i dbye ba yang dag 'byung /_/de phyir sgo yi khyad par gyis/_/rnal 'byor pas ni mnyam gzhag 
[\[146b.6\]]pa/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi thob pa ni/_/'chi ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa nyid/_/rim la sogs pas ma phye ba'i/_/'pho ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa nyid/_/bum pa dang por brtsams nas ni/_/sgo rnams thams cad rengs par byed/_/mchod rten rnams kyi lcags sgrog 
[\[146b.7\]]lnga/_/sgo yi bug pa'i bsgom pa ni/_/de bas dma' ba'i sgo nyid do/_/sa bon chu ltar dkar po nyid/_/btung dang btung min me yi ni/_/de yi sa bon 'bar ba ltar/_/de yi dang po dbugs kyi yang /_/de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/_/dbugs ni bum pa 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]can bsgom bya/_/lus kyi rlung gi kha dog dang /_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni/_/rlung gi sa bon rtsa ba rnams/_/rlung ni mtha' yi rtsa ba can/_/thig le sgra dang ldan pa yis/_/sems kyi sa bon gyis ni drang /_/rdo rje can gyi sa bon gyis/_/
[\[147a.2\]]'jigs pa'i lcags kyu la sogs sbyar/_/gnas ni bcu dang nyi shu ni/_/rtsa bzhi'i gnas las 'jigs mas dgug_/go 'phang gnas ni go 'phang ste/_/bug pa dgu yi steng mas so/_/mdzod spu skra dkar sa bon gyi/_/yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis 
[\[147a.3\]]sbyar/_/drag po'i sgra yis brjod nas ni/_/brgyad kyi mtha' yi sa bon gyis/_/'jigs dang 'jigs pa'i sde tshan gyi/_/dang po la sogs dang po yi/_/yi ge phyed pas sbyar nas ni/_/rlung gis sa bon 'og ma las/_/sgra ni sgra yis bskul bar bya/_/
[\[147a.4\]]rlung gi sa bon ldan pa dang /_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni/_/gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni/_/de nas steng nas steng du mchog_/rnal 'byor pas ni skra dkar bas/_/steng gi yi ge bza' bar bya/_/bu ga dgu yi steng mchog nas/_/'phral du yid kyis 
[\[147a.5\]]'pho bar byed/_/nyin zhing bram ze gsod pa dang /_/mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang /_/chom rkun las kyi longs spyod pa/_/'di yi lam gyis grol 'gyur te/_/sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing /_/srid pa'i skyon las shin tu grol/_/dper na 'dam 
[\[147a.6\]]las skyes pa yi/_/pad+ma gzi brjid dri ma med/_/de bzhin 'dam sogs lus kyis ni/_/ye shes sku ni rang 'dod pas/_/dus thob na yang 'pho bya ste/_/dus min lha ni gsod pa nyid/_/de phyir lus kyi mtshan shes nas/_/blo dang ldan pas rnal 'byor brtsam/_/
[\[147a.7\]]rnal 'byor bsgrub bya'i khyad par las/_/ji ltar de nyid rdo rje nyon/_/mnyam nyid sems kyi dngos po ni/_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad las/_/snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon rnams/_/'di ni nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar/_/
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]ngo bo sems kyis mtshon par bya/_/sngar gsungs stong pa nyid kyis ni/_/sngar gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/hU~M la gnas pa'i sems kyis ni/_/gzugs la sogs pa thams cad gzhig_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sa bon gyis ni 
[\[147b.2\]]gzugs bskyed nas/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni/_/ye shes mkha' 'gror bdag nyid bsam/_/zhal gsum pa la phyag drug nyid/_/spyan gsum dbu rgyan gyis ni brgyan/_/bzhad dang khro zhing sgeg pa dang /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/kun 
[\[147b.3\]]da zla ba'i mdog ltar dkar/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/_/sangs rgyas sprin ni spro bar bya/_/sems dpa' skyil mo krung du gnas/_/dang por mda' ni dgod par bya/_/de bzhin gnyis par lcags kyu nyid/_/gsum par rdo rje 'phyar ba'o/_/g.yon 
[\[147b.4\]]pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa nyid/_/gnyis par dpag bsam shing lcug ma/_/gsum par gzhu yi cho gas khyab/_/'od zer phreng ba du ma dang /_/dbugs ni g.yo ba med par bsgom/_/sa bon brgyad la sogs pa yis/_/yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya'o/_/A 
[\[147b.5\]]li ka li rab sbyor bas/_/ji ltar btus pa'i sa bon bzhin/_/thams cad kha dog dkar po rnams/_/sa bon zla ba'i 'od zer ldan/_/pad+ma'i chu shing me tog gi_/snying la sgong skyes gzhag par bya/_/de yi dbus su ye shes dang /_/rnam par shes pa lhan cig 
[\[147b.6\]]tu/_/dngos po'i ngo bos bsgom par bya/_/g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med/_/de nas phyi rol rnal 'byor rnams/_/rnam par mkhas pas gzung bar bya/_/gnas gnyis kyi ni sems dang ni/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni/_/de yi dbus su me nyid de/_/
[\[147b.7\]]de yi steng du nyi ma der/_/A li ka li ldan pa yi/_/sa bon de nyid dmar po'o/_/rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/_/dbyung dang rngub pa'i bzlas pa bya/_/ye shes sa bon dbus su ni/_/'byung ba yis ni bsnun bya zhing /_/bsnun pas snying ga'i ye shes ni/_/me tog 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]lta bur bsnun par bya/_/dbyung dang dbyung min bzlas pas ni/_/dbyung dang rngub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi/_bdag nyid phyi rol du ni byed/_/dbyung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan pa dang /_rngub ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/_dbyung dang rngub ba'i 'byor gyi/_/
[\[148a.2\]]mtshan nyid de nyid bsgoms pas ni/_/mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de nas phyi rol rnams kyi lus/_/sgrub pa pos ni rnam par sprul/_/gzhan gyi sems kyi rjes su sems/_/rnam par mkhas pas shes 
[\[148a.3\]]par bya/_/bsgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/_/legs pa'i lam ni bsam byas na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de nas ye shes gzugs gyur dang /_/de phyir mar me'i sems kyis ni/_/rnam par 
[\[148a.4\]]mkhas pas las rnams byed/_/nyan thos la sogs de nyid ni/_/legs par bshad pa bsgrags pa nyid/_/shel ltar sems ni brtan byas nas/_/mar me'i rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/_/spros pa thams cad dmigs nas ni/_/spros pa nyid ni spros med byed/_/
[\[148a.5\]]rang bzhin rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni/_/'di dag thams cad yongs su spang /_/kye bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang gis ye shes khyad par du 'phags lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ye shes rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/_/gsang ba'i me long ye 
[\[148a.6\]]shes lha'i/_/khro bo'i ye shes lha ma yin/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ye shes nyi ma ste/_/dmyal ba'i 'jigs shing du ba nyid/_/gti mug ye shes byol song rnams/_/sems med brtan pa la sogs pa/_/mi la rnam shes khyad par ni/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/lnga 
[\[148a.7\]]yi dbye bas ye shes bsgrags/_/glen zhing lkugs pas khebs pa yi/_/byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/_/ye shes de nyid khyad par dang /_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos khyad par las/_/skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/_/nga yi ye shes kyis bskul ba/_/mkhas pa rnal 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]'byor bstan bcos la/_/'bad pas dad pa bskyed par bya/_/phyi rol bstan bcos sgra la sogs/_/dper na gar mkhan kha dog bzhin/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes btsal bas/_/bza' dang grol ba'i gnas su bya/_/snying po las ni snying po mchog_/rnal 
[\[148b.2\]]'byor zhal mchog khyod la bshad/_/brgyad pa las mu stegs kyi ye shes 'jig pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni/_/rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon/_/o~M badzrA mr-i ta ma hA su kha ha~M swA hA/_snying po'o/_/
[\[148b.3\]]o~M AHhU~M hU~M swA hA/_rdo rje sems dpa'i bzlas pa'i sngags so/_/o~M AHa~M ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje drag mo'i 'o/_/o~M AHA~M ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma'i 'o/_/o~M AHiM ha~M swA hwA/_'dod chags rdo rje ma'i'o/_/o~M AHIM ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje zhi ba ma'i'o/_/
[\[148b.4\]]o~M AHu~M ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'i'o/_/o~M AHU~M ha~M swA hA/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i'o/_/o~M AHa~M ha~M swA hA/_sgra'i rdo rje ma'i'o/_/o~M AHaHha~M swA hA/_sa'i rdo rje ma'i'o/_/o~M AHo~M ha~M swA hA/_gling bu ma'i'o/_/o~M AHo~M ha~M swA hA/_pi wang ma'i 
[\[148b.5\]]'o/_/o~M AHo~M ha~M swA hA/_mu kun da'i'o/_/o~M AHaiM ha~M swA hA/_rdza rnga ma'i'o/_/o~M AHbadzrAM ku shi dzaHha~M swa hA/_rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i'o/_/o~M AHbadzra pA she hU~M ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje zhags pa ma'i'o/_/o~M AHbadzra s+pho Ta ba~M ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i'o/_/o~M 
[\[148b.6\]]AHbadzra g+haN+De hoHha~M swA hA/_rdo rje dril bu ma'i'o/_/spyan la sogs pa'i sngags ni snga ma bzhin du sngags pas bzlas par bya'o/_/o~M r-i swA hA/_me tog ma'i'o/_/o~M r-I swA hA/_bdug pa ma'i'o/_/o~M l-i swA hA/_dri ma'i'o/_/o~M l-I swA hA/_mar me ma'i'o/_/
[\[148b.7\]]'di dag ni rdo rje sems dpa'i'o/_/o~M hrIHswA hA/_he ru ka'i'o/_/o~M badzra gu h+ye si d+ha pa ra ma yo ge shwa ri ka pa la ma la d+ha ri Ni/_ru d+hi ra pri ye sh+ma shA na bA si ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_dkar mo'i'o/_/o~M badzra tsaN+De shwa ri kha T+wA~M gi ma ha badzri Ni ka pA la mA lA mu ku Te A kaD+D+ha A 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]kaD+D+ha sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hr-i da ya mA kaD+D+ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hU~M phaT/_chom rkun ma'i'o/_/o~M badzrA pa rA dzi te pa ra ma gu h+ye ka pa la mA lA bi b+hU Shi te/_sarba duSh+Ta mo hi ni pri ye e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa ti badzra gu h+ye shwa rI pa hu bi bid+ha be shad+ha ri Ni/_sarba duSh+Ta ni bA ra Ni hU~M phaT/_rab tu rmongs 
[\[149a.2\]]ma'i'o/_/o~M badzra be t+tA li kha kha khA hi khA hi/_sarba duSh+TA n+bi kr-i ta be Sha d+hA ri Ni bi kr-i tA la~M kA ra/_b+hU Shi te ha na ha na da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa mA ba lam+ba mA bi lam+ba/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra pra be sha ya maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/_ut+tA pa ya sar+b+ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_ro langs ma'i 'o/_/o~M e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa 
[\[149a.3\]]ti badzra gu h+ye shwa ri ba hu bi bi d+ha be sha d+ha ri Ni sarba ta thA ga ta dzuSh+Te sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_ha na ha na/_ra~M ga ra~M gA ra~M gA pa ya/_pU ra ya pU ra ya/_A bi sha sa A bi sha ya/_sarba b+hU trAn na rta na rta na rtA pa yi na rtA pa ya/_haHha ha ha ha/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_puk+ka sI'i 'o/_/o~M 
[\[149a.4\]]badzra shU lA gri b+hin+da b+hin+da sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da ya~M/_A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_nirma tha ni rma tha mA ra ya ma ra ya/_mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M hU~M phaT/_gdol pa mo'i 'o/_/o~M badzra ma he shwa ri ha~M ha~M ha~M ha~M haHru lu ru lu b+h+yo hU~M hU~M phaT/_b+hak+Sha ya 
[\[149a.5\]]sarba duSh+Ta n+nirma tha hr-i da ya~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_g+ha sma rI'i 'o/_/o~M su~M b+ha ni di b+ha sa ma ya badzre hU~M phaT/_he ru ka dang mtshungs pa'i 'o/_/o~M badzra ba~M she hU~M swA hA/_gling bu ma'i'o/_/o~M badzra bI Ne hU~M swA hA/_/bi baM ma'i'o/_/o~M badzra mu kun+de hU~M swA hA/_mu kun da'i'o/_/o~M badzra 
[\[149a.6\]]mr-i rda~M ge hu~M swA ha/_rdza rnga ma'i 'o/_/o~M badzra ba Da bA mu khi yo gI shwa ri hI hi hi hi hi hU~M dzaH/_rta gdong ma'i'o/_/o~M badzra da~MSh+TA ba ra ha mu khi trA~M ba trA~M ba hU~M/_rdo rje phag gdong ma'i'o/_/o~M badzra tsan+d+ra sUr+ya hu ta sha ni sing ha nirnA de sid+ha wak+t+re sid+hi ni Ta~M Ta~M ba~M/_seng ge'i gdong ma'i 'o/_/
[\[149a.7\]]o~M badzra d+hA tu sa dzI ba ni ma hA yak+Shi Ni shwa na rU pi Ni ma hA prA la ya ni r+N+Na de kA ma rU pi Ni trA~M tra Ta tra Ta hoH/_khyi gdong ma'i 'o/_/swA hA/_zhes bya ba ni thams cad du'o/_/'di rnams ni dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'o/_/o~M a~M swA hA/_bdag med ma'i 'o/_/o~M A~M swA hA/_
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rdo rje ma'i 'o/_/o~M iM swA hA/_dkar mo'i'o/_/A+o~M IM swA hA/_chu'i rnal 'byor ma'i 'o/_/o~M U~M swA hA/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i'o/_/o~M U~M swA hA/_puk+ka sI'i 'o/_/o~M r-i swA hA/_ri khrod ma'i'o/_/o~M r-IM swA hA/_gdol pa mo'i'o/_/o~M l-i swA hA/_/g.yung 
[\[149b.2\]]mo'i'o/_/o~M l-I~M swA hA/_dkar mo'i'o/_/o~M e~M swA hA/_/chom rkun ma'i'o/_/o~M ai~M swA hA/_/ro langs ma'i'o/_/o~M o~M swA hA/_g+nya sma rI'i'o/_/o~M au~M swA hA/_sa spyod ma'i'o/_/o~M a~M swA hA/_mkha' spyod ma'i'o/_/'di rnams ni bdag med ma 'khor 
[\[149b.3\]]dang bcas pa'i'o/_o~M de ba pi tsu badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'i/_/o~M trai lo kyA k+She pa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_phyag gnyis pa'i'o/_/o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_phyag bzhi pa'i'o/_/oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_/phyag drug pa'i 'o/_o~M 
[\[149b.4\]]na mo b+ha ga wa te bI re shA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA kalpAg+ni san+ni b+hA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M dza TA ma ku TA+ot+ka TA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M da~M Sh+T+rA ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M pa ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU la kha T+wA~M ga d+hA ri Ne hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M byA g+h+ra dzi 
[\[149b.5\]]nAm+b+ha ra d+ha rA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA d+hU mrA n+d+ha kA ra wa pu ShA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_phyag 'bum pa'i 'o/_/o~M shrI he he ru ru ka~M badzra DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba raM hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_dur khrod la dgyes pa phyag gnyis pa'i'o/_/o~M shrI he ru ka badzra sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu da pra b+ha~M dza ka hU~M hU~M 
[\[149b.6\]]phaT swA hA/_drag po'i gdan can gyi phyag gnyis pa'i 'o/_/o~M hrIHha ha hU~M hU~M phaT/_rig pa'i rgyal po'i'o/_/'di rnams ni he ru ka 'byung ba'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye swA hA/_yi ge bcu drug po 'di rnams ni/_mkha' 'gro ma'i rtsa ba'i sngags 
[\[149b.7\]]so/_/o~M mA rI ts+yai swA hA/_'od zer can gyi snying po'o/_/o~M mA rI ts+yai bat+tA li ba dA li ba dA li/_ba rA ha mu khi swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/_/o~M pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri sar+b+ba mA ri pra sha ma ni hU~M hU~M ma ho da ri phaT/_ri khrod ma shing lo can gyi'o/_/o~M badzrA~M ku sha kaR+Sha ya 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]hu~M/_oM badzra pA sha ban+d+ha hU~M/_o~M badzra kA li tardza ya hU~M/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti gr-ih+Na hU~M/_o~M badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M/_o~M badzra mung+ga rA ko Ta ya hU~M/_sngags 'di rnams ni shin tu grub pa ste/_don yod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'o/_/oM badzra DA ki ni i ma~M/_ba 
[\[150a.2\]]liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_sa ma ya stA~M/_dr-i sh+ya hoH/_/de ltar lan gsum bzhi lngar bzlas nas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gtor ma'i sngags so/_/o~M kha kha khA hi kha hi/_sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tson+mA dA pa smA ra 
[\[150a.3\]]DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya i ma~M ba liM gr-ih+Na ta sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/_/o~M ki Ti ki Ti badzra hU~M/_byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/_/o~M AHhU~M shod+ha ya sho d+ha ya rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/_sa sbyang 
[\[150a.4\]]ba'i sngags so/_/oM badzra DA ki nI hU~M phaT swA hA/_auM gau rI hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM tsaN+Da lI hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM bet+ta lI hU~M phaT swA hA/_sngags pas cho gas bsnun pa dang /_gsad pa dang /_dgug pa dang /_gar byed pa'o/_/oM badzra si hi ni A~M swA hA/_oM badzra byA g+h+ri 
[\[150a.5\]]IM swA hA/_oM badzra dza~M bu ke U~M swA hA/_oM badzra u lU kA s+ya r-I swA hA/_oM badzra ra dze n+d+riM l-i swA hA/_oM badzra dIp+ti te dze oM swA hA/_oM badzra tsU Shi Ni tsU Sha ya sar+b+ba sa tA~M auM swA hA/_oM badzra ka m+bo dze aHswA hA/_oM hrIHswA hA/_dbus su ste/_ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro 
[\[150a.6\]]ma 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/oM dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHkha~M ra~M/_mchod yon gyi sngags so/_/oM kha~M ni rI hU~M kha~M/_zhabs bsil gyi sngags so/_/oM d+h+wa~M d+h+wa~M/_dri dang bshos gtsang la sogs pa'i sngags so/_/oM ha ho hrIHswA hA/_phyag rgya chen po'i sngags so/_/oM ku 
[\[150a.7\]]ru ku ru sa ma yA d+hi pa ti hU~M dzaHswA hA/_dgug pa'i sngags so/_/ha hi hu he ho ha~M/_yan lag drug la dgod pa'i sngags so/_/dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las byung ba bya ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/_phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas rgyas pa/_/bcom ldan 
[\[150b.2\]]lha yis bshad du gsol/_/gang du gnas su bzhugs gyur pas/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par rol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ci rigs brtags pas sems 'dzin pa/_/nga yis bshad par bya yis nyon/_/gang zhig de skad sngar gsungs 
[\[150b.3\]]pa/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/dkyil 'khor lus zhes brjod par bya/_/sgo bzhi ji skad gsungs pa'o/_/lte ba'i dbus gnas pad chen po/_/kun mkhyen ye shes mngon par grags/_/gnas der gnas pa'i dpa' bo ni/_/dri med 
[\[150b.4\]]dri ma rnam par spangs/_/lus la gnas shing nag nog med/_/lus can kun la rnam par rol/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che/_/rnam par mdzad cing rab tu bsgyur/_/kha cig tu ni byang chub chen po'i sems/_/kha cig tu ni ji ltar spyod rjes 'brang /_/
[\[150b.5\]]kha cig tu ni dga' ldan lha rnams lags/_/kha cig tu ni 'bab par gyur pa dang /_/kha cig tu ni bltams pa rnam dag cing /_/kha cig tu ni khab nas gsal byung dang /_/kha cig tu ni byang chub chen por mchod/_/kha cig tu ni bdud las mchog tu rgyal/_/
[\[150b.6\]]kha cig tu ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub/_/kha cig tu ni 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/kha cig tu ni phas kyi rgol ba dag_/lhan cig chos kyis tshar ni gcod pa po/_/kha cig tu ni dngos grub kun dbang phyug_/kha cig dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum las 
[\[150b.7\]]rgyal/_/kha cig tu ni dpag bsam shing mchog kun/_/dngos grub dbang phyug bla na med pa nyid/_/de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog_/sangs rgyas kun bdag sdom pas ni/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/_/de phyir gti mug yongs su spangs/_/
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]A li bung ba zhes byar brjod/_/bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid/_/A li nam mkha'i mthar gtugs par/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo 'dzin/_/phung po khams dang skye mched dang /_/dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi 
[\[151a.2\]]dang /_/las rnams thams cad skye ba nyid/_/de phyir thams cad bkug nas ni/_/rtsa ba'i dbus su thim par bya/_/'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis ni/_/rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rdzas las ni/_/rlung dang me dang bdun pa'i don/_/rdo rje can gyi sa bon sbyar/_/thig 
[\[151a.3\]]le sgra yis yang dag mnan/_/char gyi rgyun zhes brjod par bya/_/dbyangs kyi dang po mchog sa bon/_/de yi dbus su gzung bar bya/_/kA li me tog shes par bya/_/me tog rdo rje can gyi lus/_/ma mo kun gyi sa rnams kyang /_/kun la 'khor ba bskyed 
[\[151a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/ye shes chu bo rgya mtsho 'dir/_/shes rab chu srin dbyangs kyi nyas/_/gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni/_/thabs kyi rnam pa'i myu gu nyid/_/ba~M du lta bur bya ba nyid/_/sbrang rtsi dang ni bdud rtsi'i gnas/_/kA li dang mi bdud rtsi nyid/_/
[\[151a.5\]]chu dang me tog nang du 'khor/_/bdud rtsi chu yi cho ga mchog_/gnyis las lus ni skye bar 'gyur/_/gang du bdud rtsi dang ni chu/_/lnga yi bdag nyid du ni gsungs/_/me ni tsha ba nyid yin te/_/reg pas rlung ni du bar lta/_/chu ni gsher ba'i dngos po ste/_/sa ni 
[\[151a.6\]]gzugs su blta bar bya/_/ye shes rdo rje byin brlabs pas/_/rnam pa lngar ni rab tu bskyed/_/yang ni chu ni kun gyi dbyibs/_/de bzhin me yis zad par byed/_/de bzhin rlung ni rtag pa yi/_/sa ni dbang po'i gzugs can ma/_/hU~M gi glu yi rnam pa yis/_/rnal 
[\[151a.7\]]'byor ma kun mnyes par byed/_/rdo rje yan lag dgyes pa'i mthus/_/spyan gyis gzigs par mdzad pa yi/_/yi ge'i dngos po rang bzhin ni/_/stong par rol pa nyid kyis ni/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pas/_/snying po yang ni 'tshal ba nyid/_/ma lus pa 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]yi bsam pa dang /_/yi ge thams cad gzhom par gyis/_/gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/chu rnams kyi ni dgos pa can/_/gnyis med chos ni thob pa ni/_/thar pa yang ni thob pa nyid/_/'khor ba'i bde bas rmongs pa la/_/grol ba yang ni spangs 
[\[151b.2\]]pa nyid/_/thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rnal 'byor ma yi sngags kyis rol/_/rnal 'byor ma ni lnga po rnams/_/sangs rgyas de nyid mtshon par bya/_/sgyu mar gnas pa du ma kun/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis sems can smin/_/rdo rje brkyang ba'i dgos pa ni/_/
[\[151b.3\]]chos kyi rmongs pa bral bar byed/_/rnal 'byor ma yi thar pa can/_/snying po chos la phyag 'tshol cig_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu 'dis rgyal ba thams cad kyis bdag nyid las skye bar 'gyur ba la 'di skad ces 
[\[151b.4\]]bka' stsal to/_/dgu pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyed pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//gtor ma'i las cho ga ji lta bar/_/rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon/_/khru gang tsam gyi tshad du ni/_/dmar po'i dri yis dkyil 
[\[151b.5\]]'khor bya/_/dkar pos phyi rol gru gsum bya/_/mchod yon mchod sogs rim gro dang /_/nya dang sha sogs bza' ba dang /_/chang dang myos byed spro ba yang /_/g.yon du nye bar dgos pa kun/_/g.yas pa dag tu chu yi snod/_/sngon du mchod yon dag gi 
[\[151b.6\]]snod/_/rdzas ni 'di dag thams cad rnams/_/bdud rtsi lnga yis sbyang bar bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin nam/_/yang na he ru ka dpal brtson/_/las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug par bya/_/me tog dmar pos bdug pa 
[\[151b.7\]]sogs/_/dri la sogs pa dbul bar bya/_/oM gyis mtshan pa'i pad+ma'i snod/_/lce hU~M de nyid khyad par las/_/ye shes lcags kyu'i rab dbye bas/_/yid kyis thams cad dgug pa'o/_/kye bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi lcags kyu dur gsungs/_de gang 
[\[152a\]]
