[\[152a.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang po skye dgu'i bdag por brjod/_/de bzhin gnyis par sgrol ma nyid/_/gsum pa la ni rab mchog brjod/_/bzhi pa la ni mang po skyes/_/lnga pa la ni stobs zhes bya/_/rigs lnga 
[\[152a.2\]]rnams kyi sngags 'di dag_/ye shes lnga yis rab dbye bas/_/ye shes chen po lnga po 'di/_/khyod la phan pa'i bsams pas bshad/_/ye shes lcags kyu'i rab dbye bas/_/las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/_/gal te las la phan 'dod pas/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[152a.3\]]ma kun tshim par bya/_/'dod la dga' bar mi bya zhing /_/longs spyod la ni sbyor mi bya/_/sems can don rgyu rnal 'byor pas/_/mchod pa thams cad yang dag brtag_/dbyangs kyi bcu gsum las byung ba/_/gang zhing zla ba de rab grags/_/de yi dbus 
[\[152a.4\]]su sa bon gyi/_/A li kA li mnyam sbyar bas/_/lha kun de nas tshim par bya/_/'bud pa sbar ba nyid dang ni/_/khyad par du ni bskol ba nyid/_/shel gyi gzugs kyis bskyed bya zhing /_/de phyir thams cad brtag par bya/_/de yi dbus nas blangs nas 
[\[152a.5\]]ni/_/de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya/_/lhag ma la sogs dngos po kun/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor tshim par bya/_/g.yon pa'i cha yi snod dang ni/_/g.yas pa'i khro bo bstan par bya/_/rkang pas mnan cing steng du blta/_/spyi bor phe~M gyi rnam pa 'byung /_/zla ba mar 
[\[152a.6\]]ngo'i bcu bzhi dang /_/khyad par du ni brgyad pa dang /_/yar gyi ngo yi bcu pa la/_/mchod pa mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang /_/ri bo dang ni 'bab chu dang /_/khyim dang grong gi ngos dag dang /_/zhing dang grong ni stong pa dang /_/
[\[152a.7\]]sems can snod dang thang stong dang /_/chu la yang ni khyad par du'o/_/drag po nag po drag chen po/_/lha mo yang ni mnyam par gnas/_/nag po thod pa can 'jigs rung /_/dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/_/rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang /_/gdol pa 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]mo dang 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/lha mo dka' zlog thams cad du/_/rgyal ma dang ni rnam rgyal nyid/_/mi thub ma dang gzhan mi thub/_/nag mo bzang mo nag mo che/_/rtse mo nag mo rnal 'byor mo/_/dbang mo zla mo 'jigs pa ma/_/gdug pa can dang lam pa kI/_/
[\[152b.2\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug ma/_/g.yo ldan mar me 'jib byed ma/_/grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs dang gzugs chen ma/_/mche ba gzugs ngan gtsigs pa nyid/_/thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyang ba can/_/mthu chen lag na kha T+wa ga_/
[\[152b.3\]]lag na dgra sta ral gri dang /_/rdo rje lag ma gzhu yi lag_/mkha' 'gro ma yi de nyid che/_/las rnams rjes su sgrub par byed/_/rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor rgyal mo che/_/de bzhin rdo rje'i dbang phyug gtso/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen las/_/skyon med 
[\[152b.4\]]dbang phyug 'byin pa mo/_/rdo rje dbang phyug bka' lung 'dis/_/thams cad las ni thams cad dgug_/oM ka ka ka D+h+ya na ba ba ban+d+ha na kha kha khA da na sar+b+ba duSh+TA nA~M ha na ha na/_g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a mu ka s+ya shAn+tIM ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT phaT dzaHswA hA/_bdud rtsi'i bsam 
[\[152b.5\]]gtan dmigs nas ni/_/bdud rtsis kha ni dgang bar bya/_/las sogs bsams nas rnal 'byor dang /_/rnal 'byor ma ni bsgom par bya/_/las rnams thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur/_/has ni kha dog 'phrog par byed/_/hos ni dri ni 'jig par byed/_/
[\[152b.6\]]hrIHni brtson 'grus 'joms par ni/_/rim pa 'di ni brjod par bya/_/rnam gsum lan gsum brjod pas ni/_gsum gyis lha rnams tshim par bya/_/pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs gser mdog_/gzi brjid dri chu rnam snang dang /_/rdo rje'i dbang phyug myang ba 
[\[152b.7\]]ni/_/lag na rdo rje lha gsum dag_/rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/_/'dir ni chos rnams bzang por ltos/_/'du ba rnams la the tshom med/_/bram ze khyi dang gdol pa rnams/_/rang bzhin gcig pa nyid du zo/_/tshigs bcad 'dis ni de nas sbyin/_/rol bcas 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]mchog tu rjes bskor bas/_/g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis/_/'dod pas bskor bar bya ba'o/_/rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/ji ltar rab tu bsgyur bas 'jug_/bde gshegs chos ni rin thang med/_/'dod chags dri ma rnam par 
[\[153a.2\]]bsal/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/_/gus pas de la phyag 'tshol cig_/tshigs bcad 'dis ni blang bar bya/_/yang dag spyod pa'i de nyid 'di/_/gtsang sbra kun du rnal 'byor pa'i/_/ji ltar bde ba zhes byar brjod/_/yan lag yan lag bde gsol 
[\[153a.3\]]'debs/_/gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba yi/_/sgyu ma yis ni rnam par brgyan/_/dngos po rnam grol phyag 'tshol cig_/rdo rje dril bu'i sgra rnams kyis/_/ci 'dod pa yi bkra shis glus/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M/_rdo rje thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/snying ga ru ni gzung 
[\[153a.4\]]bar bya/_/de nas sems can kun sogs la/_/smon lam rnams ni gdab bya ba/_/sems can thams cad bde gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skyon med par/_/gang gi lam gyis 'gro 'gyur ba/_/de ni sangs rgyas nyid thob gyur/_/ma bsgral ba 
[\[153a.5\]]dag bsgral ba bgyi/_/ma grol ba dag bdag gis dgrol/_/rnal 'byor bstan bcos bya ba'i dngos/_/da lta ru ni yang dag brtags/_/rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/_/g.yon pa snying gar gzhag par bya/_/lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas ni/_/sa la bzhag 
[\[153a.6\]]nas gshegs su gsol/_/oM At+ma tiSh+Tha hU~M swA hA/_phyi ni bdag gi dbugs kyis ni/_/bdag gi lus la thim par bya/_/skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bdag gi dngos pos mchod par bya/_/oM sar+b+ba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gats+tsha hU~M phaT/_se gol gsum 
[\[153a.7\]]gtogs nas phyi rol gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/dgu pa las gtor ma'i mchod pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//gsang ba'i pad+ma bde ba can/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs la/_/gsang ba la ni rnam gnas 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]nas/_/de la lha mo des zhus pa/_/sbas pa dam pa'i dngos spyod yul/_/bde gshegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_/khro bo rnams dang lha rnams dang /_/thams cad lha ni khyod kyis gsungs/_/ji ltar nang la rnam gnas pa'i/_/de nyid bla med bdag 'tshal 
[\[153b.2\]]yang /_/bdag la da dung the tshom mchis/_/gang gi cho gas bris sku dang /_/glegs bam yang ni bri bar bgyi/_/lha lags 'di dag mi 'tshal bas/_/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de bdag lang tsho dal ba 
[\[153b.3\]]dang /_/rgyas shing rnam rtog med pa dang /_/khro med lkog 'phyas med pa dang /_/shin tu cha phra mkhas spro dang /_/bzod dang dad pa snying rje ldan/_/de ltar gyur pa'i ri mo mkhan/_/yang na dam tshig can gyi yang /_/ri mo mkhan gyis bri bar bya/_/sgrub pa po dam pas 
[\[153b.4\]]dpa' bo shi ba'i ras sam/_ro la dkris pa'i ras sam/_bu btsas pa'i ras sam/_khrag chen pos btsos pa'i ras sam/_bud med kyi me tog gis rab tu bsgrubs pa'i ras rnams la sgrol ma dang /_'od zer can dang /_de bzhin du ni ri khrod ma shing lo can la sogs bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[153b.5\]]de la 'di'i cho ga ni gsang ba'i phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas 'drir gzhug par bya'o/_/skyes pa'i thod par gnas par ji ltar gsungs pa'i kha dog lnga sih+la dang /_ga bur la sogs pa bsres pa dang /_ro'i skra'i pir gyis bris sku 'jigs 
[\[153b.6\]]pa bri bar bya'o/_/dang por slob dpon gyis mnyam par gzhag pas shes rab dang ldan zhing /_/rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_/dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas yan lag la ni ra~M shu bsam zhing gcer bur gyur pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[153b.7\]]du yang lhag ma dang /_ma dag pas mkhas pas mi bya'o/_/kye bcom ldan 'das gal te sih+la la sogs pas bsres pa lags na/_de'i tshe ji ltar ma dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/pho nya gtsang sbra dang po ste/_/gnyis pa la ni zhi bar 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]'dod/_/snod gcig tu ni zas nyid ni/_/gtsang sbra gsum pa nyid du gsungs/_/phyi rol rnal 'byor la dga' bas/_/gtsang sbra 'di dag yang dag brtsam/_/rang sems dri ma can gyur la/_/gnas ni 'di yis ci zhig dgos/_/gang yang 
[\[154a.2\]]log pa'i chos gnas pa/_/'dod pa'i don kun 'dod pa ni/_/khyi yi skye gnas brgyar 'gro ste/_/sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur/_/dper na kha cig mar don gnyer/_/dad pas chu ni bsrub gyur kyang /_/mar sar thob par mi 'gyur te/_/lus nyon mongs pa kho 
[\[154a.3\]]nar zad/_/'dzin dang mchod pa ma gtogs par/_/gzhan du bzang mo don med 'gyur/_/'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyu yi phyir/_/rnal 'byor gzhan la brten pa nyid/_/dung dang nya phyis mu tig rnams/_/gsum char rgyu las byung ba nyid/_/chos kyi sku yi lus 
[\[154a.4\]]can gyi/_/thod pa la ni su zhig smod/_/mchod phyir thogs pa dag byed kyang /_/dam pa'i chos kyi rim par gsungs/_/gtsang sbra he ru ka dpal gnas/_/de phyir kun du rab 'bad pas/_/phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pas mchod/_/shin tu bzhin mdzes snying rje 
[\[154a.5\]]can/_gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma/_/gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/_/rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du gzhag_/pir la byin brlabs 'dri mkhan la/_/byin te bris sku 'jigs pa ni/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/_/de nas yang dag bri bar bya/_/
[\[154a.6\]]'jig rten gzhan la mi bstan zhing /_/ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pos blta/_/glegs bam khyod la bshad bya yis/_/lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon/_/gro ga'am ta la'i 'dab ma la/_/glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis pa/_/sbrang tshan snag tsha byas nas ni/_/mi yi rus 
[\[154a.7\]]pa'i smyu gu yis/_/dam tshig can gyis bri bar bya/_/glegs bam dang ni bris sku nyid/_/gal te skal ba med mthong na/_/skye ba 'dir ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten pha rol spyod yul min/_/dam tshig sems dpa' sbyin par bya/_/res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pa'o/_/glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du/_/skra dang mchan khung dag du sba/_/dam tshig sems dpa' sbyin par bya/_/dgu pa las bris sku dang glegs bam gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//sil snyan yang dag sbyor mtshan nyid/_/
[\[154b.2\]]bshad par bya yis lha mo nyon/_/a ra a ra dzeM dzeM sma ra sma ra tsa Ta ba~M hoHra Ta ba~M ho hu lu hu lu hU~M dzaHhU~M dzaH_a la a la hU Nu hU Nu hU Nu/_hra~M hra~M hra~M hu ta~M g+hai hu ta~M g+hai g+hai g+hai g+hai ta Ta g+hai g+hai ta~M Ta g+hai g+haiM ta g+hai ta g+hai ta g+hai hon+do han+do do hU~M do hU~M/_ka ka ka ka_/kau kau kau_/kauM kauM kauM_/
[\[154b.3\]]bai~M kai~M bai~M kai~M bai~M kai~M_/bi~M badzra badzri bai~M badzra badzra~M bai~MHkai~MHbai~MHkai~MHbai~MHkai~MHbai~MHkai~MHbai~M hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo/_ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo hU~M b+h+yo/_rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i'o/_/Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/_Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/_Tak+ki dzaH/_'di ni rol pa'i'o/_/ta Da ba ta Da ba/_brah+me brah+me/_rta mgrin 
[\[154b.4\]]gyi'o/_/hrI~M Sh+T+rI~M hrI~M Sh+T+rI~M hrI~M Sh+T+rI~M Sh+T+rI~M Sh+T+rI~M Sh+T+rI~M/_hrI Sh+t+rI hrI Sh+t+rI hrI Sh+t+rI/_gshin rje'i rgyal po'i'o/_/hrI~M hrI~M/_ku~M hrI~M ku~M hrI~M khan+ta khe~M khan+ta khe~M khan+ta khe~M/_pad+ma~M pad+ma~M/_hrI~M pad+ma~M hrI~M pad+ma~M/_trI~M trI~M trI~M trI~M trI~M trI~M/_hrI~M hrI~M hrI~M hrI~M hrI~M hrI~M/_hrI~M ta~M hrI~M ta~M/_hrI~M hrI~M hrI~M/_sgrol ma'i'o/_/de nas cang te'u'i mtshan nyid bshad/_/
[\[154b.5\]]badzri shiR+sha rtsa ba dang /_/tsan+dan dmar po las byung dang /_/gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams ni/_/yid la 'dod pa rnams la bya/_/de yi tshad 'di bka' stsal pa/_/bcu gnyis pa dang bcu pa nyid/_/kha la sor ni drug dang lnga/_/dgu pa dang ni bcu gcig nyid/_/
[\[154b.6\]]kha la de yi phyed nyid do/_/gzhan pa yi yang rnge'u chung ni/_/thod pa las ni bskor ba nyid/_/spre'u'i pags pas g.yogs pa'o/_/de bzhin kha sbyor gnyis la ni/_/pad+ma dag ni bri bar bya/_/bud med khrag gis mdzes pa dang /_/dur khrod skyes pa'i skra las ni/_/
[\[154b.7\]]bkal nas rus pa gnyis ni bcing /_/khyim gyi me tog gnyis kyis ni/_/pad+ma ze 'bru gnyis pa la/_/dkyil 'khor nyid ni bri bar bya/_/mtshan mo bzhi mdo dag tu ni/_/rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong gis/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mtshams su ni/_/rdo rje lcags 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]kyu bri bar bya/_/der gnas g.yon pa'i ngos su ni/_/ji ltar dang por ming bzung ba/_/kheM hU~M zhes ni brjod nas ni/_/chu skyar rkang pa'i rus pas gdab/_/de ltar g.yo ldan ma la sogs/_/thams cad 'gugs par byed par 'gyur/_/gal te 'ongs 
[\[155a.2\]]par ma gyur na/_/de tshe mkha' 'gro ma kun 'chi/_/nges pa nyid du 'grub 'gyur bas/_/ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med/_/gal te khros pas slob dpon gyis/_/cang te'u rdung bar byed pa na/_/de tshe mchi ma 'dzag cing ngu /_/khyod ni dam tshig la ni khro bo sngon 
[\[155a.3\]]po mdzes/_/dngos grub phyag na dbyig to rin chen bcings pa 'dzin/_/kye dpal ldan dpa' bo 'du bar 'khor ba sgrol ba 'khums/_/mkha' mdzes rnal 'byor ma yi nang du bdag thong shig_/tshogs kyi 'du ba bzang po nyid/_/lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon/_/'dod 
[\[155a.4\]]pa'i don kun sgrub pa mo/_/gang du zos pas 'grub 'gyur ba/_/dur khrod ri yi tshang tshing dang /_/rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du 'am/_/yang na dben pa'am bas mtha' ru/_/bza' ba 'di dag yang dag brtsam/_/me tog bdug pa mar me dang /_/de bzhin bza' ba 
[\[155a.5\]]bca' ba nyid/_/chang ni sgeg mo ru ni brjod/_/sbrang chang rab tu myos mar brjod/_/bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs/_/snying po bdud rtsi rgun chang yin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi kla klo yis/_/bdud rtsi lam ni yan lag brgyad/_/rgun 'brum sbrang rtsi dpa' bo gcig_/
[\[155a.6\]]nya phyis rtsub pa'i 'dod pa can/_/sings po bshang bar brjod pa ste/_/rtsabs dang bran mo sings por brjod/_/de ltar bza' ba sna tshogs dang /_/chang dang nya dang yang dag ldan/_/dga' ba'i longs spyod skal bzang bas/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub/_/
[\[155a.7\]]a mra smin dang pa na sa~M/_/rgun 'brum na ri ke la dang /_/A lu ka la sogs pa ni/_/'bras bu sna tshogs tha dad pa/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbul bar bya/_/'dis ni glu dang phyag rgya dang /_/nges par gar kyang khyad par du'o/_/ka ka ka ka ka ka ka ka_/hi hi hi hi 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]hi hi hi hi/_hriM hriM hriM hriM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_hA hA hA hA hA hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/_i hA hA i hA hA/_hA hA hA/_dzA~M dzA~M dzA~M dzA~M/_a i a i a i/_dzA~M dzA/_iM dzeM dzAM/_iM dzA iM dzA iM dzA iM dzeM dzeM dzeM iM te a~M/_hi hi hi hi hI/_hi hi hi hi hI/_hi hi hi hi hI/_hi hi hi hi hI/_
[\[155b.2\]]hi hi hi hI/_ny+dza hI hI hi hi hi hI ny+dza hI hI hi hi hi hI/_kardza hi hi/_de ltar kla klas kun 'dar nyid/_/he ru ka yi sbyor bas gar/_/phyag rgya nyid kyang khyad par du'o/_/gang phyir lta stangs de khu tshur/_/lta stangs khu tshur rkang pas rkang /_/ji ltar rnal 'byor rim pa las/_/
[\[155b.3\]]sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par mdzad/_/sring mo'i bu mo sgyug mo dang /_/ma dang sring mo yin na yang /_/de rnams gang bar mchod nas ni/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/_/skyes pa'i thod chen cha gcig par/_/chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste/_/
[\[155b.4\]]bla ma la dbul skal chen ma/_/phyag 'tshal nas ni rang yang btung /_/pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang /_/de nyid kyi ni lag pas dbul/_/yang nas yang du phyag 'tshal ba/_/de la sgrub pa po yis bya/_/dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba bya ba bzhi'i de kho na'i rgyal 
[\[155b.5\]]po ste brtag pa dgu pa'o//_//rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig gi/_/grub rtags lag na rdo rje nyon/_/dang por dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/snying ga yi ni dkyil 'khor du/_/rang gi dbang sogs rgyas pa yis/_/rang gis nang du zhugs pas na/_/rdo rje slob 
[\[155b.6\]]dpon mtshungs med pa/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/gang phyir thos pa de nyid kyi/_/bsam gtan spro ba nyid kyi phyir/_/rdo rje slob dpon 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' snying po sogs/_/'bum du bzlas pas rab tu 'grub/_/skal ba kun gyi sngon grub 
[\[155b.7\]]pas/_/slob dpon chen po gdod nas grub/_/cho ga 'dis ni sems can rnams/_/rgyal bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/gnyis med spro bar bcas pa rnams/_/de nyid gnas shing go cha bgos/_/thams cad mkhyen pa gang gang gi/_/rigs kyi rab tu dbye ba las/_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]phyag rgya gang dang gang gsungs pa/_/de dang de ni cho gas blangs/_/de dang de nyid kyis ni bsgrub/_/gti mug bdag nyid nges bar ma/_/lha mo'am skye gnyis bdag nyid skyes/_/gti mug rnam dag bsam gtan pas/_/blangs nas mngon du 
[\[156a.2\]]rnam snang 'gyur/_/ma ni rig ma dam pa ste/_/gal te pha yis sngar bstan kyang /_/de bzhin de nyid kyis kyang 'grub/_/bde ba chen pos bka' stsal to/_/zhe sdang bdag nyid gdol pa mo/_/bu mo'ang gnod sbyin bu mo blang /_/zhe sdang rnam dag bsam gtan pa/_/
[\[156a.3\]]mi bskyod pa ni mngon du 'gyur/_/'dod chags bdag nyid gar mkhan ma/_/sring mo'am klu mo lha min blangs/_/'dod chags rnam dag bsam gtan pa/_/'od dpag med pa bsgom par 'gyur/_/phrag dog bdag nyid bzo shes ma/_/chu 'byung dga' ma 
[\[156a.4\]]'am sring mo yi/_/bu mo yang dag blangs nas ni/_/phrag dog rnam dag bsam gtan pa/_/dpa' bo don yod grub par 'gyur/_/nga rgyal bdag nyid mna' ma'am/_/rgyal po'i bu mo'am rig 'dzin ma/_/blangs nas nga rgyal rnam dag pa'i/_/bsam gtan pa de 
[\[156a.5\]]nor bu'i rigs/_/'byung gnas su ni 'gyur ba'o/_/spyan dang lhan cig sangs rgyas nyid/_/mA ma kI dang mi bskyod par/_/'grub 'gyur dkar mo lhan cig tu/_/pad+ma can dang sgrol ma ni/_/lhan cig don yod grub par 'gyur/_/rin chen rin chen ma dang 'grub/_/
[\[156a.6\]]rigs pas 'dod pa 'di dag 'grub/_/gzhan yang 'dis ni khro bo yi/_/lha dang rgyal ba'i sras po dang /_/khro bo rab gtum cho ga dang /_/zhi la zhi ba'i cho ga yis/_/zhi ba rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dod chags rgya chen zhen pa dang /_/nga rgyal ldan pas 
[\[156a.7\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/de ltar dka' ba med pa'i thabs/_/kun mkhyen thugs rje bcas pas bsngags/_/shin tu bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs/_/brtul zhugs dka' thub spyod pa spangs/_/de ltar bdud rtsi'i ro rnyed nas/_/nyon mongs gzhom phyir mi brtson gang /_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ji ltar dka' thub brtul zhugs des/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni bya bar nus/_/rang gi bde ba'i thabs rnyed nas/_/gang zhig bdag don mi byed pa/_/rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de yi ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni gang du 'gyur/_/yang ni de ni shes mi 'gyur/_/'dis ni 
[\[156b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad du/_/skye bo dam pas mthong ba nyid/_/las kun rmi lam sgyu ma ltar/_/sangs rgyas chos la mi shes pas/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du/_/ji srid ma phyin bar du bya/_/bcu pa las slob dpon dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa ste rab tu byed 
[\[156b.3\]]pa dang po'o//_//de nas gang du rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa der 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste/_sa 'di dag dga' zhing mgu la rangs pas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas bdud kyi gnas su cha lang lta bu'i sgra grags pa dang /_phyogs bcur 
[\[156b.4\]]bskal pa'i me lta bu'i skar mda' ltung ba dang /_rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra dang /_thams cad du gnam rdo ltung ba dang /_de nyid du bskal pa'i me'i gzugs lta bu'i ye shes kyi snang ba 'bar ba dang /_phyag rgya'i skye gnas kyi snying por khams gsum thams cad 
[\[156b.5\]]snang ba dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_chu bdag dang /_brgya byin dang /_drag po dang /_me dang /_stobs bzang po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_grub pa dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye dang /_lha'i mchog dang /_rig pa 
[\[156b.6\]]'dzin pa dang /_chus byung la sogs pa gang zhig gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum du gnas pa'i lha rnams der 'ongs nas yang dag par dga' bas me tog gis mchod par byed do/_/pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_mu kuN+Da dang /_tam+bu ra dang /_dung dang /_zangs dung 
[\[156b.7\]]dang /_nan+di dang /_pa Ta ha dang /_rdza rngas nam mkhar gnas te/_der rtag tu mchod par byed do/_/lha'i bu mo dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo thams cad kyis gar byed pa dang /_sil snyan du ma byed pa dang /_mi'am ci dang /_gnod sbyin gyis glu len par byed cing 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]gar byed pa dang /_de la dga' ba dang bcas pas rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgras rtag tu rol par byed pa dang /_gang zhig grub pa nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni legs so'i rnam pa rab tu gsol bar mdzad do/_/gang zhig dga' ldan du 
[\[157a.2\]]gnas pa'i lha rab mchog dang /_gang zhig lha'i bu dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa pa dang /_'og min gyi bar du 'ongs nas phyag 'tshal zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi rnam pa dang /_dri sna tshogs kyi char dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par gyis gus pa'i tshul gyis mchod par 
[\[157a.3\]]byed do/_/gzhan yang khyod la rgyas par bshad pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig dgos te/_bsgrub par bya ba'i bsod nams kyis khams gsum du skyes pa'i mchod pa de rnams kyis mchod par byed do/_/bcu pa las bde ba chen po'i dngos grub kyi mchod pa dang rim gro zhes 
[\[157a.4\]]bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa ni/_/gang du mchi zhing gang du gnas/_/bdag la the tshom 'di dag ni/_/bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rig ma'i skyes 
[\[157a.5\]]bu grub pa ni/_gang du yang mi 'gro/_gang du yang mi gnas/_thog ma dang /_tha ma dang /_dbus dang bral ba/_gnyis su med pa/_gnas gsum du snang ba/_thams cad son pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad pa/_thams cad kyi don thams cad sems 
[\[157a.6\]]can thams cad kyi sems la gnas pa/_sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/_yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa/_thams cad dang ldan pa/_zhi ba/_mnyam pa med pa/_rtag tu 'char bar mdzad pa/_mgon po/_skyob pa/_kun tu rtog pa 
[\[157a.7\]]spangs pa/_dbyibs dang kha dog dang bral ba/_rgyal ba'i yang spyod yul ma yin pa/_rgyal ba'i yang spyod yul ma yin pa/_rgyal po phyed par dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje/_nyon mongs pa'i nye bar gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir zla ba/_dogs pa med pa'i phyir seng ge_/gting dpag par dka' ba'i phyir chu'i phung 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]ba'o/_/de ltar dpe sna tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dper bya'o/_/de nyid gcig pus sems can rnams kyi don byed pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pas kyang bltams pa ston pa dang /_khab nas mngon par 'byung ba dang /_gzhon nu'i rol rtsed 
[\[157b.2\]]mdzad pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_rdo rje gdan gyis mnan pa dang /_bdud btul ba mnyam pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang /_lha las babs pa nyams dga' ba dang /_shin tu sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_glang 
[\[157b.3\]]po che nor skyong 'dul ba dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa'i skye bo dag pa gzhug pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa dang /_bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed la ltos pa med pa dang /_'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'dul ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab nyid dang /_
[\[157b.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po chen po ste/_de ltar rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyad par du ma rmi lam lta bur sangs rgyas kyi rol pa mchog tu ston par mdzad de/_gang zhig grub pa sgyu ma'i tshul gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad 
[\[157b.5\]]do/_/bcu pa las sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma rnam par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//gong du bshang gci khrag dang ni/_/nya dang sha yi sbyin sreg ni/_/lha ni khyod kyis gsungs pa nyid/_/ji ltar ye shes sems dpa' la/_/
[\[157b.6\]]mi gtsang bas ni kha bkang na/_/sdig pa ji ltar skye mi 'gyur/_/gal te sdig las ji ltar 'bras/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mi shes rmongs pa'i sems can gang /_/ye shes thabs ni rnam par spangs/_/phyi rol dngos por mngon zhen bas/_/
[\[157b.7\]]rtog pa dra bas dra bar byas/_/de yi sdig dang bsod nams kyi/_/cha gnyis rnam par rtog pa ste/_/'di rnams chos ni rang bzhin dag_/ma skyes pa dang gnas med cing /_/sems can ye shes 'phel ba'i phyir/_/don dam las ni bsod nams nyid/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]thabs ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan/_/skye ba dang ni spangs med na/_/bsod nams min la su zhig zhen/_/dper na sems can pha rol 'gro/_/chu klung chu yis gang ba la/_/shing dang rtswa ni bsdus nas ni/_/chu la gzings ni byas nas su/_/
[\[158a.2\]]de la 'jus nas brgal nas kyang /_/spangs nas bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol du/_/chos dang chos min zhon nas ni/_/bde bas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/chos dang chos min rnam par spangs/_/de phyir rtog pa'i dra ba ni/_/spangs 
[\[158a.3\]]nas zab mo'i chos ni 'phel/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lam/_/lam rig rnam par rtog mi bya/_/rnam rtog gti mug chen po ste/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin/_/mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas pa/_/mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur/_/
[\[158a.4\]]dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa yis/_/nga rgyal las ni rgyal ba'i gzugs/_/rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs/_/rnam par shes pa rdzogs pas ni/_/skye ba 'dir ni ye shes can/_/bud med dang ni skyes pa'i lus/_/
[\[158a.5\]]las ni du mas bskyed pa ston/_/mi shes pas kyang mi bya ste/_/sku yi rdo rje'i dam tshig go/_/sems can sna tshogs gdung ba dang /_/kun rtog ngan pa'i rnam rtog gis/_/sems la smad par mi bya ste/_/thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig go/_/phrag dog nyid kyis 
[\[158a.6\]]ma rungs pas/_/tshig rtsub la sogs smra mi bya/_/rna ba bde bar byed pa nyid/_/gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig go/_/sha yi khams gnas sangs rgyas ni/_/rnam snang chen po rtse mor skye/_/rkang la mi bskyod gnas pa nyid/_/khrag ni rin chen lta bur ni/_/nor bu 
[\[158a.7\]]chen pos rnam par brgyan/_/rus pa la ni 'od dpag med/_/sems can rnams kyi rigs bcas 'bab/_/rtsa yi 'ching ba'i tshogs kyi sgor/_/don yod thub pa rgyal po nyid/_/khyod la gsang ba nga yis bshad/_/dam tshig ye shes rig pas bsten/_/blo ldan 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]thugs kyi rdo rje yis/_/rtag pa ru ni bsgom par bya/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/sred pa dang ni 'du byed 'phel/_/'di lnga thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs/_/bshang gci khu ba bad kan dang /_/khrag dang yongs su 'dzag pa rnams/_/'byung ba 
[\[158b.2\]]bzhi ni yongs gzung nas/_/blo yis rdzogs pa yongs bsgoms pas/_/gang zhig dam tshig bstan par bya/_/thams cad du ni zos pas 'byung /_/dper na bud med byis pa yis/_/gtam la rjes mos smra ba yi/_/'du ba'i gtam ni brjod pa ste/_/lam 
[\[158b.3\]]yang 'ching ba med par brjod/_/de lta'i cho gas rnal 'byor pa'i/_/legs pa'i lam ni ston pa'o/_/de nas rnal 'byor pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_mkha' 'gro bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[158b.4\]]pa'i dge 'dun du ma'i 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes thams cad kyis thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa thams cad dang /_lha dang /_
[\[158b.5\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba de kho na nyid thams cad kyi gleng gzhi brtag 
[\[158b.6\]]pa'i rgyal po chen po ste bcu pa rdzogs so//_//rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di ni paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang /_bdag nyid chen po 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba las/_slad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston zhabs kyis rgya dpe rtsa 'grel dang bstun nas hor 
[\[158b.7\]]kong bas bas shing 'gyur bcos legs par mdzad pa las bris so//_//[{D382}]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas yang mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thig ler 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]thig le dag gi don/_/gtan phab yang dag gsal gsungs na/_/bdag gi dbus su rang byung bas/_/des na rang byung brjod par bya/_/rang byung zhes bya 'byung chen gyi/_/don ni rjes su dpag bya'i phyir/_/'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[159a.2\]]gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/_/lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni/_/gong du gsungs pa'i khams rnams so/_/de rnams dbus su phul byung che/_/zhes bya gtso bo'i gzugs kyis so/_/gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/
[\[159a.3\]]ji lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/_/gzhan du ji ltar rnam pa 'dis/_/sdom pa mchog tu phan pa lags/_/gsang ba'i sgras ni yon tan can/_/gsang ba'ang yon tan du ni grags/_/
[\[159a.4\]]rdo rje can ni yon tan can/_/'jig rten mchog dgyes smod pa spangs/_/gsang ba'i sgra ni kla klo'i skad/_/phyi rol rjes su btsal bas kyang /_/'di ni mngon sum shes par bya/_/rjes dpag yon tan can gyi sgras/_/gang tshe sems ni mi mthong ste/_/
[\[159a.5\]]sems zhes bya ba 'di yang ni/_/yon tan can dang yon tan gsungs/_/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/gsang ba 'di la chos nyid gnas/_/de la thams cad bdag nyid ni/_/de ni thams cad rnam par gnas/_/
[\[159a.6\]]de gang stong pa'i rdo rje can/_/sdug dang lhan cig dga' ba'o/_/gang tshe sems kyi gzugs kyis ni/_/sngo sogs mig gis mi dmigs shing /_/rna sogs thos par mi 'gyur ba/_/de tshe sems ni ji lta bur/_/de tshe rjes dpag ji ltar lags/_/'di ni sna yis 
[\[159a.7\]]mi dmigs na/_/dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dbus su gnas sam ci/_/sems ni phyi rol mi dmigs shing /_/de bzhin nye ba'i longs spyod med/_/ro ni mngar dang kha la min/_/de bzhin du ni reg bya nyid/_/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gsang ba 'di ni ji lta bur/_/rjes su dpag pas bsam par bya/_/ji ltar yi ge'i dbyibs su ni/_/phyin pa yi ni ye shes nyid/_/gzhan du bcom ldan sgra ji ltar/_/lha zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi nges don ci/_/mnyam par sbyor ba ci 
[\[159b.2\]]zhes bgyi/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni gang gi ming /_/dra ba ji lta bu zhig lags/_/sdom pa zhes bya ci zhig bshad/_/de bzhin spyad par dka' ba nyid/_/khyod kyis 'dod chags med gsungs ci/_/chags bral med pa de bzhin gzhan/_/dbu ma zhes bya gang gi 
[\[159b.3\]]ming /_/bud med kun gyi sgyu ma ci/_/stong nyid gzugs khams la sogs pa/_/ci zhig bshad cing mnyam nyid sbyor/_/dang po rnam pa drug 'gyur dang /_/sna tshogs pad+mar bris sku dang /_/A li kA li phyag rgya che/_/de nyid med sems rnal 'byor dang /_/de nyid 
[\[159b.4\]]bzang po ji ltar lags/_/rnal 'byor nyid la mnyam gzhag dang /_/phyi rol drag kyang yang dag bshad/_/zla ba nyi ma rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'byung ba ji lta bu zhig lags/_/bris pa dang ni ma bris pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor ji ltar gzhag par bgyi/_/de 
[\[159b.5\]]bzhin sngags dang rgyud nyid dang /_/gsang ba'i gnas ni mi 'tshal zhing /_/pad+ma bzhi ni khyad par du/_/bdag dang bdag gi ji ltar lags/_/de bzhin sems dang sems byung nyid/_/sems kyi ngo bo ye shes gsungs/_/de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid/_/
[\[159b.6\]]rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang /_/de bzhin chos dang chos can nyid/_/chu bo'i rgyud ni ci zhes bshad/_/rgya mtsho yang ni khyad par du'o/_/sna tshogs nyid ni khyod gsungs na/_/mang po ji ltar 'thob mi 'gyur/_/rnam shes ye shes khyod kyis gsungs/_/de bzhin 
[\[159b.7\]]bcud kyis len nyid dang /_/g.yon brkyang la sogs ci lags dang /_/gzhu yis rnam rgyal de bzhin gzhan/_/gtso dang gtso min sgra ci lags/_/brtag pa yang ni ci zhig gsungs/_/byang chub chen po'i chos rnams ni/_/sum cu rtsa bdun nang gi dang /_/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]sku la sogs pa de bzhin gzhan/_/nyan thos rnams kyis khyod gsungs dang /_/des kyang dgos pa ci zhig mchis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che'i/_/rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ni ci/_/tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug kyang /_/de bzhin 
[\[160a.2\]]gsol ba ci yi don/_/'dod pa'i lha ni chung mar bcas/_/lha mo dka' zlog gzungs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma/_/gong du skyabs su song ba nyid/_/gnyis gnyis sbyor ba 'dod mdzad pa/_/'di ltar sbyor ba'i 'thab mo dang /_/de la gsang ba ji lta bu/_/rdo rje can gyis 
[\[160a.3\]]rdzun pa yi/_/phyis ni tshig tu smra bar mdzad/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug dang /_/zla ba sngar gsungs gzhan du ni/_/thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/ji ltar rdo rje can zhi bas/_/khro bo'i gzugs 
[\[160a.4\]]can ji ltar lags/_/chos kyi sku ni ji ltar lags/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa ci zhig lags/_/sprul pa rdo rje nyid 'byung dang /_/he ru ka ni ji ltar gsungs/_/pad+ma gar dbang ji ltar lags/_/gshin rje'i gzugs su ji ltar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni rta 
[\[160a.5\]]mchog nyid/_/ji ltar cho gas ci gsungs dang /_/lha mo de bzhin khro bo nyid/_/kla klo khyod kyis bshad pa ni/_/des kyang dgos pa ci zhig mchis/_/re zhig lha mo rnams kyi tshig_/btu bar byas pa ji ltar lags/_/sngags kyi smra pos 'di dag ni/_/ji ltar rdo 
[\[160a.6\]]rje sems khyod kyis/_/thams cad yang dag rnam par shod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas gzung ste/_dang por brtsam par byas nas 'dir yang rjes su 'byung ste/_rigs kyi bu yang brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[160a.7\]]gsang ba'i sgras ni bdun gyi rnam pa ste bdun pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/gsang ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sems dang sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gsungs so/_/de bzhin nyid du ro gcig 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]pa nyid ngo bo gcig pas der gsang bar byung ba'i phyir gsang ba ste/_nam mkha' thams cad du khyab par 'gro ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi tshad de/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa dang /_rdo rje'i lha mo dang ldan pa ni gnas so/_/kye bcom ldan 
[\[160b.2\]]'das khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste ye shes dam pa'i yul lo/_/dgyes pa na zhes bya ba ni nyams dga' ba na ste/_dpe thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/spyan la 
[\[160b.3\]]sogs pa dang yang dag par sbyor bas dga' bar byed pas nyams dga' bar byed pa'i phyir dgyes pa na'o/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang /_lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par 'gro bas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par lha mo thams cad kyi bde ba 
[\[160b.4\]]chen por sbyor ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang ldan pa 'di las 'byung ba'i stobs ni gzhal du med de/_phan tshun du rab tu rangs pas dga' bar byed cing /_skyes bu rnams dang de rnams kyi dga' ba ni dgyes pa na'o/_/thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi bdag 
[\[160b.5\]]nyid de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gang sngar gsungs pa'o/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gsungs te/_thams cad bdag nyid kyis ni de gsungs so/_/de ltar gyur pas thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba 
[\[160b.6\]]'dis gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i gnas su so so bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyis ji snyed btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su rtag tu bzhugs so zhes gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas dang kun 'dis sangs rgyas kun te/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[160b.7\]]thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o/_/rtag pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis byas pa'i phyir ram/_rang bzhin gyi phyir gnas ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes bya ste/_sgyu 'am rang bzhin la dngos po'o/_/sems dpa' ni sems can gyi 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]don la nus pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje ni thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro/_/sems dpa' ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro/_/bde ba ni sngar gsungs pa'i dga' ba'i sbyor ba las shin tu ldan par zhi ba'i yid 
[\[161a.2\]]kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro/_/mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/_bde ba'i go 'phang 'di rnams kyi sems dpa' 'di rnams kyi don dam pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so/_/'on kyang sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/_/zhes bya 
[\[161a.3\]]ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/'on kyang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba'i phyir dogs pa bsu nas bka' stsal pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni gang de skad du rigs kyi bu de ni gsungs pa de nyid/_sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/_/zhes bya ba'i 
[\[161a.4\]]don to/_/lha mo thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa ni skal ba bzang po ste/_rang gi bdag nyid kyi sgrub ba shin tu sbyor ba de nyid mchog tu 'dod chags pa dang ldan pa'o/_/skyes bu med pa'i gar mkhan 
[\[161a.5\]]rang gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas pa'i phyir shin tu don la rnam par mi g.yeng bas lha mo rnams dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba myong bar bya'o/_/yang dag par sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor te zhes pa'o/_/brtan pa/_rtag pa/_mchog tu yang yid srub pa'o/_/yang 
[\[161a.6\]]na brtan pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang mtha'i mtha' ji srid gnas pa'i phyir rtag pa'o/_/mchog tu yid srub pa ni lha mo thams cad kyi bde ba rjes su myong ba'i phyir ro/_/brtan pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mchog tu yid srub pa 
[\[161a.7\]]'di ni brtan pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mchog tu yid srub pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya ste/_yul gyi rang bzhin rnams so/_/rang gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rgyu mthun pas ci zhig byed ce na/_'di ni rang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gi longs spyod dang /_de rnams za bar byed do/_/gzhan du na ni tha dad pa'i dngos po la rang gis nye bar longs spyod pa nyid ma yin no/_/ye shes kyi rang bzhin so sor skyes pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang shin tu mi spong ste/_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba 'dod 
[\[161b.2\]]chags kyi spyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las gang zhig 'dod las gang zhig 'dod chags kyi spyod pa de rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'dod pa'o/_/gang zhig rang bzhin bzang po de rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dngos grub 'dod pa'o/_/de ltar zhe sdang dang /_'dod chags dang /_ser 
[\[161b.3\]]sna dang /_le lo la spyod pa rnams kyis he ru ka dang /_pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /_rdo rje nyi ma dang /_rta mchog gi cho ga 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de lta de ltar 'dod chags la spyod pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems 
[\[161b.4\]]dpa' la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ba bskyed nas/_tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las bskyed de/_rnal 'byor gyi gtam gyis slob ma 'dul bar byed do/_/gtam ni brjod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gtam ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[161b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtam brjod pa ste/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi sku'i rgyu mthun pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i rang bzhin la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[161b.6\]]la sogs pa bskyed pa'o/_/rang bzhin brjod par bya ste/_brtan pa zhes bya ba ni chos ri rab ltar brtan pa'o/_/dper na ri rab rlung gis bzlog par dka' zhing rab tu gtum pas kyang bskyod par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[161b.7\]]'di ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_mu stegs can ngan pa'i rgol ba rab tu gtum zhing rab tu 'joms pas rang lhag par 'gro zhing bskyod par mi nus so/_/dur khrod du bzhugs pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi rgyud 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]du rgyu zhing rnam par dag pa'i sems chos kyi sgo du mar rjes su 'khor zhing /_lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das 'khor bar bzhugs pa'o/_/brtan pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i phyogs so/_/g.yo ba zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi rgyud las gzung ste/_de 
[\[162a.2\]]rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes par bya'o/_/ji ltar rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid de rnams nyid de gzhan dang rnam pa gcig pa'i ngo bo ste/_de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rnams la bzhugs so/_/sems 
[\[162a.3\]]can nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de/_dngos po'i don dam pa la gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs so/_/g.yo ba ni spre'u lta bu ste/_gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi sems brtan pa'i phyir sems dpa' zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[162a.4\]]'dzin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin te/_nges par 'byed pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir sems kho na g.yo ba nyid du gsungs shing phyi rol la sogs pas ma yin te/_de rnams ni gcig dang du mas dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/_/thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa'o/_/
[\[162a.5\]]dngos po zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi don to/_/srid pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o/_/brtan pa dang g.yo ba zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o/_/dngos po dang thams cad 'di ni dngos po thams cad de/_de ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad dngos po dang srid pa'o/_/brtan pa 
[\[162a.6\]]dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gang gi thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid de/_de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje 'dis bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i 
[\[162a.7\]]thugs kyi chos nyid kyis brtan pa dang /_g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid de/_'dis 'di dag brjod par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /_me long lta bu la sogs pas bsdus par 'gyur ba rtag pa dang /_mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]rgyas lnga po thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa bsdus par 'gyur ba'o/_/kun gyi sgras ni yongs su zhes bya bar gzung ngo /_/mnyam par sbyor ba ni 'du ba'o/_/gang du zhe na/_gsang bar te/_thams cad kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi bdag nyid du yin gyi gzhan du ni ma 
[\[162b.2\]]yin no/_/gang dang lhan cig zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang ste/_de dang yang dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos sprul pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dgu yis so/_/'on kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa can du mdzad pa'i sku gcig gis thams cad nas de'i bdag 
[\[162b.3\]]nyid kyi chu dang 'o ma lta bur 'ong ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis phyi dang nang gi dngos po thams cad kyi nang du de kho na skad cig gis ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzad pa ltar rtogs shing shes so/_/de bas na sangs rgyas 
[\[162b.4\]]thams cad dang /_de las gzhan pa rnams kyi lhan cig yang dag par sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o/_/mnyam pa'i dus ni dbyer med pa'i dus te/_sbyor ba'i gnas kyis thams cad kyi des sems tsam du snyoms par zhugs pas gcig 
[\[162b.5\]]tu gyur pa'i dngos pos phan tshun du bsdus pas dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bas ni phyogs bcu'i nam 
[\[162b.6\]]mkhar 'gro ba yang dag par mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro mar gsungs so/_/dra ba'i sgras kyang sgyu ma'i rnam grangs su blta ste/_shing la sogs pa rnams las sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa'i glang po che la sogs pa ltar mi 
[\[162b.7\]]bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lus med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can mi spong ba'i phyir ro/_/dkar mo la sogs pa'i rdo rje lha mo'i gzugs la reg pa'i phyir de nyid gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gyis gang zhig zag pa med pa'i bde bas yid zhi ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang por 'gyur ro/_/de nas sdom pa'i sgras brjod par bya ste/_sa~M zhes bya ba ni bde ba'o/_/bar zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bud med kun ni gong du 
[\[163a.2\]]gsungs so/_/sgyu ma ni ji skad du gsungs pa ste/_sgyu mas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin des zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de yang rang bzhin gyis grub ste grub pa rdzogs pa'o/_/ji ltar rang gi ngo bo yongs su gyur pa zhe na/_rang rnams dang de rnams kyi gzugs can ni rang gi 
[\[163a.3\]]gzugs can te/_kun gzhi dang /_nyon mongs pa can dang /_yid dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa de rnams yongs su gyur pa ni rang gi ngo bos yongs su gyur pa'o/_/bdag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgom pas me long lta 
[\[163a.4\]]bu dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang /_bya ba nan tan gyi rang bzhin la gnas nas ldog par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang gi phyir rang gi ngo bo yongs su gyur pas bud med thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi dngos grub yin te/_de'i phyir rnyed pa kun 
[\[163a.5\]]gyi bde spro bas/_/bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/sna tshogs dang sgyu ma ni sna tshogs sgyu ma ste/_kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa las lha mo thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs so/_/de'i sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di bzung 
[\[163a.6\]]nas blo la gzhag par byas nas 'di skad bka' stsal pa/_mkha' 'gro ma bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du son pa'i phyogs bcu'i nam mkhar gang zhig 'gro ba 'di ni sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'jig rten 
[\[163a.7\]]dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos kyi nang du rab tu grags pa mi gsal ba'i skad kyis rang gi brdar byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa 'di ni mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no/_/gang gi phyir bud med thams cad ni bcom 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi rdo rje lha mo'o/_/'khor bar byed pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad la gnas nas ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis me long lta bu dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_so sor rtog pa dang /_bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis grub 
[\[163b.2\]]pa'o/_/de'i me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ni sna tshogs sgyu ma'i rang gi ngo bo ste/_de rnams kyi sgyu mas nam mkhar 'gro ba'i bya ba ste/_de ni gzugs sna tshogs su 'gyur te/_de'i phyir sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya bar brjod 
[\[163b.3\]]par bya'o/_/kla klos de rnams kyi nam mkhar 'gro ba 'ba' zhig gis bya ba ni mkha' 'gro mar brjod pa ma yin te/_de skad du/_nam mkha' kun du spyod grub pa/_/mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags zhes de'i phyir bshad do/_/kun las zhes bya ba ni phyogs 
[\[163b.4\]]bcu'o/_/sna tshogs dang de'i phyag rgya ni sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/_spyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/gzugs brnyan gyi rnal 'byor gyis sems can gyi khams la phyag rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir des na phyag rgya zhes brjod do/_/sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni thams 
[\[163b.5\]]cad kyi rang bzhin nam/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad dang /_phyag rgya ni sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/kun las sna tshogs sdom pa yis/_/zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste/_bde ba'i mchog gis nam mkha' kun tu 'gro ba'i ngo bo ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/sangs 
[\[163b.6\]]rgyas skad dbyings zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dpal rnam par snang mdzad la gnas nas mngon par ldog pa ni rang bzhin gyi khams rnams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams rnams ni/_sangs rgyas kyi skad kyi 
[\[163b.7\]]dbyings kyi sgras brjod de/_ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas nas mngon par ldog pa'i rgyu rnams ni de'i rang bzhin khams rnams te mkha' 'gro ma'i sgras nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du bstan to/_/de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]rin chen bdag po dang /_'od dpag tu med pa dang /_don yod grub pa'i khams rnams su blta bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la spyan la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro 
[\[164a.2\]]ba thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_de skad du dpal he ru ka la dkar mo la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_de skad du bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan 
[\[164a.3\]]pa la rdo rje ma la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad dang /_bdag med pa'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_de skad du ye shes dang ldan pa la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams 
[\[164a.4\]]cad ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_de ltar sgrol ma dang lhan cig pad+ma can dang /_pad+ma'i 'khor lo dang /_gshin rje'i rgyal po dang /_de skad du rta mchog dang /_de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba nyid dang /_gzhan yang yid 
[\[164a.5\]]la 'dod pa yang rigs kyi rab tu dbye bas phye ba la mkha' 'gro mas de bzhin du yongs su bskor ba nyid du brjod do/_/de skad du sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro rnams bstan nas/_sdom pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir bde ba zhes bya ba ni gang zhig bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 
[\[164a.6\]]sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas gang zhig shin tu bde ba dang ldan par skyed par byed do/_/de las cir 'gyur zhe na/_mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/_bde ba thams cad kyi thabs phul du byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma 
[\[164a.7\]]thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba ste/_de yang gzhan du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sbyor bas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyis gang zhig bde ba bskyed pa de nyid 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]gang gi phyir sa~M gyi sgras brjod do/_/de'i phyir de'i rgyus gang zhig bde ba mchog khyad par du 'phags pa skyed par byed pa de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i rnam par dag pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams thams cad rtogs pas snying rje chen 
[\[164b.2\]]po skye'o/_/stong min zhes bya ba ni khams gsum dang /_'dod pa kun tu spyod pa'i yang dag pa ma yin par kun brtags pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir der yang dag pa ma yin par kun brtags pa'i stong pa ma yin pas dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/stong pa min pa'ang 
[\[164b.3\]]min zhes bya ba ni don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po med pa ste/_gang gi ye shes kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa'i mngon sum du byas pa de'i ye shes kyang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[164b.4\]]de nyid kyi phyir de skad du yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi dbu mar rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de yang shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/_/zhes gsungs te/_de nyid kyi thabs te snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje'i bdag 
[\[164b.5\]]nyid kyi dmigs pa ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te/_de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje thabs zhes bya ba ni shin tu snying rje yang mdzes pa'i snying rje ste/_btang snyoms kyis dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'o/_/de nyid thabs te gang gi shin tu snying rje dang ldan pa'i thabs 'di ni 
[\[164b.6\]]mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin te/_dpal rnam par snang mdzad do/_/cir gyur pas zhe na/_chos dag byung ba zhes bya bar sbyor ro/_/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag gsal zhe na/_shes rab ces bya ba ni chos rnams sgyu ma lta 
[\[164b.7\]]bur rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par brtag par bya ste/_de nyid bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni son pa ston pa ste/_shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/_/zhe'o/_/gang gis zhe na/_rnam rtog med par lhag mos bas zhes so/_ci mdzad 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ce na/_brtags par ni sngon du bdag po'i nus pa las zhes bya bar dgongs so/_/ci brtags zhe na/_brtags pa kun gyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rang dbang du sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo'o/_/ci'i mtshan nyid rnams las zhen/_rnam rtog med 
[\[165a.2\]]pa'i chos rnams la/_/sems can don ni yongs su brtags/_/zhes pa ni snying rje'i dbang gis sems can gyi don rgyur brtags pa'o/_/de brtags pas cir 'gyur zhe na/_sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid/_/ces bya ba la sgra brnyan zhes bya ba ni brag ca'i sgra'o/_/des 
[\[165a.3\]]dbyangs mchog dang mnyam zhing mnyam par dbyangs kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang sgra rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam zhing de de ltar gyur par rtog go/_/de ci zhe na/_de nas 'di ni chos ngag byung /_/zhes bya ba ni de nas de'i phyir 
[\[165a.4\]]chos las chos kyi don gyi nges pa'i tshig so sor snang ba so sor rig pa ni brtags pa'i ngo bo ste/_de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsum gsal bar byed pa'o/_/ngag gi chos ni ngag gi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i don no/_/de de ltar 
[\[165a.5\]]gyur ba ni ngag 'byed pa ste/_ngag gi 'di ni de'i de bzhin du brjod do/_/de yang dag pa ma yin pa las grub pa ni chos ngag las grub pa'i phyir ro/_/theg pa dang chen po de ni theg pa chen po ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/_/chen po rnam pa bdun 
[\[165a.6\]]du sbyor ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde dag tu grub bo/_/de'i phyir ches khyad par du 'phags pa rdo rje'i theg pa theg pa chen po ni skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir de'i yon tan dam par gyur pa stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs 
[\[165a.7\]]pa ste/_de rnams kyi tshogs ni rgyas pa ste/_de rnams yon tan dam par gyur pas so/_/dus gsum ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar ro/_/dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rang bzhin thams cad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/_/bstod pa ji lta bu zhe na/_rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par grol bas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i rigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod do/_/gang gi phyir brtan pa dang g.yo ba la sogs pa ma lus pa 
[\[165b.2\]]la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab cing brtan pa dang g.yo ba la sogs pa des khyab pas khams gsum rnam par rig pa tsam ste/_de'i phyir sdom pa la sogs pa rnams la lha'i rnal 'byor du gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te ci'i slad du de'i rang bzhin thams 
[\[165b.3\]]cad de'i rnam pas 'jig rten pas de rtogs par mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so/_/thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi dngos pos so/_/bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni rang gi'o/_/
[\[165b.4\]]rnam shes phung por zhes bya ba ni gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i lus la'o/_/gnas pa ni rang rig pa'i sems kyi ngo bo ste/_de'i phyir rmongs pa ni gti mug go/_/skyes bu tha ma ni rig pa can la sogs pa'o/_/rtogs mi nus zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa dang bcas pas 
[\[165b.5\]]mi shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te de mi 'tshal na ji ltar de rnams kyi de kho na 'tshal ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sems dang sems byung sems tshul bdag_/ces bya ba ni sems can gyi sems kyi ngo bo'o/_/sems zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dngos po'i 
[\[165b.6\]]rang bzhin dge ba'i phung po la sogs pa rig par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'tsho ba'o/_/ye shes kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/_de la khyab 'jug gi ye shes kyi bdag nyid skyes bu'o/_/shes bya'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni shed bu dang /_shed 
[\[165b.7\]]las skyes dang /_tshor ba po dang /_byed pa po dang /_gnas kyi don dang /_rang gi ngo bo can dang byed pa po nyid do/_/dbang phyug tu smra ba rnams ni chos rnams kyi byed par dbang phyug 'dod do zhes zer ro/_/chos can dngos po nyid ces bya ba ni bdag nyid can de nyid grub 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]pa'i mtha' las bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi byed pa po'am/_chos kyi ngo bor dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug chen po 'dod do/_/de rab tu bstan pa'i don du 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par gsungs pa dang /_gcig dang du ma dag dang bsgrub 
[\[166a.2\]]par bya ba dag dang /_chos can dag dang gtan tshigs dang /_dpe dag bka' stsal pa/_chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_du mas zhes bya ba ni gal te du ma nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyur brjod na du ma nyid mi bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/'dis gcig pa nyid bsgrub par bya 
[\[166a.3\]]ba'i phyir brjod pas chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i gnas kyis gnyis kyi'ang dpe brjod do/_/'dis gcig dang du ma dag gis bsgrub pa'i phyir dper brjod par bya ste/_de la re zhig du ma'i chos kyi mthar brjod pa'i sems la sogs pa'i dngos po du ma ni mang po nyid de/_gang 
[\[166a.4\]]gi phyir gcig las log pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rim pa 'dis chos ni du mas ni zhes pa ni rgyus thams cad mu stegs pa'i sems la sogs pa'i rnam pa du mar 'dod do/_/ci bcom ldan 'das dmigs lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_chu bo'i rgyun ni zhes bya 
[\[166a.5\]]ba'i sgras ni nyan thos so/_/rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni rol mtsho las phyi rol du ji ltar chu bo sI ta dang /_sin+d+hu dang /_gang gA la sogs pa'i chu bo'i rgyun 'bab cing rab tu 'khor ba 'di ni sin+d+hu'i chu bo'o/_/'di ni gang gA'i chu bo zhes sna tshogs nyid du dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[166a.6\]]de bzhin du zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos kyi dbyings las phyi rol du gyur pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyi bdag dang 'tsho ba dang /_skyes bu dang gang zag ces bya ba sna tshogs nyid du 'dod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ci 'dir de kho na nyid du ma'i rnam pa nyid lags sam/_
[\[166a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/gang zhig 'dir de kho na ni gcig tu mngon par 'dod de/_de kho na nyid de'i ngo bo gcig par gzung ba nyid do/_/gang gi phyir gcig dang mang po nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa las mang po nyid ces bya ba ni de rnams kyi sems la sogs pa gang 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]zhig du ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa de ni dam pas dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing rigs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir du ma nyid ni gcig la 'jug pa ste/_dper na chu bo rnams kyi du ma nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar/_sems dang bdag la sogs pa yod do 
[\[166b.2\]]ces bya bar rigs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur zhing /_rigs pa yod pa dang ldan du zin kyang sems la sogs pa gang gi tshe chos thams cad bdag med par zhugs pa de'i tshe'ang /_de rnams kyi sna tshogs nyid mi 'dod do/_/dper na rgya mtsho la chu bo du ma nyid zhugs pa'i 
[\[166b.3\]]so sor snang ba'i dngos po med do/_/de bzhin du du ma nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir/_de kho na nyid gcig pa'i rnam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de de lta bu'i rnam pas gang las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya 
[\[166b.4\]]ba la bla ma ni sngags dang /_rgyud dang man ngag can te/_gang zhig tshig gis man ngag rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i man ngag nges par bstan pa bka' stsal pa/_nang gi zhes bya ba ni rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bor ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa dang /_nam mkha' lnga 
[\[166b.5\]]yis brgyan par byas pa'o/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma ni gsang ba'i gnas zhes gsungs te/_pad+ma'i lte bar rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bo'i phyogs su khrag dang /_khu ba dang gci ba 'dzin pa'i rtsa lnga yis mdzes pa'i phyir spyi bo'i nam mkha'i gnas su'o/_/yang na chu dang /_me dang /_
[\[166b.6\]]dbang chen dang /_rlung dang /_bsil ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_gnyis kyis tsha ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_'dod chags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pas nam mkha'i lnga po 'di rnams kyis brgyan par byas pa ste/_pad+ma 'ba' zhig gis brgyan pa ni ma yin no zhes bka' 
[\[166b.7\]]stsal to/_/gsang ba zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bdun te/_brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/gsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o/_/der gsang ba de nyid phyogs yin te/_de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa'o/_/gsang ba ni sa bon lnga'o/_/gsang ba ni dam 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa'i dngos po sbas pa'o/_/gsang ba ni gsang ba'i pad+ma'o/_/gsang ba ni lte ba'i dga' ba'o/_/gsang ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba'o/_/gsang ba ni bde ba thams cad mtha' yas pa ste/_rgyud kyi gzhung gis bshad do/_/gsang ba yang ni byang 
[\[167a.2\]]chub sems/_/gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab nyid/_/gsum pa yang ni snying rje ste/_/bzhi pa snying po dam pa nyid/_/lnga pa mnyam pa nyid du gsungs/_/drug pa yang ni byams pa nyid/_/bdun pa chos nyid ye shes te/_/'di rnams gnas su kun tu bzhugs/_/
[\[167a.3\]]byang chub sems ni ma skyes pa/_/ting 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs mchog_/ming ni mdzes spyir rnam par bshad/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ma de/_/mang po'i gnas su gcig pu ste/_/de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa/_/phra snying 
[\[167a.4\]]gsang ba'i mkha' grong 'gro/_/sgyu ma'i gzugs brgya rig pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis 'chad par byed/_/me long la sogs dngos po yis/_/sngags ni lnga po yang dag bshad/_/shes rab pha rol phyin par gsungs/_/yi ge dang po gcig gyur 
[\[167a.5\]]pa/_/me long la sogs bde gshegs lnga/_/drug pa dpal ldan bde chen po/_/de yi yang ni ye shes gzhan/_/drug pa steng du grags pa med/_/rgyud ni 'bum phrag chad du ni/_/drug pa yod par ma gsungs so/_/rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu nyid/_/mi 
[\[167a.6\]]yi 'jig rten yod ma yin/_/de phyir nga yis khyod la bshad/_/'di nyid kyi ni nang son pas/_/gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du gang /_/sngon dang phyi mar bcom ldan 'das/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/_/'di la slob dpon gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i 
[\[167a.7\]]ye shes ji lta bu lags/_thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/_/gnas ni rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/_/bzhi ni cha dang yang dag ldan/_/pad+ma bzhi la rnam par gnas/_/spyi bo med snying pad+mar gnas/_/kha yi pad+ma'i spyi bor gnas/_/lte ba'i pad+mar gnas 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]pa'i sgra/_/sgra mthar gsang ba'i pad+mar ni/_/'gro dang rjes su 'ong bar byed/_/thig le'i sbyor bas rab tu bskor/_/kha dog gnag dang dmar ba dang /_/mdog dkar de bzhin ser ba nyid/_/cha ni bcom ldan thig le'i gzugs/_/cha ni shes rab cha zhes gsungs/_/
[\[167b.2\]]lha mo sgra ni rnam nges bstan/_/gang de rig ma sgyu ma che/_/sna tshogs gzugs can mtha' yas ma/_/'byin cing sdug dang 'jigs dang chags/_/thig le'i sgra ni yongs su bskor/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang /_/bzhi stong gi ni cho gas ni/_/lus kyi 
[\[167b.3\]]de nyid mi shes pas/_/de dag thams cad 'bras bu med/_/yig 'bru rnams kyi dang po a/_/brtan dang g.yo ba rnams la gnas/_snying rje chen po re ga byung /_/kha ni 'og tu nam mkha' 'byed/_/thog ma tha ma med pa'i lha/_/de yi spyi bo nges par bstan/_/
[\[167b.4\]]mchog gi de nyid 'di dag ni/_/lha mo nga yis rab tu phye/_/'di nyid las ni thams cad 'byung /_/chos kyi dbyings ni bru~M du brjod/_/skye gnas dbus su rnam par gnas/_/mthar ni swA hA zhes bya'i phyir/_/bsdus nas zhes ni rnam par brjod/_/rus pa rkang 
[\[167b.5\]]dang khu ba nyid/_/pha las skyes pa gsum du gsungs/_/pags pa dag ni sha dang khrag_/ma las skyes pa gsum zhes bsgrags/_/'di dag tsam du gsungs pa rnams/_/gong bu rnams ni bsdus pa nyid/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /_/'du byed 
[\[167b.6\]]dang ni rnam shes nyid/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis gzungs brnyan dngos/_/phung po dag ces bsgrag par bya/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/_/ro dang yang ni reg bya nyid/_/chos kyi khams zhes rnam par bshad/_/khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams/_/
[\[167b.7\]]'di rnams las ni byung ba yi/_/khu ba las ni gong bu skye/_/gong bu las ni mi rnams 'byung /_/yid ni nam mkha'i khams kun du/_/skye mched dang ni khams rnams dang /_/dbang po phung po 'byung ba dang /_/khams rnams las ni byung ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]lus su gsungs pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor b+ha gar brjod pa nyid/_/dkyil 'khor yang ni byang chub sems/_/dkyil 'khor gsum du brtag par bya/_/gang la gtso bo kun spyod pa/_/rtag pa du mar kun du gyur/_/phung po rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/_/
[\[168a.2\]]'byung ba rig par rtag tu brtag_/myos byed dang ni lcags kyu nyid/_/zhags pa pad+ma gzhug byed dang /_/bcing pa lcags sgrog dril bu yang /_/nges par byed pa ru ni gsungs/_/bshang ba dkar po zhes byar gsungs/_/pad+ma zhes bya khrag tu gsungs/_/
[\[168a.3\]]sha zhes bya ba mar me nyid/_/khu ba nam mkha' nyid du brjod/_/thim pa'i phyir ni ling gar gsungs/_/me tog snying gi b+ha gar brjod/_/glu ni langs pa nyid kyi glu/_/gar ni mnyam par sbyor ba nyid/_/ro ni shi bar brjod pa nyid/_/kha ni zhal dang bug pa 
[\[168a.4\]]nyid/_/snying po ro bsregs dur khrod do/_/me ni byin za gsal ba dang /_/de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'o/_/bur ni gu gul du brjod pa'o/_/nag po'i 'byung po'i nyi ma ni/_mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi pa'o/_/gser shing ni d+ha ru ra'o/_/a la~M ka ni ldong ros so/_/ma du 
[\[168a.5\]]lung gA ni sa bon gang ba'o/_/tsi tra ka ni tsi tra ka'o/_/ba tsa ni tshig nyid do/_/khyim bya'i sgo nga thams cad ni khyim bya'i sgo nga'i dum bu'o/_/skya bo ni dkar po'o/_/rta gsod pa ni ka ra bI ra'o/_/nyi ma'i ljon shing ni arka'i shing ngo /_/pe chag pa ni chag pa dang sreg 
[\[168a.6\]]chags zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sdig pa ni sbrul lo/_/a la~M ni rnga ma'o/_/ka la pa ni cha'o/_/nyin phyed kyi 'o mas byug cing zhes pa ni yang bsgos pa'o/_/bA na ri ni ka pi'o/_/yul ni kats+tsha ra brjod do/_/de'i bdag nyid ni thod lo skor dang spre'u dang /_kha Ti 
[\[168a.7\]]ka nyin phyed kyi 'o ma'i nang du nyi ma bdun du gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag dang nyin phyed kyi 'o ma dag dang sbyar bas mgo bo'i dbang po bri bar bya'o/_/dug sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni reg pa las skyed par byed pa'i don to/_/ma la ya las byung ba ni tsan+dan no/_/nA ga 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ge sar ni nA ga'o/_/nad kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o/_/myos byed kyi 'bras bu ni tsher ma'i 'bras bu'o/_/dza gu'i yul ni myos byed kyi spro bar rtogs par bya'o/_/ta ka ra ni dri'i ta ka ra'o/_/ldan pa ni sbyor ba'o/_/'bras kyi chu ni ko sha'o/_/ji snyed pa'i dug sna 
[\[168b.2\]]tshogs ni du ma'i rnam pa'o/_/'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni zad par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de'i nyin par skyes pa ni/_de'i nyin par shi ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/byis pa ni bu chung ngo /_/ro tsa ni bshang ba'o/_/ta ga ra ni klu'i shing bu'o/_/snying po'i gnas 
[\[168b.3\]]ni bcug par byas pa'o/_/sbal pa ni snying po can no/_/sprul mgo gnyis pa ni lto 'phye mgo gnyis pa'o/_/khrag dang tshil bu bskol ba ni snum du brjod do/_/ba ru ra'i shing ni de'i 'bras bu'o/_/lag pa ni phyag go/_/dug gis zin pa 'jig par byed do zhes bya 
[\[168b.4\]]ba ni zin pa 'phrog par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ba lang gi mar ni ba'i mar ro/_/rdo rje can ni snu hi'i 'o ma'o/_/bar+hi ni rma bya'o/_/khrag ni rma skyes so/_/sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i sha ni sha'o/_/ba la ka'i rtsa ba cha bdun pa ni bdun gyi dum bu'o/_/oM badzra ka ra hU~M 
[\[168b.5\]]phaT/_'byung po 'dul ba'i sgras 'byung po mthar byed pa ni 'byung po nyid du rab tu grags so/_/lag pa g.yas par btags na gdon las thar bar byed de/_gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/lto 'phye'i dbang po ni sbrul gyi rgyal po 'o/_/shun pa ni bshus pa'o/_/lto 'phye'i 
[\[168b.6\]]dgra ni rma bya ste de'i gshog pa'o/_/khwa gnyis ni khwa'o/_/nyin mo 'jigs pa ni 'ug pa'o/_/rta ni 'gro mgyogs so/_/rmig pa ni rkang pa'o/_/khung bu ni bug pa'o/_/gzhag pa ni bcug pa'o/_/sbrul ni lto 'phye'o/_/gnod sbyin ni khyi'o/_/thod pa ni rmod 
[\[168b.7\]]byed do/_/phag ni phag pa'o/_/mgo skyes ni skra'o/_/mgrin [{]rings [,]ring [}]ni rnga mo'o/_/dmar po ni khrag go/_/b+hal+la ta ka nyid dang /_star bu ni a~Ml be ta nyid do/_/lag skyes ni sen mo'o/_/kha sbyor gyi me ni kha sbyar gyi 'tshed pa'o/_/bsregs pa ni thal bar byas pa'o/_/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]a~M ko Ta ni ko Ta ni'i shing ngo /_/dri zhim pa ni ba glang ngo /_/a~M ko Ta'i sa bon btus pa'i mar khu des grub pa'i mig sman 'o ma dang bsres pa'i mig sman des mig byug par bya'o/_/rgyal ni skar ma rgyal lo/_/a~M ko Ta'i mar khu'i rtsigs ma dang /_ta ka ra'i 
[\[169a.2\]]'bras bu dang /_a~M ko Ta'i sa bon gyi mar khu dang /_gang zhig gnyis ka'i rtsigs ma dag gis mig byugs na lha'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/ta ka ra'i 'bras bu'i mig sman gyis byugs na sngar gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/_rang gi ngo bo nyid can du mthong ngo /_/
[\[169a.3\]]ri bong can gyi chu ni se ba la'o/_/dza lu ka ni pad pa nyid do/_/sbal pa'i mar khu ni snying po can gyi mar khu'o/_/ba ta la'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig go/_/dge sbyong ni skra breg pa'o/_/zla ba las byung ba ni se ba las byung ba'o/_/dun d+hu b+ha ni sbrul gdong gnyis pa'o/_/khrag 
[\[169a.4\]]ni gzugs 'dzin pa'o/_/gos kyi nang du gzhug par byas nas khar gzhug go/_/s+ye nA ka zhes bya ba'i shing ngo /_/mar sar ni mar dkar nyid do/_/dmar po'i btsag ni gser gyi btsag go/_/dri ngan pa zhes bya ba ni sman no/_/mi na ni nya'o/_/srin bu ni shing gi 
[\[169a.5\]]rjes su rgyu ba'i 'bu srin no/_/ko ki la ni sbrang bu'o/_/bu ram ni gu Da nyid do/_/a ran la ni sings po'o/_/skye ba gnyis pa ni bram ze'o/_/byi la ni rtug pa sbed pa'o/_/spre'u ni bA nA ra'o/_/rang 'tshed pa ni g.yung po'o/_/khwa'i dgra ni 'ug pa'o/_/na gu le 
[\[169a.6\]]ni sre mong nyid do/_/tsa ra mo ni byi la'o/_/'di dag gi phye ma'o/_/ba glang tshe ni ce spyang ngo /_/ma tu lung ga ni sa bon gang ba'o/_/phug ron ni ka po ta'o/_/zangs kyi gtsug pud can ni khyim bya'o/_/'di dag gi rtug pa bsdu bar bya'o/_/skra'i las kyi mtha' zhes 
[\[169a.7\]]bya ba ni mgo reg go/_/pi tsu marda ni nim pa'o/_/gtor zan ni khwa'o/_/dga' ba dang bcas pa'i dkar mo ni khyi mo dkar mo'o/_/nus pa ni 'byar ba'o/_/mda'i rma ni sbrang bu'o/_/bsnun pa ni brdungs pa'o/_/rang gi sa bon ni bdag gi rdzas so/_/rgyal ni skar ma rgyal 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]lo/_/skyes ma ni bud med do/_/skal ba ngan pa gzung ba ni blangs pa'o/_/skyes pa'i shing ni a mra la sogs pa'o/_/shing gi yal ga ni 'dab ma'o/_/pi lu ni glang po'o/_/steng du 'dren pa ni lag pas 'dzin pa'o/_/skyes bu'i myos byed ni rdzas so/_/krAn ta ni 
[\[169b.2\]]khyab 'jug gnon pa'o/_/sra ban ti ni ngu ba'o/_/a ba na ta dza ki kA ni thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/shi kha ni rma bya'i gtsug phud do/_/mkha' 'gro'i bdag po ni nam mkha' lding gi bdag po'o/_/lha'i bdag po sbas pa ni dbang po sbas pa'o/_/ba bla ni man shi la'o/_/ldong 
[\[169b.3\]]ros ni ldong ros ljang gu'o/_/a grA ni ba tsA'o/_/bcad nas skyes pa ni dUr ba'o/_/bkra shis ni ro tsa na'o/_/ba~M sa zhes bya ba ni lte ba mngon par sar pa'o/_/dbang po'i nas ni ku ta dza'i sa bon te/_la la dag gi ku ta dza'i sa bon no/_/dpal thams cad ni mdzes pa 
[\[169b.4\]]dang ldan pa'o/_/a ru NA ni tsan+dan dmar po'o/_/drang srong gi bu ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_nam mkha' bskyed pa'o/_/ri'i snying po ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/_/srod ni rna ba'i mig sman no/_/ri bong gis mtshan pa'i tsher ma ni se ba la'i tsher ma'o/_/
[\[169b.5\]]sbrang rtsi ni sbrang ma'i'o/_/sbrang rtsi ni yaSh+Ti'i sbrang rtsi'o/_/dang po'i me tog ni dang po'i zla mtshan gyi khrag go/_/lcags gsum zhes bya ba ni gser dang dngul dang zangs so/_/sngon po gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon cing sbyar ba'i a sho ka'i shing ni a sho ka sngon po'o/_/de 
[\[169b.6\]]las byung ba'i myu gu ni a sho ka sngon po las byung ba'i myu gu'o/_/nyi ma ni zangs te shin tu dmar ba'o/_/zla ba ni dngul lo/_/me ni gser ro/_/ba glang gi gi wang ni ba glang gi gi wang ngo /_/ing gu di'i shing gi me tog ni ing gu di'i ljon shing gi ku su sa ste/_ljon shing 
[\[169b.7\]]gi me tog kun bsdus pa'o/_/'gegs pa ni skyes pa shi ba ste/_de'i mig dang spu rnams so/_/ka gnyis pa'i zos pa dang ldan pa ni khwas zos pa skyugs pa dang lhag ma ma zos pa'o/_/pha'i skyed mos tshal ni dur khrod do/_/der mnyes pa ni zla mtshan gyis myos pa'i bu mo'i rdzas 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]blangs pa'o/_/a sho ka yang yin pa sngon po yang yin pa de ni a sho ka sngon po'o/_/de'i byang phyogs kyi khwa'i tshang ni khwa'i gnas so/_/de las gang zhig byung ba'i myu gu de ni a sho ka sngon po'i byang phyogs kyi khwa'i tshang gi myu gu'o/_/phug ron gyi khong par sro 
[\[170a.2\]]ta any+dza na bcug la/_'on kyang tsi ta'i mes bsreg par bya ste/_de nas mig sman 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/byi la dkar po ma yin pas bsad pa ni byi la nag po'i khrag gis mi snang bar byas te sbed pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/tri Na'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs de rnams ni tri Na'i myu gu 
[\[170a.3\]]sar pa'i tshogs rnams so/_/des bteg pa'i sa ni tri Na'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs kyis bteg pa'i sa'o/_/de'i steng du gnas pa'i sa dang /_mda'i rma dang /_ta la dang ldan pa'o/_/mda'i rma ni sbrang bu'o/_/ta la ni ldong ros so/_/de dag dang yang dag par ldan pa ni 
[\[170a.4\]]bcas pa ste/_sa rag+ha dang /_ta la dang ldan pa'o/_/rgyal la zhes pa ni rgyal gyi nyi ma la'o/_/mig sman ni gong du gsungs pa'o/_/gang zhig sngags dang sman gyi sbyor bas legs par byas na de'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las 
[\[170a.5\]]'ongs pa ste/_de nas b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/dang por phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas/_phyi nas mig sman gyi sgrub pa bcug cing sbyor bas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ma skyes kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/_/gang zhig sngags kyi sgrub pa dang 
[\[170a.6\]]bral ba'i mig sman 'di 'ba' zhig gis zhi ba'i las la sogs pa'ang byed do zhes gsungs so/_/mig mig sman gyis byugs nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lta stangs kyis bltas na zhi ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/mig mig sman gyis byugs nas rgyal po la bltas na rgyal po'i 
[\[170a.7\]]mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/mig mig sman gyis byugs nas khro bo'i lta bas dgra la bltas na dgra zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bgegs thams cad la nges par bltas na gdon la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad yang dag par skrod par byed do/_/'chad par 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]'gyur ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags shing bzla bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o/_/bud med kyi b+ha gar gur gum bcug nas phyi nas rang gi sgrub pa gzhug par bya zhing mnyam par sbyor bas sngags bzlas te khyad par du yang bsgrub par bya'o/_/de'i sngags brjod pa bka' 
[\[170b.2\]]stsal pa/_oM pra san+na tA re/_a mr-i ta mu kha~M/_a mr-i ta lo tsa ne/_sar+b+bA r+tha sA d+ha ni/_sar+b+ba satwA ba sha~M ka ra hU~M phaT hU~M swA hA/_oM tr-i mu khe Sha D+D+hu dze/_de bi mA la ki rau dr-i rU pi Ni hriM hriM hU~M hU~M a~M a~M ha ha swA hA/_sngon gyi bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas/_phyi nas mig sman dang 
[\[170b.3\]]gur gum yang bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/gur gum des dpral bar thig le bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/bud med skal ba bzang por byed pa bka' stsal pa/_b+ha ga tsan+dan gyis byugs pa'i steng du ba glang gi gi wang gis bru~M bris nas/_bdag po dang lhan cig 
[\[170b.4\]]sbyor bas ji srid myos byed ma 'ongs kyi bar du'o/_/de nas bdag po de bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/nr-i pa ni bung ba'i rgyal po'o/_/tsi tri ni 'dab ma stong pa'o/_/mtshan mo ni yung ba'o/_/ba ku tsi ni a pa ku tsa'o/_/ut+pa la'i snying po ni ut+pal kha ma bye ba'o/_/lcags kyi dri ma 
[\[170b.5\]]ni lcags kyi bshang ba'o/_/dri la sogs pa ni gu gul dang sardza ra sa'o/_/khrag sel ba ni las kyi kha dog go/_/gser gyi shing ni gser gyi ljon shing ngo /_/Di D+ha pra ro ni bA lA'o/_/sin+hu pa ra ni nir guN+Da'o/_/sh+yA ma ni pri ya ku'o/_/ke sha ri ni nA ga ge sar ro/_/
[\[170b.6\]]rig pa 'dzin pa ni tsam pa ka'o/_/nA ga ni pu na na ga'o/_/'khor lo 'thag pa ni e Da tsi'o/_/mtshan mo spyod pa ni yung ba'o/_/shi khi ni rma bya'i gtsug pud do/_/pra ba na ni bal+la ka'o/_/'byung po'i dgra bo ni nir gun ti'o/_/ba ra hri da ni bal+la b+hi dang rkun ma'i me tog 
[\[170b.7\]]tu brjod do/_/ka ran la ni ka ra ny+dza'o/_/man dza ri ni 'dul bar byed pa'o/_/gser gyi shing gi shun pa ni pags pa'o/_/g+ha na ni musta ka'o/_/mtshan mo'i shing ni skyer pa'i shing ngo /_/nad kyi dbang po ni kun+da'o/_/srid pa'i rdul ni khyim gyi me tog go/_/rkun ma ni 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]rgan po gzhon par byed pa'o/_/keM su ni de'i yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sgrub pa dang rab tu ldan pa la lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa kha cig 'byung ba tshar gcad pa'i phyir/_mtshon cha kun gyi phyag rgya che/_/'khrul 'khor 
[\[171a.2\]]'phangs dang ma 'phangs dang /_/de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa nyid/_/'phangs pa 'dzin par bcas pa dang /_/lag pa'i 'thab mo lnga pa nyid/_/gzhu yi rig byed rang gyur pas/_/phyag rgya rab tu gnas par bya/_/de la sbyor 'phangs mda' la sogs/_/ma 
[\[171a.3\]]'phangs ba ni ral gri sogs/_/lag pas grol ba 'khor lo sogs/_/'gro ba 'dzin bcas zhags pa sogs/_/mtshon cha thams cad yongs spangs nas/_/lag pa'i 'thab mos dgra 'dul sogs/_/de bzhin bcing ba yang dag ldan/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 
[\[171a.4\]]sems dpa' yis/_/mtshon cha'i mchog ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/gnas dag dbyibs ni rab bshad bya/_/rnal 'byor sgrub thabs shin tu mdzes/_/sbyor dang myur bar gsor ba dang /_/dgug pa dang ni 'dzin pa nyid/_/gsal ba ru ni gtong ba ste/_/sa la mnyam 
[\[171a.5\]]stabs phyag rgyas btab/_/bai sha kha sar phyag rgyas gdab/_/dkyil 'khor de nyid phyag rgyas gdab/_/gnas ni gsum du g.yas brkyang bas/_/dbyibs kyi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa/_/mthe bo dang ni sor mo rnams/_/long bu'i nang du sbyar ba yin/_/gang zhig 
[\[171a.6\]]brtan par sbyar ba ni/_/mnyam pa'i rkang stabs gnas su gsungs/_/rkang pa'i sor mo phyir bzhag nas/_/pus mo gnyis ni bsrang ste g.yo/_/sor mo nyi shu rtsa drug chad/_/gnas ni bai sha kha ru brjod/_/ngang pa'i gshog pa'i dbyibs su ni/_/pus mo gnyis 
[\[171a.7\]]ni mnyam sbyar ba/_/bar du yang ni khru gnyis nyid/_/de ni dkyil 'khor rkang stabs gsungs/_/gang yang gshol gyi dbyibs mnyam par/_/pus mo brla yi g.yas bsrungs na/_/g.yon ni byol song 'gro ba yin/_/'khyud nas brla dang rje ngar gnas/_/mtho lnga rnam par rgyas 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]pa ni/_/g.yas brkyang bar ni de rab grags/_/de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ni/_/de ni g.yon brkyang ba ru brjod/_/lhod min pa dang mkhrang ba nyid/_/mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa nyid/_/gang las skye mched rnam par dag_/rang gi sku yi phyag rgya mdzes/_/rims kyi 
[\[171b.2\]]nad dang dug gi nad/_/mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba gdon dag ni/_/'dis ni yan lag kun brgyan pa/_/thams cad du ni zil gyis gnon/_/gang ba'i skye mched kyi phyag rgya'o/_/rang snying 'gugs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/shin tu mdzes pas gzhu nyid gzung /_/
[\[171b.3\]]g.yas su rab tu bsgyur ba dang /_/mda' ni bcug na 'grub par 'gyur/_/sngon du lag pa mnyam byas nas/_/rgyab tu bkug nas rim par ni/_/gang zhig dal gyis dgug bya zhing /_/'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/_/thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[171b.4\]]rna ba'i skye mched dkyil 'khor du/_/bcug nas rim pa ji lta bar/_/oM ni ji srid rang gi khar/_/ji srid du na 'dzin pa'o/_/dus su oM ni zlos gyur pa/_/de srid dus su gzung bar bya/_/'dzin pa yi ni phyag rgya'o/_/rim pa ji ltar mnyam bkug nas/_/cho 
[\[171b.5\]]ga ji bzhin gzung bar bya/_/de la cung zad drang bya zhing /_/yongs su bkang na 'grub par 'gyur/_/dgang ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/'dzum zhing mig gis blta ba dang /_/'ben la khu tshur gdab par bya/_/lta stangs khu tshur bcug nas ni/_/rab tu btang nas mchog 'grub 
[\[171b.6\]]'gyur/_/gzhu yis rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/gru bzhi rnon po zlum po dang /_/de bzhin mchog tu bskor ba nyid/_/gang du g.yas nas bskor bya zhing /_/de bzhin 'og dang steng du 'gro/_/rim pas mnan cing drag mnan pas/_/cho ga bcus mchog phyag rgya 
[\[171b.7\]]yis/_/khams gsum rgyal po chen po dang /_/rgyal ba'i bde ba nye bar spyod/_/dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal ni/_/phyag rgya bcug cing mnyam bcug dang /_/de bzhin glog ltar bcug pa nyid/_/phyag rgya bkug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/de bzhin glog ltar 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]bskor ba nyid/_/'og tu mnyam pa de bzhin du/_/steng gi phyogs su 'gro ba nyid/_de bzhin gshegs 'dzin phyag rgya ni/_/gnas gsum dag tu bsgom par bya/_/rgyan thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/kun du kun nas thams cad dang /_/rnam 
[\[172a.2\]]kun dus kun rang gi ni/_/gzhu yi rig byed phyag rgya 'dzin/_/yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de/_spyan gyi gzugs su gyur pa dang /_rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor 
[\[172a.3\]]dang ldan pas sngags kyi yi ge las spyan phyung ste/_zla ba gang ba dang /_bum pa'i lag pa ma'i ma mo 'dod par bya ba dang /_dbang bskur bar bsams na zhi ba skye bar byed pa yin te/_shi ba rnams la srog sbyin par byed cing /_grub pa 'dod pa la dngos grub sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[172a.4\]]rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje'i dam tshig la skul bar byed pa ni rdo rje'i dam tshig skul bar byed pa'o/_/thugs kyi rdo rje'i sku gsum 'bar ba'i mchog gi dam tshig ni mA ma kI'i mtshan nyid de/_gang du ting nge 'dzin la de ni de bzhin du brjod do/_/rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[172a.5\]]kyi sngags kyi yi ge dkar po phyung nas/_de'i tshe bsgrub bya'i lus la gang bar bsgom par byas na sdig pa 'jig par byed pa yin no/_/zhi ba la ma mo spyan dang ldan pa lta bur bya ba dang /_rgyas pa la ni rin po che'i bum pa nas rin po che'i char pa 'byin par bsam par 
[\[172a.6\]]bya'o/_/'dod chags chen po la 'od dpag tu med pa gang gi pad+mas gtses pa de'i gar gyis phye ba ste/_de ltar gyur pa'i kun byed pa ni rigs kun gyi bdag nyid can no/_/gang gi kun byed pa ni thams cad byed pa'o/_/'dis ni byas pa'i de'i dmigs pas ting nge 
[\[172a.7\]]'dzin la rdo rje dmigs par de bzhin du brjod do/_/rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad do/_/pad+ma ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste/_sngags kyi yi ge gser gyi kha dog lta bu phyung nas sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur bar byed na rgyas pa chen po skyed par byed do/_/de rnams kyi spro 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ba dang sdud par byed pa dag sgom par byed na chos kyi mdzod 'phel bar byed do/_/rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma'i snying por nang du gnas pas bsgrub bya sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng bas byin gyis brlabs te/_sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug 
[\[172b.2\]]par byed na/_bsrung ba chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad dbang du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_dbang du gyur pa la sogs de rnams rtogs par byed pa dang /_skyed par byed pa de ni don yod rdo rje can te/_de nyid rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' 
[\[172b.3\]]bar byed pa'o/_/rdo rje ni mi phyed pa ste/_gang du ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pas sngags kyi yi ge dmar po phyung ste/_des bsgrub par bya ba dag par bya zhing bzlas pa byas na mngag gzhug par byed do/_/ye shes kyis kun sgrol bas sgrol ma zhes bya ba ni ye 
[\[172b.4\]]shes 'jug par byed ma can no/_/de'i tshe dmigs pa'i phyir de de bzhin du gsungs so/_/ye shes sna tshogs ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes sna tshogs te/_rdo rje gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams de dag nyid kyis gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ste/_
[\[172b.5\]]de rnams ni gur nyid do/_/mdzes pa ni yan lag dang nying lag dman pa ma yin pa'o/_/srubs med pa ni dum bu gcig pa'o/_/srubs gnyis pa ni dum bu gnyis pa ste/_'di dag nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa rdul gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ni de brjod 
[\[172b.6\]]pa yin te/_gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnal 'byor pa lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pas bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi rdul gyis de'i gzugs brnyan byas nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug par bya ste/_de nyid la gzhug pa dang 
[\[172b.7\]]bcing ba byas nas rkang pa g.yon pas de mnan te/_ji srid khugs par gyur pa de srid du bskul ba dang bcas par bzla bar bya'o/_/sku gsum mi phyed bsgom pa yis zhes bya bas ni rang gi lha'i nga rgyal brtan par bsgoms pas so/_/gti mug chen po'i mchog ni don yod rdo 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rje can te/_de'i ye shes ni rdo rje rtse mo las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/_de'i phyir rdo rje bdud rtsi'i khro bo ni gang du ting nge 'dzin la de de bzhin du brjod do/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang par bcug pa zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rnal 'byor dang
