[\[173a.2\]]ldan pas bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi rdul la de'i gzugs brnyan bong bu'i gcin gyis byas nas mi dge ba'i phyag rgyas byas nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dab ma las sA lu btags par byas pa dang /_dur khrod kyi sol bas bsgrub bya'i ming gro ga'i nang du chud par mngon 
[\[173a.3\]]par bris shing /_gzugs brnyan lnga rgyab tu bzhag nas rdo rje log par 'dren pa bkug nas mchod de/_de'i rkang pa dag tu gzhug par bya'o/_/de bya'o zhes bya ba ni de srid du sngags kyi mthar hU~M brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rlung gis bar chad du gyur pa de'i tshe gong du 
[\[173a.4\]]gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid dmigs nas bdag nyid dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bskyed pa bka' stsal pa/_rlung gi phyogs su dri nag pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par thig le bdun/_ya yig so so'i nang du byas pa ni de'i dbus su thig le bdun po 
[\[173a.5\]]ste/_thig le bdun po 'di rnams las rlung lha bdun [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la zhon zhing mdog nag po'o/_de la rang gi sa bon las byung ba ni des rang gi snying ga las bton pa ste/_'phags pa mi g.yo mgon nam/_'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas zhags pas bcing bar bsam 
[\[173a.6\]]par bya'o/_/de nas kham phor gyis zhes bya ba ni hU~M su~M hU~M zhes bya ba las ri rab kyi gzugs rwa brgyad dang ldan pa bskyed nas/_kha 'og tu phub nas gzhag pa ni rdo rje'i 'ching ba chen po yin no/_/rang gis sngags bzlas pa ni de'i thig le bdun sngags kyis sbas nas 
[\[173a.7\]]dbugs kyis gnas par bya'o/_/de'i steng du yang la~M gyis dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog ser po'o/_/der yang rtse lnga pa chen po las mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer las khro bo 'jigs par spro bar bya zhing /_khro bo rdo rjes mnan par bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i steng du 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag nas/_'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla bar bya'o/_/rdo rje'i steng du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /_'phags pa mi g.yo mgon zhabs g.yas brkyang bas thams cad gnon cing bcom ldan 'das 
[\[173b.2\]]kyi sngon du lag na ral gri dang /_zhags pas rlung bsdigs par bsam par bya ste/_de skad du 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung thams cad kyang bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/char dbab pa'i don du stobs po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris nas de'i 
[\[173b.3\]]'dab ma brgyad la mtha' yas dang /_rigs ldan dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_dung skyong dang /_'jog po dang /_pad+ma chen po dang /_stobs kyi rgyu dang /_pad+ma zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi rim pa las/_ser po dang dkar po'o/_/sha Sha sa ha sa~M swA~M swa~M swa rang gi sa bon 
[\[173b.4\]]gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i klu brgyad po rnams/_snying po brgyad du gnas pa'i snga ma bkug nas mchod de/_'dir bzhugs pa khro bo'i sku 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid hU~M na~M hU~M zhes mchog tu bzlas pas/_zhabs kyi 'og tu klu rnams gzer bar sgom par byed 
[\[173b.5\]]na char mchog tu rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/char bzlog pa'i don bka' stsal pa/_bdag nyid khro bo'i gzugs nyi ma'i mdog gi 'od ltar shin tu dmar bar bsams nas rang gi kha ru hU~M 'bar ba'i lce nam mkha'i tshad 'dis dral zhing yongs su gang ba las 
[\[173b.6\]]sprin snying ga'i sbubs kyi dbugs kyis 'gugs shing dbugs 'byin pas ras bal gyi phur ma ltar gtor bar byed do/_/yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 'bar bar bton pas dral zhing bcad nas hU~M gis mchog tu bsdigs par bya'o/_/de gzhig pa'i don bka' 
[\[173b.7\]]stsal pa/_me'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtag pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/_rang gi dpral ba nas 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon ra~M las byung ba bton nas me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa phyag drug pa g.yon k+ShiM las sdigs mdzub dang /_hU~M las 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]zhags pa'i nang du bcug pa dang /_d+ha~M las gzhu'o/_/g.yas pa na kha~M las ral gri dang ho las mda' dang /_hU~M gis rdo rje 'dzin par bsams nas/_de nyid kyi 'od zer gyis khro bo dang lhan cig pas bgegs thams cad hU~M gi sgra bsgrags pas 
[\[174a.2\]]'bar ba'i ral gri la sogs pas bsnun pa la sogs pa dang /_mda' 'phangs nas phigs pas skyes pa'i bgegs gzhom par bya'o/_/skyes pa'i khrag chen po ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rkang rjes kyi rdul dang /_skyes pa'i khrag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs 
[\[174a.3\]]brnyan byas nas/_skyes pa'i rus pa'i phur bu dag la 'od zer can gyi sngags nyi shus mngon par bsngags te/_mig la phur pas btab nas tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar gzhug go/_/oM sum+b+ha rdo rje gtun shing dang tho bas dang po kha dang gtun shing gis rgyab tu brdung bar 
[\[174a.4\]]bsam par bya'o/_/'bar ba gzhom pa'i don du mig sman gyi kha dog ces bya ba la sogs pas ni nam mkha'i gnas su hU~M gaHhU~M zhes nang du gzhug par bya'o/_/phuH'i yig 'bru las skyes pa klu nag po stong phrag gis bskor ba'i nam mkha' lding gis bka' stsal par 
[\[174a.5\]]bya'o/_/ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te/_oM badzra nA rA ya na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang por bskul te/_des brgya byin yang yid kyis bskul bar bya'o/_/'di'ang de char gyi sprin la char gyi don du bka' stsal par bya ste/_bka' thos na yang char 'bebs pas sprin phyir bzlog 
[\[174a.6\]]pa ni yid kyis bsam par byed na/_nam mkha' lding gi gshog pas zlog par byed cing mchus bsnun pas chu bo'i mtshams byed do/_/rdo rje phyir bzlog pa'i don bka' stsal to/_/sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pas ni dge ba byed pa'i phyir zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang du 
[\[174a.7\]]byed pa'i mtshan nyid la ni gtsubs pa las byung ba'i mes bya'o/_/mngon spyod la ni dur khrod kyi mes bya'o/_/thab khung zhes bya ba ni zlum po dang /_gru bzhi dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_gru gsum mo/_/de ltar thab khung gi mtha' mar dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]dang /_nag por pad+ma rnams kyang gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas de'i mdog ltar gtsug tor dang /_chu skyes dang /_rin po che dang /_rdo rje 'bar ba rnams bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/las kun byed pa bzlas pas ni zhes bya ba ni hU~M gis mngon par bsngags pa'o/_/g.yon 
[\[174b.2\]]pa'i rdo rjes zhes bya ba ni lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa can du byas pa'o/_/las kyi 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis ci rigs par 'od kyis rnam par spras pa'o/_/'bar ba'i rnam pas yongs su thim par byas pa'o zhes bya ba la 
[\[174b.3\]]'bar ba ni lha'am 'bar ba ni gtsigs pa'i gzugs kyis te/_de bzhin du ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi cho ga bsgom par bya zhing /_oM dang po dang /_mthar swA hA las mchog tu gnas nas zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dbang la'o/_/mngon spyod la khro ba'i tshig gis hU~M dang 
[\[174b.4\]]bcas pa'i phaT kyis sngags bzla bar bya'o/_thog ma dang tha mar sreg blugs gang bar dbul lo/_kha dgang ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni lha'i zhal gyi pad+mar sbyin sreg bya'o/_/bshang gci la sogs pa'i sreg blugs la sdig pa la sogs pa'i dogs pa mi bya ste/_gang 
[\[174b.5\]]gi phyir don dam par rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir thams cad rnam par rtog pa tsam mo/_/de nas dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pas kyang lha'i nga rgyal sngon du bya ba dang /_thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa'i ye shes skyed par 
[\[174b.6\]]byed pa'o/_/sku la sogs pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba bka' stsal pa/_bud med dang ni skyes pa'i lus/_las ni du mas bskyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par bstan pa zhes bya bas ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i skyes bu'o/_/sha dang 
[\[174b.7\]]rkang la sogs pa dag ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /_mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te/_'di'i phyir bsten par bya'o/_/gang yang 'dod chags zhe sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/_'du byed 'phel ba bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa lnga yongs su 'dzag pa ni 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]sa la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhi'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'o/_/bsgoms pa las zhes bya ni brtags pa dang bral ba'i blo gros kyis so/_/de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya/_/thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba ni ji snyed du gru bzhi pa dang /_sgo 
[\[175a.2\]]bzhi pa dang /_sgo skyong ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs so/_/de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/_kun las sna tshogs phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpal sangs 
[\[175a.3\]]rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang ldan pa'o/_/kun las sna tshogs 'khor lo can zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gong du gsungs pa'i gnas su bkod pas de'i rjes su mtshams bzhi po rnams su drag mo la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin 
[\[175a.4\]]gyis brlabs nas/_seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa dang /_rdo rje tho bas de'i sngags bzlas nas brdung zhing lte ba dang /_drag mo la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su rim pas mtha' yas dang /_rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phur pas btab ste/_dkyil 
[\[175a.5\]]'khor ba sta gon la gnas par bya'o/_/dri la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas kyi lha thams cad kyi gnas su rang gi hU~M dang /_de'i mtshan dang por bzlas nas mngon par gtor zhing /_de nas sngon du tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rang gi lha'i 'khor lo bton te/_gnas 
[\[175a.6\]]ji lta bar bzhugs su gsol nas gsungs pa'i dgug pa la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang por bya ba dang /_rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu nye bar bltas nas dbang bskur ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_phyag 'tshal nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[175a.7\]]can gyi yid zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg byas nas phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/ji ltar re zhig rtsa ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i lhag par gnas pa byas nas slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya'o/_/hU~M bzlas pa'i chus dang por snying gar gtor nas/_de nyid kyis 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa gzhag par bya zhing /_snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /_ji srid spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya'o/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas te/_hU~M gis mngon par bsngags pa'i srad bus dpung ba bcings nas so shing la 
[\[175b.2\]]sogs pa dang /_dri la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de rnams la chos bstan cing dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su gzhug par bya ste/_de'i 'od zer rnams kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/sngar bzhin yongs su gyur pas zhes bya ba ni mchod pa la sogs pa byed 
[\[175b.3\]]pa ste/_ji ltar 'di skad du lha'i 'khor lo bton pa de bzhin du lha'i 'khor lo der nang du bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ji snyed pa'o/_/gzhan yang dang por rtog pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa thugs ka nas bton nas sngon po la sogs pa'i kha 
[\[175b.4\]]dog dag gi srad bu lnga po de'i bdag nyid du byas te/_hU~M dal gyis sgyur zhing hU~M de brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/de ltar rdul tshon yang ji ltar rnal 'byor 'di nyid du gzhug pa gsungs la/_sangs rgyas lngas byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs ji lta bar thig 
[\[175b.5\]]gdab ste/_dang por slob dpon gyis rdul tshon bri bar bya zhing /_phyis ni slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du sngon po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_ser po'i rdul tshon rnam pa lnga'o/_/gnyis pa la ni sngon po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang 
[\[175b.6\]]gsum mo/_/gsum po'i 'khor lo ni rdul tshon dkar pos so/_/'khor lo'i lte ba sna tshogs 'bar zhes bya ba ni/_sna tshogs pad+mar bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad chen po bzhugs par bya'o/_/shar la sogs pa'i re'u mig rnams su ni rtag pa la sogs pa ste 
[\[175b.7\]]phyogs su'o/_/'khor lo'i shar la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su spyan la sogs pa'o/_/'phar ma gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su drag mo la sogs pa'i rdo rje lha mo rnams so/_/'phar ma gsum pa'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]byams pa la sogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'o/_/mtshams rnams su ni mur dza la sogs pa'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/ji ltar re zhig bum pa legs par byas na brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/_/
[\[176a.2\]]rtsa ba'i bum pa la ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o/_/bzhi pa la ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po rnams kyis so/_/lha thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbye bas ni bzhi'o/_/de nas bum pa sgor gnas pa la las thams cad pa bzlas pas bsang gtor bya'o/_/de rnams gos 
[\[176a.3\]]la sogs pas brgyan par byas nas bdag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas legs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis lha thams cad kyi 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid kyi nang du bsgom par bya zhing de'i nga rgyal dang ldan par bya'o/_/mchod yon gyi nye bar spyod pa yongs su bzlas nas sgo mngon par phye 
[\[176a.4\]]ste/_gnas ji lta bar bum pa la sogs pa rnams bzhag la/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du phyung nas rang gi gnas su 'khor lo gzhug par bya'o/_/rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rnams kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/_rang gi phyag rgya rab tu bstan pas rang gi dbang 
[\[176a.5\]]gis dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bsams nas/_sgeg mo la sogs pa'i sngon gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_rnga dang gling bu la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i rang gi mchod pa'i khyad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig ma rnams kyis thal mo sbyar bas 
[\[176a.6\]]rdo rje'i glu legs par sbyar ba gsum du brjod pas phyag 'tshal te/_tshim par bya ba'i don du gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/dngos grub thams cad kyi don du rang gis gsol ba btab nas dang po la sogs pa bskyed par bya ste/_slob 
[\[176a.7\]]ma la sna tshogs pas brgyan par bya'o/_/o~M la sogs pas snying gar sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/thal mo sbyar ba sdigs mdzub dkris pa'i 'khor lo'i rnam pas hU~M brjod cing gnas lnga po thams cad du byas te/_gdong 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]gos kyis bkab nas rdo rje lha mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas bzung ba'i me tog dang /_hU~M nyid kyis gzhug cing spyi bo'i tshogs thams cad bya'o/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bas byin gyis brlabs nas/_dri dang me tog la sogs pas brgyan par bya ste/_ji lta 
[\[176b.2\]]bar bum pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchod yon dang /_phyag na bum pa bdud rtsi bzang pos bkang bas de rnams kyis dbang bskur bar blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang gos la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/_rdo rje 
[\[176b.3\]]la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar gyur pa dang /_mi bskyod pa la sogs pa du ma'i gzugs yongs su gyur nas nye bar thod pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_rdo rje dang /_bdag po dang /_rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba dang /_gser la sogs pa'i thur mas mi shes pa'i 
[\[176b.4\]]rab rib bsal ba dang /_me long blangs te/_rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad kyis mtshan nyid rnams bsgrag par bya'o/_/dbyangs kyi dang pos glegs bam dang /_dang po'i rjes kyi dbyangs kyis rdo rje dril bu dang /_bka'i gnang 
[\[176b.5\]]ba sbyin pa'i don du rkang pa byin gyis brlab cing /_lag pa g.yas par ral gri sbyin par bya ste/_deng nas bzung ste 'jig rten la chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig_/skyob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang dag par dmigs par bya'o/_/de ring nas bzung ste zhes bya ba la sogs 
[\[176b.6\]]pas ni dam tshig nye bar bstan nas/_bla mas yon blangs nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa byas nas hU~M zhes brjod par bya'o/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje can muHzhes bya bas lha'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/phur pa bton 
[\[176b.7\]]nas de bzhin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid gong du gsungs pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes brjod pas rang gi gnas nyid du khyad par du 'phags pa nang du bsgom par bya'o/_/hU~M nyid kyis rdul tshon dbyi bar bya zhing bsdus nas 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]chu'i nang du blug par bya'o/_/khro bos khro ba 'dzin pa'i phyir dpal he ru ka 'byung ba bka' stsal pa/_de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya bar rigs kyi bu bsgrags pa yin no/_/srog 
[\[177a.2\]]gcod pa la sogs pa'i mi dge ba bcu la spyod pa dang /_dam tshig nyams pa de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa brjod de/_rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni dag pa'o/_/sgeg cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang /_/zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/_/phyag ni bcu drug dag 
[\[177a.3\]]gis brgyan/_/spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi par/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_yang de ltar rim pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi pa/_phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras pa'o/_de la zhal dang po ni drag po'o/_gnyis pa g.yas pa ni bde bas rab tu 
[\[177a.4\]]myos shing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o/_/rgyab tu zhal gsum pa la ni rmad du byung ba'i bza' ba'o/_/g.yon du zhal sgeg pas 'o mdzad pa'o/_/de bzhin du steng ma'i zhal gtsigs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mdzad pa'i mchog go/_/zhal gsum ni stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[177a.5\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ye shes so/_/mi bskyod pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje can ni de bzhin du phyag drug pa'o/_/rgyas par 'byung ba ni phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig par yang bstan par bya zhing g.yon pa'i phrag par ni mchod phyir thogs dag pa'i sbyor bas 
[\[177a.6\]]rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pas kha T+wA~M ga gnas pa'o/_/de'i phyag g.yas pa na ba dan rtse gsum pa dang ldan pa dang /_/rdo rje su tsi ka dang /_'bar ba'i 'khor lo'o/_/phyag g.yon pa na thod pa snying rje chen pos gang ba yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/phyag rgya chen po'i phyed krung 
[\[177a.7\]]gis za ba zhes bya ba ni stan mthon po la 'dug pa ste/_rkang pa g.yon pa sa la gzhag par bya ste/_de'i brla la g.yas pa'i rkang pas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi sbyor bas dgod do/_/de'i rkang pa'i mthil gyis yang g.yon pa'i brla mnyam par sbyor bar byed pa'i sbyor 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bas mnan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drag po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba rab tu thob par 'gyur te/_g.yon pa'i brlar rkang pa'i dgod pas mnyam par sbyor bar byed pas phye mar byas nas rab tu 
[\[177b.2\]]rgyas par khro bo'i sku de ni zhal steng du bsams nas/_der bsgrub par bya ba btung bar bya'o/_/de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal steng du bsgom par bya zhing /_zhabs g.yas pas de bzhin du rdo rje skyil mo krung gi sbyor bas bud med thams cad ji ltar 'dod pas blangs nas/_
[\[177b.3\]]brla g.yon pa bskyod pas de rnams dang mnyam par sbyor bar bya'o/_/yang na zhal gyi phyag rgya bsgrag par bya ste/_shar gyi re'u mig la ni dkar mo'i gdong zhi ba'o/_/g.yas su chom rkun ma'i gdong ni drag mo'o/_/rgyab tu rab tu rmongs ma ni bde ba'i myos byed kyis rab tu 
[\[177b.4\]]rmongs ma'i gdong ngo /_/g.yon du ro langs ma ni rengs ma'i gdong ma'o/_/me'i re'u mig la puk+ka sI ni gar gyi gdong ma'o/_/bden bral gyi re'u mig la ni gdol pa mo gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa'i sbyor bas thams cad du gus pa dang bcas pa'i gdong ma'o/_/rlung du g+hasma rI'i shi 
[\[177b.5\]]ba za ba sbyor ba'i gdong ma'o/_/dbang ldan du he ru ka lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma'o/_/dkar mo ni zhi ba'i lta stangs so/_/chom rkun ma ni drag mo'i lta stangs so/_/rab tu rmongs ma ni rab tu rmongs pa'i lta stangs so/_/ro langs ma ni shi ba slong ba'i lta stangs so/_/
[\[177b.6\]]puk+ka sI ni gar gyi lta stangs so/_/gdol pa mo ni steng du lta ba'o/_/g+hasmA rI ni 'og tu gdan la lta ba'o/_/me tog la dkar mo gzugs su bsams nas gang la byin pa de phyag rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa la ni chom rkun ma'i gzugs so/_/chang la ni rab tu rmongs ma'i 
[\[177b.7\]]gzugs so/_/chu la ni ro langs ma'i gzugs so/_/shing gi 'khril shing la ni puk+ka sI'o/_/ras la ni gtum mo'o/_/me la ni g+hasma rI ste rtse gcig ma'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas kun tu gnas so/_/de nas dkar mo de'i bsam gtan gyis kyang phyag rgyas gdab 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]par bya'o zhes sbyar ro/_/de ltar bya ba chom rkun mas rnying gnas drangs pa'i bsam gtan gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs te snying nas drang ngo /_/rab tu rmongs ma'i sbyor bas bde bas rmongs shing bsgrub bya rmongs par bsam par bya ste/_de ltar bde ba rab tu sbyin pas rab 
[\[178a.2\]]tu rmongs par byed pa'o/_/ro langs ma'i bsam gtan gyis bdud rtsi chu yis gtor bas shi ba slong bar byed do/_/puk+ka sI'i rnal 'byor gyis se gol gtogs pas gar byed do/_/steng du shin tu dbugs kyi bsam gtan gyis lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas gdol pa mos gsod 
[\[178a.3\]]par byed do/_/gdan gyi bza' bas g+hasma rI'i bsam gtan des bza' bar bya'o/_/dkar mos ni g.yon gyi lta stangs kyis bsgrub bya la bltas pas phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do/_/yid kyis bsgrub bya'i snying gar zhugs te/_de'i snying gi pad+ma lag pa g.yon pas 
[\[178a.4\]]'don cing 'gugs par byed do/_/chom rkun mas ni snying nas 'dren par byed do/_/rab tu rmongs mas ni yid kyis sam mngon sum du'o byed pas bde bas rab tu rmongs pas rab tu rmongs par byed do/_/ro langs ma ni yid kyis sam/_dngos su 'khyud nas 'chi ba slong 
[\[178a.5\]]bar byed do/_puk+ka sI'i rnal 'byor gyis gar byed pa ni yid kyis bsgrub bya dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas rang gis gar byed do/_yid kyis bsgrub bya dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas bde bas rmongs pas steng gi lta stangs byas te/_gtum mo'i rnal 'byor gyis gsod 
[\[178a.6\]]par byed do/_/g+hasma rI'i rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya khar bcug ste bca' zhing bza' bar bya'o/_/bza' bar bya zhes bya ba ni dgra bo thams cad shin tu rtag tu zos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad la ni 'jig rten gsum sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[178a.7\]]ming rnyed par 'gyur te/_de ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no/_/de nas gzhan du zhes bya ba ni mdzes pa dang /_snying rje'i stobs la sogs pa'i khro bo gzhan thams cad khro bo'i ro gcig par zhen pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]khro bo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ci lags/_gang gi don du gsungs/_lus la dam par lta ba dang /_srog dang gang zag la sogs pa bdag tu 'dzin pas smras pa'i brtags pa thams cad kyi mthar byed pa gshin rje'i rgyal po ste/_gsum byed pa de rnams kyis brtags 
[\[178b.2\]]pa'i 'khor lo las rgyal ba ni brtags pa thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub kyi dbang phyug yin no/_/khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba bshad par bya ste/_gang gi phyir khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nas bzung ste de thams cad rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis thal bar rlag 
[\[178b.3\]]par mdzad do/_/'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba la/_'dod chags chen po ni 'dod chags rdo rje ste de'i ngo bo can ni der brjod pa yin no/_/yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas 'dod chags can gyi rdo rjer 'gyur ba'i phyir dpyid lta bur me tog dri zhim po'i phreng ba dang /_snying po la sogs pas brgyan 
[\[178b.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir dang /_me tog gi gzhu dang mda' dang ldan pa'i phyir nga ni 'dod pa'o/_/sku gsum gyi mda' ni rnam dgod pa zhes bya ba ni spang leb kyi phub kyi dbus su yu~M kha~M dang /_o~M la sogs pa gsum dgod pa dang mda' dang lhan cig btsun mo'i spyi bor rdzas 'di rnams bsam 
[\[178b.5\]]par bya zhing 'dzag pa'i don du pad+ma'i mthar gsungs so/_/gal te 'dod pa zhu ba ni 'dod pa zhu ba lta bu'o/_/pad+ma zhes bya ba ni snying po ste/_e ba~M lta bur dbang du gyur pas 'dzag pa'o/_/'di skad la sogs mtha' yas mchog_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa mchog_/ces bcom ldan 
[\[178b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nyid kyis 
[\[178b.7\]]'byung ba yang dag par bka' stsal pa/_da ni bdag la bshad du gsol/_sna tshogs bris sku bkab pa zhes bya ba ni gdan rnams su brjod de/_de rnams kyis yar 'jug pa ni de'i don gyi rnal 'byor te/_bris sku'i 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ro/_/de bas na rang 'byung bar byed do/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]yang dag par rab tu gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/pad+ma'i snod ces bya ba 'di ni mi'i thod par shes par bya'o/_/da ni yang khyod la btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs bshad par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ni zlum po'o/_/he ru ka'i 
[\[179a.2\]]zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs zhes bya ba'i don to/_/pad+ma'i rnam pa dang /_rin po che'i rnam par shes par bya'o/_/ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dun pa'o/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rdo rje dang /_pad+ma dang /_rin po che 
[\[179a.3\]]dang /_ral gri'i gdan gyi dbus su sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan no/_/phyi nas rta mchog gi gzugs brnyan gzhug par bya ste/_rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin no/_/ji ltar thob pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rnyed pa 
[\[179a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad skyes pa de nyid kyi yo byad kyis bri bar bya'o/_/dus ji lta bar zhes bya ba ni zhi bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gdan de bri bar bya'o/_/rgyas pa'i don du rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma 
[\[179a.5\]]shar ba na bri bar bya'o/_/mngon spyod kyi las rnams la nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la'o/_/gzhan pa'i las la pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma bsnyur na'o/_/ji ltar bde ba zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang /_dbang bskur ba la dus kyi nges pa yod pa ma yin no/_/
[\[179a.6\]]shar dang /_lho dang /_byang dang /_nub kyi phyogs su thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad du'o/_/yongs su gang ba'i dbang zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang thams cad do/_/slob ma mchog 'bring tha ma kun/_/zhes bya ba ni tha ma la ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang dang /_
[\[179a.7\]]nyin par gyi thig le'o/_/'bring po la ni nya phyis kyis so/_/gang zhig mchog de rnams la ni sangs rgyas gcig pu'i bdag nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o/_/dum bu gcig pa'i mgo skyes bya ba ni dum bu gcig pa dang /_mgo bo'i rdo rje ni dum bu gcig pa'i mgo skyes so/_
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa dum bu gcig pa'i bdag nyid kyis dbang yang bya'o/_/mgo skyes zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i snod do/_/dum bu gcig pa ni dum bu gcig pa ste/_ma gas pa dang ma chag pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rtogs par bya'o/_/ka~M ni phung po skyong bar byed pa'i phyir 
[\[179b.2\]]thod pa'o/_/de bzhin du gsungs pa/_sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub/_/pad+ma gcig bdag de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje'i rin po che'i dbang ngo /_/dpal he ru ka ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo /_/'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang ni nor bu'i dbang 
[\[179b.3\]]dang /_der bzlas par yang bya'o/_/rin po che'i phyed pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ni nor bu'i dbang du shes par bya'o/_/rta mchog gi yang ngo /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje sems dpar yang shes par bya'o/_/thod pa'i 
[\[179b.4\]]gdan 'di'i 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba gang zhe na/_rang bzhin nyid de'i grub pa rab tu byung bas rang bzhin las rab tu 'byung ba'i nus pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skabs med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir de nyid du gyur pa'i rab tu 'byung bas de ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'o/_/
[\[179b.5\]]thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin las zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las de ltar gsungs pa yin no/_/dper na me ni tsha ba'i rang bzhin du grub pa ste/_de ltar de'i yang rab tu 'byung ba nyid las rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_de nyid 
[\[179b.6\]]kyi bzang po'i bsam pa'i rnal 'byor byas nas ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig gcig pa'i dngos pos de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtogs par bya'o/_/rang gi snying ga'i zla bar hU~M blos bris nas de brjod par bya ste/_bdag 
[\[179b.7\]]nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o/_/de nyid kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid do/_/de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga par hU~M yang bsgom mo/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug cing der yang rdo rje sems dpar 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]bskyed nas bkug ste/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol ba dang /_ji ltar spyan la sogs pa'i sprul pa yang bzhugs par bya zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang rang gi rigs kyi 'byung ba'i sbyor ba la blta bar bya 
[\[180a.2\]]ste/_'dis ni yang rab tu sbyor bas gang zhig de rnams skye ba de ni nyi ma dang zla ba 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/phyir rol dang nang gi bdag nyid las yi ge lngar 'gyur ba'i phyir lha mo thams cad gnyis las skyed pa dang rdzogs pa'o/_/las thams cad rab tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i cho ga'o/_/
[\[180a.3\]]la la zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba'o/_/rang gi sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems so/_/byang chub tu btab pa'i sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/de'i spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste/_ji ltar sems dpa' yang dag par rnyed nas rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir rjes su 'gro 
[\[180a.4\]]ba'o/_/rgyal bar byed pa dang /_sbrang rtsir byed pa dang /_don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i ming po gsum gyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'i tshul gyis sems can gyi don byed de/_de nyid sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'gyur zhing /_rdul dang /_mun pa dang /_snying stobs kyang sems can gyi 
[\[180a.5\]]don du 'gyur te/_gang zhig rnam par dag pa de ni kun tu bzang po'o/_/de bas na byang chub kyi spyod pa 'di ni ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin no/_/khab nas gsal bar 'byung ba'am zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[180a.6\]]dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs pa ste/_bsod nams kyi phung po de'i nyi zer gyi rdul ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams so/_/de rnams kyi rdul ni dpe byad bzang po rnams so/_/gsal bar gyur pa de gang zhe na/_gsal ba ni khyad par du yon tan la 
[\[180a.7\]]sogs pa 'dzin pa ste/_byang chub chen po'i mchod pa ni de rnams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/bdud kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slu ba ni skyes pa'i bdud de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems gsod pa'i phyir bdud ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o/_/bdud 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bzhi bcom pa dang ldan zhing bdud las rgyal bar kha cig tu shAkya thub par gyur pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa tshar gcad pa'i phyir thar pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gang zag tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang /_nyan thos 
[\[180b.2\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'dzin pa tshar gcad pa'i phyir/_de ltar chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas ji ltar gyur pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir thar pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yin te/_'di'i don du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[180b.3\]]skor bar mdzad pa'o/_/bdag tu lta ba rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'dod chags rnam pa thams cad dang /_de'i rnam par dag pa ste/_de kho na la bdag mi dmigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_de'i don du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po ni pad+ma gar gyi 
[\[180b.4\]]dbang phyug yin no/_/dga' ldan gyi lha thams cad kyi mthar thug pa la 'khor lo dam pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa'i mchog ni lha'i 'khor lo dam pa'o/_/'di lta ste yang ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa zhes bya ba la 'dus pa ni/_
[\[180b.5\]]tshogs pa'o/_/bde ba can zhes bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ldan te/_rigs kyi bu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu'o/_/dper na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pas brgyan pa'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gar 
[\[180b.6\]]gyi dbang phyug dang /_dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med pas kun tu bskor bas/_de ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu ste/_de'i don du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sgrol ba po 'byung ba yin no/_/sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa po 
[\[180b.7\]]dang /_len pa po mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pas ser sna spang ba'i phyir don dam par rnam par dag pa de'i don du ser sna can gyi sems can rnams 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu sbyin pa la sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/nyi ma lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po ni nyi 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las snying po bskyed pa'i phyir gang gi 'di ni de de bzhin du gsungs so/_/dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed pa ni sems can thams 
[\[181a.2\]]cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs par gsol ba 'debs pa de rnams kyi bsam pa de rab tu sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa skong bar byed pa ste/_de'i phyir bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' la glang po la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che thams cad kyi 
[\[181a.3\]]char 'bebs pa zhes bya ba ni rin po che bdun gyi char 'bebs pa'o/_/de'i don du sgrol ma 'byung ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no/_/shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa zhes bya ba ni le lo la sogs pa'o/_/stobs kyi rnal 'byor ni grags pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[181a.4\]]ro/_/de bas na stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dag pa ni drag shul gyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dag pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas ni de'i don du stobs kyi rnal 'byor rnam par dag pas rta mchog 'byung ba yin te/_/rta mgrin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dpung 
[\[181a.5\]]pa bzhi dang lag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni phyag brgyad pa lta bu'o/_/zhabs bzhi zhes bya ba ni g.yon brkyang ba'i sbyor ba'o/_/de nas g.yas pa'i zhabs gcig gis ni mi'i dngos grub kyi dpal mo mnan to/_/gnyis pas ni lha mo sha tsi dang dga' ma mnan pa'o/_/g.yon gyi dang 
[\[181a.6\]]pos ni mig gsum pa dang khyab 'jug go/_/gnyis pas ni tshangs pa dang 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas bzhugs so/_/dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug rta mchog gis ni 'jig rten gsum po lha chen po la sogs pa de rnams bsdus nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa 
[\[181a.7\]]rnams kyis rnam par btul ba gang zhig rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad bsgral nas/_de'i dkyil 'khor du lha chen pos bla ma la dka' zlog ma yon du phul nas phyung ba ni rim pa ji lta bar gru bzhi sgo bzhi par thig gdab par bya zhing sgeg mo la sogs pas 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]yongs su gang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dkyil 'khor gyi tshad gang gis thig gdab par bya zhe na/_nang du khru gang zhes bya ba ni dbus su khru gang ste dang /_phyi rol du khru gang nyid dang /_'phar ma gsum pa khru gnyis pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/zla ba'i 
[\[181b.2\]]dkyil 'khor lta bu zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zlum po yin no zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum po sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to/_/da ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgom pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sgom pa bshad par bya ste/_de la re zhig 
[\[181b.3\]]dang por tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa ni srid pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro/_/rmongs pa las bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa ni lus la tshul bzhin ma yin pa sgom pa ste/_de yongs su brtags pas gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi bden pa 
[\[181b.4\]]la 'jug pa'o/_/de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal te/_de dang lhan cig zag pa med pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi sdug bsngal gang zhig lta ba'i phyir/_tshor 
[\[181b.5\]]ba ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyir de yongs su brtags pas kun 'byung gi bden pa la 'jug go/_/bdag gi dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i sems de yongs su brtags pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa la 'jug go/_/bdag tu lta ba gcod pas rtogs pa'i phyir chos la brtags 
[\[181b.6\]]pas gang zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i phyir lam gyi bden pa la 'jug go/_/de ltar dang por bden pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa rnam par gzhag par bya ste/_de nas 
[\[181b.7\]]yang dag par spong ba'i sgom pa yongs su shes la/_gang gi phyir mthun pa'i phyogs dang /_mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad du de rtogs na brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi po 'di rab tu rtsom mo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pas mthun pa'i phyogs dang 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su shes nas mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi yang dag par rab tu rtsom ste/_sdig pa mi 
[\[182a.2\]]dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir zhes rgyas par gong du gsungs so/_/las nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni de la don thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir/_skyon lnga spang ba dang /_'du byed brgyad bsten pa de'i phyir yongs su shes pas brtson 'grus kyi sgom 
[\[182a.3\]]pas sems gnas pa'i las nyid do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni don thams cad yang dag par 'phel ba'i rgyu'i phyir gnas pa ni 'dir sems kyi ting nge 'dzin du rig par bya'o/_/de nas yang dag par spong ba'i mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de yang las nyid de/_skyon 
[\[182a.4\]]lnga spang ba dang /_'du byed brgyad bsgoms pas rig par bya'o/_/skyon lnga gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la le lo dang /_shes bzhin ma yin pa dang /_rmugs pa dang /_bying ba dang /_rgod pa nyid de/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /_de 
[\[182a.5\]]nas mngon par 'du bya ba skyon lnga spang bar lnga po 'di rnams brjod do/_/de la bying ba dang /_rgod pas skyon gcig byed de/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ni bying ba dang rgod pa 'jug pa'i dus su skyon no/_/mngon par 'du byas pas rab tu zhi ba la 'di rnams spang ba'i phyir ji 
[\[182a.6\]]ltar spang zhing 'du byed brgyad rnam par gzhag ce na/_bzhi yis le lo spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang /_rtsol ba dang /_dad pa dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa de rnams yang rim pa ji lta bar rig par bya'o/_/gnas dang de nas gnas pa dang /_de'i mtshan ma dang 'bras bu nyid de 
[\[182a.7\]]gnas ni 'dun pa'o/_/gnas pa ni rtsol ba'o/_/de'i gnas 'dun pa'i mtshan ma ni dad pa ste/_yid ches pa dang /_dad pa dang /_'dod pa'o/_/de'i gnas pa stsol pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_'dun pa dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]khyad par rtogs par bya'o/_/lhag ma spong ba'i 'du byed bzhi ni dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_sems pa dang /_btang snyoms te/_grangs ji lta bar skyon bzhi'i gnyen po'i phyogs so/_/de yang dran pa la sogs pa'i rim pa de bzhin du rig par bya ste/_dmigs 
[\[182b.2\]]pa ni rmugs pa med pas bying ba dang /_rgod pas rjes su rtogs par bya zhing /_de gnyis kyi mngon par 'du byed pa zhi ba la shin tu sbyangs pas 'byung ngo /_/dran pa ni dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas shes bzhin te/_rmugs pa med par gyur na bying ba dang rgod pa rjes su rtogs 
[\[182b.3\]]so/_/ma rtogs pa de rtogs par bya ba'i don to/_/mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems kyis bying ba dang /_rgod pa zhi ba la dam pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa'i sems kyis btang snyoms so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mthar dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po de rnams kyi rnam par 
[\[182b.4\]]gzhag pa ci ltar dgod ce na/_thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa gang zhig 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag po dang /_dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas brjed pa med pa'i bdag po'o/_/bdag po zhes bya ba ni sgyur bar byed pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i las ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[182b.5\]]thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa ni gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'dun pa'i bdag po dang /_rab tu sbyor ba'i bdag po dang /_dmigs pa ni rmugs pa med pa'i bdag po dang /_brjed pa med pa'i bdag po dang /_rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag po ste/_rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du dad pa 
[\[182b.6\]]la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po rnams rig par bya'o/_/de la za ba po dang /_bza' bar bya ba stong pa bka' stsal pa/_nang gi skye mched rnams nas brtsams te/_phyi rol gyi bza' ba stong pa nyid dang /_de'i lus kyi za ba po dang /_bza' ba dag gang zhig byin gyis 
[\[182b.7\]]brlabs pa'i lus de'i stong pa nyid la'ang lta zhing skyo bas 'du byed spong bar byed de/_dge ba mi zad pa dang /_gang yang khyad par du bltas pas nang dang phyi rol stong pa nyid du gsungs so/_/rab tu gnas pa'i dngos po snod kyi 'jig rten rgyas pa'i phyir de'i stong pa nyid 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsungs so/_/de yang nang gi skye mched rnams la sogs pa gang gis stong pa nyid mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis de'i stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/ji ltar don dam pa'i rnam pas mthong ba de'i stong pa nyid ni 
[\[183a.2\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/de'i don du yang byang chub sems dpas rab tu spyod do/_/de'i stong pa nyid kyi don ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba gnyis 'thob pa'i don du dge ba'i 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas gnyis so/_/
[\[183a.3\]]rtag tu sems can la phan pa'i phyir dang /_sems can la shin tu phan pa'i don du 'khor ba mi spang ba'i phyir/_de'i stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba stong pa nyid du ma mthong bas skyo ste/_'khor ba yongs su spong 
[\[183a.4\]]bar byed kyang /_gang yang dge ba mi zad pas na khyad par du lta bas mya ngan las 'das par yang mi byed cing de'i stong pa nyid spong bar yang mi byed de/_'di ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/_/rigs kyang rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la/_rigs ni rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid do/_/
[\[183a.5\]]mtshan dang dpe byad thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang /_dpe byad dang bcas par thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu spyod de/_khyad par du stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa spyang 
[\[183a.6\]]ba'i phyir/_re zhig stong pa nyid bcu bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o/_/yang 'dir stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_chos dang gang zag gi don dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de/_de'i phyir de las byung ba don dam pa'i dngos po ni der de stong pa nyid dang /_pha rol gyi chos dang gang zag dngos po med pa stong pa 
[\[183a.7\]]nyid las byung ba'i don dam pa'i dngos po'o/_der ji skad gsungs pa'i zab po la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug tu mtshan nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhung gnyis kyi stong pa nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/_chos dang gang 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]zag la yang dag par 'jug pa de'i stong pa nyid ji snyed pa yongs su spang ba'i don du rim pa ji lta ba de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba shes bar bya'o/_/ji ltar sgrub pa rnam par shes par bya zhe na/_gal te 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[183b.2\]]gal te 'di rnam par dag par ma gyur na brtsam pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro/_/gal te chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid blo bur gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/_mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dngos po med pa'i phyir 
[\[183b.3\]]'bad pa med pa nyid du sems can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ma skyes pa'i yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rnam par dag par ma gyur te/_thar pa'i don du rtsom pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa 
[\[183b.4\]]can ma yin pa dang /_dag pa dang ma dag pa nyid sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir de ji ltar na nyon mongs pa yang ma yin zhing ma dag pa yang ma yin no/_/nyon mongs pa blo bur gyi phyir/_ji ltar nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'ang ma yin zhing /_dag pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ltar stong 
[\[183b.5\]]pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye bas gsungs so/_/de la stong pa nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don bsgrubs pa yin no/_/yang gsungs pa/_'dod chags kyi gnyen por mi sdug pa la sogs pa dang /_zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa dang /_gti mug gi gnyen por rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/
[\[183b.6\]]de la ji ltar 'dod chags rnam par ldog ce na/_gal te de dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na/_yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no/_/de bzhin du gsungs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu e ma ho/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[183b.7\]]thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi ye shes ni rnyog pa med pa ste/_'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom nas bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/'dod chags la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang bcas pa ste/_gzhan du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'dod chags rnyed pa 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]yin na de'i 'dod chags la sogs pa yongs su mi spong bar spyod na/_'on te rim pa'i khyad par las yon tan gyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na ke ta ka'i me tog dri'i glang po ches zos na gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro/_/glang po che phal pas zos na 
[\[184a.2\]]lci ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de la ke ta ka'i me tog gi skyon ma yin te/_de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa la gnas pas bsam pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba las/_khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi 'bras bu smin par byed do/_/dper na 'o ma la 
[\[184a.3\]]sbrul la sogs pas 'thungs na dug gi dngos por 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang skyes bus 'thungs na bdud rtsi'i dngos por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu 'dod chags la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir sbyor bas dngos po khyad 
[\[184a.4\]]par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang de'i 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'byung ngo /_/dper na ke ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pa la gnas pa 'dod 
[\[184a.5\]]chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA yas+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba 
[\[184a.6\]]dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_/slad nas kyang bod kyi lots+tsha ba gzhan rnams gzhan gyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas/_rang gi ming bcug cing gzhan gyi ming 'phyi 
[\[184a.7\]]ba de dag dang /_mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir/_slad nas kyang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang /_dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//_//
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]{D383}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI gu h+ya badzra tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo mi gsung ba/_/bdag gis zab 
[\[184b.2\]]mo'i don ma rtogs/_/de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring /_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin tu zab/_/rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa/_/khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad/_/gsang ba 
[\[184b.3\]]rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags/_/de yi rdo rje ji ltar lags/_/de yi pad+ma ji ltar lags/_/bcom 
[\[184b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/_/gsang ba'i pho brang dang po ste/_/de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir/_/gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste/_/bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir/_/gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste/_/de yi mgrin 
[\[184b.5\]]par gnas pa'i phyir/_/bzhi pa gsang ba bde skyong ste/_/sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yin/_/de rnams don ni gsang ba ste/_/brtul zhugs byed cing gtong phod che/_/e ba~M zab cing chags la dga'/_/khu ba 'dzag cing rak+ta 'bab/_/'di la ston gyis gzhan la 
[\[184b.6\]]gsang /_/rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba/_/bzhi po gnas pa'i rten yin te/_/dper na khang rten ka ba bzhin/_/rgyud kyi don ni rgyun yin no/_/gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sel ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[184b.7\]]re re'i dbye ba ma 'tshal bas/_/'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du lhung /_/'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi bzad pas/_/bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug_/'dab ma'i grangs ni nyis 'gyur ro/_/rta 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes/_/gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis/_/brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no/_/rig pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga/_/rigs ni me tog lta bu'o/_/b+ha ga rab 'bring gsum yin te/_/rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya/_/
[\[185a.2\]]sman dang snum gyi ril bu yis/_/rnal 'byor sor mo la bskus la/_/gzhang kha nas ni phye mas bdug_/gsang ba nas kyang snum gyis bdug_/de nas rnal 'byor pho'am mos/_/rtse de sor mos legs par btsal/_/ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas/_/sor brgyad 
[\[185a.3\]]par ni gar gnas pa/_/shes rab b+ha ga che chung dang /_/de bzhin b+ha ga grang dro dang /_/chu rnams che zhing bde ba chung /_/de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis/_/b+ha ga che na bde ba chung /_/b+ha ga che na chung ngu bya/_/chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs/_/grang na de bzhin bsro 
[\[185a.4\]]bar bya/_/chu rnams che na chung bar bya/_/'di 'dra'i b+ha ga gang la yod/_/bud med 'di la b+ha ga mnga'/_/de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das/_/thabs kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang /_/ring ba dang ni thung ba ste/_/shes rab ji bzhin thabs la'o/_/de yi gnas su gzung bar bya/_/
[\[185a.5\]]gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/e ba~M rnam pa'i dbus gang du/_/bde ba'i khyad par tshol ba la/_/'di las khyad par med dam ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[185a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_/shin tu dben pa'i gnas btsal la/_/bza' ba bcud can sna tshogs dang /_/btung ba zhim po mang po dang /_/gur kum la sogs dri zhim dang /_/shin tu 'jam pa'i stan bting la/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru/_/dri zhim thig le re re bya/_/
[\[185a.7\]]rnal 'byor pha yi gnas lnga ru/_/de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya/_/de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/_/e las gru gsum gting ring bsam/_/de yi nang du pa~M las ni/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam/_/de yi dbus su 'khor lo bsam/_/'khor lo'i 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]dbus su reg mi bzod/_/de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang /_/hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga bsam/_/oM las rdo rje mgo bor bsam/_/phaT las rdo rje bu ga bsam/_/de nas bde ba'i stan thog tu/_/sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste/_/yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos/_/'khor lo nyi shu rtsa 
[\[185b.2\]]dgu la/_/chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byug_/bde ba skye ba'i zas zos nas/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/thabs kyis gnas dgur 'o yang bya/_/shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya/_/thabs kyis shes rab pad+ma la/_/'o byas pad+ma rgyas su gzhug_/shes rab kyis 
[\[185b.3\]]kyang de bzhin no/_/chags pa skye ba'i rtags 'byung ste/_/de nas gcig gis gcig 'khyud nas/_/he ru ka dang phag mor bsam/_/shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas/_/thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyod nas/_/nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir/_/shes rab ma 
[\[185b.4\]]la rtags gsum 'byung /_/lus 'dar 'phar ba sku yi rtags/_/mi bzod skad 'don ngag gi rtags/_/shes pa brgyal ba thugs kyi rtags/_/de la ngo bor bshad pa'i phyir/_/'di ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te/_/'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong /_/nad 
[\[185b.5\]]kyi zug rngu thams cad 'joms/_/'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa min/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la gnas/_/sbyin sreg la sogs bya ba min/_/gsang ba'i rdo rje rgyud 'di ni/_/kun gyis thos par mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[185b.6\]]glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis bya/_/glegs bam gsang ba'i gnas su sba/_/yongs su smin pa'i rnal 'byor ma/_/'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la sba/_/gsang ba ston pa'i bla ma ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu/_/
[\[185b.7\]]gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas nas/_/lnga bcu nas bzung stong gi bar/_/rnal 'byor ma kun bde med kyang /_/sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyod byas nas/_/bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam/_/sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor pas/_/rlung mkhris bad kan kun 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]nas skye/_/shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste/_/sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab ma/_/thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya/_/sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gsang la bsten/_/lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[186a.2\]]gsang la bsten pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ming sring tshul lam rje 'bangs tshul/_/pha spad tshul lam mkhan slob tshul/_/gzhan gyis mi rig ngo tsha bsrung /_/dben pa'i gnas su sbyor ba bya/_/gal te ma bsten dam tshig 
[\[186a.3\]]nyams/_/tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar ltung /_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar lags/_/bde ba khyad med ji ltar lags/_/phyag rgya ma bsten ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bde ba la 
[\[186a.4\]]gnas gsang ba'i don/_/khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad/_/sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor dang /_/stan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste/_/'dod chags bsam pa yang mi bya/_/gal te de 'dra bsten gyur na/_/'jig rten phal pa'i 'dod chags te/_/
[\[186a.5\]]shi nas mnar med dmyal bar skye/_/'dod chags spyod pa shal ma ri/_/lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa/_/yar la 'dzeg cing mar la 'bab/_/thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba 'bod/_/de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bsten/_/sbyor thabs las ni bde ba skye/_/de 
[\[186a.6\]]phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags/_/bde ba thabs med lus zungs nyams/_/rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skye/_/las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu bsten/_/phyag rgya ma bsten dam tshig nyams/_/phyag rgya bsten pa'i dus su yang /_/rnal 'byor ming sring brda yis mtshon/_/
[\[186a.7\]]gang zhig 'dzub mo ston pa na/_/'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin/_/sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang /_/mthe bo drang por ston pa dang /_/de bzhin srin lag drang por ston/_rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste/_/pad+ma kak+ko la zhes bya/_/de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams/_/brda yi bye 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]brag ma lus pa/_/sam+bu Ta ru zhes par bya/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/rdo rje pad+ma dga' ba'i gnas/_/de ru gzung ba ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis/_/rab kyi dbugs dang shes pas 
[\[186b.2\]]gzung /_/dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas gzung /_/sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru gzung /_/gcig ni sbom po khro mos gzung /_/gzung ba'i rten ni rnam pa bzhi/_/man ngag can gyis shes par bya/_/gal te de ru ma zin na/_/'khor bar ltung bas rang gis su/_/ting nge 
[\[186b.3\]]'dzin gyi ha~M la bsdu/_/lce yis byang chub sems blangs la/_/ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim/_/de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' zhig gam/_/thabs kyi bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gam/_/
[\[186b.4\]]rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma/_/bde ba khyad par med dam ci/_/bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod/_/sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis bya/_/de las bde ba khyad par 'phags/_/
[\[186b.5\]]dper na dar dang snal ma bzhin/_/thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong /_/shes rab dar gyi sham bu tsam/_/de phyir rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud/_/rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs/_/rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas/_/rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur 
[\[186b.6\]]dang /_/mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang /_/khrus dang bsrung ba la sogs pa/_/gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med/_/'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste/_/ye shes lnga yi spros dang bral/_/de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams 
[\[186b.7\]]'dod chags kyi the tshom yongs su zad nas/_bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i ros gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/gsang ba'i yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ra rat+na badzra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[187a.2\]{D384}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshin+da tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[187a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon gyi phyogs nas skor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod 
[\[187a.4\]]nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags/_/rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags/_/de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gsang ba 
[\[187a.5\]]zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/_/dang po bum dbang dang 'brel ba'i/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te/_/rten dang brten par bsgom pa ni/_/snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams/_/spang phyir nga yis gsungs pa yin/_/de yi khyad par dgongs pa'i don/_/dang po 
[\[187a.6\]]stong nyid la sogs pa/_/rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs/_/rten dang brten pa'i bye brag la/_/dang po rten gyi dgongs pa yang /_/thugs ka'i yi ge hU~M las ni/_/mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul/_/kha dog nag po'i e 'phros pas/_/gru gsum rgya che 
[\[187a.7\]]gting ring bsam/_/gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/_/dug gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don/_/logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te/_/lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i/_/mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don/_/chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis/_/rang 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab/_/de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don/_/'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /_/chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas/_/gting ring ba ru dgongs pas bshad/_/de nas thugs ka'i hU~M las yang /_/
[\[187b.2\]]hU~M 'phros pa las rdo rjer gyur/_/rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang /_/dang po tshe yi bar chad dang /_/gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chad de/_/bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/phyi yi bgegs dang nang gi bgegs/_/phyi yis tshe yi bar chad byed/_/nang gis thar pa'i 
[\[187b.3\]]bar chad byed/_/bar chad rnam pa gnyis bsrung ba/_/rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don/_/ya~M las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra/_/dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste/_/rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang /_/mi rtog pa ni skye ba la/_/dbang du byed pas dbang gi don/_/ba dan 
[\[187b.4\]]bzhi yi dgongs pa yang /_/chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi/_/dgongs pa yin par nga yis gsungs/_/ra~M las me yi dkyil 'khor ni/_/zur gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yin/_/rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don/_/ba~M las chu yi dkyil 'khor te/_/
[\[187b.5\]]zlum po spros pa zhi bar gsungs/_/bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi/_/la~M las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/_/gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga/_/de steng ri rab rtse mo brgyad/_/rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin/_/snod bcud rnam rtog mi 
[\[187b.6\]]mnga'i rtags/_/dur khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du dgod par bya/_/re re'i bye brag rnam rtog yang /_/bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/_/gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas/_/shing rnams rim bzhin rtag tu dgod/_/rnam rtog 
[\[187b.7\]]mi dge bcu yi don/_/'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dgod/_/'dod chags zhe sdang ma rig pa/_/gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod/_/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_/gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis/_/lus dang ngag gi sems can gyis/_/
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod/_/nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no/_/de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang /_/snyan nas brgyud pa shes par bya/_/de nas nang du gzhal yas khang /_/b+h+ru~M las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de/_/rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi 
[\[188a.2\]]dngos/_/yongs su gyur pas rnam snang sku/_/phyi nas bltas pas nang du gsal/_/de bzhin nang nas phyi ru ste/_/thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don/_/tshon chen sna lnga sku lnga'i don/_/kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don/_/gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs/_/
[\[188a.3\]]logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste/_/sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag yin/_/ka ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad/_/gdung bzhi ye shes bzhi yi don/_/twa ra Nal sogs pa kun/_/stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs/_/de nas nang du gdan rnams ni/_/pad+ma'i sa bon 
[\[188a.4\]]dbyangs las skyes/_/'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis/_/ma gos rtags su pad+ma'i gdan/_/de steng nyi ma zla ba ste/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda/_/dang po ro ni nga bdag gam/_/rnam rtog 'joms phyir gsungs pa yin/_/yan lag bzhi ldan 
[\[188a.5\]]gtso bo'i gdan/_/'khor la re re gdan du sbyin/_/gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir/_/dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yis/_/rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o/_/de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni/_/skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te/_/skad cig las byung rdzus pa'i tshul/_/
[\[188a.6\]]dper na chu gting las ni nya/_/rkyen las skyes pa drod gsher skyes/_/dper na nyi mas pad+ma bzhin/_/spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul/_/dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no/_/sbyor ba las byung mngal skyes tshul/_/yar la sreg cing mar la gso/_/dper na spra tshil 
[\[188a.7\]]las ni gzugs/_/pho brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs/_/rjes su skyed pa he ru ka/_/dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa/_/bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin/_/mchod pa don yod grub pa'o/_/bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med/_/yan lag drug las byung ba yi/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/de nas bzlas pa'am bsgom pa ni/_/dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i ste/_/rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/bsgom pa'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs/_/'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin/_/tha mas dbu ma'i spyan la 
[\[188b.2\]]'jug_/dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas/_/sum cu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgom/_/'bring po yis kyang de bzhin te/_/gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung /_/bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs/_/zab pa sngags dang thig le dang /_/mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun/_/
[\[188b.3\]]'di yis bstan pa shin tu zab/_/gong du gsungs pa thams cad kyang /_/rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya/_/re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/_/du ma'i tshul ni shin tu zab/_/phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don/_/phyi la ltos nas nang 
[\[188b.4\]]yin te/_/de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don/_/las su rung ba mthar phyin don/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni/_/nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams la/_/re re lha ru byin brlabs la/_/lnga 'am drug gam sum cu bdun/_/
[\[188b.5\]]g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs/_/bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba'i/_/yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar lags/_/bskyed pa zhes bya ji ltar lags/_/de yi rim pa ji ltar lags/_/gzhan 
[\[188b.6\]]yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_/thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar lags/_/lta spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug_/dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag rgyu/_/'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed/_/
[\[188b.7\]]de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i/_/rgyu ni gtso bor gyur pa yin/_/he ru kar gyur gcig la yang /_/rgyu rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_/gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/rgyu nor ba las ma yin te/_/gro las nas kyi myu gu min/_/
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ma tshang ba las ma yin te/_/'bru nyams pa las myu gu med/_/rgyu med pa las ma yin te/_/nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri/_/rgyu de rkyen med pa las min/_/nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin/_/de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan 
[\[189a.2\]]pa'i/_/las dang po yis rnam rtog spang /_/lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas/_/bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin/_/phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha/_/de yi rim par bshad pa yin/_rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang /_/khyams dang bla gab med pa dang /_/
[\[189a.3\]]bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum/_/mos pa'i dbang du gsungs pa yin/_/'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis/_/nyin thun bzhi yi dbye ba yi/_/nyin mtshan bzhi ru gsungs pa yin/_/mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya/_/dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba 
[\[189a.4\]]dang /_/thun brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/thun dang mtshams ni mnyam par gsungs/_/mtshams kyi tshe na rnal 'byor pa/_/dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis/_/lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas la/_/mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul/_/
[\[189a.5\]]mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya/_/lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste/_/rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa las/_/rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang /_/gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba la/_/rgyan dang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnang /_/
[\[189a.6\]]rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs/_/pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs/_/spyod pa gnang ba nga yis gsungs/_/shes rab ye shes dang 'brel bas/_/gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste/_/khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnang /_/lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang /_/
[\[189a.7\]]spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis/_/'di ni gsang sngags dam sri ste/_/mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/_/de phyir lta med spyod pa spang /_/srin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o/_/spyod med lta ba'ang spang ba ste/_/dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing /_/phung sogs 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]rnam snang la sogs la/_/brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin/_/des na lta spyod zung du 'jug_/glang chen bzhengs kyang mnyam par bzhengs/_/glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs/_/rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa/_/bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/
[\[189b.2\]]de yi spyod pa ji ltar lags/_/de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung /_/rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun/_/gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs/_/dang por phyi yi bdud rtsi bsten/_/bdud 
[\[189b.3\]]rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la/_/lcags kyu lnga ni dgod pa ste/_/brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag_/si h+la mi bskyod lud skam blang /_/bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag_/he ru ka dang rnam snang dang /_/lud skam snying po blang bar bya/_/yar gyi ngo dang mar 
[\[189b.4\]]gyi ngo /_/brgyad dang bcu bzhi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/thams cad bzang po'i dus su gsungs/_/seng ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzang /_/lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med/_/'di ni sha yi sgrub pa'i rten/_/glang po glang po chen po ste/_/ke ta ka yi rgyu nyid las/_/
[\[189b.5\]]gla rtsi la sogs 'byung ba'i sha/_/ba lang gi wang ldan pa'i sha/_/rta ni rta yi rgyal po ste/_/kha dog dkar min dmar ba min/_/dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha/_/mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha/_/lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtags/_/bza' ba'i snod 
[\[189b.6\]]ni dum bu gcig_/de yi nad du bsgrub par bya/_/rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan ma ni/_/'bar dang dud pa spro ba rnams/_/mtshan ma phyi yi yin par bshad/_/gzhan skyes don ni rgas chen sel/_/skad ma phyin na dngos grub med/_/skad phyung bas ni tshangs par 
[\[189b.7\]]'gyur/_/nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin/_/dril can bu ga dgu lam nas/_/'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas/_/til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste/_/a ba d+hU tIr dbugs chud pas/_/steng gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin/_/si h+la ga bur dbus na gnas/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]'og gi drug pa rgyu ba yin/_/'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste/_/skra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong /_/spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis/_/gang zag mchog dang las dang po/_/bskyed pa'i rim par legs gnas shing /_/rigs su 
[\[190a.2\]]'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir/_/phyi yi drug pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin/_/las dang po la phyi nang gnyis/_/'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/_/skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas/_/lnga pa goms par gyur pa yis/_/drug pa gzung bar 
[\[190a.3\]]gsungs pa ste/_/kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas/_/sor bzhi nas ni dbus su bzhugs/_/lte ba'i gnas su dbugs gnas pa/_/steng gi drug pa zin pa yin/_/'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/_/sred pa med cing yang ba'o/_/'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du/_/
[\[190a.4\]]nam mkhar 'phur zhing ltung ba med/_/mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa/_/'og gi drug pa yin par bshad/_/gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin/_/'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste/_/dril can bu ga 'gag par byed/_/rgyan gyi dang po zhe sdang 'joms/_/
[\[190a.5\]]dur khrod chen po sih+la ling /_/ru dra 'dul ba'i rim pa ste/_/bdud rtsis rnam rtog la sogs 'joms/_/phrin las bzhi ni thun mong yin/_/phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu/_/gang zag 
[\[190a.6\]]mchog ni ji lta bu/_/'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag_/dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni/_/lnga pa nam mkha' 'byung ba yin/_/lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste/_/
[\[190a.7\]]drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin/_/dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'/_/bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas/_/lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung /_/bde chen rang bzhin med pa dag_/'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin/_/de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang /_/bzhi pa 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]sngon du song ba yis/_/lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgom/_/dper na zangs kyi dngos po la/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis/_/zangs nyid gser du gyur pa ste/_/zangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang /_/lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[190b.2\]]kyis kyang ma gsungs so/_/lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed/_/nyin zhag dus drug dus gnyis la/_/skad cig re tsam drug la 'byung /_/las dang po yi spyod yul min/_/dper na chu yi snod nang du/_/bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig gzhag pa/_/chu ru nyams su 
[\[190b.3\]]myong ba las/_/cig shos nyams su myong ba med/_/chu la brten nas bdud rtsi yang /_/nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/_/de bzhin spros bcas lnga pa la/_/brten nas spros med drug pa 'byung /_/rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs/_/mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad 
[\[190b.4\]]dam/_/sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan/_/las kyi phyag rgya yongs su spangs/_/ye shes phyag rgya la gnas shing /_/phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa/_/'di ni gang zag mchog yin te/_/'di yis drug pa zin par bshad/_/'dod chags zhes pa 'khor 
[\[190b.5\]]ba ste/_/rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs/_/de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang /_/gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste/_/rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don/_/dang po lha yi nga rgyal bya/_/mkha' 'gro rtsa ru shes par bya/_/dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes/_/
[\[190b.6\]]'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang /_/de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas/_/tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshad/_/bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad yin te/_/sor gsum la ni 'khor lo re/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin/_/
[\[190b.7\]]dbang gi gnas dang 'khor lo'i gnas/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/tshangs mdo me la gzhang kha rlung /_/sor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pas brtag_/gnas gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin te/_/de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o/_/sor bzhi rta mgrin 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gnas yin te/_/sor brgyad gsang ba bde skyong gnas/_/rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma'i/_/lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las/_/sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad nyid las/_/brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas/_/bzhi bcu la ni 'khor lo 
[\[191a.2\]]gzhan/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/thams cad sgal tshigs dbyug gu ste/_/phyi dang nang du mkhas pas brtag_/'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis/_/dang por 'khor lo gnyis pa rtsa/_/rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang /_/dbang dang rnam pa bzhi ru 
[\[191a.3\]]gsungs/_/rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi/_/rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni gnyis/_/tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi/_/'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste/_/bla ma tshogs nang mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs/_/man ngag gzhan du spel zhing 'phyar la dga'/_/'dod chags 
[\[191a.4\]]spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod/_/gab pa'i don la rgyab phyogs skur pa 'debs/_/gsang sngags bar gcod rnal 'byor gzhan la gshe/_/'di ni mnar med sems dmyal chen por skye/_/sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig rdzogs tshe yi tshad/_/'di la sbas kyi thams cad 
[\[191a.5\]]la/_/nga yis sba bar ma gsungs te/_/de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni sbas/_/rgyud 'dir nga yis rgyas par bshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis las ni zung /_/bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin/_/
[\[191a.6\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams/_/brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o/_/spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor sbas/_/gsang ba bde skyong lte bar sbas/_/bcu drug las ni zung 'gyur ba/_/brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin/_/bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha/_/
[\[191a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas/_/bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su sbas/_/mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ru/_/ro drug la ni longs spyod pas/_/ro ma longs spyod 'khor lor sbas/_/rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas/_/
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]brgyad las g.yas g.yon cha gnyis cha/_/bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin/_/brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas/_/brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi/_/mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi cha/_/drug cu rtsa 
[\[191b.2\]]bzhi grangs su sbas/_/tshangs mdo'i me ni me la sbas/_/snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ru/_/chos kun rig pas rig pa sbas/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni zung /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi/_/bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin/_/
[\[191b.3\]]drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad/_/brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o/_/gzhang kha rlung ni rlung las sbas/_/gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas/_/'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi/_/phyi ru srog gi rnam par 'khyud/_/chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams/_/sna tshogs du mar 'bab 
[\[191b.4\]]byed kyang /_/rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur/_/lte bar rol pa bde chen sku/_/rnam par thar dang stong pa dang /_/de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/_/snying ga chos kyi sku yin te/_/rnam thar la sogs de bzhin no/_/mgrin pa longs spyod de dang 'dra/_/bde 
[\[191b.5\]]chen sprul ba'ang de bzhin no/_/mtshan rnams steng la stong pa 'og_/dang po'i bde chen kha sbyor yin/_/rnam thar steng la dpe byad 'og_/bde chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin/_/gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya/_/stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor bcu/_/rlung ni sgrol ma'i 
[\[191b.6\]]ngo bo ste/_/rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang /_/me ni gos dkar rang bzhin te/_/zur rtsa gsum ni drod kyis gang /_/rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la/_/brgyad dang lnga yi mtshan nyid la/_/brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad/_/lnga la kA li dang po lnga/_/rig pa'i 
[\[191b.7\]]pho brang mtha' can lnga/_/rta mgrin dbyangs yig g.yon dang g.yas/_/a gnyis mthar gzhag 'dab dgu yin/_/gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lo ni/_/ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus/_/byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun yin/_/de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang /_/
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]phyi yi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/_/sha la gnas nas tshil bu skyed/_/nang gi brgya dang nyi shu ni/_/tshil la gnas nas rkang skyed pa'o/_/gsang ba sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/rus par gnas shing ga pur skyed/_/de kho na yi rtsa gsum ni/_/
[\[192a.2\]]gsang bar gnas shing bde ba bskyed/_/khang pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/_/khang pa re la khang pa 'bum/_/khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te/_/grangs ni 'bum du shes par bya/_/nang dang gsang ba'i rtsa la yang /_/
[\[192a.3\]]srin bu'i rigs ni grangs su gsungs/_/de kho na yi rtsa gsum las/_/'dod chags skyed pa'i srin bu dgu/_/nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum/_/dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya/_/rtsa der gnas pa'i ga bur yang /_/bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba/_/
[\[192a.4\]]bdud rtsi la sogs gong du gsungs/_/ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /_/ra~M las me'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/de steng a las ka pA la/_/pa~M las pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam/_/nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/de ru sha la sogs pa dgod/_/
[\[192a.5\]]gtso bo'i steng du sor bzhi 'am/_/mtho gang tsam du bsam pa ni/_/yi ge go bzlog bsam par bya/_/sngon po dmar po dkar po ste/_/hU~M las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam/_/de stengs yi ge ma~M bsam la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du bsam/_/'di ni bdud 
[\[192a.6\]]rtsi'i kha sbyor ro/_/sha lnga las ni gdan lngar gyur/_/lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur/_/las kyi rlung gis me bus te/_/zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu/_/tha mal pa yi bdud rtsi yin/_/yi ge gsum dang nyi ma zhu/_/lha yi bdud rtsi zhes ni bya/_/'od 
[\[192a.7\]]zer gyis bkug ye shes kyi/_/bdud rtsi yin pa rang yis gsungs/_/lan gsum bskor ba sku gsung thugs/_/'di ni byin brlabs rnal 'byor ro/_/de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod/_/mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs/_/de nas rol pa'i rnal 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]'byor te/_/g.yas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya/_/de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor yang /_/mnyam pa'i rlung dang gtum mo'i mes/_/ye shes bzhi yi ngo bor gyur/_/cha gcig mi bskyod rnam snang ste/_/sha za'i mkha' 'gro mnyam pa nyid/_/cha gcig bya ba 
[\[192b.2\]]nan tan te/_/srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod/_/cha gcig rlung dang mkhris pa ste/_/mkhris pas bad kan la sogs pa/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ste/_/so sor kun rtog ye shes mchod/_/cha gcig rang bzhin med 
[\[192b.3\]]pa ste/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchod par mdzad/_/rlung ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/_/rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin/_/ga pur sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste/_/srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin/_/gzhan yang rtsa la sogs pa la/_/
[\[192b.4\]]mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du shes par bya/_/sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste/_/gsung ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o/_/thugs ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin/_/bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o/_/gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus nas ni/_/
[\[192b.5\]]mkha' 'gro'i bye brag shes par bya/_/dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste/_/mchog dga' sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o/_/rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin/_/bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o/_/dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi ma'o/_/
[\[192b.6\]]tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi/_/sbas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru nges/_/bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu/_/longs spyod chos kyi 'khor lor bsdu/_/gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang /_/thig le la ni thams cad 'dus/_/dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la/_/
[\[192b.7\]]nyi ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang /_/du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus/_/dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gdugs/_/shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no/_/snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang /_/nyi zla'i 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]dkyil na tsa na ka yi tshad/_/de yi dbus su thig le yungs kar tshad/_/sngags phreng ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyis ni/_/g.yon bskor g.yas bskor dbyangs gsal sbrul ltar 'khyil/_/de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te/_/'di la sems ni 
[\[193a.2\]]brtan 'gyur nas/_/de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom/_/zla ba A li kA li la/_/A li nyi ma la thim nas/_/nyi ma zhabs bskyed la thim bsam/_/zhabs bskyed la sogs rim par thim/_/yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga/_/de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor 
[\[193a.3\]]te/_/de nas nA da phra mo la/_/sems ni rim par bsgom pa'o/_/de nas rang rig ye shes te/_/chos kun stong par ro gcig pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_/sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo gnyis/_/'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul/_/bla 
[\[193a.4\]]ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba ste/_/nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung /_/srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste/_/kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas/_/sor bzhi nas ni rtsa gsum gcig_/dbugs dgag pa yi gnas yin pas/_/dang 
[\[193a.5\]]por de ru gzung bar bya/_/de nas sprul pa'i gnas su gzung /_/yang na bgrang bar shes par bya/_/de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni/_/shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i/_/dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o/_/gzhang kha g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang /_/dga' 
[\[193a.6\]]ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa/_/bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs/_/byang chub sems rgyu mi rtog snyam/_/mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga/_/gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang /_/lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs pa/_/chos kyi sku ni 
[\[193a.7\]]yin par gsungs/_/bde ba'i rgyun chad bral ba'i dga'/_/de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis/_/gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams/_/yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos/_/dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa'o/_/skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar spros mod kyang /_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug_/nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang /_/sgra gcan lta bur gnyis su med pa'o/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu/_/zung du 'jug pa ji lta bu/_/gnyis su med pa ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[193b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun ni/_/rgyu yi khyad par spros pa'o/_/sku gsum dang ni ye shes lnga/_/'bras bu'i khyad par spros pa yin/_/rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang /_/'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o/_/rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste/_/'bras 
[\[193b.3\]]bu gnyis su bsgom par bya/_/chos kun sems kyi ngo bo ste/_/sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/thams cad stong par ro gcig pa/_/'di ni blang dor med pa'i dbyings/_/'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir/_/'dod chags sku yi phyag rgya lnga/_/phyag rgya 
[\[193b.4\]]chen po ye shes gnyis/_/dam tshig chos dang las phyag rgya/_/'di la brten pa shin tu zab/_/'di ni bde ba chen po ste/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag_/bde chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum/_/gsang ba'i sna rtse e la gnas/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang 
[\[193b.5\]]ba yin/_/rig pa la sogs de bzhin te/_/gsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas/_rang bzhin bde chen 'khor lo ste/_/bde ba chen pos ros gang ba/_/til dang til mar ji bzhin no/_/dper na shing sna bcad pa las/_/'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin no/_/bde ba chen 
[\[193b.6\]]po de nyid las/_/skra yi rtse mo brgya stong dang /_/khri dang 'bum gyi rnam pa ste/_/dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste/_/gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o/_/gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste/_/bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o/_/'di dag kun gyi rim pa yang /_/sprul pa la sogs rim pa 
[\[193b.7\]]bzhin/_/sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni/_/a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin/_/mar me lta bu 'chi ba yis/_/ha~M gi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin/_/lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni/_/gnyis su med pa bar ma do'i/_/mtshan ma stong par shes par bya/_/gzhan yang 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]'dar ba la sogs pa/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang /_/shes rab ye shes 'brel ba ste/_/dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyang /_/gzhang lam g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang /_/lus 'dar dga' 
[\[194a.2\]]ba'i ngo bo yin/_/gsang ba rdo rje rtsa lam nas/_/byang chub sems rgyu bde ba snyam/_/mchog dga' yi ni ngo bo ste/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'gags pa snyam/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin/_/bde ba'i rgyun chad bde ba snyam/_/bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin/_/'di rnams 
[\[194a.3\]]kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang /_/byang chub sems phyogs la sogs pa/_/gong du gsungs par shes par bya/_/dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste/_/mchog dga' snang ba mched pa yin/_/rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob/_/lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal 
[\[194a.4\]]ba'o/_/ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin te/_/bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i gnyen po yin/_/rags pa bzhi yis gsang bar 'joms/_/phra ba'i bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyis/_/'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin/_/'khor lo la rten dga' ba bzhi/_/de
