[\[194a.5\]]nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang /_/de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin/_/'dod chags la brten dug gsum ni/_/nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te/_/'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin/_/gsang ba'i bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms/_/kha dog 
[\[194a.6\]]dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud/_/rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms/_/sbas pa bzhi ni lha yi bdud/_/rig pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud 'joms/_/skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste/_/gsang ba skye med 'chi bdag 'joms/_/phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 
[\[194a.7\]]'dra/_/skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi/_/bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi/_/'byung ba bzhi dang yum bzhi dang /_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa/_/ye shes bzhi po 'di nyid las/_/khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste/_/rnam par rtog pa'i 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bye brag dang /_/gzhan yang mos pa'i bye brag dang /_/chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis/_/sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin/_/dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste/_/'di yi thams cad bya bar gsungs/_/rdo 
[\[194b.2\]]rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags/_/de yi bya ba ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum/_/so sor thar dang byang chub sems/_/rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo /_/
[\[194b.3\]]gcig dang bzhi dang bcu dang ldan/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu'i [{]go rims kyis[,]go rim gyis[}]/_/bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang /_/dge slong so sor thar pa yin/_/gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang /_/shin tu gtong dang rnam par gtong /_/bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen 
[\[194b.4\]]dge tshul dang /_/dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/dkyil 'khor du zhugs dge ba ste/_/de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin/_/bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin/_/chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang /_/bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste/_/de la 
[\[194b.5\]]bsnyen pas dge bsnyen yin/_/de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin/_/gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste/_/de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin/_/bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin/_/dge ba shes rab ye shes te/_/de nyid slong bas dge slong yin/_/bdun dang 
[\[194b.6\]]ldan pas chen po yin/_/chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang /_/phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te/_/rnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang /_/theg pa dman par ldog pa ni/_/spong ba gsum ni [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing /_/
[\[194b.7\]]rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas/_/'bras bu 'di gnas rnal 'byor pa/_/khyim pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/_/cha lugs su ni gnas byas la/_/dbang bskur rab gnas la sogs bya/_/theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis/_/gsang ba spyad par 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]ma gsungs te/_/dper na rdo las zangs su 'gyur/_/zangs las gser gyi rnam par rol/_/zangs kyi dus na rdo med do/_/gser du gyur pas rdo mi snang /_/rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la/_/so sor thar dang byang chub 
[\[195a.2\]]sems/_/gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so/_/de nas gsang ba bzhi po yang /_/bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste/_/rtag tu g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid/_/gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas ni/_/bsgom byar 
[\[195a.3\]]lhan cig bcas pa dag_/dbang du byas de bsgom par bya/_/gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi/_/dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_sems nyid bsam du med pas na/_/cir yang bsam par mi bya'o/_/sems nyid stong par bcug nas su/_/stong 
[\[195a.4\]]pa sems su rab bcug nas/_/stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i/_/rtog pa bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur/_/rten yod ma yin brten pa med/_/dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin/_/de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste/_/lhan skyes gnyis med rig 
[\[195a.5\]]pa'o/_/de nas spyod pa bka' stsal pa/_/khro tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams/_/sgyu ma tsam du ma shes par/_/phyag rgya chen por yang dag bsgoms/_/dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can/_/snying rje med cing sha khrag za/_/
[\[195a.6\]]de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_/phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug gi/_/dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas/_/bsgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med/_/gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gshe/_/rnal 'byor kun 
[\[195a.7\]]la skur pa 'debs/_/rdo rje spun tshig slob la 'phyar/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig nyams/_/bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis/_/mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/_/rten cing 'brel ba zab mo yi/_/rtsa 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]yi 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs/_/lcags gri sor ni bcu drug pa/_/'dzeg pa ru ni nga yis bshad/_/gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par/_/sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis/_/thur du sems can 
[\[195b.2\]]dmyal bar skye/_/shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar/_/las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor/_/shes pas rang gi rang rig dang /_/rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang /_/rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa/_/rang rig shel 
[\[195b.3\]]sgong lta bu dang /_/dbyings dang ye shes la sogs pa/_/lta ba'i don nyid 'chad pa'o/_/rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum/_/bde chen 'khor lo rgyu yi rgyud/_/gsang ba'i sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud/_/gsang ba bde skyong 'bras 
[\[195b.4\]]bu'i rgyud/_/bum pa rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs/_/gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te/_/shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud/_/skye ba rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs/_/'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs/_/bar ma do ni 
[\[195b.5\]]'bras bu'i rgyud/_/rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te/_/rgyal po gsang ba ston pa ste/_/gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/_/bum pa las dang po la gsang /_/gsang ba bum pa'i dus su gsang /_/shes rab ye shes gsang 
[\[195b.6\]]bar gsang /_/rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang /_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[195b.7\]]bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ye d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]{D385}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI tsakra sa~M ba ra gu h+ya a tsin+ta tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_/dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[196a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes 
[\[196a.3\]]gsol pa/_/kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/_/kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi/_/de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu/_/gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/slu ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar snang /_/de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos/_/sems 
[\[196a.4\]]nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no/_/phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyis/_/dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang /_/dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag dang /_/'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang /_/gnas pa'i tshad dang 
[\[196a.5\]]rim pa dag_/gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bag chags nyon mongs ye shes sku/_/ris drug rtsa shing 'khril lcug gi/_/rang bzhin ngag gi lam 'das la/_/de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo 
[\[196a.6\]]yin/_/bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang /_/de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/_/rtag chad skye 'gag la sogs pa'i/_/mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig cing /_/gdod nas spros bral bde ba nyid/_/de don bsam gyis mi khyab nges/_/de nyid dbye bar rab 'bring tha/_/rnam 
[\[196a.7\]]pa gsum du shes bya ste/_/dang por rang rig bsam mi khyab/_/rgyu dang lam rtags bsam mi khyab/_/mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab/_/chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khyab/_/yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/_/
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/a ni yi ge dam pa ste/_/khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/_/skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa/_/yi ge dam pa bsam mi khyab/_/phrag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang /_/rgyan cha gcer bu thal gos sogs/_/chang dang bdud rtsi sha dang yang /_/ma dang sring mo bu mo 
[\[196b.2\]]sogs/_/rol pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab/_/nga yis gdul ba'i sems can la/_/mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med/_/de phyir theg pa thug med pas/_/de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab/_/rtag chad sgro skur ltos pa'i sgra/_/de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti 
[\[196b.3\]]mug sogs/_/nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs/_/rtags nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/lha bsgom rlung dang rtsa sogs pa/_/lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/rang rig nam mkha'i sprin char tshul/_/pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa/_/rgyu 
[\[196b.4\]]nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/rgyu 'bras tha snyad kun dang bral/_/rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa/_/sprin med mkha' ltar ma bcos pa'i/_/spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag_/rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/a ni shad dang sbrul sogs kyis/_/bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis/_/
[\[196b.5\]]yi ge'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug sogs/_/bcu dgu phra rab rdul gyi bar/_/sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te/_/sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste/_/reg bya bcu gcig chos de bzhin/_/gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/_/chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/theg 
[\[196b.6\]]pa gsum dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/ji snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar/_/lta ba'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam/_/mthong lam bsgom lam mthar phyin lam/_/lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/sems rtag bdud rtags 'byung ba'i rtags/_/rtags kyi dbye ba 
[\[196b.7\]]rgyas pa'o/_/mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar/_/spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/rtag dang chad dang sgro skur nas/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang /_/thabs dang shes rab mtha' yi bar/_/mtha' yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/'dod chags 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]la sogs nyi khri dang /_/chig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang /_/zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te/_/nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang /_/'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs/_/rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/sems dang nam mkha' ye 
[\[197a.2\]]shes dang /_/sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs/_/rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o/_/blos brtags mtshan mar snang ba dang /_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang /_/rim min mos pa khyad par tshol/_/rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing /_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub 
[\[197a.3\]]byed pa/_/gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste/_/gang zhig mthar lhung lta ba de/_/rang rig gzhan rig sems ma yin/_/kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin/_/rang rig rtog ge skam po dang /_/mthar ltung dbu mar khas len pa/_/de ni sems nyid rang rig dang /_/brjod med 
[\[197a.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/mi mthun pa yi phyogs yin te/_/de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/rang rig ye shes chen po yin/_/sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang /_/rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yis/_/rang rig ye shes chen po la/_/thabs dang thabs las byung ba 
[\[197a.5\]]'am/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa/_/rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin/_/rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang /_/de la sgrib pa ma yin te/_/nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no/_/rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis/_/sems can sangs rgyas 
[\[197a.6\]]gnyis su dbye/_/rang rig sprin med nam mkha' la/_/gzhan rig rnam rtog nam mkhar mtshungs/_/sprin sogs rlung gis gtor byas te/_/sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid/_/gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la/_/sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_/rang rig kho na tsam du zad/_/
[\[197a.7\]]dper na skyes bu nam mkha' lta ba la/_/sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las/_/nam mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no/_/grangs ni dang po gcig yin te/_/gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las/_/dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min/_/'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na/_/
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]de nyid rig cing nges pa'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang /_/gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste/_/bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o/_/lus ngag sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med/_/smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs/_/bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[197b.2\]]gsum pa'o/_/byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/_/sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las/_/bzhi yi grangs su nges pa ste/_/dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no/_/rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga/_/phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga/_/bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o/_/pha rol phyin drug 
[\[197b.3\]]rang bzhin las/_/yul drug dbang po drug la sogs/_/bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de/_/brgya sogs grangs ni bsam mi khyab/_/gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis/_/thog ma med nas gnas pa ste/_/lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas/_/rang rig med par gzhan rig 
[\[197b.4\]]dag_/so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod/_/'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa/_/gzhan rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod/_/'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan 'das/_/kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/_/rig pas blang dor gnyis su rtogs/_/de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon/_/rig pa 'dzin 
[\[197b.5\]]la brgya rtsa bcu/_/theg chen mdo sde stong phrag gsum/_/nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis/_/khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa/_/lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab/_/rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa/_/stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub/_/bde ba chen po ros gang ba/_/khams 
[\[197b.6\]]gsum 'khor ba kun shes na/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la/_/'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das/_/lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste/_/rang rig med cing gzhan rig med/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs/_/sems med nam mkha' chos nyid med/_/'khrul ba med cing ma 
[\[197b.7\]]'khrul med/_/theg pa med cing rim pa med/_/dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med/_/ye shes med cing bde ba med/_/mtha' bral dbu mar mi gnas pa/_/bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste/_/'di rtogs khong du chud pa dang /_/mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsom pa/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]thu bo ste/_/rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog_/rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing /_/mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas/_/rig 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste/_/des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad de bslab/_/rig 'dzin sa la gnas par bya/_/rig 'dzin 
[\[198a.2\]]sa la gnas nas kyang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga sa yi bdag nyid las/_/sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa/_/gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs/_/de yi stobs kyis snang ba las/_/yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med/_/
[\[198a.3\]]rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang /_/rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar/_/rang rig spyi yi rnam pa ste/_/chos nyid yul du byas pa'o/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te/_/rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni/_/yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i/_/
[\[198a.4\]]rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba yis/_/khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i/_/bdag nyid de nyid tshul gyis ni/_/mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te/_/sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa/_/snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad/_/thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang /_/dbyu gu skad cig 
[\[198a.5\]]rim pa la/_/sems kyi bying rgod la sogs skyon/_/bral te dben par gnas pa ni/_/snang med mthar phyin tshad yin te/_/rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan to/_/snang ba med cing sgyu ma med/_/bya ba tsal med cing bgrod pa med/_/rang byung lhun gyis grub pa ru/_/rtag tu mi 'gyur gang 
[\[198a.6\]]gnas pa/_/rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la/_/mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin no/_/'dod chags ro yis myos pa dang /_/sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang /_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dus/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus/_/khyad par can du gsungs pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[198a.7\]]yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang /_/rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi/_/gzugs la brten pa'i mig nyid kyis/_/rtog pa'i rgyun chad sems de nyid/_/sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus/_/sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhin no/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]sogs/_/nyon mongs rjes nas rgyu ba ste/_/byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no/_/bzod sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang /_/byams dang snying rje la sogs pa'i/_/mdor 
[\[198b.2\]]na dkar po'i chos rnams dang /_/bzo dang sgyu rtsal la sogs dang /_/bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa'i rim pa kun/_/skye ba gcig gam du mas ni/_/yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_/'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba/_/bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus/_/bskyed dang rdzogs sogs 
[\[198b.3\]]mi gnas shing /_/rdzogs pa chen por gang 'dod pa/_/de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te/_/bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/bar mchod par 'jug pa'i dus/_/gzung ba'i thabs ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi med dang /_/yul drug dus gsum 
[\[198b.4\]]brten pa dang /_/lhan cig skyes nyid sgra la brten/_/sa chu me rlung sgra brten no/_/chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i/_/rang rig bsgom pa mkha' mnyam ste/_/bla mas sems gzung dang por gces/_/chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/_/sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa/_/
[\[198b.5\]]gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro/_/sems ni gzod nas rang rig pa/_/gzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/_/de brten sems gzung bla ma las/_/skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya/_/de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug rjes su 
[\[198b.6\]]mkhas pas gzung /_/lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la/_/brten te skye ba med par bsgom/_/bye brag sems gzung bsam mi khyab/_/nyan thos la sogs theg chen la/_/man ngag yod pa ma yin te/_/lta ba spyod pa sems gzung dang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang /_/
[\[198b.7\]]dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang /_/bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang /_/ngal dub mtha' spangs tshegs chung dang /_/tshogs sogs pa yi khyad par dang /_/khyad par rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yis/_/rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags/_/kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che/_/rang 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]rig bsam mi khyab pa la/_/sbyin dang byams sogs dgongs pa ci/_/sku gnyis gzhan don gang las byung /_/bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas/_/de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sbyin dang byams pa la 
[\[199a.2\]]sogs pas/_/gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang /_/sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i/_/sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas su/_/'byung ba'i rkyen du nges pas na/_/bsam mi khyab la mi gnas kyang /_/sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab par bya/_/de la bsam mi 
[\[199a.3\]]khyab pa 'byung /_/sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang /_/gzungs dang ting 'dzin las rnams kun/_/sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas nas/_/bsam mi khyab pa 'byung bar nges/_/de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab/_/de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos/_/dbul pos nor bu'i 
[\[199a.4\]]byi dor bzhin/_/bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang /_/bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems gnas nas/_/de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te/_/sems kyi yig mgo gcad pa gces/_/rang sems las su rung ba na/_/de ni phyi rtags nang du ste/_/de nyid nang rtags phyi ru 'byung /_/
[\[199a.5\]]lus la dri med srin bu med/_/skra dkar gnyer ma sogs med pa/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no/_/'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang /_/sprin med mkha' ltar gang snang ba/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i rtags yin no/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos 
[\[199a.6\]]thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to//_//dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba shAkya ye 
[\[199a.7\]]shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//[{D386}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas mkha' spyod ma/_sa spyod ma dang /_sa 'og na spyod pa ma 
[\[199b.2\]]gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/_gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/_/dad ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems/_/lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan/_/'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi/_/lam la spro bar gyis la 
[\[199b.3\]]legs par nyon/_/mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/nga yis khyod la bshad par bya/_/mkha' spyod steng sgo'i rlung yin te/_/sa spyod bar du thig le'i sgo/_/sa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo/_/sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/_/dang po mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang /_/rnam pa gsum 
[\[199b.4\]]du shes bya ste/_/bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung /_/kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung /_/mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye/_/gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste/_/zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung /_/ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung /_/snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang /_/
[\[199b.5\]]lte ba lus kyis khyab pa ru/_/rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas/_/rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung /_/dngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur/_/'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyad de/_/thun re la ni 'pho ba gnyis/_/rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin/_/'pho ba gcig la chu tshod gnyis/_/
[\[199b.6\]]chu tshod re la dbyug gu gnyis/_/rlung gi dbyug gu drug cu bzhi/_/de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis/_/nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sogs/_/sems dang sems min 'dres pa'i rlung /_/rags pa dang ni phra ba la/_/mkhas pas sems kyi bzhon par gzung /_/rnam rtog gzung 
[\[199b.7\]]'dzin sems kyi rta/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas/_/de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung /_/dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis/_/'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te/_/de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag_/yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyis/_/rlung gi 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang /_/gzhol ma dang ni g.yon ma dang /_/'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas/_/bems po rlung gi lam yin te/_/dbang po mngon sum lam yin pas/_/sna yi ri rab gling bzhi la/_/nyi zla byang nub 
[\[200a.2\]]lhor rgyug gis/_/thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la/_/'bad pas sems ni gzung bar bya/_/'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas/_/mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis/_/rin chen sems ni dri can byas/_/'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te/_/'di nyid kyis ni lam gyur 
[\[200a.3\]]ba/_/ro ma dang ni rkyang ma'o/_/sbrul 'khyil lta bu'i rnam pa ste/_/rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul/_/gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'gag go/_/rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa/_/'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung /_/kun 'dar ma yi rtsa la brten/_/tsaN+DA lI ni shing lta bu/_/rang 
[\[200a.4\]]rig ye shes spyod yul te/_/gnas der 'bad de rang rig gzung /_/mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir/_/'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin no/_/de nas sa spyod bshad bya ste/_/rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas/_/tsaN+DA lI yi bye brag brtag_/dang por rang bzhin tsaN+DA lI/_/gnyis pa 
[\[200a.5\]]gtum mo tsaN+DA lI/_/gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+DA lI/_/de bzhin gcer bu'i tsaN+DA lI/_/de nyid la yang dbye ba ste/_/gcer bu gtum mo shin tu gtum/_/yang dag gtum mo gzhan sbyar dang /_/bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya/_/gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang /_/shin tu gcer bu 
[\[200a.6\]]gcer bu sogs/_/'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya/_/dbye na rnam pa bcu gnyis te/_/yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad/_/sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin te/_/stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs/_/gzhan skyes kyi ni khro mo tsam/_/phra ba de las bzlog pa'o/_/brgya dang nyi shu skra yi rtse/_/
[\[200a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis skra yi rtse/_/lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum/_/gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshad/_/dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom dang /_/gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes par bya/_/dngas ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar/_/rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la/_/yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]kyang /_/dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa/_/sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no/_/gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes/_/'di nyid nor bu rin po che/_/'di la brten nas thams cad 'byung /_/rig 'chol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang /_/dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs/_/
[\[200b.2\]]'chol pa las ni dngos grub min/_/de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni/_/sa spyod ma yi dngos grub ste/_/thams cad kun gyi rten yin no/_/sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/byang chub sems ni rnam pa gsum/_/dang po chos nyid sems yin 
[\[200b.3\]]te/_/'di ni shes brjod yul las 'das/_/gnyis pa rang rig byang chub sems/_/dper na rkyen gyis shel sgong bzhin/_/gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems/_/sih+la dang ni ga pur te/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis su gsungs/_/las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes/_/
[\[200b.4\]]g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems/_/ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes/_/g.yo ba don dam sems yin te/_/dngas snyigs las ni rim pa yin/_/dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni/_/sems kyi khyad par shes par bya/_/las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing /_/las kyi me yis 
[\[200b.5\]]mi 'dzag par/_/kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las/_/mi shigs ha~M gi dbyibs 'dra ste/_/nor ba kun+da'i mdog lta bu/_/dkar la 'tsher dang gzi mdangs snum/_/bde ba chen po'i skur 'byung ba/_/'di ni don dam byang chub sems/_/dmar la dngas pa'i rang bzhin la/_/
[\[200b.6\]]khyad par bzhi ni thun mong ste/_/'di ni shes rab byang chub sems/_/de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis/_/'og sgor gnas shing srid pa skye/_/dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed/_/de phyir don dam kun rdzob kyis/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/rgyu 'chol ba 
[\[200b.7\]]las dngos grub med/_/rkyen 'chol ba las de bzhin te/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/don dam sems kyi spyod yul min/_/kun rdzob tshor ba bde ba'i yul/_/sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje gsum bsgom mi phyed pa/_/de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/yi ge 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dang ni yan lag dang /_/bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi don/_/sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don/_/sna tshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin/_/rtog med rten las sna tshogs 'byung /_/A li kA li ma ning dang /_/drug tu 
[\[201a.2\]]sbyor ba brtag par bya/_/sgra mtha'i yi ge bsam mi khyab/_/yan lag rnam pa gsum yin te/_/rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang /_/brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do/_/de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad/_/theg pa gsum dang de las gzhan/_/thun mong spyi ru nges pa ste/_/bye brag 
[\[201a.3\]]rang las shes par bya/_/sbas pa dbang dang sngags su dbye/_/sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis/_/chos ni spyi dang bye brag go/_/de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang /_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/snod dang snod min bye brag kyang /_/bla mas legs par brtag bya ste/_/de nyid yang 
[\[201a.4\]]dag rtogs gyur na/_/ston pa med cing bstan pa med/_/bsam gtan la sogs 'jig pa med/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung /_/bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs pa/_/chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor/_/dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/_/bya med rnal 'byor 
[\[201a.5\]]de ltag la/_/de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te/_/rnal 'byor nang pa de ltag la/_/phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/_/shes rab snying po brtser gyur pa'i/_/thabs dang shes rab bsrub shing la/_/gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las/_/bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyi shu bzhi/_/nor 
[\[201a.6\]]bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung /_/ji ltar ma dkrogs 'o ma las/_/'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min/_/de bzhin lo grangs mang po las/_/dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min/_/de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi/_/
[\[201a.7\]]bdud rtsi ro 'dra seng ge'i gzugs/_/gnas ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang /_/sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs te/_/mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la gtad/_/phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab bo/_/dam du sba zhing dam du spel/_/rgya las 'das na dam tshig nyams/_/sngags dang dbyibs dang chos 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bdag ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/_/de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag_/sngags la gnyis te chos la gnyis/_/dbyibs kyang de bzhin shes par bya/_/re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang /_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/phyi nang sbas pa mthar thug bzhi/_/rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi 
[\[201b.2\]]yin te/_/de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag_/de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan/_/de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis ni tsaN+DA lI/_/gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/_/rtsa gsum gyis ni byin gyis brlabs/_/gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/_/mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/_/rgyud ni nyi shu 
[\[201b.3\]]rtsa bzhi gtad/_/pu ru rab gtum gsang rdo rje/_/dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod/_/o ru 'od ldan bsam mi khyab/_/A ru sna rtse nam mkha' mnyam/_/go ru bstan blo nam mkha' che/_/ra ru mi'u thung sku gsung thugs/_/de ru lang ka rin chen phreng /_/ma ru shing grib dam tshig che/_/ka ru e 
[\[201b.4\]]rU stobs po che/_/o ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang /_/tri ru rlung shugs ye shes phreng /_/ko ru chang 'thung ye shes 'bar/_/ku ru sh+yA ma zla ba'i phreng /_/la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar/_/ka ru rta rna nyi ma'i 'khor/_/he ru kha kha ye shes rgyal/_/bre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'gro gsang /_/
[\[201b.5\]]gr-i ru khaN+Da gsang me 'bar/_/sau ru shoN+Di gsang bdud rtsi/_/su ru 'khor lo dur khrod rgyan/_/na ru shin dpa' rdo rje rgyal/_/si ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal/_/ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal/_/ku ru brtson 'grus mkha' 'gro sdom/_/de dag gtad do legs par sbos/_/nang du tsaN+TA 
[\[201b.6\]]lI dag ni/_/nyi shu bzhi ni gtad pa ste/_/dang po gsang ba gnyis pa yang /_/rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang /_/rkyen ni tha mas gsungs pa ste/_/mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rang bzhin te/_/de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin/_/dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pas/_/dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te/_/
[\[201b.7\]]rta dang glang po la sogs dang /_/bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig_/bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te/_/bdud rtsi ro yi ra li las/_/bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub blang /_/yid la zung la dran par gyis/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/_/sku 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[202a.2\]{D387}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA kha tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[202a.3\]]gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan 
[\[202a.4\]]gsum byas te/_phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/_/kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che/_/bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang /_/'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang /_/bdag la khyod kyis bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[202a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_/bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/_/re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/_/bcu drug grangs su shes par bya/_/ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste/_/dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang /_/kha dog dbyibs la log rtog gis/_/bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin du ma dag_/phung po'i 
[\[202a.6\]]bdud du rab tu grags/_/'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa/_/nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no/_/yang dag lam ston bla ma med/_/zhe sdang ru drar skye ba yi/_/rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag_/lha yi bu yi bdud yin te/_/las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyus/_/srog 'chad 
[\[202a.7\]]pa ni 'chi bdag bdud/_/bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas/_/lha yi bu yi bdud kyang bcom/_/log rtog du ma'i rtog pa 'gag_/des na phung po'i bdud bcom mo/_/rten dang brten pa ro mnyam pas/_/nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/_/dus min 'chi dang 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]tshe zad pas/_/'di dag 'chi ba dag bdud yin te/_/tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi/_/tshe yi 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo/_/gzhan yang bdud 'joms bye brag ni/_/phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len/_/grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms so/_/de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste/_/
[\[202b.2\]]longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms/_/sems kyis lha yi bdud bcom ste/_/rten dang brten ni sgyu mar ldan/_/de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang /_/phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs/_/phyi ru du ma phung po'i bdud/_/rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas/_/
[\[202b.3\]]nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no/_/dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi/_/bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud/_/phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len/_/de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag ni/_/sgo gsum 'khrul par gang ston pa/_/bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud/_/sgo 
[\[202b.4\]]gsum las ni du ma'i cha/_/de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud/_/de nyid 'bad de bsgrubs byas kyang /_/'bras bu mi 'byung sems nyon mongs/_/nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te/_/de yis tshe yi bar chad byed/_/de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no/_/rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes 
[\[202b.5\]]pas/_/lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo/_/de nyid sgyu mar shes par bya/_/de nyid shes pas phung po dang /_/nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/_/dngos po'i mthar lhung skye bas 'chi/_/rgyu med las skye 'chi ba ste/_/rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rang bzhin gnas/_/sgyu mas 'chi bdag bdud 
[\[202b.6\]]bcom mo/_/tshe la dbang sgyur ma lta bu/_/gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/shes rab ye shes bdud bzhi yang /_/rtsa dang shu kra la sogs pa'i/_/dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud/_/de nyid du ma phung po'i bdud/_/de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas/_/nyon mongs pa yi 
[\[202b.7\]]bdud yin no/_/kha dog dbyibs ni skyes pas 'jig/_/de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang /_/'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'i/_/bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud/_/dga' ba bzhi ni du ma ste/_/rgyud la spungs pas phung po'i bdud/_/
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rang sems nyon mongs nyon mongs bdud/_/'khor bar ltung bas skye ba ste/_/skye ba las byung 'chi bdag bdud/_/rnam par rtog pa skye bas so/_/'dod chags kyis ni 'chi bdag bdud/_/ma spangs sum cu drug gnyis dang /_/nges pa sum cu rtsa drug gi/_/
[\[203a.2\]]lam bsten bla mas lha bdud bcom/_/dga' bzhi sgyu ma rang bzhin med/_/bde chen ror 'gyur phung po bcom/_/'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin/_/rang sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral/_/nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo/_/de yis 'chi ba dang bral bas/_/de nyid 'chi 
[\[203a.3\]]bdag bdud bcom mo/_/'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi/_/dman pa'i stobs kyis zin pa ste/_/rgyal po dmangs su babs pa bzhin/_/de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin/_/rgyal po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin/_/bzhi pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni/_/gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la/_/
[\[203a.4\]]bzhi pa'i lam ston bla ma ni/_/lha yi bu yi bdud yin te/_/bdud gsum bla ma'i zhal nas shes/_/snod min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang /_/mar dang kha ra la sogs pa/_/'thungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin/_/khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste/_/rigs ngan rgyal sa 'dzin 
[\[203a.5\]]pa 'dra/_/dbang dang gdams ngag 'brel bcas pa'i/_/bdud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan/_/ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug_/ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags/_/bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis/_/thob na de nyid dam pa ste/_/bla ma gcig la dbang thob nas/_/
[\[203a.6\]]bla ma gcig la mnyan par bya/_/bla ma rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/_/phyi yi bla ma de nyid de/_/nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha/_/bdud dang dgra yi sde rnams kun/_/thams cad 'jigs shing skrag byed pas/_/'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste/_/dgra dang bdud kyi g.yul 
[\[203a.7\]]las rgyal/_/dmigs pa lha sogs bdun dang ldan/_/de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang /_thams cad rgyud la dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/_/dpal nam mkha' 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D388}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI kA ya bAk+tsit+ta tan+t+ra rA dza/_
[\[203b.2\]]bod skad du/_dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che/_/mchog gyur 'di la yang dag gnas/_/mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/_/khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas 
[\[203b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_/sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste/_/gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo 'dod/_/thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te/_/sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI/_/dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mo/_/rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsol/_/rgyud kyi don la rab goms shing /_/smra ba'i tshig gis ma 
[\[203b.4\]]rmongs la/_/gzhan gyi rtsod pas mi rdzi yang /_/dbang dang man ngag ma thob par/_/dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs/_/sngags spyod ngal ba don med yin/_/shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye/_/de phyir gtso bos dbang bskur gyi/_/man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol/_/
[\[203b.5\]]rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/_/dang por bum dbang rim pa yang /_/gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa btsal/_/bkra shis yid dga' shin tu snum/_/bkra shis bya rnams snyan par sgrogs/_/dpag bsam shing rgyas yod par 'dod/_/gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam/_/
[\[203b.6\]]chu ngogs dag la sogs pa ru/_/sa bdag sa yi lha mo la/_/gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gyis/_/sa bslang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs/_/de nas dang po bsnyen pa dbul/_/bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring tha/_/mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs/_/re re la yang gsum 
[\[203b.7\]]gsum ste/_/mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra/_/grangs ni stong dang khri dang 'bum/_/dus ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga bcu gsum dang /_/bdun du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang /_/lha rnams bsnyen pas mnyes byas nas/_/lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun/_/lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin bya/_/
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi/_/bu mos sa yi phyogs mthun pa'i/_/ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtag_/so shing rtse mor me tog dri/_/bsrung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag_/dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/_/dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring tha/_/
[\[204a.2\]]ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim/_/gang dang ldan pa de nyid do/_/de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram/_/khaM bIr yi sngags kyis kyang /_/de la rdo rje bya ba par bya/_/de nas ku sha la sogs pa/_/spogs pa'i cho ga dang bcas bya/_/gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas/_/bla ma mnyes 
[\[204a.3\]]par bya ba dang /_/dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir/_/rta dang glang po ma he dang /_/rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang /_/spos dang mar me la sogs pa/_/brgya'am stong ngam khri'am 'bum/_/bla re rgyan dang ba dan sogs/_/byin brlabs tshogs bsag phyi ru dgod/_/
[\[204a.4\]]de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/_/khrus dang yan lag dri yis byug_/kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu/_/'jig rten 'phrul pa las sad na/_/he ru kar grags chen po yi/_/dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol lam/_/dad pa dang bcas spro bar gyis/_/rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems/_/dga' 
[\[204a.5\]]chen khyod bdag ston pa po/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa dgongs su gsol/_/byang chub chen por lung bstan pa/_/mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/_/dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/_/byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/_/pad+ma las byung bdag la stsol/_/gsang ba dgyes pa bdag 
[\[204a.6\]]la stsol/_/thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/_/mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/_/legs so legs so rigs kyi bu/_/rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog_/rnam rtog thams cad 'jig byed pas/_/gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya/_/mi bskyod bcom ldan dang 
[\[204a.7\]]mtshungs pa'i/_/zil gyis mi non khyod kyis blangs/_/dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa yi/_/mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya/_/thabs dang shes rab zung du sbrel/_/nam yang khyod kyis spang mi bya/_/tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam gtan la/_/'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]chang ni rtag btung khro mi bya/_/de bzhin sha yang shes par bya/_/gzhan gyi phyag rgya bsten par bya/_/'di ni dam tshig brgyad yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/_/thun mong sdom dang sems skyed sbyin/_/bskor ba lan gsum phyag gsum bya/_/yol bas 
[\[204b.2\]]bar du bcad nas ni/_/mig la sogs pa lnga bkab la/_/lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin/_/kun byed chu yis bsal dag bya/_/me tog dang bcas rdo rje yang /_/de yi snying la gzhag la bsgom/_/slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs/_/ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya/_/phyi 
[\[204b.3\]]yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab/_/sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral/_/mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang /_/rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri/_/lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg_/dngos grub phrin las so so ru/_/mkhas pas brtag par shes par bya/_/me tog dor te lha yang sbyin/_/
[\[204b.4\]]'khor rnams gtso bo'i yan lag yin/_/gtso bo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis/_/dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin/_/de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yis/_/mi shes pa yi rab rib kun/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal/_/de la gzugs 
[\[204b.5\]]brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan/_/dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ru/_/gzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur/_/chu khams mi bskyod me long gis/_/rdo rje rigs kyi phrin las 'grub/_/dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te/_/mnyam nyid ye shes rang 
[\[204b.6\]]bzhin gyis/_/rin chen rigs kyi phrin las 'grub/_/'od dpag med pa'i rdo rje'i dbang /_/so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/pad+ma rigs kyis phrin las byed/_/dril bu don yod grub pa ste/_/bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/_/phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[204b.7\]]rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang /_/rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems/_/rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo ste/_/chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las/_/de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin/_/mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri stengs su/_/rigs byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya/_/bdud bzhi 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]'joms pas rgyal chen bzhi/_/chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan gzugs/_/chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab/_/gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs gnyis/_/phyag rgya dam tshig gsum po yin/_/dbugs dbyung ba dang 
[\[205a.2\]]lung bstan dang /_/rjes su gnang dang phyir mi ldog_/brtan par byed dang rnam pa lnga/_/gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams/_/rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun/_/thun mong yin par nga yis gsungs/_/bum pa'i dbang la rnam gsum ste/_/dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin/_/
[\[205a.3\]]gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te/_/brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o/_/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/_/lus ni ri rab lhun po la/_/byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas nas/_/bde ba'i stan la gnas nas su/_/gsang ba'i dbang gi rten gyur pa/_/rig ma dang po btsal bar bya/_/
[\[205a.4\]]dang po shes pas brtag pa dang /_/bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang /_/nyes pa dag par sbyang ba dang /_/dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang /_/bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang /_/bsrung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod/_/dri yi thig le du ma bya/_/g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang /_/
[\[205a.5\]]bsrub dang bsrub bcas sbyor byas dang /_/bsrubs las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis/_/lus kun khyab nas gsang ba ru/_/dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'jag_/dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra/_/ro ma'i 'khor lor byA bsams la/_/lce de pad+mar byin brlabs te/_/lce yi rtse 
[\[205a.6\]]mor b+h+yaHbsams la/_/sih+la ga pur 'dres pa yis/_/b+h+yaHla bzhag ste de la bstim/_/so gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la/_/dbus su mi dmigs bsgom par bya/_/gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste/_/rdo rje gtso mor sbyin pa dang /_/sbom po khro mos sbyin pa dang /_/rdo rje 
[\[205a.7\]]gre tshangs sbyin pa'o/_/shes rab ye shes dbang la yang /_/dang por shes rab brtag pa ni/_/lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum/_/mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/_/de nas khyad par lnga brtags te/_/rigs dang lang tsho longs spyod dang /_/rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]bar lnga/_/phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs/_/sems brtan rdo rje yi ni rigs/_/khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs/_/rnam rtog chung ba rdo rje yi/_/lang tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs/_/mi rtog pas brgyan shes pa ste/_/rdo rje'i rgyan gyi khyad par yin/_/de 
[\[205b.2\]]nyid gsum du mi 'gyur ba/_/mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/_/rdo rje gzugs kyi khyad par yin/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/_/de yi ro la longs spyod pas/_/rdo rje'i longs spyod khyad par ro/_/kun 'dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs/_/rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o/_/
[\[205b.3\]]de nyid mda' ltar mkhrang ba ni/_/thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro/_/rtsa de dmar la dngas pa dang /_/byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas/_/gnyis su med par gsal ba'i tshul/_/dper na nor bu ke ke ru/_/dar la brgyus pa ji bzhin du/_/thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad 
[\[205b.4\]]par ro/_/la la nA dang ra sa nA/_/a ba d+hU tIr gnyis med la/_/thugs kyi longs spyod khyad par ro/_/dang por phyi la gnyis pa nang /_/gsum pa gsang ba'i brtag pa'o/_/lus brtag pa ni sku yin te/_/ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur/_/yid brtag thugs su 
[\[205b.5\]]'gyur ba'o/_/sgyu ma tsam gyis dgongs pa'i don/_/kun la khyab par shes par bya/_/lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun/_/sems kyi bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul/_/dang por smig rgyu chur 'khrul dang /_/gnyis pa smig rgyu nyid yin te/_/gsum pa smig rgyu mi snang bzhin/_/de 
[\[205b.6\]]bzhin zhal nas shes par bya/_/chu la bdun no mar la gcig_/dri ni bdun te sha la gnyis/_/sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum/_/'di rnams btsal ba'i rten gyur pa/_/lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gsungs/_/ka ra gnyis te bu ram gcig_/chang ni gnyis su shes par 
[\[205b.7\]]bya/_/rgyan ni bye brag sna tshogs so/_/dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha/_/zhag gcig na ni bcud dang ldan/_/dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang /_/drod dang ldan na bcud dang ldan/_/rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te/_/'dun pa byas na dam tshig nyams/_/rtsa ba lnga dang yan 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]lag bcas/_/gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman/_/mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya/_/sha yang mar gyi de bzhin no/_/kha bas kun gyi bcud skyed de/_/mngar ba kun gyis ro tsa byed/_/bcud bskyed sha ni gzhon nu zhes/_/ro tsa sha ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin/_/
[\[206a.2\]]bcud bskyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang /_/lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsres/_/chang ni mnyam por gsungs pa'o/_/ro tsa ba yi sha la yang /_/'o ma sgo nga cha mnyam par/_/lnga gsum lnga gnyis gtso bor bya/_/kha ra'i chang ngam 'o ma 'am/_/sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya/_/'di 
[\[206a.3\]]ni yan lag spros bcas so/_/de nas mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang /_/dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang /_/spros pa med pa'i yan lag yin/_/dbang bskur sngon du bsgom pa'i don/_/dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs/_/rig ma gtad dang man ngag sbyin/_/brda rnams 
[\[206a.4\]]bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags/_/brtag pa shin tu spros pa med/_/phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'khyud/_/dang po'i sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so/_/dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs pa/_/sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste/_/langs pa tsog pu gan rkyal dang /_/kha sbub 'phred dang 
[\[206a.5\]]lnga yin te/_/'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab/_/dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa/_/'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu/_/tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis/_/bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa'o/_/bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste/_/gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste/_/de yi rnam 
[\[206a.6\]]smin brjod mi lang /_/dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/yan lag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba dngos/_/khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung /_/sngags dang sman ni dang po ste/_/gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs/_/gsum pa ting nge 'dzin 
[\[206a.7\]]yin te/_/sngags dang sman gyis kun+da drang /_/rked bcing tshad dang gnas pa'i tshad/_/drang ba'i tshad rnams shes par bya/_/'byung ba bzhi dang rigs mthun pa'i/_/rked bcing rked pa'i tshad dang mnyam/_/sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram men/_/gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]drug_/rnam thar gsang ba'i pho brang gnas/_/skye mched rig par gnas pa'o/_/stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas/_/khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas/_/'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/_/yang dag spong ba snying gar gnas/_/he ru kar ni ma gshigs shing /_/
[\[206b.2\]]rdo rje mnga' yis ma brgyab pa'o/_/drang ba'i tshad ni sor bzhi 'byung /_/dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la/_/sman dang snum dang dri dang gsum/_/sum cha sum gnyis stod smad du/_/lus la bsku zhing me la bdug_/rtse gsum rtsa ni shin tu zab/_/ba spru ba dang lca ba dang /_/ra mnye ba dang 
[\[206b.3\]]nye'u shing dang /_/ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas/_/rdo la sogs pa lnga sbyar dang /_/gzhan yang sman dang snum dang dri/_/dar la sogs pa'i nang du blugs/_/sgo gnyis nas ni tho ldos bdug_/zab pa'i sngags btab bsgoms byas na/_/dang por mtshan ma shes par bya/_/
[\[206b.4\]]chags pa'i gzi ldan sna tshogs 'byung /_/tha ma'ang gsum mam bdun na 'byung /_/dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur nas/_/sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro/_/dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir/_/sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya/_/'di yi sdig pa bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[206b.5\]]bdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na/_/dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa/_/sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs/_/bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/'khor lo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/sku yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/ye shes go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/'byung ba go bzlog 
[\[206b.6\]]sbyor ba dang /_/yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/stong pa'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/gtum mo'i 
[\[206b.7\]]go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/rtsa yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/brda yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang /_/rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba rnams/_/kun mkhyen gyis kyang ma gzigs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang /_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum/_/sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro/_/'di yi khyad par ma dpags par/_/zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin/_/dbang bskur ba yi sngon du yang /_/gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin/_/
[\[207a.2\]]gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur/_/shes rab ma la brten nas su/_/bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas na/_/shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs/_/sih+la ga pur shes rab ste/_/de yi bde ba ye shes yin/_/sih+la shes rab ces bya ste/_/ga pur ye shes su ni bshad/_/rtsa gsum 
[\[207a.3\]]'dus pa shes rab ste/_/de yi thig le ye shes yin/_/la la nA ni ye shes so/_/ra sa nA ni shes rab ste/_/rtsa ni shes rab zhes bya ste/_/byang chub sems ni ye shes so/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni shes rab ste/_/dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad/_/dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te/_/rang 
[\[207a.4\]]bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin/_/'og ni shes rab ces bya ste/_/steng la ye shes su yang bshang /_/g.yon pa shes rab ces bya ste/_/g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad/_/chos dbyings shes rab ces bya ste/_/ye shes bzhi ni ye shes yin/_/phyag mtshan ming dang yi ge rnams/_/
[\[207a.5\]]gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya/_/shes rab ye shes la yang gsum/_/tshig la bslab pa'ang gnang ba yin/_/gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste/_/mngon par rtogs pas bsgom pa gsungs/_/e wa~M ma yA'i rnam pa bzhi/_/e ni sa ste wa~M ni chu/_/ma ni me ste yA ni rlung /_/
[\[207a.6\]]e ni snying rje wa~M ni byams/_/ma ni dga' ba yA btang snyoms/_/e ni spyan wa~M mAm kI/_/ma ni gos dkar yA sgrol ma/_/e ni sbyin pa wa~M tshul khrims/_/ma ni bzod pa yA bsam gtan/_/e ni phyag rgya chen po ste/_/wa~M ni dam tshig phyag rgya yin/_/ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste/_/yA ni 
[\[207a.7\]]shes rab phyag rgya'o/_/e ni shar te wa~M lho phyogs/_/ma ni nub phyogs yA byang phyogs/_/e ni sku yi thig le ste/_/wa~M ni gsung la ma ni thugs/_/yA ni ye shes thig le'o/_/e ni sngon po wa~M ljang ku/_/ma ni dmar po yA ser po/_/e ni mkha' 'gro wa~M lA ma/_/ma ni dum skyes yA 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gzugs can/_/e ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin/_/wa~M ni rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro yin/_/ma ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste/_/yA ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'o/_/e ni 'gog pa wa~M ni lam/_/ma ni sdug bsngal yA kun 'byung /_/e ni bde chen wa~M longs spyod/_/ma ni chos la yA sprul pa/_/
[\[207b.2\]]e ni mtshan la wa~M stong pa/_/ma ni rnam thar yA dpe byad/_/e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/wa~M ni rnam par smin pa'o/_/ma ni rnam par nyed pa ste/_/yA ni rnam pa mtshan nyid bral/_/e ni chung ba wa~M 'bring po/_/ma ni lhag pa yA cher lhag_/e ni g.yas nas me rgyu ste/_wa~M ni g.yon 
[\[207b.3\]]nas rlung rgyu'o/_/ma ni 'og nas sa rlung rgyu/_/yA ni steng nas chu rlung rgyu/_/e ni gnas brtan wa~M phal chen/_/ma ni bkur ba yA thams cad/_/e ni bsnyen pa wa~M nye bsten/_/ma ni sgrub pa yA bsgrub che/_/e ni shar lho wa~M lho nub/_/ma ni nub byang yA byang shar/_/e ni rgyud la wa~M ni 
[\[207b.4\]]sngags/_/ma ni ye shes yA gsang ba/_/e ni snang ba wa~M snang mched/_/ma ni snang thob yA 'od gsal/_/e ni bdag gi bzang po yin/_/wa~M ni dus kyi bzang po'o/_/ma ni ye shes bzang por gsungs/_/yA ni rlung gi bzang po yin/_/e ni bdag gi gnas yin te/_/wa~M ni rnal 
[\[207b.5\]]'byor gnas su bstan/_/ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yin te/_/yA ni rgyud kyi gnas yin no/_/e ni dga' ba wa~M mchog dga'/_/ma ni lhan cig yA dga' bral/_/e ni me long wa~M mnyam nyid/_/ma ni kun rtog yA nan tan/_/e ni chos sku wa~M longs spyod/_/ma ni sprul sku yA bde 
[\[207b.6\]]chen/_/e ni zhi ba wa~M ni dbang /_/ma ni rgyas pa yA gsod pa/_/yi ge btus pa'i sngags chen gsum/_/oM ni sku yi 'khor lo ste/_/AHni gsung gi 'khor lo'o/_/hU~M ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yin/_/oM ni rnam snang AH'od dpag_/hU~M ni mi bskyod rang bzhin no/_/oM ni phyag 
[\[207b.7\]]g.yon hU~M ni g.yas/_/AHni dbus kyi snying ga yin/_/oM ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te/_/hU~M ni g.yas pa AHdbu ma/_/oM ni srog yin hU~M rtsom pa/_/AHni gnas par shes par bya/_/oM ni sku la hU~M ni thugs/_AHni gsung du shes par bya/_/oM ni lus la AHni ngag_/
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]hU~M ni yid du shes par bya/_/oM ni thabs la hU~M shes rab/_/AHni gnyis su med pa'o/_/oM ni g.yon gyi la la nA/_/hU~M ni g.yas kyir sa nA/_/AHni a ba d+hU tI yin/_/o~M ni g.yas kyi ra sa nA/_/hU~M ni g.yon gyi la la nA/_/AHni de bzhin dbus 
[\[208a.2\]]na gnas/_/o~M ni ga pur hU~M sih+la/_/AHni dkar dmar rtsa dag yin/_/o~M ni mchog dga' hU~M khyad dga'/_/AHni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don/_/dga' ba lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur/_/lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'gyur/_/rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang /_/'bras 
[\[208a.3\]]bu la yang rgyu sbyor dang /_/rgyu la rgyu yi sbyor ba dang /_/'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor/_/rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyor/_/thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang /_/shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor/_/thabs la thabs kyis sbyor ba dang /_/shes rab shes rab sbyor ba 
[\[208a.4\]]dag_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor/_/sbyor ba 'di yi dgongs pa yang /_/kun mkhyen gyis kyang rtogs par dka'/_/a ni rnam snang mi bskyod pa/_/na ro rin chen 'byung ldan te/_/zla tshes 'od dpag med pa yin/_/thig le don yod grub pa'o/_/o~M ni bde gshegs 
[\[208a.5\]]lnga rang bzhin/_/zhabs skyed don yod grub pa ste/_/'a ni de bzhin 'od dpag med/_/ha ni rnam par snang mdzad de/_/zla tshes rin chen 'byung ldan yin/_/thig le mi bskyod rang bzhin no/_/zhabs skyed sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te/_/'a ni gos dkar ngo bo yin/_/ha ni rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/_/
[\[208a.6\]]zla tshes mA ma kI rang bzhin/_/thig le spyan du shes par bya/_/'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang /_/'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba lnga/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du shes par bya/_/zhabs skyed bya ba nan tan yin/_/'a ni mnyam nyid ye shes so/_/ha ni chos kyi dbyings yin te/_/zla tshes so sor rtog pa'o/_/thig 
[\[208a.7\]]le me long ye shes so/_/'di dag kun gyi dgongs pa'i don/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang /_/kun tu gsang zhing dpyad par dka'/_/yi ge tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod nas 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]mi snang bar gyur to/_/mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[208b.2\]{D389}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI rat+na mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/_/rin chen phreng ba'i don ma rtogs/_/
[\[208b.3\]]khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring /_/dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru/_/ma gsungs nga yis khyod la bshad/_/rin po che ni rnam pa gsum/_/de yi phreng ba'ang rnam pa gsum/_/dang po snod kyi 
[\[208b.4\]]rin po che/_/gnyis pa bcud kyi rin po che/_/snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral/_/de ni rin chen gsum pa yin/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/rnam pa gsum du gsungs pa las/_/de rnams rin chen ji ltar lags/_/de yi phreng ba ji ltar lags/_/
[\[208b.5\]]de rnams su yi spyod yul lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang po snod kyi rin po che/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/ka ka ru ni dkar po che/_/mi bskyod pa yi byin brlabs te/_/dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu la/_/rab ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam/_/'di ni rin 
[\[208b.6\]]chen 'bar ba ste/_/ba dkar ra dkar lug dkar mo'i/_/'o ma bsku zhing sbangs pa dang /_/mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya/_/de ni spyi bor gdags pa'o/_/mchod pa'i bye brag kun la bya/_/shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang /_/gang la yod pa de la skyob/_/'bring ni 
[\[208b.7\]]gzhan skyes sbom po tsam/_/'di ni rin chen dge ba ste/_/dngul chu rnam pa gnyis blugs la/_/rkyen gyi rdzas rnams tshang ba dang /_/kha yi nang du gzhug pa ste/_/ro ma'i 'khor lo lces mnan la/_/de nas dal gyis bskyod pa dang /_/gsang ba'i rdo rje sna rtse ru/_/bde ba chen po 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]skyes tsam na/_/ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa mnan/_/dper na sbrul gyi sha zos pa/_/mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'byung /_/de bzhin mnan pas byang chub sems/_/sna rtse las kyang gyen la ldog_/til dang til mar bzhin du gnas/_/khyad par bde ba 
[\[209a.2\]]gyen la skye/_/bde ba ster phyir rin po che/_/de yi phreng ba du mar bshad/_/tha ma skyes pa'i khro mo tsam/_/e ra Na la sogs sman lnga dang /_/spyi bo'i gtsug tu btags gyur na/_/lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed/_/de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang /_/bai DUr+ya ni sngon 
[\[209a.3\]]po ste/_/rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te/_/dbyibs ni sog ka lta bu ste/_/rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i mig_/'di ni rin chen myu gu ste/_/ngang pa'i sgo nga ldong ros dang /_/spang sha ma dang gsum sbyar nas/_/de gdugs rna ba g.yas su gdags/_/lho yi 
[\[209a.4\]]gdon rnams thub par gsungs/_/gang la yod pa de la skyob/_/'bring ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam/_/'di ni rin chen e raN+Da/_/ga pur rak+ta dngul chu gsum/_/de yi nang blugs lce lkog tu/_/gyen thur gnyis ni sna dang 'jug_/de yi byang chub sems bzung ste/_/mgal 
[\[209a.5\]]me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas/_/tha ma bye'u'i sgo nga tshang tsam/_/a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/ba ru ra dang ldong ros rnams/_/bsres te lus la byugs bskul te/_/'di ni d+han+d+ha ka spu ra/_/lus kyi srin bu 'byer bar byed/_/de nas yang dag gsum pa yang /_/pad+ma rak+ta dmar po ste/_/
[\[209a.6\]]dbyibs ni zlum po lta bu la/_/'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te/_/rab ni kAr+ShA pa Na stong /_/gur kum ga pur lnga sbyar la/_/de la bsku zhing byug pa bya'o/_/lte ba'i dbus su gzhag la bcing /_/'di ni rat+na ke ru ra/_/nub kyi gdon rnams thub par gsungs/_/'bring 
[\[209a.7\]]ni kAr+ShA pa Na ste/_'di ni rat+na ka ra ste/_/mar dang sa le sbram dang lnga/_/bzo ru byas pa'i dngul chu rnams/_/de yi nang blugs lte bar mnan/_/'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste/_/chu la chu gzhag ji bzhin no/_/tha ma kAR+ShA pa Na ste/_/'bras bu gsum dang ru rta dang /_/
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]mar gyi snying po dang sbyar te/_/spyi bo'i gtsug tu sba ba dang /_/'di ni rat+na de ba sar/_/skra dkar med par byed pa'o/_/de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang /_/de ni margad ljang gu ste/_/dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu ste/_/don yod grub par byin brlabs te/_/rab ni be con dbyug pa 
[\[209b.2\]]tsam/_/'di ni rat+na ga ga ni/_/rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas/_/bskus la rna ba g.yon du gdags/_/'di yis byang gi gdon rnams thub/_/'bring ni bya mo'i sgo nga tsam/_/ma hA de ba u ma de/_/gnyis kyi ga pur rak+ta yis/_/byugs la lte ba'i nang du gzhug_/ga pur sih+la 
[\[209b.3\]]gnyis ka 'dzin/_/tha ma gzhan skyes sgo nga tsam/_/ldong ros ser po gser dang gsum/_/man cha gcig ni byin nas ni/_/'di ni e ru na ra ste/_/srin bu mi skye bde dang ldan/_/'di ni rat+na san+da ha/_/de nas yang dag lnga pa yang /_/kha dogs dbyibs ni du mar snang /_/rnam par snang 
[\[209b.4\]]mdzad byin brlabs te/_/don rnams so so du ma byed/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/ma 'ongs so so skye bo yis/_/rin chen gnas rnams gang las btsal/_/rin chen mi 'tshal ji ltar lags/_/rin po che ni ji ltar brtag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[209b.5\]]pa/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na/_/rin po che yi gling yod de/_/de yi gnas nas btsal bar bya/_/gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni/_/gser dngul la sogs rdo rnams kyi/_/gnas ni kun na yod par gsungs/_/rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga/_/dang por rgyud rnams thams 
[\[209b.6\]]cad la/_/rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang /_/bla ma'i man ngag shes pas thob/_/gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes/_/gsum pa rgyud kyi man ngag la/_/zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes/_/bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i/_/rgyal po chen po des shes so/_/lnga 
[\[209b.7\]]pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang /_/rgyal po dang ni 'brel pa yi/_/gser mgar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/dang po'i man ngag ji ltar yin/_/gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags/_/gsum pa rgyud ni ji ltar lags/_/bzhi 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pa'i yon tan ji ltar lags/_/lnga pa 'brel pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang po man ngag shes pa yang /_/rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la/_/yon tan du mar shes pa ste/_/dper na rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin/_/chu la 
[\[210a.2\]]mi 'bying 'bigs la sogs/_/du ma shes pa man ngag yin/_/rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste/_/de yis thams cad shes pa yin/_/rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi/_/tshong dpon de yis shes pa yin/_/sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi/_/yon tan kun ldan rgyal po 
[\[210a.3\]]shes/_/rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel pa'i/_/sa 'og gser gi rlangs pa shes/_/gser mgar de yis shes pa'o/_/brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma ste/_/rdo rje pha lam la sogs dang /_/e raN+Da la sogs pa yi/_/mngon 
[\[210a.4\]]sum gtan la phab pa yin/_/ma hA nI la la sogs pa/_/gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob/_/dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang /_/tshe rnams ring ba la sogs so/_/dang por gdon gyi mtshan ma ni/_/mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/_/de nas gdon gyi mtshan 
[\[210a.5\]]ma la/_/de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya/_/de nas chu mig gtsang ma ru/_/gtor ma btang la chu gtsang blang /_/gser dngul snod du chu blugs la/_/lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin sogs/_/mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Dal la/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gzhag par bya/_/gom pa 
[\[210a.6\]]gsum gyis gcad par bya/_/g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog tu ni/_/chu yi nang du me long gzhag_/phyi ru gtor ma cha gcig gzhag_/nang du yol ba dkar pos bcad/_/de ru tshogs dang bkra shis gzhag_/rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la/_/lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa 
[\[210a.7\]]dang /_/khro bos drag tu mtshams bcad la/_/sbom po khro mo lha ru bsgom/_/de yis rin chen dang po gzung /_/de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du gzhug_/thub bam mi thub la sogs pa/_/mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya/_/dbyibs dang kha dog rin po che/_/yon tan 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]med pa ga la srid/_/dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na/_/pha med pa yang ga la srid/_/de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya/_/lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das/_/gser dngul la sogs ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gser ni rnam pa 
[\[210b.2\]]gnyis yin te/_/rang bzhin dang ni bzor byas yin/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'chi ba bslu/_/bzor byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis/_/gser 'gyur gser gyi rgyan yin te/_/bdar ba'i gser gyis srid lam 'gegs/_/lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed/_/mkhas pas brtags shing shes par 
[\[210b.3\]]bya/_/dngul la sogs pa'ang de bzhin te/_/mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas/_/thams cad rin po che yin te/_/man ngag can gyis shes par bya/_/de nas bcud kyi rin po che/_/lus kyi ri rab lhun po la/_/rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang /_/thabs dang shes rab rin 
[\[210b.4\]]po che/_/shes rab rtsa yi rang bzhin te/_/thabs ni byang chub sems yin no/_/dmar dang dngas pa shes rab ste/_/dkar dang dngas pa thabs su gsungs/_/a ba d+hU tI rin chen las/_/thig le du ma phreng ba yin/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/a ba d+hU tI ji ltar 
[\[210b.5\]]lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/a ba d+hu tI'i rang bzhin las/_/steng du sgo lnga yang dag gnas/_/bar dang 'og tu 'ang de bzhin te/_/bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las/_/yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid do/_/bde chen thig le ha~M yin no/_/oM dang 
[\[210b.6\]]AHhU~M ha dang bzhi/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru/_/sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che/_/'bar ba bzhi ru yang dag bshad/_/sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che/_/mgrin pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi/_/snying gar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi/_/sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te/_/chos kyi sku ni rin 
[\[210b.7\]]chen la/_/stong pa bcu drug phreng bar bshad/_/de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don/_/pad+ma rdo rje gnyis pa yang /_/a ba d+hU tI rin po che/_/a phaT e dang waM dang bzhi/_/gsang ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad/_/a ni me long lta bu ste/_/phaT ni bya ba nan tan yin/_/e ni so 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]sor rtog pa ste/_/waM ni mnyam nyid ye shes so/_/rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te/_/rnam par thar dang stong pa dang /_/mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams/_/a ni 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi/_/phaT kyi gnas su ye shes lnga/_/e yi gnas su snyoms 
[\[211a.2\]]'jug dgu/_/waM gi gnas su lnga bcu brgyad/_/de kho na ru shes par bya/_/k+Sha oM e ta sa bon bzhi/_/yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/_/kun la khyab cing shes par bya/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/'di yis gdon rnams ji ltar thub/_/byang sems 
[\[211a.3\]]dgag pa ji ltar lags/_/skra dkar gnyer ma ji ltar zhi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te/_/mtshan dang dpe byad spong ba dang /_/phung po lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga/_/skye mched de ni lnga ru 'gyur/_/khams rnams rten gyi ngo bo ste/_/de 
[\[211a.4\]]rnams rten rtsi'i ngo bo ste/_/rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che/_/byang chub sems dgag rim pa yang /_/g.yas brkyang bas ni thabs kyis te/_/g.yon gyis shes rab rtsa mdud dgag_/sa gas nam mkha' dgag par bya/_/zlum pos gsang ba'i sna rtser dgag_/
[\[211a.5\]]la la nA dang ra sa nA/_/a ba d+hU tI'i nang chud pa/_/de ni nam mkha' zlum po ste/_/dper na sbrul gyi lce gnyis la/_/dug dang sman ni yod pa bzhin/_/gzhan yang 'dug stangs bye brag gis/_/dgag pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya/_/dgag pa srog dang rtsol ba'i 
[\[211a.6\]]rten/_/de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang /_/rim nas rim par gyen la drang /_/skad cig nas bzung lo yi bar/_/skra dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin dgag_/gang la brten pa de yi tshad/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/dbus su gnas pa ji ltar lags/_/
[\[211a.7\]]rim nas rim du ji ltar drang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'/_/shes rab zhes pa chad pa'i mtha'/_/snyoms par 'jug pa dbu ma'i don/_/g.yas kyi srog ni rtag pa'i mtha'/_/g.yon gyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mtha'/_/
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i don/_/ro ma rtag pa'i byang chub sems/_/rkyang ma khrag ni chad pa'o/_/kun 'dar ma ru gang gnas pa/_/de ni dbu mar shes par bya/_/mchog gi dga' ba rtag pa'i mtha'/_/bral ba'i dga' ba chang pa'i mtha'/_/lhan cig dga' ba 
[\[211b.2\]]dbu mar bshad/_/oM dang hU~M ni mtha' gnyis te/_/AHyi rnam pa dbu mar gnas/_/A li kA li mtha' gnyis te/_/ma ning yi ge dbu ma yin/_/skyes pa bud med mtha' gnyis te/_/ma ning gnyis su med par gsungs/_/'di ni sgom pa zung du 'jug_/de ni 
[\[211b.3\]]gnas par dbu ma'i don/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru/_/'brel ba zung du 'jug par gsungs/_/bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyud/_/snang ba zung du 'jug par gsungs/_/dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa ru/_/steng sgo'i rlung la zung du 'jug_/shes rab rnal 'byor bla 
[\[211b.4\]]ma ru/_/sih+la ga pur zung du 'jug_/rim nas rim du drang ba yang /_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni/_/bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa/_/pad+ma rdo rje 'gags pa snyam/_/de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad/_/de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i bar 
[\[211b.5\]]du drang /_/dang por de ltar shes par bya/_/de ltar sems ni brtan 'gyur na/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas/_/gsang ba'i sna rtse bar du drang /_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas/_/de ni shes pa su yis shes/_/de yi brtag pa 
[\[211b.6\]]ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du/_/a ba d+hU tI tsan+da na gnas/_/la lar sa sbrul ltar gnas/_/gzhan rnams pa thag khug par gnas/_/'di rnams rang bzhin kun la gnas/_/
[\[211b.7\]]rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gsungs/_/phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa/_/gsang ba de bzhin mthar thug pa'i/_/man ngag yod pas shes par gsungs/_/brtag pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan/_/dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste/_/gnyis 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]pa dag tu shes par bya/_/lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis/_/sgun rlung gi rang bzhin te/_/yan lag thung ba chu yi khams/_/yan lag rgyas pa sa yi khams/_/smad zheng che ba me yi khams/_/sna tshogs du ma nam mkha'i khams/_/spyi ru 
[\[212a.2\]]dkar ba chu yi khams/_/dmar ba me ru shes par bya/_/ser na de bzhin sa yi khams/_/sngo na rlung du shes par bya/_/yang na rlung gi khams yin te/_/drod rnams che na me yi khams/_/brtan na sa yi khams su gsungs/_/chu khams che na chu yi khams/_/de rnams 
[\[212a.3\]]kun ldan nam mkha'i khams/_/'jug pa bde chen sa yin te/_/ldog pa sprul pa chu ru gsungs/_/rnal 'byor rgyud ni bye brag gis/_/sems kyi gnas su shes par bya/_/shu kra rlung la sih+la me/_/sbrul dang chos su kha sbyar yin/_/gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par 
[\[212a.4\]]bya/_/de nas bye brag gsungs pa yi/_/dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ma gsum/_/kun la mkhas pas shes par bya/_/dang por dbyibs kyi brtag pa yang /_/dbral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi/_/gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang /_/gru gsum du yang shes par bya/_/
[\[212a.5\]]dkar po la sogs de dang 'dra/_/rna ba nas gzung rkang pa'i bar/_/kun la brtag cing shes par bya/_/skad ni phra dang sbom pa dang /_/ring du 'don dang thung ba dang /_/'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams/_/mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/_/rtags des brtag pa'i 
[\[212a.6\]]mtshan ma ni/_/rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/_/'dod chags sku dang zhe sdang thugs/_/mun pa gsung du shes par bya/_/dang po 'dod chags dbye ba yang /_/yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum/_/dbyibs dang kha dog skad gsum la/_/mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag_/
[\[212a.7\]]nyin bar bzhi dang mtshan bar bzhi/_/de bzhin skad cig [(]thang [,]thengs [)(]cig [,]shig [)]rnams/_/mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/_/mig 'dzums pa sbu ldang la sogs/_/dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba'i rtags/_/'dod pa'i gzugs ldan cung zhig dmar/_/sna bug dkar la sogs pa dang /_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]skad 'dar kha ni skam la sogs/_/'dod pa skye ba'i rtags su bshad/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa rgyas pa'i rtags/_/kha dog dbyibs la brtag par bya/_/sra phyir 'dod pa sa yi khams/_/chu la sogs pa de bzhin no/_/gsung dang thugs la'ang shes par bya/_/lha mos gsol 
[\[212b.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das/_/'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/de yi chen po ji ltar lags/_/zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar lags/_/sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste/_/gab pa'i gsang ba 
[\[212b.3\]]ma gtogs par/_/sbas pa'i gsang ba la zhen nas/_/srid pa'i sa bon mi zab pas/_/dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du/_/'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye/_/chen po mi rtog rang bzhin te/_/'bras bu gnyis med ye shes skyed/_/'dod chags zhes pa spang bya ste/_/
[\[212b.4\]]de yi chen po gnyen por gsungs/_/'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste/_/de yi chen po dri dang 'dra/_/gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya/_/zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra/_/thams cad rten pa sku ru bstan/_/brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan/_/rnam rtog bral ba thugs su 
[\[212b.5\]]shes/_/rnam rtog chung zhing gtong phod che/_/bla ma la gus snying rje che/_/gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa/_/'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang /_/bla ma yon tan kun ldan zhing /_/dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang /_/gsang ba'i don la ma rmongs shing /_/thugs rje chen 
[\[212b.6\]]po dang ldan pas/_/chos la ser sna med pa dang /_/gsal la gsong por smra ba dang /_/rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba dang /_/las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang /_/dam tshig dang ldan bla ma ste/_/'di la bkur gyi thams cad la/_/bsnyen cing bkur bar bya ba min/_/de nas rin 
[\[212b.7\]]chen gsum pa ni/_/gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa ste/_/rtog bral spros pa med pa yin/_/de rtogs rin chen phreng ba'o/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/gab pa zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/de yi 'bras bu ji ltar smin/_/sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/de yi 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]'bras bu ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gab pa zhes pa ye shes te/_/sum cu rtsa bdun sku gsung thugs/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul sku gsum/_/dga' ba bzhi ru mdor bsdus pa/_/dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gsang ba'o/_/
[\[213a.2\]]bdun dang ldan phyir chen po'o/_/sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i/_/gnyen po stobs kyis ma zhugs par/_/sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis/_/snyoms par zhugs na 'dod pa skye/_/'di ni rkun po ma rungs pa/_/dper na ljon shing rtsa ba las/_/yal ga me tog thams cad skyes/_/nyon 
[\[213a.3\]]mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags las/_/dug gsum la sogs thams cad de/_/sbas pa'i gsang ba 'khor ba ste/_/gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs/_/'khor ba mnar med dmyal ba dang /_/dur khrod brgyad po dregs pa can/_/snying rje med cing sha khrag za/_/shing rta'i 'khor lo 
[\[213a.4\]]bzhin du gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa sku gsum ste/_/skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang /_/'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du ni/_/tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yis su/_/sems can don la yang dag 'jug_/chos sku spros bral nam mkha' bzhin/_/sku gnyis sprin dang char lta bu/_/sku 
[\[213a.5\]]gnyis sems can don mdzad pa/_/sems can las dang smon lam stobs/_/de yi stobs kyi snang ba las/_/yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med/_/sku gsum de nyid bzhi bcu'i don/_/dur khrod la sogs brda ru shes/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda/_/brgyad ni gzugs sku 
[\[213a.6\]]gnyis kyi brda/_/gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni/_/sbom po gsang ba'i rdo rje'i brda/_/khro mo gsang ba'i pad+ma'i brda/_/sgu dang drang ba yon tan skyon/_/mdzub mo la brten mthe'u chung ni/_/nga yi gan du tshur shog yin/_/mthe bo la brten mdzub mo bar/_/khyod kyi gan du 'ong gis 
[\[213a.7\]]yin/_/mthe bong mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni/_/b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin/_/b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum por ston/_/bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang /_/srod dam nam gung tho rangs gsum/_/mdzub tshigs dang po nas gzung nas/_/tha ma'i bar du brda yin no/_/sku gsung thugs 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]kyis byin brlabs kyis/_/lan gsum bar du nan tan gnad/_/gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams/_/rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa/_/gnas ni thabs kyi 'dug stangs so/_/nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs/_/zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs/_/de 
[\[213b.2\]]bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing /_/'du ba thabs ni 'ong ba ste/_/shes rab 'ong ba nye 'du yin/_/ts+tshan+do thabs kyi stan dang rgyan/_/shes rab de bzhin nye ts+tshan+do/_/dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral/_/de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod/_/gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams/_/kha dog 
[\[213b.3\]]de bzhin dbyibs dang yang /_/yan lag tshul las shes par bya/_/de nas lha mo la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gsang ba ste rang bzhin gyis gsang ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[213b.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_slad kyis kyang dpe phyi mo la gtugs nas bcos pa'o//[ {D390}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA sa ma ya tan+t+ra 
[\[213b.5\]]rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i 
[\[213b.6\]]b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang /_rnal 'byor ma grangs med pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/_dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/_dam tshig dang ni mi ldan na/_/bsgrubs kyang 
[\[213b.7\]]'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/rgyu med pa yi 'bras bu bzhin/_/tshe yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro/_/de phyir dam tshig shin tu bsrung /_/sangs rgyas bla ma las thob phyir/_/thun mong ma yin bla ma yi/_/lnga bcu'i bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/_/thun mong brgyad dang bcu bzhi ste/_/de rnams 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]nges par shes par bya/_/de rnams spyi yi dam tshig ste/_/bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya/_/phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste/_/'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o/_/skye mched sems dpa' sems ma yin/_/gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la/_/brjed dang brnyas 
[\[214a.2\]]pa la sogs spang /_/de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya/_/don dam par ni rang rig ste/_/tshogs bsags phyir na nga yis gsungs/_/tshor ba la sogs de dang 'dra/_/sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te/_/spyod lam gsum du ma yengs shig_/gang du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung /_/
[\[214a.3\]]chu la sogs pa de bzhin no/_/mig la sogs pa de bzhin no/_/gzugs la sogs pa de bzhin bsrung /_/dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du mchod/_/brnyas shing gshe ba la sogs spang /_/sems can pho dang mo kun la/_/dpa' bo dpa' 
[\[214a.4\]]mo dam tshig bsrung /_/bza' ba la sogs dus su yang /_/bdud rtsi sbyor bas dam tshig bsrung /_/sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la/_/rang gi spyod dang gzhan spyod la/_/rjes su yi rang dam tshig yin/_/mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas/_/dam tshig bsrung zhing mchod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[214a.5\]]lus kyi nyes sdom sku yin te/_/ngag gi nyes sdom gsung du gsungs/_/yid kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs/_/o~M gyi 'od zer dkar po yis/_/'dod khams dag par gyur pa ni/_/sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba'o/_/de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya/_/bsdu ba'ang o~M du shes par 
[\[214a.6\]]bya/_/AHni kha dog dmar po yis/_/gzugs khams dag pa'i gsung dam tshig_/hU~M gi kha dog nag po yis/_/gzugs med dag pa'i dam tshig go/_/o~M ni spyi bor yang dag gnas/_/AHni de bzhin mgrin par gnas/_/hU~M ni snying gar spro dang bsdu/_/sku yi mkha' 'gro bcu 
[\[214a.7\]]gnyis su/_/'dod khams dag pa'i dam tshig go/_/gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su/_/gzugs khams dag pa'i dam tshig yin/_/thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su/_/gzugs med dag pa'i dam tshig ste/_/o~M dang AHdang hU~M la bsdu/_/o~M ni rgyu yi sku bcu 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]gnyis/_/AHni lam gyi sku bcu gnyis/_/hU~M ni 'bras bu sku bcu gnyis/_/bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs/_/ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o/_/dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs/_/ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs/_/ye 
[\[214b.2\]]shes gcig gyur sdom pa'o/_/sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs/_/ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o/_/bde chen snying po ha~M nyid la/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang /_/ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/o~M dang AHdang hU~M dang yang /_/yan lag bzhi bzhir thub pas 
[\[214b.3\]]gsungs/_/rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu la/_/bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya/_/a~M dang ha~M gnyis rang bzhin gyi/_/sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya/_/sngags kyi grangs ni nyi khri stong /_/drug brgya bzlas par shes par bya/_/lag pa bskyod pa rang bzhin gar/_/rkang pa rang 
[\[214b.4\]]bzhin dkyil 'khor ro/_/de ltar gnas na dam tshig go/_/gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag yang /_/'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir/_/mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang /_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa/_/gsang ba'i rdo rje pad+ma dang /_/ji ltar rol pa'i spyod pa kun/_/tha 
[\[214b.5\]]snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug_/gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni/_/rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu/_/theg pa che la smod pa dang /_/gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang /_/rnal 'byor kun la gnod pa dang /_/sems can kun la 'tshe byed pa/_/'di gsang ba ni dam tshig yin/_/
[\[214b.6\]]sbas pa bsrung ba'i rim pa yang /_/ma byin blang ba'i dam tshig ste/_/'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i/_/'dod chags spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba bzhi pa yin/_/ro tsa'i sha dang bcud kyi sha/_/kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang /_/mar 
[\[214b.7\]]la gcig ste 'o ma gnyis/_/gzhan ni gsum ste yan lag bcu/_/'di ltar dam tshig yin par gsungs/_/bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du/_/bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste/_/dang por yungs kar tha ma yang /_/byi la'i kham gyi tshul du bza'/_/mtshan mo shes rab sku 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gsung thugs/_/nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs/_/nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar/_/nyi ma gung ni thabs kyi dus/_/nam srod nam ni langs pa dang /_/nam gyi gung ni shes rab dus/_/dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi gcad/_/dam tshig 'di las mnyams na/_/phyogs bcu 
[\[215a.2\]]'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/_/mchod dang bsrung ba la sogs byed/_/gzhan yang gsang ba'i bye brag la/_/gsang ba sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/lus la me dang khrag mi gdon/_/srog gam zug rngu'i phyir ma gtogs/_/srog chags 'dod 
[\[215a.3\]]pa spyod mthong na/_/rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya/_/dam tshig bsrung phyir dben par 'dug_/las su rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam/_/'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad/_/bdag gi bcu bzhi yin par gsungs/_/thos pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'i don/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi/_/
[\[215a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu/_/sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid/_/rdo rje mi phyed phyir dam tshig_/btsun mo dam tshig gis brgyan mdzes/_/b+ha ga mnyam par 'jog pas so/_/snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba/_/bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o/_/rdo rje snying po la sogs 
[\[215a.5\]]pa/_/bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs/_/e ni yan lag brgyad yin no/_/ba~M ni bcu po'i rang bzhin te/_/ma ni lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no/_/yA ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs/_/e ni srog chags gsod pa ste/_/ba~M ni ma byin len pa'o/_/ma ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'o/_/yA ni 
[\[215a.6\]]'dod chags spyod pa'o/_/e ni sku yi dam tshig ste/_/ba~M ni gsung gi dam tshig go/_/ma ni thugs kyi dam tshig go_/yA ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go/_/dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrungs na/_/'jig rten pa dang 'bum 'gyur ba'i/_/rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs/_/dam tshig 
[\[215a.7\]]nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni/_/lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung /_/ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs smra/_/kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur ba dang /_/lag gi rdzas rnams mi thub cing /_/'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung /_/de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa des/_/dam tshig nyams pa shin du bsam/_/
[\[215b\]]
