[\[215b.1\]]bla ma rdo rje spun gral du/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la/_/gser dngul la sogs brgya 'am stong /_/rta dang glang po la sogs dang /_/bai DUr+ya dang man shel dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong /_/mar me la sogs de bzhin no/_/tshogs kyi 'khor 
[\[215b.2\]]lo chen po bskor/_/tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pa gso/_/gal te nyams pa ma gsos na/_/nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan/_/gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig gam/_/yul dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam/_/skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya/_/'dug na nyes pa bsam 
[\[215b.3\]]mi khyab/_/rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang /_/gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang /_/ril bu mig sman la sogs dang /_/zhi rgyas la sogs las rnams dang /_/'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi/_/sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan 
[\[215b.4\]]ma gcig_/gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa/_/dam tshig 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'bru rnams sna tshogs skye 'gyur ba/_/rin chen sa las skyes pa bzhin/_/dam pa sku gsung thugs yin te/_/de las 'das na 'tshig par 'gyur/_/ji ltar bu ni med pa'i khyim/_/
[\[215b.5\]]shi ma thag tu stong par 'gyur/_/de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na/_/mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye/_/pi wang gling bu sbyor kun sogs/_/rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung /_/de bzhin dam tshig med gyur na/_/sngags bzlas bsgom pa la sogs pa/_/'bras bu med par 
[\[215b.6\]]brlag par 'gyur/_/nas las nas kyi myu gu skye/_/dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang /_/tshe 'dir thob par gsungs pa ste/_/dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus/_/bstan bya gzhan min nga yis te/_/skye ba gzhan min pha dang ma/_/man ngag gzhan min sa ma ya/_/bzhi ni yin par 
[\[215b.7\]]gsungs pa'o/_/de ltar dam tshig dang ldan pa/_/bud med 'du zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar ston/_/nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang /_/rgyal po'i 'khor yul la sogs 'du/_/ngag ni snyan cing bde bar 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]'gyur/_/srog gcod la sogs tshig smras kyang /_/sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/lus kyis sems can bsad byas kyang /_/rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sku ni thob par gsungs pa'o/_/ngag gis phra ma'i tshig smras kyang /_/nyes par mi 
[\[216a.2\]]'gyur gsung thob 'gyur/_/yid kyis mnar sems bsams byas kyang /_/nyes par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur/_/dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no/_/e ma'o rgyud ni ngo re mtshar/_/dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra 
[\[216a.3\]]dang /_/lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D391}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA ba la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[216a.4\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang /_lA ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang /_rnal 'byor ma dang /_
[\[216a.5\]]ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/'jig rten na ni cher grags pa/_/dgra ni chen po drug yin te/_/ji ltar nyi ma nub pa'i tshe/_/grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kyis/_/rta dang glang po la sogs pa/_/rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed/_/
[\[216a.6\]]thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin yul drug gi ni dgras/_/shes rab nyi ma nub pa'i tshe/_/ma rig pa yi mun pa la/_/so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi/_/ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi/_/rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed/_/bde ba med pa'i gnas su skye/_/
[\[216a.7\]]dgra de yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir/_/mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med/_/gtor ma sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor med/_/klog dang sgom pa bsam gtan med/_/g.yeng ba'i tshes dang skar ma'i tshogs/_/thams cad spangs te bde ba yi/_/stan la bdag nyid legs 'dug 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]ste/_/shes rab ye shes bsrub par bya/_/shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar/_/yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems/_/de dag las ni bzlog nas su/_/las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos/_/ye shes me ni chen po 'bar/_/rnam rtog sreg ste bdud rtsi'i ros/_/til gyi 'bru bzhin 
[\[216b.2\]]gang ba ste/_/skye ba med pa'i gnas su gzung /_/de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas/_/mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur/_/de nyid las ni bzlog nas su/_/rang sems stong par bsgom par bya/_/chos la bdag med rtogs pa na/_/de tshe sems ni rtogs par 
[\[216b.3\]]'gyur/_/thams cad stong par ros gang ste/_/bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste/_/'di la bsal ba ci yang med/_/bsnan par bya ba ci yang med/_/de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol/_/rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang /_/rigs lnga 
[\[216b.4\]]rigs ni brgya la sogs/_/de nyid 'di la tha dad med/_/ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas/_/glang po'i rjes ni mi btsal ltar/_/sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyur na/_/rnam rtog gang yang mi btsal lo/_/ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la/_/sman nyid dug tu sbyar te byin/_/sman las dug 'byung sbyor 
[\[216b.5\]]ba yang /_/sman pa mkhas pas sbyor ba shes/_/gzhan yang mar dang kha ra dang /_/mar gyi snying po la sogs pa/_/'thungs te zhu na sman du 'gyur/_/de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang /_/drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don/_/sgra ni ji bzhin ji bzhin min/_/dgongs 
[\[216b.6\]]pa dang ni dgongs pa min/_/bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du/_/yongs su brtags nas nga yi bka'/_/blang bar bya yi mos pa'am/_/gzhan gyis mkhas pa 'jug mi bya/_/ji ltar skye bo blun po ste/_/dgra ru gyur pa'i skye bo yis/_/sman yin byas te dug byin 
[\[216b.7\]]na/_/sman du dmigs te dug zos na/_/zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur/_/thabs rnams thams cad sgyu mar shes/_/shes rab brjod du med par gsungs/_/ji ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis/_/dug ni dug gis 'byin par byed/_/ji ltar me yis tshig pa la/_/de bzhin me yis 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gdung bar bya/_/ji ltar 'dod chags che ba la/_/'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya/_/ji ltar zhe sdang che ba la/_/zhe sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya/_/de bzhin gti mug che ba la/_/gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya/_/dper na rlung na mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu/_/de nyid 
[\[217a.2\]]nags sreg me yi grogs su 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'dod la brten pa bde ba'i yul/_/dug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob/_/ril bu mig sman la sogs pa/_/'di nyid las ni thams cad byung /_/ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas/_/gzings la brten nas pha rol 
[\[217a.3\]]'gro/_/pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed/_/de bzhin rang rig tshol bas kyang /_/bud med sgyu ma la brten te/_/rang rig ye shes thob par bya/_/rang rig ye shes thob pa dang /_/bud med sgyu ma dor bar bya/_/zab mo'i dgongs pa ma shes shing /_/zab mo'i dgongs pa ma rtogs 
[\[217a.4\]]par/_/zab mo'i spyod pa spyod par byed/_/sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung /_/ji ltar ri yi rtse mo nas/_/skyes bu 'ga' zhing lhung 'gyur na/_/de ni lhung ba chen por 'gyur/_/gzhan yang dar gyi srin bu yis/_/rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed/_/mtshan mo me yi srin bu 
[\[217a.5\]]yang /_/rang gis rang ni sreg par byed/_/sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing /_/mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol/_/spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi/_/mtshon bya mtshon byed ma yin te/_/lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa yi/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o/_/dpal stobs po che'i rgyud 
[\[217a.6\]]las mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//gang zhig brtag par byed pa yang /_/gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa ru/_/khru do pa yi maN+Dal la/_/dang po ba yi rnam lnga yis/_/sor gcig tsam du byug par bya/_/de nas dri chen dri chu yis/_/byugs te me tog 
[\[217a.7\]]sngon po dgram/_/rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan/_/bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang dbus/_/de nas bzlas pa khri'am 'bum/_/bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs te/_/gang zhig brtag pa'i mi de la/_/dang po mtshams gcad khrus byas te/_/slog pa nag po phyir bzlog gon/_/skra ni 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]gyen bcings sha bcings dang /_/ber ka thogs te shar sgor gzhag_/tshil chen me mar shar du gtam/_/nub tu me long dngul la sogs/_/dag pa de la sman lnga dang /_/dri lngas byugs te bkru bar bya/_/de nas me long nang du yang /_/gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag bya ste/_/gtso bo'i 
[\[217b.2\]]sngags kyi mtha' ru ni/_/gdon gyi ming dang sngags btags na/_/lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun/_/mtshan mar 'byung ba the tsom med/_/mi de rgyan ni tha dad de/_/lha la sogs mthong bye brag go/_/dus ni 'byung po'i nyi ma sogs/_/mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe/_/de tsheg don ni dbang 
[\[217b.3\]]du bsdu/_/tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang /_/mdza' bshes zug rngu la sogs pa/_/gdon la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir/_/dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs/_/brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang /_/mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs/_/bskor la mtshan ma brtag 
[\[217b.4\]]par bya/_/dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang /_/dbab pa de bzhin sdig la sogs/_/mtshan ma me long dag la ni/_/brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i/_/mtshan ma brtag la bla ma yi/_/zhal nas yang dag shes par bya/_/nad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba'i phyir/_/gso ba'i rig 
[\[217b.5\]]pa las gsungs pa'i/_/rlung dang pad kan mkhris pa dang /_/'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas/_/gnas bzhir 'khor lor gnas pa ste/_/lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru/_/sngags pas lag pas mnye bya ste/_/me long dkyil du brtags byas na/_/rlung la sogs pa shes 
[\[217b.6\]]par nges/_/de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la/_/gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya/_/dug ni brtag pa'i rim pa yang /_/nad grol yan lag thams cad la/_/gang du dug zhugs mchen ma brtag_/de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang /_/sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te/_/mkhas pas 
[\[217b.7\]]brtags nas gso bar bya/_/dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang /_/gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis/_/srung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya/_/gtso bo'i bzlas pa khri'am 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]'bum/_/bsnyen pa byas te de nas yang /_/gser ram dngul las bzo byas te/_/nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'am/_/yang na 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas/_/rdo rje ra ba la sogs bya/_/yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga dang /_/rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang /_/
[\[218a.2\]]de nang gzhag ste rab gnas bya/_/yongs su rdzogs nas bcing bar bya/_/gzhan yang grog 'am shing shun nam/_/dur khrod dag gi ro ras la/_/bsang dang bgegs bskrad tshul bzhin bya/_/bzlas pa gong dang 'dra ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyur na/_/sngags kyang 
[\[218a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bri/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis/_/lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya/_/yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug la/_/dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris te/_/bsrung ba'i lus la mtshan par bsgom/_/rtsibs mchan drug la g.yung drung gi/_/yi ge drug ni bris pa 
[\[218a.4\]]ste/_/bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par bsgom/_/dbus su yi ge k+Sha bris te/_/bar chad thams cad bsal bar bsam/_/cho ga yongs su rdzogs bya ste/_/bzo byas snod ni kha dog sgyur/_/legs par sbas te spyi bo 'am/_/mgrin pa de bzhin dpung ba yi/_/tshangs pa'i bu ga longs spyod 
[\[218a.5\]]mnyam/_/sor bzhi dag tu bcing bar bya/_/gzhan yang nad pa'am rnal 'byor pa/_/ngag la srung na dang por yang /_/gdon bsal bsangs te gnas gsum du/_/thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod/_/gzhan yang gnas ni sum cu bdun/_/thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod/_/
[\[218a.6\]]de nas go cha mtshan ma yang /_/tshul bzhin mthun par shes par bya/_/de nas stan nam mal cha la/_/oM AHbadzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/_/sgom mam gzhan la'ang bri bar bya/_/gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yis/_/mthil du gur kum dag sbyar te/_/g.yon gyi sbom mo khro mo yis/_/
[\[218a.7\]]spyi bo dpral ba rna ba mig_/sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang /_/dpung pa snying ga lte ba dang /_/'og gi snod gnyis yan lag la/_/sngags dang bcas pas legs par 'tsho/_/gzhan yang skud pa sna lnga la/_/sngags dang bcas na bsrung bar 'gyur/_/dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las bsrung 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/_/de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal te/_/rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa/_/bsrung ba'i 'khor lo de ltar na/_/ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ye shes kyis ni 
[\[218b.2\]]de nyid kyi/_/rtog pa rab tu bshad par bya/_/de la ye shes kyi ni gnas/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang /_/rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che/_/nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon/_/de la phyi yi ye shes ni/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan dang 'brel pa'o/_/
[\[218b.3\]]de ltar rtogs pa phyi'i ye shes/_/nang gi phung sogs lha ru rtogs/_/de nyid dang bral ye shes so/_/de nas gsang ba'i ye shes ni/_/rtsa dang rlung dang thig ler rtogs/_/rtog pa de dang bral ba ni/_/gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad/_/dga' ba mchog dang bral ba'i dga'/_/
[\[218b.4\]]lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa/_/bde bar rtog pa rnam rtog ste/_/de spong rab gsang ye shes so/_/de nas ye shes chen po bzhi/_/dang po ro mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i/_/ye shes de nyid yod pa la/_/rnam rtog spong ste de bzhin 'jog_/de nyid rang rig chen po ste/_/de 
[\[218b.5\]]nyid ye shes chen po'o/_/de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyi/_/sa ni nges par thob pa'o/_/dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas ye shes chen po yi/_/brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya/_/dang por ro mnyam gyur pa'o/_/stong 
[\[218b.6\]]pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/_/phung po khams dang skye mched sogs/_/rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang /_/dga' dang mchog dga' bral ba dang /_/de la sogs pa thams cad kun/_/sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya/_/de nyid gzhan rig ces bya ste/_/
[\[218b.7\]]rang rig sems kyi de nyid la/_/gnyis su med par bsgom pa ni/_/de nyid ye shes chen po ste/_/mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa'o/_/dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las ye shes chen po brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_rnal 'byor ma dang /_ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/_g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[219a.2\]]dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D392}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_
[\[219a.3\]]dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi/_/rang lus rtsa yi 'khor lo bzhi'i gtso bo/_/snying po de la yang dag phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang bzhi'i de nyid bdag la gsungs/_/nyon cig 
[\[219a.4\]]rdo rje snying po'i bdag_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams kyi/_/de nyid dang por bshad bya ste/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi dpe byad yin/_/sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs/_/lnga ni ye shes lnga yin te/_/dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings/_/phyag mtshan sku mdog gzhan nas gsungs/_/
[\[219a.5\]]gu h+ya'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad/_/nas dang sor tshigs yin par 'dod/_/de nyid thabs dang shes rab yin/_/don dam nyid la dbyer med de/_/bsgom bya med de sgom pa med/_/bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du med/_/sems kyi gzhi la sku lnga dang /_/
[\[219a.6\]]ston pa med cing bstan pa med/_/'jigs dang rnam rtog kun dang bral/_/de nyid bzhi pa'i de nyid do/_/dang po rlung gi de nyid de/_/srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang ha~M/_/a ni chos rnams thog ma nas/_/ma skyes pa yi don yin no/_/ha~M ni gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong /_/ldang 'jug 
[\[219a.7\]]gsum ni sku gsung thugs/_/sems kyi gzhi dang sku lnga dang /_/rnam par thar dang stong ba dang /_/de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad sogs/_/de dag rlung gi de nyid de/_/de nas thig le'i de nyid kyang /_/nyi zla thabs dang shes rab ste/_/sngags kyi phreng ba mtshan dpe yin/_/thig le ye shes 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]lnga rang bzhin/_/gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yin/_/phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shes/_/de nas 'og gi sgo dag ni/_/de nyid yang dag bshad bya ste/_/rtsa gsum sku gsung thugs ngo bo/_/rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yin no/_/tsaN+DA lI ni nyi shu bzhi/_/de nyid ye shes nyi shu bzhi/_/chos sku'i 
[\[219b.2\]]phrin las nyi shu bzhi/_/kha sbyar thabs dang shes rab ste/_/'dzag dang 'bar ba gnyis med yin/_/'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste/_/drug ni de nyid drug yin te/_/sgrol ma rlung gi de nyid de/_/me ni gos dkar ngo bo nyid/_/bcu drug stong pa bcu drug yin/_/bzhi ni ye shes bzhi 
[\[219b.3\]]yin no/_/rnam par thar dang stong pa dang /_/de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad dang /_/rig sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu/_/ye shes lnga bcu la sogs pa/_/rtsa 'dab de nyid yin par nges/_/rtsa de gnas pa'i rim pa yang /_/'khor lo ba thag khug pa las/_/g.yas 
[\[219b.4\]]g.yon sbrul ltar 'khril ba ste/_/phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu/_/gsum pa'i dbang gis de nyid kyang /_/sih+la shes rab chos dbyings te/_/ga pur thabs kyi ye shes bzhi/_/rtsa ni 'og min gnas yin te/_/dga' ba mchog dga' byang chub phyogs/_/rang bzhin dga' 
[\[219b.5\]]ba chos sku ste/_/bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis/_/bcu drug stong pa bcu drug go/_/rgyud kyi tshul du sgyu ma tsam/_/gang zhig rang rig 'dod pas kyang /_/dang por ngo bo shes bya ste/_/de nas de nyid shes par bya/_/gal te de nyid mi shes par/_/zab mo'i lam 
[\[219b.6\]]nyid sgom byed na/_/'bras bu med cing brlag par nges/_/lha yi de nyid ma shes na/_/dur khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra/_/de bzhin dur khrod srin mo 'dra/_/spyod pa'i de nyid ma shes na/_/grong khyer gnas pa'i smyon pa 'dra/_/khyi phag srin po rak+Sha 'dra/_/phyag 
[\[219b.7\]]mtshan de nyid ma shes na/_/brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra/_/phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na/_/rgyal po pang gi btsun mo 'dra/_/rlung gi de nyid ma shes na/_/brgya byin spyi bo'i dud pa 'dra/_/rtsa yi de nyid ma shes na/_/tsan+dan shing gi sprul sogs 'dra/_/lus kyi gnyer ma 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]dag dang 'dra/_/lus kyi dri ma chu dang 'dra/_/thig le'i de nyid ma shes na/_/tsan+dan shing gi 'dzer par 'dra/_/'khor lo'i de nyid ma shes na/_/brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra/_/de bzhin srid pa'i 'khor lo 'dra/_/pad+ma'i de nyid ma shes na/_/'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 
[\[220a.2\]]'dra/_/stug po'i de nyid ma shes na/_/mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra/_/kha sbyor de nyid ma shes na/_/thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra/_/gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na/_/'khor lo sgyur rgyal pho brang 'dra/_/byang sems de nyid ma shes na/_mi gtsang sgo yi lud pa 'dra/_/sih+la'i 
[\[220a.3\]]de nyid ma shes na/_/mtshon sogs las byung khrag dang 'dra/_/dga' ba'i de nyid ma shes na/_/smad 'tshong ma yi 'dod chags 'dra/_/spang bya'i de nyid ma shes na/_/grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po 'dra/_/gnyen po'i de nyid ma shes na/_/rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer 'dra/_/rang rig de nyid ma shes 
[\[220a.4\]]na/_/'dus byas nam mkha' stong pa 'dra/_/gzhan yang de nyid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul dang ni/_/rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu/_/de nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur/_/kye ho mgon po thugs rje che/_/rang rig ye shes tshol ba la/_/rang dang gzhan 
[\[220a.5\]]gyi sde pa la/_/'di la khyad par med dam ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/khyad par chen po de nyid de/_/gzhan ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang /_/de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags/_/chad pa bdag dang dbang phyug dang /_/phya dang byed pa po nyid las/_/rgyu sogs rgyud las khyad par 'phags/_/
[\[220a.6\]]gang zag bdag dang bral ba'i phyir/_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen dang /_/rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings/_/dman pa rnams kyi snang bas khyab/_/theg chen rang bzhin lha yis khyad/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po sogs/_/de nyid kyi ni khyad par che/_/legs par bstan gyis legs par 
[\[220a.7\]]bzung /_/de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing yid rangs par gyur to/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA la dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]{D393}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrIdz+nyA na mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/_/gsang ba bla na med pa yi/_/lta ba zhes pa gang gang lags/_/spyod 
[\[220b.2\]]pa gang dang gang lags pa/_/gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin/_/gdod nas spros bral lhun gyis grub/_/rang rig ye shes dbyings na gsal/_/ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa med/_/shes rab snying po 
[\[220b.3\]]rtser byung ba/_/lta ba kun gyi yang rtse yin/_/don dam rang rig ye shes la/_/blang ba med cing dor ba med/_/dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med/_/bsgom pa po med bsgom bya med/_/dmigs med gnas su snying rje dang /_/dmigs med gnas su shes rab gnyis/_/blo dang lhan cig 
[\[220b.4\]]gcig gyur pa/_/nam mkhar nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas/_/mtshan ma'i rnam rtog bsgom pa min/_/dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab/_/de nyid la yang sgro mi gdags/_/dang por bskal par bsgoms pa dang /_/rang rig skad cig thob pa 
[\[220b.5\]]gnyis/_/brgya stong la sogs char mi phod/_/dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus te/_/dper na mtsho dang rlabs rjes bzhin/_/dngos po sgom pa bsgom pa min/_/dngos med sgom pa sgom pa min/_/dngos dang dngos med ro mnyam na/_/ma bsgoms na yang bsgoms pa nyid/_/bsgom 
[\[220b.6\]]dang mi bsgom gnyis ka med/_/'od gsal de la sems zin na/_/gzung 'dzin dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms/_/phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas/_/rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spangs/_/'bring gis rjes thob 
[\[220b.7\]]stong par lta/_/tha mas rjes thob sgyu mar lta/_/seng ge lta bu'i lta spyod ni/_/bzhi pa yin par nga yis gsungs/_/de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad/_/spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te/_/kun tu bzang po b+hu su ku/_/a ba d+hU tI gsum yin no/_/spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]zas/_/gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang /_/ngo bo dang ni tshad dang yang /_/thabs dang dgongs pa dgos pa dang /_/mkhas pas kun la sbyar bar bya/_/sangs rgyas rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs/_/rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs/_/las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga/_/
[\[221a.2\]]kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin/_/sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang /_/dkon mchog gsum ni 'dzin pa dag_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi spyod/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin/_/bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod/_/dam tshig yid 'ong dus bzhi ru/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rin chen spyod/_/
[\[221a.3\]]theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin/_/pad+ma shar gyi spyod pa yin/_/dam tshig thams cad ldan pa dang /_/ma grol la sogs dgrol ba ni/_/rta yi rgyal po'i spyod pa yin/_/za ba nyal ba 'chag pa gsum/_/rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste/_/g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba ni/_/
[\[221a.4\]]b+hu su ku yi spyod pa'o/_/rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang /_/phyag rgya bsten dang rnam pa gsum/_/a bad+hU tI'i spyod pa ste/_/rgyan la drug ste phyag rgya lnga/_/bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas/_/mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o/_/gnas ni kha na ma tho med/_/phyi nang g.yeng med gnas 
[\[221a.5\]]yin no/_/rtog pa 'joms pa slob pa'i dus/_/grub na rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i dus/_/thabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang /_/sgro dang skur pa med pa'o/_/dgongs pa gnyen po'i stobs yin te/_/rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa dang /_/zug rngu'i kha zas ma yin te/_/bla ma'i 
[\[221a.6\]]dus thabs legs bsten blang /_/kha zas rnam rtog chung ba yi/_/las dang po yis bya bar gsungs/_/dbye ba gsum dang bye brag ni/_/gong du gsungs pa kho na'o/_/ngo bo rtog med sems de nyid/_/gtsang sme 'gags dang sprul pa ston/_/'di nyid 'grub pa'i tshad yin no/_/
[\[221a.7\]]dgos pa la yang gnyis yod de/_/gtsang sme spang ba dgos pa las/_/dgos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi/_/rang sems brtan g.yo brtag pa dang /_/phyag rgya khyad par tshol ba dang /_/des 'dul gang zag gzhug pa dang /_/mi mos skur pa dgag pa'o/_/gsang sngags 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rgyal po'i lta spyod kyis/_/'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs/_/dus dang brgyal dang 'gyel gyur pas/_/dbugs dbyung ba yi ting 'dzin gyis/_thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas/_/thams cad mgrin gcig 'di skad gsol/_/dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa yi/_/
[\[221b.2\]]lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che/_/g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spang ba yi/_/spyod pa 'di yang ngo mtshar che/_/chos rnams stong par ro mnyam na/_/lta dang mi lta ga la yod/_/gtsang sme bdud rtsi ro gcig la/_/spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod/_/dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje 'dzin/_/
[\[221b.3\]]mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod/_/thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod/_/'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrib g.yogs kyis/_/rin chen sems ni dri can byas/_/zla ba 
[\[221b.4\]]rab rib sel byed de/_/mig gis rang gi rdul mi mthong /_/sems kyis de nyid ma rtogs par/_/tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin/_/de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan/_/mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis/_/bdud rtsi'i de nyid ma shes te/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang la 
[\[221b.5\]]sogs brtags/_/de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan/_/gnas pa'i rkyen dang g.yeng ba'i rkyen/_/de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan/_/rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis/_/mnyam gzhag rjes thob rgyal po bstan/_/mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis/_/'khrul pas 
[\[221b.6\]]gzung 'dzin gnyis su brtags/_/de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan/_/lta spyod 'di la nan tan gyis/_/de nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/_phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal ye shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 
[\[221b.7\]]lta spyod zung du 'jug pa rdzogs so//_//rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA la dang /_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]{D394}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrIdz+nyA na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ma sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/_/rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang /_/
[\[222a.2\]]ye shes gang lags 'bar ba gang /_/dpal ni gang lags bdag la gsungs/_/'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/_/dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te/_/gnyis med bde chen ro las byung /_/gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig go/_/sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes 
[\[222a.3\]]che/_/rang byin brlab pa lte bar te/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsang bar ro/_/smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar/_/thung du gnas shing ring du 'gyur/_/de nyid drang dang kha dbye dang /_/rgyas par bya ba gsum yod de/_/dang por drang ba'i rnam pa yang /_/'drongs pa'i 
[\[222a.4\]]tshad ni gsum yod de/_/sgo gsum yon tan gsum ldan na/_/sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges/_/'bring la sor gnyis tha ma la/_/sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung /_/sbom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam/_/dang po bya gdong nyid na gnas/_/rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi/_/
[\[222a.5\]]stong pa bcu drug khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad/_/nyi shu lte bar nyi shu lnga/_/snying ga ru ni gnas pa'o/_/sman la sogs pa kun ldang bas/_/drang ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/_/rnam snang sku rags bcing ba dang /_/rgyab yol dbul dang mchod pa dbul/_/gdan khri dbul dang sku khrus dbul/_/
[\[222a.6\]]sman mchod dbul dang me mchod dbul/_/de nas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul/_/kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo 'am/_/khro bo mdzub mo'i rtse mo la/_/bdud rtsi ril bu legs byas te/_/mkhas pas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul/_/mngon du shes pa gdon mi za/_/bde ba chen po'i mchod pa 
[\[222a.7\]]yis/_/khams gsum mchod pa gdon mi za/_/dar ram men tri sor bzhi'i tshad/_/rked par ska rags dbul bar bya/_/sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su/_/ras bal la sogs rgyab yol dbul/_/shing bu rigs dang mthun pa yin/_/sbom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dri med sman dang snum ldan pa'i/_/zug rngu mi skyed mchod rdzas kyis/_/bai ro tsa na'i lam du mchod/_/dri zhim chu yis khrus byas te/_/khrus kyis lus la mchod pa dbul/_/sman dang snum gyi phye ma yis/_/sgo gnyis dag tu mchod pa dbul/_/shin tu dro ba'i me dag gis/_/
[\[222b.2\]]gtum mo'i me la mchod pa dbul/_/rked pa'i tshad mnyam ka ti ka/_/gdan khri bstab pa'i mchod pa dbul/_/de yis 'drongs par gdon mi za/_/de nas rgyas par bya ba yang /_/gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste/_/phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun/_/rgyas par byed pa'i las yin te/_/
[\[222b.3\]]rgyas pa'i sbyor ba gsum byas na/_/dper na me tog pad+ma bzhin/_/de nas dbye ba'i rim pa yang /_/gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste/_/dus gsum lce yi rtse mos kyang /_/bskyod na nges par kha 'byed do/_/de nyid gsum ni me rang bzhin/_/me 'bar ba yi rkyen gyur pa/_/rlung nyid 
[\[222b.4\]]yin par gsungs pa ste/_/rkyen des me nyid 'bar bar bshad/_/gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag dang /_/srog rtsol rlung ni dbu mar dgag_/bum pa zhabs med rlung phul nas/_/sgo dgu phyi rol drag tu bud/_/lus kyi ngal dub cha mnyam ste/_/sbyor ba rdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen/_/
[\[222b.5\]]bde ba las ni rdo rje 'chang /_/bde ba yis ni bde ba 'grub/_/rgyu bde ba las 'bras bu bde/_/rgyu yi nang na 'di mchog la/_/'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go/_/de nas bde ba'i rkyen gyur pa/_/srid pa dgag dang rlung dgag pa/_/gnas nas gnas su rten gzung ste/_/g.yas 
[\[222b.6\]]brkyang bas ni ro ma dgag_/dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha' 'gro g.yon/_/g.yon brkyang bas ni rkyang ma ste/_/sa gas kun 'dar ma ru gzung /_/de bzhin zlum pos dbu mar gzung /_/de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang /_/dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon/_/de bzhin kun la sbyar bar 
[\[222b.7\]]bya/_/gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang /_/dril can bu gu dgu lam gyis/_/rlung rgyu phyi ru bus byas te/_/rkang lag drag tu bsgrims byas na/_/zin par 'di la the tsom med/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis/_/thun mong du ni bya bar gsungs/_/bai ro tsa na las kyi 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]rlung /_/gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung rnams dag_/dang po nyid du bsdams byas na/_/zin par 'di la the tsom med/_/dbye ba bsdam pa'i man ngag go/_/byed pa spel mar song gyur na/_/mi zin pa la the tsom med/_/gnas gsum dag tu k+Sha bsams te/_/
[\[223a.2\]]dbugs gsum pa yis yar drangs te/_/lte ba'i gyen la drangs kyang zin/_/'di ni gang zag mchog gis yin/_/mdzes pa'i spyi bo de nyid la/_/gyen du bkan dang thur du bkan/_/drang por g.yas g.yon btsan thabs la/_/ka ti'i gzer ni btsan thabs gcig_/sbom 
[\[223a.3\]]po khro mos mnan pa ste/_/bla ma'i zhal nas ma blangs na/_/lus kyi nad bzhi kun nas skye/_/chu 'gags chu so skrangs la sogs/_/lus smad nad sna nyi shu 'byung /_/gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis ni/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/bla ma mnyes 
[\[223a.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_/lus srog longs spyod thams cad kyis/_/dus gsum maN+Dal dang bcas mchod/_/lus srog btang bar phangs pa bas/_/man ngag dam pa de bas phangs/_/de bas btsan thabs legs par sba/_/man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas/_/de nyid rgyud du shes 
[\[223a.5\]]par bya/_/zab mo'i don ston rgyal por gsungs/_/rdo rje phag mo la sogs rnams/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad byung 'di/_/khyod la gtad do dam du sngos/_/kun la spel na dam tshig nyams/_/kye ma rgyud kyi don 'di la/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/_/
[\[223a.6\]]dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/_/thams cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te/_/dga' zhing mgu nas yi rang ngo /_/dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang cher gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs so//_//sing g+ha la'i gling gi rnal 'byor 
[\[223a.7\]]ma tsan+da mA la dang /_dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D395}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI tsan+d+ra mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'tshal lo/_kye ho mgon po rdo rje can/_/sgron ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/_/nges pa gang lags tshad gang lags/_/rang bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags/_/mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rang bzhin grub pa sgrub 'dod pa/_/bla ma'i 
[\[223b.2\]]bka' drin legs mnos te/_/dur khrod la sogs sa phyogs su/_/bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan/_/brtags pa las dang po yi gnas/_/gang zag mchog la brtag tu med/_/yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'dug ste/_/bla med sems gzung rnal 'byor pas/_/sgo gsum 
[\[223b.3\]]dal ba'i tshad brtag ste/_/bcing ba gsum ni nges bsgoms pas/_/skye ba gcig gis grub par nges/_/dbugs bcing kun rdzob sna rtse yin/_/yid bcings sor bzhi nam mkha'i khams/_/sems bcings rang rig bsam mi khyab/_/rgyu rkyen las ni sna tshogs las/_/sems 
[\[223b.4\]]can mos pa sna tshogs 'byung /_/de dag bcings gsum dag pa yis/_/sems can bcings las nges par grol/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/'du shes gsum gyi cha las grol/_/thig le cha gsum phra mo ni/_/yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i rim/_/sgra dang rang rig re 
[\[223b.5\]]rer snang /_/stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul/_/sa dang lam sogs rim pa kun/_/rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar/_/de nas sgron ma'i tshad bstan te/_/tshad ni spyi dang bye brag ste/_/brgya phrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis dang /_/yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba/_/
[\[223b.6\]]gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi tshad/_/brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu lnga/_/yi ge bcu dgu las byung ba/_/rin chen phreng ba'i nges pa'i tshad/_/brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu bzhi/_/mi 'gyur bcu gsum las byung ba/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o/_/brgyad cu rtsa lngar yi ge bzhis/_/
[\[223b.7\]]ma tshang pa las gang 'gyur ba/_/gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig_/rin chen 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do/_/sum cu rtsa gcig yi ge ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis las byung ba/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yin no/_/drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug_/dam 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi tshad/_/drug cu yi ge nyi shu gcig_/gsang ba rdo rjer rab tu grags/_/drug cu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba/_/bcu drug stobs po che yi tshad/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yi ge lnga/_/nam mkha' chen po'i tshad yin no/_/drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug_/ye 
[\[224a.2\]]shes 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do/_/sum cu rtsa drug yi ge dgu/_/ye shes phreng ba'i tshad yin no/_/sum cu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi/_/mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i tshad yin no/_/sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag_/me yi phreng ba'i tshad yin no/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag_/ye shes 
[\[224a.3\]]rgyal po'i ldang tshad do/_/bdun cu rtsa brgyad rkang pa phyed/_/chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshad yin no/_/tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu lnga/_/ye shes bsam pa'i ldang tshad do/_/dgu bcu go brgyad las byung ba/_/ye shes gsang ba'i tshad yin no/_/nyi shu thams pa gang yin pa/_/
[\[224a.4\]]gsang ba rdo rje rgyal po'i tshad/_/brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni/_/rdo rje rgyal po ra li'i tshad/_/lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge bcu/_/dur khrod rgyan gyi ldang tshad do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yi ge ni/_/bcu drug mkha' 'gro ma sdom tshad/_/lnga bcu yi ge [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga las/_/byung ba gsang 
[\[224a.5\]]ba bdud rtsi'i rgyal/_/bzhi bcu yi ge nyi shu bzhi/_/nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i gzhung tshad do/_/sum cu yi ge bcu drug las/_/byung ba zla ba'i phreng tshad do/_/de nas nges par bshad bya ste/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo gang ston pa/_/gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dag_/ston pa dam 
[\[224a.6\]]tshig chen por nges/_/dgra drug ston pa stobs po che/_/dbang bzhi dgag sgrub gsang ba gcod/_/rang rig de ston bsam mi khyab/_/yi ge gsum ston rin chen 'bar/_/sgo gsum lam ston nam mkha' mnyam/_/bcom ldan la sogs the tsom med/_/ston pa 
[\[224a.7\]]nam mkha' chen po ste/_/dbang bzhi'i de nyid gang ston pa/_/ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges/_/lta spyod rmad du gang byung ba/_/ston pa ye shes phreng bar nges/_/gleng bslang rnam pa lnga yi don/_/ston pa mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud/_/he ru ka dpal gang ston pa/_/
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]me yi phreng ba'i rgyud du grags/_/dbang gsum don ni gang ston pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ra lir nges/_/snod bcud rin chen ston byed pa/_/rin chen phreng ba'i ra lir nges/_/lhan cig skyes ston ye shes bsam/_/rdo rje rnyog pa med pa'o/_/lha yi de nyid gang ston pa/_/
[\[224b.2\]]chags pa'i rgyal po'i ra lir nges/_/nges pa lnga ston rdo rje rgyal/_/ri gi A ra li zhes grags/_/dur khrod brgyad ston dur khrod rgyan/_/dam tshig sdom pa mkha' 'gro gsum/_/ston pa mkha' 'gro sdom pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs drug ston pa/_/gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyal 
[\[224b.3\]]po'o/_/'khrul pa 'khrul gzhi de bsad pa/_/gsum ston ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud/_/ma spangs nges ston nyi 'khor lo/_/tshad nges bsgrub gsum ston zla phreng /_/rgyud sogs lnga ston ye shes 'bar/_/de nas 'khor thams cad dga' nas rgyud thams cad kyi don la yi rangs par 
[\[224b.4\]]gyur to/_/dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D396}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI rat+na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza nA 
[\[224b.5\]]ma/_bod skad du/_dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/he he rdo rje snying po dang /_/mkha' spyod ma la sogs pa dag_/sgo gsum legs par bsdus nas ni/_/ra li chen po'i dbye ba nyon/_/la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud/_/
[\[224b.6\]]ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud/_/i phyis a las gnyis med rgyud/_/thabs ni sku ste shes rab gsung /_/gnyis med thugs su shes par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ba'o/_/a la la ho e ma'o/_/thabs ni la las ji ltar byung /_/ra las 
[\[224b.7\]]shes rab ji ltar byung /_/a las gnyis med ji ltar byung /_/sku gsung thugs su ji ltar 'gyur/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhir ji ltar dbye/_/e ma'o mgon pos bshad du gsol/_/'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/_/a las a ba d+hU tI ste/_/'di nyid las ni gnyis med rgyud/_/
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]'byung ba'i gnas dang rgyu ru brtags/_/la las la la nA yi rtsa/_/de las thabs kyi rgyud byung ba'i/_/rgyu dang gnas dang ngo bo brtag_/ra las ra sa nA yi rtsa/_/'di nyid las ni shes rab kyi/_/ra li 'byung ba'i rgyu dang gnas/_/ra ni chags phyir shes rab 
[\[225a.2\]]ste/_/shes rab yi ge bcu drug brda/_/la ni nub phyir thabs yin te/_/thabs kyi yi ge bcu bzhi'i brda/_/thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa/_/a ni gnyis med rang bzhin te/_/gnyis med blo yi spyod yul min/_/blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob phyir/_/g.yas ni thabs yin la la nA/_/
[\[225a.3\]]g.yon pa shes rab ra sa nA/_/a ba d+hU tI gnyis su med/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyi/_/ra li'i ngo bo shes par bya/_/'dod chags rdul la lus ni thabs/_/la la nA ni sku yin te/_/gti mug mun pa ngag dang yang /_/shes rab ra sa nA ni gsung /_/zhe sdang snying 
[\[225a.4\]]stobs yid yin te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'gyur ba'o/_/sku la brgyad de gsung la brgyad/_/thugs la brgyad de nyi shu bzhi/_/ra li nyi shu bzhi ru nges/_/gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /_/tsaN+DA lI dang phyag dag dang /_/mkha' 'gro 'byung po nyi shu bzhi/_/de nyid brda ru nges pa ste/_/
[\[225a.5\]]sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas so/_/gnas dang mkha' 'gro ra li dbye/_/sku gsum du ni de nyid bsdu/_/dang por rgyud kyi nges pa dang /_/rgyu yi gnas dang gnas nges pa/_/gtad sa nges dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]nges/_/grangs nges rigs nges [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lngar nges/_/mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa 
[\[225a.6\]]yi/_/dman pa'i rim pa dang por gsung /_/dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/_/de rjes rnal 'byor nyid yin te/_/skyes pa 'dul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud/_/phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/_/bud med yongs su gzung phyir ro/_/dang po rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs te/_/de nas bshad 
[\[225a.7\]]pa'i rgyud nyid do/_/de nas rgyud ni phyi ma'o/_/de rjes phyi ma'i phyi ma ste/_/rim pa bcu ni bskor ba ste/_/snod ngan dman pa'i rim pas gsungs/_/me tog snying po'i bcud bzhin du/_/phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi yi/_/ra li'i snying po snying po rgyud/_/dang por la las sku yi rgyud/_/
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mas zhus nas/_/sku yi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad/_/de rjes ra las gsung gi rgyud/_/gsung gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad/_/phyi nas a las thugs kyi rgyud/_/thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad/_/gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi'i ro/_/lus las 
[\[225b.2\]]lus gsal mig gi lus/_/gsal ba'i phyir na sgron ma ste/_/seng ge'i gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro/_/nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer/_/'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'i gting /_/chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab lhun/_/u dum bAr 'dra'i zhing gi rdul/_/'di la 'dod 'dod tshol ba dang /_/rtog 
[\[225b.3\]]ge ba yis dpyad du med/_/gal te rang 'dod dpyad gyur na/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro khros gyur te/_/mgo lus tshal pa brgya ru 'gas/_/de bas rang gi chung ma dang /_/bu dang yul 'khor lus ngag gis/_/bla ma dam pa mnyes bya ste/_/chu bo'i rgyun 'dra'i man ngag blang /_/kye 
[\[225b.4\]]ma'o mgon po snying rje can/_/ra li'i dbye ba de ltar na/_/de yi chen po ji ltar lags/_/nang du nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/_/nges pa slar yang bdag la gsungs/_/rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa/_/ma spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis/_/ra li 'di ni chen por nges/_/re re la yang chen po bdun/_/gang 
[\[225b.5\]]zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la/_/rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste/_/sA lu las ni myu gu bzhin/_/de phyir dang po rgyu mi spang /_/lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang /_/lhan cig lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/thun mong dang ni thun mong min/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya'i 
[\[225b.6\]]phyir/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i zhal yin te/_/de nyid ston pa'i bka' las 'das/_/de las 'khrul pa snying re rje/_/phung songs rtsa dang shu kra ni/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te/_/log rtog 'khrul pa rgyur 'dod dang /_/ngo bo ma grub rgyur 'dod dang /_/kun rdzob byang sems 
[\[225b.7\]]rgyur 'dod pa/_/'di ni rmongs pa ma rungs pa/_/phung po 'byung ba dbang po dang /_/phyi yi skye mched dman po'i rgyu/_/brtags pa rgyur 'dod snying re rje/_/nam mkha'i me tog gi dri gang /_/rang bzhin gnas pa'i rtsa rlung sogs/_/khyad par lam gyi rgyu yin te/_/rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]par/_/log par rtogs pa snying rje nyams/_/don dam byang chub sems kyis ni/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rgyu/_/bla ma ma bsten de las 'khrul/_/kun rdzob shu kra rgyur 'dod pa/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'o/_/rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi 'byin/_/de phyir 
[\[226a.2\]]rkyen ni spang mi bya/_/ye shes rlung dang ye shes me/_/lhan skyes gnyis med rkyen yin te/_/de nyid spang bar mi bya zhing /_/las kyi rlung dang me nyid dang /_/gzhan du 'ang de nyid sbyar bar bya/_/srid pa len dang bde ba len/_/las mi spang zhing bde ba yang /_/mi spang pa ni bzhi pa'o/_/lus 
[\[226a.3\]]dang lus kyi snying po'i rtsa/_/gnas dang gnas chen mi spang ba/_/lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod/_/de nyid phyi dang nang du shes/_/phyi ni dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/snang ba dang ni mun pa'i cha/_/gang ba dang ni stong pa'i cha/_/'pho ba ma spangs brgyad pa'o/_/rgyu yi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas/_/
[\[226a.4\]]de nyid mi spang shes par bya/_/rin po che yi pho brang du/_/rten ni mi spang shu kra gzung /_/gal te de ru ma zin na/_/shor ba mi spang ro mar bstim/_/gnyen po mi spang gzugs sku gnyis/_/ma spangs pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o/_/nor bu'i rten las skyes pa yi/_/bde ba la rten dbang po 
[\[226a.5\]]yi/_/sgo bsdu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o/_/gong 'og khyad par shes byas nas/_/sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o/_/dga' ba mchog dga' shes byas te/_/sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o/_/'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya ste/_/gnas nas gnas su zlog byed pa/_/gnas kyi khyad 
[\[226a.6\]]par ma spangs pa'o/_/de nyid rim par 'pho byed pa/_/bla ma'i bla ma las brgyud shes/_/'khor ba 'jug ldog bye brag ni/_/'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa gnyis/_/ye shes me ni cher 'bar bas/_/phung po 'byung ba dbang po sogs/_/thams cad bdud rtsir gyur pa ni/_/rkyen gyi khyad par 
[\[226a.7\]]ma spangs pa'o/_/lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang /_/brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/_/bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba/_/ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med/_/gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/bzhin mdzes mig yangs phyag rgya ni/_/ldan pa phyag 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]rgya ma spangs pa'o/_/dam tshig chos kyi phyag rgya dang /_de nas ye shes phyag rgya che/_/phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/chags pa'i phyag rgya las yin te/_/dam tshig chos ni ma ning gi/_/phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya/_/ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis/_/grol ba'i phyag rgya 
[\[226b.2\]]yin par 'dod/_/phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/dang por gsang ba'i 'khor lor te/_/phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lor yin/_/'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/dang por gsang ba'i gtum mo ste/_/gnyis par rang bzhin gtum mo ni/_/gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/
[\[226b.3\]]las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni/_/kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te/_/ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni/_/don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te/_/rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/srid pa bskyed cing 'dzag pa bde/_/kun rdzob shu kra'i las yin no/_/srid pa mi len rang rig skyes/_/don dam 
[\[226b.4\]]byang sems las yin no/_/las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/sbyor thabs rtsa ni rgyas pa dang /_/kha 'byed pa yi las yin te/_/sbyor thabs bzhi la ma rmongs pa/_/'di ni ma spangs nyi shu brgyad/_/spyi mthun las las grub pa yi/_/mi drug la sogs grangs kyis bstan/_/rang rig ye shes 
[\[226b.5\]]gang 'dod pas/_/bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten te/_/mi spang nges pa'i gdams ngag blang /_/'di nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu/_/de las byung ba khyad par 'bras/_/dang por cha ste thig le dang /_/tshul dang tshul can mchog gzhan mchog_/'di nyid de nyid drug yin te/_/de nyid drug ni tsaN+DA 
[\[226b.6\]]lI/_/re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/_/tsaN+DA lI ni nyi shu bzhi/_/ra li nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges/_/phyi ru gnas ni nyi shu bzhi/_/spyan dang phyag rgya nyi shu bzhi/_/tsaN+DA lI dang ra li yi/_/phyi dang nang du grangs su nges/_/he he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang /_/ra li'i 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/_/ra li'i 
[\[226b.7\]]ngo bo gang gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sku dang phyag mtshan rags pa kun/_/ra li'i ngo bo dman pa'i lam/_/mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod/_/sgo gsum la gnas khyad par gyi/_/ra li'i ngo bor gsungs pa yin/_/dga' ba bcu drug rten dang 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]bcas/_/zab pa'i ra li'i ngo bor brtags/_/rang rig stong pa thabs dang bcas/_/mthar thug ra lir shes par bya/_/a ni thog mar ma skyes pa/_/la ni nub dang skyong ba ste/_/ra ni chags dang rin po che/_/ra las 'dod chags khrag yin te/_/la las zhe sdang 
[\[227a.2\]]khu ba'o/_/a las gti mug khu ba ste/_/sems can ra li'i rang bzhin te/_/ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs/_/kun la ldan pas ra lir gnas/_/sku yi ra li spyi bo yi/_/gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o/_/gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po las/_/thugs kyi ra li thugs ka nas/_/byung ba 
[\[227a.3\]]rnam par nges pa'o/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/spyan rnams la ni rim bzhin byung /_/sku gsung thugs kyi gnas la ste/_/spyi bo la sogs dag las byung /_/phyag gi mthil nas rim pas byung /_/bla ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya/_/bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin te/_/he he sems can 
[\[227a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi/_/rang bzhin sa dang lam ldan te/_/zla ba bcu sogs sa sogs ni/_/brdzus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags/_/'on te sangs rgyas min nam ci/_/sems can thams cad gdod ma nas/_/sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste/_/brdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs/_/
[\[227a.5\]]sems kyi gnas bcu sa bcu ste/_/rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga/_/mkhan po sems kyi rgyal po ste/_/rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin/_/rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu bregs/_/a dang ha~M gnyis sngags kyi don/_/thams cad sems la gnas pa ste/_/sems med sangs rgyas ma yin 
[\[227a.6\]]te/_/ngam grog la sogs bems po yi/_/sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir/_/sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul dang yang /_/bag la nyal dang kun tu rgyu/_/nus pa'i tshul dang mngon sum tshul/_/gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtags/_/
[\[227a.7\]]sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no/_/de ltar sems can sangs rgyas pas/_/ra li sems can rang bzhin phyir/_/lus la sku yi phyag rgyas gdab/_/ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas gdab/_/sems la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du/_/dngos po ro mnyam gyur 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]pa las/_/sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod/_/dman dang gya nom ga la yod/_/'khor ba yongs su shes pa la/_/mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod/_/thams cad 'jigs dang rnam rtog spongs/_/'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyi/_/legs par gtad kyis dam du sbos/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus 
[\[227b.2\]]pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i phreng ba dang lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[227b.3\]{D397}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI sUr+ya tsakra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/a la la ho dpa' bo gye/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/_/bskyed dang rdzogs pa chen po ste/_/ma spangs pa 
[\[227b.4\]]dang nges pa dag_/mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste/_/phung po khams dang skye mched dag_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rgyu ma spangs/_/phyag mtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dag_/bla ma'i man ngag rkyen ma spangs/_/lus 
[\[227b.5\]]ngag sgo bsdams dam tshig las/_/sku gnyis 'byung ba 'bras ma spangs/_/zhe sdang ru drar skye ba'i las/_/zhe sdang rang rig bskyed pa dang /_/lus kyi dri ma 'khrud pa las/_/las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/pul+li ra dang dzA lan sogs/_/nang du spyi bo spyi gtsug sogs/_/gnas kyi dbye 
[\[227b.6\]]pa ma bskangs pa'o/_/shar sogs bdud kyi snying ga ru/_/zhabs gnas gnas chen ma spangs pa/_/gnas de phyi dang nang du shes/_/gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin/_/phung sogs lha ru 'pho byed pa/_/'di ni 'pho ba ma spangs pa'o/_/rgyu yi gnas ni 
[\[227b.7\]]snying ga ste/_/'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs te/_/ma spangs pa ni gnyis su shes/_/phung sogs sgyu mar 'dzin byed pa/_/'di ni rten pa ma spangs pa'o/_/gal te nang du ma zin na/_/phyi ru de nyid ngo bor bsgom/_/de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o/_/gnyen po ma spangs sgyu mar bsgom/_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]phung sogs la brten lha rnams la/_/sgo gsum ngo bo ma spangs pa/_/tha mal pa dang bskyed rim gnyis/_/gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste/_/sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o/_/bdun po rnam dag la sogs pa/_/sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o/_/phung sogs rtog 
[\[228a.2\]]pa las log nas/_/phra ba'i gnas su gnas byed pa/_/gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/lha yi rnam par 'jug pa dang /_/gong du sgyu mar bzlog pa gnyis/_/'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs nyid/_/ye shes me ni cher 'bar te/_/phung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa/_/rten gyi 
[\[228a.3\]]khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun 'gags te/_/thams cad rten dang brten par snang /_/ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/de nyid sgyu ma rang bzhin med/_/gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o/_/shes rab phag mo ma spangs pa/_/phyag rgya ma spangs pa ru 
[\[228a.4\]]'dod/_/ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra/_/gong 'og las kyi khyad par ro/_/zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags gsung /_/gti mug sku yi phyag rgya ste/_/phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dag_/'khor lo'i dbye ba 
[\[228a.5\]]ma spangs pa'o/_/dang po sgyu ma'i ye shes me/_/gnyis pa sgyu ma ltar snang me/_/gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/phung sogs sgyu ma las g.yo zhing /_/phung sogs sgyu mas yang dag bsreg_/kun rdzob rtogs pa'i rkyen yin te/_/sgyu ma ltar snang las g.yo zhing /_/sgyu ma de nyid slar 
[\[228a.6\]]bsregs pa/_/don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te/_/rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/'khor ba spel zhing rnam rtog bskyed/_/kun rdzob bden pa sems kyi las/_/'khor bar mi 'khor rang rig bskyed/_/don dam sems kyi las yin te/_/las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa/_/'di dag ma spangs nyi 
[\[228a.7\]]shu brgyad/_/bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa'o/_/gsang dbang bla ma'i zhal nas blang /_/shes rab ye shes gzhan du'o/_/bzhi pa'i ma spangs nyi shu brgyad/_/rang rig lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/chos nyid ma dag bzhi pa'i rgyu/_/zhal gyi man ngag rkyen ma spangs/_/'gro ba'i chos rnams rang rig mes/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bsregs pa las ma spangs pa yin/_/gong 'og rim pas dbye ma spangs/_/a bad+hU tI log min gnas/_/gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa/_/de nyid phyi dang nang du nges/_/phyi nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/_/stong pa dang ni gzung 'dzin char/_/'pho ba ma spangs a dang ha~M/_/rten ma spangs 
[\[228b.2\]]te rtog pa la/_/sems 'phros de nyid rang rig sgom/_/shor ba ma spangs par rig la/_/dbang po'i sgo bsdu ngo ma spangs/_/rtog bcom gnyen po ma spangs pa'o/_/rang rig spyi la sems pa las/_/sngon 'gro ma spangs ma spangs brgyad/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/spyi dang rang gi mtshan 
[\[228b.3\]]nyid la/_/'pho ba ma spangs rang rig bsgom/_/phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las/_/phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung /_/las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/dad med bla ma ma bsten dang /_/bla ma dam pa ma rnyed dang /_/ma spangs ngo bo ma shes par/_/rang rig 
[\[228b.4\]]'bras bu gang 'dod pa/_/de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs/_/dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin/_/de nas nges pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yang /_/rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas dang yang /_/gtad pa [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]grangs dang rim/_/nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs/_/sngags ni spros bcas spros med nges/_/rkyen ni ye shes 
[\[228b.5\]]me rlung nges/_/rgyu 'bras gnas ni a ha~M nges/_/dbang bzhi gong 'og khyad par nges/_/sun 'byin gnyen po nges pa dang /_/ngo bo nges dang dbye ba nges/_/las nges pa dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ste/_/de las byung ba'i nges pa dag_/bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes/_/ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi/_/mtshan nyid 
[\[228b.6\]]yongs su shes gyur na/_/'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi/_/thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung /_/gong bu chu dang gzugs su gnas/_/de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa ste/_/gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang /_/
[\[228b.7\]]rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste/_/rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas/_/de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang /_/'bad pas bla ma mnyes bya ste/_/rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang /_/de yi man ngag shes par bya/_/bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing /_/dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/_/nyan pa la sogs byed 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa ni/_/'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/_/de bas 'bad de nan tan bya/_/dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing 
[\[229a.2\]]zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D398}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ma sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas/_/
[\[229a.3\]]kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/_/gang phyir sems can thams cad kyis/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir/_/dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te/_/bla ma'i rjes su 'jug par bya/_/rang rig gnyis su med pa la/_/gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/gzod nas 
[\[229a.4\]]ma skyes ma grub la/_/skye dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la/_/dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid/_/mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la/_/sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'khrul/_/rang bzhin lhun gyis grub 
[\[229a.5\]]pa la/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyis skye bas 'khrul/_/brda dang tha snyad bral ba la/_/blo yi spyod yul byed pas 'khrul/_/mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la/_/rtag dang chad par 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/shes brjod yul las 'das pa la/_/bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/
[\[229a.6\]]dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i/_/rnam rtog kun gyis stong pa la/_/dngos por rjes su 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/rang nyid gnyis su med pa la/_/bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/_/theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la/_/sgro dang skur pa 'debs pas 
[\[229a.7\]]'khrul/_/sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis/_/las kyi rnam smin la sogs la/_/lta bas skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul/_/rang rig gzod nas 'od gsal la/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/_/rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod pas 'khrul/_/'khrul ba dang ni 'khrul 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pa'i gzhi/_/'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste/_/'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na/_/'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/zhe sdang zhe sdang chen po dang /_/de bzhin zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das/_/gti mug gti mug chen po ste/_/de bzhin gti mug bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[229b.2\]]'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyis/_/'di spangs gzhan gyis grol ba min/_/bdag po lha dang bla ma spun/_/bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam/_/theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhan/_/skye bo'i bems po cha dang brgyad/_/de dag rang rig thob pa'i rgyu/_/de phyir dam tshig gtso bor 
[\[229b.3\]]bsrung /_/'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung /_/kye ma mgon po kye sangs rgyas/_/'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na/_/de yi ngo bo ji ltar lags/_/zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra/_/rdo rje snying po snying rje che/_/legs par nyon la yid la zung /_/las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi/_/rgyu 
[\[229b.4\]]'bras mi shes gti mug ste/_/lus sems kun nas 'khrug pa dag_/zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyis/_/kun nas bslang ste nor bu'i mthar/_/sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chags so/_/dbang sogs ngo bo gang las shes/_/'dod chags la sogs chen por nges/_/rang rig ngo bo gang 
[\[229b.5\]]la gnas/_/'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste/_/ngo bor sgyu mar gang shes dang /_/dbang po'i sgo bsdus thabs yin no/_/gong ma skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i/_/phyir yang chen por gyur pa ste/_/gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang /_/de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang /_/mang po mi mos spong ba dang /_/
[\[229b.6\]]nyon mongs spyi yis zil ma non/_/bye brag 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs/_/zil gyis mi non 'og ma yi/_/rnam rtog gang yang mi skye dang /_/nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spong /_/gnyen po yin par nges pa dang /_/nyon mongs skra rtse tsam mi skye/_/gnyis ni gong dang 'dra ba ste/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[229b.7\]]'dod chags chen po dag_/bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste/_/zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no/_/zab mo'i lta spyod ma rtogs par/_/sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed/_/de dag ngal ba don med yin/_/de dag bla ma dam pa las/_/man ngag dam pa btsal bya ste/_/'khrul 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las/_/sad par byed pa'i cho ga blang /_/de'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs par gyur to/_dpal ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+har dang /_lots+tsha ba dge 
[\[230a.2\]]slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D399}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI badzra DA ki gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye/_/
[\[230a.3\]]dbang rnams dam pa yod dam ci/_/gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci/_/sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la/_/bye brag tha dad med dam ci/_/dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis/_/de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnam rtog gzung 'dzin 
[\[230a.4\]]dgag pa dang /_/rang rig ye shes blugs pa'i phyir/_/dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod/_/rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru/_/dbang ni nges pa kho na ste/_/lus ngag kun nas bzang ba la/_/de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni/_/'khrud dang gtor dang sreg pa dang /_/mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 
[\[230a.5\]]'byed pas/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste/_/dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag_/rim gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob/_/bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing /_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la/_/thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/
[\[230a.6\]]skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsung /_/gang zag mchog dang las dang po/_/mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang /_/mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go/_/'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol/_/dbang dang man ngag 'brel pas so/_/de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang /_/sngon du 'gro dang mi 
[\[230a.7\]]'gro med/_/'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste/_/slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin/_/'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang /_/'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur/_/'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya/_/rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi/_/gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la/_/byin brlabs ye shes dbab byas nas/_/lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te/_/bcos ma la sogs de ltar na/_/phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la/_/ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed/_/de nas gzhan 
[\[230b.2\]]yang dbye ba dag_/'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi/_/bcos ma nye bar bcos ma dang /_/'dra ba yin pa lta bu yi/_/dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te/_/log pa'i sred pas srid par 'ching /_/'khrul ba'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'khor/_/de bas dngos grub 'dod 
[\[230b.3\]]pas kyang /_/lha yi bu yi bdud spangs te/_/bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten/_/yid ches rigs dang nges pa skye/_/lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang /_/'og ma spangs shig gong ma thob/_/man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang /_/mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing /_/che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing /_/
[\[230b.4\]]'jig rten lta spyod dang 'dres pa'i/_/snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o/_/de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang /_/gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste/_/rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba'o/_/rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs/_/de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang /_/phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis/_/
[\[230b.5\]]gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags/_/dper na pha rol phyin drug las/_/shes rab pha rol phyin med na/_/pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis/_/pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi thob/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i/_/de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te/_/gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na/_/
[\[230b.6\]]'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur/_/dper na rgyal po med pa yi/_/grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no/_/de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang /_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra/_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/sku gsung dam tshig de dang 
[\[230b.7\]]'dra/_/srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang ma byin len pa dang /_/'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra/_/lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra/_/tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam/_/dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra/_/dper na 'khor los 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_/bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin/_/bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya/_/de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang /_/rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang /_/rang rig gzhan rig 
[\[231a.2\]]rkyen dag dang /_/rang sems las su rung ba dang /_/ma rung pa dang las kyi mtha'/_/log pa dang ni ma log pa/_/don byed nus dang mi nus pa/_/yongs su rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang /_/tha dad par ni mi brtag ste/_/chu khams gser dang 
[\[231a.3\]]nam mkha' bzhin/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod/_/rang sems rang gis rtogs pa na/_/sems can gdod nas sangs rgyas so/_/rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa/_/srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/_/dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[231a.4\]]rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang /_/gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na/_/srog gcod nyams pa chung ngur nges/_/gzhan gyis gnod par tshor ba dag_/nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin/_/de las bzlog pa chen por nges/_/gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang /_/gzhan la nyon mongs cher 
[\[231a.5\]]skyes na/_/de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges/_/cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring /_/chen po las ni nyon mongs cher/_/de ni chen po kho nar nges/_/tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste/_/mi shes pa dang bag med dag_/brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs/_/gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi/_/
[\[231a.6\]]che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshad dag_/rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga yis/_/rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste/_/ltung ba'i ngo bos zin pa dang /_/phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs/_/tshul dang mthun par bshad pa bya/_/dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gis/_/bla ma'i 
[\[231a.7\]]dkyil 'khor shes par bya/_/gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag la/_/sbyin sreg gis ni sdig bsreg phyir/_/nang gi sbyin sreg chen po brtsam/_/zab pa'i me ni rgyun gzhag med/_/thabs kyi rgyun gzhag me yin te/_/lo bdun dang ni lo gcig dag_/phyi yi rgyun gzhag chen po'i me/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni/_/'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs/_/rgyun gzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs/_/rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te/_/rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi/_/gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin/_/'di ni rgyun gzhag chen po'i me/_/thog mtha' med par 
[\[231b.2\]]gnas pa'i phyir/_/dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs/_/ye shes me yi bud shing yin/_/man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na/_/nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges/_/dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te/_/rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra/_/rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs 
[\[231b.3\]]par zung /_/thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur/_/dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[231b.4\]{D400}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI dz+wa la ag+ni gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[231b.5\]]thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang na rdo rje phag mos gsol pa/_rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang /_/'chi ba gang lags shi ba gang /_/ro ni gang lags ro chen gang /_/de bzhin shi ba chen 
[\[231b.6\]]po gang /_/thal ba gang lags thal chen gang /_/tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi/_/chen po gang lags gnas ni gang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug la/_/rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa 
[\[231b.7\]]yin/_/dus min lha ni gsod pa ste/_/dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang /_/dus tshod nges par shes bya ste/_/bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyis/_/'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges/_/khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim/_/srog gi 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]rtsol ba la thim ste/_/rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i/_/skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste/_/rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang /_/rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi/_/skad cig dang po shi ba ste/_/de nas zhag bdun bar du gzhag_/lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das/_/de ni shi ba 
[\[232a.2\]]chen por grags/_/lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra/_/'di nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste/_/ye shes dbab dang ye shes brtan/_/mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod/_/spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru/_/dri yi thig le gsum byas te/_/sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/_/thog mar dri zhim sna 
[\[232a.3\]]tshogs kyis/_/khrus byas gnas ni bcu gnyis su/_/dri yi thig le bcu gnyis bya/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlab/_/gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kun/_/dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges/_/ri mor bris pa 'bring po ste/_/dri yi thig le tha mar nges/_/g.yas brkyang la 
[\[232a.4\]]sogs 'dug stangs kyis/_/he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs/_/rang rig bdag po gang yin pa/_/he ru ka ru nges pa dang /_/de la dus drug mchod pas mchod/_/'di dag ro ni chen po ste/_/'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste/_/mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/_/rang bzhin bsregs 
[\[232a.5\]]pa thal ba ste/_/rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas/_/chos sku gzugs brnyan rim bzhin brtsig_/yang na bum pa lta bu yi/_/gzhal yas khang pa brtseg mar brtsig_/mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang /_/tsan+dan gur kum la sogs pa'i/_/dri yis byugs shing bsgo bar bya/_/tsan+dan dmar 
[\[232a.6\]]po la sogs pa'i/_/dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu 'am/_/yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi/_/bud shing tshad dang mthun pa yis/_/thab khung chen por rdzogs par brtsig_/bla ma dam pa mnyes byas la/_/zhal nas yang dag shes par bya/_/zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi/_/phyogs bzhi mi 'jigs seng ge 
[\[232a.7\]]brgyad/_/ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan/_/cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang /_/sngar gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur/_/de nas rgyun gzhag me sbar te/_/me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra/_/de nas rig pa de nyid kyang /_/me yi khang pa mdzes pa ru/_/rang 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol/_/me mchod sdig pa bsreg pa yi/_/sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra/_/me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi/_/mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste/_/bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs/_/med na sdig pa bsreg par bya/_/dung la sogs pa 
[\[232b.2\]]byung na rab/_/ma byung na yang cho ga rnams/_/rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams/_/'di ni thal ba chen po ste/_/de las gzhan pa thal bar gsungs/_/de nas rus ba zhag gsum ni/_/gur kum la sogs dris gtor te/_/rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste/_/kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro/_/
[\[232b.3\]]bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung /_/mnyams dum bu gcig pa la/_/dri sogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste/_/dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/steng du seng ge'i khri dag la/_/seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi rgyan/_/steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te/_/
[\[232b.4\]]gnas der rus pa gzhag byas la/_/me tog byas nas zhag lnga ru/_/bsnyen pa byas te drug pa la/_/gdung byung sta gon bdun pa la/_/tsha tsha rab tu gnas par bya/_/dang por ro bsregs dus su yang /_/shi ba dang po nas bzung ste/_/zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste/_/drug pa ro yi sta gon no/_/bdun 
[\[232b.5\]]pa dur khrod rab tu gnas/_/dang por snang ba gnyis par ro/_/gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das/_/mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum/_/gzhan la med cing rang la med/_/dman la med cing de rjes med/_/thabs sum gsungs shes rab kyi/_/rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud phyi ma dang /_/phyi ma'i phyi mar ma 
[\[232b.6\]]gsungs pa'o/_/mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum/_/bdud rtsi sgron ma ra li yi/_/rgyud du khyod la nga yis bshad/_/de nas tsha tsha'i rim pa yang /_/snang ba rgyal po la sogs la/_/mthun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs blang /_/mi snang sa bdag la sogs la/_/gtor ma me yis sa sogs blang /_/
[\[232b.7\]]de nas skud pa rnam lnga yang /_/phan pa rdo rje can dang yang /_/gzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal/_/srad bus sa gzungs sbyang sogs/_/cho ga gzhan dang mthun par bya/_/dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya/_/lha grangs du yod gtor ma gtang /_/sbyin sreg dag 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]gis zhi byas te/_/gcig gam lnga'am bdun nam ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad/_/ci nus par ni gdab par bya/_/dus ni mtshan mo shes pa ste/_/dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyis/_/phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste/_/gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag_/chos 
[\[233a.2\]]kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab/_/bum dbang sa la gdab pa ste/_/gsang dbang sa dang chu la gdab/_/gsum pa me dang rlung la gdab/_/bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o/_/dang po 'pho bas ma lhung la/_/gnyis pa ro bsreg ma lhung ba'o/_/gsum pa tsha tshas ma lhung na/_/'chi 
[\[233a.3\]]bslu ba'i dam pa ste/_/srid pa'i 'chi ba las grol nges/_/dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas/_/lhung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges/_/de bas srid las grol 'dod pas/_/bla ma dam pa rab mnyes te/_/'pho ba la sogs gdams ngag blang /_/rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung /_/de'i 
[\[233a.4\]]tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to/_/mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab bo/_/dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro langs chen po thams cad rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to/_/dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 
[\[233a.5\]]rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D401}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI a mr-i ta guh+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_bcom 
[\[233a.6\]]ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_dkyil 
[\[233a.7\]]'khor dbye ba ji lta bu/_/sngags dang gtor ma ji lta bu/_/sbyin sreg mchod sogs ji lta bu/_/khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dang po dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang /_/phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor te/_/nang du lus kyi dkyil 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]'khor ro/_/gsang bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te/_/bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems/_/de rnams lha yi mtshan nyid kyang /_/sku mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i lam/_/khro tshul drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_/'bar ba'i gar dgu phyag rgya drug_/mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu yis/_/tha mal pa yi rnam 
[\[233b.2\]]rtog spong /_/lus kyi dri 'khru zhe sdang dag_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o/_/'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor te/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur pa/_/de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te/_/rdo rje can dang phan pa dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang /_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /_/de 
[\[233b.3\]]bzhin rta bdun rdo rje sems/_/snying po yongs gzung dkyil 'khor te/_/de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yin/_/de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang /_/rnal grol steng du gdan khri rlung /_/rang rig bdag po'i lha yin no/_/dang por de nyid shes bya ste/_/rags pa dang ni phra ba dang /_/zung 'jug sgo 
[\[233b.4\]]gsum nyi khri dang /_/chig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam/_/las ni rags pa'i lam 'joms shing /_/ngag gi dri 'khru gti mug dag_/sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa/_/mkha' spyod rlung du shes par bya/_/gang zhig snang ba bsgom pa dang /_/de bzhin mun pa bsgom pa dag_/nyin dang mtshan 
[\[233b.5\]]mor rab tu grags/_/gnod mdzes lta stangs dman pa ste/_/tshul de de las bzlog pa'o/_/dang por yid bcing sna rtser bya/_/de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang /_/nam mkha' sor bzhi de nas stong /_/de nas bar du thig le yang /_/yan lag dang bcas yan lag med/_/shin 
[\[233b.6\]]tu yan lag med pa ste/_/yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste/_/thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/ma ning 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs/_/de nas 'og sgor tsaN+DA lI/_/kha sbyor dang ni stug po sogs/_/rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang /_/bdag sbyang ba 
[\[233b.7\]]dang gzhan sbyang dang /_/gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba dang /_/gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang /_/gtum mo rkyen gyis spar ba dang /_/gtum mo zhar la sbar ba dang /_/gtum mo bye brag sbar ba dang /_/spyi yi gtum mo sbar ba dang /_/grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang /_/chags 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]pa'i rang bzhin gtum mo ste/_/nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste/_/gsang ba'i lha yi ring ba'i rgyu/_/de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du ru/_/de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin/_/dga' ba la sogs sgyu ma yi/_/phra ba'i lam spong las yin 
[\[234a.2\]]te/_/sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod chags dag_/rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i rgyu/_/de nas bzhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/chos sku skye med nam mkha' bzhin/_/rang rig stong pa 'od gsal la/_/bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te/_/ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa min/_/bsgom 
[\[234a.3\]]pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste/_/mi bsgom pa yang rtog pa nyid/_/bsgom du rdul tsam med pa la/_/yengs su skad cig med pa 'di/_/lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod/_/dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/_/rang rig ye shes me bo che/_/thams cad 'di la gnas pa ste/_/dper 
[\[234a.4\]]na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag_/yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang /_/yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar/_/mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i/_/las dang bya ba sna tshogs kun/_/sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na/_/thams cad 'di la sdud par nges/_/las 
[\[234a.5\]]ni zab pa'i lam spong ste/_/sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum 'joms/_/gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te/_/spyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs/_/de nas nang gi sbyin sreg kyang /_/lte ba snying ga spyi bo mgrin/_/rigs ni nges pa'i thab khung ste/_/
[\[234a.6\]]sku ni spyi bo gsung mgrin pa/_/snying gar thugs te yon tan dang /_/phrin las gtum mo gnyis su nges/_/rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang /_/rang bzhin gnas pa'i ye shes me/_/me lha dag pas bdag po'i lha/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan rnam rtog dag_/sreg rdzas bsreg ste me 
[\[234a.7\]]mchod bya/_/nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang /_/rnam rtog sreg phyir sbyin sreg ste/_/rang lus ye shes me yis ni/_/rtog pa'i bud shing bsreg bya ba/_/'di ni sbyin sreg tshad ma ste/_/til sogs sdig par nges pa'am/_/las kyi me nyid ye shes sam/_/bsregs pas nges par 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]tshig gam ci/_/sreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed me/_/dbang pos spyod yul ma yin te/_/de phyir las kyi me nyid la/_/til sogs bsregs pa'i las byas kyang /_/nges par sdig pa tshig mi 'gyur/_/mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no/_/bstan pa tsam du nges pa ste/_/rgyud ni don dam 
[\[234b.2\]]ma yin te/_/don dam rtogs pas bstan pa med/_/dgang gzar blugs gzar la sogs pa/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang /_/thab khung lte ba'am sna rtse ste/_/chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang /_/rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba yi/_/
[\[234b.3\]]gtum mo ye shes me sbar te/_/g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis/_/shukra rtsa dang rlung sogs kyi/_/phra mo'i rtog pa'i sreg rdzas bsreg_/bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya/_/zhi rgyas las kyi rim pa dang /_/bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya/_/de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang /_/
[\[234b.4\]]phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhU~M/_/nang du bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid de/_/gsang bar mchog tshad dbus na gnas/_/mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go/_/spos sogs phyi yi mchod pa ste/_/bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o/_/gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod/_/mthar thug stong pa'i ro yis mchod/_/
[\[234b.5\]]'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma ste/_/dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed/_/a ba d+hU tI'i ka pA lar/_/sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas/_/rnam rtog bgegs chen zhi bar byed/_/bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros/_/phra ba'i gdon chen zhi byas pa/_/'di ni gsang ba'i gtor 
[\[234b.6\]]mar gsungs/_/rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros/_/bde chen gdon ni zhi byas pa/_/'di ni bzhi pa'i gtor mar nges/_/phyag 'tshal skor ba la sogs dang /_/spyang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes/_/gang gi phyir na sbyin sreg ni/_/dngos grub dam pa ster ba dang /_/rnam rtog sreg phyir 
[\[234b.7\]]sbyin sreg ste/_/shing sogs sreg pa sbyin sreg min/_/mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste/_/spos sogs phul bas mnyes pa med/_/rang sems las su rung ba dag_/mnyes pas mchod pa chen po ste/_/gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang /_/bar chad zhi dang dngos grub dag_/'byung ba'i phyir 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]na gtor ma ste/_/'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma yis/_/gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur te/_/rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag_/gdon la sogs par snang ba ste/_/'khrul pa'i rnam rtog ma spangs par/_/gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir/_/sgo gsum rnam 
[\[235a.2\]]rtog 'joms pa yi/_/sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog_/gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang /_/dam tshig gso dang lha rnams 'go/_/dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phyi nang gtor mar nges pa'o/_/rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang /_/lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te/_/phyi yi 
[\[235a.3\]]dkyil 'khor lha ma yin/_/lus dang yan lag lha ma yin/_/kha mig la sogs lha ma yin/_/lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir/_/dbang po sgo gsum g.yeng ba dgag_/rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung /_/sgo gsum zhi phyir lha zhes brjod/_/yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te/_/
[\[235a.4\]]rang sems las su rung ba dang /_/rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir/_/'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs/_/gzhan yang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/_/thams cad bla ma'i zhal nas blang /_/rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rgyud kyi don la yi 
[\[235a.5\]]rangs par gyur to/_/dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya b+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D402}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI sh+mA shA ni a laM kAr tan+t+ra 
[\[235a.6\]]rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te/_/zhabs la spyi bos legs btud nas/_/dur khrod gang lags rgyan gang lags/_/rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[235a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_/legs so rdo rje snying po legs/_/legs par nyon la legs par zung /_/dang por dur khrod bshad bya ste/_/dur khrod spyi dang bye brag gnas/_/gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol te/_/rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol du/_/'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas/_/bye brag shar la sogs 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]pa ste/_/snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang /_/lcags ri nag po tshun chad de/_/rdo rje ra bas de nyid do/_/chen po khru ni nyi shu ste/_/chung ba khru gang tshun chad do/_/de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/tshad las nges par 'das pa'o/_/rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brgyad/_/
[\[235b.2\]]mi mnga'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad/_/phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu dgod/_/tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i/_/rtags su shing brgyad rim pas dgod/_/de bzhin gdug pa brgyad bcom pa'i/_/rtags su klu brgyad rim pas dgod/_/tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom 
[\[235b.3\]]pa'i/_/rtags su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod/_/lus ngag gnyis kyis sems can gyi/_/don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod/_/de nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyu/_/rnam rtog zil gnon brgyad por bshad/_/mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan yin no/_/
[\[235b.4\]]de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_/dang por dur khrod bshad par bya/_/shar du gtum drag nag po che/_/lho ru ha har dgod ser che/_/nub tu mi bzad dmar po ste/_/byang du tshang tshing ljang gu che/_/me ru g.yer ka can yin te/_/bden bral mtshams su 'bar ba 'dzin/_/rlung mtshams 
[\[235b.5\]]dmyal sogs gnas pa ste/_/dbang ldan du ni dbyibs can no/_/b+hu ce ri khi tsa sha ni/_/sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod/_/pa ta li dang bA sa ni/_/sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod/_/dur khrod 'di rnams mtshan nyid kyang /_/'bar ba tshig dang ma tshig sogs/_/keng rus thod pa la sogs 
[\[235b.6\]]dang /_/ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas/_/ce spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/shar du shi ri sha yi shing /_/lho ru a shwad tha yi shing /_/nub tu wang ge ling gi shing /_/byang du tsU ta'i shing du nges/_/gong dang mtshungs pan+ya gro da/_/parka ti lcug pA thA dag_/me 
[\[235b.7\]]nas dbang ldan mtshams su dgod/_/ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su 'dod/_/shar du dbang po gnas pa ste/_/lho ru gshin rje gnas pa'o/_/nub tu klu dbang gnas pa ste/_/byang du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas/_/shar lhor me ni gnas pa'o/_/lho nub mtshams su srin po gnas/_/
