[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]nub byang mtshams su rlung dgod de/_/byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan dgod/_/nyi zla shar la sa bdag nub/_/ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su dgod/_/shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste/_/'jog po lho ste stobs rgyu nub/_/pad+ma byang la pad chen me/_/hu lu hu lu srin 
[\[236a.2\]]por dgod/_/rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste/_/dung skyong dbang ldan mtshams su'o/_/gdug pa sprul gyi gzugs su dgod/_/kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye/_/shar du char sprin dkar por dgod/_/lho ru pu mi ti dgod do/_/nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas/_/byang 
[\[236a.3\]]du a ba yang dag gnas/_/sngo nya mer ni yang dag gnas/_/g+hA nya srin po'i mtshams su dgod/_/rlung gi mtshams su par sha na/_/gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad/_/btsod kyi mdog 'dra gur kum mdog_/nam mkha'i mdog 'dra du ba'i mdog_/sprin gyi mdog 'dra sprin gyi 
[\[236a.4\]]gzugs/_/shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste/_/'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung /_/dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs/_/de nas ye shes phun sum tshogs/_/rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs/_/gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yin/_/rtags su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas/_/
[\[236a.5\]]de nas nang gi dur khrod sogs/_/pags pa rdo rje ra ba ste/_/rus pa rdo rje gur du nges/_/dpung pa nye ba'i dpung pa ste/_/brla dang de bzhin nye ba'i brla/_/brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad du nges/_/rje ngar nye ba'i rje ngar bzhi/_/lag ngar nye ba'i lag ngar bzhi/_/brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do/_/
[\[236a.6\]]tshigs dang de bzhin nye ba'i tshigs/_/steng dang 'og tu bzhi bzhi ste/_/nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod/_/mthil dang de bzhin nye ba'i mthil/_/steng 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do/_/rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse/_/brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te/_/bskyed rim rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/_/
[\[236a.7\]]dur khrod brgyad ni nang na gnas/_/rtsa rlung ngo bo shes pa rgyas/_/de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas/_/rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir/_/nang na klu brgyad yang dag gnas/_/bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir/_/char sprin brgyad ni nang du gnas/_/de nas gsang ba'i dur 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]khrod kyang /_/sna rtser rtsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad/_/lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyad do/_/snying gar rtsa brgyad phyogs skyong brgyad/_/mgrin par rtsa brgyad klu brgyad de/_/spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad/_/gsang bar rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/_/dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bar gnas/_/
[\[236b.2\]]thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyir/_/gsang bar shing brgyad yang dag gnas/_/phra ba'i mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi/_/gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod/_/bde bas bdag spyod gzhan sbyor bas/_/de yi phyir na char sprin dgod/_/de nas bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang /_/rnam shes brgyad 
[\[236b.3\]]ni de nyid brgyad/_/dur khrod brgyad du nges pa'o/_/dur khrod sogs brgyad de nyid shing /_/lhag ma gsum dang tshor tshogs lnga/_/brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges/_/nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis/_/brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do/_/lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag ni/_/de dag bzhi 
[\[236b.4\]]pa'i char sprin brgyad/_/gzung 'dzin rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/_/bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad/_/stobs sogs mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas/_/rtags su shing brgyad nges pa'o/_/rnam rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi/_/rtags su klu brgyad nges pa'o/_/gzugs sku gnyis kyis 
[\[236b.5\]]sems can gyi/_/don mdzad rtags su char sprin brgyad/_/phyogs skyong bla ma'i zhal nas shes/_/de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang /_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/_/rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya/_/rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o/_/gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa'i 
[\[236b.6\]]bka'/_/gsung gcig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang /_/du ma nyid du so sor snang /_/chos tshul du ma'i bye brag dang /_/mos pa du ma'i bye brag dang /_/'du shes du ma'i bye brag gis/_/theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med/_/sems gzung yan lag bsam mi khyab/_/nga yi rjes su 
[\[236b.7\]]'brang ba yi/_/bla ma sa rab non pa dang /_/de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes skyes/_/de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi bar/_/rig pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas spyad/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan pas/_/brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yis nges/_/de lta'i man ngag ma thob par/_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]sngags kyi lta spyod gang spyod pa/_/rang yang phung la gzhan yang phung /_/mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed/_/de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/_/bla ma dam pa mnyes byas te/_/man ngag dam pa blang bar bya/_/nges pa'i lta spyod ma rnyed par/_/gsang ba'i lha 
[\[237a.2\]]dang spyod pa dang /_/mos pa'i rjes su gang byed dang /_/nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag_/gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod/_/'di dag rkun po ma rungs pa/_/mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skye/_/dang po srid pa skye ba yang /_/yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum/_/sih+la'i dang 
[\[237a.3\]]po tha ma dang /_/'bras bu sred pa skye ba yi/_/dus der kun du ru byed na/_/'byung ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na/_/nad gzhi bsdus shing nad gzhi skyed/_/srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung /_/de la 'dod pa'i mtshon chas ni/_/g.yeng ba me dang gtar ka bya/_/phyi nas rigs kyi bdag 
[\[237a.4\]]pos so/_/srid par skye ba'i dus tshod kyang /_/rgyun chad zhag gsum zhag lnga dang /_/bdun dang dgu yi dus rnams spang /_/de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'i don/_/khyod la gtad kyis legs par zung /_/de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yi rangs par gyur to/_/dpal 
[\[237a.5\]]dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/_/paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D403}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_/shrI badzra rA dza ma hA tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_dpal rdo rje 
[\[237a.6\]]rgyal po chen po'i rgyud/_dpal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mkha' 'gro grangs med 
[\[237a.7\]]pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/_rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gsol pa/_rdo rje gang lags chen po gang /_/rgyud ni gang lags 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rgyal po gang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/don gyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi/_/dbang bzhi'i grangs su shes par bya/_/rnam rtog 'joms phyir rdo rje ste/_/de la rnam pa bzhi yin te/_/phyi nang gsang ba rab gsang gnyis/_/rtse gsum rtse gcig rtse lnga pa/_/rtse dgu pa ni nyid yin 
[\[237b.2\]]no/_/bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste/_/rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no/_/gnyis su med pa rtse gcig pas/_/rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yin/_/rtse gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/_/'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin/_/rtse lnga ye shes lnga 
[\[237b.3\]]yi rtags/_/me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog_/bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes/_/nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pa ste/_/zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang /_/phrag dog gti mug 'joms par byed/_/rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa/_/ye shes rtse dgu bshad pa ste/_/khams gsum sa 
[\[237b.4\]]dgu 'joms par byed/_/'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams/_/nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems/_/rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes che/_/sa dgu la ni gang sgrib pa'i/_/sgrib pa sbyong bar byed pa yi/_/rdo rje rtse dgur bstan pa yin/_/rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis 
[\[237b.5\]]pa/_/'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi/_/spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin/_/ma rig pa las 'du byed de/_/'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes/_/ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug_/reg dang tshor dang sred dang len/_/srid pa skye dang rga shi ste/_/de rnams spong ba'i gnyen 
[\[237b.6\]]po ste/_/chos kyi ye shes mngon du byas/_/de las ye shes drug rang bzhin/_/de las sku gsung thugs ngo bo/_/de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas/_/de las gnyis med reg pa ni/_/de las nyams myong bde chen po/_/rang rig de nyid sred pa ste/_/chos kun ston byed len pa ste/_/
[\[237b.7\]]srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin/_/skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru bshad/_/rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan 'das/_/'od gsal stong chen ngang du thim/_/de phyir rdo rje bcu gnyis pa/_/rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/_/'bigs shing rno ba zur gsum ste/_/gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas/_/'jam 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]zhing dang la 'joms par byed/_/pha lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms/_/zur lngas thams cad ci dgar byed/_/de nas chen po'i don bshad de/_/dmigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang /_/brtul zhugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang /_/de bzhin ye shes chen po ste/_/re re 
[\[238a.2\]]la yang bdun bdun sbyar/_/de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan/_/rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang /_/rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che/_/de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la/_/rgyu yi rgyud du bstan pa yi/_/de rnams don ni ji bzhin rtogs/_/'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa 
[\[238a.3\]]yin/_/rgyud dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa/_/rgyu ni gnyis su med pa yi/_/rang rig ye shes mthar thug pa/_/mthar thug bla na med pa'i rgyud/_/rgyal po la yang lnga yin te/_/phyi nang gsang dang rab tu gsang /_/shin tu gsang ba chen po ste/_/de rnams don la dbang bskur dang /_/de yi 
[\[238a.4\]]mi mthun phyogs 'joms phyir/_/de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags/_/btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji ltar lags/_/rdo rje gang lags snying po gang /_/
[\[238a.5\]]dpa' bo gang lags mkha' 'gro gang /_/dpag tu med pa ji ltar lags/_/thabs cig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags/_/phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i/_/mchod nas zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/mngon phyogs 'khod pa ji ltar lags/_/zhal 'dzum mdzad pa ji ltar lags/_/gzigs 
[\[238a.6\]]pa zhes pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud/_/phung po'i bdud dang lha yi bdud/_/bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa'o/_/ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir/_/dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang /_/dpal dang grags dang 
[\[238a.7\]]skal ba bzang /_/ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la/_/drug po de ldan zhes bya ba/_/'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te/_/de ltar bral phyir 'das pa'o/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs/_/thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/_/sku 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas/_/btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings/_/de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste/_/dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs par bshad/_/rdo rje chos rnams 'jigs pa che/_/snying po ye shes chen po ste/_/sogs pa mang po'i don yin te/_/dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga/_/phyi nang 
[\[238b.2\]]gsang ba la sogs kyi/_/rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin/_/mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' 'gro ste/_/rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya/_/thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir/_/ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa yin/_/de yi don la mi dpogs pas/_/de yi phyir na dpag tu med/_/thabs 
[\[238b.3\]]cig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di/_/de nyid don dang dbyer med phyir/_/gcig gi don du bshad pa'o/_/gnyis pa ma yin de dus su/_/phyi nang ma yin mchod pa ni/_/phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya/_/me tog bdug pa mar me dang /_/dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang /_/rol mo sil 
[\[238b.4\]]snyan dbyangs nyid dang /_/sgeg dang rgod dang gar nyid dang /_/rta dang glang po rin chen sogs/_/de nas nang gi mchod pa ni/_/b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa btsir/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba lnga/_/byang chub sems dang ldan byas te/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/_/de la 
[\[238b.5\]]sogs pas mchod par bya/_/de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni/_/rtsa dang rlung dang thig le ste/_/de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis/_/rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod/_/de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni/_/dang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang /_/dga' bral de bzhin lhan skyes dga'/_/bde 
[\[238b.6\]]ba'i khyad par de nyid kyis/_/rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod/_/de nas bla med mchod pas ni/_/rang rig stong par rtogs pa yis/_/'od gsal de nyid chos kyi sku/_/de nyid bla med mchod pa mchog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rdo rje snying po la sogs 
[\[238b.7\]]pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs par gyur te/_g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rdo rje rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA la dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]{D404}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI dz+nyA na A sha ya tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor 
[\[239a.2\]]grangs med pa dang /_ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan ye shes mnga' bdag che/_/ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang /_/
[\[239a.3\]]ye shes skye gnas gang dang gang /_/rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang /_/gang la dbang byed gang gis 'dul/_/de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro nyon/_/ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga/_/de nyid don la shes pa 
[\[239a.4\]]dang /_/log rtog shes pas ma bsgribs phyir/_/spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o/_/me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang /_/so sor rtog dang bya nan tan/_/chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o/_/de la me long ye shes ni/_/dper na g.ya' dag me long la/_/gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba 
[\[239a.5\]]bzhin/_/de bzhin sems kyi me long la/_/nyon mongs g.ya' ni dag byas na/_/chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong /_/sems kyi me long gang yin la/_/sgyu ma tsam du snang ba de/_/tha dad mi phyed mnyam ye shes/_/mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam de ni/_/
[\[239a.6\]]las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa/_/de nyid so sor rtog ye shes/_/de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de/_/de nyid don grub ye shes te/_/thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te/_/de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin/_/ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa/_/kha sbyor dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do/_/dbyings 
[\[239a.7\]]dang ye shes gnyis med tshul/_/shar dang lho dang nub dang byang /_/ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas/_/de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni/_/chos dbyings ye shes skye ba'i gnas/_/me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang /_/so sor rtog dang bya ba grub/_/chos dbyings ye shes la sogs pa/_/bdag 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]po byed pa'i phyir dang ni/_/zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang /_/'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang /_/de bzhin gti mug la sogs pa'i/_/nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir/_/rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa/_/byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags/_/
[\[239b.2\]]de nyid dbye ba gang lags dang /_/de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas/_/nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang /_/de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang /_/rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa/_/de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/byang chub sems ni rang rig ste/_/
[\[239b.3\]]dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su bstan/_/de yi gnas ni rtsa yin te/_/gzung ba rig pa'i 'khor lor te/_/nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni/_/go bzlog pa yi tshul yin no/_/de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs/_/rtags ni lus la khrag byung dang /_/ba spu langs dang 'dar ba dang /_/kha zas dad chung 
[\[239b.4\]]lus yang dang /_/skra dkar gnyer ma dengs pa dang /_/le lo med dang brtson 'grus ldan/_/de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub/_/de nas yon tan bshad pa ni/_/rkang mgyogs steng sa 'og gi/_/'jig rten dngos grub gang yin dang /_/'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur/_/gnyis 
[\[239b.5\]]med byang chub sems kyi gnas/_/rang rig 'od gsal de nyid do/_/ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te/_/rtags ni 'od gsal de nyid do/_/'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'i/_/sa ni nges par thob pa'o/_/rnal 'byor sems gzung bsgom pa brtag_/lus sems tshags su bcug nas ni/_/
[\[239b.6\]]rang gi sems kyi de nyid la/_/de nyid dbyer med bsgom par bya/_/de yis thob med 'bras bu thob/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de mi 
[\[239b.7\]]snang bar gyur to/_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]{D405}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI rA ga rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[240a.2\]]gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/_/he he dpa' bo 'jigs pa che/_/sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin na/_/mtshan dang dpe byad gang dang 
[\[240a.3\]]gang /_/stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang /_/rdzus skyes mngal skyes sgong skyes dang /_/drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/a ni dbu yi gtsug tor te/_/A ni dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil/_/i ni dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa/_/I ni smin 
[\[240a.4\]]mtshams mdzod spu ste/_/u ni spyan smig mthon mthing la/_/ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o/_/u tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/_/r-i r-I tshems mnyam tshams thags bzang /_/l-i l-I tshems dkar ro bro mchog_/e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra/_/ai ljags shin tu srab pa ste/_/o ni tshangs pa'i 
[\[240a.5\]]dbyangs dang ldan/_/au ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum/_/oM ni bdun mtho ba ru gsungs/_/aHni thal gong rgyas pa ste/_/'di dag bcu drug g.yas bskor ro/_/de nas g.yon bskor mtshams nas kyang /_/a ni lpags srab mdog gser 'dra/_/A ni bzhengs bzhin ma btud par/_/
[\[240a.6\]]phyag gnyis pus mo sleb pa'o/_/i ni ro stod seng ge 'dra/_/I ni shing n+ya gro lta bur/_/chu dang zheng ni gab pa'o/_/u ni mdzod spu g.yas su 'khyil/_/U ni spu rnams gyen du phyogs/_/r-i mdoms spa ba sbubs su nub/_/r-I brla legs par zlum pa'o/_/l-i ni zhabs long tshigs 
[\[240a.7\]]mi mngon/_/l-I ni phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon/_/l-I ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil/_/'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o/_/e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'brel/_/ai ni sen mo ring ba ste/_/o ni phyag dang zhabs mthil la/_/'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin/_/au ni zhabs ni shin 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]tu gnas/_/oM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste/_/aHni byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ni/_/e na ya yi lta bu ste/_/spyi bo'i mi shigs snying po ha~M/_/ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/_/ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra/_/kha ni sen mo mdog snum pa/_/ga ni sen mo mtho ba ste/_/g+ha ni sor mo rnams zlum 
[\[240b.2\]]pa/_/nga ni sor mo rnams rgyas pa/_/tsa ni sor rnams byin gyis phra/_/tsha ni rtsa rnams mi mngon pa/_/dza ni rtsa mdud med pa yin/_/dz+ha ni long bu mi mngon pa/_/nya ni zhabs mi mnyam pa med/_/Ta ni seng ge'i stabs su gshegs/_/Tha ni glang po'i stabs su gshegs/_/Da ni ngang pa'i stabs 
[\[240b.3\]]su gshegs/_/D+ha ni khyu mchog stabs su gshegs/_/Na ni g.yon phyogs ldog cing gshegs/_/ta ni mdzes par gshegs pa ste/_/tha ni mi g.yo bar gshegs pa/_/da ni sku la 'khril bag chags/_/d+ha sku byi dor byas pa 'dra/_/na sku rim par 'tsham pa'o/_/pa ni sku gtsang pha sku 'jam/_/
[\[240b.4\]]ba sku rnam par dag pa'o/_/b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid/_/ma sku kho lag yangs shing bzang /_/ya ni gom pa snyoms pa'o/_/ra sku shin tu gzhon mdog can/_/la ni sku la 'khrul pa med/_/wa ni sku lus rgyas pa ste/_/sha ni shin tu grims pa'o/_/Sha ni yan lag thams cad 
[\[240b.5\]]mdzes/_/sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag_/ha dku zlum pa nyid yin te/_/k+Sha ni dku skabs phyed pa'o/_/ya ni dku snyoms pa yin te/_/ra ni phyal phyam med pa yin/_/la ni lte ba zab pa ste/_/wa ni lte ba g.yas su 'khyil/_/D+ha ni kun nas mdzes pa ste/_/d+ha ni kun spyod gtsang ma 
[\[240b.6\]]yin/_/'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu yin/_/de nas g.yon gyis bzhi bcu ni/_/ka ni sku sme gnag bag med/_/kha ni shing bal ltar 'jam phyag_/ga phyag ri mo mdangs yod pa/_/g+ha phyag ri mo zab pa dang /_/nga phyag ri mo ring ba'o/_/tsa 
[\[240b.7\]]zhal ha cang mi ring ba/_/tsha zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang /_/dza dz+ha ljags mnyen ljags srab pa/_/nya ni ljags dmar ngo bo ste/_/glang po'i nga ro 'brug sgra Ta/_/Tha ni gsung snyan mnyen 'jam pa/_/Da D+ha mche ba zlum dang rno/_/Na ni mche dkar ta tshems mnyam/_/tha ni mche ba 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]byin gyis phra/_/da shangs shin tu mtho ba dang /_/d+ha shangs shin tu gtsang ba'o/_/na ni spyan 'od rnam par dag_/pa pha spyan bzang rdzi ma stug_/ba ni dkar nag phyed pad+ma'i/_/'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra pad+ma'i spyan/_/b+ha ni de bzhin smin mtshams ring /_/ma ya smin 
[\[241a.2\]]mtshams smin spu mnyam/_/ra ni de bzhin smin ma snum/_/la ni phyag ring rgyas pa'o/_/de bzhin wa ni snyan shal mnyam/_/snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams sha/_/dpral ba legs par 'byes pa Sha/_/sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_/ha ni dbu dag shin tu rgyas/_/dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag k+Sha/_/
[\[241a.3\]]dbu skra stug pa ya yin te/_/de bzhin dbu skra 'jam pa ra/_/dbu skra mi gshor ba ni wa/_/dbu skra dri zhim Da yin te/_/phyag la dpal gyi be'u dang ni/_/bkra shis g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan/_/sdong ris lta bu D+ha yin te/_/lte ba sprul pa'i snying po a~M/_/
[\[241a.4\]]gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/_/a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid/_/A ni stong pa nyid stong pa/_/i ni chen po stong pa nyid/_/I ni don dam stong pa nyid/_/u ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid/_/U ni 'dus ma byas stong pa/_/r-i ni mtha' las 'das stong pa/_/r-I ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid/_/l-i ni 
[\[241a.5\]]ngor ba med pa stong /_/l-I ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/e ni chos rnams thams cad stong /_/ai ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong /_/o ni mi dmigs stong pa nyid/_/au ni dngos po med stong nyid/_/a~M ni ngo bo stong pa nyid/_/dngos med ngo bo stong nyid aH/_/mgrin pa longs spyod snying po o~M/_/
[\[241a.6\]]shes rab ston pa bcu drug rtsa/_/gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba/_/rnam par thar pa dang po a/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_/phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba/_/rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no/_/sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus/_/mngon sum byas nas 
[\[241a.7\]]rdzogs pa ni/_/de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'das pa/_/sna tshogs 'du shes yid mi byed/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas la gnas Ta/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas las 'das te/_/rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing /_/rnam shes mtha' yas rdzogs 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]pa ta/_/rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das nas/_/ci yang med pa la gnas te/_/de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no/_/ci yang med pa las 'das te/_/'du shes med min la gnas te/_/'du shes med min rdzogs pa ya/_/'du shes med min la 'das te/_/'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i 
[\[241b.2\]]lus/_/mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad pa sha/_/snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo hU~M/_/gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan/_/'di dag rtsa yi rnam par gnas/_/'khor lo'i rgya ni sor gsum ste/_/sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/de phyir sems can sangs 
[\[241b.3\]]rgyas yin/_/sna tshogs sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/ring du 'byung zhing thung du gnas/_/smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la/_/g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste/_/steng 'og kha yi bar nas 'byung /_/ro ma shar du mngon du phyogs/_/rkyang ma nub ste 'og 
[\[241b.4\]]gi char/_/ro mas rkyang ma la 'khyud cing /_/g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug nyid/_/rkyang mas ro ma la 'khyud cing /_/g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid/_/g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsung thugs/_/de sgra sngags su rab tu grags/_/sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs/_/de nyid las ni byung 
[\[241b.5\]]bas na/_/sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no/_/skye ba bzhi yi rim pa yang /_/snod bcud yab yum la thim ste/_/yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur/_/snang ba'i thig le yang dag bcas/_/'di dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul/_/A li kA li nyi zla ste/_/sems ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas/_/
[\[241b.6\]]nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod/_/kA dang A las nyi zla ste/_/rang byung thig le drod gsher yin/_/de dag skad cig rkyen med las/_/rang bzhin 'byung ba rdzus skyes so/_/rkyen med sbyor ba sgong sogs las/_/bde ba skye dang bde ba'i rgyu/_/thams cad dran pa gsang ba yi/_/mngal nas skyes 
[\[241b.7\]]pa'i tshul yin te/_/yar la sreg dang mar la gso/_/gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin/_/phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis/_/rtsa rgyas bde ba ster ba dang /_/rin po che yi pho brang du/_/sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin/_/nang gi 'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis/_/bde ba skye ba drod 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]gsher skyes/_/gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par/_/gdod nas bde ba'i rgyur skyes la/_/bde ba skyes pa rdzus skyes so/_/gtum mo go bzlog rkyen gyis sbar/_/gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang /_/gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang /_/gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba ni/_/
[\[242a.2\]]mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes/_/rdzus skyes rim par sbyar bar bya/_/du ma'i gzhi bcas gzhi bcas dang /_/gzhi med shin tu gzhi med de/_/mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes/_/rdzus skyes bzhi char rim par sbyar/_/rgyu dang lam ste 'bras bu kun/_/skye ba bzhi yi ngo bor 
[\[242a.3\]]gcig_/de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis/_/dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la/_/log rtog sgyu mas gnyis su 'khrul/_/rdo rje snying po snying rje che/_/nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon/_/sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor bsgom/_/gsung ni mgrin 
[\[242a.4\]]pa thugs ni snying /_/yon tan lte ba phrin las ni/_/sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya/_/'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang /_/rdo rje phag mo rab tu grags/_/ha~M ni bde mchog he ru ka/_/dpa' bo gcig pa yin par 'dod/_/bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag_/gsum pa hU~M las rab tu grags/_/bcu 
[\[242a.5\]]gsum pa dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_/bcu dgu o~M las rab tu grags/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu/_/ha~M gi ngo bor yang dag gnas/_/sum cu bdun dang drug cu bzhi/_/a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges/_/rtsa ni rdo rje phag mo ste/_/g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal/_/dpa' bo byang chub 
[\[242a.6\]]sems yin te/_/skye mched bcu gnyis dngas pa yang /_/bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags/_/'byung bzhi'i dngas ma zhal bzhir nges/_/mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad/_/gsung mchog bla ma'i zhal nas blang /_/g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste/_/'dom gang mnyam pa 
[\[242a.7\]]gru bzhi yin/_/bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga/_/rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te/_/ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do/_/so sen ba spu twa ra sogs/_/mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya/_/'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te/_/dper na rang byung gser dang 'dra/_/'di ni bcos ma ma 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]yin te/_/rang rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bsgom pa min/_/rdul tshon la sogs bri ba min/_/spos la sogs pas mchod pa min/_/rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya/_/rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/rang bzhin mchod pas rtag 
[\[242b.2\]]tu mchod/_/sku ni dgun dus rang bzhin te/_/'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum/_/gsung ni dpyid dus ngo bo ste/_/'jug pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum/_/thugs ni dbyar dus ngo bo ste/_/gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum/_/ye shes ston gyi dus yin te/_/sku gsung thugs ni 
[\[242b.3\]]zla ba gsum/_/dang po rgyu yi sa pa yin/_/'khor lo chags pa dmar po la/_/yi ge rnams ni dkar pos gnas/_/lam gyis pa rnam pa gnyis/_/ring ba dang ni nye ba'o/_/de nas 'bras bu'i sa pa yin/_/'khor lo yang dag gnas pa ste/_/'khor lo de rnams lha rnams kyang /_/
[\[242b.4\]]sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral/_/rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med/_/shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med/_/mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can/_/zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can/_/phyi ru sku mdog phyag mtshan lha/_/nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gzugs/_/gsang ba'i bde ba lha ru nges/_/
[\[242b.5\]]de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha/_/lus las byung phyir lha zhe'am/_/rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lha/_/chags pa'i phyir na lha yin te/_/rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin te/_/thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/_/chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs so/_/de nas sa chen po yang cher 
[\[242b.6\]]g.yos par gyur te/_/mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po yang babs par gyur to/_/de nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yi rangs nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//
[\[242b.7\]]rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA la dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D406}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI DA ki nI saM ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/_bod skad du/_dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bya ba/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas/_/thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang /_/he he mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni ji ltar lags/_/de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags/_/dam tshig bsrung ba ji ltar lags/_/
[\[243a.2\]]rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs/_/nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon/_/dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang /_/rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas/_/rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag_/kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang /_/sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste/_/rang bzhin sgo gsum 'khrugs 
[\[243a.3\]]pa 'bring /_/nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin/_/rang gzhan 'khrugs pa tha ma yang /_/nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod/_/re re la yang gsum gsum ste/_/nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye/_/rang la mnar sems ma skyes kyang /_/gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi/_/bdag gi 
[\[243a.4\]]g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa/_/de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad/_/rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang /_/gzhan la nyes pa chung bas na/_/'di lnga nyams pa 'bring du bshad/_/g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang /_/'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs/_/rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi/_/
[\[243a.5\]]lta spyod gang la gzhan ma mos/_/zab mo'i don la skur 'debs pa/_/ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad/_/rang gis ma nyes gzhan cher 'khrugs/_/'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad/_/re re'i dbye ba gzhan nas shes/_/de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang /_/phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag_/
[\[243a.6\]]'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye/_/rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol la/_/bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur/_/g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu /_/mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang /_/bcas te bye brag dam tshig las/_/gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs/_/
[\[243a.7\]]dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang /_/de nas mkha' 'gro mtshan nyid kyang /_/mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste/_/phag mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad/_/gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste/_/gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o/_/ka nas g.yas bskor ka yi bar/_/mkha' 'gro drug cu bzhi ru nges/_/ka 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ste/_/phyi nas rtsa re mkha' 'gro re/_/mkha' 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi bar/_/sum cu rtsa bdun mkha' 'gro ma/_/lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas/_/a sogs brgyad ni mkha' 'gro brgyad/_/de bzhin zung rtsa mkha' 'gro bzhi/_/snying ga ru ni yang 
[\[243b.2\]]dag gnas/_/zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gro re/_/gzhan rnams rtsa re mkha' 'gro re/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas/_/rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas/_/gzhan ni spyi bor yang dag gnas/_/de nas sdom pa bshad bya ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/_/bde de 
[\[243b.3\]]sdom par yang dag bshad/_/gang zhig bde ba khyad par can/_/nges par sdom pa yin par 'dod/_/rdo rje phag mo mi 'da' bas/_/sdom pa dam tshig tu ni bshad/_/mi phyed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs/_/rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa/_/dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags/_/rkyen ni 
[\[243b.4\]]gang lags dus gang lags/_/tshad ni gang lags bsrung dus gang /_/lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye/_/dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang /_/mi shes pa dang bag med dang /_/nyon mongs ldan dang ma gus dang /_/brjed ngas dran pa mi gsal ba/_/'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu/_/
[\[243b.5\]]bla ma ma bsten grogs ngan 'grogs/_/mdor na sgo gsum g.yengs pa'i yul/_/de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs/_/gdon gyis bar chad chang gis myos/_/log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod/_/nyon mongs zil non bla mas skyo/_/'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag_/dam tshig 
[\[243b.6\]]nyams pa'i dus yin te/_/spyir ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs/_/gdon sogs gzhan gyis byin brlabs tshe/_/bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na/_/chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs/_/'du shes sngon du ma song na/_/bag med nyams pa so nas gnas/_/gdon sogs rang gis ma 
[\[243b.7\]]mthong na/_/de yang nyams pa chung bar gsungs/_/'khor bas skyo dang rnam smin dran/_/bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes/_/bar chad bral ba bshags pa'i dus/_/sbyor ba dngos gzhi mjug dang gsum/_/gang rdzogs tshad ni mthar phyin te/_/che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya/_/sbyor ba 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ltung ba chung ngu ste/_/dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung /_/mjug rdzogs ltung ba chen por nges/_/rgyan dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag_/'chang ba bsten pa'i dam tshig yin/_/sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni/_/bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/_/sems can 
[\[244a.2\]]dpa' bo mkha' 'gro la/_/longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa/_/blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/_/rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa/_/shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go/_/sgo gsum sku gsung thugs su bsam/_/bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/_/nyon mongs dug drug gzung 'dzin kun/_/
[\[244a.3\]]rang rig skye ba med par bsgral/_/bsgral ba'i dam tshig chen po yin/_/dam tshig don du dam tshig dag_/dus drug dus gnyis lo bar du/_/brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrung /_/dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrung /_/skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med/_/rang gi lus kyi nyes pa 
[\[244a.4\]]las/_/gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes 'byung ba/_/'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad/_/rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las/_/gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes 'byung ba/_/bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste/_/gzhan la gsung gi nyams par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya/_/rang la rtsa ba'i nyes 
[\[244a.5\]]pa las/_/gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang /_/legs pa las ni nyes 'byung sogs/_/bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste/_/'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya/_/dam tshig de yi don rnams la/_/'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te/_/rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa/_/dam tshig 
[\[244a.6\]]'di yi don rnams ni/_/zab cing rgya che rtog par dka'/_/mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bdud rtsi khar zos slar la dor ba med/_/ngan skyugs phyir dor slar la za ba med/_/rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshor na/_/log rtog 'khrul 
[\[244a.7\]]pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol/_/de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to/_/mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]{D407}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ag+ni mA la tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ha ha hi hi he he kye/_/bdag la khyed la zhu ba mchis/_/shrI ni gang lags he gang lags/_/ru ni gang lags ka gang 
[\[244b.2\]]lags/_/dbang bzhi he ru ka gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/_/he ni rgyu sogs rnam par spangs/_/ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid/_/ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas so/_/de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka/_/rtag tu lus dang sems la 
[\[244b.3\]]gnas/_/de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi/_/dbang bzhi grangs kyis nges pa ste/_/dang po bum dbang he ru ka/_/sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe/_/rang sems las su rung ba ste/_/de tshe 'jig rten tha mal pa'i/_/rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi/_/spangs pa'i phyir na he zhes brjod/_/
[\[244b.4\]]las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral/_/de yi phyir na ru zhes brjod/_/'jig rten tha mal rnam rtog gi/_/gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i/_/phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o/_/thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags gnyis su med/_/de yi phyir na 
[\[244b.5\]]shrI ru brjod/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka/_/phag mo la gnas tshogs dang ldan/_/zag med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul/_/de nas gsang dbang he ru ka/_/nyi zla phyag mtshan yig 'bru'i tshogs/_/bskyed rim rgyu rkyen kun spangs te/_/rlung sogs las 
[\[244b.6\]]su rung bas na/_/de yi phyir na he zhes brjod/_/phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang /_/mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i/_/tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na ru/_/bskyed pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang /_/dmigs dang lta spyod gang la yang /_/mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod/_/bskyed pa'i gzung 
[\[244b.7\]]'dzin gnyis med ma'o/_/phyir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste/_/rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan/_/rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul/_/rlung sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas/_/rtsa rlung rang bzhin gnas la sogs/_/nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs ldan/_/nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka/_/
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]de nas gsum pa'i he ru ka/_/rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yi/_/rgyu spangs phyir ni he zhes brjod/_/rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi/_/tshogs dang bral phyir ru zhes brjod/_/rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang /_/tsaN+DA lI yi kha dog dang /_/dbyibs la mi gnas phyir 
[\[245a.2\]]na ka/_/sems nyid bde bar gnas pas so/_/nang gi thabs dang shes rab med/_/de yi phyir na shrI ru gsungs/_/mig ser nad kyis btab pa ltar/_/rang sems bde bar gnas pas so/_/sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang /_/bde ba la bsten tshogs dang ldan/_/lhan cig skyes 
[\[245a.3\]]pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan/_/sems dang bde ba tha dad med/_/sems dang bde ba gang gnas pa/_/mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa/_/gsum pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/_/de nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka_/rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral/_/de yi phyir na he 
[\[245a.4\]]zhes brjod/_/pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam/_/thams cad stong par ro gcig pas/_/tshogs gnyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod/_/bde ba tsam la'ang mi gnas phyir/_/ka zhes nges par brjod pa yin/_/sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas/_/stobs sogs phun sum tshogs pas 
[\[245a.5\]]na/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang /_/gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan/_/shrI zhes bya ba mngon par brjod/_/dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/_/dngos por ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i/_/sems kyi de nyid la gnas pa/_/bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/_/bdud rnams kun 
[\[245a.6\]]la tho 'tsham zhing /_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol/_/mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin med/_/snang zhing gsal la rang bzhin med/_/me long bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin/_/mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang /_/de ltar don ni ma rtogs par/_/kha cig sku mdog phyag mtshan la/_/
[\[245a.7\]]he ru ka yi rnam par rtog_/kha cig gzugs brnyan rnam par rtog_/kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod/_/de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod sogs/_/de bzhin rang rig he ru ka/_/bla ma ma bsten brtson 'grus med/_/shes rab mi ldan bzod sogs med/_/rigs dang rig pa'i nga rgyal can/_/khe 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]dang grags pa rnyed dang dga'/_/rgyu des log rtog sna tshogs bskyed/_/de bas he ru kar grags pa'i/_/dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/dad ldan gus bcas pha rol phyin/_/rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las/_/man ngag yang dag blang bar bya/_/ma mo'i tshogs kyis yang 
[\[245b.2\]]zhus pa/_/he ru ka dpal de ltar na/_/rdo rje phag mo ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje gsum ste phag mo gnyis/_/don gyi rdo rje de nas brtags/_/tha ma rdzas kyi rdo rje ste/_/don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste/_/gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis/_/mi phyed phyir na 
[\[245b.3\]]rdo rje ste/_/dbang bzhis rdo rje re re'o/_/rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te/_/rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste/_/rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags/_/rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te/_/khams gsum dgu 'joms pa yi/_/rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu'o/_/rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/_/zlum po la 
[\[245b.4\]]sogs rnam pa bzhi/_/mi shes dri mas ches gos pa'i/_/dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang /_/shes rab char byung phag mo ste/_/de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru nges/_/bum dbang zhe sdang gti mug phag_/gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug phag_/gsum pa chags dga' gti mug phag_/bzhi 
[\[245b.5\]]pa chos dbyings gti mug phag_/'di nyid khyod la legs par gtad/_/thams cad rjes su yi rang ngo /_/dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shrI he ru ka'i nges par 'byung ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes 
[\[245b.6\]]kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//[ {D408}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI DA ki nI gu h+ya dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye a 
[\[245b.7\]]la la ho/_kye a la la ho/_mkha' 'gro gang lags ma gang lags/_/gsang dang rgyud dang rgyal po gang /_/nyon cig byang chub sems dpa' khyod/_/mkha' 'gro bzhi ste ma ni gsum/_/gsang ba drug ste rgyud brgyad do/_/rgyal po bcu dgu dag tu bstan/_/dang po mkha' 'gro dbye 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ba yang /_/rags pa'i rtog pa spang ba'i phyir/_/bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan dang po'o/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan spang ba'i phyir/_/gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/rlung dang rtsa sogs tsaN+DA lI/_/'di dag mkha' 'gro gnyis pa 
[\[246a.2\]]ste/_/dman pa rnams la sku dang phyag_/rlung dang rtsa sogs kha dog dbyibs/_/de nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/shes rab ye shes dang 'brel pa'i/_/lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i ro/_/'di dag gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro ste/_/mkha' 'gro 'di rnams rim pa las/_/dman pa rnams 
[\[246a.3\]]la phra ba'i gzugs/_/lus sems tshor ba bde ba las/_/'das pa'i bde ba chen po dag_/spang phyir rang rig ye shes te/_/sems kyi de nyid stong ba'i ro/_/de nyid mkha' 'gro bzhi pa ste/_/shes brjod kun gyi yul ma yin/_/de nyid lnga la sogs pa yi/_/mkha' 'gro 'di rnams 
[\[246a.4\]]rim pa yang /_/sku mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i gnyen/_/rlung dang rtsa sogs bum dbang spong /_/bde bas rlung dang rtsa sogs spong /_/rang rig stong pas bde ba spong /_/gzugs sku gnyis kyis stong pa spong /_/de phyir gong ma gnyen por bshad/_/rags pa phung sogs bum dbang 
[\[246a.5\]]rgyu/_bum dbang gsang dbang rgyu yin te/_/gsang ba gsum pa'i rgyu ru nges/_/bde ba rang rig skyed pa yi/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa ste/_/'bras bu bzhi dang mi mthun bzhi/_/mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rim pa'o/_/ma ni rnam pa gsum yin te/_/'dod chags chen pos bcom ldan 
[\[246a.6\]]'das/_/zhe sdang chen pos bcom ldan 'das/_/gti mug chen pos bcom ldan 'das/_/nga rgyal la sogs de dang 'dra/_/thun mong ma yin sras 'byung bas/_/ma zhes gsungs pa yin par 'dod/_/snod min gsang ba sgrogs thos pa/_/skrag pa thun mong ma yin bskyed/_/bskyed 
[\[246a.7\]]pa'i phyir na ma zhes bya/_/skye ba gcig gis sangs rgyas pas/_/sras rnams thun mong ma yin skyed/_/de yi phyir na ma zhes bya/_/thun mong bla ma'i zhal nas shes/_/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/_/bdud rtsi drug dag gsang ba ste/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/_/reg bya de 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]bzhin chos yin te/_/rgyud ni dbang bzhi ngo bo ste/_/brjod bya rjod byed brgyad du bshad/_/gsang ba lnga ni rgyal po lnga/_/lta ba spyod pa zung 'jug lam/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu sa la sogs/_/bcu dgu rgyal po yin par gsungs/_/kye bo dpa' bo 'jigs pa che/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[246b.2\]]gzugs dang srin po gzugs/_/gzhan yang bdud la sogs pa'i gzugs/_/sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi/_/lha 'am klu la sogs pa'i gzugs/_/sdug pa ston na ji ltar bgyi/_/gnod sbyin sgra dang srin po'i sgra/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra grag na/_/de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_/
[\[246b.3\]]tshangs pa'i sgra dang ngang pa'i sgra/_/sgra snyan byung na ji ltar bgyi/_/bya rgod dri dang gla rtsi dri/_/ngan skyugs la sogs dri byung na/_/de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_/gur gum tsan+dan ga pur sogs/_/dri zhim byung na ji ltar bgyi/_/bdud rtsi la sogs drug cu sogs/_/bzang po ston na 
[\[246b.4\]]ji ltar bgyi/_/ngan skyugs la sogs dman pa'i ro/_/sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi/_/reg bya lcags kyi spu gri sogs/_/rtsub ba byung na ji ltar bgyi/_/dar men la sogs lus kyis reg_/'jam pa byung na ji ltar bgyi/_/'jig rten chos rnams sna tshogs dang /_/'jig rten 
[\[246b.5\]]'das pa'i chos rnams ston/_/de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gzugs ngan khong khro mi bskyed cing /_/gzugs bzang 'dod par mi bya ste/_/de la lus kyi phyag rgya bstan/_/lan byed dpa' bo mkha' 'gro yi/_/dngos grub sprul pa yin par nges/_/
[\[246b.6\]]brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang /_/lan med bdud kyi bar chad de/_/bdud bsal ba yi cho ga brtsam/_/kun la mkhas pas sbyor bar bya/_/sgra snyan 'dod pa mi bskyed cing /_/'jigs pa'i sgra la khong mi khro/_/de la btang snyoms sems bya ste/_/rdo rje glu yis brtag par 
[\[246b.7\]]bya/_/de bzhin dri bzang mi chags zhing /_/dri ngan khong khro mi bya bar/_/mnyam par dmigs la brtag par bya/_/dri yi phyag rgya de la bstan/_/lan byed mkha' 'gro'i sprul pa ste/_/lan med bdud kyi sprul pa'o/_/ro bzang bza' bar mi bya zhing /_/ro ngan dor bar mi bya'o/_/mnyam par 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gzhag la brtag par bya/_/de la ro yi phyag rgya bstan/_/de bzhin bye brag shes par bya/_/de bzhin chos la chos phyag rgya/_/brtags te bdud rnams bsal bar bya/_/lus la byung ba'i bdud rnams kyang /_/kha dog dbyibs la shes par bya/_/dang po dngos 
[\[247a.2\]]grub blang ba yang /_/mig gis gzugs la rna bas sgra/_/sna yis dri dang lce yis ro/_/lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos/_/brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang /_/de nas bdud ni bsal bya ste/_/yang na stong pa'i rdzong la gnas/_/yang na phrin las bzhi yis bsal/_/chu yis 
[\[247a.3\]]bde ba 'jam sogs pas/_/nang gi bdud ni bsal ba'o/_/pad mkhris steng sgo 'dus pa'i bar/_/rlung can mgo yi sgo ru ste/_/rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung /_/de ltar byas na dngos grub thob/_/dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//
[\[247a.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D409}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI badzra b+hai ra ba bi dA ra Na tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i 
[\[247a.5\]]rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang /_/ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te 
[\[247a.6\]]thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das/_/rdo rje gang lags 'jigs byed gang /_/'joms pa gang lags rgyud gang lags/_/rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te/_/nyon 
[\[247a.7\]]mongs bdud sogs 'jigs par byed/_/nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms/_/rgyu yi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud/_/mthar thug rgyud ni gang yin la/_/rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/re re'i bye brag ma 'tshal bas/_/de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol/_/
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te/_/don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags/_/rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni gsum/_/de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad/_/gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir/_/don gyi rdo rje bshad pa'o/_/dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste/_/rdo rje bzhi ru bshad pa yin/_/rtags 
[\[247b.2\]]kyi rdo rje gsum yin te/_/rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu pa/_/rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags/_/rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags/_/rtse dgu khams gsum sa dgu'i rtags/_/rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/_/bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs lha/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i 
[\[247b.3\]]rnam rtog ni/_/'jig dang 'joms pas rdo rje'o/_/gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtog pa/_/'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o/_/shes rab ye shes dang 'brel pa'i/_/lhan cig skyes dga' la sogs la/_/gzung 
[\[247b.4\]]dang 'dzin par gang rtog pa/_/'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje yin/_/bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/rang rig sems nyid stong nyid la/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtog pa/_/'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o/_/de nas rtags kyi rdo rje ni/_/rtse gsum sku gsung thugs su bshad/_/
[\[247b.5\]]'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/_/'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste/_/rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags/_/nga rgyal la sogs rnam pa lnga/_/'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o/_/de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni/_/rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa ste/_/zur gsum rno la 'bigs pa dang /_/gru bzhi dag ni 
[\[247b.6\]]gsal bar byed/_/zlum pos rdzas rnams 'joms par byed/_/zur lngas 'dod bsgrub rdzas rdo rje/_/rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud/_/mthar thug rgyud ni rgyal po ste/_/de rnams kun la dbang byed pas/_/log lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed/_/bcom ldan 
[\[247b.7\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs te/_g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]rgyal po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D410}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA ba la dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal stobs 
[\[248a.2\]]chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_/bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la 'khor dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang /_ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs 
[\[248a.3\]]pa'i dus su/_dpa' bo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas g.yon phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos gtugs te/_ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_rtsa ni gang lags 
[\[248a.4\]]rlung gang lags/_/thig le gang lags grangs ni du/_/de la sems gzung ji ltar lags/_/'khor lo ji ltar lags pa dang /_/de yi grangs ni du zhig mchis/_/rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags/_/yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags/_/de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni/_/yi ge 
[\[248a.5\]]dgod pa gang dang gang /_/gtum mo sbar ba ji ltar lags/_/zla ba nyi ma ji ltar lags/_/gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi/_/rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags/_/go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi gang lags/_/de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang /_/
[\[248a.6\]]de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung /_/stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags/_/sa yi rim pa ji ltar lags/_/de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang /_/dgos pa'i dgongs pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod/_/khyod la bshad kyis legs 
[\[248a.7\]]par zung /_/rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni/_/nam mkha' gnyis med thams cad bskyed/_/der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni/_/g.yo ba rnam shes g.yo ba yin/_/thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste/_/stong nyid bsam du med pa'o/_/thig le grangs ni bcu drug ste/_/rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]de nas sems gzung bstan pa ni/_/rtsa rlung dang ni thig le la/_/gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po/_/'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin te/_/bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod chos/_/de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/_/de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/_/bcu drug grangs su shes par bya/_/me 
[\[248b.2\]]rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te/_/ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni/_/spyi gtsug 'khor lo dbang bskur gnas/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin te/_/bde skyong 'khor lo dang po ste/_/rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor lo yin/_/rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin 
[\[248b.3\]]no/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs su bstan/_/rtsa rnams rang bzhin nga yis bshad/_/rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te/_/rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no/_/de nas yi ge dgod pa ni/_/bde chen 'khor lo sum cu gnyis/_/gsal byed sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/g.yas nas bskor te dgod par bya/_/
[\[248b.4\]]longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug_/dbyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad/_/yum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon nas dgod/_/thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin la/_/
[\[248b.5\]]gsal byed g.yas bskor dgod par bya/_/dbyangs yig gnyis ldan g.yon nas bskor/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/ha~M ni dkar po thur bltas bsam/_/longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/oM ni dkar po gyen bltas bsam/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/
[\[248b.6\]]hU~M ni sngon po thur bltas bsam/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/AHni dmar po gyen bltas bsam/_/rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis yin te/_/dang po'i gnas su yi ge ya~M/_/gtum mo 'bar ba'i ya~M yin te/_/nag po yongs su gyur pa las/_/rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi 
[\[248b.7\]]dbyibs/_/dbus su d+ha lnga dgod byas nas/_/ba dan lnga ni mdzes pa'o/_/gru gsum gnas su yi ge ra~M/_/me yi 'khor lo gru gsum dmar/_/dbus su o~M AHhU~M ni dgod/_/zur la rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan/_/rkyen gyi 'khor lo de ltar yin/_/rlung gis bskyod pas dam tshig 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]mes/_/ye shes me ni bskul ba mkhas/_/ye shes me ni bskul ba mkhas/_/'khor lo bzhi'am brgyad gnyis bshad/_/bde chen ma gtogs gnyis tsam bsregs/_/bde chen ha~M ni bsros byas nas/_/zhu ba 'chi med bdud rtsi ni/_/zla ba zhu ba'i bdud rtsi yis/_/srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab/_/
[\[249a.2\]]rgyun du 'bab par gyur pa yis/_/'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te/_/gzung ba mdud pa'i nang du gzung /_/go bzlog lugs su bzlog pa ste/_/mthar thug gnas su gzung ba'o/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa ni/_/gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo ste/_/hU~M ni lte bar dgod byas nas/_/
[\[249a.3\]]'dab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi grangs/_/gsal byed lugs bzhin dgod par bya/_/dbyangs yig rim gnyis dag bkod nas/_/tha ma bzung ste spangs pa'o/_/sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong ste/_/de phyir bde skyong zhes ni bshad/_/rta mgrin 'khor lo'i 'dab bzung la/_/dbyangs yig lugs 
[\[249a.4\]]dang lugs min dgod/_/lte bar u ni dgod par bya/_/bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i phyir/_/rta mgrin 'khor lo ru ni bshad/_/rig pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma lnga/_/lte bar ha~M ni dgod byas nas/_/'dab ma lnga la o~M hU~M trA~M a/_/g.yas nas rim gyis dgod par bya/_/bzhi pa'i don ni 
[\[249a.5\]]rig pa'i phyir/_/rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo rim pa drug_/lte ba 'dab bzhi 'dab ma brgyad/_/bcu drug sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi bshad pa yin/_/lte bar a ni dgod pa ste/_/e ba~M ma yA de rnams ni/_/'dab ma bzhi la g.yon nas 
[\[249a.6\]]dgod/_/'dab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba/_/sde brgyad kyi ni dang po brgyad/_/g.yon gyi rim pas dgod par bya/_/'dab ma bcu drug gang yin pa/_/ma mo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod/_/'dab ma sum cu gnyis sogs la/_/dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi 
[\[249a.7\]]rim pas dgod/_/'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la/_/g.yas nas kA li lugs bzhin dgod/_/A li rim gnyis g.yon nas dgod/_/gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yi phyir/_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad/_/de nas ro ma'i 'khor lo ni/_/'dab ma gnyis la lte bar bcas/_/
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]ma ning bzhi yi 'dab gnyis la/_/lte bar de nyid thur la dgod/_/rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba/_/b+h+ya ni gyen la dgod par bya/_/yi ge gnyis kyi dbus su ni/_/byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro/_/nyams su myang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/nyams myong ro ma'i 'khor lor bshad/_/de nas 
[\[249b.2\]]dbang bskur 'khor lo ni/_/steng gi tshangs sgo'i 'dab ma brgyad/_/lte bar a~M ni dgod pa ste/_/da~M la~M kha~M ru~M/_g.yon nas brtsams te phyogs bzhir dgod/_/hU~M trA~M hrI a/_g.yas nas mtshams su rim par dgod/_/byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/_/lus ngag yid gsum sgrib 
[\[249b.3\]]pa dag_/'khrud pa'i phyir na dbang bskur te/_/de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lor bshad/_/de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/_/mdor bsdus bsgom pa bshad par bya/_/gong du bstan pa gang yin pa/_/sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya/_/rang rig sems las gzhan min te/_/rang gi sems kyi stong 
[\[249b.4\]]pa nyid/_/'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin du/_/ci yang mi rtog shes 'gyur na/_/ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa nyid/_/de ltar sems la legs par zung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_
[\[249b.5\]]ma mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/_phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong 
[\[249b.6\]]shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D411}]@##/_rgya gar skad du/_shrI badzra sid+d+ha dzA la sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza/_bod skad du/_dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[249b.7\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas rin po che'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_dga' ba'i 'od dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i dus su rigs sgyu ma'i dbang du mdzad de thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[250a.2\]]phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/_mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/_/de nyid don dam gang yin pa/_/dpal dang rdo rje don dang ni/_/dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don/_/des bstan sdom pa gang yin pa/_/de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[250a.3\]]byams pa la sogs 'khor rnams kun/_/phyi rol don la g.yengs pa'i sems/_/nang du bsdus la rtse gcig nyon/_/dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te/_/de nyid mchod pa'i 'os yin la/_/gnyis med bde bas mchod par bya/_/rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga/_/gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir/_/
[\[250a.4\]]rdo rje zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/de nyid don la rtse gcig pas/_/chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i/_/sa ni nges par 'thob pa'o/_/dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don/_/kun rdzob gzhan rig tu bstan pas/_/grangs mang rgya cher bstan pa ni/_/nam mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don/_/nam mkha' 
[\[250a.5\]]dang mtshungs rang rig ni/_/sems kyi de nyid stong pa'i ro/_/skad cig de yi rgyun nyid la/_/rgyud ces bya bar bstan pa yin/_/dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las mtshan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan yang nga yis bshad/_/ye shes skye ba'i 
[\[250a.6\]]rgyu dang gnas/_/rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul/_/bye brag ming gi rnam grangs dang /_/don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang /_/phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang /_/don dam de nyid chos kyi dbyings/_/de nyid 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/rgyu ni rang rig ye shes te/_/rgyu med rgyu yi rang bzhin 
[\[250a.7\]]can/_/rang rig sgyu mar byung ba ni/_/bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te/_/'khor lo bzhi'am brgyad gnyis bshad/_/de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/_/ye shes skye ba'i rten yin la/_/gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa/_/grogs ni ye shes rlung yin te/_/ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]zhon nas de nyid byung ba yin/_/grangs ni snga ma ltar shes bya/_/ngo bo thig le nyid yin te/_/thig le mdud pa'i grangs su shes/_/de yi phan yon gang yin pa/_/gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis/_/phyin ci log tu brtags pa yi/_/rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin/_/'bras bu rdo rje 
[\[250b.2\]]'chang chen po'i/_/sa ni nges par thob pa'o/_/dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las ye shes kyi rgyu dang gnas la sogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba ni/_/bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni/_/sum 
[\[250b.3\]]cu rtsa gnyis grangs yin no/_/de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni/_/'dab ma bcu drug dag tu bstan/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi dag yin no/_/bde chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste/_/longs spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug_/
[\[250b.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug_/bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba ru/_/ha~M ni dkar po thur bltas bsam/_/longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/oM ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/hU~M ni sngon po thur bltas 
[\[250b.5\]]bsam/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su/_/AHni dmar bo gyen bltas bsam/_/dang po'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la/_/dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni/_/lugs 'byung lugs min dgod par bya/_/longs spyod 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la/_/dbyangs yig bcu drug rim bzhin 
[\[250b.6\]]dgod/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la/_/lA~M mA~M pA~M tA~M/_/yi ge 'di rnams g.yon nas dgod/_/o~M trI hrI a/_/mtshams nas g.yas su dgod par bya/_/sprul pa'i 'dab ma bzhi rtsibs la/_/gsal byed yi ge sum cu gnyis/_/lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul dgod/_/
[\[250b.7\]]sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni/_/dbus nas drang por gnas pa ste/_/hU~M ni dkar po thur bltas pa/_/mar gyi rtse la thug par dgod/_/g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te/_/kA li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/_/thabs la lan gsum bskor byas na/_/lugs 'byung 'og tu kha bltas dgod/_/
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la/_/ma mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni/_/gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya/_/sgal tshigs la gnas srog la brten/_/rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni/_/rin chen dang 'dra 'dud pa ni/_/dgu por gnas pa bya gdong tshul/_/chos kyi 
[\[251a.2\]]dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_/bde ba reg ster ma ni bzhugs/_/gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis/_/gru gsum gnas su yi ge ra~M/_/de ni yongs su gyur pa las/_/me yi 'khor lo gru gsum pa/_/tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te/_/lte bar raM ni dmar po bsam/_/'dab ma gsum 
[\[251a.3\]]la o~M AHhU~M/_/gru gsum zur la dgod bya ba/_/rdo rje rtse gsum bsam par bya/_/rlung gi gnas su yi ge ya~M/_/de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/_/mdog nag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la/_/tshad ni sor bzhi nyid yin no/_/dbus su 'dab ma lnga yin te/_/lte bar yaM ni nag po 
[\[251a.4\]]bsam/_/'dab ma lnga la d+ha lnga dgod/_/ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o/_/rlung gis dam tshig me sbar pas/_/dam tshig me yis gtum mo bskul/_/'khor lo gsum bsregs rnyid pa tsam/_/yi ge ha~M ni bsros pa yis/_/ha~M bzhu bdud rtsi'i char yang bab/_/lte ba'i gnas su 
[\[251a.5\]]thig ler gyur/_/rgyun du 'bar bar gyur pa yis/_/rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang slebs nas/_/rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong bas/_/rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro/_/bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/_/de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis/_/chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i/_/sa 
[\[251a.6\]]ni nges par thob pa'o/_/dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i/_/nges don du ni nga yis gsungs/_/de yi don la khyed rnams kyis/_/
[\[251a.7\]]rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byams pa dang /_dga' ba'i 'od dang /_dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang /_rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs nas lha'i 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni nam mkha' la rin po che'i char dang /_sgeg pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang /_pa Ta ha la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /_gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_mar me dang /_zhal zas kyi mchod pa ro brgya pa dang /_
[\[251b.2\]]btung ba'i mchod pas mchod de/_gzhan yang nang dang /_gsang ba dang /_gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 
[\[251b.3\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar kyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//[ {D412}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gar+b+hAr+tha tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[251b.4\]]pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po don gyi rgyud/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag_/snying po mchog ni bzhugs pa'i sku/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[251b.5\]]dpa' la gzigs te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku/_/sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/_/mtha' dang bral ba yin mod kyi/_/srid dang 'khor bar rab tu grags/_/de na rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/_/kye ho rang byung bcom ldan 
[\[251b.6\]]'das/_/nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus/_/gsung gi mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/_/skye med dbyings nas snang byed 'khrungs/_/'gro drug 'dren pa khyod kyis gsungs/_/nyid kyi zhal nas thigs pa shor/_/ke ke ru dang margad dang /_/spug dang rdo yi snying po dang /_/rin chen 
[\[251b.7\]]kha dog sna lnga pas/_/ye shes gzhal yas kha dog spras/_/nyid las mi gzhan 'jigs byed dang /_/rgyal sras dad pa gtam nyan dang /_/'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams so/_/de nas bcom ldan shAka thub kyi/_/gsung gi dgongs pa mkhyen nas ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]kyi/_/rab 'byung ye shes bsdu ba mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs kyis 'di skad du/_/ched du rjod pa rnam par mdzad/_/gang zhig rtsol med bde chen don/_/lhan cig skyes pa ma mthong na/_/sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang /_/byis pa don med ga chad du/_/rdzas bzung ba ni 'ching 
[\[252a.2\]]ba nyid/_/rten 'brel sgom pa gnyis pa'o/_/don med nyams myong 'dod pa yang /_/'ching ba'i rgyu ste gsum pa'o/_/kha cig e ri'i thal bas byugs/_/dbang phyug nam mkha'i rdzas rnams sdud/_/'ching ba'i rgyu ste bzhi pa'o/_/gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//mtha' dang 
[\[252a.3\]]bral ba'i rang bzhin la/_/gzung 'dzin nad kyis ci la 'ching /_/gdod nas dag pa'i nam mkha' la/_/bag chags mtshan mas ci la 'ching /_/skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid la/_/rgyu 'bras nad kyis ci la 'ching /_/bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes la/_/rtog dpyod nad kyis ci la 'ching /_/e 
[\[252a.4\]]ma'o rnam dag sems nyid klong /_/lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog_/'od gsal sna tshogs dus na bde/_/rnam dag 'khor lo bde ba la/_/bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis/_/srid rgyu nges pa'i rtsa bar 'khyams/_/gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs/_/zhen chags can gyi 
[\[252a.5\]]gdul bya la/_/bde ba chen po bcos ma sbyin/_/khong khro can gyi gdul bya la/_/g.yo ba rlung gi bcos ma sbyin/_/'dod pa chu bzhin gdungs pa la/_/bkri drang rang rgyud bcos ma sbyin/_/kun tu rmongs pa'i yid can la/_/stong pa snying rje bcos ma sbyin/_/ston pas de skad bka' stsal pas/_/
[\[252a.6\]]'khor rnams bsdu ba rnam mdzad de/_/de bzhin gshegs la 'di skad gsol/_/ye nas rnam par dag pas na/_/khams gsum 'khor ba ji ltar lags/_/glo bur pa zhig lag lags 'gyur na/_/thog mtha' yod par mi 'gyur ram/_/yang na rdo rje sems sogs pa/_/dmyal bar 'tshed 
[\[252a.7\]]par mi 'gyur ram/_/'khor ba bde ba grub pa na/_/sbyang btub bam ni ci zhig gu/_/de skad gsol nas mi snang gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_/nga la nyan pa khyed legs so/_/rtse gcig yid kyis dang bar byos/_/ma nges kha dog 'ja' tshon las/_/rigs 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]kyi khyad par tha dad snang /_/ldan la lha mi gcig pa'o/_/ma bsdus gcig tu rdzogs pa'o/_/smra ba'i seng ge 'jigs pa med/_/bka' yi dgongs pa shin tu zab/_/margad blo yis mching bu len/_/sna tshogs kha dog rigs su bsgyur/_/dper na swa sti ka bzhin no/_/ka ran da yi skye 
[\[252b.2\]]bzhin no/_/brtags shing brtags shing skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku/_/khyab bdag nam mkha'i sna tshogs gzugs/_/deng bdag sems dpa'i lus su 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i mgon pos de skad du/_/bshad nas 'khor rnams dengs gyur te/_/phyogs gcig tu ni 
[\[252b.3\]]'khod gyur nas/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/_/lta ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu/_/ma bcos ngo bo ji lta bu/_/ye shes spyod pa ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen pos/_/rnam pa drug gi mtshan nyid de/_/khyad par bdun dang 
[\[252b.4\]]mtshan pa'i dpe/_/bcu bzhi rnam pa ci rigs su/_/bcu gsum ma nor zhes su bshad/_/lhan cig skyes pa khyab gnas pa/_/mngon sum dbang gi ngo bor shar/_/sbyin pas bzlog nas bltas pa yis/_/nam mkha' las 'bab bde skyong nas/_/thur du 'khor lo drug rim du/_/a ta 
[\[252b.5\]]rak+ta bde ba len/_/ye shes zer zhing sdug bsngal skye/_/rmongs pas mya ngan sdig pa 'dzin/_/de mi spong ba'i 'ching bar 'gyur/_/sid+ha'i tshul du dge slong gnyis/_/dbang rdzogs zer zhing bde ba spyod/_/'chi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar song /_/rgyal po'i khab ni btsun mo can/_/tshom 
[\[252b.6\]]du sdud cing reg pa yis/_/ye shes gzhan la 'chad cing ston/_/'chi 'phos dur khrod sa ga yi/_/smad 'tshong ma yi srin bur skyes/_/'jig rten khams gzhan sems dmyal du/_/shin tu 'tshed cing 'bod par 'gyur/_/prik+Sha'i drung na a ko ta/_/bka' yi bsgo ba rnam par byed/_/
[\[252b.7\]]kha sbyor ba ni ye shes zhes/_/bzhin bzang ma la legs par dgod/_/tshe 'phos nas ni ngu 'bod skyes/_/'chad pa'i skyes bu de phyir nges/_/khyod kyis 'dri ba bstan par bya/_/sems kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa/_/mi rtogs lta ba mi dmigs shes/_/mig yo ngo bo mi 'da' dam/_/
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]de skad gsungs nas mi snang gyur/_/'dri ba'i rtog pa dang po chod/_/'chad pa'i skyes bus yang gsol pa/_/'gro ba'i bla ma gnyen gcig pu/_/dam phog pa ni ji ltar lags/_/dbang gi rang bzhin ji ltar lags/_/rtog pa gnyis pa dris pa las/_/lta ba'i 
[\[253a.2\]]le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi/_/gang la ming de skad bya yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/mtshon pa'i dpe ni 'di skad gsungs/_/nag po brtsegs pa pad pa ti/_/gri ta dang ni kang ka dang /_/phag dang glang po gzhon nu ma/_/
[\[253a.3\]]zla ba chu shel glang seng dang /_/o da chu bo gsum 'dres dang /_/gser dang nam mkha'i ri bo me/_/gsum pa bcu bzhir shes par gyis/_/de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste/_/de las gang zhig 'da' byed pa/_/dmyal bar yang dag 'tshed par bshad/_/e ma'o rang rig skal chen po/_/
[\[253a.4\]]nam mkha'i sprin la 'bud par byed/_/byis pa rang bzhin mi shes pas/_/bcos med rang bzhin spro bsdu byed/_/rnam dag 'od gsal sgrib pa med/_/ye shes rgya mtshor zhugs rmongs pas/_/kun tu 'ching ba'i mdud pa nyid/_/kun tu 'ching ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i 
[\[253a.5\]]mda' 'phangs kyang /_/bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis/_/gcig dang du mas sems bslad pas/_/rmongs pa nga rgyal spel bar byed/_/rlung gi rgyu ba dril ba'i lha/_/yig 'bru kha dog go bar byed/_/yid dang rlung ni rgyu ba na/_/snang ba 'gags pa ye shes so/_/de nyid log pas 'ching 
[\[253a.6\]]ba'i rgyu/_/tshangs pa yi ni tsaN+Da lI/_/sbar bas lha nyid 'od du zhu/_/ka sogs g.yas dang g.yon du a/_/yig mgo tshig dang gsos pa dang /_/stong phrag bdun cu'i rtsa lam nas/_/bab pa bde ba skyed par byed/_/don dam pa'o zhes su smra/_/rmongs pa bsdoms pas mdud pa grol/_/
[\[253a.7\]]zag pa skyes pas 'ching bar 'gyur/_/lhan cig skyes pas rigs pa yis/_/ci rigs pa ru gzhan la ston/_/grol bar 'gyur zhes nga mi smra/_/e ma'o blo ni gnyis su snang /_/ji ltar spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur/_/dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//gang la ming de skad 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/rtog pa gsum la gcad pa'i phyir/_/stan las langs te 'di skad gsol/_/nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus/_/sgom pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar lags/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpa' khyod 
[\[253b.2\]]la/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje rang byung sems/_/phyag rnams dag pa 'od gsal dbyings/_/phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/'gro ba'i bla ma ye shes gzugs/_/gsung gi thigs pa lhan cig skyes/_/rnam dag rang rig dbyings la 'dud/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[253b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_/kye ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon/_/mngon du gyur pa sgom pa'i mchog_/sna tshogs 'bar ba ye shes drod/_/ci yang mthong la med rtogs na/_/ma mthong gnas na mthong ba ru/_/mthong na 'gag cing bltas na skye/_/shes rab ye shes 'od po che/_/ci dgar bzhag 
[\[253b.4\]]na bde ba 'gog_/ye shes rgya mtsho ye gsal la/_/sangs rgyas sgom par mi mdzad do/_/de la gnyen po yod dam ci/_/rigs pas ston pa 'ching ba'i nad/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/_/bde ba de ni ston mdzad dam/_/rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyid kyis/_/bstan par nus sam 'on 
[\[253b.5\]]te ci/_/bsnyad du med pas brjod dang bral/_/bsgrub tu med pas dpe dang bral/_/mtshon du med pas tshig lam chad/_/lhan cig skyes pas bsgrub tu med/_/mngon du gyur pas bsgom du med/_/dpyad du med pas bcos dang bral/_/ma yengs blo yis rtogs pa'o/_/bsgom 
[\[253b.6\]]pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_/'chad pa'i skyes bu nyid kyang ni/_/brgyal nas sa la 'gyel gyur te/_/lha min rig sngags 'chang ba rnams/_/so sor byer te dengs par gyur/_/lha yi bu mo stong phrag ni/_/chos la rdul mig rnam par dag_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri yang /_/
[\[253b.7\]]de ma thag tu mngon sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten khams ni drug g.yos pas/_/'ur 'ur po dang chem chem gyis/_/khams gsum po ni 'dar bar byed/_/de yi mod la sems rdzogs pa/_/ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad gsol/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/_/rdzogs sangs 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]rgyas pa bde ba'i mchog_/skal ldan 'dul byed gnyen gcig pu/_/'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron/_/khyod kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis/_/ma rig sgo nga'i ling thog bsal/_/rnam dag ye shes khyod la 'dud/_/dga' mgu rangs nas gsol pa dang /_/
[\[254a.2\]]thams cad 'dud cing 'khod par byed/_/sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de skad bcom ldan shAkya thub/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te/_/bka' yi bsgo ba 'di skad mdzad/_/legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams/_/yang dag ye shes la zhugs 
[\[254a.3\]]pas/_/rnam rtog 'ching ba'i nad dang bral/_/mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la/_/bzlog pas bltas pa tha dad 'dzin/_/gnyug ma'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes/_/de yang bcings pas ci la mthong /_/gang gis de nyid mngon gyur pa/_/de la sdig pas ci la 'dzin/_/dus gsum 
[\[254a.4\]]'jig rten khams bzhugs pa/_/de la byin gyis rlob par mdzad/_/de la gal te gzugs yod na/_/dpag gam gzhal du btub bam ci/_/lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/_/de la ci rigs skyob par byed/_/gnod sbyin mthu chen thob pa yang /_/srung ba rgyun du byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[254a.5\]]grul bum srin po gdon rnams kyis/_/de yi bsam pa yongs su bsgrub/_/nad dang shu ba 'bras dang rims/_/de yi lus la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang /_/skad cig ma yis 'byang bar 'gyur/_/rgyun du zhugs dang lan cig 'ong /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[254a.6\]]sems dpa' yis/_/de yi gzi brjid 'phel bar byed/_/de bas sems dpa' chen po nyon/_/khyab pa'i 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog_/de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan/_/yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung /_/dam pa'i don la 'jal bar nus/_/don gyis chos nyid 'jal bar ston/_/
[\[254a.7\]]bla ma'i zhal nas dris na skye/_/rtogs na rnal 'byor skyes bu de/_/nam mkha'i rdul phran ston par 'gyur/_/ma rabs sgyu ma'i tshig la 'dzin/_/lhan cig skyes pa mthong ngam ci/_/gal te mthong na brtag par 'gyur/_/brtags na yengs te 'khyam par 'gyur/_/gnyis kyi blo la mya 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]ngan snang /_/kha dog gcig tu bsgyur ba yi/_/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo mchog_/rnal ma la gnas 'ching grol 'gyur/_/gang zhig bla ma'i drin shes dag_/skye ba med pa nyid du ston/_/bla ma'i bka' drin mi shes pa/_/de yis lhan skyes ci la mthong /_/lhan cig skyes pa de yis bcings/_/
[\[254b.2\]]de la 'gro ba skye zhing 'ching /_/tha dad gzengs pas nad du gyur/_/dus dang gnas su bgrangs pas ldog_/bdag dang gzhan du bltas pas ldog_/'di dang phyi mar bsnyad pas gol/_/skye med lhan skyes bcos pas 'ching /_/de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad/_/'chad pa'i skyes 
[\[254b.3\]]bus 'di skad bstod/_/e ma'o rnam dag ye shes sku/_/khyab bdag gsung gi lde mig sgo/_/ma rig sgrib pa dral ba'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa ye shes sku/_/e ma'o rnal 'byor thugs kyi bcud/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir las bsgral/_/ma skyes lhan cig 'gag med cing /_/byang 
[\[254b.4\]]chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/phan yon gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po'i don gyi rgyud rdzogs so//_//rje btsun gu ru'i zhal snga nas dang /_lots+tsha ba seng kar shAkya 'od kyis pham thing du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//_
[\[254b.5\]{D413}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI tsakra sa~M ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza ad+b+hu ta sh+mA sA na a la~M kA ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[254b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/_/de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang /_nang dang /_gsang ba dang /_de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad 
[\[254b.7\]]ces gsol to/_/kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/dpal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_/'khor lo zhes pa gang la bgyi/_/sdom pa nyid kyang ji lta bu/_/rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags/_/de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te/_/
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod/_/phyi nang gsang ba de nyid do/_/dang po phyi yi 'khor lo ni/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan lha yi sku/_/drug cu rtsa gnyis rim pa ste/_/ye shes dam tshig sku gsung thugs/_/dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rim pa bzhin/_/lugs 'byung lugs 
[\[255a.2\]]las bzlog pa ni/_/tha mal gcod pas phyi ru bshad/_/gnyis pa nang gi 'khor lo ni/_/gnas sogs sa bcu'i rim pa rnams/_/mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang /_/'khor lo sgo la dgod pa ni/_/phyi rol spros pa gcod pa'o/_/gsum pa gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni/_/sprul pa chos 
[\[255a.3\]]dang longs spyod dang /_/de bzhin bde ba chen po ste/_/rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/_/gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod/_/dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang /_/rnam par dga' ba'i gnyen po ni/_/bde ba stong pa mi rtog gsum/_/dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la/_/de kho na yi 
[\[255a.4\]]'khor lor brjod/_/sdom pa phyi nang gsang ba nyid/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs pa/_/gnyen pos ye shes ngang du sdom/_/bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang /_/tha mal pa yi rnam rtog kyang /_/dag pa lha yi 'khor lor sdom/_/gzod nas lus la 
[\[255a.5\]]grub pa yi/_/rtsa dang rlung dang byang sems dang /_/a ba d+hU tI'i nang du sdom/_/bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang /_/dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang /_/dbyer med gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom/_/rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te/_/gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang /_/'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yis/_/
[\[255a.6\]]rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste/_/dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la/_/gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das/_/rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi/_/'og ma'i yon tan ldan pa dang /_/nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang /_/gnyen po ye shes che ba dang /_/gzhan la khyab pas rgyal po yin/_/rdo rje snying pos 
[\[255a.7\]]yang gsol pa/_/dur khrod brgyad ni ji ltar lags/_/de yi dgongs pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis/_/dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur/_/dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni/_/rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam/_/yang na phyi rol grwa rnams su/_/
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni/_/gtum drag dang ni tshang tshing dang /_/'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang /_/'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi/_/phyogs su g.yon nas bskor te gnas/_/ha har rgod pa dbang ldan te/_/dpal gyi nags tshal byin zar ro/_/'jigs 
[\[255b.2\]]pa'i mun pa bden bral du/_/rlung mtshams ki li ki lir sgrogs/_/shar du ha ri ba s+ye la/_/gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong /_/byang du byang chub shing bu la/_/g+ha ra ser po mi yi gdong /_/nub du mya ngan med shing la/_/'bar 'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong /_/lho ru tsU ti'i 
[\[255b.3\]]shing bu la/_/'jigs sde nag po ma he'i gdong /_/me ru ka ran tsa na ste/_/dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdong dmar/_/bden bral a rdzu'i shing bu la/_/'jigs pa'i mun pa ma he'i gdong /_/rlung du srid grub shing bu la/_/ki li sgra sgrogs [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdong /_/dbang ldan n+ya gro d+ha shing la/_/
[\[255b.4\]]ha har rgod pa ba glang gdong /_/g.yas na gri gug thod pa g.yon/_/shing lo'i steng na stod phyung ngo /_/shar du brgya byin dkar po la/_/rdo rje sdigs mdzub glang po zhon/_/byang du lus ngan ser po la/_/dbyug pa 'dzin cing gter la zhon/_/nub tu chu bdag dmar po ni/_/chu srin zhon nas 
[\[255b.5\]]zhags pa thogs/_/lho ru gshin rje nag po la/_/ma he zhon nas be con thogs/_/shar lho me lha dmar ser la/_/ra la zhon nas me thab 'dzin/_/lho nub srin po smug nag la/_/ral gri thogs nas mi la zhon/_/nub byang rlung lha mdog sngon po/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhon nas 'phan ni 'phyar/_/
[\[255b.6\]]byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni/_/khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs/_/thams cad rang rang rig mas 'khyud/_/nor rgyas dang ni 'jog po dang /_/stobs kyis rgyu dang pad+ma dag_/shar nas brtsams te g.yon du dgod/_/pad+ma che dang mtha' yas dang /_/rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ni/_/
[\[255b.7\]]g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa'o/_/sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang /_/mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyil/_/shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod/_/'khrigs pa gang ba 'bab pa dang /_/drag po sprin tshogs mtshams la dgod/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang /_/las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]sna tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/ro la spyod cing mkha' la rgyu/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang /_/chu dang me sogs rim pa ste/_/gza' dang bar ta grub pa rnams/_/rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas/_/
[\[256a.2\]]'byung po'i gdon dang ro langs dang /_/stag dang khyi dang ce spyang dang /_/wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang /_/phyed tshig pa dang rnam par dbyangs/_/mgo bo lus po keng rus rnams/_/a la phaiM gyi sgra sgrogs pa/_/de nas nang gi dur khrod ni/_/lus kyi skra sen spu la sogs/_/skye zhing 'jig par byed 
[\[256a.3\]]pas na/_/dur khrod chen po lus la dgod/_/de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni/_/rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis nas/_/'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni/_/dbugs rgyu zhes pa dur khrod do/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang /_/dngos po'i rtog pa sna tshogs pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi dur 
[\[256a.4\]]du mchi/_/gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod/_/de nas dur khrod dgongs pa ni/_/rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la/_/phyogs skyong mi dge bcu po spong /_/sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing /_/thugs rje'i rtags su shing brgyad la/_/zhing skyong sngags kyi theg pa bsrung /_/gdug pa 'joms
