[\[256a.5\]]phyir klu brgyad dgod/_/mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas/_/rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed/_/chu ni brjod bya zab pa la/_/me sogs rtog pa bral ba'o/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/sku 
[\[256a.6\]]dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags/_/btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji lta bu/_/bzhugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud/_/lha yi bu dang phung po'i bdud/_/bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa la/_/ldan pa yon tan drug nyid de/_/
[\[256a.7\]]dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang /_/dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang /_/ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni/_/drug po de la ldan zhes gsungs/_/'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te/_/de dang bral phyir 'das pa'o/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gshegs/_/thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas/_/btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyings/_/de la yod phyir b+ha ga ste/_/mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi/_/de bzhin dpa' mo nyid 
[\[256b.2\]]kyang ci/_/de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste/_/bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/_/tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong /_/des na phyi yi dpa' bor bshad/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[256b.3\]]dbang dang 'brel ba yi/_/rtsa rlung thig le bsgoms pa yis/_/mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni/_/nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin/_/gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi/_/dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms/_/de ni gsang ba'i 
[\[256b.4\]]dpa' bo yin/_/bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'i yi/_/gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas/_/tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir/_/de kho na yi dpa' bor bshad/_/dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bzhi/_/ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la/_/lta ba'i zhen pa 
[\[256b.5\]]spong ba ni/_/de ni phyi yi dpa' mor bshad/_/nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs/_/rang bzhin med par byed pas ma/_/gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes bsam/_/rang rig sems kyis ngo bo ni/_/nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgom pa/_/de kho na yi dpa' 
[\[256b.6\]]mo'o/_/mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/phyi nang gsang ba de kho na/_/dang po phyi yi mchod pa ni/_/me tog bdug spos mar me dang /_/dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang /_/rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang /_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni/_/ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang /_/'khor 
[\[256b.7\]]lo rin chen glang po rta/_/btsun mo dmag dpon blon po rnams/_/phyi yi mchod pa thun mong ngo /_/rang gi lus las byung ba yi/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang /_/sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/_/phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/_/'khor lo rnams la mchod pa nang /_/de nas 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]gsang ba'i mchod pa ni/_/rang snang thabs kyi rig ma yis/_/skra gzung b+ha ga ku tsa btsir/_/rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs/_/dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang /_/lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba mchod/_/rang rig stong par rtogs pa yi/_/'od gsal de 
[\[257a.2\]]nyid chos sku la/_/zhen pa rnams dang bral ba ni/_/bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o/_/rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/_/gtor ma zhes pa gang la bgyi/_/de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/_/phyi nang gsang ba de 
[\[257a.3\]]kho na/_/dang po phyi yi gtor ma ni/_/thun mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du/_/ra~M las me dang ya~M las rlung /_/sgyed gsum a las dum gcig pa'i/_/nang du bdud rtsi sha lnga la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang /_/mkha' 'gro dgyes par byed 
[\[257a.4\]]pa'o/_/gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/_/lus ni lha yi 'khor lo la/_/rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/_/srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod/_/gsum pa gsang ba'i gtor ma ni/_/'khor lo bzhi yi ka phA lar/_/rlung dang thig le bdud rtsi 
[\[257a.5\]]la/_/dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te/_/lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya/_/de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni/_/phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi pad snod du/_/don dam sems kyi gsum sngags kyis/_/bde ba chen po'i ngang la mchod/_/phan yon dngos 
[\[257a.6\]]grub ster ba dang /_/phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang /_/zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang /_/khams dang skye mched rtas pa dang /_/rgas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing /_/skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang /_/dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang /_/'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o/_/lha mos gsol 
[\[257a.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das/_/sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/_/de las 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor/_/ma 'khrul don la ji ltar gzhag_/de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang /_/sems las ma gtogs chos 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]gzhan dag_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing /_/ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te/_/des na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sems kyi gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog_/khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa/_/snang pa myong zhing grub pa med/_/de phyir 'khor ba'i ming 
[\[257b.2\]]yang med/_/thog mar ma skyes rang bzhin dag_/glo bur sangs rgyas ming yang med/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin/_/kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin/_/rang bzhin rig pa 'od gsal sogs/_/smrar med brjod du med pa ste/_/dper na lkugs pas ro myong 'dra/_/ras 
[\[257b.3\]]dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la/_/log rtog rtsi sogs rnam par 'khrul/_/khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing /_/'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang /_/de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag_/de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste/_/rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching /_/rang gis 
[\[257b.4\]]gsod cing rang gis za/_/rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal/_/rang rig ye nas spros bral la/_/sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'khrul/_/rang rig ngang gis 'od gsal la/_/ma rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul/_/dngos po stong par ro mnyam la/_/blang dang dor bar byed na 'khrul/_/'dod 
[\[257b.5\]]yon ngang gis 'gag pa la/_/de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul/_/rang rig ye nas stong pa la/_/'dod yon lnga la brten na 'khrul/_/dman dang gya nom med pa la/_/sgro dang skur pa 'debs na 'khrul/_/gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la/_/sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul/_/sangs 
[\[257b.6\]]rgyas sems can gnyis med la/_/de dag gnyis su 'dzin na 'khrul/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la/_/bden pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul/_/sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal/_/skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul/_/stong nyid ro la mi gnas par/_/dngos po mtshan mar 
[\[257b.7\]]bzung na 'khrul/_/sems kyi glang chen mi 'dul bar/_/g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul/_/rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa la/_/rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul/_/rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar/_/che ba'i nga rgyal smra na 'khrul/_/rang rig nyams su ma myong bar/_/dkar 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]po'i chos rnams spong na 'khrul/_/sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul/_/rang bzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'khrul/_/sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul/_/sangs rgyas las 'khrul sems can de/_/rang rig las 'khrul gzhan rig snang /_/sems 
[\[258a.2\]]nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung /_/des na rang sems 'khrul pa dag_/don du snang ba rab tu skye/_/skye ba med bzhin skye bas 'khrul/_/lcags bsregs sa gzhi rang gi sems/_/me sogs byed pa gzhan na med/_/bkres skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems/_/zas skom bkres 
[\[258a.3\]]pa gzhan na med/_/brdeg btsog lcag bzhus rang gi sems/_/srog gcod shan pa gzhan na med/_/'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun/_/rang gi sems su ma shes na/_/de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin/_/bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten/_/theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta/_/
[\[258a.4\]]bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms na/_/ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa'i mchog_/de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la/_/stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med/_/de las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung /_/sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun/_/nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung /_/de dag sems kyi rang 
[\[258a.5\]]bzhin no/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du/_/rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis/_/gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas/_/gdol pa ko lpags mkhan 
[\[258a.6\]]la sogs/_/gzugs ngan gsod pa'i don gnyer ba/_/theg pa 'di las 'grub par 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa dang /_/gtso bo yab yum bsgom pa dang /_/dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa/_/bskyed rim spros dang bcas pa'i lam/_/rigs la gnas pa'i 
[\[258a.7\]]rnal 'byor gyis/_/lha sogs bu mo mtshan ldan la/_/chags pas chags pa spong ba ni/_/las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam/_/gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung /_/bkod pa byang sems dman pa dbyibs/_/zab pa sngags dang thig le dang /_/mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa/_/
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam/_/rten yod ma yin brten pa med/_/dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal te/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i don bsgom pa/_/phyag rgya chen por rang byin brlab/_/de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste/_/gang zag mchog dang las dang po/_/las dang po la phyi nang gnyis/_/
[\[258b.2\]]mchog la yang ni phyi nang gnyis/_/dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang /_/dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste/_/'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum/_/bshad rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_/yan lag rgyud 
[\[258b.3\]]ni grangs las 'das/_/rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang /_/phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin/_/bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs gdol pa gdul don du/_/rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/_/bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[258b.4\]]gnas gang du ni gtso bo bsgom/_/thabs ni rnam pa du zhig mchis/_/de bzhin thabs las byung ba ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ri rtse dur khrod ro steng du/_/gcer bu skra bshig lhor bltas te/_/A li kA lis lus bsrungs la/_/dpa' bo'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya/_/
[\[258b.5\]]smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la/_/grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam/_/lam gnyis la ni brten nas su/_/sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya/_/bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrud/_/gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud/_/gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste/_/de ni kun tu brtags pa la/_/
[\[258b.6\]]lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa/_/bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa bshad/_/gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni/_/'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang /_/ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la/_/nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i rim/_/rim gnyis mnyam par gnas 
[\[258b.7\]]nas su/_/rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do/_/stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la/_/mtshan dpe bde ba longs spyod sku/_/rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul sku la/_/sku gsum dbyer med bde chen ngang /_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang la bar 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]chad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/'khor bas skyo nas sdom gsum ldan/_/thos che dang ldan mtshan nyid bzang /_/dben par dkyil 'khor bris smra bcad/_/chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyad/_/thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub 
[\[259a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la/_/lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal 'byor la/_/bsgom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/le lo che ba'i rnal 'byor la/_/'bras 
[\[259a.3\]]bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi/_/bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi/_/'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rgyud 
[\[259a.4\]]rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus/_/yod pa rgyu la bsgrub pa lam/_/mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin/_/thog mar gsungs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/_/phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud/_/don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la/_/gsal bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud/_/bskal pa rdzogs ldan sum 
[\[259a.5\]]gnyis dang /_/rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa yis/_/rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/_/bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do/_/lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_/zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sba/_/ji lta bu la sbyin par bya/_/ster na lung nod ji ltar bya/_/bka' 'di rgya yis ji 
[\[259a.6\]]ltar gdab/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/snying rje med cing khro la gdug_/khengs shing chags pa tshul khrims med/_/dad med rigs ngan bla mas skyo/_/thos chung snying ring rnams la sba/_/dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan/_/bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/_/dad 
[\[259a.7\]]ldan rigs bzang gtong phod che/_/thos mang dam tshig ldan la sbyin/_/dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis/_/sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la/_/yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu la/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod/_/ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/lha mo rnams la rgyud 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]gtad ltar/_/de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams/_/zung la sgrub pa ched du gyis/_/lan gsum brjod la rgyud rnams sbyin/_/phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la/_/chags sems gyong ba'i slob ma ni/_/gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod/_/thos nas khungs sub rang che 'byin/_/de la 
[\[259b.2\]]bstan na dam tshig nyams/_/nges par dad nas zhu ba yi/_/gcig nas gnyis la ma spel na/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyun 'chad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_/ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis rgyud kyi don rtogs nas rjes su 
[\[259b.3\]]yi rang ngo /_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D414}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a nA bi la tan+t+ra 
[\[259b.4\]]rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya/_/snang ba med cing dpe med pa/_/tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das/_/zhi zhing bdag med dag 
[\[259b.5\]]pa nyid/_/mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs/_/ngang gi sangs rgyas 'di nyid tshul/_/mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs/_/khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas/_/bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin/_/rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas/_/snying rjes 'di ni 
[\[259b.6\]]bstan pa yin/_/kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang /_/kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang /_/kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni/_/blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed/_/de nyid nges par yang dag par/_/rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na/_/bsgom pa med 
[\[259b.7\]]cing byang chub med/_/rgyu yi yid ches spangs pa 'di/_/thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag_/sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba/_/rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed/_/kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du/_/kha cig zhi ba chen po che/_/kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs/_/kha cig 'dar zhing g.yo 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ba dang /_/glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang /_/lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid/_/kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgod/_/kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /_/dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang /_/'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus/_/de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog_/
[\[260a.2\]]sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags/_/gang tshe sems ni legs gnas pa/_/de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid/_/dkyil 'khor de bzhin 'gyur ba ni/_/phan 'dod rnams ni shes par bya/_/phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/_/gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa/_/lus ngag yid gsum bcos 
[\[260a.3\]]pa'i phyir/_/rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs/_/phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste/_/rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya/_/me long lta bu gcig nyid de/_/dang po grwar ni rtogs par 
[\[260a.4\]]bya/_/so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas/_/shar gyi grwar ni rnam par brgyan/_/bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa/_/byang gi grwar ni rnam par spros/_/mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni/_/bag chags med grwa rjes rtogs byed/_/gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/_/grwa yi dbus ni thams cad 
[\[260a.5\]]du/_/de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas/_/ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag_/sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni/_/de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba/_/de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni/_/sbyin pa bzhi ni rnam dag pa/_/dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs su ni/_/mi bskyod pa yis rnam par brgyan/_/
[\[260a.6\]]zhi dang chos don brgyan pa las/_/de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub/_/dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs/_/dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang /_/rta babs la sogs thams cad ni/_/ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid/_/sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste/_/de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs/_/
[\[260a.7\]]gang zhig sems kyi rab 'phel ba/_/ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas/_/de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs/_/dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste/_/dril bu do shal brtag pa ni/_/rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed/_/sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bur ni/_/chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs/_/chos 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir/_/de nyid rgyal mtshan phreng bar gsungs/_/bla re la sogs gang bres pa/_/dngos po la sogs dang por nges/_/sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad/_/dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o/_/gos phreng de dag thams cad ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid/_/
[\[260b.2\]]gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems/_/dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan/_/de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs/_/grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du/_/rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje rin po che yis spras/_/zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa/_/thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir/_/thabs 
[\[260b.3\]]dang shes rab bdag nyid sems/_/ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs/_/sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyir/_/rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med/_/bla ma slob ma rnams gsal bar/_/rab tu 'jug pa de nyid 
[\[260b.4\]]gsungs/_/sbyin sreg yang ni bshad pa yang /_/lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod/_/rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni/_/thab khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid/_/bye brag phyed pas me nang du/_/gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams/_/sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid/_/thams 
[\[260b.5\]]cad kyi ni sreg lugs bya/_/gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba/_/yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags/_/de ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas ni/_/rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya/_/sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni/_/gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa/_/de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod/_/
[\[260b.6\]]phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci/_/gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/de ni gsal bar brjod par bya/_/yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang /_/gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod/_/skye ba med cing snang med pa/_/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/_/gsang ba'i don ni rtogs 
[\[260b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_/'di ni nga yis sngags su gsungs/_/sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni/_/lha rnams yang ni brjod par bya/_/phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/_/rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang /_/yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid/_/de kun yang dag rab brtags shing /_/gal 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]te sems kyi nyer brtags gang /_/lha zhes bya bar yang dag bshad/_/sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las/_/de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs/_/lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni/_/gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya/_/de nas skyil krung bcas nas ni/_/sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang /_/rang gi 
[\[261a.2\]]rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis/_/de nyid mthong ba gzhag par bya/_/snying ga'i gnas su lag pa gnyis/_/'bad pas mnyam par sbyar nas su/_/mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du/_/gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag_/de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus 
[\[261a.3\]]pa'i bdag_/myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag_/thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/_/rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur/_/nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa/_/sangs 
[\[261a.4\]]rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don/_/thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don/_/sems can don du snying rje che/_/sangs rgyas byang chur rab sgrub pa/_/sna rtse'i dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs/_/de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du/_/mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so/_/res 'ga' dam tshig 'khor 
[\[261a.5\]]lo yang /_/de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so/_/rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni/_/gang 'grub de ni res 'ga' yang /_/gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin/_/rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas/_/sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya/_/khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/_/bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid/_/dam tshig 
[\[261a.6\]]zhes bya rab 'bad par/_/gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa/_/de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs/_/de rnams tha snyad tsam gyis gnas/_/gang tshe dam tshig 'dod chags sems/_/des ni de nyid rab tu spyod/_/gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa/_/de ni sems can yod ma yin/_/de la kun tu 
[\[261a.7\]]rtog pa yi/_/khrag ni za bar 'gyur ba'o/_/khrag ni chen po zos nas ni/_/'od dpag med pa'ang bza' bar bya/_/gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa/_/khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrag par bya/_/de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir/_/bza' bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid/_/dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid/_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sha chen du ni rab tu dbye/_/mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod/_/gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems/_/nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las/_/phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis/_/de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod/_/chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems/_/sbas pa'i char ni 
[\[261b.2\]]gnas pa 'di/_/chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'o/_/bshang ba za bar yang dag brjod/_/dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad/_/'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang 
[\[261b.3\]]ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D415}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[261b.4\]]shrI sa~M ba ra kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang 
[\[261b.5\]]gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/_gsang ba chen po de bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje snying 
[\[261b.6\]]po khyod nyon cig_/srog dang lnga pa de bzhin du/_/lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin no/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste/_/sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[261b.7\]]'das lnga pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/_/lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smin pa dang ni grol ba'o/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_smin 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa'i lam ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bum pa gsang ba shes rab dang /_/bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste/_/de yi rnam pa de la gnas/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das grol ba'i lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[262a.2\]]pa/_/snying rje chen po las skyes pa/_/dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog_/bde ba chen po lam yin no/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni gang /_dga' ba ni gang /_thabs ni gang /_shes rab ni gang /_gnyis su med pa 
[\[262a.3\]]ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog_/dga' ba gnyis med bde ba che/_/thabs ni he ru ka dpal nyid/_/shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/_/gnyis su med pa zung 'jug mchog_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das he ru ka ni gang lags/_
[\[262a.4\]]rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/he ru ka ni phung po nyid/_/phung po yang ni he ru ka_/khams ni rdo rje ma dpal te/_/rdo rje ma dpal khams nyid do/_/skye mched de yang de bzhin du/_/lha yi ngo bor shes par bya/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phung 
[\[262a.5\]]po'i he ru ka gang lags/_khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dngos/_/dri ma med pa'i kha dog can/_/rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste/_/drug gis brgyan cing dgu dang ldan/_/zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rje dang /_/rigs kyi bdag pos 
[\[262a.6\]]rnam par brgyan/_/spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste/_/chags pa med pa'i sham thabs can/_/shes rab rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma/_/ban+du dmar po'i kha dog can/_/gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan cing /_/dag pa lnga bcu'i phreng bas mdzes/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i snod bsnams pa/_/yab la 'khyud cing 
[\[262a.7\]]brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/gnyis med bde ba la dgyes pa/_/chu skyes nyi ma'i dbus na 'gying /_/khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do/_/dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang po'o//_//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]gyis rnam par dag pa ni gang lags/_ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/brtan dang g.yo ba thams cad kun/_/shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de/_/lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal nyid/_/ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku/_/brjod du med cing bsam mi 
[\[262b.2\]]khyab/_/rtog pa med pa nam mkha'i dbus/_/gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can/_/gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med/_/gnyis su med pa bde ba'i mchog_/'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o/_/dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/_rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis 
[\[262b.3\]]pa'o//_//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa rnam par dag pa ni gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang /_/dbang gi rnam par dag pa dang /_/maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du/_/bum pa'i ngo bo lhar shes pa/_/
[\[262b.4\]]sngags kyi de bzhin gnas pa'o/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang /_sbyin sreg ni gang /_gtor ma ni gang /_dbang ni gang /_maN+Dal ni gang /_bum pa ni gang /_sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngags ni gsang 
[\[262b.5\]]sngags rgyal po ste/_o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT/_DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra swA hA/_o~M hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+N+Na nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis/_/bskal pa stong la sogs pa yi/_/sdig pa ma lus dag 
[\[262b.6\]]byed chu/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes/_/a shwat+Tha dang n+ya grong /_/dUr ba la sogs de bzhin du/_/bzhi pa'i ngo bor yang dag shes/_/sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga/_/gyen du phaiM gyi sgra bsgrags pas/_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes/_/dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid do/_/bdud 
[\[262b.7\]]rtsi chu yis legs byugs nas/_/me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o/_/rin chen snod [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bru~M gyis mdzes/_/dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu/_/zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis/_/gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing /_/spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_/kye bcom ldan 'das skye mched 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]kyi mkha' 'gro ma gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gcer bu thal ba'i mdog can te/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim/_/lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang /_gtor ma ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_o~M dz+wa la mu khi DA ki nI ka~M ka ni hU~M phaT/_o~M pa ri nA ya ni DA ki nI hU~M phaT/_o~M ma Di ra DA ki nI hU~M phaT/_o~M pa ra mu khi DA ki nI hU~M phaT/_o~M u lu ka ti DA ki nI hU~M phaT/_o~M a ra Na ma Ni DA ki nI hU~M phaT/_chu skyes dag gis rnam brgyan cing /_/bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes/_/dpa' mo drug ni 
[\[263a.3\]]mnyes par 'gyur/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i lam ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste/_/de yi rnam pa de la gnas/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang /_sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/_bcom 
[\[263a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rnam pa'i ngo bo lha nyid de/_/sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag por bshad/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi bdag po ni gang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dbang gi kha dog dmar po ste/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/sprul pa 'khor 
[\[263a.5\]]lo'i rtsibs la gnas/_/brkyang bskum tshul gyis mnan pa'o/_/rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de/_/o~M ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/_nag po 'bru yi ril bu la/_/bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar 
[\[263a.6\]]gnas pa/_/sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya/_/dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/_las sna tshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang /_byang chub 
[\[263a.7\]]sems dpa' rdo rje gnod gnas la sogs pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na badzras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]{D416}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI badzra ma hA kA la kro d+ha nA tha ra ha s+ya sid+d+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i/_/ye shes mngon par mkhyen 
[\[263b.2\]]pa yis/_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa/_/bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/_
[\[263b.3\]]kun mkhyen bde gshegs bzhugs gyur pa/_/mya ngan 'da' bar mi mdzad cing /_/de srid mtshungs med sems can don/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba kun/_/srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par/_/byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis/_/rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[263b.4\]]khams kyi mtha' thug par/_/smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing /_/snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni/_/dpa' bos srid pa sbyong bar mdzad/_/sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin/_/'di ni rgyud rnams kun du yang /_/kla klo'i skad kyis sbas pa ste/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa po/_/
[\[263b.5\]]rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i/_/rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che/_/myur du dngos grub ster byed pa/_/'phral du yang dag yid ches byed/_/bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis/_/mi rnams sems dang mthun par 'jug_/de dang de yi gzugs sprul te/_/sna tshogs g.yogs te bde bar 
[\[263b.6\]]bzhugs/_/de phyir 'bad pa du ma yis/_/sna tshogs tshul gyis mthun par bya/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can/_/rang gi lha yi rab sbyor bas/_/bdag nyid ye shes mchog 'grub 'gyur/_/'di yis rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang /_/dkyil 'khor ba dang zhing skyong 
[\[263b.7\]]tshogs/_/gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas/_/mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug mgon po che/_/sku gsung thugs dang phrin las tshogs/_/ye shes yon tan rigs kyi lha/_/nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/_/lha mo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas dus kun du/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]ting 'dzin gyis/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che/_/bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis/_/ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab/_/tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid 
[\[264a.2\]]med/_/khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/_/'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin/_/brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/_/'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste/_/mthong ba dang ni thos la sogs/_/thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'char/_/gang gis skye bo 'ching gyur pa/_/de nyid yongs shes rnam par grol/_/phyag rgya'i 
[\[264a.3\]]sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/sa gsum bde ba chen por bsgyur/_/nyon mongs med na ye shes med/_/nyan rang byang chub lam las ring /_/phung po khams dang skye mched dang /_/'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams/_/thams cad gdod nas dag pa yi/_/ye shes chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/dngos 
[\[264a.4\]]bo du ma gsal bar snang /_/ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rab bskul/_/de bas bla med rgyud 'di ru/_/'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/_/gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med/_/dang po bla ma'i dam tshig dag_/thob pas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang 
[\[264a.5\]]bzhin te/_/brtan pa dag ni longs spyod yin/_/nges par brtan pa mya ngan 'da'/_/rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig gnas/_/brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang /_/dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ster/_/bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_/rgyal ba byang chub sems dpar bcas/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[264a.6\]]bdag po bla na med/_/sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang /_/yang dag bla ma bsten par bya/_/'dir ni byang chub sems kyis ni/_/bsnyen pa nye bar bsnyen pa dang /_/bsgrub pa bsgrub pa chen po yi/_/khyad par rim pa rtags dang dus/_/las la sbyar ba shes par bya/_/ji srid las kyi sbyor ba 
[\[264a.7\]]yis/_/mgon po 'khor bcas mnyes gyur na/_/las dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa/_/myur du 'grub par the tshom med/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsung rmi lam lta bur nye bar gsan te/_gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig gis/_/sgyu ma brag cha'i sgra brnyan ltar/_/yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu/_/dngos 
[\[264b.2\]]grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub/_/bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni/_/byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa/_/kun gyi snying pos gyur pa ni/_/gsang ba zhing skyong mgon po che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mgon po 'dis/_/bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang /_rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang du rdo rje'i theg pa che/_/gsang ba bsdus pa'i yang dag lam/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i/_/snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa/_/snyigs ma lnga 
[\[264b.4\]]ldan dus nyid du/_/'dren pa ye shes bstan pa bsrung /_/'di nyid gsang ba'i sgrub pa gang /_/rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/_shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa/_/ting 'dzin gang du sgom gyur pa/_/
[\[264b.5\]]bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste/_/rgol ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad/_/thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la/_/'dzin dang skyong dang srung ba gsum/_/lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad/_/sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan par/_/gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya/_/zhes 
[\[264b.6\]]bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang byung bla na med pa'i rdo rje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po 
[\[264b.7\]]mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ston par mdzad do/_/rdo rje gzhi la gnas pa'i cha/_/gter gyi bum pa kha 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]khyer ldan/_/dus kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba/_/chu 'dzin phyogs tsam phyed ldan nyid/_/sgra dang sgra las khyab pa ste/_/du ma ma yin gnas pa'i yul/_/dam tshig gsang ba 'byung ba las/_/rgyal ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso/_/phyogs dus med par rang byung ba/_/chos 'byung 
[\[265a.2\]]pho brang dkyil 'khor du/_/rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni/_/nam mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa/_/phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis grub/_/mi phyed lhan cig skyes pa rgyal/_/pho brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/dkyil 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug pa/_/ge sar pad+ma'i dbus su ni/_/kun 
[\[265a.3\]]nas zlum por 'khor ba ni/_/tshad med phreng bas brgyan pa ni/_/bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan/_/ri rab lhun po mchog byung ba'i/_/de nyid kun nas yongs bskor ba'i/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te/_/shin tu mnyam zhing mtshungs par 'khor/_/de nyid rim pa yongs su brtan/_/bye brag mtshungs 
[\[265a.4\]]med dmar chen mtsho/_/rim pas chu gter 'o ma'i gnas/_/'byung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi/_/phung po rus pa'i ri bo la/_/phyi nang mnyam pa'i tshang can gyi/_/lhun gyis grub par bstan pa yin/_/de las dngos po sna tshogs kyis/_/tha dad snang ba ye shes gzugs/_/rang byung bde ba chen po 
[\[265a.5\]]nyid/_/mnyam pa med pa kun tu 'byung /_/dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i gdan/_/rdo rje skyil krung mi phyed las/_/thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/_/'dod chags rdo rje'i skur ldan pa/_/lho phyogs bya rkang ri dang 
[\[265a.6\]]ni/_/dpal gyi ril mdun phyogs pa/_/d+hA na ka Ta par pa ta/_/pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa'i dbus/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par gnas/_/dpal ldan dga' ba'i khang pa brtsegs/_/gsang ba sngags kyi rgya mtsho yi/_/ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul/_/gsang ba chos kyi dbyings chen 
[\[265a.7\]]bo/_/dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor du/_/kla klo'i yul gyi mi rnams dang /_/lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/_/gsang chen yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/rang byung ye shes pho brang du/_/tshangs dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag_/dkyil 'khor sgo bzhor bcug nas kyang /_/skye bo chags can 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]rab 'dul phyir/_/mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po gsung /_/phyogs bcur gnas kyi sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang /_/dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/khrag khrig ri rab rdul mnyam pa/_/de dbus seng ge'i khrir bzhugs 
[\[265b.2\]]pa'i/_/thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/_/rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te/_/pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs/_/thal mo sbyar te 'di don zhus/_/gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya che/_/
[\[265b.3\]]mi 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam/_/dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste/_/spyod yul bstan pa'i khyad par gyi/_/grub dang sgrub pa phrin las tshogs/_/thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste/_/rim pa mngon byed rgyur ldan pa/_/de nyid bcom ldan gsung du gsol/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[265b.4\]]ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/_bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa la/_/dga' zhing mgu la rab dang ba'i/_/sems dpa' chen pos gsang ba'i don/_/rab tu zhus pa legs so legs/_/shin tu rmad du byung ba yi/_/gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du/_/byang chub sems kyi ye 
[\[265b.5\]]shes mdzod/_/khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/_/de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi/_/grub pa rab tu ster byed pa/_/rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste/_/gsang ba las kyi rim pa nyid/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/bstan pa bsrung zhing bka' la gnas/_/dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhing 
[\[265b.6\]]skyong la/_/mgon pos bcu'i dbang phyug gtso/_/dpal ldan rig 'dzin thams cad la/_/mchog tu gyur pa'i las sgrub pa/_/dpal ldan nag po chen po ni/_/'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi/_/g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yin/_/lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas/_/mchod 'os gtso 
[\[265b.7\]]bor gyur ba yin/_/dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang /_/nag mo re ma tir gyur pas/_/lcam dral gyur pas bstan pa bsrung /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba/_/phyi nang de nyid kho na'i don/_/yon tan phrin las dbang phyug tu/_/dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gtso bo ste/_/
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gzhan yangs gsum dbang byed pa'o/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba spyi la dgongs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/_/'di nyid bla med sgrub pa po/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi/_/sems can duH
[\[266a.2\]]kha gzigs nas ni/_/ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba/_/de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad/_/dus ni bskal pa bzang po yi/_/rdzogs ldan tha mar gyur pa yi/_/dpag med dus las 'das nas ni/_/gnyis ldan dang ni gsum ldan las/_/rtsod pa'i dus kyi rim pa la/_/bcom ldan tshe lo brgya ba'i 
[\[266a.3\]]dus/_/de nyid bstan pa'i snyigs ma yi/_/lnga brgya pa yi dus kyi mthar/_/shin tu gdug cing rtsub pa yi/_/mi srun pa yi dus kyi tshe/_/de tshe mgon po'i bstan pa 'byung /_/gang zag la yang gnyis su bshad/_/bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang /_/sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrub po ste/_/dang po 
[\[266a.4\]]bstan pa 'jig byed cing /_/dkon mchog gsum po smod pa dang /_/bla ma la sdang bdag la smod/_/de dag la sogs bya bar bshad/_/sgrub pa po ni rnam pa gsum/_/he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma/_/dag cing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gsal/_/rim pa go 'phang thob pa ste/_/thun mong spyi 
[\[266a.5\]]dang bye brag tu/_/dam tshig gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin/_/gnas kyi khyad par 'byung ba yang /_/bsnyen pa'i dus dang bsgrub pa dang /_/las la sbyar ba'i dus shes pas/_/yid 'ong dben dang dur khrod sogs/_/bsam gtan 'phel dang khyad par ro/_/yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du/_/
[\[266a.6\]]mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang /_/reg pa dang ni dran pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor pa yi snang ba dang /_/ma lus dngos po gang shar ba/_/bde ba can du shes par bya/_/bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang /_/gsang ba 'bras bu lam byed pa/_/rdo rje theg pa 'di 
[\[266a.7\]]nyid de/_/bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum/_/'di ni khyad par bsrung ba yin/_/grub pa bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang /_/nye bar bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang /_/dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che/_/rnam dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa/_/bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa/_/rnam dag stobs 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ni rgyas par byed/_/bsnyen pa'i dus su rang lha yi/_/he ru kar ni gnas pa yi/_/mdun du bka' sdod dam tshig gi/_/mgon po phyag bzhi bsgom par bya/_/de nas thugs ka'i rang sngags las/_/'od 'phros 'khor ba'i bzlas pa las/_/khyad par du ni sgra bcas dang /_/shin tu dal bar 
[\[266b.2\]]bzlas pa bya/_/nye bar bsnyen pa'i dus su ni/_/bdag nyid he ru ka las ni/_/hU~M phyung mdun du 'od 'phros pas/_/bskyed cing mthar ni nye bar bsdu/_/sgrub pa'i dus su mgon po yi/_/rgyas 'debs spyi bor he ru ka/_/de nyid gsang sngags phyogs bcas pa/_/de nyid sems dpa' sum 
[\[266b.3\]]brtsegs bsam/_/gsang ba zhing skyong rgyal po che/_/cho ga gsum gyis sgrub pa'i tshul/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bdag_/thams cad bde chen gnas pa la/_/dus gsum 'khor lo gsum du gnas/_/brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob par 'gyur/_/sgrub pa chen po bla na med/_/ye 
[\[266b.4\]]shes mgon po chen po nyid/_/khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad/_/rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor/_/dkyil 'khor pho brang dbus su yang /_/dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/_/'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba/_/dam tshig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste/_/rab tu 
[\[266b.5\]]'bad de gsang bar bya'o/_/phrin las khyad par gang yin pa/_/las la sbyor ba rim shes bya/_/rengs par byed dang skrod pa dang /_/rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug_/rnam par rmongs dang lkugs par byed/_/dug gis 'dzin dang 'on long dang /_/rang sha rang gis za byed cing /_/gshis 
[\[266b.6\]]dan dug dang khrag tu skyug_/'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa/_/las kyi khyad par yongs su bstan/_/char dbab pa dang sprin dral dang /_/thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang /_/rang phyogs su ni bzlog cing bsrung /_/byad ka bzlog dang ngag bcing dang /_/nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang /_/phran 
[\[266b.7\]]tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o/_/thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste/_/rten gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/_/dang por bla ma mnyes par bya/_/gnyis par dbang bzhi thob pa dang /_/gsum par byin gyis brlabs nas ni/_/bka' bsgo'i rjes gnang tshul bzhin du/_/ma nor 'jug pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]shes/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rten tshul khyad par shes par bya/_/stobs ni chos rnams thams cad la/_/sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang /_/yang dag bden pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'byung /_/'jug pa thun mong ma yin pa/_/byams pa snying rje byang chub sems/_/tshad med bzhi 
[\[267a.2\]]dang ldan pa yis/_/'gro ba'i don la sems pa po/_/mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste/_/dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste/_/dang po bar dang tha mar yang /_/gtso bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi/_/gang grub rab 'bring tha ma ru/_/rtags kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin/_/rgyu ni thogs pa med pa yi/_/rten 
[\[267a.3\]]cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/_/mngon sum du ni 'byung ba la/_/gang gis dgag par mi nus pa/_/de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung /_/gang du thogs med rdo rje yi/_/snying po zad pa med pa'i don/_/yang dag ye shes snang ba po/_/bla ma'i drin las thob 
[\[267a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas dbang ldan bdud 'joms pa'i/_/sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad/_/gsang ba'i mgon po chen po yi/_/sbas pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi/_/
[\[267a.5\]]gsang ba mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang /_/lhan cig tu ni dgyes par rol/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ba/_/gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni/_/zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/_/mi thung khros pa ut+pal mdog_/mgo skyes gyen 'greng rngam pa'i sku/_/ro yi gdan la bzhugs 
[\[267a.6\]]mdzad cing /_/klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/_/khros pas char sprin nag po ltar/_/me stag phung po lta bu yi/_/spyan gsum drag po'i lta bas gzigs/_/glang po'i tshul can stobs ldan pa/_/rgyu ma'i do shal dbyangs pa yi/_/mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas bklubs/_/shin tu mi srun sgeg 
[\[267a.7\]]pa'i sku/_/bdud 'dul chen po lha yi lha/_/nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum tshogs/_/ma rig mun sel sgeg pa'i nyams/_/rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa dpa' bo ste/_/gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'jigs par ston/_/log lta spong byed gtsigs pa'i 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]nyams/_/gdug pa tshar gcod snying rjes khros/_/ngo mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing /_/khro chags mi g.yo zhi ba'i thugs/_/g.yas kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams/_/g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag 'dzin/_/g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'debs/_/g.yon pas kha T+wA~M 'dzin par 
[\[267b.2\]]mdzad/_/gsung gis ha ha zhes sgrogs pa/_/log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad/_/stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar bcas/_/rang byung rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas/_/de yi mdun du gtum pa mo/_/lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/mun 
[\[267b.3\]]pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma/_/phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can/_/gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad/_/yab la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan/_/yum la lnga yis rgyas btab gnas/_/sku dang gnyis med 'khril bar bzhugs/_/me 'od phreng bas yongs su bskor/_/ye shes 
[\[267b.4\]]rgya mtsho'i 'khor srungs ma/_/shar phyogs mkha' 'gro 'phrog ma dang /_/lho phyogs glang sna ma zhes bya/_/nub kyi srin mo ral pa can/_/byang dus yi gtsug yin no/_/gang du rgya mtsho chu ngogs dang /_/nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku/_/ma rungs 'joms byed nag po che/_/'bad pas snying rje 
[\[267b.5\]]bskyed pa nyid/_/gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid/_/snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/_/de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya/_/mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'khrug byed pa/_/zhe sdang rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/re zhig tsam du gsad par bya/_/gzas pa'i shal rtag tu 
[\[267b.6\]]rol/_/kun tu gtum pa'i shugs 'chang ba/_/yul dang yul du rol byed pas/_/shing rnams la ni gnas nas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor zhing rnams skyong bar byed/_/dur khrod gnas kyis yongs su bskor/_/ma mo'i gnas sogs khyab par byed/_/klu yis mchod pa'i zhing skyong ba/_/
[\[267b.7\]]me yi phye mas yongs su bskor/_/sgo dang mig gis khyad par 'gyur/_/gtso bo'i sngags kyis lus can te/_/sgrub pa po yi lus la gnas/_/de dag rim par dus bstan pa/_/dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/_/sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams khyad par las/_/'bru nag gtor ma rab 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]tu shis/_/sha chen gyis ni brgyan pa yi/_/tshogs rdzas pU dza gus pas dbul/_/phyi nang gsang ba khyad par las/_/bstan pa'i tshul gyis phrin las las/_/bye brag rgyun dang gnas skabs pa/_/grub dang sgrub pas mngon du 'gyur/_/dus rnams kun tu zhe sdang 
[\[268a.2\]]gis/_/rnam pa kun tu gzhom mi bya/_/yul min pa la gsad bya na/_/rnal 'byor dam tshig las nyams phyir/_/grub pa nam yang yod mi srid/_/khyad par ye shes bla med pa/_/dam tshig mgon po sgrub pa yi/_/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad/_/
[\[268a.3\]]byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di/_/yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas/_/yar ngo yis ni skyed byed la/_/mar ngo la ni 'grib par byed/_/yar ngo yi ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/byang chub sems kyi mkha' 'gro yang /_/bde ba chen por 'du bar mdzad/_/'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs/_/dkyil 'khor lha 
[\[268a.4\]]nyid lus nyid yin/_/gzhan du lha dang dkyil 'khor ni/_/btsal yang rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes/_/'dren pa dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la/_/drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa/_/yon tan phrin las dbang phyug gi/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i bdag po yin/_/
[\[268a.5\]]ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las/_/'khor lo dgug bya gnyis med bstim/_/dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang /_/gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te/_/'khrul dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa/_/khams gsum kun la dbang byed pas/_/'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi/_/mgon po'i 
[\[268a.6\]]khyad par mngon du 'byung /_/gdags pa tha snyad khyab pa po/_/thun mong bar ni bstan pa yin/_/'di dag las dang skye bo las/_/sgrib pa thun mong lha yi cha/_/dngos dang brgyud pas lung bstan pa/_/srog dang srog ma yin pa ste/_/rgyu dang rkyen dang bskul ba yis/_/gsang sngags 
[\[268a.7\]]bzlas pa mngon par phye/_/'di ni mngon du 'byung ba'o/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi/_/gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che/_/'di 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]yi sgrub rim bshad par bya/_/gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mchog ste/_/skal ba can la sbyin par bya/_/gang du sgrub pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mi mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas/_/de nas nag po bsgrub par bya/_/'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas/_/tshad med byang chub sems kyi blos/_/
[\[268b.2\]]snying rje chen po bskyed byas nas/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/lhor bltas skra grol gcer bu yis/_/dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni/_/rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying ga ru/_/a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/bsil zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam/_/de'i steng ra~M las nyi 
[\[268b.3\]]dkyil 'khor/_/rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang /_/me yi rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam/_/de dbus yi ge hU~M nag po/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/_/de yi 'od kyis snang ba las/_/dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam/_/rang bzhin gnas su 'phros pa las/_/bla ma dang ni 
[\[268b.4\]]lhag pa'i lha/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas pa dang /_/nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/_/mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la/_/skyabs su 'gro dang mchod pa dbul/_/sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/_/bzod par gsol nas gshegs su gsol/_/de rjes dngos po 
[\[268b.5\]]thams cad kun/_/ma lus stong pa nyid gzhug cing /_/o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/_o~M badzra shud+d+hAHsarba d+har+m+mAHbadzra shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/_o~M yo ga shud+d+hAH_sarba d+har+m+mA\u0f85yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/_zhes brjod par bya'o/_/phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun/_/gdod nas dag pa'i ngang du 
[\[268b.6\]]bsam/_/de nyid hU~M dang bcas pa yang /_/nA da tsam du gnas pa las/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab par bya/_/de las sa bon 'di dag ni/_/'chad bzhin pa las rim pas bsam/_/ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /_/ra~M las me yi 
[\[268b.7\]]dkyil 'khor dang /_kha~M dkar chu yi dkyil 'khor te/_/la~M las gser gyis gzhi nyid/_/de steng bru~M las ri rab 'byung /_/de dag phyi nang ngo bo nyid/_/de dag steng gi cha la yang /_/dbus su pa~M las pad+ma ni/_/sna tshogs pad+ma rgya che ba/_/lte ba ge sar bcas dbus su/_/ha 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]las sna tshogs rdo rje ni/_/kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam/_/de dbus ra~M las nyi ma yi/_/hU~M yig sa bon las byung ba/_/sa gzhi ma lus rdo rjer gyur/_/steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang /_/ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni/_/phur bu gri gug kha T+wA~M ga/_/rdo rje 
[\[269a.2\]]rtse gcig pa dang ni/_/rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar/_/dum rnam par 'phros nas ni/_/shin tu rgya che bsam par bya/_/bla re ra ba sogs dang ni/_/gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcing bya/_/me 'od 'bar ba khyab par 'gyur/_/'di dag bsrung ba'i khyad par ro/_/bru~M las byung ba'i 
[\[269a.3\]]'khor lo ni/_/rtsibs bcu pa ni yongs su 'khor/_/de steng ra~M las nyi dkyil 'khor/_/de yi dbus su hU~M mdzad do/_/zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/_/rin chen klu dbang rgyan dang ldan/_/rol pas rnam par sgeg par bsam/_/ra~M las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus/_/de steng hU~M 
[\[269a.4\]]bcu rnam par bsam/_/de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu/_/zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam/_/khro bo de dag re re zhing /_/phyogs skyong bcu bo gdan la ni/_/bkug nas gnyis med bzhugs par bsam/_/de las gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis/_/phur bus gdab dang brdung par 
[\[269a.5\]]bya/_/nges ni bla med mchog dag 'gyur/_/khro bo de dag re re zhing /_/brtan par bya phyir gsang sngags brjod/_/o~M dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa/_/'od ldan de las spros bsdus pas/_/bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab/_/'od du zhu nas gzhal yas khang /_/rin chen sna 
[\[269a.6\]]tshogs las grub pa/_/gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas/_/rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi/_/'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o/_/pho brang nang ma zlum po la/_/re mig dgu pa rdo rjes bskor/_/phyi ni pad+ma mu khyud bcas/_/de yi nang na e yi dbyibs/_/drag po'i gnas su bsam par bya/_/dbus 
[\[269a.7\]]ma'i nang du ba~M las ni/_/pad+ma nyi zlar bcas pa bsam/_/A li kA li 'dus pa las/_/de las nam mkha'i sa bon te/_/nam mkha' las ni hU~M byung ste/_/gnyis med zhugs las 'od du zhu/_/de la rdo rje gri gug bsam/_/'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las/_/skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]nag po chen po bsam par bya/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/dpa' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs/_/yab yum gnyis su med par bsam/_/de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyed nas/_/mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab bya ste/_/sngags brjod pas ni dgyes pa bskyed/_/
[\[269b.2\]]de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams/_/yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa las/_/yum gyi mkha' dbyings bde chen du/_/so sor cho gas bskyed byas la/_/phyi rol du ni rim gyis 'byung /_/dang por gtso bo'i rgyan dang bcas/_/rdzogs par phyung ste d+hU tI nas/_/gyen du thugs 
[\[269b.3\]]ka'i pad+ma las/_/'thon te 'gro ba'i don byas la/_/slar 'dus rang la thim gyur pa/_/dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs su gnas/_/de las rim pa ji bzhin du/_/phyung nas so so'i gdan la bzhugs/_/gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro bzhi/_/zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/_/
[\[269b.4\]]gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni/_/g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam par 'gying /_/dpa' mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o/_/mtshams bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang /_/sna tshogs pad 'dab la gnas pa/_/nyi ma la gnas mgon po ni/_/shar du sku yi mgon po dang /_/lho ru yon tan 
[\[269b.5\]]mgon po dang /_/nub tu gsung gi mgon po dang /_/byang du las kyi mgon po ste/_/thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_/gri gug thod pa bsnams pa'o/_/so so'i g.yon du yum re re/_/gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang /_/zlog byed ma dang dpa' mo ste/_/zhal gcig phyag 
[\[269b.6\]]gnyis rgyan dang bcas/_/de yi phyi yi gru chad la/_/bde 'dzin pa dang kha T+wA~M ga_/gaN+DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o/_/de yi phyi rol sgo dang grwar/_/lha mo brgyad po gar gyis rol/_/thams cad zhal gcig 
[\[269b.7\]]phyag gnyis pa/_/gar stabs ldan pas bzhugs pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa dang /_/de nas gtso bo yab yum dag_/snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu/_/de nas lha mo bzhi yis ni/_/rdo rje tshad med dbyangs kyis bskul/_/e pa~M si ta u Da na nI bA/_dza tid+ha mad+ha 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]ma/_g+ha ma g+ha ma a~M ka ma/_d+ha d+ha sha ri d+ha ra~M/_/sa ni sa sa sa ni ga ma sa sa sa/_/rig mo bum te sa ri sa ra sa ri ri sa ni sha/_/ma hA ma a d+ha ma sa sa/_/shru tra ni sA sa sA/_/sa ni sa ri ta g+ham a~M g+ha~M/_/a ta ma ta ya/_/sa sA pa pa/_/ma ya a ba sa d+hai na a i/_
[\[270a.2\]]de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las/_/de ltar nye bar gsan nas ni/_/thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de/_/nag po gsang ba'i bu dang bcas/_/shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku/_/bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas/_/spro ba dang ni bsdu bar mdzad/_/de nyid brtan dang 
[\[270a.3\]]mnyes par mdzad/_/sku gsung thugs ni rgyas gdab cing /_/ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang /_/byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang /_/sngags kyis bsten phyed bzlas pa bya/_/bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul/_/ting 'dzin don bsam nyer bsdu bya/_/de nas ldang 
[\[270a.4\]]bar gyur pa na/_/gnyis pa lha rnams thams cad kun/_/skad cig gis ni rdzogs bya ste/_/de yi ngang la ting nge 'dzin/_/gsang ba khyad par rdzogs par bya/_/rnam rtog bag chags kyis bcings la/_/rtog pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan/_/rnam rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na/_/
[\[270a.5\]]de nyid thob tu med pa ste/_/bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung /_/chags pa med pas kun du spyad/_/'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor ba/_/rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang /_/de nyid shes la bcing med de/_/rnam par rol ba'i tshul mchog go/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos 
[\[270a.6\]]grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gang du sngags kyi yi ge dang /_/bzang po'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di/_/rdza rnga bcings pa las shes bya/_/re mig bdun pa'i grangs 
[\[270a.7\]]kyis ni/_/kun nas mnyam par dgod par bya/_/mkhas pas dbyangs dang gsal byed ni/_/sde tshan rim pas phye ba nyid/_/kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/rim pa bzhin du btu bar bya/_/sde tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni/_/ha yi 'og nas gnas pa blang /_/usma yi 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]bzhi pa nyid/_/wa 'og gnas pa de nyid de/_/sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po ste/_/pa yi steng na gnas pa blang /_/an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste/_/ya yi steng ma yang dag blang /_/sde tshan brgyad pa'i bzhi pa ni/_/ma yi steng na gnas pa sbyar/_/sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa nyid/_/nya 
[\[270b.2\]]yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar/_/sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste/_/Da yi 'og na gnas par sbyar/_/sde tshan dang po'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_/d+ha yi steng na gnas pa yi/_/zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya/_/sde tshan dang po'i bcu bzhi pa/_/de yi 'og ma'i yi ge la/_/dbyangs kyi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yin te/_/d+ha yi 
[\[270b.3\]]'og mas brgyan par bya/_/de nyid thog mar sbyin bya yin/_/sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa nyid/_/na yi 'og na gnas pa ste/_/bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang /_/ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas te/_/thog mar 'byung ba'i drug po ste/_/'di ni yid bzhin nor bu ster/_/tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang /_/
[\[270b.4\]]b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blang /_/Ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya/_/ha yi 'og na gnas pa dang /_/wa yi 'og ma gzung bar bya/_/pa yi steng ma nyid btu bya/_/ya yi steng na gnas pa las/_/nya yi steng mas las kun byed/_/ma yi steng gnas yi ge nyid/_/ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas la/_/
[\[270b.5\]]nyis 'gyur D+ha yi steng mas brgyan/_/tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/_/i yi steng ma drung du bzhag_/'di ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/_/nga yi steng ma'i yi ge la/_/d+ha yi steng mas yang dag brgyan/_/rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas/_/ma lus ye shes skur gyur pa'o/_/
[\[270b.6\]]Sha yi 'og na gnas pa la/_/b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge dang /_/Na yi 'og nas rab sbyin dang /_/pa yi thog ma yang dag blang /_/tha 'og Da 'og stan du sbyar/_/tsas par gnas yi ge dang /_/dz+hA yi steng ma bdag po ste/_/sa yi bar na gnas pa bzung /_/kha dang a yi bar gnas 
[\[270b.7\]]pa/_/ta yi 'og ma nya steng ldan/_/ma yi steng gnas r-irA~M 'og sbyar/_/thig les brgyan pa nyis 'gyur sbyar/_/tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/_/a yi steng mas brgyan pa drung /_/'di ni sbas pa'i snying po ste/_/rang srog yi ger gsang ba'o/_/da yi steng ma'i yi ge la/_/d+ha yi steng 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]mas brgyan par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/_/snying po bzlas pa'i rig pa ste/_/bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar/_/na yi steng mas yang dag brgyan/_/dza yi gong ma d+ha steng sbyar/_/sa la bar gnas Da steng sbyar/_/thig le nA das brgyan par 
[\[271a.2\]]bya/_/na 'og d+ha steng mgo bor sbyin/_/'di las ma steng ri 'og ldan/_/thig le zla tshes dag gis mtshan/_/tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/_/ra yi 'og ma drung du sbyin/_/b+ha steng gnas pa la 'og sbyar/_/nya yi 'og ma yang dag ldan/_/sha sa bar gnas nya 'og sbyar/_/'di ni 
[\[271a.3\]]gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste/_/bya ba stobs ldan nyid yin no/_/gang du mngon par phyogs pa yi/_/dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/_/gsang sngags mchog tu gyur pa 'dis/_/stong dang brgya ba bcur 'gyur gyis/_/rigs ni dam pa'i sa la gnas/_/thob pa yul dang yul du gnas/_/pha 
[\[271a.4\]]yi 'og ma dang por blang /_/ha yi 'og ma blang byas la/_/tha yi steng ma sbyin par bya/_/Da yi steng ma'i drung nyid du/_/sha yi thog mas brten par bya/_/pha yi steng ma btu bar bya/_/la yi steng ma'i yi ge la/_/Da yi steng mas stan du sbyar/_/nya yi steng ma nyis 'gyur la/_/phyi ma nya yi 'og 
[\[271a.5\]]mas brgyan/_/e yi 'og gyur bsdus pa la/_/sha yi steng ma drung du sbyar/_/la yi 'og ma rgyan du byas/_/nya yi 'og gis sbyin par bya/_/o yi 'og na gnas pa la/_/nya yi 'og mas brgyan par bya/_/da yi 'og mar gnas pa la/_/thig le nA da dag gis brgyan/_/da yi 'og 
[\[271a.6\]]ma'i yi ge la/_/u yi steng ma sbyin par bya/_/tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang /_/b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blangs/_/ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya/_/d+ha yi 'og ma gnas pa dang /_/wa yi 'og ma gzung bar bya/_/sa yi steng ma nyid bsdus bya/_/ya yi steng na gnas pa las/_/nya yi 
[\[271a.7\]]'og mas de la brgyan/_/nya yi 'og ma kun gyi rten/_/sa yi steng ma blang bar bya/_/b+ha yi steng na gnas pa la/_/la yi 'og mas brgyan par bya/_/pha yi steng ma nyid de blang /_/dz+nya yi 'og ma nga steng dang /_/ba yi steng na gnas pa la/_/u yi steng ma yang dag blang /_/e yi 'og 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gnas yi ge la/_/d+ha yi steng ma mgo bor sbyin/_/la tha bar gnas pa la yang /_/Na yi steng mas brgyan par bya/_/ma steng thig le nA das brgyan/_/dz+ha 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la/_/da steng sa yi steng ma dang /_/pha 'og ta yi 'og mas brgyan/_/dz+ha yi gong na gnas pa 
[\[271b.2\]]dang /_/ma yi steng ma sa steng gnas/_/ya yi steng ma nyid dang ldan/_/dz+ha 'og nya yi steng ma la/_/d+ha yi steng mas mgo bor brgyan/_/Da yi 'og ma sha steng ldan/_/thig le nA das brgyan pa'o/_/Da yi steng mas tsha nyid du/_/sha yi thog mas brten par bya/_/pha yi 
[\[271b.3\]]steng ma btu bar bya/_/la steng gnas pa Ta steng sbyar/_/nya yi steng du nyis 'gyur bas/_/phyi ma'i nya yi 'og mas brgyan/_/dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can/_/sa steng gnas pa nyid dang yang /_/u steng gnas pa yang dag bcas/_/sa steng gnas pa thig les 
[\[271b.4\]]brgyan/_/nya yi steng ma'i gnas pa la/_/ai yi 'og gnas ga mdun gnas/_/ta yi 'og ma mgo bor sbyin/_/nga steng gnas pa Na 'og sbyar/_/la steng gnas pa Ta 'og bcas/_/la 'og zur gnas sbyar bar bya/_/b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge la/_/ma steng gnas pa 
[\[271b.5\]]stan du byas/_/sha'i 'og dza yi steng mar sbyar/_/Na 'og gnas pa nyid drung ste/_/b+ha steng gnas pa'i 'og mas brgyan/_/sha steng drung du sbyin par bya/_/la steng sha yi thog ma la/_/phyi ma nya 'og gnas pas mdzes/_/Ta 'og sha thog thig les brgyan/_/sha thog r-i 
[\[271b.6\]]yi 'og mas brgyan/_/ba thog la steng gnas pa sbyar/_/de la nya 'og sbyin par bya/_/b+ha steng gnas pa la 'og ldan/_/nya 'og dag gis yang dag mdzes/_/ka ga bar gnas pa nyid la/_/nyis 'gyur du ni bsdu bar bya/_/g+ha steng gnas pa de nyid la/_/nya 'og brgyan pa nyid du 
[\[271b.7\]]bya/_/ma yi thog ma Da 'og bcas/_/g+ha steng gnas pa nyid dang ni/_/wa 'og gnas pa Tha 'og sbyin/_/ha 'og Na yi 'og mar ldan/_/de yi nyis 'gyur shes par bya/_/kha 'og ma yi ge la/_/u r-i bar gnas sbyar bar bya/_/ma steng pha 'og 'og tu sbyin/_/de ni nyis 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'gyur sbyar bar bya/_/tsha yi steng ma pha thog drung /_/Sha yi thog ma drung du gnas/_/de ni zung du sbyar bar bya/_/ma steng gnas pa sa thog drung /_/nyis 'gyur rim par shes par bya/_/sha thog gnas pa wa thog drung /_/lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/_/ka 'og 
[\[272a.2\]]gnas pa pha stan pa/_/ba 'og stan du byas pa nyid/_/nyis 'gyur dag tu shes par bya/_/b+ha steng gnas pa Ta steng drung /_/Sha yi 'og ma stan du byas/_/sha'i steng Da yi 'og mas brgyan/_/d+ha 'og i thog stan du sbyar/_/pha yi steng ma drung du bzhag_/ha yi 'og ma Na 'og ldan/_/
[\[272a.3\]]pha thog drag por 'gyur ba'o/_/sha steng tha yi 'og mas brgyan/_/'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'i/_/mA ra ya yi thog mar sbyar/_/ma yi steng gnas ri 'og sbyar/_/nyis 'gyur thig le nA das brgyan/_/tsa yi steng na gnas pa la/_/i yi steng ma brgyan pa drung /_/b+ha thog tha 
[\[272a.4\]]thog gnas pa sbyar/_/de la nya yi 'og mas brgyan/_/ma steng gnas pa nya 'og ni/_/yang dag stan du bya ba'o/_/'di ni dri med bde ba'i gter/_/snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid ni/_/gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su/_/nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas/_/ma lus zhing skyong 'khor 
[\[272a.5\]]dang bcas/_/dur khrod ro la ce sbyang dang /_/sha za'i tshogs rnams 'du ba bzhin/_/nges par 'du bar byed pa ste/_/bstan pa rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o/_/dpag tshad brgyad khri'i bar du ni/_/de yi bgegs rnams ma lus pa/_/til 'bru tsam du byed par mdzad/_/snying po 'di ni zlos byed 
[\[272a.6\]]cing /_/gang du nyi ma gcig tu yang /_/ma chad mngon par sems pa yi/_/he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor la/_/'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang /_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod la/_/thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi/_/
[\[272a.7\]]bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya/_/mtshan ma byung nas bla ma yi/_/man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/yang dag ye shes bskyed pa po/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/_/gtum po de yi gsang ba'i yum/_/lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa yi/_/gsang sngags btu ba bshad par bya/_/dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dag la/_/thig le nA das rnam par brgyan/_/rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa 
[\[272b.2\]]dang /_/mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang /_/bdun pa yi ni dang po nyid/_/an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste/_/dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin/_/lnga pa'i lnga pa gsum pas brgyan/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/_/an+ta s+tha yi gsum pas brten/_/dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan/_/
[\[272b.3\]]drug pa yi ni dang po dang /_/dbyangs kyi dgu pas gnas der sbyar/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang por dang /_/an+ta s+tha yi gsum pa dang /_/de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni dang po la/_/dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng 'og sbyin/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pa mgo bor sbyin/_/
[\[272b.4\]]gsum pa yi ni dang po la/_/drung du lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyar/_/lnga pa'i bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/_/dang po'i dang po'i drung du ni/_/gnyis pa'i gsum pa sbyar ba dang /_/mthar gnas las kyang phyi ma yi/_/de la dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan/_/an+ta s+tha yi dang po la/_/dbyangs yig bcu 
[\[272b.5\]]gcig pa yis brgya/_/brgyad pa yi ni bzhi pa la/_/dbyangs yig drug pa dag gis brgyan/_/thig le nA das mdzes pa'o/_/drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid/_/bzhi pa yi ni thog ma sbyar/_/'di ni gsang ba'i gtum pa mo/_/drag cing shin tu cher 'jigs byed/_/yid bzhin nor 
[\[272b.6\]]bu'i rigs 'dzin gter/_/bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar/_/mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/_/dbyangs yig bdun pa steng 'og sbyar/_/thig le nA das mdzes pa yin/_/usma Sha yi bzhi pa la/_/dbyangs yig drug pa dang sbyar ba/_/an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/_/de nyid thig 
[\[272b.7\]]les mdzes par byas/_/gnyis pa'i dang po blang byas la/_/dbyangs kyi dgu pa blang ba nyid/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/usma Sha yi bzhi pa dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/dbyangs yig bcu ba sbyar bar bya/_/bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]lnga pa'i dang po btu par bya/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/dbyangs yig [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yis brgyan/_/gnyis pa'i lnga par gnas pa'o/_/mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang /_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/phyi ma'i yang ni bzhi pa la/_/
[\[273a.2\]]lnga yi yang lnga pa la/_/dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan par bya_/dang po yi ni dang po dang /_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan par bya/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang /_/mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/_/an+ta s+tha yi dang po sbyar/_/mthar gnas pa 
[\[273a.3\]]yi gsum pa dang /_/bdun pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/drug pa yi ni bzhi pa sbyar/_/lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/dbyangs kyi dgu pa'i yi ge la/_/lnga pa'i gsum pa gdags par bya/_/usma Sha yi gsum pa la/_/lnga pa'i dang po sbyar bar bya/_/thig le nA das yang dag brgyan/_/
[\[273a.4\]]drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/an+tas+tha yi dang po ste/_/yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis/_/nyis 'gyur dag tu sbyar bar bya/_/usma Sha yi bzhi pa la/_/dang po'i drug pa dang sbyar ba/_/an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/_/thig le nA das brgyan par bya/_/'di ni gsang ba'i yum dag 
[\[273a.5\]]gis/_/snying po sbas pa mchog gyur pa/_/lha mo nag mo ye shes che/_/sngags ni drag cing sdud pa'o/_/de nas ye shes lnga ldan pa'i/_/rig byed mngon sum dang por bzhag_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang /_/mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po nyid/_/
[\[273a.6\]]an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste/_/dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin/_/dang po'i bcu drug pa mtha' bya/_/mthar ni hU~M phaT sbyar bar bya/_/sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po la/_/an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar/_/dang po'i dgu pa blang ba nyid/_/drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/thig le nA das brgyan pa'o/_/
[\[273a.7\]]gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/_/drung du de nyid lnga pa sbyar/_/gnyis pa'i dang po de nyid dang /_/dbyangs kyi dgu pa sbyar bar bya/_/mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/_/bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar/_/de la thig le nA das brgyan/_/gnyis pa yi ni dang po la/_/an+tas+thi yi gsum pa dang /_/
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar/_/lnga pa'i dang po nyid la yang /_/dbyangs kyi bdun pa steng 'og sbyar/_/bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la/_/thig le nA das mdzes byas pa'o/_/'di dag kun gyi thog ma dang /_/tha mar yang dag brten par bya/_/'di ni DA ki bzhi dag gi/_/snying po sbas pa mchog 
[\[273b.2\]]tu gsungs/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/gsang ba sngags kyi 'khor lo las/_/mthar ni hU~M phaT sbyar bar bya/_/lha yi 'khor lo rgya mtsho 
[\[273b.3\]]nyid/_/lan tshwa chu rgyun 'bab pa'i ngang /_/gangs kyi thigs pa bdud rtsi'i chu/_/me tog mdangs gsal snying po yi/_/ge sar ze 'brur ldan pa la/_/'dab rgyas ye shes nyi shar bas/_/rang grol mdangs 'bar rab tu rgyas/_/rdo rje rin chen ral gri dang /_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs 
[\[273b.4\]]dag las/_/'khor ba'i rgyun las 'od zer 'phro/_/steng 'og dag las rim pa ni/_/'khrug cing gcod pa'i gri gug gis/_/las dang phrin las rang byung du/_/byed cing bskul ba'i las grub pa/_/phyi nang gsang ba rim bzhin du/_/dbab dang sngags pa zlog pa ste/_/rtsa ba 
[\[273b.5\]]yan lag las bzhir 'gyur/_/dang po thun mong dgu pa ste/_/gnyis pa bye brag phye ba dang /_/bskyed pa'i ye shes mi zlog pa/_/[{]klungs su [,]klung du [}]chud pa phyag rgya che/_/snying po gcig la dus gsum du/_/'gyur med de nyid dbye ba nyid/_/gcig las du ma'i ngo bo can/_/'jig rten 
[\[273b.6\]]pa dang ye shes che/_/mi 'gyur ba dang 'gugs pa dang /_/las rnams byed pa'i srog gyur pa/_/gsang sngags 'khor lo 'di dag ni/_/bye brag rnal 'byor pas shes bya/_/o~M ma hA kA la hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra ma hA kA la hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra ka'u wa ma hA kA lA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_
[\[273b.7\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M shrI ma hA kA lA ya/_shA sa na~M u pa hA rI NA~M/_e ShA pash+tsi/_ma kA laHa ya~M/_i da~M rat+na tra yA ya/_a pa kA ri NA~M/_ya di pra ti dz+nyA/_sma ra si ta dA/_e da~M duSh+Ta sa twa/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_ma ra ma ra/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ba tsa pa tsa/_sar+b+ba duSh+TA~M/_di na me ke na mAr ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ma hA kA li ni kro d+ha sa ki la rak+Shi NI tsaN+Da ak+Shi NI tsa N+Da k+ShI ye hU~M phaT/_o~M hrIHhU~M kA li ma hA kA li rak+ta mA~M se na/_b+hak+Sha Ni a mu ka s+ya/_sar+b+ba laM stoM p+ta ya hU~M phaT/_o~M AHma~M hra~M ra~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M ka rA li ma~M hU~M phaT/_o~M 
[\[274a.2\]]kang kA la~M hrIHhU~M phaT/_oM kA la ra tri ra~M hU~M phaT/_de las dngos dang nyams su yang /_/nag po chen po'i zhal ston dang /_/tha ma rmi lam lung ston pa/_/mi nag bong thung gsus 'phyang dang /_/bya nag khwa ta la sogs 'ong /_/de yang rab 'bring tha ma yi/_/bye brag rtags su 'char 
[\[274a.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/grangs ni bdun 'bum dag dang ni/_/mngon sum gsal ba'i nges pa 'char/_/khri phrag bdun dang khri phrag dgu/_/stong phrag bdun gyis nye bar 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab bcas pa yi/_/sngags kyi stong phrag bcu dag ni/_/dus ni zla drug zhag bdun bar/_/rnal 
[\[274a.4\]]'byor smra ba bcad de bzlas/_/mi tshig bar ma chod pa yi/_/gsang sngags phrin las nges par 'grub/_/thun mtshams mchod dang gtor ma dang /_/bstod dang bcol bskul las la 'bad/_/rang nyid he ru kar gsal ba/_/ri rab steng du yum bcas bsam/_/de mdun nag 
[\[274a.5\]]po chen po nyid/_/gsal ba bskyed tshul dbye ba yis/_/rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs pa ni/_/mngon sum lta bur blta bar bya/_/bdag dang mdun gyi mgon po yi/_/thugs ka'i sa bon rang sngags las/_/de ltar spro bsdus ting 'dzin bsam/_/de ltar dus dang gzhan du yang /_/
[\[274a.6\]]rten bcas dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang /_/rten btsugs brtan byed de nyid bsnyen/_/de nas rten bcas tsam gyis ni/_/nges par de yi mdun song ba/_/mchod dang gtor ma bsham par bya/_/sha chen bsreg spos phul nas ni/_/dmigs pa gtod par byed pa dang /_/gang 
[\[274a.7\]]la bya ba'i bsgrub bya de/_/dmigs pas bkug cing bstab pa dang /_/gtor mar dbul zhing bka' bsgo bya/_/lha dang bral zhing nyes pa bsgo/_/de nas ma nyes nyes pa bsgrag_/dpang btsugs las la bcol bskul bya/_/de yis nges par 'grub par 'gyur/_/de las khyad par 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]phrin las ni/_/lha sbyin dang ni mchod sbyin sogs/_/bsgral ba'i zhing de gang yin pa/_/de yi zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang /_/phung shul sa dang g.yul sprad sa/_/grog mkhar sa la sogs pa rnams/_/bsdud chad sa la bong bu'i chus/_/sprus te ling ga sta gon bya/_/de nas dben 
[\[274b.2\]]par song nas ni/_/mar ngo yi ni tshes brgyad dam/_/bcu bzhi la sogs sgrub dus la/_/gza' skar shin tu drag po la/_/de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya/_/rgyu ni ro ras shing shun dang /_/zhing lpags dag la dug sna dang /_/khrag dang dug gi me tog gi/_/du ba mtshan ngan thod chags 
[\[274b.3\]]la/_/mchog phur bstod pa'i snag tshas bri/_/rgya skyegs dag gis bsres la bri/_/tshad dang ldan pa'i mu khyud ni/_/rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa la/_/nang du ling tshe dgu pa bya/_/phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga por ni/_/gru gsum nag po sa bon bcas/_/las rnams byed pa rlung yig dang /_/
[\[274b.4\]]ma hA kA la 'bru bzhi dang /_/steng non o~M dang badzra ste/_/de yi phyi rim rtsibs brgyad la/_/a mu ka~M dang ba yi ni/_/yi ge bcu gsum gnyis gnyis pa/_/g.yas skor dag tu dgod par bya/_/de yi phyi rim pad 'dab brgyad/_/sgo mtshams lha mo'i 'khor lo'i sngags/_/ming spel 
[\[274b.5\]]bcas pa dgod par bya/_/de yi nang gi gru chad bzhir/_/hU~M gnyis phaT dang bcas pa la/_/ming spel bcug la bri bar bya/_/khyad par sbas pa'i 'khor lo ni/_/dbus su rlung gi sa bon nyid/_/phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro ma bzhi gnas/_/phyogs bzhir sngags kyi phreng ba las/_/
[\[274b.6\]]phyi rol rtsibs la gcod pa'i sngags/_/'dab brgyad cha la tsaN+Di ka/_/mtha' rten snga ma dag dang mtshungs/_/yang na rim pa gsum pa yi/_/gsang sngags ma hA kA la yi/_/phrin las khyad par dgod par bya/_/'dis ni shin tu mngon spyod myur/_/thabs dang shes rab khyad par dang /_/
[\[274b.7\]]steng 'og bar gyi dbye ba yis/_/zangs dang lcags kyi gri gug gis/_/bla dang tshe srog don snying la/_/myur du 'khor bas gcod par byed/_/sdud byed 'phrog cing len pa'i srog_/bsgral ba rdo rje rigs kyi las/_/thun mong du ni bya ba yin/_/khyad par 'khor lo dril bya ste/_/dus kyi rim 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]pas las la sbyar/_/'di ni kun du mnan pa ste/_/las kyi gshin rje'i gnas su gtad/_/'khor lo la yang bsnyen pa dang /_/bsgrub pa [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]nor mi bya/_/'dis ni bya ba mi 'grub med/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags 
[\[275a.2\]]dang 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te/_/mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya/_/khyad par dur khrod pa yi shing /_/lha 'dre gtum po gnas pa las/_/ma 
[\[275a.3\]]mo'i bya brag brtags pa las/_/bcad pa mgo mjug ma nor bar/_/gnyis gshags de nas sngags bris la/_/bsdams te zla ba mig gis ni/_/phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa la/_/legs par gzhag ste tshad du bya/_/dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la gzugs/_/gzhan yang 
[\[275a.4\]]bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag ni/_/zur gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas/_/ming spel bskul tshig ldan pa ni/_/grangs ni rab 'bring tha ma ste/_/ci rigs par ni bya bar gsungs/_/yang na ro sgrom shing la yang /_/byang bu byas la ling+ga bri/_/gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi/_/'khor lo 
[\[275a.5\]]legs par bris pa dang /_/bsgrub bya srog gi 'khor lo ni/_/gri gug lnga pa 'khor ba dag_/de dag par du bcug pa dang /_/yang na mgon po'i 'khor lo dang /_/bsgrub bya du yod ling+ga rnams/_/de yi nang du dril bar bya/_/'khor lo tshon skud rnam lngas dkri/_/de yi phyi rol ku sha yi/_/
[\[275a.6\]]rtswa yis mi gzugs byas nas kyang /_/rang mdun gru gsum nag po yi/_/nang du gzugs de gzhug par bya/_/de la lha dang dbye ba dang /_/nyes pa bsgo zhing bsgrag par bya/_/de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni/_/mdun du nag po chen po ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/
[\[275a.7\]]yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang /_/spyan drangs mchod cing bstim par bya/_/las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi/_/rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/_/lha srin sde brgyad ma lus dang /_/gzhan yang dur khrod sha za dang /_/ma mo ro langs ce spyang dang /_/stag dang dred dang bya gcan 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]sogs/_/bya rog khwa ta la sogs pas/_/yongs su bskor cing phrin las byed/_/de nas rang dang mgon po dang /_/lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi/_/sa bon las ni 'od zer yang /_/lcags kyu lta bu dpag med pas/_/bsgrub bya de dag ma lus pa/_/snying gi srog rtsa nas drangs 
[\[275b.2\]]te/_/rang dbang med par rlung gis bteg_/myur du 'ongs pa mdog nyams pa/_/rid cing skra 'dzings shin tu 'dar/_/yed yed sdang zhing skrag pa de/_/zhags pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang /_/dril bu la sogs sgra yis ni/_/shin tu dbang po myos gyur te/_/de yi rnam 
[\[275b.3\]]par shes pa ni/_/ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs la bstim/_/de yi dus su gsang sngags ni/_/phrin las sngags [{]rings [,]ring [}]mtha' ru ni/_/A kar+Sha ya dzaHzhes brjod/_/mgon po nag po yab yum gyi/_/lte bar gru gsum lcags khang ni/_/btson dong mun khang gnas pa bsam/_/
[\[275b.4\]]de las thar dus med par bya/_/de nas dong de ro g.yam la/_/rdo rje rgya gram bris pas mnan/_/mtha' mar las sbyor dus su yang /_/bsgrub bya'i them pa'am lam dag tu/_/mnan pa byas la phrin las bcol/_/gal te de nyid sbyin sreg gis/_/las sbyor bsgrub bya'i chu rjes sogs/_/
[\[275b.5\]]dri ma gos dang skra sogs dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang dug sna dang /_/khrag dang skye tshe shang tshe dang /_/da d+hu ra dang de la sogs/_/sa sna gzhan dang sbyar bar bya/_/bong bu'i chu dang bsres nas ni/_/'jim pa byas la g.yog par bya/_/dug chu ro sol dag gis ni/_/de la byug cing 
[\[275b.6\]]gnas lnga ru/_/seng ldeng lcags phur btab la gzhag_/de yi lus po thams cad la/_/spra tshil gyis ni byug par bya/_/de la drag po'i shing gi ni/_/tsher ma sna tshogs btsugs la gzhag/_/gru gsum a yi nang du ni/_/de gzugs phyi gan dag tu gzhag_/kha nang dur khrod 
[\[275b.7\]]thal bas brdzang /_/de nas dong kha bcad la gzhag_/de la thun bzhir bya ba'am/_/dus drug dag tu bya ba ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis lhor bltas la/_/nyin phyed mtshan phyed dus su bya/_/yang na dus bzhir las la sbyar/_/phyogs kyi DA ki bzhi yis ni/_/dgug gzhug 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bstim dang bsngags par bya/_/de nas thod pa mtshan ngan du/_/yungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i/_/thun rdzas rnams la sngags bzlas shing /_/dus dus dag tu brdeg par bya/_/skabs skabs dug gi chu yis brdeg_/gal te gu gul nag po dang /_/
[\[276a.2\]]sha chen dag gis bdug par bya/_/yang na 'bras phub me la ni/_/spra tshil ma zhu tsam du bsro/_/de nas sngags kyis brdeg par bya/_/'dis ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/de ltar cho ga'i thabs 'di yis/_/dgra yi khang par bya rog dag_/mang po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang /_/lus 
[\[276a.3\]]la tsha bas thebs la sogs/_/du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dang por nang rtags gsal bar 'char/_/phyi rtags rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag po'i mngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//
[\[276a.4\]]de nas gdug pa 'dul don du/_/nag po chen po khros pa yi/_/bsgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa/_/gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya/_/rje btsun he ru ka dpal dang /_/nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams/_/nam mkhar mngon par bltas nas ni/_/bdun po yongs su dag par bya/_/
