[\[276a.5\]]bzod par gsol la gshegs su gsol/_/de rjes stong ba'i ngang las ni/_/tshad med bzhi po bsam par bya/_/byang chub sems kyi ngang las ni/_/pad+ma zla nyir gnas pa yi/_/hU~M yig nag po bsam par bya/_/de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las/_/bsdus shing skad cig yongs gyur 
[\[276a.6\]]pa/_/dpal ldan nag po chen po ni/_/zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/_/phyag gnyis sku mdog shin tu nag_/dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes/_g.yas pa gshin rje'i lce 'dra ba'i/_/gri gug rnon po 'dzin par mdzad/_/g.yon pa thod pa khrag bkang bsnams/_/thod pas 
[\[276a.7\]]skra mtshams bcings pa dang /_/yan lag thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs/_/mche gtsigs 'jigs su rung ba ste/_/ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin chen brgyad/_/rgyu ma'i ga sha stag lpags can/_/mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang /_/zhal nas khrag 'dzag gad rgyangs can/_/phyag rgya 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]drug gis sku la spras/_/drag po'i nyams dang ldan pa ste/_/skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya/_/de yi thugs kar nyi ma la/_/ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs/_/ting 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa/_/rten dang brten par bcas pa bsam/_/de la 'di yi gsang 
[\[276b.2\]]sngags byung /_/o~M badzra ma hA kA lA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa/_/gsang sngags phreng ba bzlas par bya/_/de nas sha chen spos bsreg cing /_/gzhan yang dug dang khrag la sogs/_/bdug pa'i du bas mchod par bya/_/ma sha 'bras dang so ba dang /_/'bru nag me tog byug pa dang 
[\[276b.3\]]sgron ma lnga dang mi 'chi lnga/_/khu ba chan dang chang la sogs//_/gtor ma nag po che la dbul/_/mchod dang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya/_/'di yi nye bar spyad pa ni/_/bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang /_/tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la/_/gang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs/_/byas 
[\[276b.4\]]te dug gis byugs nas kyang /_/tsher mas bkang ste thab khung du/_/'bras phub me la gdung la sogs/_/bya ba sna tshogs las byas na/_/skad cig gis ni brlag par byed/_/rdo rje slob dpon smod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed pa/_/dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba 
[\[276b.5\]]dang /_/sems can kun la 'tshe ba rnams/_/'di dag nag po chen pos sgrol/_/yan lag dag gi sha chod la/_/mgon po nag po'i zhal du gsol/_/yang na de yi spyi nas ni/_/til tsam du ni mdzad du gsol/_/khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung bar mdzod/_/de ltar phrin las las 
[\[276b.6\]]bcol bya/_/de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/_/phung shul g.yul sprad la sogs pa/_/dur khrod sol bas byug byas te/_/gru gsum rim pa kha sgyer ldan/_/de yi nang du drag po'i shing /_/tsher ma can gyis brtsig par bya/_/mchod dang bsreg rdzas gtor ma dang /_/bsgrub bya'i ling+ga 
[\[276b.7\]]sha chen dang /_/yungs kar bcas pas yongs su bskor/_/sngags pas lhor bltas ting 'dzin zhugs/_/me lha bskyed cing dgug gzhug bya/_/ling+ga phur btab gtubs byas la/_/me sbar bsregs pas lha la mchod/_/gsang sngags 'dod yon sgyur ldan pa/_/brag gcig gis ni 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]lan cig ste/_/lan grangs rol mtsho'i khyad par gyis/_/phyir mi zlog cing srog gtor byed/_/de rjes gsol gdab bcol bskul bya/_/shin tu myur bar rtags rnams 'grub/_/nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i las/_/ma grub lan gsum spogs pa dang /_/sa bon 
[\[277a.2\]]'phrog cing gcud pas 'grub/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag po'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po yi/_/dur khrod gnas pa'i zhing skyong dang /_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhing skyong bcas/_/de dag rim 
[\[277a.3\]]pa bshad par bya/_/rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi'i phrin las dang /_/'di nyid gsang ba'i mgon po yi/_/thabs mchog 'di ni kun du sbas/_/dpal ldan mgon po rdo rje can/_/khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/_/shin tu 
[\[277a.4\]]'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sku/_/le tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ni/_/sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus la/_/dpa' bo chen po phyed skyil tshul/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/spyan gsum byi ru la ltar dmar/_/sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po/_/thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/phyag rgya lnga 
[\[277a.5\]]ldan gar gyis rol/_/dang pos gri gug thod pa dang /_/gnyis pa ral gri kha T+wA~M ga/_/klu brgyad rgyan gyi phrin las can/_/de yi thugs kar gnas pa yi/_/sa bon spro dang bsdu ba'i dngos/_/o~M ma hA kA la A kaR+Sha ya ma ma pra sha ma nA ya ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_thams cad sdud cing dbang byed pa/_/
[\[277a.6\]]skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya/_/de yi shar gyi le tshe la/_/drag po shin tu 'jigs pa ste/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/_/mthing nag rngam pa'i tshul du gnas/_/de yi mdun du rgan byed ma/_/g.yas su mi sdug drag po che/_/g.yon du 'jigs ma gnas pa dang /_/rgyab 
[\[277a.7\]]tu u ma rnam par rol/_/nag po'i lho yi phyogs su ni/_/drag po chen po du ba'i mdog_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/_/thod phreng gis brgyan gtsigs pa'i tshul/_/de yi mdun du rnam rgyal ma/_/g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba ma/_/rgyab tu mi sdug ma gnas la/_/g.yon 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]du gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o/_/lha gter mnyam gnas nub phyogs su/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/_/mdog ser rgyu ma'i phreng bas dkris/_/shin tu bzhad pa'i tshul du gnas/_/de yi mdun du nag mo che/_/g.yas su drag chen drag shul can/_/rgyab tu nag sbom 
[\[277b.2\]]ma ni gnas/_/g.yon du bzang mo mche ba can/_/nag mo khyab byed byang phyogs su/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/_/char sprin nag po'i mdog 'dra ba/_/shin tu gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba/_/de yi mdun du dbang mo ste/_/g.yas su zla ba mo zhes bya/_/rgyab tu drag tu sdang 
[\[277b.3\]]ba la/_/g.yon du rna ba 'phyang ba'o/_/gtso bo nag po chen po ni/_/shar lho mtshams kyi gnas bzhugs pa/_/gtsigs pa can ni shel gyi mdog_/stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa'o/_/mdun du lha mo 'phrog byed ma/_/g.yas su 'bar byed ma gnas la/_/de yi rgyab tu 'jigs 
[\[277b.4\]]byed ma/_/g.yon du yul skyong ma gnas so/_/gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yi ni/_/lho nub mtshams su bzhugs pa ni/_/mi sdug pa ni du ba'i mdog_/shin tu mi srun gzugs 'chang ba/_/gzig gi ko ba rlon pas dkris/_/mdun du 'jigs byed drag mo che/_/g.yas su gzugs chen 
[\[277b.5\]]mo zhes bya/_/rgyab tu mche ba gtsigs ma ste/_/g.yon du thod can ma yin no/_/nag po chen po'i sku yi ni/_/nub byang mtshams kyi grwar bzhugs pa/_/dga' bar ldan pa pad dmar mdog_/glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/de yi mdun du thod phreng 'dzin/_/g.yas su phreng ba 'dzin 
[\[277b.6\]]ma ste/_/rgyab tu tri shul 'dzin ma'o/_/g.yon du ltos 'gro bsnams pa'o/_/gtso bo nag po chen po yi/_/byang shar mtshams su gnas pa ni/_/log sred can gyi rdza gsar mdog_/spre'u'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/de yi mdun du ral gri ma/_/g.yas su dgra sta 'dzin ma ste/_/rgyab 
[\[277b.7\]]tu rdo rje mda' thogs ma/_/g.yon du rdo rje gzhu ma'o/_/khro bo'i pho nya 'di dag ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi gar gyis rol/_/dang po gri gug thod pa 'dzin/_/gnyis pas DA ma ru dang ni/_/tri shul ni 'dzin par mdzad/_/pho nya'i rnal 'byor ma 'di dag_/'di dag phal cher zhal 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]gcig la/_/phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can/_/nag mo ser dang dmar ljang ste/_/phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o/_/dur khrod gnas su rol par mdzad/_/pho brang de yi phyi rol du/_/zhing skyong rnams kyis yongs su bskor/_/ka Ta ha re ka ta~M shing /_/shan+ti pa la yab yum 
[\[278a.2\]]can/_/kol+la kir ni ro yi shing /_/g+han+d+ha bA la yum dang ldan/_/d+har par ta pa yi shing /_/aM gi pA la yab yum sbyor/_/ko Tir d+hi pa pa d+hi shing /_/dz+wA la pA la yab yum sbyor/_/b+hi ra tsa ra te a mra'i shing /_/shwa ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas/_/o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i/_/ka pA 
[\[278a.3\]]la yi lha srub byed/_/sa Ta b+ha rur dza ti'i 'bras/_/g+han stod da pa lhan cig sbyor/_/o la pu ri ra ma Na/_/ha ti pa yi rna ba can/_/ha na mo ha yab yum sbyor/_/karmi ra bar rtsa ba'i sdong /_/tsan+d+ra sa na go Ta'i bdag_/ma ri Na par thang sgron shing /_/byin pa k+She tra pA lar ldan/_/nA ga 
[\[278a.4\]]ba rar sa shing can/_/keng rus ldan pa rol bar 'gyur/_/suN+De par ri dzA lu'i shing /_/bu yi rkang pa rtag tu rol/_/dzA la d+ha rar khang brtsegs shing /_/bum pa can de bde bar rol/_/b+ha sna gu bar drag klog 'khrug_/dzA Ta tri pa mnyam par gnas/_/so sa par ni tril sha'i shing /_/
[\[278a.5\]]sgra gcan sgrogs pa'i yum dang bcas/_/tsa ri Ta pa'i ka ran tsar/_/mdzes pa shaka ti can yum ldan/_/o Ta ya par a sho ka'i/_/shin tu sgra gcan gsang mor bcas/_/gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ko li/_/sred pa dpa' bo dbang phyug bcas/_/k+Shi ri ke par sA la'i shing /_/
[\[278a.6\]]lhun po 'bar ba dbang phyug bcas/_/k+Shi ri ki sar sA la'i shing /_/lhun po 'bar ba lhan cig bcas/_/b+ha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing /_/stobs chen 'jigs pa gnas byed pa'o/_/pu Ta nar ni d+ha du pa'i/_/a b+ha ke pa brtul zhugs 'dzin/_/rA dza g+hi har dza pa na/_/sna chen dzi 
[\[278a.7\]]li sgra gcan no/_/khang pa can du rang byung brag_/thub dka' rgyal mtshan 'dzin mar bcas/_/ma hA tra yer tsan+dan shing /_/sna tshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur bcas/_/'di dag k+She tra pA la ni/_/zhing skyong zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_/gri gug cang te'u g.yas pa na/_/g.yon pa thod khrag 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]rtse gsum can/_/yum ni so so'i phyag mtshan ldan/_/skye gnas las byung sgra sgrogs mdzad/_/rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyis/_/lus la yang dag gnas nas ni/_/dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed/_/'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse bas/_/rtag par mtshan mo 'du bar mdzad/_/
[\[278b.2\]]'di dgas gsum khyab pa ste/_/sna tshogs mdog can 'bar ba'o/_/o~M shIn+taM k+She pa hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA smr-i ti hU~M phaT/_oM b+ha lan pU hU~M phaT/_o~M shang ka ri hU~M phaT/_o~M kA lA d+hi pa hU~M phaT/_oM dza ya b+ha lan hU~M phaT/_oM be su b+ha ga hU~M phaT/_o~M par+Na san hU~M phaT/_o~M k+Sha tra pA la ha hi hU~M 
[\[278b.3\]]phaT/_o~M kI li kI li phe~M phe~M phaT phaT/_k+ShA~M k+ShA~M k+ShA~M k+ShA~M/_ka ha ka ha/_hri~M hri~M hri~M hri~M/_pa tsa pa tsa/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_ha hA/_Da DA ra~M rA~M ra~M rA~M/_kru~M kru~M kru~M kru~M/_kha~M kha~M kha~M kha~M/_ru ru ru ru/_Da~M Da~M Da~M Da~M/_ka~M ka~M ka~M ka~M/_tsa~M tsa~M tsa~M tsa~M/_kra~M kra~M kra~M kra~M/_sa~M sa~M sa~M sa~M/_pha~M ba~M ba~M ba~M/_ya~M ya~M ya~M ya~M/_phai~M phai~M phai~M phai~M/_b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M 
[\[278b.4\]]b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/_k+Sha~M k+Sha~M k+Sha~M k+Sha~M/_kle~M kli~M klu~M klu~M/_bA~M bA~M bA~M bA~M swA hA/_yul ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/_/drag po'i zhing skyong nyi shu bzhi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yi/_/sa gsum rnam par khyab nas gnas/_/'di dag gsang ba'i sngags yin te/_/gzhan du nam yang 'khrul bar 'gyur/_/
[\[278b.5\]]oM DA ki nI/_ka kak+na ta na/_b+ha ba ban+d+ha na/_kha kha khA hi ban+d+ha na/_sarba duSh+TA nA~M/_ha na ha na/_g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/_sarba pA pa a mu ka s+ya shIn+ta~M ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_'di dag grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/_/dngos grub stsol bar the tshom med/_/'di nyid dkyil 'khor dgod pa yis/_/
[\[278b.6\]]sna tshogs phrin las byed pa ste/_/dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag po mchog_/pho nya legs brten 'khor lo yin/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dur khrod kyi bdag po rnams dang /_pho nya ba khyad par ba rnams dang ma mo dang zhing skyong gi phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu 
[\[278b.7\]]gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang nyi shu bzhi/_/gsang ba'i mgon po 'di nyid kyis/_/dkyil 'khor pho brang gnas pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro'i gsang sngags bstan par bya/_/pho nya legs skyes rnal 'byor ma/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ro yis ni/_/phye ba'i rdo rje nor bu dang /_/
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]pad+ma ral gri'i rigs dang ni/_/bde gshegs ye shes dam tshig gis/_/sna tshogs sha za'i ma mo rnams/_/gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa/_/klu yis mtshon pas kun du phye/_/o~M b+he ra khi ni swA hA/_Du tri ni/_Da sha ka ra li ni/_dz+wA la mu khi ni/_bA yu be ga ni/_pra 
[\[279a.2\]]tsaN+Dini/_ru dra ak+Shi Ni/_ma hA nA si ni/_a se ni ya ma ni/_kIrti ni/_la k+Sh+mI ni/_bi dza ya ni/_shrI dzA na ye/_shrI dzA ya ka ra Ni/_shrI badzri Ni/_ka~M kA li ni/_kA la rA tri N-i/_pra kro d+ha mu khi ni/_kA la dzi hwA ni/_ga rA li ni/_badzra b+hai ra bA kA ra ni/_d+hu ru si ni/_ya ni ma na a~M ka ri Ni/_mri ka ra sa tis+thA 
[\[279a.3\]]ni/_rat+na mA li ni/_sU tra ak+Shi Ni/_ku su li ni/_khat+t+ri Ni/_badzra pra b+ta ni/_badzra kA la ya ni/_sa ma pany+tsa ni/_ka ma ni b+hi/_tsitrA li ga ni/_shu ki ni/_sarba d+hi ni/_sU tra ri Ni/_g+ha la sma ni/_pad+mA k+Shi Ni/_dza la dza la kha Di b+ha ba b+hu d+hi ni/_shrI g+ho ra Ni/_tsan+d+ra mu khi ni/_ha~M sa warmi Ni/_
[\[279a.4\]]wA gi me shwa ra Ni/_g+hi ta ru dra ye/_ka ra Ni swa ka b+hi ru sa ni mr-i d+ha ni d+hi/_g+hu ri Ni/_sha Sho ni/_su shI g+h+ra~M na/_ban+du b+ha ra Ni/_shrI mu khi ni/_brka la ni/_ka li ni/_ha ri Ni thA ye/_pad+mi ni/_na gra pa ek+Shi Ni/_b+hI ma la tsa Na gri Ni swA hA/_b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sarba yo gi ni kA me shwa ri/_sarba duSh+Ta gardzadza gardzadza gr-ih+Na 
[\[279a.5\]]gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/_chos brgyad dang ni nya ba dang /_/nyi shu dgu dang dgu stong dang /_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/_/las ni the tshom med 'grub pa'o/_/dbyug gu drag po'i pho nya dang /_/chu tshod kyi ni ma mo dang /_/'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis/_/thun ni pho nya brgya dag go/_/dus sbyor bcu 
[\[279a.6\]]gnyis gnas pa'i yul/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi de yi phyed/_/rtsa rlung yi ge khams la rgyu/_/'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las phyi dang nang gi dngos po pho nya ma'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[279a.7\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/nag po chen po gtum po ni/_/zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril cing /_/a la la yi sgra sgrogs pa/_/rab 'jigs bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis ni/_/gsang ba mchod byed lha mo brgyad/_/kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste/_/'di yis phrin las 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dbang thob byed/_/o~M badzra ka wu ba ma hA kA lA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M gr-i d+h+ra sa kA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M b+ha ga byA g+hA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M b+ha na su ba rA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M si ma lA yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M b+ha na shwA nA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M kro Ne d+ha ka rA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ga ru Das gA s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/_'di 
[\[279b.2\]]ni dpal nag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngags so/_/mtshan phyed dus na gtor ma 'bul/_/sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga/_/myos byed stobs dang bcas pas mchod/_/gsang ba sgrub pa'i mchog tu bshad/_/bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis/_/dben par dug dang tsha ba dang /_/sa 
[\[279b.3\]]la dgra bo'i gzugs bya ste/_/grog 'am ni ro ras la/_/rgya skyegs dug dang khrag rnams kyis/_/bya rog mo yi rus pas ni/_/gzugs bris de yi snying gar ni/_/e yi rnam pa'i 'khor lo la/_/mA ra ya yi mtha' can gyi/_/man ngag bzhin du bri bar bya/_/de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te/_/
[\[279b.4\]]dril la dur khrod skra yis dkri/_/sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying ga ru/_/bcug ste tshigs dang lte ba sogs/_/dug dang bcas pa'i tsher ma gzugs/_/de nas sngags pa 'dod lha yi/_/nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas/_/snying ga'i hU~M las 'od 'phros pas/_/lha la bka' bsgo rnam shes ni/_/
[\[279b.5\]]man ngag can gyis dgug par bya/_/o~M badzra ma hA kA la che ge mo A kar+Sha dza dzaHhU~M ba~M hos dgug pa dang /_/gzhug dang bcing dang myos par bya/_/de nas tsha ba dug gis brab/_/de bzhin bdun phrag nyi shu gsum/_/zla ba gcig tu las bsgrubs la/_/drag po'i thab tu tsher ma dang /_/bra ma'i me la 
[\[279b.6\]]bsro bar bya/_/des kyang 'dud par mi byed na/_/bstan pa bde la gnas pa'i phyir/_/snying rje chen po rab bskyed de/_/gri lcags las byas mtshon gyis gtub/_/khrag dang dug dang tsha ba dang /_/tsher ma ling gar bcas te bsregs/_/thal ba bla ma'i man ngag ltar/_/mnan dang chu bor 
[\[279b.7\]]dor bar bya/_/gzhan yang mi shis thod pa la/_/dug gi myu gus gzugs bris te/_/de yi lce la ud ma ni/_/ming spel bris la thod pa gnyis/_/kha sbyar skud pa nag pos dkri/_/nag po'i gos kyis gtums nas ni/_/mi shis sa phyogs dag tu mnan/_/bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]na/_/'chi dang smyo bar 'gyur bar ni/_/the tshom yod pa ma yin no/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam ni dgra bo gang /_/gro ga la ni gzugs bris la/_/snying gar sngags 'dis bskor bar bya/_o~M badzra ma hA kA la che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_ces pa'i sngags bris gtor mar gzhug_/
[\[280a.2\]]de nas bsgrub sngags bzlas par bya/_/de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul/_/mgon po nag po 'khor bcas la/_/sha khrag rkang sogs bstabs byas nas/_/gtor mas bsad pas bsgral bya ste/_/dmigs par bya ba myur du brlag_/gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol te/_/nus pa cung zad yod 
[\[280a.3\]]gyur na/_/rang shed rang la dbab pa'i phyir/_/ngag mnan sbyor ba 'di ltar bya/_/gro ga 'am ni ro ras la/_/khrag dang dug dang bdug pa yis/_/gzugs ni lces khengs sngags bri ba/_/stam+b+ha ming spel ldan pa bskor/_/phyin ci log tu dril la bcing /_/zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa 
[\[280a.4\]]la ni/_/tsha tsha byas pa'i nang bcug la/_/bstim zhing mnan la mdun byas la/_/rnal 'byor spro bsdu phyag rgya bcing /_/thun gyis brabs la bzlas pa bya/_/las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya/_/de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni/_/gnod pa'i sa phyogs dag tu mnan/_/myur du 
[\[280a.5\]]'grub par the tshom med/_/thod pa 'am ni snod gzhan du/_/sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de/_/thun rdzas kyis brab ling+gar bcas/_/yang na drag po klu la gtad/_/gru gsum dong bcug brdzi bar bya/_/kha bcad nas ni drag po yi/_/nges par thob par the tshom med/_/de ltar las 
[\[280a.6\]]la sbyor dus su/_/nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shes nas/_/srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar bsgrag_/bstan pa 'jig par byed pa yi/_/dgra bo srung byed lha khyod nyon/_/gdug pa'i sems ldan dgra 'di yis/_/dkon mchog bla ma la smod cing /_/rnal 'byor la sdang sems can 'tshe/_/sgrub 
[\[280a.7\]]pa po la brnyas gyur pas/_/dpag tshad stong du lhung ba yi/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong gyur pas/_/bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni/_/gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin/_/khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par/_/sdig can 'di ni myur du spongs/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bstan 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]pa bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang /_/snying rje chen po ldan pa yis/_/yengs pa med par byas gyur na/_/nges par 'grub par gdon mi za/_/brgya byin dag gi srog kyang g.yo/_/sdig can dgra bgegs smos ci dgos/_/byang chub sems dang rab ldan na/_/ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par gyur/_/
[\[280b.2\]]dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las lha mo'i 'khor lo dang las bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' ba/_/dpal ldan lcam dral thams cad kyi/_/sgrub pa rab tu nyams 
[\[280b.3\]]dga' ni/_/mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa/_/dang po gri gug thod khrag 'dzin/_/spyan gsum mthing nag rngam pa yi/_/g.yas g.yon par mas phreng ba dang /_DA ma ru ni 'dzin cing brdung /_/tha ma gnyis kyis ka T+wA~M dang /_/sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'ching 
[\[280b.4\]]bar mdzad/_/klu brgyad kyis brgyan khrag 'dzag zhal/_/sa bon rang sngags phreng ba can/_/rgyas btab pas ni byin brlabs shing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' dbu brgyan pa/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la brten/_/bi nA ya ka mnan par bsam/_/o~M badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nA na binA ya ka nA~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_/
[\[280b.5\]]sha chen bsregs spos phul nas ni/_/skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags bzlas/_/de la gtor ma dbul bar bya/_/khyad par byin brlabs gyur par bya/_/phrin las thogs pa med pa 'grub/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma hA kA lA ya hU~M phaT/_sku'i mgon po'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA kA la gu Na 
[\[280b.6\]]hr-i da hU~M phaT/_yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra ma hA kA la rak+Sha ru dri ba Sha ni hU~M phaT/_/gsung gi mgon po'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra kr-iSh+Na tsaN+Da mA ra ya ma hA kA la tsit+ta la hrIHdzaH/_las kyi mgon po'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA kA li ha na badzra hU~M phaT/_yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i 
[\[280b.7\]]mgon po'i sngags so/_/o~M tsaN+De shwa rI ye swA hA/_/gtum po mo'i sngags so/_/oM tsaN+Di tsa kI ye swa ha/_/drag mo'i sngags so/_/oM kA li ka ye swa ha/_/bzlog byed ma'i sngags so/_/o~M ku li she Sha rI ye swA hA/_/dpa' ma'i sngags so/_/o~M shrI ma hA kA lag Na mai tri dzaH/_bde 'dzin 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]ma'i sngags so/_/o~M re da na ti ma hA kA li tri shU la sar+b+ba sha trU~M dzaH/_rtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra ma hA kA la kro tri ga N+Di sa ya hU~M phaT/_gaN+Di 'dzin pa'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra ma hA kA la te tsi tsau ta ka ra ma rA NA~M hU~M phaT/_/rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i sngags so/_/
[\[281a.2\]]gsang ba bed 'dzin mgon po yis/_/lha ma yin gyi grong khyer ni/_/sum brtsegs la sogs khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams/_/khro bo tsan+dan bed bsnams kyis/_/lha dmag bye ba dung phyur rnams/_/phyung nas brlag par mdzad pa yi/_/grong khyer 'bum phrag brgyad cu 'am/_/rlag byed bdud 'dul 
[\[281a.3\]]chen po ste/_/'di nyid g.yon gnas lha mo ni/_/kun du dgyes nas gar stabs gnas/_/o~M shrI ma hA kA la du be~M ni dza a mu ka'i mgo bo la ru dra hU~M b+h+yoH/_o~M shrI ma hA kA la tra ga rak+Sha~M du be~M ni dzaHmun nag shig b+h+yoH/_mu shi b+h+yoH/_che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/_o~M badzra ma hA kA la rak+Sha tri yak+Sha/_/ru dras 
[\[281a.4\]]ma ya/_sarba sha trU~M ru ru tsa ba lA ya/_ma ra Na rbad rbad/_nri rbad pu rbad pu/_tshal pa tshal pa/_ni sha ku ru sa ma ya/_che ge mo/_gtubs gtubs dza dza/_o~M ru ru ma ma b+h+yaH/_ma ma sha trU~M/_tsit+ta la hri~M hrI~M/_mA ra ya rbud rbud/_re sha~Mg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/_kA li ya~M b+ha sha ni ma hA kA la/_
[\[281a.5\]]yak+Sha shA sa na/_a pa ka ri di na me ke na me ru ru ma ma b+h+yaH/_tsit+ta la hri~M hri~M rbad/_tri ri pri tri ka hi swA hA/_ti ka pa tra hU~M/_a tra ka ti swa mo sha mo sna/_tig pug shig_/ku mi ta rbad shig rbud sod/_gaN+Di 'dzin pa'i khro bo che/_/ma rungs klad pa 'gems par byed/_/tsa muN+Di ldan rol pa ste/_/
[\[281a.6\]]gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shis/_/kha T+wA~M rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni/_/dgra bgegs lus ngag yid la 'debs/_/gtum po thogs 'bebs mig sgyur ma/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba'o/_/gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams/_/bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs skrag byed/_/'di 
[\[281a.7\]]nyid legs ldan rgyal po che/_/rdo rje bse gdong sna tshogs gdong /_/dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'di dag gis/_/gsang sngags rim pa bstan pa'o/_/thun mong khyad par bye brag gis/_/lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa/_/grub pa kun du bgrod pa'o/_/dpal mgon po chen po 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags dang phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni/_/grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa po/_/dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni/_/yang dag nyid du 
[\[281b.2\]]bshad par bya/_/bya rog g.yang gzhis brgyan pa yi/_/nag po phyag bzhi pa yi sku/_/gsang zhing dam tshig ldan pas bri/_/de ni sku yi rten du bshad/_/gser dngul la sogs kyis bris pa'i/_/nag po chen po'i snying po dang /_/nye ba'i snying po bris pa rnams/_/gsung gi rten du 'dod 
[\[281b.3\]]pa'o/_/bya rog sogs dang rta nag snying /_/khyi yi snying dang mi yi snying /_/rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams/_/thugs kyi rten du gzung bar bya/_/snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang /_/nya sha la sogs 'bru yi chan/_/sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang /_/bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin/_/
[\[281b.4\]]rdzas dang gta' gtor steng dang 'og_/steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbub/_/sha lnga sman lnga myos byed bcas/_/rgyun du thugs dam bskul phyir mchod/_/rta nag lug nag g.yag rog la/_/mgul du snying po bris la gdags/_/de yi ngo bo legs phul la/_/phyi yi rten du bya bar 
[\[281b.5\]]bshad/_/nag po ras sam dar la yang /_/rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis/_/nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_/bris pa nyin gcig gis rdzogs nas/_/bar chad med par rab gnas bya/_/gsang rten lus la bcang ba'o/_/sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i/_/gtor 
[\[281b.6\]]ma mi shas brgyan pa dag_/pho brang rten dang brten par bcas/_/nang gi rten du slob pa'o/_/skyes pa grir shi'i thod phreng ni/_/yon tan ldan phyir rtag tu sba/_/mi gsod mtshon las byas pa yis/_/rdo rje gri gug hU~M bris pa/_/phrin las byed pa'i khyad par ro/_/dam tshig gnas 
[\[281b.7\]]pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas nyid du/_/lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar ro/_/rigs med kyi ni thod pa la/_/gsang sngags yi ge 'di dag ni/_/bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed/_/bsgrub pa mi dgos nus pa 'byung /_/dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri/_/
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]o~M shrI de wi tsa muN+Da rak+ta tsa muN+Di/_seM ga mor/_d+ha ke sang ha si ta/_mu khi ka ra ha ra/_kI la kI la/_phre k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta brU~M brU~M la la ta ya/_ka pA la ma lA d+ha ra ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bri/_/phyi yi rten du bshad pa yin/_/bong bu nag mo'i thod pa 
[\[282a.2\]]la/_/rten pa lha mo'i sku bris pa/_/nang gi rten du bshad pa yin/_/nal gri'i snying ni mnyams pa/_/mtshon gyi rtse la bkon la gzhag_/gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya/_/bu mo'i thod pa ja ril dang /_/gri gug dar gyis gtums pa dang /_/dri bzang mtshon gyis bdug par 
[\[282a.3\]]bya/_/de kho na nyid rten du bshad/_/de nas nub phyogs dag nas ni/_/gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo/_/mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can/_/rdo rje mgon po 'khor bcas pa/_/rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la/_/'dir ni 
[\[282a.4\]]bstan srung bzhugs su gsol/_/lan gsum brjod nas gzhug par bya/_/rol mo'i sgra dang spos dud dang /_/sna tshogs rol mos bsu nas kyang /_/phrin las gang 'grub rim shes bya/_/'di ni rang bzhin rten yin no/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud 
[\[282a.5\]]las phyi nang gsang ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/_/bka' yi tshogs kyis 'khor gyur pa/_/'di ni kun du shes par bya/_/las kyi mgon po rnams dang ni/_/lha 
[\[282a.6\]]mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas/_/lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa/_/pho nya mngag gzhug las byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang phyogs skyong bcu dang ni/_/klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyad/_/gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal chen bzhi/_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de/_/gnod sbyin brgyad dang 'phrog ma'i 
[\[282a.7\]]bu/_/sha za dang ni ma mo dang /_/'jig rten pa dang dam tshig gnas/_/zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas/_/'di dag las kun byed pa yi/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcas pas/_/grub pa rab tu stsol mdzad pa/_/lha dang lha min mi'am ci/_/lto 'phye grul bum srul po dang /_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs/_/nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang /_/'byung po ma lus 'dus pa kun/_/'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing /_/mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yis/_/bsrung zhing bar chad nges par sel/_/sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i rA hu la/_/'di la sogs pa 
[\[282b.2\]]thams cad la/_/tshogs kyi gtor mas cher mchod na/_/dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster/_/'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi/_/nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang /_/rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'byung /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags gyur pa/_/
[\[282b.3\]]dngos dang nyams snang rmi lam dang /_/sprul pa'i phrin las nges 'byung ba/_/gtso bo nyid dang 'khor rnams kyi/_/rim pa rjes su 'brel par 'byung /_/rtags byung nas ni las la bskul/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa 
[\[282b.4\]]mchod par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/_/thar ba'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar/_/dbang bskur cho ga bshad par bya/_/'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs/_/de las rgyal bar byed pa 
[\[282b.5\]]yi/_/cho ga bzang po bla na med/_/dkyil 'khor bzang po bzheng bar bya/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu/_/rgyud shes yang dag bla ma la/_/snod ldan dag pa'i slob ma yis/_/gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la/_/maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro yin/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa 
[\[282b.6\]]ma lus dang /_/rgyal ba mgon po ma lus dang /_/dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas/_/dang po bsnyen pa brtsam par bya/_/mtshan ma nye ba'am tshul shes nas/_/de nas sngon 'gro 
[\[282b.7\]]brtsam par bya/_/dang po bgegs rnams nyer zhi yi/_/phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yi/_/ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/_/sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i/_/sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis/_/me sbar bsreg 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]ngang bral bar bya/_/de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma las/_/sa brtag ba dang sbyang bar bya/_/sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas/_/brko zhing ro lnga bsal bar bya/_/de nas bsrung zhing bcag par bya/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni/_/rdo rje gom pa'i gar stabs 
[\[283a.2\]]kyis/_/hU~M hU~M drag po'i sgra brjod pas/_/phyogs kun bcing bar byas nas ni/_/bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin/_/slob ma kun la bsrung byas la/_/rdo rje mgon po chen po yi/_/ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la/_/gsol ba gdab pas gnang ba sbyin/_/khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil 
[\[283a.3\]]pas bsrung /_/yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che/_/'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed pa/_/rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che/_/de nas lhag par gnas pa brtsam/_/sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas/_/bka' byin nas ni thim par blta/_/bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan/_/ma nyams 
[\[283a.4\]]mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga/_/kha tshar ma nyams ras zung dkri/_/snying po sman dang 'bru lnga sogs/_/spos dang rin chen dag gis dgang /_/rgyun 'bab chu yis gang ba dang /_/'bras ldan shing gis kha brgyan pa'o/_/de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yi/_/bka' yi khro bo rnam par bsgom/_/
[\[283a.5\]]dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la/_/me tog gcal bkram lha rnams ni/_/bskyed cing mchod la gnyis med bstim/_/so shing dor dang ltas brtag pa/_/bsrung skud ku sha sbyin par bya/_/de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas pas/_/dam tshig gsang ba sbyin par bya/_/khyad par lha la 
[\[283a.6\]]gsol btab nas/_/rdul tshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/dang por ye shes thig gdab cing /_/phyi nang dam tshig nges par gdab/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ma nor nges pa'i tshul/_/srad bu shes rab can thig gdab/_/tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang /_/spra brtag rdul tshon 
[\[283a.7\]]rim par dgye/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhis ni mdzes pa yi/_/zlum skor pho brang le tshe dgu/_/dbus ma e dbyibs drag po nyid/_/phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/_/lha khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog_/'dod yon rin chen sked pad dang /_/dra phyed ba 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]ku li yi phreng /_/yang na kha bad mdzes pa'i rgyan/_/chos 'khor [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdugs dang bcas/_/thod skam pad+ma'i phreng bar ldan/_/dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su 'khor/_/rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs/_/dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i/_/gsang sngags nye ba 
[\[283b.2\]]sngags par gnas/_/brtan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab/_/nye bar brgyan cing yongs su bskor/_/de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[283b.3\]]gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya/_/yang na le tshe dgu ldan pa'i/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du/_/mu khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la/_/e dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod/_/lha dang sa bon phyag mtshan ni/_/
[\[283b.4\]]sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas mtshan/_/slob ma khrus byas rgyan btags te/_/maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing /_/ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su/_/dang por me tog dor bar bya/_/mtshan ma mthong bas legs par drang /_/sgo bzhi nas ni nang 'jug cing /_/gu gul bdug cing 
[\[283b.5\]]ting 'dzin gyis/_/nag po chen po'i lha tshogs kyang /_/nges par spyan drangs bstim par bya/_/de las nges par rtags rnams byung /_/yang na so so'i mgon por bskyed/_/ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab/_/bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las/_/'od 'phros rang 
[\[283b.6\]]byin brlabs par gyur/_/mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor/_/gdong g.yogs bkrol zhing lha ngo bstan/_/de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis/_/nges par rim pas dbang bskur te/_/bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong /_/bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 
[\[283b.7\]]'phel mdzad pa/_/sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis/_/bla med dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir/_/yang dag ye shes dbang bskur ro/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang /_/phrin las lha yi khyad par ro/_/me long ye shes dbang nyid can/_/rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis/_/
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni/_/zhe sdang dag pas dbang bskur ro/_/mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang /_/bya ba nan tan chos kyi dbyings/_/ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang /_/nges par dbang bskur bstan par bya/_/phrin las bzhi yi dbang yang 
[\[284a.2\]]bskur/_/lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub/_/bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang /_/thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs pa yis/_/gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid/_/rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o/_/de rjes b+ha li~M gtad pa yis/_/nus pa thogs med sbyin byed yin/_/sku gsung 
[\[284a.3\]]thugs kyi gsang ba mchog_/lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos/_/ting 'dzin chen po'i phyag rgya che/_/'di nyid dngos grub kun gyi gter/_/zab cing rgya che'i don sgrub pa/_/skal ba can la sbyin par 'os/_/he ru ka dang nag po che/_/bla ma tha dad med pa la/_/tshogs kyi 'khor 
[\[284a.4\]]los legs mchod cing /_/zhabs la gtugs la smon lam gdab/_/'di ni thob par the tshom med/_/phrin las kun du grub ster byed/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[284a.5\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dpal ldan mgon po de nyid kyi/_/phyogs bzhi yongs su skyong ba yi/_/rgyal po chen po rnam pa bzhi/_/shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang /_/byang phyogs nas ni 
[\[284a.6\]]rnam thos sras/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa/_/'di nyid grub pa ster byed pa'o/_/rab tu dben zhing gtsang ba dang /_/bkra shis nyams dga'i sa phyogs su/_/rnam thos sras ni bsgrub par bya/_/sa gzhi ba yi lci bas byug_/dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tsan dan dkar dmar dang /_/a ga ru 
[\[284a.7\]]dang du ru ka/_/kha che gi hang sna tshogs sman/_/bsreg cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya/_/maN+Dal gru bzhi mda' gang ba/_/dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang /_/rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba/_/pho brang rin chen las grub pa/_/sna tshogs pad+ma rin chen gling /_/gter dang dpag 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bsam ljon shing bcas/_/ka ba stong phrag du ma yis/_/rab tu rgyas shing yongs su bskor/_/lte ba rin chen mu khyud la/_/lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/_/bar ma lha khyams mdzes pa la/_/gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor/_/phyi ma rabs bskor ba la/_/klu 
[\[284b.2\]]chen brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/_/sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa/_/dbus su rin chen seng ge'i khri/_/sna tshogs pad+ma ge sar bcas/_/de dbus zla ba dar gyi gdan/_/de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas/_/sa bon phyag mtshan sku dgod bya/_/sna tshogs mchod pas yongs 
[\[284b.3\]]bskor te/_/'bras dang gro dang 'bru sna la/_/gtor ma shin tu bzang bar bsham/_/khyad par me tog sna tshogs ni/_/nA ga ge sar ku mu da/_/puN+Da ke ba ba ku li/_/baR+shi ka dang tsam pa ka/_/d+ha nu ka ri ma li ki/_/su ti ka dang ut+pa la/_/pad+ma man+dA ra ba dang /_/daN+Dod pa 
[\[284b.4\]]la sogs pa'o/_/sna tshogs chu dang bsreg spos tshogs/_/gu gul khyad par bsreg par bya/_/ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi dang /_/khur ba 'bras chan zhun mar dang /_/zhal zas bye brag thams cad dang /_/snang gsal mar me byug pa dang /_/sgra snyan sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas/_/
[\[284b.5\]]gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /_/'phan dang bla re la sogs pa/_/sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi dang /_/de ltar bkod pa legs brgyan nas/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang /_/rang lhar bskyed pa'i sa bon las/_/'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la/_/rab tu 'phros 
[\[284b.6\]]pas 'od du 'bar/_/de las dbus su rgyal chen ni/_/sku mdog gur gum mdog 'dra ba/_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/_/seng ge'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i/_/phyag g.yas yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan can/_/g.yon pa ne'u le'i 
[\[284b.7\]]snod can las/_/kha nas rin chen skyug par bsam/_/gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang /_/nor bu bzang dang rta yi bdag_/yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang /_/lnga rtsen pi tsi kuN+Da li/_/sna tshogs rgyan dang phyag mtshan bcas/_/re re'ang du mas yongs bskor nas/_/
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]shin tu gsal zhing brtan par bsam/_/de nas sa bon las 'phros te/_/rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs la/_/mchod cing bstod de gnyis med bstim/_/khyad par gsol ba gdab par bya/_/rgyal ba mgon po 'khor bcas pa'i/_/yid 'ong khang 
[\[285a.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pho brang 'di/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i char 'bebs pa'i/_/rin chen gter gyi dngos grub gsol/_o~M bai swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_o~M dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/_o~M pUr+NaN b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ku be rA ya swA hA/_o~M sa~M pra dza nA ya swA hA/_o~M gu h+ya s+tha nA ya swA hA/_
[\[285a.3\]]o~M pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/_o~M pi tsi kuN+Da lA ya swA hA/_dang po lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/_/gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid/_/gsum pa kun nas bstod par bya/_/de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/_/gsol ba btab nas phrin las bcol/_/de nas ye shes gshegs su gsol/_/
[\[285a.4\]]der gnas pa ni bzhugs par bya/_/phyi rten nang rten khyad par ba/_/rim pa 'khor lo sngags dang bcas/_/mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang /_/khyad par rtags ni gsal bar 'byung /_/nye ba'i mtshan ma nges mthong nas/_/dngos grub blang zhing gtor ma dbul/_/sbyin sreg 
[\[285a.5\]]las kyis myur du 'grub/_/gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yis ni/_/'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub/_/kha skong me yi mchod pa bya/_/gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa/_/lan bdun nye bar bsnyen pas 'grub/_/'di ni lha rnams kun gyi gter/_/sgrub pa po la stsol bar 
[\[285a.6\]]mdzad/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las khyad par du 'phags pa rnam thos sras gnod sbyin chen po brgyad dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/'phags pa chen po de nyid la/_/klu 
[\[285a.7\]]chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba/_/rim pa 'di ni bstan par bya/_/khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che/_/dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po nyid/_/zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa nyid/_/spyan gsum cung zad khro ba'i tshul/_/sku mdog dmar dang ljang khu'i mdog_/rin chen 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can/_/sku la dar ber sum rim la/_/sna tshogs cod pan rgyan gyis spras/_/phyag rgya rin chen 'bar ba bsnams/_/lha yi ba dan mdzes pa 'phyar/_/g.yon pa mchod rten sku gdung bsnams/_/ne'u le'i rkyal ba nor skyug 'chang /_/'khor du khyad par 
[\[285b.2\]]klu chen brgyad/_/sku lus mi yi rnam pa la/_/sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gdengs ka can/_/phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba nas/_/yid bzhin nor bu legs bsnams pa/_/sems dpa'i 'dug stangs phyed skyil can/_/thams cad gtso la 'dud par byed/_/nor rgyas pad+ma nyid dang 
[\[285b.3\]]ni/_/stobs kyi rgyu dang 'jog po nyid/_/pad+ma che dang hu lu che/_/dung skyong rigs ldan brgyad po nyid/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang dag gi/_/pad+ma la ni gnas bcas te/_/de ltar bskyed la ye shes pa/_/spyan drangs mchod la gnyis med bstim/_/dgyes pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor 
[\[285b.4\]]la/_/yid 'ong dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/_/o~M shrI badzra yak+Sha bai shra ba NA ya hU~M phaT/_o~M ba ru NA ya swA hA/_o~M a nan+tA ya swA hA/_o~M tak+Sha kA ya swA hA/_o~M sha~M kha pA lA ya swA hA/_o~M ka ra ko TA ya swA hA/_o~M pad+mA ya swA hA/_o~M ma hA pad+mA ya swA hA/_o~M ku li kA ya swA hA/_der ni 
[\[285b.5\]]gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/_/sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya/_/de nas klu rnams thams cad la/_/yid 'ong gtor ma dbul bar bya/_/nA ga ge sar pus pa dang /_/rgya mtsho lbu ba a ru dang /_/dzA ti pa la gur gum dang /_/tsan+dan dkar dmar pu shel tse/_/dbang po lag dang 
[\[285b.6\]]snying zho sha/_/chu srin sder mo leb rgan dang /_/'gron bu dung dang mu tig dang /_/nya phyis gla gor zho sha dang /_/mkhal ma zho sha rma bya'i mdongs/_/rta ru rgun 'brum mdar gsum dang /_/gser gyi bye ma ras skud dang /_/'o ma dang ni 'bru sna lnga/_/rin chen sna tshogs ma lus pa/_/
[\[285b.7\]]khyad par du ni dbul bar bya/_/de nas mchod cing bstod bya ste/_/dngos grub gang 'dod stsal bar bsam/_/de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/_/gsang sngags khri phrag bcu bzlas nas/_/rtags byung nas ni dngos grub blang /_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]rgyal po rnam thos sras la klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/drang srong sras mchog de nyid la/_/lha mo brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i/_/thabs nyid rnal 'byor pas shes bya/_/rin 
[\[286a.2\]]chen bdun pa'i khang [{]bzangs su[,]bzang du[}]/_/nor bu sna tshogs gdan bzhugs pa'i/_/'phags pa sku mdog bai DUr+ya/_/zhal gcig phyag drug spyan gsum pa/_/rin chen sna tshogs du mas spras/_/gdug pa klu yis nyer brgyan cing /_/g.yas kyi dang po rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/g.yon gyi 
[\[286a.3\]]dang po rin chen snod/_/bar ma gnyis ni rdo rje dang /_/pad+ma 'bar ba bsnams pa dang /_/tha mas zhags pa tho ba 'phyar/_/stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes/_/skad cig gis ni bsam par bya/_/o~M badzra bi ru ka_/ku ber At+ma ka_/ma hA 
[\[286a.4\]]yak+Sha rA dza rat+na sid+d+hi hU~M swA hA/_/gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa yis/_/gnod sbyin mo rnams mdun du 'gugs/_o~M tsan+d+ra kAn+t+yai swA hA/_o~M su b+ha drA yai swA hA/_o~M dat+tA yai swA hA/_o~M guh+yA yai swA hA/_o~M su dat+tA yai swA hA/_o~M de byai swA hA/_o~M Ar+yA yai swA hA/_o~M sar swat+yai swA hA/_zla 'od can ma rab 
[\[286a.5\]]bzang ma/_/sbyin byed ma dang gsang ba ma/_/rab sbyin ma dang dpal lha mo/_/'phags ma dang ni dbyangs ldan te/_/thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/kun tu rgyal ba 'od 'phro ma/_/gdu bu dpung rgyan mgul rgyan dang /_/zhabs gdub do shal legs brgyan cing /_/dar dang 
[\[286a.6\]]nor bus rnam par mdzes/_/dkar dang ser dang dUr ba'i 'od/_/gser 'od pad+ma rA ga dang /_/ut+pal pad+ma rA ga dang /_/ut+pal puN+Da rI ka dang /_/pa la sha yi mdog mtshungs pa/_/'od kyi phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i nang /_/rin chen sgrom bu gter gyi snod/_/rin chen gzhong pa dung 
[\[286a.7\]]chos dang /_/be tsu ra dang nor bu me/_/dpal be pany+tsa li ka ste/_/g.yon pa kun tu pad+ma bsnams/_/sgeg cing 'gying dang ldan par bsam/_/gtso bos lha mo brgyad po bskul/_/lha mo brgyad po thams cad kyis/_/rin chen char pa phab nas ni/_/bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnam 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]par bsam/_/mgon po myur du bskul ba'i tshe/_/gtso bos mi 'jigs seng ge chibs/_/thun mong gi ni las byed pa'o/_/stobs ldan glang chen rab brtan chibs/_/khyad par sgrub pa'i las rnams byed/_/g.yu 'brug sngon po chibs nas ni/_/snang srid ma lus dbang du sdud/_/
[\[286b.2\]]dbang du byed pa'i las rnams dang /_/khyad par sbyin sreg drag po ni/_/bzhad dang rngam pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/myur du las la 'gro ba yin/_/phyi nas gsang ba'i rim shes pa'i/_/stong phrag bcu yis 'grub pa ste/_/'di ni rin chen ga'u'i nang /_/rin chen 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la/_/
[\[286b.3\]]gsang sngags yi ge'i phreng ba can/_/sa bon spro bsdus ting 'dzin bsgom/_/na mo bai shra ba Na badzra mu sa la/_mu su na sti/_tri shU la a~M ku sha_/pA sha pa ra shu/_ban+d+ha mud gar lA lang k+Shi ta/_hasta s+ya/_na mo na maH_sar+b+ba de wa ta su tsi ta/_kr-i ta Ta s+ya/_ma hA kI la kI lA ya/_sarba gra 
[\[286b.4\]]hA/_a ka ri Sha Ni ya bi dza yA/_dza ya~M dU/_b+ha ga bA na/_nA da ku be rA/_k+Shi ti sa ti tsakra ti ni/_ka la ka la/_nA da ku be ra ki ri ki li/_nA dku be ra/_k+Shi ti pa ti/_tsakra ti ni/_bi dza ma hA b+ha ga ba ni/_nA da ku be ra/_bi kra ta/_drang srong ka ra la/_ban d+ha na/_re'u tra/_d+hi h+ya sa/_gu h+ya/_ka na 
[\[286b.5\]]ga na ba ri br-id+hA/_bai shra ba Na/_b+ha ne b+ha ne/_b+hi ba na ba si ti/_ku ti ku ti/_ku be ra/_nA da ku be ra/_namaHstu te swA hA/_'di ni khyad par sgrub pa ste/_/gsang sngags gnod sbyin stong sde'i tshogs/_/ma lus 'di yis skul bar byed/_/gar mkhan mchog ces bya ba yi/_/lha ni du 
[\[286b.6\]]mas yongs bskor ba'i/_/'di ni bskyed cing spyan drang ba/_/spyan drangs mchod cing bstod pa dang /_/gang sgrub las la bskul bar bya/_/'di yis rnal 'byor dgos pa sgrub/_/zhi bas nad gdon ma lus la/_/dbang gis khams gsum ma lus bsgyur/_/rgyas pas nor dang 
[\[286b.7\]]'bru sogs 'phel/_/mngon spyod kyis ni gdug pa 'dul/_/nor bu bzang pos gter la spyod/_/yang dag shes kyis dus gsum mthong /_/gang ba bzang pos longs spyod 'phel/_/gtsug na 'khyil pas tshe dpal ster/_/'brog gnas rgyal bas dud 'gro spel/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]lnga po 'di dag gis/_/sa gsum g.yo bar byed pa ste/_/'di dag sgrub pos mchod gyur na/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal rnams ster/_/rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yis ni/_/sa bon las 'phros lcags kyus ni/_/'di dag srog gi dbang po la/_/dbang byed 
[\[287a.2\]]las byed mi zlog 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin rnams la shing thog dang /_/klu rnams gtor mas kun du mchod/_/lha mo a ru ra yi 'bru/_/ma lus myur du mchod pa'o/_/gang po dang ni mdzes ma dag_/khyad par mngag gzhug gyur pa'o/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud 
[\[287a.3\]]las rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_/'khor ba'i srid pa ji srid par/_/byang chub sems kyi chos rnams ston/_/ri bo'i rtse dang 
[\[287a.4\]]nags tshal brag_/rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang shing gcig sa/_/gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod de/_/gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan bsgom/_/las kyi mgon po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/gru gsum pho brang la gnas pa/_/dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar ba ni/_/me dpung 'bar ba 'phro 
[\[287a.5\]]ba'i dbus/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/_/sku mdog nag cing mche ba rno/_/yan lag thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang /_/thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan byas/_/spyan gsum sdang mig khro tshul ston/_/bzhin bsgyur mi sdug lus can ni/_/phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug 'phyar/_/
[\[287a.6\]]g.yon pa dam nyams snying khrag gis/_/thod pa bkang nas gsol bar mdzad/_/dug sbrul gdug pas lhu tshigs brgyan/_/dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/_/mi thod rlon pa'i do shal byas/_/ro yi gdan la brdzis nas kyang /_/drag po'i nga ro sgrogs pa'i gnas/_/sku gsung 
[\[287a.7\]]thugs kyi mgon po ni/_/gsod byed rngam byed sgrol byed che/_/bsgrub bya nges par sgrol ba'i tshe/_/sku yi mgon pos dam nyams kyi/_/lte ba'i srog rtsa gcod par byed/_/gsung gi mgon pos dam nyams kyi/_/mgrin pa nas ni khrag rnams 'dren/_/rdo rje thugs kyi 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]mgon po yis/_/snying gi dkar nag mtshams su yang /_/bya rog mchu ni btsugs nas kyang /_/srog rtsa myur du gcod par byed/_/pho nya sha za'i gdong can gyis/_/spyi gtsug nas ni rtsa la 'jib/_/las byed ma mo tsaN+Di kas/_/gsang ba'i mdoms sor dngas ma rngub/_/rtsa 
[\[287b.2\]]'jib ma dang khrag 'thung ma/_/srog 'phrog mas ni las la sbyor/_/nyin mtshan dus las 'da' mi byed/_/'di dag gsang sngags ma yengs bzlas/_/dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad/_/rtsa ba'i sngags ni srog yin te/_/gsung gi dngos grub snying po yin/_/nye ba'i snying 
[\[287b.3\]]pos thugs bskul ba'o/_/ye shes sa bon mi shigs pa/_/dngas ma'i gnas par de bshad do/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/_/rim par bzlas pas bsam gtan 'grub/_/rtags rnams nye bar ma byung na/_/'bad pas bsten cing mchod par bya/_/gzhan du 
[\[287b.4\]]'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/o~M ma hA kA la gu na hr-i da hU~M phaT/_oM ma hA kA la tra ga shad dzaH_ma hA kA la si ti ya ma du dzaH_A li kA li mnyam ldan pa'i/_/rtsa brgyad phreng ba rab tu bsgrags/_/rim par byin brlabs ldan bya'i phyir/_/bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/_/bgrang phreng 
[\[287b.5\]]nus par ldan pa yis/_/las ni myur bar shis pa yin/_/shel gyis zhi ba chen po 'grub/_/mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la/_/dred po'i so yis gsad pa 'grub/_/de gnyis 'gyur ba bong bu'i so/_/sdang dang skrad pa rnga mo'i so/_/ka sogs rnam dag yum bcu drug_/
[\[287b.6\]]byis pa 'tsho byed dbang sogs la/_/dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas/_/bzhi yis lhag pa'i pad 'bras shing /_/lung tang dmar po bdun gcig drug_/yang na tsan dan 'bru dgu 'am/_/rgyu skar phyed pos grangs mnyam pas/_/lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus/_/
[\[287b.7\]]dbyangs dang gsal byed phyed sbyangs pas/_/ru drAk+Sha ni mngon spyod la/_/de lta'i cho ga shes pa yis/_/tshar gcad phan gdags las rnams spyad/_/gsang sngags yi ge'i 'khor lo ni/_/mgal me bzhin du bskor bar bya/_/de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par bya/_/des ni nye 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/des kyang grub par ma gyur na/_/rang nyid ye shes nag po yi/_/gdug pa 'dul bar bsams nas ni/_/las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog_/de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor/_/gzas pa po de sgrol bar byed/_/gal te las 
[\[288a.2\]]la 'gyangs pa na/_/srog gi thigs pa blang ba dang /_/gsang sngags snying po go bzlog cing /_/lte ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na/_/shi sa bstan par 'gyur ba ste/_/srog ni dmar len byed par 'gyur/_/ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung 
[\[288a.3\]]ba las/_/gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur/_/sbyin sreg dang ni mnan pa dang /_/de bzhin zor dgye las bya ba/_/gsad pa rang gshed gnad la dbab/_/de las myur bar rtags byung tshe/_/thugs dam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa 
[\[288a.4\]]dang /_/de dag nar mar 'grub par 'gyur/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las las nye bar bsgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang bcas/_/nag mo 
[\[288a.5\]]mngon par 'byung ba yi/_/las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad/_/dam tshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis/_/brag nag rtse mo rno ba yi/_/kha lhor bltas pa'i brag phug gam/_/gzhan yang ri bo'i zom mam rtse/_/shing gcig dur khrod ma mo'i gnas/_/rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas 
[\[288a.6\]]mchog tu/_/maN+Dal dang ni mchod pa dang /_/gtor ma legs par bshams nas ni/_/sha chen bsregs spos phul nas kyang /_/bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya/_/gru gsum khrag dang dug gis byug_/dug shing tsher ma can gyis brtsig_/gzhan yang ling+ga byas 
[\[288a.7\]]pa la/_/mi bsad lcags kyu tri shU la/_/de yi lus la gdab par bya/_/tshil chen mar me zur gsum pa/_/btang nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la/_/dkyil 'khor grub gsum legs gnas pa/_/ma hA kA la phyag bzhi pa/_/mdog nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus/_/
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]zhal gcig spyan gsum 'bar ba ste/_/g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang /_/'og ma tri shUl rtse gsum pa/_/g.yon gyi dang pos mda' gzhu dang /_/gnyis pas mgo bo khrag 'dzag bsnams/_/dur khrod kyis brgyan sham thabs can/_/de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su/_/sha 
[\[288b.2\]]za gnyis ni gnas par bsam/_/las kun byed pa'i pho nyar bskul/_/dang po lha mo chen mo ni/_/e dbus gsang sngags las grub pa'i/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/_/spyan gsum shin tu sku mdog gnag_/shin tu rnga ma zhing sgeg pa'i sku/_/g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 
[\[288b.3\]]'chang /_/'og ma shag ti 'bar ba can/_/g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'dzin/_/'og ma kha T+wA~M bsnams pa'o/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes/_/mche gtsigs thod pa dug sbrul brgyan/_/glang po'i stod g.yogs stag sham dang /_/re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol/_/bong 
[\[288b.4\]]bu gwa dmar steng nas ni/_/phyed krung 'bar bas bzhugs pa'o/_/yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin/_/dam tshig bskyed la ye shes dgug_/phrin las bcol bar bya ba'o/_/o~M shrI ya de wI kA li kA li ma hA kA li b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Ta bA 
[\[288b.5\]]to si tri tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo dzaH/_ma hA kA li de wI ka rA li bi kr-i ta ka la rA tri Ni/_tsaN+Da rU pi Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hU~M b+h+yaH_o~M ma hA kA li de wI gr-ih+ne b+ha li~M ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_khA hi hU~M phaT/_bdud rtsi 
[\[288b.6\]]lnga dang sha lnga dang /_/skyes pa grir shi'i snying khrag gis/_/nag po chen po'i gtor mar blugs/_/ma nyams grir shi'i ba~M blangs la/_/ma hA ru dra bstims nas ni/_/mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan/_/rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/_/gan rkyal bzhag la bsgral 
[\[288b.7\]]bar bya/_/de yi sha dang khrag dang ni/_/pags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas/_/klad pa klad rgyas zhag dang ni/_/dbang po lnga dang don snying lnga/_/rus pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis/_/ye shes nag po chen po dang /_/dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti/_/las kyi mgon po 'khor 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]dang bcas/_/pho nya bran g.yog dur khrod gnas/_/DA ki'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang /_/de yi sha yi tshogs rnams kyis/_/nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang /_/de yi khrag dang chu ser gyis/_/ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang /_/de yi chu rgyus rus pa rkang /_/sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang /_/
[\[289a.2\]]mkha' 'gro lnga dang lha mo brgyad/_/de yi phrin las mgon po dang /_/sha za 'khor dang bcas la dbul/_/phung po bsgral ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/_/rnam shes bsgral ba'i ye shes bsgyur/_/mi bskyod pa yi zhing khams su/_/rgyal ba'i sras bu bskyed pa yin/_/rnal 'byor 'chi bslu ba dang /_/bar chad 
[\[289a.3\]]thams cad zlog par byed/_/ma rungs bstan la sdang zhing 'tshe/_/sgrub la gnod na las 'di bya/_/gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/_/de yi sha la sbyin sreg bya/_/tshil ni zhun chen mar me bya/_/glad rgyas thod pa'i rnga lpags bya/_/pags pa tshogs kyi gdan du bya/_/bsregs pa'i rus pa tsha tsha bya/_/'dis 
[\[289a.4\]]ni mgon po 'khor bcas tshogs/_/mnyes par 'gyur zhing thugs dam bskang /_/gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las sgrub pa la ni bil ba la sogs pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/_/
[\[289a.5\]]'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i las sgrub na stong phrag gis bya'o/_/khI Di ra'i shing dang dmar ba'i shing gis ni dbang gi las sgrub na khri phrag gis bya'o/_/shin tu rtsub pa'i tsher ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gis ni mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya bar shis so/_/bskrad pa la ni shing gi lo ma rlung mar byung 
[\[289a.6\]]ba'i tshes lam lhung bar blangs te gzugs brnyan bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khral btags te gtang bar bya'o/_/gal te bzlog par 'dod na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi thal bas gtor zhing ba ser skya'i 'o mas lus bkrus na zhi bar byed do/_/rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag byugs te gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo 
[\[289a.7\]]de'i phyogs su gtor bas ni sha za chen pos 'dzin par byed do/_/yang na ce spyang gi sha la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phyar nas lhag ma gzas pa po'i sgo la gtor nas btang na dur khrod kyi ce spyang gi tshogs rab tu 'du zhing ngu la sgo la sder mos 'brad par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu lan gsum byas na ce spyang 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]gis za bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du thog gis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags te ri bong gi thod par bcug ste shing rkang gcig pa'i rtse mo la btags na thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid dang rigs mthun pa'i rus pa rnyed na yungs kar gyis brdeg cing pha mes 
[\[289b.2\]]kyi dur khrod du grib so lhags pa dang sbas te gtor mas mnan cing dong brus par sbas la ro bsregs pa'i g.yam pas mnan na rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/grog mkhar gyis la gzugs byas la/_de la dug dang til mar gyis byugs la 'bras phub kyi me la rab tu bsro zhing sngags brdegs na rims tsha 
[\[289b.3\]]ba chen pos btab par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan pa la ni spra tshil gyis byugs shing tsher ma'i rigs mang po btab par byas nas dus ma yin pa'i rlung la phyar na yul gzhan du gshis ngan du 'chi bar byed do/_/mtsho nang gi nya se ba bzung ste gro ga la ling+ga bris pa de bag zan gyi gzugs dang bcas pa la rab tu 
[\[289b.4\]]bsngags te slar btang na chu grir myur du 'chi bar byed do/_/bse shing la ling+ga bsregs te sgo khang du sbas na skrangs pa chen pos btab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas te mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tu 'byung po'i nyi ma lam nan nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcad na ni 'khor dang bcas pa nus 
[\[289b.5\]]pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi zag pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi sar rus pa'i phur bus btab na ni 'on pa dang long ba dang yan lag nyams pa dang lkugs par 'gyur te/_klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang po nyams pa nyid byed do/_/
[\[289b.6\]]gal te sa phyogs der char mi 'bab par gyur na ka ra bI ra'i shing btsugs la ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma gtor bar byas pas klu gnas pa'i sar song nas rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka' bsgo na char chen po 'bab par byed do/_/bal po se'u'i shing dang 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yab cing klu gzir 
[\[289b.7\]]na char 'bab cing sprin sad par byed do/_/gal te sprin bral bar 'dod na rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gi ba dan g.yab par bya'o/_/khrag sna tshogs pa yungs kar yungs nag tu sbyar te klu gnas pa'i sar sbyin sreg tu byas nas bzlas pa'i thun bar du gtor na ser ba mod la 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/yungs 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]kar yungs nag thal chen la rab tu bsngags nas gtor na ser ba mod la gcod par byed do/_/d+ha du ra'i shing la sbyin sreg byas na smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/nim pa'i shing gis ni rengs par byed do/_/me tog ban d+hu ri ka dang pa la sha yis dgug par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la yang gso 
[\[290a.2\]]bar byed do/_/a ru ra'i sbyin sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed do/_/ma he'i 'o mas bkrus na bcings pa thams cad grol lo/_/a la ru'i shing dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i shing dang gcig tu bsregs te mtshor dor na rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/glang po che'i rus pa la gi hang dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i 
[\[290a.3\]]rigs kyi me tog dang bcas pa kun dga' ra bar sbyin sreg byas na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byed do/_/de dag thams cad sngags dang bcas pa'i nus pa 'grub bo/_/drang srong gi rus pa ri bo'i rtser sbas te 'bru snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa mthong ba'i sar spyod yul du 'gyur na rigs thams 
[\[290a.4\]]cad rab tu 'phel bar byed do/_/a mra'i 'bras bu dang shing thog dzi tsin ta ka dang dza lu dang dzi ba ka rnams la snod du bkang ste gtor ma byas nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du phul na ni gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro/_/phur bus gdab cing yungs kar thal chen gyis mtshams bcad par gyur 
[\[290a.5\]]na gnod pa thams cad las bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/shin tu gsang ba bla na med/_/nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi/_/las kyi dngos grub 
[\[290a.6\]]cho ga bshad/_/dpal nag mo chen po'i phyogs kyi phrin las kyi lha mo la/_shar gyi lha mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed do/_/lho yi lha mo glang sna mas 'ching ba'i las byed do/_/nub kyi lha mo ral pa can gyis sdom pa'i las byed do/_/byang gi lha mo sa'i gtsug gis myos shing dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo bya rgod 
[\[290a.7\]]mgo bo can mas rengs pa'i las byed do/_/stag gi mgo bo can mas bskrad pa'i las byed do/_/phag rgod kyi mgo bo can mas smyor 'jug pa'i las byed do/_/ce spyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do/_/khyi gdong mas ni rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do/_/khwa'i gdong gis rnam par gnon pa'i las byed do/_/'ug pa'i gdong 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gis ni khrag drang ba'i las byed do/_/khyung gi gdong gis ni brgyal ba'i las byed do/_/gzhan yang grong khyer dkrug pa'i las bya bar 'dod na gro ga'am shing shun la dbyangs dang gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bris la bsnol bar byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya gang gi gzugs dang ming 
[\[290b.2\]]spel gyis gnas de myur du bskyod pa rlung dang me dang chu bsnol ma rnam par 'khrug par byed do/_/de nas yang kha sbyar dbye ba'i las dag gis pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi dbye bas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul nas lan bdun myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[290b.3\]]te klu'i dug gis gzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na ti tha la'i 'bru la byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzugs mgo gsum pa lce brkyang ba'am ci rigs su byas pa de'i kha'i nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas de ming dang bcas pas klu gnas pa'i sa phyogs su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do/_/ma he dang 
[\[290b.4\]]rta'i 'khrul 'khor 'byung po'i nyi ma la sa ti tsa'i khu bas bris te de nyid kyi sha khrag dang bcas pas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu 'khrug cing 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na bi ta na rau pa la trai zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i thabs kyis bgegs chen po bsgral ba'i gzugs la brten nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs 
[\[290b.5\]]te las su bya ba'o/_/yang na sa nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i tshogs kha phyir bltas pa dang nang du bltas pa dag bkod de/_pha rol rgol ba'i phyogs su bskyal na ni myur du yul dang bcas pa brlag par byed do/_/sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jigs pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang 
[\[290b.6\]]zhags pa thogs pa mdun du dmigs la phur bus btab pa dang bcas pa'i thabs kyi pha rol gyi dpung g.yos pa dang bcas pa bzlog par byed do/_/gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/ri rab kyi gzugs la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan 
[\[290b.7\]]bkod de/_phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab na g.yul chen po las rgyal bar byed do/_/dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka'am bi Da ka'i shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongs su rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do/_/rdo rje bya khyung gi 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]phyag rgya bcas la des klu non par byas na de nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i 'jam pa'i spyod yul gyis 'dul ba la nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pas klu'i gnas thams cad du ltas chen po drug byung bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa 
[\[291a.2\]]snyam byed nas myur bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang du skyes pa g.yul ngor bsad pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpal nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bar byas la bskyed pa dang bstims te bzlas pa bya/_dben 
[\[291a.3\]]par sbas nas gsol ba btab na gang 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sa kun la yang bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa dang /_de'i mdun du khrus byas te nyal na lung ston pa'am dge mi dge gsal po ston par 'gyur ro/_/yang na dur khrod kyi ras sam dar nag po la yang rung ste/_
[\[291a.4\]]dam tshig dang ldan pas bris te/_mchod pa dang gtor mar ldan pas/_rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin brlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyang rin po che las byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btab na zla ba drug gis nges par yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du 
[\[291a.5\]]byas te shes rab yongs su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i gzungs yongs su 'dzin pa dang blo yongs su dag pa dang mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/srung bas bsrung zhing bcings pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo/_/gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon 
[\[291a.6\]]tan phrin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas na dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang bar chad thams cad las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin no/_/khyad par du yang gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thams cad du ye shes kyi nag po chen pos rjes 
[\[291a.7\]]su skyong ba dang rgyang ring po nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad do/_/'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang tshe dang dpal rab tu ster cing mi zad pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa dang nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing bdud kyi ris kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]skrag ste mgo 'gas pa tsam du byed par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar thug par 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis gtum pa dang /_dpa' ba dang /_drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o/_/gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_pho 
[\[291b.2\]]nya'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang /_sha za'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang phrin las thogs pa med pa 'grub par byed do/_/zhing skyong chen po dang nye ba'i zhing skyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi 
[\[291b.3\]]po dag gis kyang phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o/_/gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_sems pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang /_rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob 
[\[291b.4\]]par byed do/_/nye bar dgongs pas mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas/_/drang srong thub pas yang dag 
[\[291b.5\]]bstan/_/nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa/_/rgyal ba yon tan 'byung ba'i gter/_/ye shes mgon po chen po dang /_/las kyi mgon po du mar bcas/_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo ni/_/'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste/_/skal ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gang /_/nga yis lung bstan gyur pa yin/_/
[\[291b.6\]]gdug pa rnams ni gzud pa'i phyir/_/mkhas pas snying rje bskyed nas ni/_/cho ga kun mchog gis rab sgrub/_/bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de/_/de bzhin bdag de dam pa'i bdag_/dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas/_/'di la the tshom mi bya ste/_/sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/rnam dag rnam pa can 
[\[291b.7\]]sems kyi/_/rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das/_/ma rungs pa ni gang dag gis/_/skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang /_/de nyid thabs dang bcas pa yis/_/srid pa'i bcing las grol bar 'gyur/_/de ltar grub pa'i lam bsten cing /_/thun mong khyad par 'grub par 'gyur/_/dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma 'bul/_/
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]bgegs med bsod nams 'phel byed pa'o/_/'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/_sha chen po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bshams la/_o~M ba liM ma Ni ra~M hU~M dza/_rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha mi/_kha kha khA hi khA hi 
[\[292a.2\]]gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ba liM/_ma hA bi Sha nA~M/_pra sA d+ha ya pra sA d+ha ya/_hu lu hu lu phaT/_kha kha khA hi khA hi mA ra mA ra/_sar+b+ba ta sa na sa tra~M/_wa ri ha d+hi ra pra yats+tsha n+tu swA hA/_o~M AHhU~M zhes pas mtshan phyed na gtor ma bsreg spos dang bcas pa dbul bar bya'o/_/o~M hAHka ha ka ha ma li ni mu khi ye yaM sAd+ha ya/_ma hA kA la bud+d+ha dza~M/_pra ti to si/_
[\[292a.3\]]kA ra ya kA ra ya/_pra duSh+TA na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_mA ra mA ra/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_shI g+h+ra~M/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_hu ra hu ra/_ma~M ra~M hU~M phaT/_i diM ba li~M gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_shrI sar+b+ba o~M AHhU~M/_dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba grub pa dang gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga 
[\[292a.4\]]pa'o//_//dpal mgon po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa bstan pa 'dzin pa/_bstan pa skyong ba/_bstan pa bsrung nges pa/_gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o/_/dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi 
[\[292a.5\]]snying por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA baN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta pA da'i zhal snga nas dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba mkhas pa chen po khe'u rgad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/_/yang slad nas mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas grags pa'i spyan 
[\[292a.6\]]sngar kre bo shes rab dpal gyis kyang zhu tig bgyis pa'o//_//_//
